atk-vin01a0:69_0: Tattha taṃ vaṇṇayissaṃ vinayanti vuttattā vinayo tāva vavatthapetabbo. Tenetaṃ vuccati
atk-vin01a0:69_1: – “vinayo nāma idha sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ adhippeta”nti. Saṃvaṇṇanatthaṃ panassa ayaṃ mātikā –
atk-vin01a0:70: Vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā, dhāritaṃ yena cābhataṃ;
atk-vin01a0:74_0: Tattha vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmāti idaṃ tāva vacanaṃ “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:74_1: viharatī”ti evamādivacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Idañhi buddhassa bhagavato attapaccakkhavacanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:74_2: na hoti, tasmā vattabbametaṃ “idaṃ vacanaṃ kena vuttaṃ, kadā vuttaṃ, kasmā ca vutta”nti?
atk-vin01a0:74_3: Āyasmatā upālittherena vuttaṃ, tañca pana paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle.
atk-vin01a0:76_0: Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cesā kiñcāpi pañcasatikasaṅgītikkhandhake vuttā, nidānakosallatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:76_1: pana idhāpi iminā nayena veditabbā. Dhammacakkappavattanañhi ādiṃ katvā yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā
atk-vin01a0:76_2: katabuddhakicce kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare visākhapuṇṇamadivase
atk-vin01a0:76_3: paccūsasamaye anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbute bhagavati lokanāthe, bhagavato
atk-vin01a0:76_4: parinibbāne sannipatitānaṃ sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ saṅghatthero āyasmā mahākassapo
atk-vin01a0:76_5: sattāhaparinibbute bhagavati, subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena “alaṃ, āvuso, mā socittha,
atk-vin01a0:76_6: mā paridevittha, sumuttā mayaṃ tena mahāsamaṇena; upaddutā ca homa – ‘idaṃ vo kappati,
atk-vin01a0:76_7: idaṃ vo na kappatī’ti! Idāni pana mayaṃ yaṃ icchissāma taṃ karissāma, yaṃ na icchissāma
atk-vin01a0:76_8: na taṃ karissāmā”ti vuttavacanamanussaranto “ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati yaṃ pāpabhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:76_9: atītasatthukaṃ pāvacananti maññamānā pakkhaṃ labhitvā nacirasseva saddhammaṃ antaradhāpeyyuṃ,
atk-vin01a0:76_10: yāva ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhati tāva anatītasatthukameva pāvacanaṃ hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-vin01a0:77: ‘Yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā’ti.
atk-vin01a0:78: “Yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ, yathayidaṃ sāsanaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:80: ‘Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ, kassapa, sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānī’ti vatvā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena ceva,
atk-vin01a0:81_0: ‘Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-vin01a0:81_1: viharāmi; kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhati vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:82_1: samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahito, tassa kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissati; nanu maṃ bhagavā
atk-vin01a0:82_2: rājā viya sakakavacaissariyānuppadānena attano kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpakaṃ puttaṃ ‘saddhammavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpako
atk-vin01a0:82_3: me ayaṃ bhavissatī’ti mantvā iminā asādhāraṇena anuggahena anuggahesī”ti cintayanto
atk-vin01a0:83_0: “Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhikkhū āmantesi – ‘ekamidāhaṃ, āvuso, samayaṃ pāvāya
atk-vin01a0:83_1: kusināraṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehī”ti
atk-vin01a0:85_0: “Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma. Pure adhammo dippati, dhammo
atk-vin01a0:85_1: paṭibāhiyyati; avinayo dippati, vinayo paṭibāhiyyati. Pure adhammavādino balavanto
atk-vin01a0:85_2: honti, dhammavādino dubbalā honti; avinayavādino balavanto honti, vinayavādino dubbalā hontī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:86_0: Bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “tena hi, bhante, thero bhikkhū uccinatū”ti. Thero sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapariyattidhare
atk-vin01a0:86_2: anekasahasse ca vajjetvā tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadhare paṭisambhidāppatte mahānubhāve
atk-vin01a0:86_3: yebhuyyena bhagavatā etadaggaṃ āropite tevijjādibhede khīṇāsavabhikkhūyeva ekūnapañcasate
atk-vin01a0:86_4: pariggahesi. Ye sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ – “atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo ekenūnāpañcaarahantasatāni uccinī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:87_0: Kissa pana thero ekenūnamakāsīti? Āyasmato ānandattherassa okāsakaraṇatthaṃ. Tena
atk-vin01a0:87_1: hāyasmatā sahāpi vināpi na sakkā dhammasaṅgīti kātuṃ, so hāyasmā sekkho sakaraṇīyo,
atk-vin01a0:87_2: tasmā sahāpi na sakkā; yasmā panassa kiñci dasabaladesitaṃ suttageyyādikaṃ bhagavato
atk-vin01a0:87_3: asammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā vināpi na sakkā. Yadi evaṃ sekkhopi samāno
atk-vin01a0:87_4: dhammasaṅgītiyā bahukārattā therena uccinitabbo assa. Atha kasmā na uccinitoti? Parūpavādavivajjanato.
atk-vin01a0:87_5: Thero hi āyasmante ānande ativiya vissattho ahosi, tathā hi naṃ sirasmiṃ palitesu
atk-vin01a0:87_6: jātesupi “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti kumārakavādena ovadati. Sakyakulappasuto
atk-vin01a0:87_7: cāyaṃ āyasmā tathāgatassa bhātā cūḷapituputto. Tatra hi bhikkhū chandāgamanaṃ viya
atk-vin01a0:87_8: maññamānā “bahū asekkhapaṭisambhidāppatte bhikkhū ṭhapetvā ānandaṃ sekkhapaṭisambhidāppattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:87_9: thero uccinī”ti upavadeyyuṃ, taṃ parūpavādaṃ parivajjento “ānandaṃ vinā saṅgīti na
atk-vin01a0:87_10: sakkā kātuṃ, bhikkhūnaṃyeva anumatiyā gahessāmī”ti na uccini.
atk-vin01a0:88: Atha sayameva bhikkhū ānandassatthāya theraṃ yāciṃsu. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a0:89_0: “Bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ etadavocuṃ – ‘ayaṃ, bhante, āyasmā ānando kiñcāpi
atk-vin01a0:89_1: sekkho abhabbo chandā dosā mohā bhayā agatiṃ gantuṃ, bahu cānena bhagavato santike
atk-vin01a0:89_2: dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto; tena hi, bhante, thero āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinatū’ti.
atk-vin01a0:89_3: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:90: Evaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā uccinitena tenāyasmatā saddhiṃ pañca therasatāni ahesuṃ.
atk-vin01a0:91_0: Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – “kattha nu kho mayaṃ dhammañca vinayañca
atk-vin01a0:91_1: saṅgāyeyyāmā”ti. Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – “rājagahaṃ kho mahāgocaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:91_2: pahūtasenāsanaṃ, yaṃnūna mayaṃ rājagahe vassaṃ vasantā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma,
atk-vin01a0:91_3: na aññe bhikkhū rājagahe vassaṃ upagaccheyyu”nti. Kasmā pana nesaṃ etadahosi? Idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:91_4: amhākaṃ thāvarakammaṃ, koci visabhāgapuggalo saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisitvā ukkoṭeyyāti.
atk-vin01a0:91_5: Athāyasmā mahākassapo ñattidutiyena kammena sāvesi, taṃ saṅgītikkhandhake vuttanayeneva ñātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:92_0: Atha tathāgatassa parinibbānato sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesu sattasu ca dhātupūjādivasesu
atk-vin01a0:92_1: vītivattesu “aḍḍhamāso atikkanto, idāni gimhānaṃ diyaḍḍho māso seso, upakaṭṭhā vassūpanāyikā”ti
atk-vin01a0:92_2: mantvā mahākassapatthero “rājagahaṃ, āvuso, gacchāmā”ti upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:92_3: ekaṃ maggaṃ gato. Anuruddhattheropi upaḍḍhaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gato. Ānandatthero
atk-vin01a0:92_4: pana bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiṃ gantvā rājagahaṃ
atk-vin01a0:92_5: gantukāmo yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi. Ānandattherena gatagataṭṭhāne mahāparidevo
atk-vin01a0:92_6: ahosi – “bhante ānanda, kuhiṃ satthāraṃ ṭhapetvā āgatosī”ti. Anupubbena pana sāvatthiṃ
atk-vin01a0:92_7: anuppatte there bhagavato parinibbānadivase viya mahāparidevo ahosi.
atk-vin01a0:93_0: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā ānando aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya taṃ mahājanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:93_1: saññāpetvā jetavanaṃ pavisitvā dasabalena vasitagandhakuṭiyā dvāraṃ vivaritvā mañcapīṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:93_2: nīharitvā papphoṭetvā gandhakuṭiṃ sammajjitvā milātamālākacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā mañcapīṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:93_3: atiharitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā bhagavato ṭhitakāle karaṇīyaṃ vattaṃ sabbamakāsi.
atk-vin01a0:93_4: Atha thero bhagavato parinibbānato pabhuti ṭhānanisajjabahulattā ussannadhātukaṃ
atk-vin01a0:93_5: kāyaṃ samassāsetuṃ dutiyadivase khīravirecanaṃ pivitvā vihāreyeva nisīdi. Yaṃ sandhāya
atk-vin01a0:94: “Akālo kho, māṇavaka, atthi me ajja bhesajjamattā pītā, appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāmā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:95: Dutiyadivase cetakattherena pacchāsamaṇena gantvā subhena māṇavena puṭṭho dīghanikāye subhasuttaṃnāma dasamaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-vin01a0:96_0: Atha thero jetavanavihāre khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ kārāpetvā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya
atk-vin01a0:96_1: rājagahaṃ gato. Tathā mahākassapatthero anuruddhatthero ca sabbaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-vin01a0:97_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe aṭṭhārasa mahāvihārā honti. Te sabbepi chaḍḍitapatitauklāpā
atk-vin01a0:97_1: ahesuṃ. Bhagavato hi parinibbāne sabbe bhikkhū attano attano pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:97_2: vihāre ca pariveṇe ca chaḍḍetvā agamaṃsu. Tattha therā bhagavato vacanapūjanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:97_4: cintesuṃ. Titthiyā hi evaṃ vadeyyuṃ – “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā satthari ṭhiteyeva
atk-vin01a0:97_5: vihāre paṭijaggiṃsu, parinibbute chaḍḍesu”nti. Tesaṃ vādaparimocanatthañca cintesunti
atk-vin01a0:98_0: “Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – ‘bhagavatā kho, āvuso, khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:98_1: vaṇṇitaṃ. Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ karoma,
atk-vin01a0:98_2: majjhimaṃ māsaṃ sannipatitvā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyissāmā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:99_0: Te dutiyadivase gantvā rājadvāre aṭṭhaṃsu. Ajātasattu rājā āgantvā vanditvā “kiṃ,
atk-vin01a0:99_1: bhante, āgatatthā”ti attanā kattabbakiccaṃ paṭipucchi. Therā aṭṭhārasa mahāvihārapaṭisaṅkharaṇatthāya
atk-vin01a0:99_2: hatthakammaṃ paṭivedesuṃ. “Sādhu, bhante”ti rājā hatthakammakārake manusse adāsi.
atk-vin01a0:99_3: Therā paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ sabbavihāre paṭisaṅkharāpetvā rañño ārocesuṃ – “niṭṭhitaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a0:99_4: vihārapaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ. Idāni dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ karomā”ti. “Sādhu, bhante, vissatthā
atk-vin01a0:99_5: karotha. Mayhaṃ āṇācakkaṃ, tumhākaṃ dhammacakkaṃ hotu. Āṇāpetha, bhante, kiṃ karomī”ti?
atk-vin01a0:99_6: “Saṅgahaṃ karontānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannisajjaṭṭhānaṃ, mahārājā”ti. “Kattha karomi, bhante”ti?
atk-vin01a0:99_8: kho rājā ajātasattu vissakammunā nimmitasadisaṃ suvibhattabhittitthambhasopānaṃ nānāvidhamālākammalataākammavicittaṃ
atk-vin01a0:99_9: abhibhavantamiva rājabhavanavibhūtiṃ avahasantamiva devavimānasiriṃ siriyā niketamiva
atk-vin01a0:99_13: brahmavimānasadisaṃ alaṅkaritvā tasmiṃ mahāmaṇḍape pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anagghāni
atk-vin01a0:99_14: pañca kappiyapaccattharaṇasatāni paññāpetvā dakkhiṇabhāgaṃ nissāya uttarābhimukhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:99_15: therāsanaṃ maṇḍapamajjhe puratthābhimukhaṃ buddhassa bhagavato āsanārahaṃ dhammāsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:99_16: paññāpetvā dantakhacitaṃ bījaniñcettha ṭhapetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocāpesi – “niṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:100_0: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye ekacce bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sandhāya evamāhaṃsu – “imasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:100_1: bhikkhusaṅghe eko bhikkhu vissagandhaṃ vāyanto vicaratī”ti. Thero taṃ sutvā “imasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:100_2: bhikkhusaṅghe añño vissagandhaṃ vāyanto vicaraṇakabhikkhu nāma natthi, addhā ete
atk-vin01a0:100_3: maṃ sandhāya vadantī”ti saṃvegaṃ āpajji. Ekacce bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āhaṃsu
atk-vin01a0:100_4: – “sve, āvuso, sannipāto tvañca sekkho sakaraṇīyo, tena te na yuttaṃ sannipātaṃ gantuṃ, appamatto hohī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:101_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando – “sve sannipāto, na kho pana metaṃ patirūpaṃ yvāhaṃ sekkho
atk-vin01a0:101_1: samāno sannipātaṃ gaccheyya”nti bahudeva rattiṃ kāyagatāyasatiyā vītināmetvā rattiyā
atk-vin01a0:101_2: paccūsasamayaṃ caṅkamā orohitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā “nipajjissāmī”ti kāyaṃ āvajjesi.
atk-vin01a0:101_3: Dve pādā bhūmito muttā, appattañca sīsaṃ bimbohanaṃ, etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi
atk-vin01a0:101_4: cittaṃ vimucci. Ayañhi āyasmā caṅkamena bahi vītināmetvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto
atk-vin01a0:101_5: cintesi – “nanu maṃ bhagavā etadavoca – ‘katapuññosi tvaṃ, ānanda, padhānamanuyuñja;
atk-vin01a0:101_6: khippaṃ hohisi anāsavo’ti. Buddhānañca kathādoso nāma natthi. Mama accāraddhaṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:101_7: tena me cittaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvattati. Handāhaṃ vīriyasamathaṃ yojemī”ti caṅkamā orohitvā
atk-vin01a0:101_8: pādadhovanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā pāde dhovitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā mañcake nisīditvā “thokaṃ
atk-vin01a0:101_9: vissamissāmī”ti kāyaṃ mañcake upanāmesi. Dve pādā bhūmito muttā, sīsañca bimbohanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:101_10: asampattaṃ. Etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ, catuiriyāpathavirahitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:101_11: therassa arahattaṃ ahosi. Tena imasmiṃ sāsane anipanno anisinno aṭṭhito acaṅkamanto
atk-vin01a0:101_12: “ko bhikkhu arahattaṃ patto”ti vutte “ānandatthero”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:102_0: Atha kho therā bhikkhū dutiyadivase katabhattakiccā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:102_1: sannipatitā. Ānandatthero pana attano arahattappattiṃ ñāpetukāmo bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:102_2: na gato. Bhikkhū yathāvuḍḍhaṃ attano attano pattāsane nisīdantā ānandattherassa āsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:102_3: ṭhapetvā nisinnā. Tattha kehici “etamāsanaṃ kassā”ti vutte “ānandattherassā”ti. “Ānando
atk-vin01a0:102_4: pana kuhiṃ gato”ti? Tasmiṃ samaye thero cintesi – “idāni mayhaṃ gamanakālo”ti. Tato
atk-vin01a0:102_5: attano ānubhāvaṃ dassento pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā attano āsaneyeva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-vin01a0:103_0: Evaṃ nisinne tasmiṃ āyasmante mahākassapatthero bhikkhū āmantesi – “āvuso, kiṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:103_1: saṅgāyāma, dhammaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā”ti? Bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “bhante mahākassapa, vinayo
atk-vin01a0:103_2: nāma buddhasāsanassa āyu, vinaye ṭhite sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti; tasmā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:103_3: saṅgāyāmā”ti,. “Kaṃ dhuraṃ katvā”ti? “Āyasmantaṃ upāli”nti. “Kiṃ ānando nappahotī”ti?
atk-vin01a0:103_4: “No nappahoti; api ca kho pana sammāsambuddho dharamānoyeva vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya
atk-vin01a0:103_5: āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ etadagge ṭhapesi – ‘etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:103_6: vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī’ti. Tasmā upālittheraṃ pucchitvā vinayaṃ saṅgāyāmā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:103_7: Tato thero vinayaṃ pucchanatthāya attanāva attānaṃ sammanni. Upālittheropi vissajjanatthāya
atk-vin01a0:105: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ upāliṃ vinayaṃ puccheyya’nti.
atk-vin01a0:107: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti.
atk-vin01a0:108_0: Evaṃ attanāva attānaṃ sammannitvā āyasmā upāli uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:108_1: there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane nisīdi, dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā. Tato āyasmā
atk-vin01a0:108_2: mahākassapo therāsane nisīditvā āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ vinayaṃ pucchi – “paṭhamaṃ, āvuso
atk-vin01a0:108_3: upāli, pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”nti? “Vesāliyaṃ, bhante”ti. “Kaṃ ārabbhā”ti? “Sudinnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:109_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ paṭhamassa pārājikassa vatthumpi pucchi,
atk-vin01a0:109_1: nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, paññattimpi pucchi, anupaññattimpi pucchi, āpattimpi
atk-vin01a0:109_2: pucchi, anāpattimpi pucchi; yathā ca paṭhamassa tathā dutiyassa tathā tatiyassa tathā
atk-vin01a0:109_3: catutthassa pārājikassa vatthumpi pucchi…pe… anāpattimpi pucchi. Puṭṭho puṭṭho upālitthero
atk-vin01a0:109_4: vissajjesi. Tato imāni cattāri pārājikāni “pārājikakaṇḍaṃ nāma ida”nti saṅgahaṃ āropetvā
atk-vin01a0:109_5: ṭhapesuṃ. Terasa saṅghādisesāni “terasaka”nti ṭhapesuṃ. Dve sikkhāpadāni “aniyatānī”ti
atk-vin01a0:109_6: ṭhapesuṃ. Tiṃsa sikkhāpadāni “nissaggiyapācittiyānī”ti ṭhapesuṃ. Dvenavuti sikkhāpadāni
atk-vin01a0:110_0: Evaṃ mahāvibhaṅgaṃ saṅgahaṃ āropetvā bhikkhunīvibhaṅge aṭṭha sikkhāpadāni “pārājikakaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin01a0:110_1: nāma ida”nti ṭhapesuṃ. Sattarasa sikkhāpadāni “sattarasaka”nti ṭhapesuṃ. Tiṃsa sikkhāpadāni
atk-vin01a0:110_4: ṭhapesuṃ. Satta dhamme “adhikaraṇasamathā”ti ṭhapesuṃ. Evaṃ bhikkhunīvibhaṅgaṃ saṅgahaṃ
atk-vin01a0:110_5: āropetvā eteneva upāyena khandhakaparivārepi āropesuṃ. Evametaṃ saubhatovibhaṅgakhandhakaparivāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:110_6: vinayapiṭakaṃ saṅgahamārūḷhaṃ sabbaṃ mahākassapatthero pucchi, upālitthero vissajjesi.
atk-vin01a0:110_7: Pucchāvissajjanapariyosāne pañca arahantasatāni saṅgahaṃ āropitanayeneva gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:110_8: Vinayasaṅgahāvasāne upālitthero dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ nikkhipitvā dhammāsanā orohitvā
atk-vin01a0:110_9: vuḍḍhe bhikkhū vanditvā attano pattāsane nisīdi.
atk-vin01a0:111_0: Vinayaṃ saṅgāyitvā dhammaṃ saṅgāyitukāmo āyasmā mahākassapo bhikkhū pucchi – “dhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:111_1: saṅgāyantehi kaṃ puggalaṃ dhuraṃ katvā dhammo saṅgāyitabbo”ti? Bhikkhū “ānandattheraṃ
atk-vin01a0:112: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-vin01a0:113: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ ānandaṃ dhammaṃ puccheyya”nti.
atk-vin01a0:114: Atha kho āyasmā ānando saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-vin01a0:115: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena dhammaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti.
atk-vin01a0:116_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane
atk-vin01a0:116_1: nisīdi dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā. Atha mahākassapatthero ānandattheraṃ dhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:116_2: pucchi – “brahmajālaṃ, āvuso ānanda, kattha bhāsita”nti? “Antarā ca, bhante, rājagahaṃ
atk-vin01a0:116_3: antarā ca nāḷandaṃ rājāgārake ambalaṭṭhikāya”nti. “Kaṃ ārabbhā”ti? “Suppiyañca paribbājakaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:116_4: brahmadattañca māṇava”nti. “Kismiṃ vatthusmi”nti? “Vaṇṇāvaṇṇe”ti. Atha kho āyasmā
atk-vin01a0:116_5: mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ brahmajālassa nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi,
atk-vin01a0:116_6: vatthumpi pucchi. “Sāmaññaphalaṃ panāvuso ānanda, kattha bhāsita”nti? ‘Rājagahe,
atk-vin01a0:116_8: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sāmaññaphalassa nidānampi pucchi,
atk-vin01a0:116_9: puggalampi pucchi. Eteneva upāyena pañca nikāye pucchi.
atk-vin01a0:117_0: Pañcanikāyā nāma – dīghanikāyo, majjhimanikāyo, saṃyuttanikāyo, aṅguttaranikāyo,
atk-vin01a0:117_1: khuddakanikāyoti. Tattha khuddakanikāyo nāma – cattāro nikāye ṭhapetvā, avasesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:117_2: buddhavacanaṃ. Tattha vinayo āyasmatā upālittherena vissajjito, sesakhuddakanikāyo
atk-vin01a0:117_3: cattāro ca nikāyā ānandattherena. Tadetaṃ sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ rasavasena ekavidhaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:117_4: dhammavinayavasena duvidhaṃ, paṭhamamajjhimapacchimavasena tividhaṃ; tathā piṭakavasena,
atk-vin01a0:117_5: nikāyavasena pañcavidhaṃ, aṅgavasena navavidhaṃ, dhammakkhandhavasena caturāsītisahassavidhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:118_0: Kathaṃ rasavasena ekavidhaṃ? Yañhi bhagavatā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā
atk-vin01a0:118_1: yāva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati, etthantare pañcacattālīsavassāni
atk-vin01a0:118_2: devamanussanāgayakkhādayo anusāsantena paccavekkhantena vā vuttaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekarasaṃ
atk-vin01a0:119_0: Kathaṃ dhammavinayavasena duvidhaṃ? Sabbameva cetaṃ dhammo ceva vinayo cāti saṅkhyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:119_1: gacchati. Tattha vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayo, avasesaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhammo; tenevāha –
atk-vin01a0:119_2: “yaṃnūna mayaṃ, āvuso, dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāmā”ti. “Ahaṃ upāliṃ vinayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:119_3: puccheyyaṃ, ānandaṃ dhammaṃ puccheyya”nti ca evaṃ dhammavinayavasena duvidhaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:120: Kathaṃ paṭhamamajjhimapacchimavasena tividhaṃ? Sabbameva hidaṃ paṭhamabuddhavacanaṃ, majjhimabuddhavacanaṃ, pacchimabuddhavacananti tippabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha –
atk-vin01a0:124: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-vin01a0:127_0: Keci “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”ti khandhake udānagāthaṃ āhu. Esā pana pāṭipadadivase
atk-vin01a0:128: Yaṃ pana parinibbānakāle abhāsi – “handa dāni, bhikkhave, āmantayāmi vo, vayadhammā saṅkhārā, appamādena sampādethā”ti idaṃ pacchimabuddhavacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:129: Ubhinnamantare yaṃ vuttaṃ etaṃ majjhimabuddhavacananti. Evaṃ paṭhamamajjhimapacchimavasena tividhaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:130_0: Kathaṃ piṭakavasena tividhaṃ? Sabbampi hetaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti
atk-vin01a0:130_1: tippabhedameva hoti. Tattha paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ saṅgītañca asaṅgītañca sabbampi samodhānetvā
atk-vin01a0:130_2: ubhayāni pātimokkhāni, dve vibhaṅgāni, dvāvīsati khandhakāni, soḷasaparivārāti idaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ nāma.
atk-vin01a0:132: Dhammasaṅgaho, vibhaṅgo, dhātukathā, puggalapaññatti, kathāvatthu, yamakaṃ, paṭṭhānanti idaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāma. Tattha –
atk-vin01a0:135_0: Vividhā hi ettha pañcavidha pātimokkhuddesa pārājikādi sattaāpattikkhandhamātikā
atk-vin01a0:135_1: vibhaṅgādippabhedā nayā, visesabhūtā ca daḷhīkammasithilakaraṇappayojanā anupaññattinayā,
atk-vin01a0:135_2: kāyikavācasikaajjhācāranisedhanato cesa kāyaṃ vācañca vineti, tasmā vividhanayattā
atk-vin01a0:135_3: visesanayattā kāyavācānañca vinayanato “vinayo”ti akkhāto. Tenetametassa vacanatthakosallatthaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:141_0: Tañhi attatthaparatthādibhede atthe sūceti, suvuttā cettha atthā veneyyajjhāsayānulomena
atk-vin01a0:141_1: vuttattā. Savati cetaṃ atthe sassamiva phalaṃ pasavatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sūdati cetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:141_2: dhenuviya khīraṃ, paggharatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Suṭṭhu ca ne tāyati rakkhatīti vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:141_3: hoti. Suttasabhāgañcetaṃ, yathā hi tacchakānaṃ suttaṃ pamāṇaṃ hoti; evametampi viññūnaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:141_4: Yathā ca suttena saṅgahitāni pupphāni na vikiriyanti na viddhaṃsiyanti; evametena
atk-vin01a0:145: Yaṃ ettha vuḍḍhimanto, salakkhaṇā pūjitā paricchinnā;
atk-vin01a0:146: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto.
atk-vin01a0:147_1: me āvuso dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamantī”tiādīsu vuḍḍhiyaṃ āgato. “Yā
atk-vin01a0:147_2: tā rattiyo abhiññātā abhilakkhitā”tiādīsu lakkhaṇe. “Rājābhirājā manujindo”tiādīsu
atk-vin01a0:147_3: pūjite. “Paṭibalo vinetuṃ abhidhamme abhivinaye”tiādīsu paricchinne. Aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite
atk-vin01a0:147_4: dhamme ca vinaye cāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Abhikkantena vaṇṇenā”tiādīsu adhike.
atk-vin01a0:148_0: Ettha ca “rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti, mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā
atk-vin01a0:148_1: viharatī”tiādinā nayena vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā. “Rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:148_2: vā”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇādīhi lakkhaṇīyattā salakkhaṇāpi. “Sekkhā dhammā, asekkhā
atk-vin01a0:148_3: dhammā, lokuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena pūjitāpi pūjārahāti adhippāyo. “Phasso hoti
atk-vin01a0:148_4: vedanā hotī”tiādinā nayena sabhāvaparicchinnattā paricchinnāpi. “Mahaggatā dhammā,
atk-vin01a0:148_5: appamāṇā dhammā, anuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena adhikāpi dhammā vuttā. Tenetametassa
atk-vin01a0:150: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”ti.
atk-vin01a0:154_0: Pariyattipi hi “mā piṭakasampadānenā”tiādīsu piṭakanti vuccati. “Atha puriso āgaccheyya
atk-vin01a0:154_1: kudālapiṭakaṃ ādāyā”tiādīsu yaṃ kiñci bhājanampi. Tasmā piṭakaṃ piṭakatthavidū, pariyattibbhājanatthato āhu.
atk-vin01a0:155_0: Idāni tena samodhānetvā tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyāti. Tena evaṃ duvidhatthena piṭakasaddena
atk-vin01a0:155_1: saha samāsaṃ katvā vinayo ca so piṭakañca pariyattibhāvato tassa tassa atthassa bhājanato
atk-vin01a0:155_2: cāti vinayapiṭakaṃ, yathāvutteneva nayena suttantañca taṃ piṭakañcāti suttantapiṭakaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:155_3: abhidhammo ca so piṭakañcāti abhidhammapiṭakanti evamete tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyā.
atk-vin01a0:156: Evaṃ ñatvā ca punapi tesveva piṭakesu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:159: Pariyattibhedaṃ sampattiṃ, vipattiṃ cāpi yaṃ yahiṃ;
atk-vin01a0:160: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye.
atk-vin01a0:161_0: Tatrāyaṃ paridīpanā vibhāvanā ca, etāni hi tīṇi piṭakāni yathākkamaṃ āṇā vohāra paramatthadesanā
atk-vin01a0:162_0: Ettha hi vinayapiṭakaṃ āṇārahena bhagavatā āṇābāhullato desitattā āṇādesanā, suttantapiṭakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:162_1: vohārakusalena bhagavatā vohārabāhullato desitattā vohāradesanā, abhidhammapiṭakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:162_2: paramatthakusalena bhagavatā paramatthabāhullato desitattā paramatthadesanāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:163_0: Tathā paṭhamaṃ ye te pacurāparādhā sattā te yathāparādhaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathāparādhasāsanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:163_1: dutiyaṃ anekajjhāsayānusayacariyādhimuttikā sattā yathānulomaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathānulomasāsanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:163_2: tatiyaṃ dhammapuñjamatte “ahaṃ mamā”ti saññino sattā yathādhammaṃ ettha sāsitāti
atk-vin01a0:164_0: Tathā paṭhamaṃ ajjhācārapaṭipakkhabhūto saṃvarāsaṃvaro ettha kathitoti saṃvarāsaṃvarakathā,
atk-vin01a0:164_1: dutiyaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhipaṭipakkhabhūtā diṭṭhiviniveṭhanā ettha kathitāti diṭṭhiviniveṭhanakathā,
atk-vin01a0:164_2: tatiyaṃ rāgādipaṭipakkhabhūto nāmarūpaparicchedo ettha kathitoti nāmarūpaparicchedakathāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:165_0: Tīsupi ca cetesu tisso sikkhā, tīṇi pahānāni, catubbidho ca gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:165_1: Tathā hi – vinayapiṭake visesena adhisīlasikkhā vuttā, suttantapiṭake adhicittasikkhā,
atk-vin01a0:166_0: Vinayapiṭake ca vītikkamappahānaṃ kilesānaṃ, vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassa. Suttantapiṭake
atk-vin01a0:167: Paṭhame ca tadaṅgappahānaṃ kilesānaṃ, itaresu vikkhambhanasamucchedappahānāni. Paṭhame ca duccaritasaṃkilesassa pahānaṃ, itaresu taṇhādiṭṭhisaṃkilesānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:168_1: Tattha dhammoti pāḷi. Atthoti tassāyevattho. Desanāti tassā manasāvavatthāpitāya
atk-vin01a0:168_2: pāḷiyā desanā. Paṭivedhoti pāḷiyā pāḷiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho. Tīsupi cetesu
atk-vin01a0:168_3: ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhā yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā
atk-vin01a0:168_4: alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā gambhīrā. Evaṃ ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:169_0: Aparo nayo – dhammoti hetu. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ – “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:169_1: Atthoti hetuphalaṃ. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ – “hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti. Desanāti
atk-vin01a0:169_2: paññatti, yathādhammaṃ dhammābhilāpoti adhippāyo. Paṭivedhoti abhisamayo, so ca lokiyalokuttaro
atk-vin01a0:169_3: visayato asammohato ca atthānurūpaṃ dhammesu, dhammānurūpaṃ atthesu, paññattipathānurūpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:170_0: Idāni yasmā etesu piṭakesu yaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ vā atthajātaṃ vā, yā cāyaṃ yathā yathā
atk-vin01a0:170_1: ñāpetabbo attho sotūnaṃ ñāṇassa abhimukho hoti, tathā tathā tadatthajotikā desanā,
atk-vin01a0:170_2: yo cettha aviparītāvabodhasaṅkhāto paṭivedho sabbametaṃ anupacitakusalasambhārehi
atk-vin01a0:170_3: duppaññehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo dukkhogāhaṃ alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhañca, tasmā gambhīraṃ.
atk-vin01a0:170_4: Evampi ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:176: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye”ti.
atk-vin01a0:177: Ettha pana tīsu piṭakesu tividho pariyattibhedo daṭṭhabbo. Tisso hi pariyattiyo – alagaddūpamā, nissaraṇatthā, bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīti.
atk-vin01a0:178_0: Tattha yā duggahitā upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā, ayaṃ alagaddūpamā. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:178_2: caramāno, so passeyya mahantaṃ alagaddaṃ. Tamenaṃ bhoge vā naṅguṭṭhe vā gaṇheyya.
atk-vin01a0:178_3: Tassa so alagaddo paṭiparivattitvā hatthe vā bāhāya vā aññatarasmiṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅge
atk-vin01a0:178_4: ḍaṃseyya. So tatonidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya, maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ. Taṃ kissa
atk-vin01a0:178_5: hetu? Duggahitattā, bhikkhave, alagaddassa. Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacce moghapurisā
atk-vin01a0:178_6: dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ. Te taṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:178_7: paññāya atthaṃ na upaparikkhanti. Tesaṃ te dhammā paññāya atthaṃ anupaparikkhataṃ
atk-vin01a0:178_8: na nijjhānaṃ khamanti. Te upārambhānisaṃsā ceva dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti itivādappamokkhānisaṃsā
atk-vin01a0:178_9: ca. Yassa catthāya dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti, tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhonti. Tesaṃ te dhammā
atk-vin01a0:178_10: duggahitā dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Duggahitattā,
atk-vin01a0:179_0: Yā pana suggahitā sīlakkhandhādipāripūriṃyeva ākaṅkhamānena pariyāpuṭā na upārambhādi
atk-vin01a0:179_1: hetu, ayaṃ nissaraṇatthā. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “tesaṃ te dhammā suggahitā dīgharattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:179_2: hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Suggahitattā, bhikkhave, dhammāna”nti.
atk-vin01a0:180_0: Yaṃ pana pariññātakkhandho pahīnakileso bhāvitamaggo paṭividdhākuppo sacchikatanirodho
atk-vin01a0:180_1: khīṇāsavo kevalaṃ paveṇīpālanatthāya vaṃsānurakkhaṇatthāya pariyāpuṇāti, ayaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikapaayattīti.
atk-vin01a0:181_0: Vinaye pana suppaṭipanno bhikkhu sīlasampattiṃ nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇāti, tāsaṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:181_1: ca tattha pabhedavacanato. Sutte suppaṭipanno samādhisampadaṃ nissāya cha abhiññā
atk-vin01a0:181_2: pāpuṇāti, tāsaṃyeva ca tattha pabhedavacanato. Abhidhamme suppaṭipanno paññāsampadaṃ
atk-vin01a0:181_3: nissāya catasso paṭisambhidā pāpuṇāti, tāsañca tattheva pabhedavacanato. Evametesu
atk-vin01a0:182_1: paṭikkhittesu upādinnaphassādīsu anavajjasaññī hoti. Vuttampi hetaṃ – “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā
atk-vin01a0:182_2: dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato
atk-vin01a0:182_3: nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti tato dussīlabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti. Sutte duppaṭipanno “cattārome, bhikkhave,
atk-vin01a0:182_4: puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā”tiādīsu adhippāyaṃ ajānanto duggahitaṃ gaṇhāti. Yaṃ sandhāya
atk-vin01a0:182_5: vuttaṃ – “attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati, attānañca khanati, bahuñca
atk-vin01a0:182_6: apuññaṃ pasavatī”ti tato micchādiṭṭhitaṃ pāpuṇāti. Abhidhamme duppaṭipanno dhammacintaṃ
atk-vin01a0:182_7: atidhāvanto acinteyyānipi cinteti, tato cittakkhepaṃ pāpuṇāti. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ – “cattārimāni,
atk-vin01a0:182_8: bhikkhave, acinteyyāni na cintetabbāni, yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī
atk-vin01a0:182_9: assā”ti. Evametesu duppaṭipanno yathākkamena imaṃ dussīlabhāvamicchādiṭṭhitā cittakkhepabhedaṃ
atk-vin01a0:185: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye”ti.
atk-vin01a0:186: Ayampi gāthā vuttatthā hoti. Evaṃ nānappakārato piṭakāni ñatvā tesaṃ vasenetaṃ buddhavacanaṃ tividhanti ñātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:187_0: Kathaṃ nikāyavasena pañcavidhaṃ? Sabbameva cetaṃ dīghanikāyo, majjhimanikāyo, saṃyuttanikāyo,
atk-vin01a0:187_1: aṅguttaranikāyo, khuddakanikāyoti pañcappabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha katamo dīghanikāyo?
atk-vin01a0:190_0: Kasmā panesa dīghanikāyoti vuccati? Dīghappamāṇānaṃ suttānaṃ samūhato nivāsato ca,
atk-vin01a0:190_1: samūhanivāsā hi nikāyoti vuccanti. “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekanikāyampi samanupassāmi
atk-vin01a0:190_2: evaṃ cittaṃ; yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā pāṇā; poṇikanikāyo, cikkhallikanikāyo”ti
atk-vin01a0:190_3: evamādīni cettha sādhakāni sāsanato ca lokato ca. Evaṃ sesānampi nikāyabhāve vacanattho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:191: Katamo majjhimanikāyo? Majjhimappamāṇāni pañcadasavaggasaṅgahāni mūlapariyāyasuttādīni diyaḍḍhasataṃ dve ca suttāni.
atk-vin01a0:192: Diyaḍḍhasataṃ suttantā, dve ca suttāni yattha so;
atk-vin01a0:194: Katamo saṃyuttanikāyo? Devatāsaṃyuttādivasena ṭhitāni oghataraṇādīni satta suttasahassāni satta ca suttasatāni dvāsaṭṭhi ca suttāni.
atk-vin01a0:197: Katamo aṅguttaranikāyo? Ekekaaṅgātirekavasena ṭhitāni cittapariyādānādīni nava suttasahassāni pañca suttasatāni sattapaññāsañca suttāni.
atk-vin01a0:200: Katamo khuddakanikāyo? Sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ khuddakapāṭhādayo ca pubbe nidassitā pannarasabhedā ṭhapetvā cattāro nikāye avasesaṃ buddhavacananti.
atk-vin01a0:204_0: Kathaṃ aṅgavasena navavidhaṃ? Sabbameva hidaṃ suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthā,
atk-vin01a0:204_1: udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallanti navappabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:204_3: aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ. Sabbampi sagāthakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:204_4: suttaṃ geyyanti veditabbaṃ. Visesena saṃyuttake sakalopi sagāthāvaggo, sakalaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:204_5: niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ, yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ taṃ veyyākaraṇanti
atk-vin01a0:204_6: veditabbaṃ. Dhammapadaṃ, theragāthā, therīgāthā, suttanipāte nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā
atk-vin01a0:204_7: ca gāthāti veditabbā. Somanassañāṇamayikagāthāpaṭisaṃyuttā dvāsīti suttantā udānanti
atk-vin01a0:204_9: veditabbaṃ. Apaṇṇakajātakādīni paññāsādhikāni pañca jātakasatāni jātakanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:204_10: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”ti -ādinayappavattā sabbepi
atk-vin01a0:204_12: sabbepi vedañca tuṭṭhiñca laddhā laddhā pucchitasuttantā vedallanti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:205: Kathaṃ dhammakkhandhavasena caturāsītisahassavidhaṃ? Sabbameva cetaṃ buddhavacanaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:207: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. ;
atk-vin01a0:208_0: Evaṃ paridīpitadhammakkhandhavasena caturāsītisahassappabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha ekānusandhikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:208_1: suttaṃ eko dhammakkhandho. Yaṃ anekānusandhikaṃ tattha anusandhivasena dhammakkhandhagaṇanā.
atk-vin01a0:208_2: Gāthābandhesu pañhāpucchanaṃ eko dhammakkhandho, vissajjanaṃ eko. Abhidhamme ekamekaṃ
atk-vin01a0:208_3: tika-duka-bhājanaṃ, ekamekañca cittavārabhājanaṃ, eko dhammakkhandho. Vinaye atthi
atk-vin01a0:208_4: vatthu, atthi mātikā, atthi padabhājanīyaṃ, atthi antarāpatti, atthi āpatti, atthi
atk-vin01a0:208_5: anāpatti, atthi paricchedo; tattha ekameko koṭṭhāso, ekameko dhammakkhandhoti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:209_0: Evametaṃ abhedato rasavasena ekavidhaṃ, bhedato dhammavinayādivasena duvidhādibhedaṃ
atk-vin01a0:209_1: buddhavacanaṃ saṅgāyantena mahākassapappamukhena vasīgaṇena “ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo;
atk-vin01a0:209_2: idaṃ paṭhamabuddhavacanaṃ, idaṃ majjhimabuddhavacanaṃ, idaṃ pacchimabuddhavacanaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:209_3: idaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ, idaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ, idaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ; ayaṃ dīghanikāyo…pe…
atk-vin01a0:209_4: ayaṃ khuddakanikāyo; imāni suttādīni navaṅgāni, imāni caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti
atk-vin01a0:209_5: imaṃ pabhedaṃ vavatthapetvāva saṅgītaṃ. Na kevalañca ettakameva, aññampi uddānasaṅgaha-vaggasaṅgahapeyyālasaṅgaha-ekakanipāta-dukanipātādinipātasaṅgaha-saṃyuttasaṅgaha-paṇṇāsasaṅgahādianekavidhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:209_6: tīsu piṭakesu sandissamānaṃ saṅgahappabhedaṃ vavatthapetvāeva sattahi māsehi saṅgītaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:209_7: Saṅgītipariyosāne cassa – “idaṃ mahākassapattherena dasabalassa sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:209_8: kālaṃ pavattanasamatthaṃ kata”nti sañjātappamodā sādhukāraṃ viya dadamānā ayaṃ mahāpathavī
atk-vin01a0:209_9: udakapariyantaṃ katvā anekappakāraṃ kampi saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, anekāni
atk-vin01a0:209_10: ca acchariyāni pāturahesunti ayaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītināma. Yā loke –
atk-vin01a0:210: Satehi pañcahi katā, tena pañcasatāti ca;
atk-vin01a0:212_0: Imissā pana paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyā pavattamānāya vinayaṃ pucchantena āyasmatā mahākassapena
atk-vin01a0:212_1: “paṭhamaṃ, āvuso upāli, pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”nti evamādivacanapariyosāne “vatthumpi
atk-vin01a0:212_2: pucchi, nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchī”ti ettha nidāne pucchite taṃ nidānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:212_3: ādito pabhuti vitthāretvā yena ca paññattaṃ, yasmā ca paññattaṃ, sabbametaṃ kathetukāmena
atk-vin01a0:212_4: āyasmatā upālittherena vuttaṃ “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:212_5: sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ. Evamidaṃ āyasmatā upālittherena vuttaṃ, tañca pana “paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle
atk-vin01a0:212_6: vutta”nti veditabbaṃ. Ettāvatā ca “idaṃ vacanaṃ kena vuttaṃ, kadā vutta”nti etesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:213_0: Idāni kasmā vuttanti ettha vuccate, yasmā ayamāyasmatā mahākassapattherena nidānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:213_1: puṭṭho tasmānena taṃ nidānaṃ ādito pabhuti vitthāretuṃ vuttanti. Evamidaṃ āyasmatā
atk-vin01a0:213_2: upālittherena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vadantenāpi iminā kāraṇena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:213_3: Ettāvatā ca vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmāti imesaṃ mātikāpadānaṃ attho pakāsito hoti.
atk-vin01a0:214_0: Idāni dhāritaṃ yena cābhataṃ, yatthappatiṭṭhitaṃ cetametaṃ vatvā vidhiṃ tatoti etesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:214_1: atthappakāsanatthaṃ idaṃ vuccati. Taṃ panetaṃ “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:214_2: viharatī”ti evamādivacanapaṭimaṇḍitanidānaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ kena dhāritaṃ, kenābhataṃ,
atk-vin01a0:214_3: kattha patiṭṭhitanti? Vuccate – ādito tāva idaṃ bhagavato sammukhā āyasmatā upālittherena
atk-vin01a0:214_4: dhāritaṃ, tassa sammukhato aparinibbute tathāgate chaḷabhiññādibhedehi anekehi bhikkhusahassehi
atk-vin01a0:214_6: Jambudīpe tāva upālittheramādiṃ katvā ācariyaparamparāya yāva tatiyasaṅgīti tāva
atk-vin01a0:215: Upāli dāsako ceva, soṇako siggavo tathā;
atk-vin01a0:219: Āyasmā hi upāli imaṃ vinayavaṃsaṃ vinayatantiṃ vinayapaveṇiṃ bhagavato
atk-vin01a0:220_0: Sammukhā uggahetvā bahūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ hadaye patiṭṭhāpesi. Tassa hāyasmato santike
atk-vin01a0:220_1: vinayavaṃsaṃ uggahetvā vinaye pakataññutaṃ pattesu puggalesu puthujjana-sotāpanna-sakadāgāmi-anāgāmino
atk-vin01a0:220_2: gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā, khīṇāsavānaṃ sahassamekaṃ ahosi. Dāsakattheropi tasseva saddhivihāriko
atk-vin01a0:220_3: ahosi, so upālittherassa sammukhā uggahetvā tatheva vinayaṃ vācesi. Tassāpi āyasmato
atk-vin01a0:220_4: santike uggahetvā vinaye pakataññutaṃ pattā puthujjanādayo gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā,
atk-vin01a0:220_5: khīṇāsavānaṃ sahassameva ahosi. Soṇakattheropi dāsakattherassa saddhivihāriko ahosi,
atk-vin01a0:220_6: sopi attano upajjhāyassa dāsakattherassa sammukhā uggahetvā tatheva vinayaṃ vācesi.
atk-vin01a0:220_7: Tassāpi āyasmato santike uggahetvā vinaye pakataññutaṃ pattā puthujjanādayo gaṇanapathaṃ
atk-vin01a0:220_8: vītivattā, khīṇāsavānaṃ sahassameva ahosi. Siggavattheropi soṇakattherassa saddhivihāriko
atk-vin01a0:220_9: ahosi, sopi attano upajjhāyassa soṇakattherassa santike vinayaṃ uggahetvā arahantasahassassa
atk-vin01a0:220_10: dhuraggāho ahosi. Tassa panāyasmato santike uggahetvā vinaye pakataññutaṃ pattā puthujjana-sotāpannasakadāgāmi-anāgāminopi
atk-vin01a0:220_11: khīṇāsavāpi ettakāni satānīti vā ettakāni sahassānīti vā aparicchinnā ahesuṃ. Tadā
atk-vin01a0:220_12: kira jambudīpe atimahābhikkhusamudāyo ahosi. Moggaliputtatissattherassa pana ānubhāvo
atk-vin01a0:220_13: tatiyasaṅgītiyaṃ pākaṭo bhavissati. Evamidaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ jambudīpe tāva imāya ācariyaparamparāya
atk-vin01a0:223: Dutiyasaṅgītivijānanatthaṃ pana ayamanukkamo veditabbo. Yadā hi –
atk-vin01a0:228_0: Athānukkamena gacchantesu rattindivesu vassasataparinibbute bhagavati vesālikā vajjiputtakā
atk-vin01a0:228_1: bhikkhū vesāliyaṃ “kappati siṅgīloṇakappo, kappati dvaṅgulakappo, kappati gāmantarakappo,
atk-vin01a0:228_2: kappati āvāsakappo, kappati anumatikappo, kappati āciṇṇakappo, kappati amathitakappo,
atk-vin01a0:228_3: kappati jaḷogiṃ pātuṃ, kappati adasakaṃ nisīdanaṃ, kappati jātarūparajata”nti imāni
atk-vin01a0:228_4: dasa vatthūni dīpesuṃ. Tesaṃ susunāgaputto kāḷāsoko nāma rājā pakkho ahosi.
atk-vin01a0:229_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vajjīsu cārikaṃ caramāno “vesālikā
atk-vin01a0:229_1: kira vajjiputtakā bhikkhū vesāliyaṃ dasa vatthūni dīpentī”ti sutvā “na kho panetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:229_2: patirūpaṃ yvāhaṃ dasabalassa sāsanavipattiṃ sutvā appossukko bhaveyyaṃ. Handāhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:229_3: adhammavādino niggahetvā dhammaṃ dīpemī”ti cintento yena vesālī tadavasari. Tatra
atk-vin01a0:229_4: sudaṃ āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:230_0: Tena kho pana samayena vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū tadahuposathe kaṃsapātiṃ udakena
atk-vin01a0:230_1: pūretvā majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa ṭhapetvā āgatāgate vesālike upāsake evaṃ vadanti
atk-vin01a0:230_2: – “dethāvuso, saṅghassa kahāpaṇampi aḍḍhampi pādampi māsakarūpampi, bhavissati saṅghassa
atk-vin01a0:230_3: parikkhārena karaṇīya”nti sabbaṃ tāva vattabbaṃ, yāva “imāya pana vinayasaṅgītiyā
atk-vin01a0:230_4: satta bhikkhusatāni anūnāni anadhikāni ahesuṃ, tasmā ayaṃ dutiyasaṅgīti sattasatikāti vuccatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:231_0: Evaṃ tasmiñca sannipāte dvādasa bhikkhusatasahassāni sannipatiṃsu āyasmatā yasena
atk-vin01a0:231_1: samussāhitā. Tesaṃ majjhe āyasmatā revatena puṭṭhena sabbakāmittherena vinayaṃ vissajjentena
atk-vin01a0:231_2: tāni dasa vatthūni vinicchitāni, adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamitaṃ. Atha therā “puna dhammañca
atk-vin01a0:231_3: vinayañca saṅgāyissāmā”ti tipiṭakadhare pattapaṭisambhide sattasate bhikkhū uccinitvā
atk-vin01a0:231_4: vesāliyaṃ vālikārāme sannipatitvā mahākassapattherena saṅgāyitasadisameva sabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:231_5: sāsanamalaṃ sodhetvā puna piṭakavasena nikāyavasena aṅgavasena dhammakkhandhavasena
atk-vin01a0:231_6: ca sabbaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyiṃsu. Ayaṃ saṅgīti aṭṭhahi māsehi niṭṭhitā. Yā loke –
atk-vin01a0:232: Satehi sattahi katā, tena sattasatāti ca;
atk-vin01a0:233: Pubbe kataṃ upādāya, dutiyāti ca vuccatīti.
atk-vin01a0:235: Yehi therehi saṅgītā, saṅgīti tesu vissutā;
atk-vin01a0:236: Sabbakāmī ca sāḷho ca, revato khujjasobhito.
atk-vin01a0:241: Dutiyo pana saṅgīto, yehi therehi saṅgaho;
atk-vin01a0:244_0: Evamimaṃ dutiyasaṅgītiṃ saṅgāyitvā therā “uppajjissati nu kho anāgatepi sāsanassa
atk-vin01a0:244_1: evarūpaṃ abbuda”nti olokayamānā imaṃ addasaṃsu – “ito vassasatassa upari aṭṭhārasame
atk-vin01a0:244_2: vasse pāṭaliputte dhammāsoko nāma rājā uppajjitvā sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ kāressati.
atk-vin01a0:244_3: So buddhasāsane pasīditvā mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pavattayissati. Tato titthiyā lābhasakkāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:244_4: patthayamānā sāsane pabbajitvā sakaṃ sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paridīpessanti. Evaṃ sāsane mahantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:244_5: abbudaṃ uppajjissatī”ti. Atha nesaṃ etadahosi – “kinnu kho mayaṃ etasmiṃ abbude uppanne
atk-vin01a0:244_6: sammukhā bhavissāma, na bhavissāmā”ti. Atha te sabbeva tadā attano asammukhabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:244_7: ñatvā “ko nu kho taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ samattho bhavissatī”ti sakalaṃ manussalokaṃ
atk-vin01a0:244_8: chakāmāvacaradevalokañca olokentā na kañci disvā brahmaloke tissaṃ nāma mahābrahmānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:244_9: addasaṃsu parittāyukaṃ uparibrahmalokūpapattiyā bhāvitamaggaṃ. Disvāna nesaṃ etadahosi
atk-vin01a0:244_10: – “sace mayaṃ etassa brahmuno manussaloke nibbattanatthāya ussāhaṃ kareyyāma, addhā
atk-vin01a0:244_11: esa moggalibrāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gahessati. Tato ca mantehi palobhito nikkhamitvā
atk-vin01a0:244_12: pabbajissati. So evaṃ pabbajitvā sakalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā adhigatapaṭisambhido
atk-vin01a0:244_13: hutvā titthiye madditvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchitvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhissatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:245_0: Te brahmalokaṃ gantvā tissaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ etadavocuṃ – “ito vassasatassa upari aṭṭhārasame
atk-vin01a0:245_1: vasse sāsane mahantaṃ abbudaṃ uppajjissati. Mayañca sakalaṃ manussalokaṃ chakāmāvacaradevalokañca
atk-vin01a0:245_2: olokayamānā kañci sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ samatthaṃ adisvā brahmalokaṃ vicinantā bhavantameva
atk-vin01a0:245_3: addasāma. Sādhu, sappurisa, manussaloke nibbattitvā dasabalassa sāsanaṃ paggaṇhituṃ paṭiññaṃ dehī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:246_0: Evaṃ vutte mahābrahmā, “ahaṃ kira sāsane uppannaṃ abbudaṃ sodhetvā sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:246_1: samattho bhavissāmī”ti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udaggudaggo hutvā, “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā paṭiññaṃ
atk-vin01a0:246_2: adāsi. Therā brahmaloke taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvā puna paccāgamiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:247_0: Tena kho pana samayena siggavatthero ca caṇḍavajjitthero ca dvepi navakā honti daharabhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:247_1: tipiṭakadharā pattapaṭisambhidā khīṇāsavā, te taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsu. Therā
atk-vin01a0:247_2: “tumhe, āvuso, amhākaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe no sahāyakā ahuvattha, tena vo idaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:247_3: hotu – ‘tisso nāma brahmā moggalibrāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhissati, taṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-vin01a0:247_4: eko nīharitvā pabbājetu, eko buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhāpetū”’ti vatvā sabbepi yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā –
atk-vin01a0:255: Taṃ pattuṃ vāyame dhīro, yaṃ niccaṃ amataṃ padanti.
atk-vin01a0:259_0: Tissopi kho mahābrahmā brahmalokato cavitvā moggalibrāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-vin01a0:259_1: Siggavattheropi tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato pabhuti satta vassāni brāhmaṇassa gehaṃ
atk-vin01a0:259_2: piṇḍāya pāvisi. Ekadivasampi uḷuṅkamattaṃ vā yāguṃ kaṭacchumattaṃ vā bhattaṃ nālattha.
atk-vin01a0:259_3: Sattannaṃ pana vassānaṃ accayena ekadivasaṃ “aticchatha, bhante”ti vacanamattaṃ alattha.
atk-vin01a0:259_4: Taṃdivasameva brāhmaṇopi bahiddhā kiñci karaṇīyaṃ katvā āgacchanto paṭipathe theraṃ
atk-vin01a0:259_5: disvā, “bho pabbajita, amhākaṃ gehaṃ agamitthā”ti āha. “Āma, brāhmaṇa, agamimhā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:259_6: “Api kiñci labhitthā”ti? “Āma, brāhmaṇa, labhimhā”ti. So gehaṃ gantvā pucchi – “tassa
atk-vin01a0:259_7: pabbajitassa kiñci adatthā”ti? “Na kiñci adamhā”ti. Brāhmaṇo dutiyadivase gharadvāreyeva
atk-vin01a0:259_8: nisīdi “ajja pabbajitaṃ musāvādena niggahessāmī”ti. Thero dutiyadivase brāhmaṇassa
atk-vin01a0:259_9: gharadvāraṃ sampatto. Brāhmaṇo theraṃ disvāva evamāha – “tumhe hiyyo amhākaṃ gehe
atk-vin01a0:259_10: kiñci aladdhāyeva ‘labhimhā’ti avocuttha. Vaṭṭati nu kho tumhākaṃ musāvādo”ti! Thero
atk-vin01a0:259_11: āha – “mayaṃ, brāhmaṇa, tumhākaṃ gehe satta vassāni ‘aticchathā’ti vacanamattampi
atk-vin01a0:259_12: alabhitvā hiyyo ‘aticchathā’ti vacanamattaṃ labhimha; athetaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ upādāya evamavocumhā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:260_0: Brāhmaṇo cintesi – “ime paṭisanthāramattampi labhitvā ‘labhimhā’ti pasaṃsanti, aññaṃ
atk-vin01a0:260_1: kiñci khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ labhitvā kasmā na pasaṃsantī”ti pasīditvā attano atthāya
atk-vin01a0:260_2: paṭiyāditabhattato kaṭacchumattaṃ bhikkhaṃ tadupiyañca byañjanaṃ dāpetvā “imaṃ bhikkhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:260_3: sabbakālaṃ tumhe labhissathā”ti āha. So punadivasato pabhuti upasaṅkamantassa therassa
atk-vin01a0:260_4: upasamaṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasīditvā theraṃ niccakālaṃ attano ghare bhattavissaggakaraṇatthāya
atk-vin01a0:260_5: yāci. Thero adhivāsetvā divase divase bhattakiccaṃ katvā gacchanto thokaṃ thokaṃ
atk-vin01a0:260_6: buddhavacanaṃ kathetvā gacchati. Sopi kho māṇavako soḷasavassuddesikoyeva tiṇṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:260_7: vedānaṃ pāragū ahosi. Brahmalokato āgatasuddhasattassa āsane vā sayane vā añño koci
atk-vin01a0:260_8: nisajjitā vā nipajjitā vā natthi. So yadā ācariyagharaṃ gacchati, tadāssa mañcapīṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:260_9: setena vatthena paṭicchādetvā laggetvā ṭhapenti. Thero cintesi – “samayo dāni māṇavakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:260_10: pabbājetuṃ, cirañca me idhāgacchantassa, na ca kāci māṇavakena saddhiṃ kathā uppajjati.
atk-vin01a0:260_11: Handa dāni iminā upāyena pallaṅkaṃ nissāya uppajjissatī”ti gehaṃ gantvā yathā tasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:260_12: gehe ṭhapetvā māṇavakassa pallaṅkaṃ aññaṃ na kiñci āsanaṃ dissati tathā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a0:260_13: Brāhmaṇassa gehajano theraṃ disvā aññaṃ kiñci āsanaṃ apassanto māṇavakassa pallaṅkaṃ
atk-vin01a0:260_14: attharitvā therassa adāsi. Nisīdi thero pallaṅke. Māṇavakopi kho taṅkhaṇaññeva ācariyagharā
atk-vin01a0:260_15: āgamma theraṃ attano pallaṅke nisinnaṃ disvā kupito anattamano “ko mama pallaṅkaṃ
atk-vin01a0:261_0: Thero bhattakiccaṃ katvā vūpasante māṇavakassa caṇḍikkabhāve evamāha – “kiṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:261_1: tvaṃ, māṇavaka, kiñci mantaṃ jānāsī”ti? Māṇavako “bho pabbajita, mayi dāni mante
atk-vin01a0:261_2: ajānante aññe ke jānissantī”ti vatvā, theraṃ pucchi – “tumhe pana mantaṃ jānāthā”ti?
atk-vin01a0:261_3: “Puccha, māṇavaka, pucchitvā sakkā jānitu”nti. Atha kho māṇavako tīsu vedesu sanighaṇḍukeṭubhesu
atk-vin01a0:261_4: sākkharappabhedesu itihāsapañcamesu yāni yāni gaṇṭhiṭṭhānāni, yesaṃ yesaṃ nayaṃ neva
atk-vin01a0:261_5: attanā passati nāpissa ācariyo addasa, tesu tesu theraṃ pucchi. Thero “pakatiyāpi
atk-vin01a0:261_6: tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū, idāni pana paṭisambhidāppatto, tenassa natthi tesaṃ pañhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:261_7: vissajjane bhāro”ti tāvadeva te pañhe vissajjetvā māṇavakaṃ āha – “māṇavaka, ahaṃ
atk-vin01a0:261_8: tayā bahuṃ pucchito; ahampi dāni taṃ ekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchāmi, byākarissasi me”ti? “Āma,
atk-vin01a0:261_9: bho pabbajita, puccha byākarissāmī”ti. Thero cittayamake imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi –
atk-vin01a0:262: “Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati nuppajjissati; yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati nuppajjissati tassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatī”ti?
atk-vin01a0:263_0: Māṇavo uddhaṃ vā adho vā harituṃ asakkonto “kiṃ nāma, bho pabbajita, ida”nti āha.
atk-vin01a0:263_1: “Buddhamanto nāmāyaṃ, māṇavā”ti. “Sakkā panāyaṃ, bho, mayhampi dātu”nti. “Sakkā māṇava,
atk-vin01a0:263_2: amhehi gahitapabbajjaṃ gaṇhantassa dātu”nti. Tato māṇavo mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā
atk-vin01a0:263_3: āha – “ayaṃ pabbajito buddhamantaṃ nāma jānāti, na ca attano santike apabbajitassa
atk-vin01a0:263_4: deti, ahaṃ etassa santike pabbajitvā mantaṃ uggaṇhissāmī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:264_0: Athassa mātāpitaro “pabbajitvāpi no putto mante gaṇhatu, gahetvā punāgamissatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:264_1: maññamānā “uggaṇha, puttā”ti anujāniṃsu. Thero dārakaṃ pabbājetvā dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:264_2: tāva ācikkhi. So tattha parikammaṃ karonto nacirasseva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-vin01a0:264_3: Tato thero cintesi – “sāmaṇero sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito, abhabbo dāni sāsanato nivattituṃ.
atk-vin01a0:264_4: Sace panassāhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā katheyyaṃ, arahattaṃ pāpuṇeyya, appossukko
atk-vin01a0:264_5: bhaveyya buddhavacanaṃ gahetuṃ, samayo dāni naṃ caṇḍavajjittherassa santikaṃ pesetu”nti.
atk-vin01a0:264_6: Tato āha – “ehi tvaṃ, sāmaṇera, therassa santikaṃ gantvā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇha. Mama
atk-vin01a0:264_7: vacanena tañca ārogyaṃ puccha; evañca vadehi – ‘upajjhāyo maṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ santikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:264_8: pahiṇī’ti. ‘Ko nāma te upajjhāyo’ti ca vutte ‘siggavatthero nāma, bhante’ti vadeyyāsi.
atk-vin01a0:264_9: ‘Ahaṃ ko nāmā’ti vutte evaṃ vadeyyāsi – ‘mama upajjhāyo, bhante, tumhākaṃ nāmaṃ jānātī”’ti.
atk-vin01a0:265_0: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho tisso sāmaṇero theraṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā anupubbena
atk-vin01a0:265_1: caṇḍavajjittherassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Thero sāmaṇeraṃ pucchi
atk-vin01a0:265_2: – “kuto āgatosī”ti? “Upajjhāyo maṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pahiṇī”ti. “Ko nāma
atk-vin01a0:265_3: te upajjhāyo”ti? “Siggavatthero nāma, bhante”ti. “Ahaṃ ko nāmā”ti? “Mama upajjhāyo,
atk-vin01a0:265_4: bhante, tumhākaṃ nāmaṃ jānātī”ti. “Pattacīvaraṃ dāni paṭisāmehī”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti
atk-vin01a0:265_5: sāmaṇero pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā punadivase pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvā udakadantaponaṃ
atk-vin01a0:265_6: upaṭṭhāpesi. Thero tassa sammajjitaṭṭhānaṃ puna sammajji. Taṃ udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā aññaṃ
atk-vin01a0:265_7: udakaṃ āhari. Tañca dantakaṭṭhaṃ apanetvā aññaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ gaṇhi. Evaṃ satta divasāni
atk-vin01a0:265_8: katvā sattame divase puna pucchi. Sāmaṇero punapi pubbe kathitasadisameva kathesi.
atk-vin01a0:265_9: Thero “so vatāyaṃ brāhmaṇo”ti sañjānitvā “kimatthaṃ āgatosī”ti āha. “Buddhavacanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:265_10: uggaṇhatthāya, bhante”ti. Thero “uggaṇha dāni, sāmaṇerā”ti vatvā puna divasato pabhuti
atk-vin01a0:265_11: buddhavacanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Tisso sāmaṇerova hutvā, ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭakaṃ sabbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:265_12: uggaṇhi saddhiṃ aṭṭhakathāya. Upasampannakāle pana avassikova samāno tipiṭakadharo
atk-vin01a0:265_13: ahosi. Ācariyupajjhāyā moggaliputtatissattherassa hatthe sakalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:265_14: yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā parinibbāyiṃsu. Moggaliputtatissattheropi aparena samayena kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:266_0: Tena kho pana samayena bindusārassa rañño ekasataputtā ahesuṃ. Te sabbe asoko attanā
atk-vin01a0:266_1: saddhiṃ ekamātikaṃ tissakumāraṃ ṭhapetvā ghātesi. Ghātento ca cattāri vassāni anabhisittova
atk-vin01a0:266_2: rajjaṃ kāretvā catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena tathāgatassa parinibbānato dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:266_3: upari aṭṭhārasame vasse sakalajambudīpe ekarajjābhisekaṃ pāpuṇi. Abhisekānubhāvena
atk-vin01a0:266_4: cassa imā rājiddhiyo āgatā – mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhā yojanappamāṇe āṇā pavattati; tathā
atk-vin01a0:266_5: upari ākāse anotattadahato aṭṭhahi kājehi soḷasa pānīyaghaṭe divase divase devatā
atk-vin01a0:266_6: āharanti, yato sāsane uppannasaddho hutvā aṭṭha ghaṭe bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi, dve
atk-vin01a0:266_7: ghaṭe saṭṭhimattānaṃ tipiṭakadharabhikkhūnaṃ, dve ghaṭe aggamahesiyā asandhimittāya,
atk-vin01a0:266_8: cattāro ghaṭe attanā paribhuñji; devatāeva himavante nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ nāma atthi
atk-vin01a0:266_9: siniddhaṃ mudukaṃ rasavantaṃ taṃ divase divase āharanti, yena rañño ca mahesiyā ca
atk-vin01a0:266_10: soḷasannañca nāṭakitthisahassānaṃ saṭṭhimattānañca bhikkhusahassānaṃ devasikaṃ dantaponakiccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:266_11: nippajjati. Devasikameva cassa devatā agadāmalakaṃ agadaharītakaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇañca
atk-vin01a0:266_12: gandharasasampannaṃ ambapakkaṃ āharanti. Tathā chaddantadahato pañcavaṇṇanivāsanapāvuraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:266_13: pītakavaṇṇahatthapucchanapaṭakaṃ dibbañca pānakaṃ āharanti. Devasikameva panassa
atk-vin01a0:266_14: nhānagandhaṃ anuvilepanagandhaṃ pārupanatthāya asuttamayikaṃ sumanapupphapaṭaṃ mahārahañca
atk-vin01a0:266_15: añjanaṃ nāgabhavanato nāgarājāno āharanti. Chaddantadaheva uṭṭhitassa sālino nava
atk-vin01a0:266_16: vāhasahassāni divase divase sukā āharanti. Mūsikā nitthusakaṇe karonti, ekopi khaṇḍataṇḍulo
atk-vin01a0:266_17: na hoti, rañño sabbaṭṭhānesu ayameva taṇḍulo paribhogaṃ gacchati. Madhumakkhikā madhuṃ
atk-vin01a0:266_18: karonti. Kammārasālāsu acchā kūṭaṃ paharanti. Karavīkasakuṇā āgantvā madhurassaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:267_0: Imāhi iddhīhi samannāgato rājā ekadivasaṃ suvaṇṇasaṅkhalikabandhanaṃ pesetvā catunnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:267_1: buddhānaṃ adhigatarūpadassanaṃ kappāyukaṃ kāḷaṃ nāma nāgarājānaṃ ānayitvā setacchattassa
atk-vin01a0:267_2: heṭṭhā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā anekasatavaṇṇehi jalaja thalajapupphehi suvaṇṇapupphehi
atk-vin01a0:267_3: ca pūjaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitehi soḷasahi nāṭakitthisahassehi samantato parikkhipitvā
atk-vin01a0:267_4: “anantañāṇassa tāva me saddhammavaracakkavattino sammāsambuddhassa rūpaṃ imesaṃ akkhīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:268_0: Rājā kira abhisekaṃ pāpuṇitvā tīṇiyeva saṃvaccharāni bāhirakapāsaṇḍaṃ pariggaṇhi.
atk-vin01a0:268_1: Catutthe saṃvacchare buddhasāsane pasīdi. Tassa kira pitā bindusāro brāhmaṇabhatto
atk-vin01a0:268_2: ahosi, so brāhmaṇānañca brāhmaṇajātiyapāsaṇḍānañca paṇḍaraṅgaparibbājakādīnaṃ saṭṭhisahassamattānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:268_3: niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Asokopi pitarā pavattitaṃ dānaṃ attano antepure tatheva
atk-vin01a0:268_4: dadamāno ekadivasaṃ sīhapañjare ṭhito te upasamaparibāhirena ācārena bhuñjamāne asaṃyatindriye
atk-vin01a0:268_5: avinītairiyāpathe disvā cintesi – “īdisaṃ dānaṃ upaparikkhitvā yuttaṭṭhāne dātuṃ
atk-vin01a0:268_6: vaṭṭatī”ti. Evaṃ cintetvā amacce āha – “gacchatha, bhaṇe, attano attano sādhusammate
atk-vin01a0:268_7: samaṇabrāhmaṇe antepuraṃ atiharatha, dānaṃ dassāmā”ti. Amaccā “sādhu, devā”ti rañño
atk-vin01a0:268_8: paṭissuṇitvā te te paṇḍaraṅgaparibbājakājīvakanigaṇṭhādayo ānetvā “ime, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a0:269_0: Atha rājā antepure uccāvacāni āsanāni paññapetvā “āgacchantū”ti vatvā āgatāgate āha
atk-vin01a0:269_1: – “attano attano patirūpe āsane nisīdathā”ti. Tesu ekacce bhaddapīṭhakesu, ekacce
atk-vin01a0:269_2: phalakapīṭhakesu nisīdiṃsu. Te disvā rājā “natthi nesaṃ anto sāro”ti ñatvā tesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:270_0: Evaṃ gacchante kāle ekadivasaṃ rājā sīhapañjare ṭhito addasa nigrodhasāmaṇeraṃ rājaṅgaṇena
atk-vin01a0:270_1: gacchantaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santindriyaṃ iriyāpathasampannaṃ. Ko panāyaṃ nigrodho nāma?
atk-vin01a0:272_0: Bindusārarañño kira dubbalakāleyeva asokakumāro attanā laddhaṃ ujjenīrajjaṃ pahāya
atk-vin01a0:272_1: āgantvā sabbanagaraṃ attano hatthagataṃ katvā sumanarājakumāraṃ aggahesi. Taṃdivasameva
atk-vin01a0:272_2: sumanassa rājakumārassa sumanā nāma devī paripuṇṇagabbhā ahosi. Sā aññātakavesena
atk-vin01a0:272_3: nikkhamitvā avidūre aññataraṃ caṇḍālagāmaṃ sandhāya gacchantī jeṭṭhakacaṇḍālassa
atk-vin01a0:272_4: gehato avidūre aññatarasmiṃ nigrodharukkhe adhivatthāya devatāya “ito ehi, sumane”ti
atk-vin01a0:272_5: vadantiyā saddaṃ sutvā tassā samīpaṃ gatā. Devatā attano ānubhāvena ekaṃ sālaṃ nimminitvā
atk-vin01a0:272_6: “ettha vasāhī”ti adāsi. Sā taṃ sālaṃ pāvisi. Gatadivaseyeva ca puttaṃ vijāyi. Sā
atk-vin01a0:272_7: tassa nigrodhadevatāya pariggahitattā “nigrodho” tveva nāmaṃ akāsi. Jeṭṭhakacaṇḍālo
atk-vin01a0:272_8: diṭṭhadivasato pabhuti taṃ attano sāmidhītaraṃ viya maññamāno nibaddhavattaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-vin01a0:272_9: Rājadhītā tattha satta vassāni vasi. Nigrodhakumāropi sattavassiko jāto. Tadā mahāvaruṇatthero
atk-vin01a0:272_10: nāma eko arahā dārakassa hetusampadaṃ disvā rakkhitvā tattha viharamāno “sattavassiko
atk-vin01a0:272_11: dāni dārako, kālo naṃ pabbājetu”nti cintetvā rājadhītāya ārocāpetvā nigrodhakumāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:272_12: pabbājesi. Kumāro khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. So ekadivasaṃ pātova sarīraṃ jaggitvā
atk-vin01a0:272_14: nikkhami. Mātunivāsanaṭṭhānañcassa dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā nagaramajjhena
atk-vin01a0:273_0: Tena ca samayena asoko dhammarājā pācīnadisābhimukho sīhapañjare caṅkamati. Taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-vin01a0:273_1: nigrodho rājaṅgaṇaṃ sampāpuṇi santindriyo santamānaso yugamattaṃ pekkhamāno. Tena
atk-vin01a0:273_2: vuttaṃ – “ekadivasaṃ rājā sīhapañjare ṭhito addasa nigrodhasāmaṇeraṃ rājaṅgaṇena
atk-vin01a0:273_3: gacchantaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santindriyaṃ iriyāpathasampanna”nti. Disvā panassa etadahosi
atk-vin01a0:273_4: – “ayaṃ jano sabbopi vikkhittacitto bhantamigappaṭibhāgo. Ayaṃ pana dārako avikkhittacitto
atk-vin01a0:273_5: ativiya cassa ālokitavilokitaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇañca sobhati. Addhā etassa abbhantare
atk-vin01a0:273_6: lokuttaradhammo bhavissatī”ti rañño saha dassaneneva sāmaṇere cittaṃ pasīdi, pemaṃ
atk-vin01a0:273_7: saṇṭhahi. Kasmā? Pubbe hi kira puññakaraṇakāle esa rañño jeṭṭhabhātā vāṇijako ahosi. Vuttampi hetaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:275: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃ va yathodake”ti. ;
atk-vin01a0:276_0: Atha rājā sañjātapemo sabahumāno “etaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ pakkosathā”ti amacce pesesi. “Te
atk-vin01a0:276_1: aticirāyantī”ti puna dve tayo pesesi – “turitaṃ āgacchatū”ti. Sāmaṇero attano pakatiyā
atk-vin01a0:276_2: eva agamāsi. Rājā patirūpamāsanaṃ ñatvā “nisīdathā”ti āha. So ito cito ca viloketvā
atk-vin01a0:276_3: “natthi dāni aññe bhikkhū”ti samussitasetacchattaṃ rājapallaṅkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pattaggahaṇatthāya
atk-vin01a0:276_4: rañño ākāraṃ dassesi. Rājā taṃ pallaṅkasamīpaṃ upagacchantaṃyeva disvā cintesi –
atk-vin01a0:276_5: “ajjeva dāni ayaṃ sāmaṇero imassa gehassa sāmiko bhavissatī”ti sāmaṇero rañño hatthe
atk-vin01a0:276_6: pattaṃ datvā pallaṅkaṃ abhiruhitvā nisīdi. Rājā attano atthāya sampāditaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:276_7: yāgukhajjakabhattavikatiṃ upanāmesi. Sāmaṇero attano yāpanīyamattakameva sampaṭicchi.
atk-vin01a0:276_8: Bhattakiccāvasāne rājā āha – “satthārā tumhākaṃ dinnovādaṃ jānāthā”ti? “Jānāmi, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a0:276_9: ekadesenā”ti. “Tāta, mayhampi naṃ kathehī”ti. “Sādhu, mahārājā”ti rañño anurūpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:277_0: Rājā pana “appamādo amatapadaṃ, pamādo maccuno pada”nti sutvāva “aññātaṃ, tāta, pariyosāpehī”ti
atk-vin01a0:277_1: āha. Anumodanāvasāne ca “aṭṭha te, tāta, dhuvabhattāni dammī”ti āha. Sāmaṇero āha
atk-vin01a0:277_2: – “etāni ahaṃ upajjhāyassa dammi, mahārājā”ti. “Ko ayaṃ, tāta, upajjhāyo nāmā”ti?
atk-vin01a0:277_3: “Vajjāvajjaṃ disvā codetā sāretā ca, mahārājā”ti. “Aññānipi te, tāta, aṭṭha dammī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:277_4: “Etāni ācariyassa dammi, mahārājā”ti. “Ko ayaṃ, tāta, ācariyo nāmā”ti? “Imasmiṃ sāsane
atk-vin01a0:277_5: sikkhitabbakadhammesu patiṭṭhāpetā, mahārājā”ti. “Sādhu, tāta, aññānipi te aṭṭha
atk-vin01a0:277_6: dammī”ti. “Etānipi bhikkhusaṅghassa dammi, mahārājā”ti. “Ko ayaṃ, tāta, bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-vin01a0:277_7: nāmā”ti? “Yaṃ nissāya, mahārāja, amhākaṃ ācariyupajjhāyānañca mama ca pabbajjā ca
atk-vin01a0:277_8: upasampadā cā”ti. Rājā bhiyyoso mattāya tuṭṭhacitto āha – “aññānipi te, tāta, aṭṭha
atk-vin01a0:277_9: dammī”ti. Sāmaṇero “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā punadivase dvattiṃsa bhikkhū gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:277_10: rājantepuraṃ pavisitvā bhattakiccamakāsi. Rājā “aññepi dvattiṃsa bhikkhū tumhehi
atk-vin01a0:277_11: saddhiṃ sve bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantū”ti eteneva upāyena divase divase vaḍḍhāpento saṭṭhisahassānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:277_12: brāhmaṇaparibbājakādīnaṃ bhattaṃ upacchinditvā antonivesane saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:277_13: niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi nigrodhatthere gateneva pasādena. Nigrodhattheropi rājānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:277_14: saparisaṃ tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu ca sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā buddhasāsane pothujjanikena
atk-vin01a0:277_15: pasādena acalappasādaṃ katvā patiṭṭhāpesi. Puna rājā asokārāmaṃ nāma mahāvihāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:277_16: kāretvā saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Sakalajambudīpe caturāsītiyā
atk-vin01a0:278_0: Ekadivasaṃ kira rājā asokārāme mahādānaṃ datvā saṭṭhisahassabhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe
atk-vin01a0:278_1: nisajja saṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi pavāretvā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi – “bhante, bhagavatā
atk-vin01a0:278_2: desitadhammo nāma kittako hotī”ti? “Aṅgato, mahārāja, navaṅgāni, khandhato caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:278_3: Rājā dhamme pasīditvā “ekekaṃ dhammakkhandhaṃ ekekavihārena pūjessāmī”ti ekadivasameva
atk-vin01a0:278_4: channavutikoṭidhanaṃ visajjetvā amacce āṇāpesi – “etha, bhaṇe, ekamekasmiṃ nagare
atk-vin01a0:278_5: ekamekaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpentā caturāsītiyā nagarasahassesu caturāsītivihārasahassāni
atk-vin01a0:278_6: kārāpethā”ti. Sayañca asokārāme asokamahāvihāratthāya kammaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Saṅgho indaguttattheraṃ
atk-vin01a0:278_7: nāma mahiddhikaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ navakammādhiṭṭhāyakaṃ adāsi. Thero yaṃ yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:278_8: na niṭṭhāti taṃ taṃ attano ānubhāvena niṭṭhāpesi. Evampi tīhi saṃvaccharehi vihārakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:279_0: Amaccā rañño ārocesuṃ – “niṭṭhitāni, deva, caturāsītivihārasahassānī”ti. Rājā nagare
atk-vin01a0:279_1: bheriṃ carāpesi – “ito sattannaṃ divasānaṃ accayena vihāramaho bhavissati. Sabbe
atk-vin01a0:279_2: aṭṭha sīlaṅgāni samādiyitvā antonagare ca bahinagare ca vihāramahaṃ paṭiyādentū”ti.
atk-vin01a0:279_3: Tato sattannaṃ divasānaṃ accayena sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitāya anekasatasahassasaṅkhyāya
atk-vin01a0:279_4: caturaṅginiyā senāya parivuto devaloke amaravatiyā rājadhāniyā sirito adhikatarasassirīkaṃ
atk-vin01a0:279_5: viya nagaraṃ kātukāmena ussāhajātena mahājanena alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ nagaraṃ anuvicaranto
atk-vin01a0:280_0: Tasmiñca khaṇe sannipatitā asīti bhikkhukoṭiyo ahesuṃ, bhikkhunīnañca channavutisatasahassāni.
atk-vin01a0:280_1: Tattha khīṇāsavabhikkhūyeva satasahassasaṅkhyā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ etadahosi – “sace rājā
atk-vin01a0:280_2: attano adhikāraṃ anavasesaṃ passeyya ativiya buddhasāsane pasīdeyyā”ti. Tato lokavivaraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:280_3: nāma pāṭihāriyaṃ akaṃsu. Rājā asokārāme ṭhitova catuddisā anuvilokento samantato
atk-vin01a0:280_4: samuddapariyantaṃ jambudīpaṃ passati caturāsītiñca vihārasahassāni uḷārāya vihāramahapūjāya
atk-vin01a0:280_5: virocamānāni. So taṃ vibhūtiṃ passamāno uḷārena pītipāmojjena samannāgato “atthi
atk-vin01a0:280_6: pana aññassapi kassaci evarūpaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppannapubba”nti cintento bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-vin01a0:280_7: pucchi – “bhante, amhākaṃ lokanāthassa dasabalassa sāsane ko mahāpariccāgaṃ pariccaji.
atk-vin01a0:280_8: Kassa pariccāgo mahantoti? Bhikkhusaṅgho moggaliputtatissattherassa bhāraṃ akāsi.
atk-vin01a0:280_9: Thero āha – “mahārāja, dasabalassa sāsane paccayadāyako nāma tayā sadiso dharamānepi
atk-vin01a0:280_10: tathāgate na koci ahosi, taveva pariccāgo mahā”ti. Rājā therassa vacanaṃ sutvā uḷārena
atk-vin01a0:280_11: pītipāmojjena nirantaraṃ phuṭṭhasarīro hutvā cintesi – “natthi kira mayā sadiso paccayadāyako,
atk-vin01a0:280_12: mayhaṃ kira pariccāgo mahā, ahaṃ kira deyyadhammena sāsanaṃ paggaṇhāmi. Kiṃ panāhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:280_13: evaṃ sati sāsanassa dāyādo homi, na homī”ti. Tato bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchi – “bhavāmi
atk-vin01a0:280_14: nu kho ahaṃ, bhante, sāsanassa dāyādo”ti?
atk-vin01a0:281_0: Tato moggaliputtatissatthero rañño idaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā rājaputtassa mahindassa upanissayasampattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:281_1: sampassamāno “sace ayaṃ kumāro pabbajissati sāsanassa ativiya vuḍḍhi bhavissatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:281_2: cintetvā rājānaṃ etadavoca – “na kho, mahārāja, ettāvatā sāsanassa dāyādo hoti; apica
atk-vin01a0:281_3: kho paccayadāyakoti vā upaṭṭhākoti vā saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Yopi hi, mahārāja, pathavito
atk-vin01a0:281_4: yāva brahmalokaparimāṇaṃ paccayarāsiṃ dadeyya sopi ‘sāsane dāyādo’ti saṅkhyaṃ na
atk-vin01a0:281_5: gacchatī”ti. “Atha kathaṃ carahi, bhante, sāsanassa dāyādo hotī”ti? “Yo hi koci,
atk-vin01a0:281_6: mahārāja, aḍḍho vā daliddo vā attano orasaṃ puttaṃ pabbājeti – ayaṃ vuccati, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a0:282_0: Evaṃ vutte asoko rājā “ahaṃ kira evarūpaṃ pariccāgaṃ katvāpi neva sāsanassa dāyādabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:282_1: patto”ti sāsane dāyādabhāvaṃ patthayamāno ito cito ca viloketvā addasa mahindakumāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:282_2: avidūre ṭhitaṃ. Disvānassa etadahosi – “kiñcāpi ahaṃ imaṃ kumāraṃ tissakumārassa
atk-vin01a0:282_3: pabbajitakālato pabhuti oparajje ṭhapetukāmo, atha kho oparajjatopi pabbajjāva uttamā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:282_4: Tato kumāraṃ āha – “sakkhasi tvaṃ, tāta, pabbajitu”nti? Kumāro pakatiyāpi tissakumārassa
atk-vin01a0:282_5: pabbajitakālato pabhuti pabbajitukāmova rañño vacanaṃ sutvā ativiya pāmojjajāto hutvā
atk-vin01a0:282_6: āha – “pabbajāmi, deva, maṃ pabbājetvā tumhe sāsanadāyādā hothā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:283_0: Tena ca samayena rājadhītā saṅghamittāpi tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhitā hoti. Tassā ca sāmiko
atk-vin01a0:283_1: aggibrahmā nāma kumāro yuvarājena tissakumārena saddhiṃ pabbajito hoti. Rājā taṃ
atk-vin01a0:283_2: disvā āha – “tvampi, amma, pabbajituṃ sakkhasī”ti? “Sādhu, tāta, sakkomī”ti. Rājā
atk-vin01a0:283_3: puttānaṃ manaṃ labhitvā pahaṭṭhacitto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ etadavoca – “bhante, ime dārake
atk-vin01a0:283_4: pabbājetvā maṃ sāsane dāyādaṃ karothā”ti. Saṅgho rañño vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā kumāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:283_5: moggaliputtatissattherena upajjhāyena mahādevattherena ca ācariyena pabbājesi. Majjhantikattherena
atk-vin01a0:283_6: ācariyena upasampādesi. Tadā kira kumāro paripuṇṇavīsativassova hoti. So tasmiṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:283_7: upasampadasīmamaṇḍale saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Saṅghamittāyapi rājadhītāya
atk-vin01a0:283_8: ācariyā āyupālittherī nāma, upajjhāyā pana dhammapālittherī nāma ahosi. Tadā saṅghamittā
atk-vin01a0:283_9: aṭṭhārasavassā hoti. Taṃ pabbajitamattaṃ tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale sikkhāya patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-vin01a0:284_0: Atha mahindatthero upasampannakālato pabhuti attano upajjhāyasseva santike dhammañca
atk-vin01a0:284_1: vinayañca pariyāpuṇanto dvepi saṅgītiyo ārūḷhaṃ tipiṭakasaṅgahitaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:284_2: theravādaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ abbhantare uggahetvā attano upajjhāyassa antevāsikānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:284_3: sahassamattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāmokkho ahosi. Tadā asoko dhammarājā navavassābhiseko
atk-vin01a0:284_4: hoti. Rañño pana aṭṭhavassābhisekakāleyeva kontaputtatissatthero byādhipaṭikammatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:284_5: bhikkhācāravattena āhiṇḍanto pasatamattaṃ sappiṃ alabhitvā byādhibalena parikkhīṇāyusaṅkhāro
atk-vin01a0:284_6: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ appamādena ovaditvā ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-vin01a0:284_7: parinibbāyi. Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā therassa sakkāraṃ katvā “mayi nāma rajjaṃ kārente
atk-vin01a0:284_8: evaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paccayā dullabhā”ti nagarassa catūsu dvāresu pokkharaṇiyo kārāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:285_0: Tena kira samayena pāṭaliputtassa catūsu dvāresu cattāri satasahassāni, sabhāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:285_1: satasahassanti divase divase pañcasatasahassāni rañño uppajjanti. Tato rājā nigrodhattherassa
atk-vin01a0:285_2: devasikaṃ satasahassaṃ visajjesi. Buddhassa cetiye gandhamālādīhi pūjanatthāya satasahassaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:285_3: Dhammassa satasahassaṃ, taṃ dhammadharānaṃ bahussutānaṃ catupaccayatthāya upanīyati.
atk-vin01a0:285_4: Saṅghassa satasahassaṃ, catūsu dvāresu bhesajjatthāya satasahassaṃ. Evaṃ sāsane uḷāro
atk-vin01a0:286_0: Titthiyā parihīnalābhasakkārā antamaso ghāsacchādanampi alabhantā lābhasakkāraṃ patthayamānā
atk-vin01a0:286_1: sāsane pabbajitvā sakāni sakāni diṭṭhigatāni “ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo”ti dīpenti.
atk-vin01a0:286_2: Pabbajjaṃ alabhamānāpi sayameva muṇḍetvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā vihāresu vicarantā
atk-vin01a0:286_3: uposathampi pavāraṇampi saṅghakammampi gaṇakammampi pavisanti. Bhikkhū tehi saddhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:286_4: uposathaṃ na karonti. Tadā moggaliputtatissatthero “uppannaṃ dāni idaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:286_5: taṃ nacirasseva kakkhaḷaṃ bhavissati. Na kho panetaṃ sakkā imesaṃ majjhe vasantena
atk-vin01a0:286_6: vūpasametu”nti mahindattherassa gaṇaṃ nīyyātetvā attanā phāsuvihārena viharitukāmo
atk-vin01a0:286_7: ahogaṅgapabbataṃ agamāsi. Tepi kho titthiyā bhikkhusaṅghena dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena
atk-vin01a0:286_8: niggayhamānāpi dhammavinayānulomāya paṭipattiyā asaṇṭhahantā anekarūpaṃ sāsanassa
atk-vin01a0:286_9: abbudañca malañca kaṇṭakañca samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Keci aggiṃ paricaranti, keci pañcātapena
atk-vin01a0:286_10: tāpenti, keci ādiccaṃ anuparivattanti, keci “dhammañca vinayañca vobhindissāmā”ti
atk-vin01a0:286_11: paggaṇhiṃsu. Tadā bhikkhusaṅgho na tehi saddhiṃ uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā akāsi.
atk-vin01a0:286_12: Asokārāme sattavassāni uposatho upacchijji. Raññopi etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Rājā ekaṃ
atk-vin01a0:286_13: amaccaṃ āṇāpesi – “vihāraṃ gantvā adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametvā uposathaṃ kārāpehī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:286_14: Amacco rājānaṃ paṭipucchituṃ avisahanto aññe amacce upasaṅkamitvā āha – “rājā maṃ
atk-vin01a0:286_15: ‘vihāraṃ gantvā adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametvā uposathaṃ kārāpehī’ti pahiṇi. Kathaṃ nu kho
atk-vin01a0:286_16: adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammatī”ti? Te āhaṃsu – “mayaṃ evaṃ sallakkhema – ‘yathā nāma paccantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:286_17: vūpasamentā core ghātenti, evameva ye uposathaṃ na karonti, te māretukāmo rājā bhavissatī”’ti.
atk-vin01a0:286_18: Atha so amacco vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā āha – “ahaṃ raññā ‘uposathaṃ
atk-vin01a0:286_19: kārāpehī’ti pesito. Karotha dāni, bhante, uposatha”nti. Bhikkhū “na mayaṃ titthiyehi
atk-vin01a0:286_20: saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karomā”ti āhaṃsu. Atha amacco therāsanato paṭṭhāya asinā sīsāni pātetuṃ āraddho.
atk-vin01a0:287_0: Addasā kho tissatthero taṃ amaccaṃ tathā vippaṭipannaṃ. Tissatthero nāma na yo vā
atk-vin01a0:287_1: so vā, rañño ekamātiko bhātā tissakumāro nāma, taṃ kira rājā pattābhiseko oparajje
atk-vin01a0:287_2: ṭhapesi. So ekadivasaṃ vanacāraṃ gato addasa mahantaṃ migasaṅghaṃ cittakīḷāya kīḷantaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:287_3: Disvānassa etadahosi – “ime tāva tiṇabhakkhā migā evaṃ kīḷanti, ime pana samaṇā rājakule
atk-vin01a0:287_4: paṇītāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā mudukāsu seyyāsu sayamānā kiṃ nāma kīḷitaṃ na kīḷissantī”ti!
atk-vin01a0:287_5: So tato āgantvā imaṃ attano vitakkaṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā “aṭṭhāne kukkuccāyitaṃ kumārena!
atk-vin01a0:287_6: Handa, naṃ evaṃ saññāpessāmī”ti ekadivasaṃ kenaci kāraṇena kuddho viya hutvā “ehi
atk-vin01a0:287_7: sattadivasena rajjaṃ sampaṭiccha, tato taṃ ghātessāmī”ti maraṇabhayena tajjetvā tamatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:287_8: saññāpesi. So kira kumāro “sattame maṃ divase māressatī”ti na cittarūpaṃ nhāyi, na
atk-vin01a0:287_9: bhuñji, na supi, ativiya lūkhasarīro ahosi. Tato naṃ rājā pucchi – “kissa tvaṃ evarūpo
atk-vin01a0:287_10: jāto”ti? “Maraṇabhayena, devā”ti. “Are, tvaṃ nāma paricchinnamaraṇaṃ sampassamāno
atk-vin01a0:287_11: vissattho na kīḷasi? Bhikkhū assāsapassāsanibaddhaṃ maraṇaṃ pekkhamānā kathaṃ kīḷissantī”ti!
atk-vin01a0:288_0: So puna ekadivasaṃ migavaṃ nikkhamitvā araññe anuvicaramāno addasa yonakamahādhammarakkhitattheraṃ
atk-vin01a0:288_1: aññatarena hatthināgena sālasākhaṃ gahetvā bījiyamānaṃ nisinnaṃ. Disvā pāmojjajāto
atk-vin01a0:288_2: cintesi – “kadā nu kho ahampi ayaṃ mahāthero viya pabbajeyyaṃ! Siyā nu kho so divaso”ti.
atk-vin01a0:288_3: Thero tassāsayaṃ viditvā tassa passantasseva ākāse uppatitvā asokārāme pokkharaṇiyā
atk-vin01a0:288_4: udakatale ṭhatvā cīvarañca uttarāsaṅgañca ākāse laggetvā nhāyituṃ āraddho.
atk-vin01a0:289_0: Kumāro therassānubhāvaṃ disvā ativiya pasanno “ajjeva pabbajissāmī”ti nivattitvā
atk-vin01a0:289_1: rañño ārocesi – “pabbajissāmahaṃ, devā”ti. Rājā anekappakāraṃ yācitvāpi taṃ nivattetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:289_2: asakkonto asokārāmagamanīyamaggaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā kumāraṃ chaṇavesaṃ gāhāpetvā alaṅkatāya
atk-vin01a0:289_3: senāya parivārāpetvā vihāraṃ nesi. “Yuvarājā kira pabbajissatī”ti sutvā bahū bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:289_4: pattacīvarāni paṭiyādesuṃ. Kumāro padhānagharaṃ gantvā mahādhammarakkhitattherasseva
atk-vin01a0:289_5: santike pabbaji saddhiṃ purisasatasahassena. Kumārassa pana anupabbajitānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo
atk-vin01a0:289_6: natthi. Kumāro rañño catuvassābhisekakāle pabbajito. Athaññopi rañño bhāgineyyo saṅghamittāya
atk-vin01a0:289_7: sāmiko aggibrahmā nāma kumāro atthi. Saṅghamittā taṃ paṭicca ekameva puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-vin01a0:289_8: Sopi “yuvarājā pabbajito”ti sutvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā – “ahampi, deva, pabbajissāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:289_9: yāci. “Pabbaja, tātā”ti ca raññā anuññāto taṃdivasameva pabbaji.
atk-vin01a0:292_0: So taṃ amaccaṃ tathā vippaṭipannaṃ disvā cintesi – “na rājā there mārāpetuṃ pahiṇeyya;
atk-vin01a0:292_1: addhā imassevetaṃ amaccassa duggahitaṃ bhavissatī”ti gantvā sayaṃ tassa āsanne āsane
atk-vin01a0:292_2: nisīdi. So theraṃ sañjānitvā satthaṃ nipātetuṃ avisahanto gantvā rañño ārocesi –
atk-vin01a0:292_3: “ahaṃ, deva, uposathaṃ kātuṃ anicchantānaṃ ettakānaṃ nāma bhikkhūnaṃ sīsāni pātesiṃ;
atk-vin01a0:292_4: atha ayyassa tissattherassa paṭipāṭi sampattā, kinti karomī”ti? Rājā sutvāva – “are!
atk-vin01a0:292_5: Kiṃ pana, tvaṃ, mayā bhikkhū ghātetuṃ pesito”ti tāvadeva sarīre uppannadāho hutvā
atk-vin01a0:292_6: vihāraṃ gantvā there bhikkhū pucchi – “ayaṃ, bhante, amacco mayā anāṇattova evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:292_7: akāsi, kassa nu kho iminā pāpena bhavitabba”nti? Ekacce therā, “ayaṃ tava vacanena
atk-vin01a0:292_8: akāsi, tuyhetaṃ pāpa”nti āhaṃsu. Ekacce “ubhinnampi vo etaṃ pāpa”nti āhaṃsu. Ekacce
atk-vin01a0:292_9: evamāhaṃsu – “kiṃ pana te, mahārāja, atthi cittaṃ ‘ayaṃ gantvā bhikkhū ghātetū”’ti?
atk-vin01a0:292_10: “Natthi, bhante, kusalādhippāyo ahaṃ pesesiṃ – ‘samaggo bhikkhusaṅgho uposathaṃ karotū”’ti.
atk-vin01a0:292_11: “Sace tvaṃ kusalādhippāyo, natthi tuyhaṃ pāpaṃ, amaccassevetaṃ pāpa”nti. Rājā dveḷhakajāto
atk-vin01a0:292_12: āha – “atthi nu kho, bhante, koci bhikkhu mametaṃ dveḷhakaṃ chinditvā sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:292_13: samattho”ti? “Atthi, mahārāja, moggaliputtatissatthero nāma, so te imaṃ dveḷhakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:292_14: chinditvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhituṃ samattho”ti. Rājā tadaheva cattāro dhammakathike ekekabhikkhusahassaparivāre,
atk-vin01a0:292_15: cattāro ca amacce ekekapurisasahassaparivāre “theraṃ gaṇhitvā āgacchathā”ti pesesi.
atk-vin01a0:292_16: Te gantvā “rājā pakkosatī”ti āhaṃsu. Thero nāgacchi. Dutiyampi kho rājā aṭṭha dhammakathike,
atk-vin01a0:292_17: aṭṭha ca amacce sahassasahassaparivāreyeva pesesi – “‘rājā, bhante, pakkosatī’ti
atk-vin01a0:292_18: vatvā gaṇhitvāva āgacchathā”ti. Te tatheva āhaṃsu. Dutiyampi thero nāgacchi. Rājā
atk-vin01a0:292_19: there pucchi – “ahaṃ, bhante, dvikkhattuṃ pahiṇiṃ; kasmā thero nāgacchatī”ti? “‘Rājā
atk-vin01a0:292_20: pakkosatī’ti vuttattā, mahārāja, nāgacchati. Evaṃ pana vutte āgaccheyya ‘sāsanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:292_21: bhante, osīdati, amhākaṃ sāsanaṃ paggahatthāya sahāyakā hothā”’ti. Atha rājā tathā
atk-vin01a0:292_22: vatvā soḷasa dhammakathike, soḷasa ca amacce sahassasahassaparivāre pesesi. Bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:292_23: ca paṭipucchi – “mahallako nu kho, bhante, thero daharo nu kho”ti? “Mahallako, mahārājā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:292_24: “Vayhaṃ vā sivikaṃ vā abhiruhissati, bhante”ti? “Nābhiruhissati, mahārājā”ti. “Kuhiṃ,
atk-vin01a0:292_25: bhante, thero vasatī”ti? “Upari gaṅgāya, mahārājā”ti. Rājā āha – “tena hi, bhaṇe,
atk-vin01a0:292_26: nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ bandhitvā tattheva theraṃ nisīdāpetvā dvīsupi tīresu ārakkhaṃ saṃvidhāya
atk-vin01a0:292_27: theraṃ ānethā”ti. Bhikkhū ca amaccā ca therassa santikaṃ gantvā rañño sāsanaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-vin01a0:293_0: Thero sutvā “yaṃ kho ahaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya sāsanaṃ paggaṇhissāmīti pabbajitomhi. Ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:293_1: dāni me so kālo anuppatto”ti cammakhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhitvāva uṭṭhahi. Atha “thero sve pāṭaliputtaṃ
atk-vin01a0:293_2: sampāpuṇissatī”ti rattibhāge rājā supinaṃ addasa. Evarūpo supino ahosi – “sabbaseto
atk-vin01a0:293_3: hatthināgo āgantvā rājānaṃ sīsato paṭṭhāya parāmasitvā dakkhiṇahatthe aggahesī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:293_4: Punadivase rājā supinajjhāyake pucchi – “mayā evarūpo supino diṭṭho, kiṃ me bhavissatī”ti?
atk-vin01a0:293_5: Eko taṃ, “mahārāja, samaṇanāgo dakkhiṇahatthe gaṇhissatī”ti. Atha rājā tāvadeva “thero
atk-vin01a0:293_6: āgato”ti sutvā gaṅgātīraṃ gantvā nadiṃ otaritvā abbhuggacchanto jāṇumatte udake theraṃ
atk-vin01a0:293_7: sampāpuṇitvā therassa nāvāto otarantassa hatthaṃ adāsi. Thero rājānaṃ dakkhiṇahatthe
atk-vin01a0:293_8: aggahesi. Taṃ disvā asiggāhā “therassa sīsaṃ pātessāmā”ti kosato asiṃ abbāhiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:293_9: Kasmā? Etaṃ kira cārittaṃ rājakulesu – “yo rājānaṃ hatthe gaṇhati tassa asinā sīsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:293_10: pātetabba”nti. Rājā chāyaṃyeva disvā āha – “pubbepi ahaṃ bhikkhūsu viraddhakāraṇā
atk-vin01a0:293_11: assādaṃ na vindāmi, mā kho there virajjhitthā”ti. Thero pana kasmā rājānaṃ hatthe
atk-vin01a0:293_12: aggahesīti? Yasmā raññā pañhaṃ pucchanatthāya pakkosāpito tasmā “antevāsiko me aya”nti aggahesi.
atk-vin01a0:294_0: Rājā theraṃ attano uyyānaṃ netvā bāhirato tikkhattuṃ parivārāpetvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-vin01a0:294_1: sayameva therassa pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā therassa santike nisīditvā “paṭibalo
atk-vin01a0:294_2: nu kho thero mama kaṅkhaṃ chinditvā uppannaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitu”nti
atk-vin01a0:294_3: vīmaṃsanatthāya “ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ daṭṭhukāmo”ti āha. “Kataraṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:294_6: nu kho, mahārāja, kaṃsapātiyā udakapuṇṇāya sabbaṃ udakaṃ kampetuṃ dukkaraṃ; udāhu
atk-vin01a0:294_8: dukkara”nti. “Tena hi, bhante, padesapathavīkampanaṃ passissāmī”ti. “Tena hi, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a0:294_9: samantato yojane puratthimāya disāya ekena cakkena sīmaṃ akkamitvā ratho tiṭṭhatu;
atk-vin01a0:294_10: dakkhiṇāya disāya dvīhi pādehi sīmaṃ akkamitvā asso tiṭṭhatu; pacchimāya disāya ekena
atk-vin01a0:294_11: pādena sīmaṃ akkamitvā puriso tiṭṭhatu; uttarāya disāya upaḍḍhabhāgena sīmaṃ akkamitvā
atk-vin01a0:294_12: ekā udakapāti tiṭṭhatū”ti. Rājā tathā kārāpesi. Thero abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:294_13: samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya “rājā passatū”ti yojanappamāṇapathavīcalanaṃ adhiṭṭhahi.
atk-vin01a0:294_14: Puratthimāya disāya rathassa antosīmāya ṭhito pādova cali, itaro na cali. Evaṃ dakkhiṇapacchimadisāsu
atk-vin01a0:294_15: assapurisānaṃ antosīmāya ṭhitapādāyeva caliṃsu, upaḍḍhupaḍḍhaṃ sarīrañca. Uttaradisāya
atk-vin01a0:294_16: udakapātiyāpi antosīmāya ṭhitaṃ upaḍḍhabhāgagatameva udakaṃ cali, avasesaṃ niccalamahosīti.
atk-vin01a0:294_17: Rājā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā “sakkhati dāni thero sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitu”nti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā
atk-vin01a0:294_18: attano kukkuccaṃ pucchi – “ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ amaccaṃ ‘vihāraṃ gantvā adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:294_19: vūpasametvā uposathaṃ kārāpehī’ti pahiṇiṃ, so vihāraṃ gantvā ettake bhikkhū jīvitā
atk-vin01a0:295_0: “Kiṃ pana te, mahārāja, atthi cittaṃ ‘ayaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhū ghātetū”’ti? “Natthi,
atk-vin01a0:295_1: bhante”ti. “Sace te, mahārāja, natthi evarūpaṃ cittaṃ, natthi tuyhaṃ pāpa”nti. Atha
atk-vin01a0:295_2: thero rājānaṃ etamatthaṃ iminā suttena saññāpesi – “cetanāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:295_3: vadāmi. Cetayitvā kammaṃ karoti – kāyena vācāya manasā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:296: Tamevatthaṃ paridīpetuṃ tittirajātakaṃ āhari – “atīte, mahārāja, dīpakatittiro tāpasaṃ pucchi –
atk-vin01a0:298: Paṭicca kammaṃ phusati, tasmiṃ me saṅkate mano’ti.
atk-vin01a0:299_0: Tāpaso āha – ‘atthi pana te cittaṃ mama saddena ca rūpadassanena ca āgantvā ete pakkhino
atk-vin01a0:299_1: bajjhantu vā haññantu vā’ti? ‘Natthi, bhante’ti tittiro āha. Tato naṃ tāpaso saññāpesi
atk-vin01a0:299_2: – ‘sace te natthi cittaṃ, natthi pāpaṃ; cetayantameva hi pāpaṃ phusati, nācetayantaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:300: ‘Na paṭicca kammaṃ phusati, mano ce nappadussati;
atk-vin01a0:302_0: Evaṃ thero rājānaṃ saññāpetvā tattheva rājuyyāne satta divasāni vasanto rājānaṃ samayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:302_1: uggaṇhāpesi. Rājā sattame divase asokārāme bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā sāṇipākāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:302_2: parikkhipāpetvā sāṇipākārantare nisinno ekaladdhike ekaladdhike bhikkhū ekato ekato
atk-vin01a0:302_3: kārāpetvā ekamekaṃ bhikkhusamūhaṃ pakkosāpetvā pucchi – “kiṃvādī sammāsambuddho”ti?
atk-vin01a0:302_5: adhiccasamuppannikā… saññīvādā… asaññīvādā… nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā … ucchedavādā… diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā
atk-vin01a0:302_7: bhikkhū, aññatitthiyā ime”ti ñatvā tesaṃ setakāni vatthāni datvā uppabbājesi. Te
atk-vin01a0:303_0: Athaññe bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā pucchi – “kiṃvādī, bhante, sammāsambuddho”ti? “Vibhajjavādī,
atk-vin01a0:303_1: mahārājā”ti. Evaṃ vutte rājā theraṃ pucchi – “vibhajjavādī, bhante, sammāsambuddho”ti?
atk-vin01a0:303_2: “Āma, mahārājā”ti. Tato rājā “suddhaṃ dāni, bhante, sāsanaṃ; karotu bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-vin01a0:304_0: Samaggo saṅgho sannipatitvā uposathaṃ akāsi. Tasmiṃ sannipāte saṭṭhi bhikkhusatasahassāni
atk-vin01a0:304_1: ahesuṃ. Tasmiṃ samāgame moggaliputtatissatthero parappavādaṃ maddamāno kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:304_2: abhāsi. Tato saṭṭhisatasahassasaṅkhyesu bhikkhūsu uccinitvā tipiṭakapariyattidharānaṃ
