atk-vin01a0:304_3: pabhinnapaṭisambhidānaṃ tevijjādibhedānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahassamekaṃ gahetvā yathā mahākassapatthero
atk-vin01a0:304_4: ca kākaṇḍakaputto yasatthero ca dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyiṃsu; evameva dhammañca
atk-vin01a0:304_5: vinayañca saṅgāyanto sabbaṃ sāsanamalaṃ visodhetvā tatiyasaṅgītiṃ akāsi. Saṅgītipariyosāne
atk-vin01a0:304_6: anekappakāraṃ pathavī akampittha. Ayaṃ saṅgīti navahi māsehi niṭṭhitā. Yā loke –
atk-vin01a0:306: Purimā dve upādāya, tatiyāti ca vuccatīti.
atk-vin01a0:308_0: Ettāvatā ca “kenābhata”nti etassa pañhassa vissajjanatthaṃ yaṃ avocumha – “jambudīpe
atk-vin01a0:308_1: tāva upālittheramādiṃ katvā ācariyaparamparāya yāva tatiyasaṅgīti tāva ābhataṃ. Tatrāyaṃ ācariyaparamparā –
atk-vin01a0:314_0: Tatiyasaṅgahato pana uddhaṃ imaṃ dīpaṃ mahindādīhi ābhataṃ. Mahindato uggahetvā kañci
atk-vin01a0:314_1: kālaṃ ariṭṭhattherādīhi ābhataṃ. Tato yāvajjatanā tesaṃyeva antevāsikaparamparabhūtāya
atk-vin01a0:320: Tato ariṭṭho medhāvī, tissadatto ca paṇḍito.
atk-vin01a0:324: Tissatthero ca medhāvī, devatthero ca paṇḍito.
atk-vin01a0:336: Tissatthero ca medhāvī, vinaye ca visārado.
atk-vin01a0:342: Sivatthero ca medhāvī, vinaye sabbattha kovido.
atk-vin01a0:345_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – moggaliputtatissatthero kira imaṃ tatiyadhammasaṅgītiṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:345_1: evaṃ cintesi – “kattha nu kho anāgate sāsanaṃ suppatiṭṭhitaṃ bhaveyyā”ti? Athassa
atk-vin01a0:345_2: upaparikkhato etadahosi – “paccantimesu kho janapadesu suppatiṭṭhitaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:345_3: So tesaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhāraṃ katvā te te bhikkhū tattha tattha pesesi. Majjhantikattheraṃ
atk-vin01a0:345_4: kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhaṃ pesesi – “tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:345_5: Mahādevattheraṃ tatheva vatvā mahiṃsakamaṇḍalaṃ pesesi. Rakkhitattheraṃ vanavāsiṃ.
atk-vin01a0:345_7: yonakalokaṃ. Majjhimattheraṃ himavantadesabhāgaṃ. Soṇattherañca uttarattherañca suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ.
atk-vin01a0:345_8: Attano saddhivihārikaṃ mahindattheraṃ iṭṭiyattherena uttiyattherena sambalattherena
atk-vin01a0:345_9: bhaddasālattherena ca saddhiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pesesi – “tumhe tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gantvā
atk-vin01a0:345_10: ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpethā”ti. Sabbepi taṃ taṃ disābhāgaṃ gacchantā attapañcamā
atk-vin01a0:345_11: agamaṃsu “paccantimesu janapadesu pañcavaggo gaṇo alaṃ upasampadakammāyā”ti maññamānā.
atk-vin01a0:346_0: Tena kho pana samayena kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhe sassapākasamaye aravāḷo nāma nāgarājā
atk-vin01a0:346_1: karakavassaṃ nāma vassāpetvā sassaṃ harāpetvā mahāsamuddaṃ pāpeti. Majjhantikatthero
atk-vin01a0:346_2: pana pāṭaliputtato vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā himavati aravāḷadahassa upari otaritvā aravāḷadahapiṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:346_3: caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti. Nāgamāṇavakā taṃ disvā aravāḷassa
atk-vin01a0:346_4: nāgarājassa ārocesuṃ – “mahārāja, eko chinnabhinnapaṭadharo bhaṇḍu kāsāvavasano amhākaṃ
atk-vin01a0:346_5: udakaṃ dūsetī”ti. Nāgarājā tāvadeva kodhābhibhūto nikkhamitvā theraṃ disvā makkhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:346_6: asahamāno antalikkhe anekāni bhiṃsanakāni nimmini. Tato tato bhusā vātā vāyanti,
atk-vin01a0:346_7: rukkhā chijjanti, pabbatakūṭāni patanti, meghā gajjanti, vijjulatā niccharanti, asaniyo
atk-vin01a0:346_8: phalanti, bhinnaṃ viya gaganatalaṃ udakaṃ paggharati. Bhayānakarūpā nāgakumārā sannipatanti.
atk-vin01a0:346_9: Sayampi dhūmāyati, pajjalati, paharaṇavuṭṭhiyo vissajjeti. “Ko ayaṃ muṇḍako chinnabhinnapaṭadharo”tiādīhi
atk-vin01a0:346_10: pharusavacanehi theraṃ santajjesi. “Etha gaṇhatha hanatha niddhamatha imaṃ samaṇa”nti
atk-vin01a0:346_11: nāgabalaṃ āṇāpesi. Thero sabbaṃ taṃ bhiṃsanakaṃ attano iddhibalena paṭibāhitvā nāgarājānaṃ āha –
atk-vin01a0:348: Na me paṭibalo assa, janetuṃ bhayabheravaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:353_0: Evaṃ vutte nāgarājā vihatānubhāvo nipphalavāyāmo dukkhī dummano ahosi. Taṃ thero
atk-vin01a0:353_1: taṅkhaṇānurūpāya dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā
atk-vin01a0:353_2: tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu ca sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi saddhiṃ caturāsītiyā nāgasahassehi.
atk-vin01a0:353_3: Aññepi bahū himavantavāsino yakkhā ca gandhabbā ca kumbhaṇḍā ca therassa dhammakathaṃ
atk-vin01a0:353_4: sutvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Pañcakopi yakkho saddhiṃ bhariyāya yakkhiniyā
atk-vin01a0:353_5: pañcahi ca puttasatehi paṭhame phale patiṭṭhito. Athāyasmā majjhantikatthero sabbepi
atk-vin01a0:354: “Mā dāni kodhaṃ janayittha, ito uddhaṃ yathā pure;
atk-vin01a0:355: Sassaghātañca mā kattha, sukhakāmā hi pāṇino;
atk-vin01a0:356: Karotha mettaṃ sattesu, vasantu manujā sukha”nti.
atk-vin01a0:357_0: Te sabbepi “sādhu bhante”ti therassa paṭissuṇitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu. Taṃdivasameva
atk-vin01a0:357_1: ca nāgarājassa pūjāsamayo hoti. Atha nāgarājā attano ratanamayaṃ pallaṅkaṃ āharāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:357_2: therassa paññapesi. Nisīdi thero pallaṅke. Nāgarājāpi theraṃ bījayamāno samīpe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a0:357_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhavāsino āgantvā theraṃ disvā “amhākaṃ nāgarājatopi
atk-vin01a0:357_4: thero mahiddhikataro”ti therameva vanditvā nisinnā. Thero tesaṃ āsīvisopamasuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:357_5: kathesi. Suttapariyosāne asītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi, kulasatasahassaṃ
atk-vin01a0:357_6: pabbaji. Tato pabhuti ca kasmīragandhārā yāvajjatanā kāsāvapajjotā isivātapaṭivātā eva.
atk-vin01a0:359: Duṭṭhaṃ nāgaṃ pasādetvā, mocesi bandhanā bahūti.
atk-vin01a0:360: Mahādevattheropi mahiṃsakamaṇḍalaṃ gantvā devadūtasuttaṃ kathesi. Suttapariyosāne cattālīsa pāṇasahassāni dhammacakkhuṃ paṭilabhiṃsu, cattālīsaṃyeva pāṇasahassāni pabbajiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:363_0: Rakkhitatthero pana vanavāsiṃ gantvā ākāse ṭhatvā anamataggapariyāyakathāya vanavāsike
atk-vin01a0:363_1: pasādesi. Kathāpariyosāne panassa saṭṭhisahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Sattatisahassamattā
atk-vin01a0:363_2: pabbajiṃsu, pañcavihārasatāni patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Evaṃ so tattha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-vin01a0:366_1: pasādetvā sattati pāṇasahassāni dhammāmataṃ pāyesi. Khattiyakulato eva purisasahassāni
atk-vin01a0:366_2: pabbajiṃsu, samadhikāni ca cha itthisahassāni. Evaṃ so tattha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-vin01a0:369_0: Mahādhammarakkhitatthero pana mahāraṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahānāradakassapajātakakathāya mahāraṭṭhake
atk-vin01a0:369_1: pasādetvā caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni maggaphalesu patiṭṭhāpesi. Terasasahassāni pabbajiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:372_0: Mahārakkhitattheropi yonakaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā kāḷakārāmasuttantakathāya yonakalokaṃ pasādetvā
atk-vin01a0:372_1: sattatisahassādhikassa pāṇasatasahassassa maggaphalālaṅkāraṃ adāsi. Santike cassa
atk-vin01a0:372_2: dasasahassāni pabbajiṃsu. Evaṃ sopi tattha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-vin01a0:373: Yonaraṭṭhaṃ tadā gantvā, so mahārakkhito isi;
atk-vin01a0:375_1: mahādevattherena ca saddhiṃ himavantadesabhāgaṃ gantvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttantakathāya
atk-vin01a0:375_2: taṃ desaṃ pasādetvā asītipāṇakoṭiyo maggaphalaratanāni paṭilābhesi. Pañcapi ca therā
atk-vin01a0:375_3: pañca raṭṭhāni pasādesuṃ. Ekamekassa santike satasahassamattā pabbajiṃsu. Evaṃ te
atk-vin01a0:378_0: Soṇattheropi saddhiṃ uttarattherena suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ agamāsi. Tena ca samayena tattha
atk-vin01a0:378_1: ekā rakkhasī samuddato nikkhamitvā rājakule jāte jāte dārake khādati. Taṃdivasameva
atk-vin01a0:378_2: ca rājakule eko dārako jāto hoti. Manussā theraṃ disvā “rakkhasānaṃ sahāyako eso”ti
atk-vin01a0:378_3: maññamānā āvudhāni gahetvā theraṃ paharitukāmā āgacchanti. Thero “kiṃ tumhe āvudhahatthā
atk-vin01a0:378_4: āgacchathā”ti āha. Te āhaṃsu – “rājakule jāte jāte dārake rakkhasā khādanti, tesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:378_5: tumhe sahāyakā”ti. Thero “na mayaṃ rakkhasānaṃ sahāyakā, samaṇā nāma mayaṃ viratā
atk-vin01a0:378_6: pāṇātipātā…pe… viratā majjapānā ekabhattikā sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā”ti āha. Tasmiṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:378_7: ca khaṇe sā rakkhasī saparivārā samuddato nikkhami “rājakule dārako jāto taṃ khādissāmī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:378_8: Manussā taṃ disvā “esā, bhante, rakkhasī āgacchatī”ti bhītā viraviṃsu. Thero rakkhasehi
atk-vin01a0:378_9: diguṇe attabhāve nimminitvā tehi attabhāvehi taṃ rakkhasiṃ saparisaṃ majjhe katvā
atk-vin01a0:378_10: ubhosu passesu parikkhipi. Tassā saparisāya etadahosi – “addhā imehi idaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:378_11: laddhaṃ bhavissati. Mayaṃ pana imesaṃ bhakkhā bhavissāmā”ti. Sabbe rakkhasā bhītā
atk-vin01a0:378_12: vegasā palāyiṃsu. Theropi te yāva adassanaṃ tāva palāpetvā dīpassa samantato rakkhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:378_13: ṭhapesi. Tasmiñca samaye sannipatitaṃ mahājanakāyaṃ brahmajālasuttantakathāya pasādetvā
atk-vin01a0:378_14: saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi. Saṭṭhisahassānaṃ panettha dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-vin01a0:378_15: Kuladārakānaṃ aḍḍhuḍḍhāni sahassāni pabbajiṃsu, kuladhītānaṃ diyaḍḍhasahassaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:378_16: so tattha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Tato pabhuti rājakule jātadārakānaṃ soṇuttaranāmameva karonti.
atk-vin01a0:381_0: Mahindatthero pana “tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gantvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehī”ti upajjhāyena ca
atk-vin01a0:381_1: bhikkhusaṅghena ca ajjhiṭṭho cintesi – “kālo nu kho me tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gantuṃ no”ti.
atk-vin01a0:381_2: Athassa vīmaṃsato “na tāva kālo”ti ahosi. Kiṃ panassa disvā etadahosi? Muṭasivarañño
atk-vin01a0:381_3: mahallakabhāvaṃ. Tato cintesi – “ayaṃ rājā mahallako, na sakkā imaṃ gaṇhitvā sāsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:381_4: paggahetuṃ. Idāni panassa putto devānaṃpiyatisso rajjaṃ kāressati. Taṃ gaṇhitvā sakkā
atk-vin01a0:381_5: bhavissati sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ. Handa yāva so samayo āgacchati, tāva ñātake olokema.
atk-vin01a0:381_6: Puna dāni mayaṃ imaṃ janapadaṃ āgaccheyyāma vā na vā”ti. So evaṃ cintetvā upajjhāyañca
atk-vin01a0:381_7: bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā asokārāmato nikkhamma tehi iṭṭiyādīhi catūhi therehi saṅghamittāya
atk-vin01a0:381_8: puttena sumanasāmaṇerena bhaṇḍukena ca upāsakena saddhiṃ rājagahanagaraparivattakena
atk-vin01a0:381_9: dakkhiṇāgirijanapade cārikaṃ caramāno ñātake olokento cha māse atikkāmesi. Athānupubbena
atk-vin01a0:381_10: mātu nivesanaṭṭhānaṃ vedisanagaraṃ nāma sampatto. Asoko kira kumārakāle janapadaṃ
atk-vin01a0:381_11: labhitvā ujjeniṃ gacchanto vedisanagaraṃ patvā vedisaseṭṭhissa dhītaraṃ aggahesi.
atk-vin01a0:381_12: Sā taṃdivasameva gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā ujjeniyaṃ mahindakumāraṃ vijāyi. Kumārassa cuddasavassakāle
atk-vin01a0:381_13: rājā abhisekaṃ pāpuṇi. Sā tassa mātā tena samayena ñātighare vasati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:382_0: Sampattañca pana theraṃ disvā theramātā devī pādesu sirasā vanditvā bhikkhaṃ datvā
atk-vin01a0:382_1: theraṃ attanā kataṃ vedisagirimahāvihāraṃ nāma āropesi. Thero tasmiṃ vihāre nisinno
atk-vin01a0:382_2: cintesi – “amhākaṃ idha kattabbakiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ, samayo nu kho idāni laṅkādīpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:382_3: gantu”nti. Tato cintesi – “anubhavatu tāva me pitarā pesitaṃ abhisekaṃ devānaṃpiyatisso,
atk-vin01a0:382_4: ratanattayaguṇañca suṇātu, chaṇatthañca nagarato nikkhamitvā missakapabbataṃ abhiruhatu,
atk-vin01a0:382_5: tadā taṃ tattha dakkhissāmā”ti. Athāparaṃ ekamāsaṃ tattheva vāsaṃ kappesi. Māsātikkamena
atk-vin01a0:382_6: ca jeṭṭhamūlamāsapuṇṇamāyaṃ uposathadivase sannipatitā sabbepi – “kālo nu kho amhākaṃ
atk-vin01a0:382_7: tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gamanāya, udāhu no”ti mantayiṃsu. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-vin01a0:384: Iṭṭiyo uttiyo thero, bhaddasālo ca sambalo.
atk-vin01a0:388_0: Tadā sakko devānamindo mahindattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca – “kālaṅkato, bhante,
atk-vin01a0:388_1: muṭasivarājā; idāni devānaṃpiyatissamahārājā rajjaṃ kāreti. Sammāsambuddhena ca tumhe
atk-vin01a0:388_2: byākatā – ‘anāgate mahindo nāma bhikkhu tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pasādessatī’ti. Tasmātiha
atk-vin01a0:388_3: vo, bhante, kālo dīpavaraṃ gamanāya; ahampi vo sahāyo bhavissāmī”ti. Kasmā pana sakko
atk-vin01a0:388_4: evamāha? Bhagavā kirassa bodhimūleyeva buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ voloketvā anāgate imassa
atk-vin01a0:388_5: dīpassa sampattiṃ disvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi – “tadā tvampi sahāyo bhaveyyāsī”ti ca
atk-vin01a0:388_6: āṇāpesi. Tasmā evamāha. Thero tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā attasattamo veṭisakapabbatā
atk-vin01a0:388_7: vehāsaṃ uppatitvā anurādhapurassa puratthimadisāya missakapabbate patiṭṭhahi. Yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:395_0: Evaṃ iṭṭiyādīhi saddhiṃ āgantvā patiṭṭhahanto ca āyasmā mahindatthero sammāsambuddhassa
atk-vin01a0:395_1: parinibbānato dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ upari chattiṃsatime vasse imasmiṃ dīpe patiṭṭhahīti
atk-vin01a0:395_2: veditabbo. Ajātasattussa hi aṭṭhame vasse sammāsambuddho parinibbāyi. Tasmiṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:395_3: vasse sīhakumārassa putto tambapaṇṇidīpassa ādirājā vijayakumāro imaṃ dīpamāgantvā
atk-vin01a0:395_4: manussāvāsaṃ akāsi. Jambudīpe udayabhaddassa cuddasame vasse idha vijayo kālamakāsi.
atk-vin01a0:395_5: Udayabhaddassa pañcadasame vasse paṇḍuvāsudevo nāma imasmiṃ dīpe rajjaṃ pāpuṇi. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:395_6: nāgadāsakarañño vīsatime vasse idha paṇḍuvāsudevo kālamakāsi. Tasmiṃyeva ca vasse
atk-vin01a0:395_7: abhayo nāma rājakumāro imasmiṃ dīpe rajjaṃ pāpuṇi. Tattha susunāgarañño sattarasame
atk-vin01a0:395_8: vasse idha abhayarañño vīsativassāni paripūriṃsu. Atha abhayassa vīsatime vasse paṇḍukābhayo
atk-vin01a0:395_9: nāma dāmariko rajjaṃ aggahesi. Tattha kāḷāsokassa soḷasame vasse idha paṇḍukassa
atk-vin01a0:395_10: sattarasavassāni paripūriṃsu. Tāni heṭṭhā ekena vassena saha aṭṭhārasa honti. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:395_11: candaguttassa cuddasame vasse idha paṇḍukābhayo kālamakāsi. Muṭasivarājā rajjaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-vin01a0:395_12: Tattha asokadhammarājassa sattarasame vasse idha muṭasivarājā kālamakāsi. Devānampiyatisso
atk-vin01a0:395_13: rajjaṃ pāpuṇi. Parinibbute ca sammāsambuddhe ajātasattu catuvīsati vassāni rajjaṃ
atk-vin01a0:395_14: kāresi. Udayabhaddo soḷasa, anuruddho ca muṇḍo ca aṭṭha, nāgadāsako catuvīsati, susunāgo
atk-vin01a0:395_15: aṭṭhārasa, tasseva putto kāḷāsoko aṭṭhavīsati, tato tassa puttakā dasa bhātukarājāno
atk-vin01a0:395_16: dvevīsati vassāni rajjaṃ kāresuṃ. Tesaṃ pacchato nava nandā dvevīsatimeva, candagutto
atk-vin01a0:395_17: catuvīsati, bindusāro aṭṭhavīsati. Tassāvasāne asoko rajjaṃ pāpuṇi. Tassa pure abhisekā
atk-vin01a0:395_18: cattāri abhisekato aṭṭhārasame vasse imasmiṃ dīpe mahindatthero patiṭṭhito. Evametena
atk-vin01a0:395_20: upari chattiṃsatime vasse imasmiṃ dīpe patiṭṭhahī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:396_0: Tasmiñca divase tambapaṇṇidīpe jeṭṭhamūlanakkhattaṃ nāma hoti. Rājā nakkhattaṃ ghosāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:396_1: “chaṇaṃ karothā”ti amacce ca āṇāpetvā cattālīsapurisasahassaparivāro nagaramhā nikkhamitvā
atk-vin01a0:396_2: yena missakapabbato tena pāyāsi migavaṃ kīḷitukāmo. Atha tasmiṃ pabbate adhivatthā
atk-vin01a0:396_3: ekā devatā “rañño there dassessāmī”ti rohitamigarūpaṃ gahetvā avidūre tiṇapaṇṇāni
atk-vin01a0:396_4: khādamānā viya carati. Rājā taṃ disvā “ayuttaṃ dāni pamattaṃ vijjhitu”nti jiyaṃ phoṭesi.
atk-vin01a0:396_5: Migo ambatthalamaggaṃ gahetvā palāyituṃ ārabhi. Rājā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhanto
atk-vin01a0:396_6: ambatthalameva abhiruhi. Migopi therānaṃ avidūre antaradhāyi. Mahindatthero rājānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:396_7: avidūre āgacchantaṃ disvā “mamaṃyeva rājā passatu, mā itare”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā “tissa,
atk-vin01a0:396_8: tissa, ito ehī”ti āha. Rājā sutvā cintesi – “imasmiṃ dīpe jāto maṃ ‘tissā’ti nāmaṃ
atk-vin01a0:396_9: gahetvā ālapituṃ samattho nāma natthi. Ayaṃ pana chinnabhinnapaṭadharo bhaṇḍu kāsāvavasano
atk-vin01a0:396_10: maṃ nāmena ālapati, ko nu kho ayaṃ bhavissati manusso vā amanusso vā”ti? Thero āha –
atk-vin01a0:399_0: Tena ca samayena devānampiyatissamahārājā ca asokadhammarājā ca adiṭṭhasahāyakā honti.
atk-vin01a0:399_1: Devānampiyatissamahārājassa ca puññānubhāvena chātapabbatapāde ekamhi veḷugumbe tisso
atk-vin01a0:399_2: veḷuyaṭṭhiyo rathayaṭṭhippamāṇā uppajjiṃsu – ekā latāyaṭṭhi nāma, ekā pupphayaṭṭhi
atk-vin01a0:399_3: nāma, ekā sakuṇayaṭṭhi nāma. Tāsu latāyaṭṭhi rajatavaṇṇā hoti, taṃ alaṅkaritvā uppannalatā
atk-vin01a0:399_4: kañcanavaṇṇā khāyati. Pupphayaṭṭhiyaṃ pana nīlapītalohitodātakāḷavaṇṇāni pupphāni
atk-vin01a0:399_6: sakuṇā nānappakārāni ca catuppadāni sajīvāni viya khāyanti. Vuttampi cetaṃ dīpavaṃse –
atk-vin01a0:404_0: Samuddatopissa muttāmaṇiveḷuriyādi anekavihitaṃ ratanaṃ uppajji. Tambapaṇṇiyaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:404_1: aṭṭha muttā uppajjiṃsu – hayamuttā, gajamuttā, rathamuttā, āmalakamuttā, valayamuttā,
atk-vin01a0:404_2: aṅguliveṭhakamuttā, kakudhaphalamuttā, pākatikamuttāti. So tā ca yaṭṭhiyo tā ca muttā
atk-vin01a0:404_3: aññañca bahuṃ ratanaṃ asokassa dhammarañño paṇṇākāratthāya pesesi. Asoko pasīditvā
atk-vin01a0:404_4: tassa pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍāni pahiṇi – chattaṃ, cāmaraṃ, khaggaṃ, moḷiṃ, ratanapādukaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:404_5: aññañca abhisekatthāya bahuvidhaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ; seyyathidaṃ – saṅkhaṃ, gaṅgodakaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:404_6: vaḍḍhamānaṃ, vaṭaṃsakaṃ, bhiṅgāraṃ, nandiyāvaṭṭaṃ, sivikaṃ, kaññaṃ, kaṭacchuṃ, adhovimaṃ
atk-vin01a0:404_7: dussayugaṃ, hatthapuñchanaṃ, haricandanaṃ, aruṇavaṇṇamattikaṃ, añjanaṃ, harītakaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:414: Na kevalañcetaṃ āmisapaṇṇākāraṃ, imaṃ kira dhammapaṇṇākārampi pesesi –
atk-vin01a0:419: Svāyaṃ rājā taṃ divasaṃ asokaraññā pesitena abhisekena ekamāsābhisitto hoti.
atk-vin01a0:420_0: Visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ hissa abhisekamakaṃsu. So acirassutaṃ – taṃ sāsanappavattiṃ anussaramāno
atk-vin01a0:420_1: taṃ therassa “samaṇā mayaṃ mahārāja dhammarājassa sāvakā”ti vacanaṃ sutvā “ayyā nu
atk-vin01a0:420_2: kho āgatā”ti tāvadeva āvudhaṃ nikkhipitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathayamāno. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a0:423_0: Sammodanīyakathañca kurumāneyeva tasmiṃ tānipi cattālīsapurisasahassāni āgantvā samparivāresuṃ.
atk-vin01a0:423_1: Tadā thero itarepi cha jane dassesi. Rājā disvā “ime kadā āgatā”ti āha. “Mayā saddhiṃyeva,
atk-vin01a0:423_2: mahārājā”ti. “Idāni pana jambudīpe aññepi evarūpā samaṇā santī”ti? “Santi, mahārāja;
atk-vin01a0:426_0: “Bhante, kena āgatatthā”ti? “Neva, mahārāja, udakena na thalenā”ti. “Rājā ākāsena
atk-vin01a0:426_1: āgatā”ti aññāsi. Thero “atthi nu kho rañño paññāveyattiya”nti vīmaṃsanatthāya āsannaṃ
atk-vin01a0:426_2: ambarukkhaṃ ārabbha pañhaṃ pucchi – “kiṃ nāmo ayaṃ, mahārāja, rukkho”ti? “Ambarukkho
atk-vin01a0:426_3: nāma, bhante”ti. “Imaṃ pana, mahārāja, ambaṃ muñcitvā añño ambo atthi, natthī”ti?
atk-vin01a0:426_4: “Atthi, bhante, aññepi bahū ambarukkhā”ti. “Imañca ambaṃ te ca ambe muñcitvā atthi
atk-vin01a0:426_5: nu kho, mahārāja, aññe rukkhā”ti? “Atthi, bhante, te pana na ambarukkhā”ti. “Aññe
atk-vin01a0:426_6: ambe ca anambe ca muñcitvā atthi pana añño rukkho”ti? “Ayameva, bhante, ambarukkho”ti.
atk-vin01a0:426_7: “Sādhu, mahārāja, paṇḍitosi. Atthi pana te, mahārāja, ñātakā”ti? “Atthi, bhante,
atk-vin01a0:426_8: bahū janā”ti. “Te muñcitvā aññe keci aññātakāpi atthi, mahārājā”ti? “Aññātakā, bhante,
atk-vin01a0:426_9: ñātakehi bahutarā”ti. “Tava ñātake ca aññātake ca muñcitvā atthañño koci, mahārājā”ti?
atk-vin01a0:426_10: “Ahameva, aññātako”ti. Atha thero “paṇḍito rājā sakkhissati dhammaṃ aññātu”nti cūḷahatthipadopamasuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:426_11: kathesi. Kathāpariyosāne rājā tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhahi saddhiṃ cattālīsāya pāṇasahassehi.
atk-vin01a0:427_0: Taṃ khaṇaññeva ca rañño bhattaṃ āhariyittha. Rājā ca suttantaṃ suṇanto eva aññāsi
atk-vin01a0:427_1: – “na imesaṃ imasmiṃ kāle bhojanaṃ kappatī”ti. “Apucchitvā pana bhuñjituṃ ayutta”nti
atk-vin01a0:427_2: cintetvā “bhuñjissatha, bhante”ti pucchi. “Na, mahārāja, amhākaṃ imasmiṃ kāle bhojanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:427_3: kappatī”ti. “Kasmiṃ kāle, bhante, kappatī”ti? “Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhikasamayā,
atk-vin01a0:427_4: mahārājā”ti. “Gacchāma, bhante, nagara”nti? “Alaṃ, mahārāja, idheva vasissāmā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:427_5: “Sace, bhante, tumhe vasatha, ayaṃ dārako āgacchatū”ti. “Mahārāja, ayaṃ dārako āgataphalo
atk-vin01a0:427_6: viññātasāsano pabbajjāpekkho idāni pabbajissatī”ti. Rājā “tena hi, bhante, sve rathaṃ
atk-vin01a0:427_7: pesessāmi; taṃ abhiruhitvā āgaccheyyāthā”ti vatvā vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-vin01a0:428_0: Thero acirapakkantassa rañño sumanasāmaṇeraṃ āmantesi – “ehi tvaṃ, sumana, dhammasavanassa
atk-vin01a0:428_1: kālaṃ ghosehī”ti. “Bhante, kittakaṃ ṭhānaṃ sāvento ghosemī”ti? “Sakalaṃ tambapaṇṇidīpa”nti.
atk-vin01a0:428_2: “Sādhu, bhante”ti sāmaṇero abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-vin01a0:428_3: samāhitena cittena sakalaṃ tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ sāvento tikkhattuṃ dhammasavanassa kālaṃ
atk-vin01a0:428_4: ghosesi. Rājā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā therānaṃ santikaṃ pesesi – “kiṃ, bhante, atthi koci
atk-vin01a0:428_5: upaddavo”ti. “Natthamhākaṃ koci upaddavo, dhammasavanassa kālaṃ ghosāpayimha buddhavacanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:428_6: kathetukāmamhā”ti. Tañca pana sāmaṇerassa saddaṃ sutvā bhummā devatā saddamanussāvesuṃ.
atk-vin01a0:428_7: Etenupāyena yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi. Tena saddena mahā devatāsannipāto
atk-vin01a0:428_8: ahosi. Thero mahantaṃ devatāsannipātaṃ disvā samacittasuttantaṃ kathesi. Kathāpariyosāne
atk-vin01a0:428_9: asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ devatānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Bahū nāgā ca supaṇṇā ca saraṇesu
atk-vin01a0:428_10: patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Yādisova sāriputtattherassa imaṃ suttantaṃ kathayato devatāsannipāto
atk-vin01a0:428_11: ahosi, tādiso mahindattherassāpi jāto. Atha tassā rattiyā accayena rājā therānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:428_12: rathaṃ pesesi. Sārathī rathaṃ ekamante ṭhapetvā therānaṃ ārocesi – “āgato, bhante,
atk-vin01a0:428_13: ratho; abhiruhatha gacchissāmā”ti. Therā “na mayaṃ rathaṃ abhiruhāma; gaccha tvaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:428_14: pacchā mayaṃ āgacchissāmā”ti vatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā anurādhapurassa puratthimadisāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:428_15: paṭhamakacetiyaṭṭhāne otariṃsu. Tañhi cetiyaṃ therehi paṭhamaṃ otiṇṇaṭṭhāne katattāyeva
atk-vin01a0:429_0: Rājāpi sārathiṃ pesetvā “antonivesane maṇḍapaṃ paṭiyādethā”ti amacce āṇāpesi. Tāvadeva
atk-vin01a0:429_1: sabbe haṭṭhatuṭṭhā ativiya pāsādikaṃ maṇḍapaṃ paṭiyādesuṃ. Puna rājā cintesi – “hiyyo
atk-vin01a0:429_2: thero sīlakkhandhaṃ kathayamāno ‘uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ na kappatī’ti āha; ‘nisīdissanti
atk-vin01a0:429_3: nu kho ayyā āsanesu, na nisīdissantī”’ti? Tassevaṃ cintayantasseva so sārathi nagaradvāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:429_4: sampatto. Tato addasa there paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:429_5: pārupante. Disvā ativiya pasannacitto hutvā āgantvā rañño ārocesi – “āgatā, deva,
atk-vin01a0:429_6: therā”ti. Rājā “rathaṃ ārūḷhā”ti pucchi. “Na ārūḷhā, deva, api ca mama pacchato nikkhamitvā
atk-vin01a0:429_7: paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā pācīnadvāre ṭhitā”ti. Rājā “rathampi nābhirūhiṃsū”ti sutvā “na
atk-vin01a0:429_8: dāni ayyā uccāsayanamahāsayanaṃ sādiyissantī”ti cintetvā “tena hi, bhaṇe, therānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:429_9: bhūmattharaṇasaṅkhepena āsanāni paññapethā”ti vatvā paṭipathaṃ agamāsi. Amaccā pathaviyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:429_10: taṭṭikaṃ paññapetvā upari kojavakādīni cittattharaṇāni paññapesuṃ. Uppātapāṭhakā
atk-vin01a0:429_11: disvā “gahitā dāni imehi pathavī, ime tambapaṇṇidīpassa sāmikā bhavissantī”ti byākariṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:429_12: Rājāpi gantvā there vanditvā mahindattherassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā mahatiyā pūjāya
atk-vin01a0:429_13: ca sakkārena ca there nagaraṃ pavesetvā antonivesanaṃ pavesesi. Thero āsanapaññattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:429_14: disvā “amhākaṃ sāsanaṃ sakalalaṅkādīpe pathavī viya patthaṭaṃ niccalañca hutvā patiṭṭhahissatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:429_15: cintento nisīdi. Rājā there paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā
atk-vin01a0:429_16: sampavāretvā “anuḷādevīpamukhāni pañca itthisatāni therānaṃ abhivādanaṃ pūjāsakkārañca
atk-vin01a0:429_17: karontū”ti pakkosāpetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Thero bhattakiccāvasāne rañño saparijanassa
atk-vin01a0:429_18: dhammaratanavassaṃ vassento petavatthuṃ vimānavatthuṃ saccasaṃyuttañca kathesi. Taṃ
atk-vin01a0:429_19: therassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā tāni pañcapi itthisatāni sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchākaṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:430_0: Yepi te manussā purimadivase missakapabbate there addasaṃsu, te tesu tesu ṭhānesu
atk-vin01a0:430_1: therānaṃ guṇe kathenti. Tesaṃ sutvā mahājanakāyo rājaṅgaṇe sannipatitvā mahāsaddaṃ
atk-vin01a0:430_2: akāsi. Rājā “kiṃ eso saddo”ti pucchi. “Nāgarā, deva, ‘there daṭṭhuṃ na labhāmā’ti
atk-vin01a0:430_3: viravantī”ti. Rājā “sace idha pavisissanti, okāso na bhavissatī”ti cintetvā “gacchatha,
atk-vin01a0:430_4: bhaṇe, hatthisālaṃ paṭijaggitvā vālukaṃ ākiritvā pañcavaṇṇāni pupphāni vikiritvā
atk-vin01a0:430_5: celavitānaṃ bandhitvā maṅgalahatthiṭṭhāne therānaṃ āsanāni paññapethā”ti āha. Amaccā
atk-vin01a0:430_6: tathā akaṃsu. Thero tattha gantvā nisīditvā devadūtasuttantaṃ kathesi. Kathāpariyosāne
atk-vin01a0:430_7: pāṇasahassaṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Tato “hatthisālā atisambādhā”ti dakkhiṇadvāre
atk-vin01a0:430_8: nandanavanuyyāne āsanaṃ paññapesuṃ. Thero tattha nisīditvā āsīvisopamasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-vin01a0:431_0: Evaṃ āgatadivasato dutiyadivase aḍḍhateyyasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Therassa
atk-vin01a0:431_1: nandanavane āgatāgatāhi kulitthīhi kulasuṇhāhi kulakumārīhi saddhiṃ sammodamānasseva
atk-vin01a0:431_2: sāyanhasamayo jāto. Thero kālaṃ sallakkhetvā “gacchāma dāni missakapabbata”nti uṭṭhahi.
atk-vin01a0:431_3: Amaccā – “kattha, bhante, gacchathā”ti? “Amhākaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhāna”nti. Te rañño saṃviditaṃ
atk-vin01a0:431_4: katvā rājānumatena āhaṃsu – “akālo, bhante, idāni tattha gantuṃ; idameva nandanavanuyyānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:431_5: ayyānaṃ āvāsaṭṭhānaṃ hotū”ti. “Alaṃ, gacchāmā”ti. Puna rañño vacanenāhaṃsu – “rājā,
atk-vin01a0:431_6: bhante, āha – ‘etaṃ meghavanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ mama pitu santakaṃ nagarato nātidūraṃ
atk-vin01a0:431_7: nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ, ettha therā vāsaṃ kappentū”’ti. Vasiṃsu therā meghavane uyyāne.
atk-vin01a0:432_0: Rājāpi kho tassā rattiyā accayena therassa samīpaṃ gantvā sukhasayitabhāvaṃ pucchitvā
atk-vin01a0:432_1: “kappati, bhante, bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmo”ti pucchi. Thero “kappati, mahārājā”ti vatvā
atk-vin01a0:432_2: imaṃ suttaṃ āhari – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ārāma”nti. Rājā tuṭṭho suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:432_3: gahetvā therassa hatthe udakaṃ pātetvā mahāmeghavanuyyānaṃ adāsi. Saha udakapātena
atk-vin01a0:432_4: pathavī kampi. Ayaṃ mahāvihāre paṭhamo pathavīkampo ahosi. Rājā bhīto theraṃ pucchi
atk-vin01a0:432_5: – “kasmā, bhante, pathavī kampatī”ti? “Mā bhāyi, mahārāja, imasmiṃ dīpe dasabalassa
atk-vin01a0:432_6: sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhahissati; idañca paṭhamaṃ vihāraṭṭhānaṃ bhavissati, tassetaṃ pubbanimitta”nti.
atk-vin01a0:432_7: Rājā bhiyyosomattāya pasīdi. Thero punadivasepi rājageheyeva bhuñjitvā nandanavane
atk-vin01a0:432_8: anamataggiyāni kathesi. Punadivase aggikkhandhopamasuttaṃ kathesi. Etenevupāyena
atk-vin01a0:432_9: satta divasāni kathesi. Desanāpariyosāne aḍḍhanavamānaṃ pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo
atk-vin01a0:432_10: ahosi. Tato paṭṭhāya ca nandanavanaṃ sāsanassa jotipātubhāvaṭṭhānanti katvā “jotivana”nti
atk-vin01a0:432_11: nāmaṃ labhi. Sattame pana divase therā antepure rañño appamādasuttaṃ kathayitvā cetiyagirimeva agamaṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:433_0: Atha kho rājā amacce pucchi – “thero, amhe gāḷhena ovādena ovadati; gaccheyya nu
atk-vin01a0:433_1: kho”ti? Amaccā “tumhehi, deva, thero ayācito sayameva āgato; tasmā tassa anāpucchāva
atk-vin01a0:433_2: gamanampi bhaveyyā”ti āhaṃsu. Tato rājā rathaṃ abhiruhitvā dve ca deviyo āropetvā
atk-vin01a0:433_3: cetiyagiriṃ agamāsi mahañcarājānubhāvena. Gantvā deviyo ekamantaṃ apakkamāpetvā sayameva
atk-vin01a0:433_4: therānaṃ samīpaṃ upasaṅkamanto ativiya kilantarūpo hutvā upasaṅkami. Tato naṃ thero
atk-vin01a0:433_5: āha – “kasmā tvaṃ, mahārāja, evaṃ kilamamāno āgato”ti? “‘Tumhe mama gāḷhaṃ ovādaṃ
atk-vin01a0:433_6: datvā idāni gantukāmā nu kho’ti jānanatthaṃ, bhante”ti. “Na mayaṃ, mahārāja, gantukāmā;
atk-vin01a0:433_7: apica vassūpanāyikakālo nāmāyaṃ mahārāja, tatra samaṇena vassūpanāyikaṭṭhānaṃ ñātuṃ
atk-vin01a0:433_8: vaṭṭatī”ti. Taṃdivasameva ariṭṭho nāma amacco pañcapaṇṇāsāya jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātukehi
atk-vin01a0:433_9: saddhiṃ rañño samīpe ṭhito āha – “icchāmahaṃ, deva, therānaṃ santike pabbajitu”nti.
atk-vin01a0:433_10: “Sādhu, bhaṇe, pabbajassū”ti rājā anujānitvā theraṃ sampaṭicchāpesi. Thero tadaheva
atk-vin01a0:434_0: Rājāpi kho taṅkhaṇeyeva kaṇṭakena cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ parikkhipitvā dvāsaṭṭhiyā leṇesu kammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:434_1: paṭṭhapetvā nagarameva agamāsi. Tepi therā dasabhātikasamākulaṃ rājakulaṃ pasādetvā
atk-vin01a0:434_2: mahājanaṃ ovadamānā cetiyagirimhi vassaṃ vasiṃsu. Tadāpi cetiyagirimhi paṭhamaṃ vassaṃ
atk-vin01a0:434_3: upagatā dvāsaṭṭhi arahanto ahesuṃ. Athāyasmā mahāmahindo vutthavasso pavāretvā kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:434_4: uposathadivase rājānaṃ etadavoca – “mahārāja, amhehi ciradiṭṭho sammāsambuddho, anāthavāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:434_5: vasimha, icchāma mayaṃ jambudīpaṃ gantu”nti. Rājā āha – “ahaṃ, bhante, tumhe catūhi
atk-vin01a0:434_6: paccayehi upaṭṭhahāmi, ayañca mahājano tumhe nissāya tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhito, kasmā
atk-vin01a0:434_8: natthi, tenamha ukkaṇṭhitā”ti. “Nanu, bhante, tumhe avocuttha – ‘parinibbuto sammāsambuddho”’ti.
atk-vin01a0:434_9: “Kiñcāpi, mahārāja, parinibbuto; atha khvassa sarīradhātuyo tiṭṭhantī”ti. “Aññātaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:434_10: bhante, thūpapatiṭṭhānaṃ tumhe ākaṅkhathāti. Karomi, bhante, thūpaṃ, bhūmibhāgaṃ
atk-vin01a0:434_11: dāni vicinātha; apica, bhante, dhātuyo kuto lacchāmā”ti? “Sumanena saddhiṃ mantehi, mahārājā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:435_0: “Sādhu, bhante”ti rājā sumanaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi – “kuto dāni, bhante, dhātuyo
atk-vin01a0:435_1: lacchāmā”ti? Sumano āha – “appossukko tvaṃ, mahārāja, vīthiyo sodhāpetvā dhajapaṭākapuṇṇaghaṭādīhi
atk-vin01a0:435_2: alaṅkārāpetvā saparijano uposathaṃ samādiyitvā sabbatāḷāvacare upaṭṭhāpetvā maṅgalahatthiṃ
atk-vin01a0:435_3: sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ kārāpetvā upari cassa setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-vin01a0:435_4: mahānāgavanuyyānābhimukho yāhi. Addhā tasmiṃ ṭhāne dhātuyo lacchasī”ti. Rājā “sādhū”ti
atk-vin01a0:435_5: sampaṭicchi. Therā cetiyagirimeva agamaṃsu. Tatrāyasmā mahindatthero sumanasāmaṇeraṃ
atk-vin01a0:435_6: āha – “gaccha tvaṃ, sāmaṇera, jambudīpe tava ayyakaṃ asokaṃ dhammarājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-vin01a0:435_7: mama vacanena evaṃ vadehi – ‘sahāyo vo, mahārāja, devānampiyatisso buddhasāsane pasanno
atk-vin01a0:435_8: thūpaṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmo, tumhākaṃ kira hatthe dhātu atthi taṃ me dethā’ti. Taṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:435_9: sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadehi – ‘tumhākaṃ kira, mahārāja, hatthe dve
atk-vin01a0:435_10: dhātuyo atthi – dakkhiṇadāṭhā ca dakkhiṇakkhakañca; tato tumhe dakkhiṇadāṭhaṃ pūjetha,
atk-vin01a0:435_11: dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ pana mayhaṃ dethā’ti. Evañca naṃ vadehi – ‘kasmā tvaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a0:436_0: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho sumano therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tāvadeva pattacīvaramādāya
atk-vin01a0:436_1: vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pāṭaliputtadvāre oruyha rañño santikaṃ gantvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-vin01a0:436_2: Rājā tuṭṭho sāmaṇerassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā gandhehi ubbaṭṭetvā varamuttasadisānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:436_3: dhātūnaṃ pūretvā adāsi. So taṃ gahetvā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upasaṅkami. Sakko devarājā
atk-vin01a0:436_4: sāmaṇeraṃ disvāva “kiṃ, bhante sumana, āhiṇḍasī”ti āha. “Tvaṃ, mahārāja, amhe tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:436_5: pesetvā kasmā pamajjasī”ti? “Nappamajjāmi, bhante, vadehi – ‘kiṃ karomī”’ti? “Tumhākaṃ
atk-vin01a0:436_6: kira hatthe dve dhātuyo atthi – dakkhiṇadāṭhā ca dakkhiṇakkhakañca; tato tumhe dakkhiṇadāṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:436_7: pūjetha, dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ pana mayhaṃ dethā”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho sakko devānamindo
atk-vin01a0:436_8: yojanappamāṇaṃ maṇithūpaṃ ugghāṭetvā dakkhiṇakkhakadhātuṃ nīharitvā sumanassa adāsi.
atk-vin01a0:437_0: Atha kho mahindapamukhā sabbepi te mahānāgā asokadhammarājena dinnadhātuyo cetiyagirimhiyeva
atk-vin01a0:437_2: Rājāpi kho sumanena vuttappakāraṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ katvā hatthikkhandhavaragato sayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:437_3: maṅgalahatthimatthake setacchattaṃ dhārayamāno mahānāgavanaṃ sampāpuṇi. Athassa etadahosi
atk-vin01a0:437_4: – “sace ayaṃ sammāsambuddhassa dhātu, chattaṃ apanamatu, maṅgalahatthī jaṇṇukehi
atk-vin01a0:437_5: bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahatu, dhātucaṅkoṭakaṃ mayhaṃ matthake patiṭṭhātū”ti. Saha rañño
atk-vin01a0:437_6: cittuppādena chattaṃ apanami, hatthī jaṇṇukehi patiṭṭhahi, dhātucaṅkoṭakaṃ rañño
atk-vin01a0:437_7: matthake patiṭṭhahi. Rājā amateneva abhisittagatto viya paramena pītipāmojjena samannāgato
atk-vin01a0:437_8: hutvā pucchi – “dhātuṃ, bhante, kiṃ karomā”ti? “Hatthikumbhamhiyeva tāva, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a0:437_9: ṭhapehī”ti. Rājā dhātucaṅkoṭakaṃ gahetvā hatthikumbhe ṭhapesi. Pamudito nāgo koñcanādaṃ
atk-vin01a0:437_10: nadi. Mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā pokkharavassaṃ vassi. Udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahābhūmicālo
atk-vin01a0:437_11: ahosi. “Paccantepi nāma sammāsambuddhassa dhātu patiṭṭhahissatī”ti devamanussā pamodiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:440_0: Athassa so hatthināgo anekatāḷāvacaraparivārito ativiya uḷārena pūjāsakkārena sakkariyamāno
atk-vin01a0:440_1: pacchimadisābhimukhova hutvā, apasakkanto yāva nagarassa puratthimadvāraṃ tāva gantvā
atk-vin01a0:440_2: puratthimena dvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā sakalanāgarena uḷārāya pūjāya karīyamānāya
atk-vin01a0:440_3: dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā thūpārāmassa pacchimadisābhāge mahejavatthu nāma kira
atk-vin01a0:440_4: atthi, tattha gantvā puna thūpārāmābhimukhoyeva paṭinivatti. Tena ca samayena thūpārāme
atk-vin01a0:441_0: Atīte kira ayaṃ dīpo ojadīpo nāma ahosi, rājā abhayo nāma, nagaraṃ abhayapuraṃ nāma,
atk-vin01a0:441_1: cetiyapabbato devakūṭapabbato nāma, thūpārāmo paṭiyārāmo nāma. Tena kho pana samayena
atk-vin01a0:441_2: kakusandho bhagavā loke uppanno hoti. Tassa sāvako mahādevo nāma thero bhikkhusahassena
atk-vin01a0:441_3: saddhiṃ devakūṭe patiṭṭhāsi, mahindatthero viya cetiyapabbate. Tena kho pana samayena
atk-vin01a0:441_4: ojadīpe sattā pajjarakena anayabyasanaṃ āpajjanti. Addasā kho kakusandho bhagavā
atk-vin01a0:441_5: buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento te satte anayabyasanamāpajjante. Disvā cattālīsāya
atk-vin01a0:441_6: bhikkhusahassehi parivuto agamāsi. Tassānubhāvena tāvadeva pajjarako vūpasanto. Roge
atk-vin01a0:441_7: vūpasante bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi. Caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-vin01a0:441_8: Bhagavā dhamakaraṇaṃ datvā pakkāmi. Taṃ anto pakkhipitvā paṭiyārāme cetiyaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:442_0: Koṇāgamanassa pana bhagavato kāle ayaṃ dīpo varadīpo nāma ahosi, rājā sameṇḍī nāma,
atk-vin01a0:442_1: nagaraṃ vaḍḍhamānaṃ nāma, pabbato suvaṇṇakūṭo nāma. Tena kho pana samayena varadīpe
atk-vin01a0:442_2: dubbuṭṭhikā hoti dubbhikkhaṃ dussassaṃ. Sattā chātakarogena anayabyasanaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-vin01a0:442_3: Addasā kho koṇāgamano bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento te satte anayabyasanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:442_4: āpajjante. Disvā tiṃsabhikkhusahassaparivuto agamāsi. Buddhānubhāvena devo sammādhāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:442_5: anuppavecchi. Subhikkhaṃ ahosi. Bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi. Caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:442_6: dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Bhagavā bhikkhusahassaparivāraṃ mahāsumanaṃ nāma theraṃ dīpe
atk-vin01a0:442_7: ṭhapetvā kāyabandhanaṃ datvā pakkāmi. Taṃ anto pakkhipitvā cetiyaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:443_0: Kassapassa pana bhagavato kāle ayaṃ dīpo maṇḍadīpo nāma ahosi, rājā jayanto nāma,
atk-vin01a0:443_1: nagaraṃ visālaṃ nāma, pabbato subhakūṭo nāma. Tena kho pana samayena maṇḍadīpe mahāvivādo
atk-vin01a0:443_2: hoti. Bahū sattā kalahaviggahajātā anayabyasanaṃ āpajjanti. Addasā kho kassapo bhagavā
atk-vin01a0:443_3: buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento te satte anayabyasanaṃ āpajjante. Disvā vīsatibhikkhusahassaparivuto
atk-vin01a0:443_4: āgantvā vivādaṃ vūpasametvā dhammaṃ desesi. Caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo
atk-vin01a0:443_5: ahosi. Bhagavā bhikkhusahassaparivāraṃ sabbanandaṃ nāma theraṃ dīpe patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:443_6: udakasāṭakaṃ datvā pakkāmi. Taṃ anto pakkhipitvā cetiyaṃ akaṃsu. Evaṃ thūpārāme purimakānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:443_7: tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ cetiyāni patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Tāni sāsanantaradhānena nassanti, ṭhānamattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:443_8: avasissati. Tasmā vuttaṃ – “tena ca samayena thūpārāme purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:443_9: paribhogacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ hotī”ti. Tadetaṃ vinaṭṭhesu cetiyesu devatānubhāvena kaṇṭakasamākiṇṇasākhehi
atk-vin01a0:443_10: nānāgacchehi parivutaṃ tiṭṭhati – “mā naṃ koci ucchiṭṭhāsucimalakacavarehi padūsesī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:444_0: Atha khvassa hatthino purato purato gantvā rājapurisā sabbagacche chinditvā bhūmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:444_1: sodhetvā taṃ hatthatalasadisaṃ akaṃsu. Hatthināgo gantvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ purato katvā
atk-vin01a0:444_2: tassa pacchimadisābhāge bodhirukkhaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. Athassa matthakato dhātuṃ oropetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:444_3: ārabhiṃsu. Nāgo oropetuṃ na deti. Rājā theraṃ pucchi – “kasmā, bhante, nāgo dhātuṃ
atk-vin01a0:444_4: oropetuṃ na detī”ti? “Ārūḷhaṃ, mahārāja, oropetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti. Tasmiñca kāle abhayavāpiyā
atk-vin01a0:444_5: udakaṃ chinnaṃ hoti. Samantā bhūmi phalitā hoti, suuddharā mattikāpiṇḍā. Tato mahājano
atk-vin01a0:444_6: sīghaṃ sīghaṃ mattikaṃ āharitvā hatthikumbhappamāṇaṃ vatthumakāsi. Tāvadeva ca thūpakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:444_7: iṭṭhakā kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu. Na yāva iṭṭhakā pariniṭṭhanti tāva hatthināgo katipāhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:444_8: divā bodhirukkhaṭṭhāne hatthisālāyaṃ tiṭṭhati, rattiṃ thūpapatiṭṭhānabhūmiṃ pariyāyati.
atk-vin01a0:444_9: Atha vatthuṃ cināpetvā rājā theraṃ pucchi – “kīdiso, bhante, thūpo kātabbo”ti? “Vīhirāsisadiso, mahārājā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:445_0: “Sādhu, bhante”ti rājā jaṅghappamāṇaṃ thūpaṃ cināpetvā dhātuoropanatthāya mahāsakkāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:445_1: kāresi. Sakalanagarañca janapado ca dhātumahadassanatthaṃ sannipati. Sannipatite
atk-vin01a0:445_2: ca pana tasmiṃ mahājanakāye dasabalassa dhātu hatthikumbhato sattatālappamāṇaṃ vehāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:445_3: abbhuggantvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi. Tehi tehi dhātuppadesehi channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:445_4: udakadhārā ca aggikkhandhā ca pavattanti, sāvatthiyaṃ kaṇḍambamūle bhagavatā dassitapāṭihāriyasadisameva
atk-vin01a0:445_5: pāṭihāriyaṃ ahosi. Tañca kho neva therānubhāvena, na devatānubhāvena; apica kho buddhānubhāveneva.
atk-vin01a0:445_6: Bhagavā kira dharamānova adhiṭṭhāsi – “mayi parinibbute tambapaṇṇidīpe anurādhapurassa
atk-vin01a0:445_7: dakkhiṇadisābhāge purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ paribhogacetiyaṭṭhāne mama dakkhiṇakkhakadhātu
atk-vin01a0:448_0: Sammāsambuddho kira imaṃ dīpaṃ dharamānakālepi tikkhattuṃ āgamāsi. Paṭhamaṃ – yakkhadamanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:448_1: ekakova āgantvā yakkhe dametvā “mayi parinibbute imasmiṃ dīpe sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhahissatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:448_2: tambapaṇṇidīpe rakkhaṃ karonto tikkhattuṃ dīpaṃ āvijji. Dutiyaṃ – mātulabhāgineyyānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:448_3: nāgarājūnaṃ damanatthāya ekakova āgantvā te dametvā agamāsi. Tatiyaṃ – pañcabhikkhusataparivāro
atk-vin01a0:448_4: āgantvā mahācetiyaṭṭhāne ca thūpārāmacetiyaṭṭhāne ca mahābodhipatiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne ca
atk-vin01a0:448_5: mahiyaṅgaṇacetiyaṭṭhāne ca mutiyaṅgaṇacetiyaṭṭhāne ca dīghavāpicetiyaṭṭhāne ca kalyāṇiyacetiyaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a0:448_6: ca nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Idamassa catutthaṃ dhātusarīrena āgamanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:449_0: Dhātusarīrato ca panassa nikkhantaudakaphusitehi sakalatambapaṇṇitale na koci aphuṭṭhokāso
atk-vin01a0:449_1: nāma ahosi. Evamassa taṃ dhātusarīraṃ udakaphusitehi tambapaṇṇitalassa pariḷāhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:449_2: vūpasametvā mahājanassa pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā otaritvā rañño matthake patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a0:449_3: Rājā saphalaṃ manussapaṭilābhaṃ maññamāno mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ karitvā dhātuṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-vin01a0:449_4: Saha dhātupatiṭṭhāpanena mahābhūmicālo ahosi. Tasmiñca pana dhātupāṭihāriye cittaṃ
atk-vin01a0:449_5: pasādetvā rañño bhātā abhayo nāma rājakumāro purisasahassena saddhiṃ pabbaji. Cetaraṭṭhagāmato
atk-vin01a0:449_6: pañca dārakasatāni pabbajiṃsu, tathā dvāramaṇḍalādīhi gāmakehi nikkhamitvā pañcapañca
atk-vin01a0:449_7: dārakasatāni sabbānipi antonagarato ca bahinagarato ca pabbajitāni tiṃsabhikkhusahassāni
atk-vin01a0:449_8: ahesuṃ. Niṭṭhite pana thūpasmiṃ rājā ca rājabhātikā ca deviyo ca devanāgayakkhānampi
atk-vin01a0:449_9: vimhayakaraṃ paccekaṃ paccekaṃ pūjaṃ akaṃsu. Niṭṭhitāya pana dhātupūjāya patiṭṭhite
atk-vin01a0:449_10: dhātuvare mahindatthero meghavanuyyānameva gantvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-vin01a0:450_0: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye anuḷā devī pabbajitukāmā hutvā rañño ārocesi. Rājā tassā vacanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:450_1: sutvā theraṃ etadavoca – “anuḷā, bhante, devī pabbajitukāmā, pabbājetha na”nti. “Na,
atk-vin01a0:450_2: mahārāja, amhākaṃ mātugāmaṃ pabbājetuṃ kappati. Pāṭaliputte pana mayhaṃ bhaginī saṅghamittattherī
atk-vin01a0:450_3: nāma atthi, taṃ pakkosāpehi. Imasmiñca pana, mahārāja, dīpe purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:450_4: bodhi patiṭṭhāsi. Amhākampi bhagavato sarasaraṃsijālavissajjanakena bodhinā idha
atk-vin01a0:450_5: patiṭṭhātabbaṃ, tasmā tathā sāsanaṃ pahiṇeyyāsi yathā saṅghamittā bodhiṃ gahetvā āgaccheyyā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:451_0: “Sādhu, bhante”ti rājā therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā amaccehi saddhiṃ mantento
atk-vin01a0:451_1: ariṭṭhaṃ nāma attano bhāgineyyaṃ āha – “sakkhissasi tvaṃ, tāta, pāṭaliputtaṃ gantvā
atk-vin01a0:451_2: mahābodhinā saddhiṃ ayyaṃ saṅghamittattheriṃ ānetu”nti? “Sakkhissāmi, deva, sace
atk-vin01a0:451_3: me pabbajjaṃ anujānissasī”ti. “Gaccha, tāta, theriṃ ānetvā pabbajāhī”ti. So rañño
atk-vin01a0:451_4: ca therassa ca sāsanaṃ gahetvā therassa adhiṭṭhānavasena ekadivaseneva jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:451_5: gantvā nāvaṃ abhiruhitvā samuddaṃ atikkamitvā pāṭaliputtameva agamāsi. Anuḷāpi kho
atk-vin01a0:451_6: devī pañcahi kaññāsatehi pañcahi ca antepurikāsatehi saddhiṃ dasa sīlāni samādiyitvā
atk-vin01a0:451_7: kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā nagarassa ekadese upassayaṃ kārāpetvā nivāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-vin01a0:451_8: Ariṭṭhopi taṃdivasameva rañño sāsanaṃ appesi, evañca avoca – “putto te, deva, mahindatthero
atk-vin01a0:451_9: evamāha – ‘sahāyakassa kira te devānampiyatissassa rañño bhātu jāyā anuḷā nāma devī
atk-vin01a0:451_10: pabbajitukāmā, taṃ pabbājetuṃ ayyaṃ saṅghamittattheriṃ pahiṇatha, ayyāyeva ca saddhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:451_11: mahābodhi”’nti. Therassa sāsanaṃ ārocetvā saṅghamittattheriṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha
atk-vin01a0:451_12: – “ayye, tumhākaṃ bhātā mahindatthero maṃ tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pesesi, devānampiyatissassa
atk-vin01a0:451_13: rañño bhātu jāyā anuḷā nāma devī pañcahi kaññāsatehi, pañcahi ca antepurikāsatehi
atk-vin01a0:451_14: saddhiṃ pabbajitukāmā, taṃ kira āgantvā pabbājethā”ti. Sā tāvadeva turitaturitā rañño
atk-vin01a0:451_15: santikaṃ gantvā evamāha – “mahārāja, mayhaṃ bhātā mahindatthero evaṃ pahiṇi, ‘rañño
atk-vin01a0:451_16: kira bhātu jāyā anuḷā nāma devī pañcahi kaññāsatehi pañcahi ca antepurikāsatehi saddhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:451_17: pabbajitukāmā mayhaṃ āgamanaṃ udikkhati’. Gacchāmahaṃ, mahārāja, tambapaṇṇidīpa”nti.
atk-vin01a0:452_0: Rājā āha – “amma, puttopi me mahindatthero nattā ca me sumanasāmaṇero maṃ chinnahatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:452_1: viya karontā tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ gatā. Tassa mayhaṃ tepi apassantassa uppanno soko tava
atk-vin01a0:452_2: mukhaṃ passantassa vūpasammati! Alaṃ, amma, mā tvaṃ agamāsī”ti. “Bhāriyaṃ me, mahārāja,
atk-vin01a0:452_3: bhātu vacanaṃ; anuḷāpi khattiyā itthisahassaparivutā pabbajjāpurekkhārā maṃ paṭimāneti;
atk-vin01a0:452_4: gacchāmahaṃ, mahārājā”ti. “Tena hi, amma, mahābodhiṃ gahetvā gacchāhī”ti. Kuto rañño
atk-vin01a0:452_5: mahābodhi? Rājā kira tato pubbe eva dhātuggahaṇatthāya anāgate sumane laṅkādīpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:452_6: mahābodhiṃ pesetukāmo, “kathaṃ nu kho asatthaghātārahaṃ mahābodhiṃ pesessāmī”ti upāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:452_7: apassanto mahādevaṃ nāma amaccaṃ pucchi. So āha – “santi, deva, bahū paṇḍitā bhikkhū”ti.
atk-vin01a0:452_8: Taṃ sutvā rājā bhikkhusaṅghassa bhattaṃ paṭiyādetvā bhattakiccāvasāne saṅghaṃ pucchi
atk-vin01a0:452_9: – “gantabbaṃ nu kho, bhante, bhagavato mahābodhinā laṅkādīpaṃ no”ti? Saṅgho moggaliputtatissattherassa bhāraṃ akāsi.
atk-vin01a0:453_0: Thero “gantabbaṃ, mahārāja, mahābodhinā laṅkādīpa”nti vatvā bhagavato pañca mahāadhiṭṭhānāni
atk-vin01a0:453_1: kathesi. Katamāni pañca? Bhagavā kira mahāparinibbānamañce nipanno laṅkādīpe mahābodhipatiṭṭhāpanatthāya
atk-vin01a0:453_2: “asokamahārājā mahābodhiggahaṇatthaṃ gamissati, tadā mahābodhissa dakkhiṇasākhā sayameva
atk-vin01a0:454: Tattha patiṭṭhānakāle ca “mahābodhi himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhātū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi – idaṃ dutiyamadhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:455: “Sattame divase himavalāhakagabbhato oruyha suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahanto pattehi ca phalehi ca chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo muñcatū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi – idaṃ tatiyamadhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:456: “Thūpārāme dakkhiṇakkhakadhātu cetiyamhi patiṭṭhānadivase yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi – idaṃ catutthaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:457: Laṅkādīpamhiyeva me doṇamattā dhātuyo mahācetiyamhi patiṭṭhānakāle buddhavesaṃ gahetvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karontū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi – idaṃ pañcamaṃ adhiṭṭhānanti.
atk-vin01a0:458_0: Rājā imāni pañca mahāadhiṭṭhānāni sutvā pasannacitto pāṭaliputtato yāva mahābodhi
atk-vin01a0:458_1: tāva maggaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā suvaṇṇakaṭāhatthāya bahuṃ suvaṇṇaṃ nīharāpesi. Tāvadeva
atk-vin01a0:458_2: ca rañño cittaṃ ñatvā vissakammadevaputto kammāravaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā purato aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a0:458_3: Rājā taṃ disvā “tāta, imaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā kaṭāhaṃ karohī”ti āha. “Pamāṇaṃ, deva,
atk-vin01a0:458_4: jānāthā”ti? “Tvameva, tāta, ñatvā karohī”ti. “Sādhu, deva, karissāmī”ti suvaṇṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:458_5: gahetvā attano ānubhāvena hatthena parimajjitvā suvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ nimmini navahatthaparikkhepaṃ
atk-vin01a0:458_7: Atha rājā sattayojanāyāmāya tiyojanavitthārāya mahatiyā senāya pāṭaliputtato nikkhamitvā
atk-vin01a0:458_8: ariyasaṅghamādāya mahābodhisamīpaṃ agamāsi. Senā samussitadhajapaṭākaṃ nānāratanavicittaṃ
atk-vin01a0:458_10: parikkhipi. Rājā sahassamatte gaṇapāmokkhe mahāthere gahetvā sakalajambudīpe pattābhisekānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:458_11: rājūnaṃ sahassena attānañca mahābodhiñca parivārāpetvā mahābodhimūle ṭhatvā mahābodhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:459_0: Rājā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā uppannapītipāmojjo “ahaṃ, bhante, imaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā
atk-vin01a0:459_1: tuṭṭho mahābodhiṃ sakalajambudīparajjena pūjemī”ti bhikkhusaṅghassa vatvā abhisekaṃ
atk-vin01a0:459_2: adāsi. Tato pupphagandhādīhi pūjetvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu
atk-vin01a0:459_3: vanditvā uṭṭhāya añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhatvā saccavacanakiriyāya bodhiṃ gaṇhitukāmo bhūmito
atk-vin01a0:459_4: yāva mahābodhissa dakkhiṇasākhā tāva uccaṃ katvā ṭhapitassa sabbaratanamayapīṭhassa
atk-vin01a0:459_5: upari suvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ ṭhapāpetvā ratanapīṭhaṃ āruyha suvaṇṇatulikaṃ gahetvā manosilāya
atk-vin01a0:459_6: lekhaṃ katvā “yadi mahābodhinā laṅkādīpe patiṭṭhātabbaṃ, yadi cāhaṃ buddhasāsane
atk-vin01a0:459_7: nibbematiko bhaveyyaṃ, mahābodhi sayameva imasmiṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe oruyha patiṭṭhātū”ti
atk-vin01a0:459_8: saccavacanakiriyamakāsi. Saha saccakiriyāya bodhisākhā manosilāya paricchinnaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a0:459_9: chijjitvā gandhakalalapūrassa suvaṇṇakaṭāhassa upari aṭṭhāsi. Tassa ubbedhena dasahattho
atk-vin01a0:459_10: khandho hoti catuhatthā pañca mahāsākhā pañcahiyeva phalehi paṭimaṇḍitā, khuddakasākhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:459_11: pana sahassaṃ. Atha rājā mūlalekhāya upari tivaṅgulappadese aññaṃ lekhaṃ paricchindi.
atk-vin01a0:459_12: Tato tāvadeva pupphuḷakā hutvā dasa mahāmūlāni nikkhamiṃsu. Puna uparūpari tivaṅgule
atk-vin01a0:459_13: tivaṅgule aññā nava lekhā paricchindi. Tāhipi dasa dasa pupphuḷakā hutvā navuti mūlāni
atk-vin01a0:459_14: nikkhamiṃsu. Paṭhamakā dasa mahāmūlā caturaṅgulamattaṃ nikkhantā. Itarepi gavakkhajālasadisaṃ
atk-vin01a0:459_15: anusibbantā nikkhantā. Ettakaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ rājā ratanapīṭhamatthake ṭhitoyeva disvā
atk-vin01a0:459_16: añjaliṃ paggayha mahānādaṃ nadi. Anekāni bhikkhusahassāni sādhukāramakaṃsu. Sakalarājasenā
atk-vin01a0:459_17: unnādinī ahosi. Celukkhepasatasahassāni pavattayiṃsu. Bhūmaṭṭhakadeve ādiṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:459_18: yāva brahmakāyikā devā tāva sādhukāraṃ pavattayiṃsu. Rañño imaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ passantassa
atk-vin01a0:459_19: pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭasarīrassa añjaliṃ paggahetvā ṭhitasseva mahābodhi mūlasatena
atk-vin01a0:459_20: suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhāsi. Dasa mahāmūlāni suvaṇṇakaṭāhatalaṃ āhacca aṭṭhaṃsu. Avasesāni
atk-vin01a0:459_21: navuti khuddakamūlāni anupubbena vaḍḍhanakāni hutvā gandhakalale oruyha ṭhitāni.
atk-vin01a0:460_0: Evaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitamatte mahābodhimhi mahāpathavī cali. Ākāse devadundubhiyo
atk-vin01a0:460_1: phaliṃsu. Pabbatānaṃ naccehi devānaṃ sādhukārehi yakkhānaṃ hiṅkārehi asurānaṃ thutijappehi
atk-vin01a0:460_2: brahmānaṃ apphoṭanehi meghānaṃ gajjitehi catuppadānaṃ ravehi pakkhīnaṃ rutehi sabbatāḷāvacarānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:460_3: sakasakapaṭibhānehi pathavītalato yāva brahmalokā tāva ekakolāhalaṃ ekaninnādaṃ ahosi.
atk-vin01a0:460_4: Pañcasu sākhāsu phalato phalato chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo nikkhamitvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ratanagopānasīvinaddhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:460_5: viya kurumānā yāva brahmalokā abbhuggacchiṃsu. Taṃ khaṇato ca pana pabhuti satta
atk-vin01a0:460_6: divasāni mahābodhi himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi. Na koci mahābodhiṃ passati.
atk-vin01a0:460_7: Rājā ratanapīṭhato oruyha satta divasāni mahābodhipūjaṃ kāresi. Sattame divase sabbadisāhi
atk-vin01a0:460_8: himā ca chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo ca āvattitvā mahābodhimeva pavisiṃsu. Vigatahimavalāhake
atk-vin01a0:460_10: suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitova paññāyittha. Rājā mahābodhiṃ disvā tehi pāṭihāriyehi sañjātapītipāmojjo
atk-vin01a0:460_11: “sakalajambudīparajjena taruṇamahābodhiṃ pūjessāmī”ti abhisekaṃ datvā satta divasāni
atk-vin01a0:461_0: Mahābodhi pubbakattikapavāraṇādivase sāyanhasamaye paṭhamaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahi.
atk-vin01a0:461_1: Tato himagabbhasattāhaṃ abhisekasattāhañca vītināmetvā kāḷapakkhassa uposathadivase
atk-vin01a0:461_2: rājā ekadivaseneva pāṭaliputtaṃ pavisitvā kattikajuṇhapakkhassa pāṭipadadivase mahābodhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:461_3: pācīnamahāsālamūle ṭhapesi. Suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitadivasato sattarasame divase mahābodhissa
atk-vin01a0:461_4: abhinavaṅkurā pāturahesuṃ. Te disvāpi pasanno rājā puna mahābodhiṃ rajjena pūjento
atk-vin01a0:461_6: gato mahābodhissa kattikachaṇapūjaṃ addasa. Evaṃ mahābodhimaṇḍato ānetvā pāṭaliputte
atk-vin01a0:461_7: ṭhapitaṃ mahābodhiṃ sandhāya āha – “tena hi, amma, mahābodhiṃ gahetvā gacchāhī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:462_0: Rājā mahābodhirakkhaṇatthāya aṭṭhārasa devatākulāni, aṭṭha amaccakulāni, aṭṭha brāhmaṇakulāni,
atk-vin01a0:462_1: aṭṭha kuṭumbiyakulāni, aṭṭha gopakakulāni, aṭṭha taracchakulāni, aṭṭha ca kāliṅgakulāni
atk-vin01a0:462_2: datvā udakasiñcanatthāya ca aṭṭha suvaṇṇaghaṭe, aṭṭha ca rajataghaṭe datvā iminā
atk-vin01a0:462_3: parivārena mahābodhiṃ gaṅgāya nāvaṃ āropetvā sayampi nagarato nikkhamitvā vijjhāṭaviṃ
atk-vin01a0:462_4: samatikkamma anupubbena sattahi divasehi tāmalittiṃ anuppatto. Antarāmagge devanāgamanussā
atk-vin01a0:462_5: uḷāraṃ mahābodhipūjaṃ akaṃsu. Rājāpi samuddatīre satta divasāni mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-vin01a0:462_6: sakalajambudīpamahārajjaṃ adāsi. Idamassa tatiyaṃ jambudīparajjasampadānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:463_0: Evaṃ mahārajjena pūjetvā māgasiramāsassa paṭhamapāṭipadadivase asoko dhammarājā mahābodhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:463_1: ukkhipitvā galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ oruyha nāvāyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā saṅghamittattherimpi
atk-vin01a0:463_2: saparivāraṃ nāvaṃ āropetvā ariṭṭhaṃ amaccaṃ etadavoca – “ahaṃ, tāta, mahābodhiṃ tikkhattuṃ
atk-vin01a0:463_3: sakalajambudīparajjena pūjetvā galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ oruyha mama sahāyakassa pesesiṃ,
atk-vin01a0:463_4: sopi evameva mahābodhiṃ pūjetū”ti. Evaṃ sahāyakassa sāsanaṃ datvā “gacchati vatare,
atk-vin01a0:463_5: dasabalassa sarasaraṃsijālaṃ vimuñcanto mahābodhirukkho”ti vanditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā
atk-vin01a0:463_6: assūni pavattayamāno aṭṭhāsi. Sāpi kho mahābodhisamārūḷhā nāvā passato passato mahārājassa
atk-vin01a0:463_7: mahāsamuddatalaṃ pakkhantā. Mahāsamuddepi samantā yojanaṃ vīciyo vūpasantā; pañca
atk-vin01a0:463_8: vaṇṇāni padumāni pupphitāni; antalikkhe dibbāni tūriyāni pavajjiṃsu; ākāse jalajathalajarukkhādisannissitāhi
atk-vin01a0:463_9: devatāhi pavattitā ativiya uḷārā pūjā ahosi. Saṅghamittattherīpi supaṇṇarūpena mahāsamudde
atk-vin01a0:463_10: nāgakulāni santāsesi. Te ca utrastarūpā nāgā āgantvā taṃ vibhūtiṃ passitvā theriṃ
atk-vin01a0:463_11: yācitvā mahābodhiṃ nāgabhavanaṃ atiharitvā satta divasāni nāgarajjena pūjetvā puna
atk-vin01a0:463_12: nāvāyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ. Taṃdivasameva nāvā jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ agamāsi. Asokamahārājāpi
atk-vin01a0:463_13: mahābodhiviyogadukkhito kanditvā roditvā yāva dassanavisayaṃ oloketvā paṭinivatti.
atk-vin01a0:464_0: Devānampiyatisso mahārājāpi kho sumanasāmaṇerassa vacanena māgasiramāsassa paṭhamapāṭipadadivasato
atk-vin01a0:464_1: pabhuti uttaradvārato paṭṭhāya yāva jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ tāva maggaṃ sodhāpetvā alaṅkārāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:464_2: nagarato nikkhamanadivase uttaradvārasamīpe samuddasālavatthusmiṃ ṭhitoyeva tāya
atk-vin01a0:464_3: vibhūtiyā mahāsamudde āgacchantaṃyeva mahābodhiṃ therassa ānubhāvena disvā tuṭṭhamānaso
atk-vin01a0:464_4: nikkhamitvā sabbaṃ maggaṃ pañcavaṇṇehi pupphehi okirāpento antarantare pupphaagghiyāni
atk-vin01a0:464_5: ṭhapento ekāheneva jambukolapaṭṭanaṃ gantvā sabbatāḷāvacaraparivuto pupphadhūmagandhavāsādīhi
atk-vin01a0:464_6: pūjayamāno galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ oruyha “āgato vatare, dasabalassa sarasaraṃsijālavissajjanako
atk-vin01a0:464_7: mahābodhirukkho”ti pasannacitto mahābodhiṃ ukkhipitvā uttamaṅge sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:464_8: mahābodhiṃ parivāretvā āgatehi soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi saddhiṃ samuddato paccuttaritvā
atk-vin01a0:464_9: samuddatīre mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā tīṇi divasāni sakalatambapaṇṇidīparajjena pūjesi,
atk-vin01a0:464_10: soḷasannaṃ jātisampannakulānaṃ rajjaṃ vicāresi. Atha catutthe divase mahābodhiṃ ādāya
atk-vin01a0:464_11: uḷāraṃ pūjaṃ kurumāno anupubbena anurādhapuraṃ sampatto. Anurādhapurepi mahāsakkāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:464_12: katvā cātuddasīdivase vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya mahābodhiṃ uttaradvārena pavesetvā nagaramajjhena
atk-vin01a0:464_13: atiharanto dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā dakkhiṇadvārato pañcadhanusatike ṭhāne yattha
atk-vin01a0:464_14: amhākaṃ sammāsambuddho nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi, purimakā ca tayo sammāsambuddhā
atk-vin01a0:464_15: samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdiṃsu, yattha kakusandhassa bhagavato mahāsirīsabodhi, konāgamanassa
atk-vin01a0:464_16: bhagavato udumbarabodhi, kassapasammāsambuddhassa ca nigrodhabodhi patiṭṭhāsi, tasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:464_17: mahāmeghavanuyyānassa tilakabhūte sumanasāmaṇerassa vacanena paṭhamameva katabhūmiparikamme
atk-vin01a0:465_0: Kathaṃ? Tāni kira bodhiṃ parivāretvā āgatāni soḷasa jātisampannakulāni rājavesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:465_1: gaṇhiṃsu. Rājā dovārikavesaṃ gaṇhi. Soḷasa kulāni mahābodhiṃ gahetvā oropayiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:465_2: Mahābodhi tesaṃ hatthato muttasamanantarameva asītihatthappamāṇaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-vin01a0:465_3: chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo muñci. Raṃsiyo sakaladīpaṃ pattharitvā upari brahmalokaṃ āhacca
atk-vin01a0:465_4: aṭṭhaṃsu. Mahābodhipāṭihāriyaṃ disvā sañjātappasādāni dasapurisasahassāni anupubbavipassanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:465_5: paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā pabbajiṃsu. Yāva sūriyatthaṅgamā mahābodhi antalikkhe
atk-vin01a0:465_6: aṭṭhāsi. Atthaṅgamite pana sūriye rohiṇinakkhattena pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi. Saha bodhipatiṭṭhānā
atk-vin01a0:465_7: udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī akampi. Patiṭṭhahitvā ca pana mahābodhi satta divasāni
atk-vin01a0:465_8: himagabbhe sannisīdi. Lokassa adassanaṃ agamāsi. Sattame divase vigatavalāhakaṃ nabhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:465_9: ahosi. Chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo jalantā vipphurantā nicchariṃsu. Mahābodhissa khandho ca
atk-vin01a0:465_10: sākhāyo ca pattāni ca pañca phalāni ca dassiṃsu. Mahindatthero ca saṅghamittattherī
atk-vin01a0:465_11: ca rājā ca saparivārā mahābodhiṭṭhānameva agamaṃsu. Yebhuyyena ca sabbe dīpavāsino
atk-vin01a0:465_12: sannipatiṃsu. Tesaṃ passantānaṃyeva uttarasākhato ekaṃ phalaṃ paccitvā sākhato mucci.
atk-vin01a0:465_13: Thero hatthaṃ upanāmesi. Phalaṃ therassa hatthe patiṭṭhāsi. Taṃ thero “ropaya, mahārājā”ti
atk-vin01a0:465_14: rañño adāsi. Rājā gahetvā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe madhurapaṃsuṃ ākiritvā gandhakalalaṃ pūretvā
atk-vin01a0:465_15: ropetvā mahābodhiāsannaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sabbesaṃ passantānaṃyeva catuhatthappamāṇā
atk-vin01a0:465_16: aṭṭha taruṇabodhirukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Rājā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā aṭṭha taruṇabodhirukkhe
atk-vin01a0:465_17: setacchattena pūjetvā abhisekaṃ adāsi. Tato ekaṃ bodhirukkhaṃ āgamanakāle mahābodhinā
atk-vin01a0:465_18: paṭhamapatiṭṭhitokāse jambukolapaṭṭane ropayiṃsu, ekaṃ tavakkabrāhmaṇassa gāmadvāre,
atk-vin01a0:465_19: ekaṃ thūpārāme, ekaṃ issaranimmānavihāre, ekaṃ paṭhamacetiyaṭṭhāne, ekaṃ cetiyapabbate,
atk-vin01a0:465_20: ekaṃ rohaṇajanapadamhi kājaragāme, ekaṃ rohaṇajanapadamhiyeva candanagāme. Itaresaṃ
atk-vin01a0:465_21: catunnaṃ phalānaṃ bījehi jāte dvattiṃsa bodhitaruṇe yojaniyaārāmesu patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-vin01a0:466_0: Evaṃ puttanattuparamparāya samantā dīpavāsīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya patiṭṭhite dasabalassa
atk-vin01a0:466_1: dhammadhajabhūte mahābodhimhi anuḷā devī pañcahi kaññāsatehi pañcahi ca antepurikāsatehīti
atk-vin01a0:466_2: mātugāmasahassena saddhiṃ saṅghamittattheriyā santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva saparivārā
atk-vin01a0:466_3: arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Ariṭṭhopi kho rañño bhāgineyyo pañcahi purisasatehi saddhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:466_4: therassa santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva saparivāro arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a0:467_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā mahābodhiṃ vanditvā therena saddhiṃ thūpārāmaṃ gacchati. Tassa
atk-vin01a0:467_1: lohapāsādaṭṭhānaṃ sampattassa purisā pupphāni abhihariṃsu. Rājā therassa pupphāni
atk-vin01a0:467_2: adāsi. Thero pupphehi lohapāsādaṭṭhānaṃ pūjesi. Pupphesu bhūmiyaṃ patitamattesu mahābhūmicālo
atk-vin01a0:467_3: ahosi. Rājā “kasmā, bhante, bhūmi calitā”ti pucchi. “Ismiṃ, mahārāja, okāse saṅghassa
atk-vin01a0:468_0: Rājā puna therena saddhiṃ gacchanto ambaṅgaṇaṭṭhānaṃ patto. Tatthassa vaṇṇagandhasampannaṃ
atk-vin01a0:468_1: atimadhurarasaṃ ekaṃ ambapakkaṃ āharīyittha. Rājā taṃ therassa paribhogatthāya adāsi.
atk-vin01a0:468_2: Thero tattheva paribhuñjitvā “idaṃ ettheva ropethā”ti āha. Rājā taṃ ambaṭṭhiṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:468_3: tattheva ropetvā udakaṃ āsiñci. Saha ambabījaropanena pathavī akampi. Rājā “kasmā,
atk-vin01a0:468_4: bhante, pathavī kampitthā”ti pucchi. “Imasmiṃ, mahārāja, okāse saṅghassa anāgate
atk-vin01a0:469_0: Rājā tattha aṭṭha pupphamuṭṭhiyo okiritvā vanditvā puna therena saddhiṃ gacchanto
atk-vin01a0:469_1: mahācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ patto. Tatthassa purisā campakapupphāni abhihariṃsu. Tāni rājā
atk-vin01a0:469_2: therassa adāsi. Thero mahācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ pupphehi pūjetvā vandi. Tāvadeva mahāpathavī
atk-vin01a0:469_3: saṅkampi. Rājā “kasmā, bhante, pathavī kampitthā”ti pucchi. “Imasmiṃ, mahārāja, okāse
atk-vin01a0:469_4: anāgate buddhassa bhagavato asadiso mahāthūpo bhavissati, tassetaṃ pubbanimitta”nti.
atk-vin01a0:469_5: “Ahameva karomi, bhante”ti. “Alaṃ, mahārāja, tumhākaṃ aññaṃ bahukammaṃ atthi, tumhākaṃ
atk-vin01a0:469_6: pana nattā duṭṭhagāmaṇī abhayo nāma kāressatī”ti. Atha rājā “sace, bhante, mayhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:469_7: nattā karissati, kataṃyeva mayā”ti dvādasahatthaṃ pāsāṇatthambhaṃ āharāpetvā “devānampiyatissassa
atk-vin01a0:469_8: rañño nattā duṭṭhagāmaṇī abhayo nāma imasmiṃ padese thūpaṃ karotū”ti akkharāni likhāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:469_9: patiṭṭhāpetvā vanditvā theraṃ pucchi – “patiṭṭhitaṃ nu kho, bhante, tambapaṇṇidīpe
atk-vin01a0:469_10: sāsana”nti? “Patiṭṭhitaṃ, mahārāja, sāsanaṃ; mūlāni panassa na tāva otarantī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:469_11: “Kadā pana, bhante mūlāni otiṇṇāni nāma bhavissantī”ti? “Yadā, mahārāja, tambapaṇṇidīpakānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:469_12: mātāpitūnaṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe jāto dārako tambapaṇṇidīpe pabbajitvā tambapaṇṇidīpamhiyeva
atk-vin01a0:469_13: vinayaṃ uggahetvā tambapaṇṇidīpe vācessati, tadā sāsanassa mūlāni otiṇṇāni nāma bhavissantī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:469_14: “Atthi pana, bhante, ediso bhikkhū”ti? “Atthi, mahārāja, mahāariṭṭho bhikkhu paṭibalo
atk-vin01a0:469_15: etasmiṃ kamme”ti. “Mayā ettha, bhante, kiṃ kattabba”nti? “Maṇḍapaṃ, mahārāja, kātuṃ
atk-vin01a0:469_16: vaṭṭatī”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti rājā meghavaṇṇābhayassa amaccassa pariveṇaṭṭhāne mahāsaṅgītikāle
atk-vin01a0:469_17: ajātasattumahārājena katamaṇḍapappakāraṃ rājānubhāvena maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sabbatāḷāvacare
atk-vin01a0:469_18: sakasakasippesu payojetvā “sāsanassa mūlāni otarantāni passissāmī”ti anekapurisasahassaparivuto
atk-vin01a0:470_0: Tena kho pana samayena thūpārāme aṭṭhasaṭṭhi bhikkhusahassāni sannipatiṃsu. Mahāmahindattherassa
atk-vin01a0:470_1: āsanaṃ dakkhiṇābhimukhaṃ paññattaṃ hoti. Mahāariṭṭhattherassa dhammāsanaṃ uttarābhimukhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:470_2: paññattaṃ hoti. Atha kho mahāariṭṭhatthero mahindattherena ajjhiṭṭho attano anurūpena
atk-vin01a0:470_3: pattānukkamena dhammāsane nisīdi. Mahindattherapamukhā aṭṭhasaṭṭhi mahātherā dhammāsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:470_4: parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu. Raññopi kaniṭṭhabhātā mattābhayatthero nāma “dhuraggāho hutvā
atk-vin01a0:470_5: vinayaṃ uggaṇhissāmī”ti pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mahāariṭṭhattherassa dhammāsanameva
atk-vin01a0:470_6: parivāretvā nisīdi. Avasesāpi bhikkhū sarājikā ca parisā attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:471_0: Athāyasmā mahāariṭṭhatthero tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūleti
atk-vin01a0:471_1: vinayanidānaṃ abhāsi. Bhāsite ca panāyasmatā ariṭṭhattherena vinayanidāne ākāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:471_2: mahāviravaṃ ravi. Akālavijjulatā nicchariṃsu. Devatā sādhukāraṃ adaṃsu. Mahāpathavī
atk-vin01a0:471_3: udakapariyantaṃ katvā saṅkampi. Evaṃ anekesu pāṭihāriyesu vattamānesu āyasmā ariṭṭhatthero
atk-vin01a0:471_4: mahāmahindapamukhehi aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā paccekagaṇīhi khīṇāsavamahātherehi tadaññehi ca
atk-vin01a0:471_7: vinayapiṭakaṃ pakāsesi. Pakāsetvā ca yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhamāno bahūnaṃ vācetvā bahūnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:471_8: hadaye patiṭṭhāpetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Tepi kho mahāmahindappamukhā tasmiṃ samāgame –
atk-vin01a0:478_0: Tesaṃ parinibbānato aparabhāge aññepi tesaṃ therānaṃ antevāsikā tissadattakāḷasumana-dīghasumanādayo
atk-vin01a0:478_1: ca mahāariṭṭhattherassa antevāsikā, antevāsikānaṃ antevāsikā cāti evaṃ pubbe vuttappakārā
atk-vin01a0:478_2: ācariyaparamparā imaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ yāvajjatanā ānesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:479_0: “Tatiyasaṅgahato pana uddhaṃ imaṃ dīpaṃ mahindādīhi ābhataṃ, mahindato uggahetvā
atk-vin01a0:479_1: kañci kālaṃ ariṭṭhattherādīhi ābhataṃ, tato yāvajjatanā tesaṃyeva antevāsikaparamparabhūtāya
atk-vin01a0:480_0: Kattha patiṭṭhitanti? Yesaṃ pāḷito ca atthato ca anūnaṃ vattati, maṇighaṭe pakkhittatelamiva
atk-vin01a0:480_1: īsakampi na paggharati, evarūpesu adhimattasati-gati-dhiti-mantesu lajjīsu kukkuccakesu
atk-vin01a0:480_2: sikkhākāmesu puggalesu patiṭṭhitanti veditabbaṃ. Tasmā vinayapatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ vinayapariyattiyā
atk-vin01a0:480_3: ānisaṃsaṃ sallakkhetvā sikkhākāmena bhikkhunā vinayo pariyāpuṇitabbo.
atk-vin01a0:481_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinayapariyattiyā ānisaṃso – vinayapariyattikusalo hi puggalo sāsane paṭiladdhasaddhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:481_1: kulaputtānaṃ mātāpituṭṭhāniyo hoti, tadāyattā hi nesaṃ pabbajjā upasampadā vattānuvattapaṭipatti
atk-vin01a0:481_2: ācāragocarakusalatā. Api cassa vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya attano sīlakkhandho sugutto
atk-vin01a0:481_3: hoti surakkhito; kukkuccapakatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti; visārado saṅghamajjhe
atk-vin01a0:481_4: voharati; paccatthike sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhāti; saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno
atk-vin01a0:481_5: hoti. Tenāha bhagavā – “pañcime, bhikkhave, ānisaṃsā vinayadhare puggale; attano
atk-vin01a0:481_6: sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito…pe… saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:482_0: Ye cāpi saṃvaramūlakā kusalā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, vinayadharo puggalo tesaṃ dāyādo;
atk-vin01a0:482_1: vinayamūlakattā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ. Vuttampi hetaṃ bhagavatā – “vinayo saṃvaratthāya,
atk-vin01a0:482_2: saṃvaro avippaṭisāratthāya, avippaṭisāro pāmojjatthāya, pāmojjaṃ pītatthāya, pīti
atk-vin01a0:482_3: passaddhatthāya, passaddhi sukhatthāya, sukhaṃ samādhatthāya, samādhi yathābhūtañāṇadassanatthāya,
atk-vin01a0:482_4: yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ nibbidatthāya, nibbidā virāgatthāya, virāgo vimuttatthāya,
atk-vin01a0:482_6: kathā, etadatthā mantanā, etadatthā upanisā, etadatthaṃ sotāvadhānaṃ – yadidaṃ anupādācittassa
atk-vin01a0:483: Ettāvatā ca yā sā vinayasaṃvaṇṇanatthaṃ mātikā ṭhapitā tattha –
atk-vin01a0:484: “Vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā, dhāritaṃ yena cābhataṃ;
atk-vin01a0:486: Imissā tāva gāthāya attho pakāsito vinayassa ca bāhiranidānavaṇṇanā yathādhippāyaṃ saṃvaṇṇitā hotīti.
atk-vin01a0:493_0: Vuttattā tena samayena buddho bhagavātiādīnaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi. Seyyathidaṃ
atk-vin01a0:493_1: – tenāti aniyamaniddesavacanaṃ. Tassa sarūpena avuttenapi aparabhāge atthato siddhena
atk-vin01a0:493_2: yenāti iminā vacanena paṭiniddeso kātabbo. Aparabhāge hi vinayapaññattiyācanahetubhūto
atk-vin01a0:493_3: āyasmato sāriputtassa parivitakko siddho. Tasmā yena samayena so parivitakko udapādi,
atk-vin01a0:493_4: tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:493_5: Ayañhi sabbasmimpi vinaye yutti, yadidaṃ yattha yattha “tenā”ti vuccati tattha tattha
atk-vin01a0:493_6: pubbe vā pacchā vā atthato siddhena “yenā”ti iminā vacanena paṭiniddeso kātabboti.
atk-vin01a0:494_0: Tatridaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ – “tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmi,
atk-vin01a0:494_1: yena sudinno methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevi; yasmā paṭisevi, tasmā paññapessāmī”ti vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:494_2: hoti. Evaṃ tāva pubbe atthato siddhena yenāti iminā vacanena paṭiniddeso yujjati.
atk-vin01a0:494_3: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati, yena samayena dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto
atk-vin01a0:494_4: rañño dārūni adinnaṃ ādiyīti evaṃ pacchā atthato siddhena yenāti iminā vacanena paṭiniddeso
atk-vin01a0:494_5: yujjatīti vutto tenāti vacanassa attho. Samayenāti ettha pana samayasaddo tāva –
atk-vin01a0:496: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati.
atk-vin01a0:497_0: Tathā hissa – “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu
atk-vin01a0:497_1: samavāyo attho. “Ekova kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”ti evamādīsu
atk-vin01a0:497_2: khaṇo. “Uṇhasamayo pariḷāhasamayo”ti evamādīsu kālo. “Mahāsamayo pavanasmi”nti evamādīsu
atk-vin01a0:497_3: samūho. “Samayopi kho te, bhaddāli, appaṭividdho ahosi – ‘bhagavā kho sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:497_4: viharati, bhagavāpi maṃ jānissati – bhaddāli nāma bhikkhu satthusāsane sikkhāya aparipūrakārī’ti
atk-vin01a0:497_5: ayampi kho te, bhaddāli, samayo appaṭividdho ahosī”ti evamādīsu hetu. “Tena kho pana
atk-vin01a0:497_6: samayena uggahamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake
atk-vin01a0:498: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-vin01a0:500_0: Evamādīsu paṭilābho. “Sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā”ti evamādīsu pahānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:500_1: “Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”ti evamādīsu
atk-vin01a0:500_2: paṭivedho attho. Idha panassa kālo attho. Tasmā yena kālena āyasmato sāriputtassa
atk-vin01a0:500_3: vinayapaññattiyācanahetubhūto parivitakko udapādi, tena kālenāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a0:501_0: Etthāha – “atha kasmā yathā suttante ‘ekaṃ samaya’nti upayogavacanena niddeso kato,
atk-vin01a0:501_1: abhidhamme ca ‘yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacara’nti bhummavacanena, tathā akatvā idha ‘tena
atk-vin01a0:501_2: samayenā’ti karaṇavacanena niddeso kato”ti? Tattha tathā, idha ca aññathā atthasambhavato.
atk-vin01a0:501_3: Kathaṃ? Suttante tāva accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati. Yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā brahmajālādīni
atk-vin01a0:501_4: suttantāni desesi, accantameva taṃ samayaṃ karuṇāvihārena vihāsi; tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:501_5: tattha upayoganiddeso kato. Abhidhamme ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho
atk-vin01a0:501_6: ca sambhavati. Adhikaraṇañhi kālattho samūhattho ca samayo, tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:501_7: khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhiyati. Tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:501_8: tattha bhummavacanena niddeso kato. Idha pana hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati.
atk-vin01a0:501_9: Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi dubbiññeyyo, tena samayena hetubhūtena
atk-vin01a0:501_10: karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno
atk-vin01a0:501_11: bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi; tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ idha karaṇavacanena niddeso
atk-vin01a0:503: Aññatra samayo vutto, karaṇeneva so idhā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:504_0: Porāṇā pana vaṇṇayanti – ‘ekaṃ samaya’nti vā ‘yasmiṃ samaye’ti vā ‘tena samayenā’ti
atk-vin01a0:504_1: vā abhilāpamattabhedo esa, sabbattha bhummameva attho”ti. Tasmā tesaṃ laddhiyā “tena
atk-vin01a0:505_0: Buddho bhagavāti imesaṃ padānaṃ parato atthaṃ vaṇṇayissāma. Verañjāyaṃ viharatīti
atk-vin01a0:505_1: ettha pana verañjāti aññatarassa nagarassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tassaṃ verañjāyaṃ; samīpatthe
atk-vin01a0:505_4: tena ṭhitopi gacchantopi nisinnopi sayānopi bhagavā viharaticceva veditabbo. So hi
atk-vin01a0:505_5: ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:506_0: Naḷerupucimandamūleti ettha naḷeru nāma yakkho, pucimandoti nimbarukkho, mūlanti
atk-vin01a0:506_1: samīpaṃ. Ayañhi mūlasaddo “mūlāni uddhareyya antamaso usīranāḷimattānipī”ti -ādīsu
atk-vin01a0:506_3: kāle chāyā pharati, nivāte paṇṇāni patanti, ettāvatā rukkhamūla”ntiādīsu samīpe.
atk-vin01a0:506_4: Idha pana samīpe adhippeto, tasmā naḷeruyakkhena adhiggahitassa pucimandassa samīpeti
atk-vin01a0:506_5: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. So kira pucimando ramaṇīyo pāsādiko anekesaṃ rukkhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:506_6: ādhipaccaṃ viya kurumāno tassa nagarassa avidūre gamanāgamanasampanne ṭhāne ahosi.
atk-vin01a0:506_7: Atha bhagavā verañjaṃ gantvā patirūpe ṭhāne viharanto tassa rukkhassa samīpe heṭṭhābhāge
atk-vin01a0:507_0: Tattha siyā yadi tāva bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharati, “naḷerupucimandamūle”ti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:507_1: atha tattha viharati, “verañjāya”nti na vattabbaṃ, na hi sakkā ubhayattha teneva
atk-vin01a0:507_2: samayena apubbaṃ acarimaṃ viharitunti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, nanu avocumha
atk-vin01a0:507_3: “samīpatthe bhummavacana”nti. Tasmā yathā gaṅgāyamunādīnaṃ samīpe goyūthāni carantāni
atk-vin01a0:507_4: “gaṅgāya caranti, yamunāya carantī”ti vuccanti; evamidhāpi yadidaṃ verañjāya samīpe
atk-vin01a0:507_5: naḷerupucimandamūlaṃ tattha viharanto vuccati “verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle”ti.
atk-vin01a0:508_0: Tattha verañjākittanena āyasmā upālitthero bhagavato gahaṭṭhānuggahakaraṇaṃ dasseti,
atk-vin01a0:508_3: purimena ca dhammadesanābhiyogaṃ, pacchimena vivekādhimuttiṃ; purimena karuṇāya upagamanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:508_4: pacchimena paññāya apagamanaṃ; purimena sattānaṃ hitasukhanipphādanādhimuttataṃ,
atk-vin01a0:508_6: phāsuvihāraṃ, pacchimena uttarimanussadhammānuyoganimittaṃ; purimena manussānaṃ upakārabahulataṃ,
atk-vin01a0:508_7: pacchimena devatānaṃ; purimena loke jātassa loke saṃvaḍḍhabhāvaṃ, pacchimena lokena
atk-vin01a0:508_8: anupalittataṃ; purimena “ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya
atk-vin01a0:508_9: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. Katamo ekapuggalo?
atk-vin01a0:508_10: Tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti vacanato yadatthaṃ bhagavā uppanno tadatthaparinipphādanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:508_11: pacchimena yattha uppanno tadanurūpavihāraṃ. Bhagavā hi paṭhamaṃ lumbinīvane, dutiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:508_12: bodhimaṇḍeti lokiyalokuttarāya uppattiyā vaneyeva uppanno, tenassa vaneyeva vihāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:509_0: Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti ettha mahatāti guṇamahattenapi mahatā; saṅkhyāmahattenapi,
atk-vin01a0:509_1: so hi bhikkhusaṅgho guṇehipi mahā ahosi, yasmā yo tattha pacchimako so sotāpanno;
atk-vin01a0:509_2: saṅkhyāyapi mahā pañcasatasaṅkhyattā. Bhikkhūnaṃ saṅghena bhikkhusaṅghena; diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅkhātasaṅghātena
atk-vin01a0:509_3: samaṇagaṇenāti attho. Saddhinti ekato. Pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehīti pañca mattā etesanti
atk-vin01a0:509_4: pañcamattāni. Mattāti pamāṇaṃ vuccati. Tasmā yathā “bhojane mattaññū”ti vutte bhojane
atk-vin01a0:509_5: mattaṃ jānāti, pamāṇaṃ jānātīti attho hoti; evamidhāpi tesaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pañca
atk-vin01a0:509_6: mattā pañcappamāṇanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Bhikkhūnaṃ satāni bhikkhusatāni, tehi
atk-vin01a0:509_7: pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi. Etena yaṃ vuttaṃ – “mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhi”nti,
atk-vin01a0:509_8: ettha tassa mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa saṅkhyāmahattaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Parato panassa
atk-vin01a0:509_9: “nirabbudo hi, sāriputta bhikkhusaṅgho nirādīnavo apagatakāḷako suddho sāre patiṭṭhito.
atk-vin01a0:509_10: Imesañhi, sāriputta, pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ yo pacchimako so sotāpanno”ti vacanena
atk-vin01a0:510_0: Assosi kho verañjo brāhmaṇoti assosīti suṇi upalabhi, sotadvārasampattavacananigghosānusārena
atk-vin01a0:510_1: aññāsi. Khoti padapūraṇamatte avadhāraṇatthe vā nipāto. Tattha avadhāraṇatthena assosi
atk-vin01a0:510_2: eva, nāssa koci savanantarāyo ahosīti ayamattho veditabbo. Padapūraṇena pana byañjanasiliṭṭhatāmattameva.
atk-vin01a0:510_3: Verañjāyaṃ jāto, verañjāyaṃ bhavo, verañjā vā assa nivāsoti verañjo. Mātāpitūhi katanāmavasena
atk-vin01a0:510_4: panāyaṃ “udayo”ti vuccati. Brahmaṃ aṇatīti brāhmaṇo, mante sajjhāyatīti attho. Idameva
atk-vin01a0:510_5: hi jātibrāhmaṇānaṃ niruttivacanaṃ. Ariyā pana bāhitapāpattā “brāhmaṇā”ti vuccanti.
atk-vin01a0:511_0: Idāni yamatthaṃ verañjo brāhmaṇo assosi, taṃ pakāsento samaṇo khalu bho gotamotiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:511_1: Tattha samitapāpattā samaṇoti veditabbo. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ – “bāhitapāpoti brāhmaṇo, samitapāpattā
atk-vin01a0:511_2: samaṇoti vuccatī”ti. Bhagavā ca anuttarena ariyamaggena samitapāpo, tenassa yathābhuccaguṇādhigatametaṃ
atk-vin01a0:511_3: nāmaṃ yadidaṃ samaṇoti. Khalūti anussavanatthe nipāto. Bhoti brāhmaṇajātikānaṃ jātisamudāgataṃ
atk-vin01a0:512_0: “Bhovādī nāmaso hoti, sace hoti sakiñcano”ti.. Gotamoti bhagavantaṃ gottavasena parikitteti,
atk-vin01a0:512_1: tasmā “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo”ti ettha samaṇo kira bho gotamagottoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a0:512_2: Sakyaputtoti idaṃ pana bhagavato uccākulaparidīpanaṃ. Sakyakulā pabbajitoti saddhāpabbajitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:512_3: kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva, taṃ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāya pabbajitoti
atk-vin01a0:512_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Tato paraṃ vuttatthameva. Taṃ kho panāti itthambhūtākhyānatthe upayogavacanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:512_5: tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho. Kalyāṇoti kalyāṇaguṇasamannāgato; seṭṭhoti
atk-vin01a0:512_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Kittisaddoti kitti eva, thutighoso vā.
atk-vin01a0:513: Itipi so bhagavātiādīsu pana ayaṃ tāva yojanā – so bhagavā itipi arahaṃ, itipi sammāsambuddho…pe… itipi bhagavāti iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:514_1: dhammiyā kathāya cittasampahaṃsanatthañca etesaṃ padānaṃ vitthāranayena vaṇṇanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:514_2: karissāmi. Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ – “so bhagavā itipi araha”ntiādi; tattha ārakattā, arīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:514_3: arānañca hatattā, paccayādīnaṃ arahattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi
atk-vin01a0:514_4: so bhagavā arahanti veditabbo. Ārakā hi so sabbakilesehi suvidūravidūre ṭhito, maggena
atk-vin01a0:514_5: savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattāti ārakattā arahaṃ; te cānena kilesārayo maggena
atk-vin01a0:514_7: jarāmaraṇanemi āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā tibhavarathe samāyojitaṃ anādikālappavattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:514_8: saṃsāracakkaṃ, tassānena bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena
atk-vin01a0:514_9: kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇapharasuṃ gahetvā sabbe arā hatāti arānaṃ hatattāpi arahaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:515_0: Atha vā saṃsāracakkanti anamataggasaṃsāravaṭṭaṃ vuccati, tassa ca avijjā nābhi, mūlattā;
atk-vin01a0:515_1: jarāmaraṇaṃ nemi, pariyosānattā; sesā dasa dhammā arā, avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyantattā
atk-vin01a0:515_2: ca. Tattha dukkhādīsu aññāṇaṃ avijjā, kāmabhave ca avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo
atk-vin01a0:515_3: hoti. Rūpabhave avijjā rūpabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti. Arūpabhave avijjā arūpabhave
atk-vin01a0:515_4: saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave saṅkhārā kāmabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccayā
atk-vin01a0:515_5: honti. Esa nayo itaresu. Kāmabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ kāmabhave nāmarūpassa paccayo
atk-vin01a0:515_6: hoti, tathā rūpabhave. Arūpabhave nāmasseva paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave nāmarūpaṃ kāmabhave
atk-vin01a0:515_7: saḷāyatanassa paccayo hoti. Rūpabhave nāmarūpaṃ rūpabhave tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānaṃ paccayo
atk-vin01a0:515_8: hoti. Arūpabhave nāmaṃ arūpabhave ekassāyatanassa paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave saḷāyatanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:515_9: kāmabhave chabbidhassa phassassa paccayo hoti. Rūpabhave tīṇi āyatanāni rūpabhave
atk-vin01a0:515_10: tiṇṇaṃ phassānaṃ; arūpabhave ekamāyatanaṃ arūpabhave ekassa phassassa paccayo hoti.
atk-vin01a0:515_11: Kāmabhave cha phassā kāmabhave channaṃ vedanānaṃ paccayā honti. Rūpabhave tayo tattheva
atk-vin01a0:515_12: tissannaṃ; arūpabhave eko tattheva ekissā vedanāya paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave cha vedanā
atk-vin01a0:515_13: kāmabhave channaṃ taṇhākāyānaṃ paccayā honti. Rūpabhave tisso tattheva tiṇṇaṃ; arūpabhave
atk-vin01a0:515_14: ekā vedanā arūpabhave ekassa taṇhākāyassa paccayo hoti. Tattha tattha sā sā taṇhā
atk-vin01a0:515_15: tassa tassa upādānassa paccayo; upādānādayo bhavādīnaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:516_0: Kathaṃ? Idhekacco “kāme paribhuñjissāmī”ti kāmupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ carati,
atk-vin01a0:516_1: vācāya manasā duccaritaṃ carati; duccaritapāripūriyā apāye upapajjati. Tatthassa
atk-vin01a0:516_2: upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo, kammanibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo, khandhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:516_3: nibbatti jāti, paripāko jarā, bhedo maraṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:517: Aparo “saggasampattiṃ anubhavissāmī”ti tatheva sucaritaṃ carati; sucaritapāripūriyā sagge upapajjati. Tatthassa upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavoti so eva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:518_0: Aparo pana “brahmalokasampattiṃ anubhavissāmī”ti kāmupādānapaccayā eva mettaṃ bhāveti,
atk-vin01a0:518_1: karuṇaṃ… muditaṃ… upekkhaṃ bhāveti, bhāvanāpāripūriyā brahmaloke nibbattati. Tatthassa
atk-vin01a0:519_1: bhāveti, bhāvanāpāripūriyā tattha nibbattati. Tatthassa nibbattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:519_2: kammabhavo, kammanibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo, khandhānaṃ nibbatti jāti, paripāko
atk-vin01a0:519_3: jarā, bhedo maraṇanti. Esa nayo sesupādānamūlikāsupi yojanāsu.
atk-vin01a0:520_0: Evaṃ “ayaṃ avijjā hetu, saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā, ubhopete hetusamuppannāti paccayapariggahe
atk-vin01a0:520_1: paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ; atītampi addhānaṃ, anāgatampi addhānaṃ; avijjā hetu, saṅkhārā
atk-vin01a0:520_2: hetusamuppannā, ubhopete hetusamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti
atk-vin01a0:520_3: etena nayena sabbapadāni vitthāretabbāni. Tattha avijjā saṅkhārā eko saṅkhepo, viññāṇa-nāmarūpa-saḷāyatana-phassa-vedanā
atk-vin01a0:520_4: eko, taṇhupādānabhavā eko, jāti-jarā-maraṇaṃ eko. Purimasaṅkhepo cettha atīto addhā,
atk-vin01a0:520_5: dve majjhimā paccuppanno, jātijarāmaraṇaṃ anāgato. Avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇena cettha
atk-vin01a0:520_6: taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva hontīti ime pañca dhammā atīte kammavaṭṭaṃ; viññāṇādayo
atk-vin01a0:520_7: pañca dhammā etarahi vipākavaṭṭaṃ. Taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāva
atk-vin01a0:520_8: hontīti ime pañca dhammā etarahi kammavaṭṭaṃ; jātijarāmaraṇāpadesena viññāṇādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:520_9: niddiṭṭhattā ime pañca dhammā āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ. Te ākārato vīsatividhā honti.
atk-vin01a0:520_10: Saṅkhāraviññāṇānañcettha antarā eko sandhi, vedanātaṇhānamantarā eko, bhavajātīnamantarā
atk-vin01a0:520_11: eko. Iti bhagavā evaṃ catusaṅkhepaṃ, tiyaddhaṃ, vīsatākāraṃ, tisandhiṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-vin01a0:520_12: sabbākārato jānāti passati aññāti paṭivijjhati. Taṃ ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ, pajānanaṭṭhena
atk-vin01a0:520_13: paññā. Tena vuccati – “paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti. Iminā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena
atk-vin01a0:520_14: bhagavā te dhamme yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā tesu nibbindanto virajjanto vimuccanto vuttappakārassa
atk-vin01a0:520_15: imassa saṃsāracakkassa are hani vihani viddhaṃsesi. Evampi arānaṃ hatattā arahaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:521_0: Aggadakkhiṇeyyattā ca cīvarādipaccaye arahati pūjāvisesañca; teneva ca uppanne tathāgate
atk-vin01a0:521_1: ye keci mahesakkhā devamanussā na te aññattha pūjaṃ karonti. Tathā hi brahmā sahampati
atk-vin01a0:521_2: sinerumattena ratanadāmena tathāgataṃ pūjesi, yathābalañca aññepi devā manussā ca
atk-vin01a0:521_3: bimbisārakosalarājādayo. Parinibbutampi ca bhagavantaṃ uddissa channavutikoṭidhanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:521_5: Ko pana vādo aññesaṃ pūjāvisesānanti! Evaṃ paccayādīnaṃ arahattāpi arahaṃ. Yathā
atk-vin01a0:521_6: ca loke keci paṇḍitamānino bālā asilokabhayena raho pāpaṃ karonti; evamesa na kadāci
atk-vin01a0:521_7: karotīti pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvatopi arahaṃ. Hoti cettha –
atk-vin01a0:524: Na raho karoti pāpāni, arahaṃ tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:525_0: Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā pana sammāsambuddho. Tathā hesa sabbadhamme
