atk-vin01a0:525_1: sammā sāmañca buddho, abhiññeyye dhamme abhiññeyyato buddho, pariññeyye dhamme pariññeyyato,
atk-vin01a0:525_2: pahātabbe dhamme pahātabbato, sacchikātabbe dhamme sacchikātabbato, bhāvetabbe dhamme
atk-vin01a0:527: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-vin01a0:528_0: Apica cakkhu dukkhasaccaṃ, tassa mūlakāraṇabhāvena taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā samudayasaccaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:528_1: ubhinnamappavatti nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā paṭipadā maggasaccanti evaṃ ekekapaduddhārenāpi
atk-vin01a0:528_2: sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho. Esa nayo sota-ghāna-jivhā-kāyamanesupi. Eteneva
atk-vin01a0:528_3: nayena rūpādīni cha āyatanāni, cakkhuviññāṇādayo cha viññāṇakāyā, cakkhusamphassādayo
atk-vin01a0:528_4: cha phassā, cakkhusamphassajādayo cha vedanā, rūpasaññādayo cha saññā, rūpasañcetanādayo
atk-vin01a0:528_5: cha cetanā, rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā, rūpavitakkādayo cha vitakkā, rūpavicārādayo
atk-vin01a0:528_6: cha vicārā, rūpakkhandhādayo pañcakkhandhā, dasa kasiṇāni, dasa anussatiyo, uddhumātakasaññādivasena
atk-vin01a0:528_7: dasa saññā, kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, kāmabhavādayo
atk-vin01a0:528_8: nava bhavā, paṭhamādīni cattāri jhānāni, mettābhāvanādayo catasso appamaññā, catasso
atk-vin01a0:528_9: arūpasamāpattiyo, paṭilomato jarāmaraṇādīni, anulomato avijjādīni paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni ca yojetabbāni.
atk-vin01a0:529_0: Tatrāyaṃ ekapadayojanā – “jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, jāti samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi
atk-vin01a0:529_1: nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā paṭipadā maggasacca”nti. Evaṃ ekekapaduddhārena
atk-vin01a0:529_2: sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho anubuddho paṭividdho. Tena vuttaṃ – sammā sāmañca
atk-vin01a0:530_0: Vijjāhi pana caraṇena ca sampannattā vijjācaraṇasampanno; tattha vijjāti tissopi
atk-vin01a0:530_1: vijjā, aṭṭhapi vijjā. Tisso vijjā bhayabheravasutte vuttanayeneva veditabbā, aṭṭha
atk-vin01a0:530_2: vijjā ambaṭṭhasutte. Tatra hi vipassanāñāṇena manomayiddhiyā ca saha cha abhiññā
atk-vin01a0:530_3: pariggahetvā aṭṭha vijjā vuttā. Caraṇanti sīlasaṃvaro, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane
atk-vin01a0:530_4: mattaññutā, jāgariyānuyogo, satta saddhammā, cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānānīti ime pannarasa
atk-vin01a0:530_5: dhammā veditabbā. Imeyeva hi pannarasa dhammā, yasmā etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati
atk-vin01a0:530_6: amataṃ disaṃ tasmā, caraṇanti vuttā. Yathāha – “idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sīlavā
atk-vin01a0:530_7: hotī”ti vitthāro. Bhagavā imāhi vijjāhi iminā ca caraṇena samannāgato, tena vuccati
atk-vin01a0:530_8: vijjācaraṇasampannoti. Tattha vijjāsampadā bhagavato sabbaññutaṃ pūretvā ṭhitā, caraṇasampadā
atk-vin01a0:530_9: mahākāruṇikataṃ. So sabbaññutāya sabbasattānaṃ atthānatthaṃ ñatvā mahākāruṇikatāya
atk-vin01a0:530_10: anatthaṃ parivajjetvā atthe niyojeti, yathā taṃ vijjācaraṇasampanno. Tenassa sāvakā
atk-vin01a0:530_11: suppaṭipannā honti no duppaṭipannā, vijjācaraṇavipannānañhi sāvakā attantapādayo viya.
atk-vin01a0:531_0: Sobhanagamanattā, sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā, sammāgatattā, sammā ca gadattā sugato.
atk-vin01a0:531_1: Gamanampi hi gatanti vuccati, tañca bhagavato sobhanaṃ parisuddhamanavajjaṃ. Kiṃ
atk-vin01a0:531_2: pana tanti? Ariyamaggo. Tena hesa gamanena khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gatoti sobhanagamanattā
atk-vin01a0:531_3: sugato. Sundaraṃ cesa ṭhānaṃ gato amataṃ nibbānanti sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattāpi sugato.
atk-vin01a0:531_4: Sammā ca gato tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto. Vuttañcetaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:531_5: “sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti
atk-vin01a0:531_6: sugato…pe… arahattamaggena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti
atk-vin01a0:531_7: sugato”ti. Sammā vā āgato dīpaṅkarapādamūlato pabhuti yāva bodhimaṇḍo tāva samatiṃsapāramipūritāya
atk-vin01a0:531_8: sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto sassataṃ ucchedaṃ kāmasukhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:531_9: attakilamathanti ime ca ante anupagacchanto āgatoti sammāgatattāpi sugato. Sammā
atk-vin01a0:531_10: cesa gadati, yuttaṭṭhāne yuttameva vācaṃ bhāsatīti sammā gadattāpi sugato.
atk-vin01a0:532_0: Tatridaṃ sādhakasuttaṃ – “yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:532_1: sā ca paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā, na taṃ tathāgato vācaṃ bhāsati. Yampi tathāgato vācaṃ
atk-vin01a0:532_2: jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ, sā ca paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā, tampi tathāgato
atk-vin01a0:532_3: vācaṃ na bhāsati. Yañca kho tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:532_4: sā ca paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā, tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāya.
atk-vin01a0:532_5: Yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ, sā ca paresaṃ piyā manāpā,
atk-vin01a0:532_6: na taṃ tathāgato vācaṃ bhāsati. Yampi tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:532_7: sā ca paresaṃ piyā manāpā, tampi tathāgato vācaṃ na bhāsati. Yañca kho tathāgato
atk-vin01a0:532_8: vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ, sā ca paresaṃ piyā manāpā, tatra kālaññū
atk-vin01a0:532_9: tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāyā”ti. Evaṃ sammā gadattāpi sugatoti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:533_0: Sabbathā viditalokattā pana lokavidū. So hi bhagavā sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato
atk-vin01a0:533_1: nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathā lokaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi. Yathāha – “yattha kho, āvuso,
atk-vin01a0:533_2: na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati, nāhaṃ taṃ gamanena lokassa
atk-vin01a0:533_3: antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ daṭṭheyyaṃ patteyyanti vadāmi; na cāhaṃ, āvuso, appatvāva lokassa
atk-vin01a0:533_4: antaṃ dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmi. Api cāhaṃ, āvuso, imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare
atk-vin01a0:533_5: sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca lokanirodhañca lokanirodhagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:535: Na ca appatvā lokantaṃ, dukkhā atthi pamocanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:540_0: Apica tayo lokā – saṅkhāraloko, sattaloko, okāsalokoti; tattha “eko loko – sabbe
atk-vin01a0:540_1: sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo. “Sassato lokoti vā asassato
atk-vin01a0:542: Tāva sahassadhā loko, ettha te vattatī vaso”ti. –
atk-vin01a0:543_0: Āgataṭṭhāne okāsaloko, tampi bhagavā sabbathā avedi. Tathā hissa – “eko loko – sabbe
atk-vin01a0:543_1: sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā. Dve lokā – nāmañca rūpañca. Tayo lokā – tisso vedanā. Cattāro
atk-vin01a0:543_2: lokā – cattāro āhārā. Pañca lokā – pañcupādānakkhandhā. Cha lokā – cha ajjhattikāni
atk-vin01a0:543_3: āyatanāni. Satta lokā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo. Aṭṭha lokā – aṭṭha lokadhammā. Nava
atk-vin01a0:543_4: lokā – nava sattāvāsā. Dasa lokā – dasāyatanāni. Dvādasa lokā – dvādasāyatanāni.
atk-vin01a0:543_5: Aṭṭhārasa lokā – aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo”ti. Ayaṃ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito.
atk-vin01a0:544_0: Yasmā panesa sabbesampi sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti, anusayaṃ jānāti, caritaṃ jānāti,
atk-vin01a0:544_1: adhimuttiṃ jānāti, apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre
atk-vin01a0:544_2: suviññāpaye duviññāpaye bhabbe abhabbe satte jānāti, tasmāssa sattalokopi sabbathā
atk-vin01a0:544_3: vidito. Yathā ca sattaloko evaṃ okāsalokopi. Tathā hesa ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ āyāmato ca
atk-vin01a0:544_4: vitthārato ca yojanānaṃ dvādasa satasahassāni tīṇi sahassāni cattāri satāni paññāsañca
atk-vin01a0:555: Saṭṭhi ceva sahassāni, esā lokassa saṇṭhiti.
atk-vin01a0:575_0: Tattha candamaṇḍalaṃ ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ, sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāsayojanaṃ, tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:575_1: dasasahassayojanaṃ; tathā asurabhavanaṃ, avīcimahānirayo, jambudīpo ca. Aparagoyānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:575_2: sattasahassayojanaṃ; tathā pubbavideho. Uttarakuru aṭṭhasahassayojano, ekameko cettha
atk-vin01a0:575_3: mahādīpo pañcasatapañcasataparittadīpaparivāro; taṃ sabbampi ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ, ekā
atk-vin01a0:575_4: lokadhātu, tadantaresu lokantarikanirayā. Evaṃ anantāni cakkavāḷāni anantā lokadhātuyo
atk-vin01a0:575_5: bhagavā anantena buddhañāṇena avedi, aññāsi, paṭivijjhi. Evamassa okāsalokopi sabbathā
atk-vin01a0:576_0: Attano pana guṇehi visiṭṭhatarassa kassaci abhāvā natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro.
atk-vin01a0:576_1: Tathā hesa sīlaguṇenāpi sabbaṃ lokamabhibhavati, samādhi…pe… paññā… vimutti… vimuttiñāṇadassanaguṇenāpi,
atk-vin01a0:576_2: sīlaguṇenāpi asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo…pe… vimuttiñāṇadassanaguṇenāpi.
atk-vin01a0:576_3: Yathāha – “na kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samanupassāmi sadevake loke samārake…pe… sadevamanussāya
atk-vin01a0:577: Evaṃ aggappasādasuttādīni “na me ācariyo atthī”tiādikā gāthāyo ca vitthāretabbā.
atk-vin01a0:578_0: Purisadamme sāretīti purisadammasārathi, dameti vinetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha purisadammāti
atk-vin01a0:578_1: adantā dametuṃ yuttā tiracchānapurisāpi manussapurisāpi amanussapurisāpi. Tathā hi
atk-vin01a0:578_2: bhagavatā tiracchānapurisāpi apalāḷo nāgarājā, cūḷodaro, mahodaro, aggisikho, dhūmasikho,
atk-vin01a0:578_3: dhanapālako hatthīti evamādayo damitā, nibbisā katā, saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpitā.
atk-vin01a0:578_6: vicitrehi vinayanūpāyehi. “Ahaṃ kho, kesi, purisadammaṃ saṇhenapi vinemi, pharusenapi
atk-vin01a0:578_7: vinemi, saṇhapharusenapi vinemī”ti idañcettha suttaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Atha vā visuddhasīlādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:578_8: paṭhamajjhānādīni sotāpannādīnañca uttarimaggapaṭipadaṃ ācikkhanto dantepi dametiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:579_0: Atha vā anuttaro purisadammasārathīti ekamevidaṃ atthapadaṃ. Bhagavā hi tathā purisadamme
atk-vin01a0:579_1: sāreti, yathā ekapallaṅkeneva nisinnā aṭṭha disā asajjamānā dhāvanti. Tasmā “anuttaro
atk-vin01a0:579_2: purisadammasārathī”ti vuccati. “Hatthidamakena, bhikkhave, hatthidammo sārito ekaṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:580_0: Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsatīti satthā. Apica satthā
atk-vin01a0:580_1: viyāti satthā, bhagavā satthavāho. “Yathā satthavāho satthe kantāraṃ tāreti, corakantāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:580_2: tāreti, vāḷakantāraṃ tāreti, dubbhikkhakantāraṃ tāreti, nirudakakantāraṃ tāreti,
atk-vin01a0:580_3: uttāreti nittāreti patāreti khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpeti; evameva bhagavā satthā satthavāho
atk-vin01a0:580_4: satte kantāraṃ tāreti jātikantāraṃ tāretī”tiādinā niddesanayenapettha attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:581_0: Devamanussānanti daevānañca manussānañca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ, bhabbapuggalaparicchedavasena
atk-vin01a0:581_1: ca. Bhagavā pana tiracchānagatānampi anusāsanippadānena satthāyeva. Tepi hi bhagavato
atk-vin01a0:581_2: dhammasavanena upanissayasampattiṃ patvā tāya eva upanissayasampattiyā dutiye tatiye
atk-vin01a0:581_3: vā attabhāve maggaphalabhāgino honti. Maṇḍūkadevaputtādayo cettha nidassanaṃ. Bhagavati
atk-vin01a0:581_4: kira gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre campānagaravāsīnaṃ dhammaṃ desayamāne eko maṇḍūko
atk-vin01a0:581_5: bhagavato sare nimittaṃ aggahesi. Taṃ eko vacchapālako daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto tassa
atk-vin01a0:581_6: sīse sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsi. So tāvadeva kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike
atk-vin01a0:581_7: kanakavimāne nibbatti. Suttappabuddho viya ca tattha accharāsaṅghaparivutaṃ attānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:581_8: disvā “are, ahampi nāma idha nibbattosmi! Kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ akāsi”nti āvajjento nāññaṃ
atk-vin01a0:581_9: kiñci addasa, aññatra bhagavato sare nimittaggāhā. So taāvadeva saha vimānena āgantvā
atk-vin01a0:581_10: bhagavato pāde sirasā vandi. Bhagavā jānantova pucchi –
atk-vin01a0:582: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:586: Bhagavā tassa dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Devaputtopi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya sitaṃ katvā pakkāmīti.
atk-vin01a0:587_0: Yaṃ pana kiñci atthi ñeyyaṃ nāma, tassa sabbassa buddhattā vimokkhantikañāṇavasena
atk-vin01a0:587_1: buddho. Yasmā vā cattāri saccāni attanāpi bujjhi, aññepi satte bodhesi; tasmā evamādīhipi
atk-vin01a0:587_2: kāraṇehi buddho. Imassa catthassa viññāpanatthaṃ “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā
atk-vin01a0:587_3: pajāyāti buddho”ti evaṃ pavatto sabbopi niddesanayo paṭisambhidānayo vā vitthāretabbo.
atk-vin01a0:590: Garu gāravayutto so, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:591_0: Catubbidhañhi nāmaṃ – āvatthikaṃ, liṅgikaṃ, nemittikaṃ, adhiccasamuppannanti. Adhiccasamuppannaṃ
atk-vin01a0:591_1: nāma lokiyavohārena “yadicchaka”nti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha “vaccho dammo balibaddo”ti
atk-vin01a0:591_2: evamādi āvatthikaṃ. “Daṇḍī chattī sikhī karī”ti evamādi liṅgikaṃ. “Tevijjo chaḷabhiñño”ti
atk-vin01a0:591_4: pavattaṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ. Idaṃ pana bhagavāti nāmaṃ nemittikaṃ, na mahāmāyāya
atk-vin01a0:591_5: na suddhodanamahārājena na asītiyā ñātisahassehi kataṃ, na sakkasantusitādīhi devatāvisesehi.
atk-vin01a0:591_6: Vuttañhetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā – “bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ…pe… vimokkhantikametaṃ
atk-vin01a0:591_7: buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikāpaññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:592: Yaṃguṇanemittikañcetaṃ nāmaṃ, tesaṃ guṇānaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ vadanti –
atk-vin01a0:597: Niddese vuttanayeneva cettha tesaṃ tesaṃ padānamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a0:601_0: Tattha vaṇṇāgamo vaṇṇavipariyayoti etaṃ niruttilakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā saddanayena vā pisodarādipakkhepalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:601_2: atthi, tasmā “bhāgyavā”ti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vuccatīti ñātabbaṃ. Yasmā pana
atk-vin01a0:601_7: bhaggattā etesaṃ parissayānaṃ bhaggavāti vattabbe bhagavāti vuccati. Āha cettha –
atk-vin01a0:603: Bhaggāssa pāpakā dhammā, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:604_0: Bhāgyavantatāya cassa satapuññajalakkhaṇadharassa rūpakāyasampattidīpitā hoti, bhaggadosatāya
atk-vin01a0:604_2: abhigamanīyatā, abhigatānañca nesaṃ kāyacittadukkhāpanayane paṭibalabhāvo, āmisadānadhammadānehi
atk-vin01a0:604_3: upakāritā, lokiyalokuttarasukhehi ca sampayojanasamatthatā dīpitā hoti.
atk-vin01a0:605_0: Yasmā ca loke issariya-dhamma-yasa-sirī-kāma-payattesu chasu dhammesu bhagasaddo
atk-vin01a0:605_1: vattati, paramañcassa sakacitte issariyaṃ, aṇimā laghimādikaṃ vā lokiyasammataṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ
atk-vin01a0:605_2: atthi tathā lokuttaro dhammo lokattayabyāpako yathābhuccaguṇādhigato ativiya parisuddho
atk-vin01a0:605_4: yaṃ yaṃ etena icchitaṃ patthitaṃ attahitaṃ parahitaṃ vā, tassa tassa tatheva abhinipphannattā
atk-vin01a0:605_5: icchiticchi, tattha nipphattisaññito kāmo, sabbalokagarubhāvappattihetubhūto sammāvāyāmasaṅkhāto
atk-vin01a0:605_6: payatto ca atthi; tasmā imehi bhagehi yuttattāpi bhagā assa santīti iminā atthena bhagavāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:606_3: nirodhaṃ, niyyāna-hetu-dassanādhipateyyaṭṭhena maggaṃ vibhattavā, vibhajitvā vivaritvā
atk-vin01a0:606_4: desitavāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā vibhattavāti vattabbe bhagavāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:607_0: Yasmā ca esa dibbabrahmaariyavihāre kāyacittaupadhiviveke suññatappaṇihitānimittavimokkhe
atk-vin01a0:607_1: aññe ca lokiyalokuttare uttarimanussadhamme bhaji sevi bahulamakāsi, tasmā bhattavāti
atk-vin01a0:608_0: Yasmā pana tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ gamanamanena vantaṃ, tasmā bhavesu vantagamanoti
atk-vin01a0:608_1: vattabbe bhavasaddato bhakāraṃ, gamanasaddato gakāraṃ, vantasaddato vakārañca dīghaṃ
atk-vin01a0:608_2: katvā ādāya bhagavāti vuccati. Yathā loke “mehanassa khassa mālā”ti vattabbe “mekhalā”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:609_0: So imaṃ lokanti so bhagavā imaṃ lokaṃ. Idāni vattabbaṃ nidasseti. Sadevakanti saha
atk-vin01a0:609_1: devehi sadevakaṃ; evaṃ saha mārena samārakaṃ; saha brahmunā sabrahmakaṃ; saha samaṇabrāhmaṇehi
atk-vin01a0:609_2: sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ; pajātattā pajā, taṃ pajaṃ; saha devamanussehi sadevamanussaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:609_7: Evamettha tīhi padehi okāsaloko, dvīhi pajāvasena sattaloko gahitoti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:610_0: Aparo nayo – sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaradevaloko gahito, samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevalokā,
atk-vin01a0:610_2: sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko, avasesasabbasattaloko vā.
atk-vin01a0:611_0: Apicettha sadevakavacanena ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbassāpi lokassa sacchikatabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:611_1: sādhento tassa bhagavato kittisaddo abbhuggato. Tato yesaṃ siyā – “māro mahānubhāvo
atk-vin01a0:611_2: chakāmāvacarissaro vasavattī; kiṃ sopi etena sacchikato”ti? Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto
atk-vin01a0:611_3: samārakanti abbhuggato. Yesaṃ pana siyā – “brahmā mahānubhāvo ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:611_4: cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati, dvīhi…pe… dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu
atk-vin01a0:611_5: ālokaṃ pharati, anuttarañca jhānasamāpattisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, kiṃ sopi sacchikato”ti?
atk-vin01a0:611_6: Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto sabrahmakanti abbhuggato. Tato yesaṃ siyā – “puthūsamaṇabrāhmaṇā
atk-vin01a0:611_7: sāsanapaccatthikā, kiṃ tepi sacchikatā”ti? Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ
atk-vin01a0:611_8: pajanti abbhuggato. Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhānaṃ sacchikatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā atha sammutideve
atk-vin01a0:611_9: avasesamanusse ca upādāya ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena sesasattalokassa sacchikatabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:612_0: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetīti ettha pana sayanti sāmaṃ, aparaneyyo hutvā;
atk-vin01a0:612_1: abhiññāti abhiññāya, adhikena ñāṇena ñatvāti attho. Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā,
atk-vin01a0:612_2: etena anumānādipaṭikkhepo kato hoti. Pavedetīti bodheti ñāpeti pakāseti. So dhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:612_3: deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ…pe… pariyosānakalyāṇanti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca
atk-vin01a0:612_4: hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti. Tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento
atk-vin01a0:613_0: Kathaṃ? Ekagāthāpi hi samantabhadrakattā dhammassa paṭhamapādena ādikalyāṇā, dutiyatatiyapādehi
atk-vin01a0:613_1: majjhekalyāṇā, pacchimapādena pariyosānakalyāṇā. Ekānusandhikaṃ suttaṃ nidānena ādikalyāṇaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:613_2: nigamanena pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sesena majjhekalyāṇaṃ. Nānānusandhikaṃ suttaṃ paṭhamānusandhinā
atk-vin01a0:613_3: ādikalyāṇaṃ, pacchimena pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sesehi majjhekalyāṇaṃ. Sakalopi sāsanadhammo
atk-vin01a0:613_4: attano atthabhūtena sīlena ādikalyāṇo, samathavipassanāmaggaphalehi majjhekalyāṇo,
atk-vin01a0:613_5: nibbānena pariyosānakalyāṇo. Sīlasamādhīhi vā ādikalyāṇo, vipassanāmaggehi majjhekalyāṇo,
atk-vin01a0:613_6: phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo. Buddhasubodhitāya vā ādikalyāṇo, dhammasudhammatāya
atk-vin01a0:613_7: majjhekalyāṇo, saṅghasuppaṭipattiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo. Taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipannena
atk-vin01a0:613_8: adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā vā ādikalyāṇo, paccekabodhiyā majjhekalyāṇo, sāvakabodhiyā
atk-vin01a0:613_9: pariyosānakalyāṇo. Suyyamāno cesa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato savanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti
atk-vin01a0:613_11: āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo, tathā paṭipanno ca paṭipattiphale niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato
atk-vin01a0:613_12: paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti pariyosānakalyāṇo. Nāthappabhavattā ca pabhavasuddhiyā
atk-vin01a0:613_13: ādikalyāṇo, atthasuddhiyā majjhekalyāṇo, kiccasuddhiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo. Tasmā eso
atk-vin01a0:613_14: bhagavā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva desetīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:614_0: Sātthaṃ sabyañjananti evamādīsu pana yasmā imaṃ dhammaṃ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:614_1: maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti, nānānayehi dīpeti; tañca yathānurūpaṃ atthasampattiyā
atk-vin01a0:614_6: sātthaṃ, saddheyyato lokiyajanappasādakanti sabyañjanaṃ. Gambhīrādhippāyato sātthaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:614_7: uttānapadato sabyañjanaṃ. Upanetabbassa abhāvato sakalaparipuṇṇabhāvena kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:614_8: apanetabbassa abhāvato niddosabhāvena parisuddhaṃ; sikkhattayapariggahitattā brahmabhūtehi
atk-vin01a0:614_9: seṭṭhehi caritabbato tesañca cariyabhāvato brahmacariyaṃ. Tasmā “sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ…pe…
atk-vin01a0:615_0: Apica yasmā sanidānaṃ sauppattikañca desento ādikalyāṇaṃ deseti, veneyyānaṃ anurūpato
atk-vin01a0:615_1: atthassa aviparītatāya ca hetudāharaṇayuttato ca majjhekalyāṇaṃ, sotūnaṃ saddhāpaṭilābhena
atk-vin01a0:615_2: nigamanena ca pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ deseti. Evaṃ desento ca brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti.
atk-vin01a0:615_3: Tañca paṭipattiyā adhigamabyattito sātthaṃ, pariyattiyā āgamabyattito sabyañjanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:615_5: pavattito lokāmisanirapekkhato ca parisuddhaṃ, seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūtānaṃ buddha-paccekabuddha-buddhasāvakānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:615_6: cariyato “brahmacariya”nti vuccati. Tasmāpi “so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ…pe… brahmacariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:616_0: Sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho pana atthāvahaṃ sukhāvahanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathārūpānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:616_1: arahatanti yathārūpo so bhava gotamo, evarūpānaṃ yathābhuccaguṇādhigamena loke arahantoti
atk-vin01a0:616_2: laddhasaddānaṃ arahataṃ. Dassanaṃ hotīti pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīlitvā “dassanamattampi
atk-vin01a0:616_3: sādhu hotī”ti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvā atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti.
atk-vin01a0:617_0: 2. Yenāti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Tasmā yattha bhagavā tattha upasaṅkamīti evamettha
atk-vin01a0:617_1: attho daṭṭhabbo. Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo, tena kāraṇena
atk-vin01a0:617_2: upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Kena ca kāraṇena bhagavā upasaṅkamitabbo?
atk-vin01a0:617_4: viya. Upasaṅkamīti ca gatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Upasaṅkamitvāti upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:617_5: Atha vā evaṃ gato tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:618_0: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena, evaṃ sopi
atk-vin01a0:618_1: bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi, sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:618_2: agamāsi. Yāya ca “kacci, bho, gotama, khamanīyaṃ; kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci bhoto gotamassa,
atk-vin01a0:618_3: ca sāvakānañca appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya
atk-vin01a0:618_4: sammodi, taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātaṃ sammodaṃ jananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:618_5: Atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ araharūpato
atk-vin01a0:618_6: saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīyaṃ, suyyamānasukhato vā sammodanīyaṃ, anussariyamānasukhato
atk-vin01a0:618_7: sāraṇīyaṃ. Tathā byañjanaparisuddhatāya sammodanīyaṃ, atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti.
atk-vin01a0:618_8: Evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:618_9: yenatthena āgato taṃ pucchitukāmo ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-vin01a0:619_1: Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṃ nisinno hoti tathā nisīdīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a0:619_2: Bhummatthe vā etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Nisīdīti upāvisi. Paṇḍitā hi purisā garuṭṭhāniyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:619_3: upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṃ nisīdanti. Ayañca tesaṃ aññataro, tasmā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-vin01a0:620_0: Kathaṃ nisinno pana ekamantaṃ nisinno hotīti? Cha nisajjadose vajjetvā. Seyyathidaṃ
atk-vin01a0:620_1: – atidūraṃ, accāsannaṃ, uparivātaṃ, unnatappadesaṃ, atisammukhaṃ, atipacchāti. Atidūre
atk-vin01a0:620_2: nisinno hi sace kathetukāmo hoti uccāsaddena kathetabbaṃ hoti. Accāsanne nisinno
atk-vin01a0:620_3: saṅghaṭṭanaṃ karoti. Uparivāte nisinno sarīragandhena bādhati. Unnatappadese nisinno
atk-vin01a0:620_4: agāravaṃ pakāseti. Atisammukhā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, cakkhunā cakkhuṃ āhacca
atk-vin01a0:620_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti. Atipacchā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti gīvaṃ pasāretvā daṭṭhabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:620_6: hoti. Tasmā ayampi ete cha nisajjadose vajjetvā nisīdi. Tena vuttaṃ – “ekamantaṃ nisīdī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:621_0: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti etanti idāni vattabbamatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:621_1: dasseti. Dakāro padasandhikaro. Avocāti abhāsi. Sutaṃ metanti sutaṃ me etaṃ, etaṃ
atk-vin01a0:621_2: mayā sutanti idāni vattabbamatthaṃ dasseti. Bho gotamāti bhagavantaṃ gottena ālapati.
atk-vin01a0:622_0: Idāni yaṃ tena sutaṃ – taṃ dassento na samaṇo gotamoti evamādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanā
atk-vin01a0:622_1: – brāhmaṇeti jātibrāhmaṇe. Jiṇṇeti jajjarībhūte jarāya khaṇḍiccādibhāvaṃ āpādite.
atk-vin01a0:622_2: Vuḍḍheti aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ vuḍḍhimariyādappatte. Mahallaketi jātimahallakatāya samannāgate,
atk-vin01a0:622_3: cirakālappasuteti vuttaṃ hoti. Addhagateti addhānaṃ gate, dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe
atk-vin01a0:622_4: atīteti adhippāyo. Vayo anuppatteti pacchimavayaṃ sampatte, pacchimavayo nāma vassasatassa
atk-vin01a0:623_0: Apica – jiṇṇeti porāṇe, cirakālappavattakulanvayeti vuttaṃ hoti. Vuḍḍheti sīlācārādiguṇavuḍḍhiyutte.
atk-vin01a0:623_1: Mahallaketi vibhavamahattatāya samannāgate mahaddhane mahābhoge. Addhagateti maggappaṭipanne,
atk-vin01a0:623_2: brāhmaṇānaṃ vatacariyādimariyādaṃ avītikkamma caramāne. Vayoanuppatteti jātivuḍḍhabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:624_0: Idāni abhivādetīti evamādīni “na samaṇo gotamo”ti ettha vuttanakārena yojetvā evamatthato
atk-vin01a0:624_1: veditabbāni – “na vandati vā, nāsanā vuṭṭhahati vā, nāpi ‘idha bhonto nisīdantū’ti
atk-vin01a0:624_2: evaṃ āsanena vā upanimantetī”ti. Ettha hi vā saddo vibhāvane nāma atthe, “rūpaṃ niccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:624_3: vā aniccaṃ vā”tiādīsu viya. Evaṃ vatvā atha attano abhivādanādīni akarontaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:624_4: disvā āha – “tayidaṃ bho gotama tathevā”ti. Yaṃ taṃ mayā sutaṃ – taṃ tatheva, taṃ
atk-vin01a0:624_5: savanañca me dassanañca saṃsandati sameti, atthato ekībhāvaṃ gacchati. “Na hi bhavaṃ
atk-vin01a0:624_6: gotamo…pe… āsanena vā nimantetī”ti evaṃ attanā sutaṃ diṭṭhena nigametvā nindanto
atk-vin01a0:624_7: āha – “tayidaṃ bho gotama na sampannamevā”ti taṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ na yuttameva.
atk-vin01a0:625_0: Athassa bhagavā attukkaṃsanaparavambhanadosaṃ anupagamma karuṇāsītalahadayena taṃ
atk-vin01a0:625_1: aññāṇaṃ vidhamitvā yuttabhāvaṃ dassetukāmo āha – “nāhaṃ taṃ brāhmaṇa …pe… muddhāpi
atk-vin01a0:625_2: tassa vipateyyā”ti. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – “ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, appaṭihatena sabbaññutaññāṇacakkhunā
atk-vin01a0:625_3: olokentopi taṃ puggalaṃ etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke na passāmi, yamahaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:625_4: vā paccuṭṭheyyaṃ vā āsanena vā nimanteyyaṃ. Anacchariyaṃ vā etaṃ, yvāhaṃ ajja sabbaññutaṃ
atk-vin01a0:625_5: patto evarūpaṃ nipaccakārārahaṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi. Apica kho yadāpāhaṃ sampatijātova
atk-vin01a0:625_6: uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā sakalaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokesiṃ;
atk-vin01a0:625_7: tadāpi etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke taṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi, yamahaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:625_8: vā paccuṭṭheyyaṃ vā āsanena vā nimanteyyaṃ. Atha kho maṃ soḷasakappasahassāyuko khīṇāsavamahābrahmāpi
atk-vin01a0:625_9: añjaliṃ paggahetvā “tvaṃ loke mahāpuriso, tvaṃ sadevakassa lokassa aggo ca jeṭṭho
atk-vin01a0:625_10: ca seṭṭho ca, natthi tayā uttaritaro”ti sañjātasomanasso patināmesi; tadāpi cāhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:625_11: attanā uttaritaraṃ apassanto āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchāresiṃ – “aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi
atk-vin01a0:625_12: lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassā”ti. Evaṃ sampatijātassapi mayhaṃ abhivādanādiraho
atk-vin01a0:625_13: puggalo natthi, svāhaṃ idāni sabbaññutaṃ patto kaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ vā…pe… āsanena vā
atk-vin01a0:625_14: nimanteyyaṃ. Tasmā tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, mā tathāgate evarūpaṃ nipaccakāraṃ patthayittha.
atk-vin01a0:625_15: Yañhi, brāhmaṇa, tathāgato abhivādeyya vā…pe… āsanena vā nimanteyya, muddhāpi tassa
atk-vin01a0:625_16: puggalassa rattipariyosāne paripākasithilabandhanaṃ vaṇṭā pavuttatālaphalamiva gīvato
atk-vin01a0:626_0: 3. Evaṃ vuttepi brāhmaṇo duppaññatāya tathāgatassa loke jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ asallakkhento
atk-vin01a0:626_1: kevalaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ asahamāno āha – “arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo”ti. Ayaṃ kirassa adhippāyo
atk-vin01a0:626_3: taṃ bhoto gotamassa natthi, tasmā arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo, arasajātiko arasasabhāvoti.
atk-vin01a0:626_4: Athassa bhagavā cittamudubhāvajananatthaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvaṃ pariharanto aññathā
atk-vin01a0:626_5: tassa vacanassatthaṃ attani sandassento “atthi khvesa brāhmaṇa pariyāyo”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:627_0: Tattha pariyāyoti kāraṇaṃ; ayañhi pariyāyasaddo desanā-vāra-kāraṇesu vattati. “Madhupiṇḍikapariyāyotveva
atk-vin01a0:627_1: naṃ dhārehī”tiādīsu hi esa desanāyaṃ vattati. “Kassa nu kho, ānanda, ajja pariyāyo
atk-vin01a0:627_2: bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”ntiādīsu vāre. “Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā aññaṃ pariyāyaṃ ācikkhatu,
atk-vin01a0:627_3: yathāyaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho aññāya saṇṭhaheyyā”tiādīsu kāraṇe. Svāyamidha kāraṇe vattati.
atk-vin01a0:627_4: Tasmā ettha evamattho daṭṭhabbo – atthi kho, brāhmaṇa, etaṃ kāraṇaṃ; yena kāraṇena
atk-vin01a0:627_5: maṃ “arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo”ti vadamāno puggalo sammā vadeyya, avitathavādīti saṅkhyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:627_6: gaccheyya. Katamo pana soti? Ye te brāhmaṇa rūparasā…pe… phoṭṭhabbarasā te tathāgatassa
atk-vin01a0:627_7: pahīnāti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Ye te jātivasena vā upapattivasena vā seṭṭhasammatānampi
atk-vin01a0:627_8: puthujjanānaṃ rūpārammaṇādīni assādentānaṃ abhinandantānaṃ rajjantānaṃ uppajjanti
atk-vin01a0:627_9: kāmasukhassādasaṅkhātā rūparasasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbarasā, ye imaṃ lokaṃ gīvāya
atk-vin01a0:627_10: bandhitvā viya āviñchanti, vatthārammaṇādisāmaggiyañca uppannattā sāmaggirasāti vuccanti,
atk-vin01a0:627_11: te sabbepi tathāgatassa pahīnāti. Mayhaṃ pahīnāti vattabbepi mamākārena attānaṃ anukkhipanto
atk-vin01a0:627_12: dhammaṃ deseti. Desanāvilāso vā esa bhagavato.
atk-vin01a0:628_0: Tattha pahīnāti cittasantānato vigatā jahitā vā. Etasmiṃ panatthe karaṇe sāmivacanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:628_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ariyamaggasatthena ucchinnaṃ taṇhāvijjāmayaṃ mūlametesanti ucchinnamūlā.
atk-vin01a0:628_2: Tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā. Yathā hi tālarukkhaṃ samūlaṃ
atk-vin01a0:628_3: uddharitvā tassa vatthumatte tasmiṃ padese kate na puna tassa tālassa uppatti paññāyati;
atk-vin01a0:628_4: evaṃ ariyamaggasatthena samūle rūpādirase uddharitvā tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena
atk-vin01a0:628_5: vatthumatte cittasantāne kate sabbepi te “tālāvatthukatā”ti vuccanti. Avirūḷhidhammattā
atk-vin01a0:628_6: vā matthakacchinnatālo viya katāti tālāvatthukatā. Yasmā pana evaṃ tālāvatthukatā
atk-vin01a0:628_7: anabhāvaṃkatā honti, yathā nesaṃ pacchābhāvo na hoti, tathā katā honti; tasmā āha
atk-vin01a0:628_9: gatā”tipi pāṭho, tassa anuabhāvaṃ gatāti attho. Tattha padacchedo anuabhāvaṃ gatā
atk-vin01a0:628_10: anabhāvaṃ gatāti, yathā anuacchariyā anacchariyāti. Āyatiṃ anuppādadhammāti anāgate
atk-vin01a0:628_11: anuppajjanakasabhāvā. Ye hi abhāvaṃ gatā, te puna kathaṃ uppajjissanti? Tenāha –
atk-vin01a0:629_0: Ayaṃ kho brāhmaṇa pariyāyoti idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, kāraṇaṃ yena maṃ sammā vadamāno
atk-vin01a0:629_1: vadeyya “arasarūpo samaṇo gotamo”ti. No ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesīti yañca kho
atk-vin01a0:629_2: tvaṃ sandhāya vadesi, so pariyāyo na hoti. Kasmā pana bhagavā evamāha? Nanu evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:629_3: vutte yo brāhmaṇena vutto sāmaggiraso tassa attani vijjamānatā anuññātā hotīti. Vuccate,
atk-vin01a0:629_4: na hoti. Yo hi taṃ sāmaggirasaṃ kātuṃ bhabbo hutvā na karoti, so tadabhāvena arasarūpoti
atk-vin01a0:629_5: vattabbo bhaveyya. Bhagavā pana abhabbova etaṃ kātuṃ, tenassa karaṇe abhabbataṃ pakāsento
atk-vin01a0:629_6: āha – “no ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesī”ti. Yaṃ pariyāyaṃ sandhāya tvaṃ maṃ “arasarūpo”ti
atk-vin01a0:630_0: 4. Evaṃ brāhmaṇo attanā adhippetaṃ arasarūpataṃ āropetuṃ asakkonto athāparaṃ nibbhogo
atk-vin01a0:630_1: bhavaṃ gotamotiādimāha. Sabbapariyāyesu cettha vuttanayeneva yojanakkamaṃ viditvā
atk-vin01a0:630_2: sandhāya bhāsitamattaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ. Brāhmaṇo tameva vayovuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanakammādiṃ
atk-vin01a0:630_3: loke sāmaggiparibhogoti maññamāno tadabhāvena bhagavantaṃ nibbhogoti āha. Bhagavā
atk-vin01a0:630_4: pana yvāyaṃ rūpādīsu sattānaṃ chandarāgaparibhogo tadabhāvaṃ attani sampassamāno
atk-vin01a0:631_0: 5. Puna brāhmaṇo yaṃ loke vayovuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikulasamudācārakammaṃ lokiyā karonti
atk-vin01a0:631_1: tassa akiriyaṃ sampassamāno bhagavantaṃ akiriyavādoti āha. Bhagavā pana, yasmā kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:631_2: akiriyaṃ vadati tasmā, taṃ akiriyavādaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a0:631_3: Tattha ca kāyaduccaritanti pāṇātipāta-adinnādāna-micchācāracetanā veditabbā. Vacīduccaritanti
atk-vin01a0:631_5: veditabbā. Ṭhapetvā te dhamme, avasesā akusalā dhammā “anekavihitā pāpakā akusalā
atk-vin01a0:632_0: 6. Puna brāhmaṇo tameva abhivādanādikammaṃ bhagavati apassanto imaṃ “āgamma ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:632_1: lokatanti lokapaveṇī ucchijjatī”ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ ucchedavādoti āha. Bhagavā
atk-vin01a0:632_2: pana yasmā aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittesu pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa dvīsu akusalacittesu
atk-vin01a0:632_3: uppajjamānakadosassa ca anāgāmimaggena ucchedaṃ vadati. Sabbākusalasambhavassa pana
atk-vin01a0:632_4: niravasesassa mohassa arahattamaggena ucchedaṃ vadati. Ṭhapetvā te tayo, avasesānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:632_5: pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathānurūpaṃ catūhi maggehi ucchedaṃ vadati; tasmā
atk-vin01a0:632_6: taṃ ucchedavādaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a0:633_0: 7. Puna brāhmaṇo “jigucchati maññe samaṇo gotamo idaṃ vayovuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikulasamudācārakammaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:633_1: tena taṃ na karotī”ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ jegucchīti āha. Bhagavā pana yasmā jigucchati
atk-vin01a0:633_2: kāyaduccaritādīhi; kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yañca tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ, yañca catubbidhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:633_3: vacīduccaritaṃ, yañca tividhaṃ manoduccaritaṃ, yā ca ṭhapetvā tāni duccaritāni avasesānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:633_4: lāmakaṭṭhena pāpakānaṃ akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpatti samāpajjanā
atk-vin01a0:633_5: samaṅgibhāvo, taṃ sabbampi gūthaṃ viya maṇḍanakajātiyo puriso jigucchati hirīyati,
atk-vin01a0:633_6: tasmā taṃ jegucchitaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti. Tattha “kāyaduccaritenā”ti
atk-vin01a0:634_0: 8. Puna brāhmaṇo tameva abhivādanādikammaṃ bhagavati apassanto “ayaṃ imaṃ lokajeṭṭhakakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:634_1: vineti vināseti, atha vā yasmā etaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ na karoti tasmā ayaṃ vinetabbo niggaṇhitabbo”ti
atk-vin01a0:634_2: maññamāno bhagavantaṃ venayikoti āha. Tatrāyaṃ padattho – vinayatīti vinayo, vināsetīti
atk-vin01a0:634_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Vinayo eva venayiko, vinayaṃ vā arahatīti venayiko, niggahaṃ arahatīti
atk-vin01a0:634_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Bhagavā pana, yasmā rāgādīnaṃ vinayāya vūpasamāya dhammaṃ deseti, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:634_5: venayiko hoti. Ayameva cettha padattho – vinayāya dhammaṃ desetīti venayiko. Vicitrā
atk-vin01a0:634_6: hi taddhitavutti! Svāyaṃ taṃ venayikabhāvaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a0:635_0: 9. Puna brāhmaṇo yasmā abhivādanādīni sāmīcikammāni karontā vayovuḍḍhe tosenti hāsenti,
atk-vin01a0:635_1: akarontā pana tāpenti vihesenti domanassaṃ nesaṃ uppādenti, bhagavā ca tāni na karoti;
atk-vin01a0:635_2: tasmā “ayaṃ vayovuḍḍhe tapatī”ti maññamāno sappurisācāravirahitattā vā “kapaṇapuriso
atk-vin01a0:635_3: aya”nti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ tapassīti āha. Tatrāyaṃ padattho – tapatīti tapo, roseti
atk-vin01a0:635_4: vihesetīti vuttaṃ hoti, sāmīcikammākaraṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tapo assa atthīti tapassī.
atk-vin01a0:635_5: Dutiye atthavikappe byañjanāni avicāretvā loke kapaṇapuriso “tapassī”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:635_6: Bhagavā pana ye akusalā dhammā lokaṃ tapanato tapanīyāti vuccanti, tesaṃ pahīnattā
atk-vin01a0:635_7: yasmā tapassīti saṅkhyaṃ gato, tasmā taṃ tapassitaṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi
atk-vin01a0:635_8: pariyāyaṃ anujānāti. Tatrāyaṃ padattho – tapantīti tapā, akusaladhammānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:635_9: Vuttampi hetaṃ – “idha tappati pecca tappatī”ti. Tathā te tape assi nirassi pahāsi
atk-vin01a0:636_0: 10. Puna brāhmaṇo taṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ devalokagabbhasampattiyā devalokapaṭisandhipaṭilābhāya
atk-vin01a0:636_1: saṃvattatīti maññamāno bhagavati cassa abhāvaṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ apagabbhoti āha.
atk-vin01a0:636_2: Kodhavasena vā bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassentopi evamāha.
atk-vin01a0:636_3: Tatrāyaṃ padattho – gabbhato apagatoti apagabbho, abhabbo devalokūpapattiṃ pāpuṇitunti
atk-vin01a0:636_4: adhippāyo. Hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbho, devalokagabbhaparibāhirattā āyatiṃ hīnagabbhapaṭilābhabhāgīti,
atk-vin01a0:636_5: hīno vāssa mātukucchimhi gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo. Bhagavato pana yasmā āyatiṃ
atk-vin01a0:636_6: gabbhaseyyā apagatā, tasmā so taṃ apagabbhataṃ attani sampassamāno aparampi pariyāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:636_7: anujānāti. Tatra ca yassa kho brāhmaṇa āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbatti pahīnāti
atk-vin01a0:636_8: etesaṃ padānaṃ evamattho daṭṭhabbo – brāhmaṇa, yassa puggalassa anāgate gabbhaseyyā,
atk-vin01a0:636_9: punabbhave ca abhinibbatti anuttarena maggena vihatakāraṇattā pahīnāti. Gabbhaseyyaggahaṇena
atk-vin01a0:636_10: cettha jalābujayoni gahitā. Punabbhavābhinibbattiggahaṇena itarā tissopi.
atk-vin01a0:637_0: Apica gabbhassa seyyā gabbhaseyyā, punabbhavo eva abhinibbatti punabbhavābhinibbattīti
atk-vin01a0:637_1: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Yathā ca viññāṇaṭṭhitīti vuttepi na viññāṇato aññā ṭhiti
atk-vin01a0:637_2: atthi, evamidhāpi na gabbhato aññā seyyāti veditabbā. Abhinibbatti ca nāma yasmā
atk-vin01a0:637_3: punabbhavabhūtāpi apunabbhavabhūtāpi atthi, idha ca punabbhavabhūtā adhippetā. Tasmā
atk-vin01a0:638_0: 11. Evaṃ āgatakālato paṭṭhāya arasarūpatādīhi aṭṭhahi akkosavatthūhi akkosantampi
atk-vin01a0:638_1: brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavā dhammissaro dhammarājā dhammassāmī tathāgato anukampāya sītaleneva
atk-vin01a0:638_2: cakkhunā olokento yaṃ dhammadhātuṃ paṭivijjhitvā desanāvilāsappatto hoti, tassā dhammadhātuyā
atk-vin01a0:638_3: suppaṭividdhattā vigatavalāhake antalikkhe samabbhuggato puṇṇacando viya saradakāle
atk-vin01a0:638_4: sūriyo viya ca brāhmaṇassa hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamanto tāniyeva akkosavatthūni tena
atk-vin01a0:638_5: tena pariyāyena aññathā dassetvā, punapi attano karuṇāvipphāraṃ aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi
atk-vin01a0:638_7: pakāsento “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo kevalaṃ palitasirakhaṇḍadantavalittacatādīhi attano vuḍḍhabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:638_8: sañjānāti, no ca kho jānāti attānaṃ jātiyā anugataṃ jarāya anusaṭaṃ byādhinā abhibhūtaṃ
atk-vin01a0:638_9: maraṇena abbhāhataṃ vaṭṭakhāṇubhūtaṃ ajja maritvā puna sveva uttānasayanadārakabhāvagamanīyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:638_10: Mahantena kho pana ussāhena mama santikaṃ āgato, tadassa āgamanaṃ sātthakaṃ hotū”ti
atk-vin01a0:638_11: cintetvā imasmiṃ loke attano appaṭisamaṃ purejātabhāvaṃ dassento seyyathāpi brāhmaṇātiādinā
atk-vin01a0:639_0: Tattha seyyathāti opammatthe nipāto; pīti sambhāvanatthe; ubhayenāpi yathā nāma brāhmaṇāti
atk-vin01a0:639_1: dasseti. Kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vāti ettha pana kiñcāpi kukkuṭiyā
atk-vin01a0:639_2: vuttappakārato ūnādhikānipi aṇḍāni honti, atha kho vacanasiliṭṭhatāya evaṃ vuttanti
atk-vin01a0:639_3: veditabbaṃ. Evañhi loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hoti. Tānassūti tāni assu, bhaveyyunti vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:639_4: hoti. Kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitānīti tāya janettiyā kukkuṭiyā pakkhe pasāretvā tesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:639_5: upari sayantiyā sammā adhisayitāni. Sammā pariseditānīti kālena kālaṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā
atk-vin01a0:639_6: suṭṭhu samantato seditāni, usmīkatānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sammā paribhāvitānīti kālena
atk-vin01a0:639_7: kālaṃ suṭṭhu samantato bhāvitāni, kukkuṭagandhaṃ gāhāpitānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:640_0: Idāni yasmā tāya kukkuṭiyā evaṃ tīhi pakārehi tāni aṇḍāni paripāliyamānāni na pūtīni
atk-vin01a0:640_1: honti. Yopi nesaṃ allasineho so pariyādānaṃ gacchati. Kapālaṃ tanukaṃ hoti, pādanakhasikhā
atk-vin01a0:640_2: ca mukhatuṇḍakañca kharaṃ hoti, kukkuṭapotakā paripākaṃ gacchanti, kapālassa tanukattā
atk-vin01a0:640_3: bahiddhā āloko anto paññāyati. Atha te kukkuṭapotakā “ciraṃ vata mayaṃ saṅkuṭitahatthapādā
atk-vin01a0:640_4: sambādhe sayimha, ayañca bahi āloko dissati, ettha dāni no sukhavihāro bhavissatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:640_5: nikkhamitukāmā hutvā kapālaṃ pādena paharanti, gīvaṃ pasārenti. Tato taṃ kapālaṃ
atk-vin01a0:640_6: dvedhā bhijjati, kukkuṭapotakā pakkhe vidhunantā taṅkhaṇānurūpaṃ viravantā nikkhamanti.
atk-vin01a0:640_7: Evaṃ nikkhamantānañca nesaṃ yo paṭhamataraṃ nikkhamati so ‘jeṭṭho’ti vuccati. Tasmā
atk-vin01a0:640_8: bhagavā tāya upamāya attano jeṭṭhakabhāvaṃ sādhetukāmo brāhmaṇaṃ pucchi – “yo nu
atk-vin01a0:640_9: kho tesaṃ kukkuṭacchāpakānaṃ…pe… kinti svassa vacanīyo”ti. Tattha kukkuṭacchāpakānanti
atk-vin01a0:640_10: kukkuṭapotakānaṃ. Kinti svassa vacanīyoti so kinti vacanīyo assa, kinti vattabbo
atk-vin01a0:640_11: bhaveyya jeṭṭho vā kaniṭṭho vāti. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:641_0: Tato brāhmaṇo āha – “jeṭṭhotissa bho gotama vacanīyo”ti. Bho, gotama, so jeṭṭho iti
atk-vin01a0:641_1: assa vacanīyo. Kasmāti ce? So hi nesaṃ jeṭṭho, tasmā so nesaṃ vuḍḍhataroti attho.
atk-vin01a0:641_2: Athassa bhagavā opammaṃ sampaṭipādento āha – “evameva kho ahaṃ brāhmaṇā”tiādi. Yathā
atk-vin01a0:641_3: so kukkuṭacchāpako jeṭṭhoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati; evaṃ ahampi avijjāgatāya pajāya. Avijjāgatāyāti
atk-vin01a0:641_4: avijjā vuccati aññāṇaṃ, tattha gatāya. Pajāyāti sattādhivacanametaṃ. Tasmā ettha
atk-vin01a0:641_5: avijjaṇḍakosassa anto paviṭṭhesu sattesūti evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo. Aṇḍabhūtāyāti aṇḍe
atk-vin01a0:641_6: bhūtāya jātāya sañjātāya. Yathā hi aṇḍe nibbattā ekacce sattā aṇḍabhūtāti vuccanti;
atk-vin01a0:641_7: evamayaṃ sabbāpi pajā avijjaṇḍakose nibbattattā aṇḍabhūtāti vuccati. Pariyonaddhāyāti
atk-vin01a0:641_8: tena avijjaṇḍakosena samantato onaddhāya baddhāya veṭhitāya. Avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvāti
atk-vin01a0:641_9: taṃ avijjāmayaṃ aṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā. Ekova loketi sakalepi lokasannivāse ahameva
atk-vin01a0:641_10: eko adutiyo. Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti anuttaranti uttaravirahitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:641_11: sabbaseṭṭhaṃ. Sammāsambodhinti sammā sāmañca bodhiṃ; atha vā pasatthaṃ sundarañca
atk-vin01a0:641_12: bodhiṃ; bodhīti rukkhopi maggopi sabbaññutaññāṇampi nibbānampi vuccati. “Bodhirukkhamūle
atk-vin01a0:641_13: paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti ca “antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhi”nti ca āgataṭṭhānesu hi
atk-vin01a0:641_14: rukkho bodhīti vuccati. “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne maggo.
atk-vin01a0:641_16: amataṃ asaṅkhata”nti āgataṭṭhāne nibbānaṃ. Idha pana bhagavato arahattamaggañāṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:641_17: adhippetaṃ. Sabbaññutaññāṇantipi vadanti. Aññesaṃ arahattamaggo anuttarā bodhi hoti,
atk-vin01a0:641_18: na hotīti? Na hoti. Kasmā? Asabbaguṇadāyakattā. Tesañhi kassaci arahattamaggo arahattaphalameva
atk-vin01a0:641_19: deti, kassaci tisso vijjā, kassaci cha abhiññā, kassaci catasso paṭisambhidā, kassaci
atk-vin01a0:641_20: sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ. Paccekabuddhānampi paccekabodhiñāṇameva deti. Buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:641_21: deti, abhiseko viya rañño sabbalokissariyabhāvaṃ. Tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā
atk-vin01a0:641_22: bodhi na hotīti. Abhisambuddhoti abbhaññāsiṃ paṭivijjhiṃ; pattomhi adhigatomhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:642_0: Idāni yadetaṃ bhagavatā “evameva kho ahaṃ brāhmaṇā”ti ādinā nayena vuttaṃ opammasampaṭipādanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:642_1: taṃ evamatthena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā veditabbaṃ. Yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā attano aṇḍesu
atk-vin01a0:642_3: bhagavato attano cittasantāne aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti tividhānupassanākaraṇaṃ. Kukkuṭiyā
atk-vin01a0:642_4: tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena
atk-vin01a0:642_5: vipassanāñāṇassa aparihāni. Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍānaṃ allasinehapariyādānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:642_7: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍakapālānaṃ tanubhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato
atk-vin01a0:642_11: Kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭacchāpakassa paripākakālo viya bodhisattabhūtassa
atk-vin01a0:643_0: Tato kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭacchāpakassa pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena
atk-vin01a0:643_1: vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā abhinibbhidākālo viya bodhisattabhūtassa
atk-vin01a0:643_2: bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā anupubbādhigatena
atk-vin01a0:643_3: arahattamaggena avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā sakalabuddhaguṇasacchikatakālo veditabboti.
atk-vin01a0:644_0: Svāhaṃ brāhmaṇa jeṭṭho seṭṭho lokassāti so ahaṃ brāhmaṇa yathā tesaṃ kukkuṭapotakānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:644_1: paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhinibbhido kukkuṭapotako jeṭṭho hoti; evaṃ avijjāgatāya
atk-vin01a0:644_2: pajāya taṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamataraṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātattā jeṭṭho vuḍḍhataroti
atk-vin01a0:644_3: saṅkhyaṃ gato. Sabbaguṇehi pana appaṭisamattā seṭṭhoti.
atk-vin01a0:645_0: Evaṃ bhagavā attano anuttaraṃ jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ brāhmaṇassa pakāsetvā idāni yāya
atk-vin01a0:645_1: paṭipadāya taṃ adhigato taṃ paṭipadaṃ pubbabhāgato pabhuti dassetuṃ “āraddhaṃ kho
atk-vin01a0:645_2: pana me brāhmaṇā”tiādimāha. Imaṃ vā bhagavato anuttaraṃ jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ sutvā
atk-vin01a0:645_3: brāhmaṇassa cittamevamuppannaṃ – “kāya nu kho paṭipadāya imaṃ patto”ti. Tassa cittamaññāya
atk-vin01a0:645_4: “imāyāhaṃ paṭipadāya imaṃ anuttaraṃ jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ patto”ti dassento evamāha.
atk-vin01a0:645_5: Tattha āraddhaṃ kho pana me brāhmaṇa vīriyaṃ ahosīti brāhmaṇa, na mayā ayaṃ anuttaro
atk-vin01a0:645_6: jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvo kusītena muṭṭhassatinā sāraddhakāyena vikkhittacittena adhigato,
atk-vin01a0:645_7: apica kho tadadhigamāya āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ ahosi, bodhimaṇḍe nisinnena
atk-vin01a0:645_8: mayā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ ahosi, paggahitaṃ asithilappavattitanti
atk-vin01a0:645_9: vuttaṃ hoti. Āraddhattāyeva ca me taṃ asallīnaṃ ahosi. Na kevalañca vīriyameva, satipi
atk-vin01a0:645_10: me ārammaṇābhimukhībhāvena upaṭṭhitā ahosi. Upaṭṭhitattāyeva ca asammuṭṭhā. Passaddho
atk-vin01a0:645_11: kāyo asāraddhoti kāyacittapassaddhivasena kāyopi me passaddho ahosi. Tattha yasmā
atk-vin01a0:645_12: nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hoti, tasmā nāmakāyo rūpakāyoti avisesetvāva
atk-vin01a0:645_13: passaddho kāyoti vuttaṃ. Asāraddhoti so ca kho passaddhattāyeva asāraddho, vigatadarathoti
atk-vin01a0:645_14: vuttaṃ hoti. Samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagganti cittampi me sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:645_15: appitaṃ viya ahosi; samāhitattā eva ca ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandananti. Ettāvatā jhānassa
atk-vin01a0:647_0: Idāni imāya paṭipadāya adhigataṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā vijjattayapariyosānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:647_1: visesaṃ dassento “so kho aha”nti ādimāha. Tattha vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi
atk-vin01a0:647_2: dhammehītiādīnaṃ kiñcāpi “tattha katame kāmā? Chando kāmo, rāgo kāmo, chandarāgo
atk-vin01a0:647_3: kāmo; saṅkappo kāmo, rāgo kāmo, saṅkapparāgo kāmo – ime vuccanti kāmā. Tattha katame
atk-vin01a0:647_4: akusalā dhammā? Kāmacchando…pe… vicikicchā – ime vuccanti akusalā dhammā. Iti imehi
atk-vin01a0:647_5: ca kāmehi imehi ca akusalehi dhammehi vivitto hoti pavivitto, tena vuccati – ‘vivicceva
atk-vin01a0:647_6: kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī”’tiādinā nayena vibhaṅgeyeva attho vutto. Tathāpi
atk-vin01a0:647_7: aṭṭhakathānayaṃ vinā na suṭṭhu pākaṭoti aṭṭhakathānayeneva naṃ pakāsayissāma.
atk-vin01a0:648_0: Seyyathidaṃ – vivicceva kāmehīti kāmehi viviccitvā vinā hutvā apasakketvā. Yo panāyamettha
atk-vin01a0:648_1: evakāro, so niyamatthoti veditabbo. Yasmā ca niyamattho, tasmā tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:648_2: upasampajja viharaṇasamaye avijjamānānampi kāmānaṃ tassa paṭhamajjhānassa paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:648_3: kāmapariccāgeneva cassa adhigamaṃ dīpeti. Kathaṃ? “Vivicceva kāmehī”ti evañhi niyame
atk-vin01a0:648_4: kariyamāne idaṃ paññāyati. Nūnimassa jhānassa kāmā paṭipakkhabhūtā, yesu sati idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:648_5: na pavattati, andhakāre sati padīpo viya, tesaṃ pariccāgeneva cassa adhigamo hoti,
atk-vin01a0:649_0: Tattha siyā – “kasmā panesa pubbapadeyeva vutto na uttarapade, kiṃ akusalehi dhammehi
atk-vin01a0:649_1: aviviccāpi jhānaṃ upasampajja vihareyyā”ti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tannissaraṇato
atk-vin01a0:649_2: hi pubbapadeeva esa vutto. Kāmadhātusamatikkamanato hi kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato ca idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:649_3: jhānaṃ kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. Yathāha – “kāmānametaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, yadidaṃ nekkhamma”nti.
atk-vin01a0:649_4: Uttarapadepi pana yathā “idheva, bhikkhave, paṭhamo samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti
atk-vin01a0:649_5: ettha evakāro ānetvā vuccati, evaṃ vattabbo. Na hi sakkā ito aññehipi nīvaraṇasaṅkhātehi
atk-vin01a0:649_6: akusalehi dhammehi avivicca jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ. Tasmā “vivicceva kāmehi
atk-vin01a0:649_7: vivicceva akusalehi dhammehī”ti evaṃ padadvayepi esa daṭṭhabbo. Padadvayepi ca kiñcāpi
atk-vin01a0:649_8: “viviccā”ti iminā sādhāraṇavacanena tadaṅgavivekādayo kāyavivekādayo ca sabbepi vivekā
atk-vin01a0:649_9: saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Tathāpi kāyaviveko, cittaviveko, vikkhambhanavivekoti tayo eva
atk-vin01a0:649_10: idha daṭṭhabbā. “Kāmehī”ti iminā pana padena ye ca niddese “katame vatthukāmā manāpiyā
atk-vin01a0:649_11: rūpā”tiādinā nayena vatthukāmā vuttā, ye ca tattheva vibhaṅge ca “chando kāmo”tiādinā
atk-vin01a0:649_12: nayena kilesakāmā vuttā, te sabbepi saṅgahitā icceva daṭṭhabbā. Evañhi sati “vivicceva
atk-vin01a0:649_13: kāmehī”ti vatthukāmehipi viviccevāti attho yujjati. Tena kāyaviveko vutto hoti.
atk-vin01a0:650_0: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti kilesakāmehi sabbākusalehi dhammehi vā viviccāti attho
atk-vin01a0:650_1: yujjati. Tena cittaviveko vutto hoti. Purimena cettha vatthukāmehi vivekavacanatoyeva
atk-vin01a0:650_3: vibhāvito hoti. Evaṃ vatthukāmakilesakāmavivekavacanatoyeva ca etesaṃ paṭhamena saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:650_4: dutiyena saṃkilesappahānaṃ; paṭhamena lolabhāvassa hetupariccāgo, dutiyena bālabhāvassa;
atk-vin01a0:650_5: paṭhamena ca payogasuddhi, dutiyena āsayaposanaṃ vibhāvitaṃ hotīti viññātabbaṃ. Esa
atk-vin01a0:651_0: Kilesakāmapakkhe pana chandoti ca rāgoti ca evamādīhi anekabhedo kāmacchandoyeva
atk-vin01a0:651_1: kāmoti adhippeto. So ca akusalapariyāpannopi samāno, “tattha katamo kāmachando kāmo”tiādinā
atk-vin01a0:651_2: nayena vibhaṅge jhānapaṭipakkhato visuṃ vutto. Kilesakāmattā vā purimapade vutto,
atk-vin01a0:651_3: akusalapariyāpannattā dutiyapade. Anekabhedato cassa kāmatoti avatvā kāmehīti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:651_4: Aññesampi ca dhammānaṃ akusalabhāve vijjamāne “tattha katame akusalā dhammā kāmacchando”tiādinā
atk-vin01a0:651_6: Nīvaraṇāni hi jhānaṅgapaccanīkāni, tesaṃ jhānaṅgāneva paṭipakkhāni, viddhaṃsakānīti
atk-vin01a0:651_7: vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi “samādhi kāmacchandassa paṭipakkho, pīti byāpādassa, vitakko
atk-vin01a0:651_8: thinamiddhassa, sukhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassa, vicāro vicikicchāyā”ti peṭake vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:652_0: Evamettha “vivicceva kāmehī”ti iminā kāmacchandassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hoti.
atk-vin01a0:652_1: “Vivicca akusalehi dhammehī”ti iminā pañcannampi nīvaraṇānaṃ. Aggahitaggahaṇena pana
atk-vin01a0:652_2: paṭhamena kāmacchandassa, dutiyena sesanīvaraṇānaṃ. Tathā paṭhamena tīsu akusalamūlesu
atk-vin01a0:652_6: dutiyena avijjāya taṃsampayuttakānañca. Apica paṭhamena lobhasampayuttaaṭṭhacittuppādānaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:652_7: dutiyena sesānaṃ catunnaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:652_8: Ayaṃ tāva “vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī”ti ettha atthappakāsanā.
atk-vin01a0:653_0: Ettāvatā ca paṭhamassa jhānassa pahānaṅgaṃ dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgaṃ dassento
atk-vin01a0:653_1: savitakkaṃ savicārantiādimāha. Tattha vitakkanaṃ vitakko, ūhananti vuttaṃ hoti. Svāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:653_2: ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇo, āhananapariyāhananaraso. Tathā hi “tena yogāvacaro
atk-vin01a0:653_3: ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotī”ti vuccati. Ārammaṇe cittassa ānayanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-vin01a0:653_4: Vicaraṇaṃ vicāro, anusañcaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo,
atk-vin01a0:653_5: tattha sahajātānuyojanaraso, cittassa anuppabandhanapaccupaṭṭhāno. Santepi ca nesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:653_6: katthaci avippayoge oḷārikaṭṭhena ghaṇṭābhighātasaddo viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto
atk-vin01a0:653_7: vitakko, sukhumaṭṭhena anuravo viya anuppabandho vicāro. Vipphāravā cettha vitakko
atk-vin01a0:653_8: paripphandanabhāvo cittassa, ākāse uppatitukāmassa pakkhino pakkhavikkhepo viya padumābhimukhapāto
atk-vin01a0:653_9: viya ca gandhānubandhacetaso bhamarassa. Santavutti vicāro nātiparipphandanabhāvo
atk-vin01a0:653_10: cittassa, ākāse uppatitassa pakkhino pakkhappasāraṇaṃ viya paribbhamanaṃ viya ca
atk-vin01a0:653_11: padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa padumassa uparibhāge. So pana nesaṃ viseso paṭhama-dutiyajjhānesu
atk-vin01a0:653_12: pākaṭo hoti. Iti iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena saha vattati rukkho viya pupphena
atk-vin01a0:653_13: ca phalena cāti idaṃ jhānaṃ “savitakkaṃ savicāra”nti vuccati. Vibhaṅge pana “iminā
atk-vin01a0:653_14: ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena upeto hoti samupeto”tiādinā nayena puggalādhiṭṭhānā
atk-vin01a0:653_15: desanā katā. Attho pana tatrāpi evameva daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a0:654_0: Vivekajanti ettha vivitti viveko, nīvaraṇavigamoti attho. Vivittoti vā viveko, nīvaraṇavivitto
atk-vin01a0:654_1: jhānasampayuttadhammarāsīti attho. Tasmā vivekā, tasmiṃ vā viveke jātanti vivekajaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:654_2: Pītisukhanti ettha pinayatīti pīti, sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇā kāyacittapīnanarasā, pharaṇarasā
atk-vin01a0:654_3: vā, odagyapaccupaṭṭhānā. Sukhanaṃ sukhaṃ, suṭṭhu vā khādati khanati ca kāyacittābādhanti
atk-vin01a0:654_4: sukhaṃ, taṃ sātalakkhaṇaṃ, sampayuttakānaṃ upabrūhanarasaṃ, anuggahapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:654_5: Satipi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge iṭṭhārammaṇapaṭilābhatuṭṭhi pīti, paṭiladdharasānubhavanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:654_6: sukhaṃ. Yattha pīti tattha sukhaṃ, yattha sukhaṃ tattha na niyamato pīti. Saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahitā
atk-vin01a0:654_8: viya pīti, vanacchāyappavesanaudakaparibhogesu viya sukhaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye
atk-vin01a0:654_9: pākaṭabhāvato cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ayañca pīti, idañca sukhaṃ, assa jhānassa,
atk-vin01a0:654_10: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ “pītisukha”nti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:655_0: Atha vā pīti ca sukhañca pītisukhaṃ, dhammavinayādayo viya. Vivekajaṃ pītisukhamassa
atk-vin01a0:655_1: jhānassa, asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti evampi vivekajaṃpītisukhaṃ. Yatheva hi jhānaṃ, evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:655_2: pītisukhaṃ pettha vivekajameva hoti, tañcassa atthīti tasmā ekapadeneva “vivekajaṃ
atk-vin01a0:655_3: pītisukha”ntipi vattuṃ yujjati. Vibhaṅge pana “idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagata”ntiādinā
atk-vin01a0:655_4: nayenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Attho pana tatrāpi evameva daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a0:656_0: Paṭhamanti gaṇanānupubbatā paṭhamaṃ, idaṃ paṭhamaṃ samāpajjatītipi paṭhamaṃ. Paccanīkadhamme
atk-vin01a0:656_1: jhāpetīti jhānaṃ, iminā yogino jhāyantītipi jhānaṃ, paccanīkadhamme ḍahanti gocaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:656_2: vā cintentīti attho. Sayaṃ vā taṃ jhāyati upanijjhāyatīti jhānaṃ, teneva upanijjhāyanalakkhaṇanti
atk-vin01a0:656_3: vuccati. Tadetaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ, lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:656_4: ārammaṇūpanijjhānanti saha upacārena aṭṭha samāpattiyo vuccanti. Kasmā? Kasiṇādiārammaṇūpanijjhāyanato.
atk-vin01a0:656_6: Ettha hi vipassanā aniccalakkhaṇādīni upanijjhāyati, vipassanāya upanijjhāyanakiccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:656_7: pana maggena sijjhatīti maggo lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti vuccati. Phalaṃ pana nirodhassa
atk-vin01a0:656_8: tathalakkhaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti vuccati. Imasmiṃ panatthe ārammaṇūpanijjhānameva
atk-vin01a0:657_0: Etthāha – “katamaṃ pana taṃ jhānaṃ nāma, yaṃ savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ…pe… pītisukhanti
atk-vin01a0:657_1: evaṃ apadesaṃ arahatī”ti? Vuccate – yathā sadhano saparijanotiādīsu ṭhapetvā dhanañca
atk-vin01a0:657_2: parijanañca añño apadesāraho hoti, evaṃ ṭhapetvā vitakkādidhamme aññaṃ apadesārahaṃ
atk-vin01a0:657_3: natthi. Yathā pana sarathā sapatti senāti vutte senaṅgesuyeva senāsammuti, evamidha
atk-vin01a0:657_4: pañcasu aṅgesuyeva jhānasammuti veditabbā. Katamesu pañcasu? Vitakko, vicāro, pīti,
atk-vin01a0:657_5: sukhaṃ, cittekaggatāti etesu. Etāneva hissa “savitakkaṃ savicāra”ntiādinā nayena
atk-vin01a0:657_6: aṅgabhāvena vuttāni. Avuttattā ekaggatā aṅgaṃ na hotīti ce tañca na. Kasmā? Vuttattā
atk-vin01a0:657_7: eva. Sāpi hi vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:657_8: vuttāyeva. Tasmā yathā savitakkaṃ savicāranti, evaṃ sacittekaggatanti idha avuttepi
atk-vin01a0:657_9: iminā vibhaṅgavacanena cittekaggatāpi aṅgamevāti veditabbā. Yena hi adhippāyena bhagavatā
atk-vin01a0:657_10: uddeso kato, so eva tena vibhaṅgepi pakāsitoti.
atk-vin01a0:658_0: Upasampajjāti upagantvā, pāpuṇitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upasampādayitvā vā, nipphādetvāti
atk-vin01a0:658_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Vibhaṅge pana “upasampajjāti paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti
atk-vin01a0:658_2: sampatti phusanā samphusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā”ti vuttaṃ. Tassāpi evamevattho
atk-vin01a0:658_3: veditabbo. Vihāsinti bodhimaṇḍe nisajjasaṅkhātena iriyāpathavihārena itivuttappakārajhānasamaṅgī
atk-vin01a0:658_4: hutvā attabhāvassa iriyaṃ vuttiṃ pālanaṃ yapanaṃ yāpanaṃ cāraṃ vihāraṃ abhinipphādesinti
atk-vin01a0:658_5: attho. Vuttañhetaṃ vibhaṅge – “viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati
atk-vin01a0:659_0: Kiṃ pana katvā bhagavā imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsīti? Kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā. Kataraṃ?
atk-vin01a0:659_1: Ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ. Aññena tadatthikena kiṃ kātabbanti? Aññenapi etaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:659_2: pathavīkasiṇādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ bhāvetabbaṃ. Tesaṃ bhāvanānayo visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva
atk-vin01a0:659_3: veditabbo. Idha pana vuccamāne atibhāriyaṃ vinayanidānaṃ hoti, tasmā pāḷiyā atthappakāsanamattameva karomāti.
atk-vin01a0:662_0: Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti vitakkassa ca vicārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vūpasamā
atk-vin01a0:662_1: samatikkamā; dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe apātubhāvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha kiñcāpi dutiyajjhāne
atk-vin01a0:662_2: sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā na santi, aññeyeva hi paṭhamajjhāne phassādayo, aññe
atk-vin01a0:662_3: idha; oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:662_4: adhigamo hotīti dīpanatthaṃ “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:662_5: Ajjhattanti idha niyakajjhattamadhippetaṃ. Vibhaṅge pana “ajjhattaṃ paccatta”nti
atk-vin01a0:662_6: ettakameva vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana niyakajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ, tasmā attani jātaṃ attano
atk-vin01a0:663_0: Sampasādananti sampasādanaṃ vuccati saddhā. Sampasādanayogato jhānampi sampasādanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:663_1: nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viya. Yasmā vā taṃ jhānaṃ sampasādanasamannāgatattā vitakkavicārakkhobhavūpasamanena
atk-vin01a0:663_2: ceto sampasādayati, tasmāpi sampasādananti vuttaṃ. Imasmiñca atthavikappe sampasādanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:663_3: cetasoti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo. Purimasmiṃ pana atthavikappe cetasoti etaṃ
atk-vin01a0:663_4: ekodibhāvena saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ atthayojanā – eko udetīti ekodi, vitakkavicārehi
atk-vin01a0:663_5: anajjhārūḷhattā aggo seṭṭho hutvā udetīti attho. Seṭṭhopi hi loke ekoti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:663_6: Vitakkavicāravirahato vā eko asahāyo hutvātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Atha vā sampayuttadhamme
atk-vin01a0:663_7: udāyatīti udi, uṭṭhāpetīti attho. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena eko ca so udi cāti ekodi, samādhissetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:663_8: adhivacanaṃ. Iti imaṃ ekodiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhayatīti idaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ ekodibhāvaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:663_9: So panāyaṃ ekodi yasmā cetaso, na sattassa na jīvassa, tasmā etaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvanti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:664_0: Nanu cāyaṃ saddhā paṭhamajjhānepi atthi, ayañca ekodināmako samādhi; atha kasmā idameva
atk-vin01a0:664_1: sampasādanaṃ “cetaso ekodibhāvañcā”ti vuttanti? Vuccate – aduñhi paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena
atk-vin01a0:664_2: vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti, tasmā satiyāpi saddhāya sampasādananti
atk-vin01a0:664_3: na vuttaṃ. Na suppasannattāyeva cettha samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo, tasmā ekodibhāvantipi
atk-vin01a0:664_4: na vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana jhāne vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā,
atk-vin01a0:664_5: balavasaddhāsahāyappaṭilābheneva ca samādhipi pākaṭo; tasmā idameva evaṃ vuttanti
atk-vin01a0:664_6: veditabbaṃ. Vibhaṅge pana “sampasādananti yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo,
atk-vin01a0:664_7: cetaso ekodibhāvanti yā cittassa ṭhiti…pe… sammāsamādhī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:664_8: vuttena panetena saddhiṃ ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā yathā na virujjhati aññadatthu saṃsandati
atk-vin01a0:665_0: Avitakkaṃ avicāranti bhāvanāya pahīnattā etasmiṃ etassa vā vitakko natthīti avitakkaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:665_1: Imināva nayena avicāraṃ. Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ “iti ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā
atk-vin01a0:665_2: honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā
atk-vin01a0:666_0: Etthāha – nanu ca “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti imināpi ayamattho siddho, atha kasmā
atk-vin01a0:666_1: puna vuttaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti? Vuccate – evametaṃ siddho vāyamattho, na panetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:666_2: tadatthadīpakaṃ; nanu avocumha – “oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā
atk-vin01a0:666_3: paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti dīpanatthaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:667_0: Apica vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ sampasādanaṃ, na kilesakālusiyassa. Vitakkavicārānañca
atk-vin01a0:667_1: vūpasamā ekodibhāvaṃ na upacārajjhānamiva nīvaraṇappahānā, na paṭhamajjhānamiva ca
atk-vin01a0:667_2: aṅgapātubhāvāti evaṃ sampasādanaekodibhāvānaṃ hetuparidīpakamidaṃ vacanaṃ. Tathā
atk-vin01a0:667_3: vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ, na tatiyacatutthajjhānāni viya cakkhuviññāṇādīni
atk-vin01a0:667_4: viya ca abhāvāti evaṃ avitakkaavicārabhāvassa hetuparidīpakañca, na vitakkavicārābhāvamattaparidīpakaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:667_5: Vitakkavicārābhāvamattaparidīpakameva pana “avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:668_0: Samādhijanti paṭhamajjhānasamādhito sampayuttasamādhito vā jātanti attho. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:668_1: kiñcāpi paṭhamampi sampayuttasamādhito jātaṃ, atha kho ayameva “samādhī”ti vattabbataṃ
atk-vin01a0:668_2: arahati vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahena ativiya acalattā suppasannattā ca. Tasmā imassa
atk-vin01a0:668_3: vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ idameva “samādhija”nti vuttaṃ. Pītisukhanti idaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-vin01a0:669_0: Dutiyanti gaṇanānupubbato dutiyaṃ, idaṃ dutiyaṃ samāpajjatītipi dutiyaṃ. Jhānanti
atk-vin01a0:669_1: ettha pana yathā paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkādīhi pañcaṅgikaṃ hoti, evamidaṃ sampasādādīhi
atk-vin01a0:669_2: “caturaṅgika”nti veditabbaṃ. Yathāha – “jhānanti sampasādo, pīti, sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:669_3: Pariyāyoyeva ceso. Sampasādanaṃ pana ṭhapetvā nippariyāyena tivaṅgikamevetaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:669_4: Yathāha – “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye tivaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti? Pīti, sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:672_0: Pītiyā ca virāgāti ettha vuttatthāyeva pīti. Virāgoti tassā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo
atk-vin01a0:672_1: vā. Ubhinnamantarā “ca” saddo sampiṇḍanattho, so hi vūpasamaṃ vā sampiṇḍeti vitakkavicāravūpasamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:672_2: vā. Tattha yadā vūpasamameva sampiṇḍeti, tadā pītiyā virāgā ca, kiñca bhiyyo vūpasamā
atk-vin01a0:672_3: cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā. Imissā ca yojanāyaṃ virāgo jigucchanattho hoti. Tasmā
atk-vin01a0:672_4: pītiyā jigucchanā ca vūpasamā cāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo. Yadā pana vitakkavicāravūpasamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:672_5: sampiṇḍeti, tadā pītiyā ca virāgā, kiñca bhiyyo vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:672_6: yojanā veditabbā. Imissā ca yojanāyaṃ virāgo samatikkamanattho hoti. Tasmā pītiyā
atk-vin01a0:672_7: ca samatikkamā, vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a0:673_0: Kāmañcete vitakkavicārā dutiyajjhāneyeva vūpasantā imassa pana jhānassa maggaparidīpanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:673_1: vaṇṇabhaṇanatthañcetaṃ vuttaṃ. “Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti hi vutte idaṃ paññāyati
atk-vin01a0:673_2: – “nūna vitakkavicāravūpasamo maggo imassa jhānassā”ti. Yathā ca tatiye ariyamagge
atk-vin01a0:673_4: evaṃ pahānaṃ vuccamānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti tadadhigamāya ussukānaṃ ussāhajanakaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:673_5: evamevaṃ idha avūpasantānampi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo vuccamāno vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:673_6: Tenāyamattho vutto – “pītiyā ca samatikkamā, vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:674_0: Upekkhako ca vihāsinti ettha upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā, samaṃ passati, apakkhapatitāva
atk-vin01a0:674_1: hutvā passatīti attho. Tāya visadāya vipulāya thāmagatāya samannāgatattā tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī
atk-vin01a0:674_2: “upekkhako”ti vuccati. Upekkhā pana dasavidhā hoti – chaḷaṅgupekkhā, brahmavihārupekkhā,
atk-vin01a0:674_3: bojjhaṅgupekkhā, vīriyupekkhā, saṅkhārupekkhā, vedanupekkhā, vipassanupekkhā, tatramajjhattupekkhā,
atk-vin01a0:674_4: jhānupekkhā, pārisuddhupekkhāti. Evamayaṃ dasavidhāpi tattha tattha āgatanayato bhūmipuggalacittārammaṇato,
atk-vin01a0:674_6: vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Idha pana vuccamānā vinayanidānaṃ atibhāriyaṃ karotīti na
atk-vin01a0:674_7: vuttā. Lakkhaṇādito pana idha adhippetupekkhā majjhattalakkhaṇā, anābhogarasā, abyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-vin01a0:675_0: Etthāha – nanu cāyaṃ atthato tatramajjhattupekkhāva hoti, sā ca paṭhamadutiyajjhānesupi
atk-vin01a0:675_1: atthi, tasmā tatrāpi “upekkhako ca vihāsi”nti evamayaṃ vattabbā siyā, sā kasmā na
atk-vin01a0:675_2: vuttāti? Aparibyattakiccato. Aparibyattañhi tassā tattha kiccaṃ, vitakkādīhi abhibhūtattā.
atk-vin01a0:675_3: Idha panāyaṃ vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā ukkhittasirā viya hutvā paribyattakiccā
atk-vin01a0:676: Niṭṭhitā “upekkhako ca vihāsi”nti etassa sabbaso atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-vin01a0:677_0: Idāni sato ca sampajānoti ettha saratīti sato, sampajānātīti sampajāno. Puggalena
atk-vin01a0:677_1: sati ca sampajaññañca vuttaṃ. Tattha saraṇalakkhaṇā sati, asammussanarasā, ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā;
atk-vin01a0:677_2: asammohalakkhaṇaṃ sampajaññaṃ, tīraṇarasaṃ, pavicayapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha kiñcāpi
atk-vin01a0:677_3: idaṃ satisampajaññaṃ purimajjhānesupi atthi, muṭṭhassatissa hi asampajānassa upacārajjhānamattampi
atk-vin01a0:677_4: na sampajjati, pageva appanā; oḷārikattā pana tesaṃ jhānānaṃ bhūmiyaṃ viya purisassa
atk-vin01a0:677_5: cittassa gati sukhā hoti, abyattaṃ tattha satisampajaññakiccaṃ. Oḷārikaṅgappahānena
atk-vin01a0:677_6: pana sukhumattā imassa jhānassa purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ viya satisampajaññakiccapariggahitāyeva
atk-vin01a0:677_7: cittassa gati icchitabbāti idheva vuttaṃ. Kiñca bhiyyo? Yathāpi dhenupago vaccho
atk-vin01a0:677_8: dhenuto apanīto arakkhiyamāno punadeva dhenuṃ upagacchati; evamidaṃ tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:677_9: pītito apanītampi satisampajaññārakkhena arakkhiyamānaṃ punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyya
atk-vin01a0:677_10: pītisampayuttameva siyā. Sukhe vāpi sattā rajjanti, idañca atimadhuraṃ sukhaṃ, tato
atk-vin01a0:677_11: paraṃ sukhābhāvā. Satisampajaññānubhāvena panettha sukhe asārajjanā hoti, no aññathāti
atk-vin01a0:677_12: imampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ idheva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:678_0: Idāni sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedesinti ettha kiñcāpi tatiyajjhānasamaṅgino sukhappaṭisaṃvedanābhogo
atk-vin01a0:678_1: natthi, evaṃ santepi yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ, yaṃ vā taṃ nāmakāyasampayuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:678_2: sukhaṃ, taṃsamuṭṭhānenassa yasmā atipaṇītena rūpena rūpakāyo phuṭo, yassa phuṭattā
atk-vin01a0:678_3: jhānā vuṭṭhitopi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya, tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento “sukhañca kāyena
atk-vin01a0:679_0: Idāni yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti ettha yaṃjhānahetu
atk-vin01a0:679_1: yaṃjhānakāraṇā taṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgīpuggalaṃ buddhādayo ariyā ācikkhanti desenti
atk-vin01a0:679_2: paññapenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti pakāsenti, pasaṃsantīti
atk-vin01a0:679_3: adhippāyo. Kinti? “Upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti. Taṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-vin01a0:680_0: Kasmā pana taṃ te evaṃ pasaṃsantīti? Pasaṃsārahato. Ayañhi yasmā atimadhurasukhe
atk-vin01a0:680_1: sukhapāramippattepi tatiyajjhāne upekkhako, na tattha sukhābhisaṅgena ākaḍḍhīyati,
atk-vin01a0:680_2: yathā ca pīti na uppajjati; evaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitāya satimā. Yasmā ca ariyakantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:680_3: ariyajanasevitameva ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, tasmā pasaṃsāraho.
atk-vin01a0:680_4: Iti pasaṃsārahato naṃ ariyā te evaṃ pasaṃsāhetubhūte guṇe pakāsentā “upekkhako satimā
atk-vin01a0:681_0: Tatiyanti gaṇanānupubbato tatiyaṃ. Idaṃ tatiyaṃ samāpajjatītipi tatiyaṃ. Jhānanti
atk-vin01a0:681_1: ettha ca yathā dutiyaṃ sampasādādīhi caturaṅgikaṃ; evamidaṃ upekkhādīhi pañcaṅgikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:681_2: Yathāha – “jhānanti upekkhā sati sampajaññaṃ sukhaṃ cittassa ekaggatā”ti. Pariyāyoyeva
atk-vin01a0:681_3: ceso. Upekkhāsatisampajaññāni pana ṭhapetvā nippariyāyena duvaṅgikamevetaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:681_4: Yathāha – “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti? Sukhaṃ, cittassekaggatā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:684_0: Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa ca kāyikadukkhassa ca pahānā.
atk-vin01a0:684_1: Pubbevāti tañca kho pubbeva, na catutthajjhānakkhaṇe. Somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāti
atk-vin01a0:684_2: cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa cāti imesampi dvinnaṃ pubbeva atthaṅgamā pahānā
atk-vin01a0:684_3: icceva vuttaṃ hoti. Kadā pana nesaṃ pahānaṃ hoti? Catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ upacārakkhaṇe.
atk-vin01a0:684_5: paṭhamadutiyatatiyānaṃ upacārakkhaṇesu. Evametesaṃ pahānakkamena avuttānaṃ, indriyavibhaṅge
atk-vin01a0:684_6: pana indriyānaṃ uddesakkameneva idhāpi vuttānaṃ sukhadukkhasomanassa domanassānaṃ pahānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:685_0: Yadi panetāni tassa tassa jhānassupacārakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti, atha kasmā “kattha
atk-vin01a0:685_1: cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva
atk-vin01a0:685_2: kāmehi…pe… paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:685_3: nirujjhati. Kattha cuppannaṃ domanassindriyaṃ… sukhindriyaṃ… somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:685_4: nirujjhati? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā…pe… catutthajjhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-vin01a0:685_5: viharati, etthuppannaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti evaṃ jhānesveva
atk-vin01a0:685_6: nirodho vuttoti? Atisayanirodhattā. Atisayanirodho hi nesaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu, na
atk-vin01a0:685_7: nirodhoyeva; nirodhoyeva pana upacārakkhaṇe, nātisayanirodho. Tathā hi nānāvajjane
atk-vin01a0:685_8: paṭhamajjhānūpacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena vā visamāsanupatāpena
atk-vin01a0:685_9: vā siyā uppatti, na tveva antoappanāyaṃ. Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:685_10: hoti; paṭipakkhena avihatattā. Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto
atk-vin01a0:685_11: hoti. Sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ; paṭipakkhena vihatattā.
atk-vin01a0:685_12: Nānāvajjane eva ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārappaccayepi
atk-vin01a0:685_13: kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati, vitakkavicārābhāve neva uppajjati.
atk-vin01a0:685_14: Yattha pana uppajjati tattha vitakkavicārabhāve. Appahīnā eva ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre
atk-vin01a0:685_15: vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti; appahīnapaccayattā. Na tveva dutiyajjhāne;
atk-vin01a0:685_16: pahīnapaccayattā. Tathā tatiyajjhānūpacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa
atk-vin01a0:685_17: siyā uppatti, na tveva tatiyajjhāne. Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso
atk-vin01a0:685_18: niruddhāti. Tathā catutthajjhānūpacāre pahīnassāpi somanassindriyassa āsannattā,
atk-vin01a0:685_19: appanāppattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca siyā uppatti, na tveva
atk-vin01a0:685_20: catutthajjhāne. Tasmā eva ca “etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:686_0: Etthāha – “athevaṃ tassa tassa jhānassūpacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāharī”ti?
atk-vin01a0:686_1: Sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ. Yā hi ayaṃ “adukkhamasukha”nti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
atk-vin01a0:686_2: sā sukhumā atidubbiññeyyā na sakkā sukhena gahetuṃ. Tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā
atk-vin01a0:686_3: vā tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa gahaṇatthaṃ gopo ekasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:686_4: vaje sabbe gāvo samāharati, athekekaṃ nīharanto paṭipāṭiyā āgataṃ “ayaṃ so, gaṇhatha
atk-vin01a0:686_5: na”nti tampi gāhāpayati; evameva bhagavā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ sabbā etā samāhari. Evañhi
atk-vin01a0:686_6: samāhaṭā etā dassetvā “yaṃ neva sukhaṃ na dukkhaṃ na somanassaṃ na domanassaṃ, ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:686_7: adukkhamasukhā vedanā”ti sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ.
atk-vin01a0:687_0: Apica adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:687_1: Sukhappahānādayo hi tassā paccayā. Yathāha – “cattāro kho, āvuso, paccayā adukkhamasukhāya
atk-vin01a0:687_2: cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā. Idhāvuso, bhikkhu, sukhassa ca pahānā…pe… catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:687_3: upasampajja viharati. Ime kho, āvuso, cattāro paccayā adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā
atk-vin01a0:687_4: samāpattiyā”ti. Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:687_5: tattha pahīnāti vuttā; evaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttātipi veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:687_6: Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānaṃ atidūrabhāvaṃ dassetumpetā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:687_7: Etāsu hi sukhaṃ somanassassa paccayo, somanassaṃ rāgassa, dukkhaṃ domanassassa, domanassaṃ
atk-vin01a0:687_8: dosassa. Sukhādighātena ca te sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
atk-vin01a0:688_0: Adukkhamasukhanti dukkhābhāvena adukkhaṃ, sukhābhāvena asukhaṃ. Etenettha dukkhasukhapaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
atk-vin01a0:688_1: tatiyavedanaṃ dīpeti, na dukkhasukhābhāvamattaṃ. Tatiyavedanā nāma – adukkhamasukhā,
atk-vin01a0:688_2: upekkhātipi vuccati. Sā iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītānubhavanalakkhaṇā, majjhattarasā, avibhūtapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-vin01a0:688_4: Imasmiñhi jhāne suparisuddhā sati. Yā ca tassā satiyā pārisuddhi, sā upekkhāya katā
atk-vin01a0:688_5: na aññena; tasmā etaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhinti vuccati. Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ – “ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:688_6: sati imāya upekkhāya visadā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā, tena vuccati – ‘upekkhāsatipārisuddhi”’nti.
atk-vin01a0:688_7: Yāya ca upekkhāya ettha satiyā pārisuddhi hoti, sā atthato tatramajjhattatā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:688_8: Na kevalañcettha tāya satiyeva parisuddhā, apica kho sabbepi sampayuttadhammā; satisīsena pana desanā vuttā.
atk-vin01a0:689_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati, yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā
atk-vin01a0:689_1: sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā divā vijjamānāpi
atk-vin01a0:689_2: candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā; evamayampi tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā
atk-vin01a0:689_4: vijjamānāpi paṭhamādijjhānabhedesu aparisuddhā hoti. Tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā
atk-vin01a0:689_5: aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti; tasmā
atk-vin01a0:689_6: tesu ekampi “upekkhāsatipārisuddhi”nti na vuttaṃ. Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā
atk-vin01a0:689_7: sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā ativiya
atk-vin01a0:689_8: parisuddhā, tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo
atk-vin01a0:689_9: parisuddhā honti pariyodātā, tasmā idameva upekkhāsatipārisuddhinti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:690_0: Catutthanti gaṇanānupubbato catutthaṃ. Idaṃ catutthaṃ samāpajjatītipi catutthaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:690_1: Jhānanti ettha yathā tatiyaṃ upekkhādīhi pañcaṅgikaṃ; evamidaṃ upekkhādīhi tivaṅgikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:690_2: Yathāha – “jhānanti upekkhā, sati cittassekaggatā”ti. Pariyāyo eva ceso. Ṭhapetvā
atk-vin01a0:690_3: pana satiṃ upekkhekaggatameva gahetvā nippariyāyena duvaṅgikamevetaṃ hoti. Yathāha
atk-vin01a0:690_4: – “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti? Upekkhā, cittassekaggatā”ti. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-vin01a0:693_0: 12. Iti imāni cattāri jhānāni kesañci cittekaggatatthāni honti, kesañci vipassanāpādakāni,
atk-vin01a0:693_1: kesañci abhiññāpādakāni, kesañci nirodhapādakāni, kesañci bhavokkamanatthāni. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:693_2: khīṇāsavānaṃ cittekaggatatthāni honti, te hi samāpajjitvā “ekaggacittā sukhaṃ divasaṃ
atk-vin01a0:693_3: viharissāmā”ti iccevaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattenti. Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:693_4: “samāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāhitena cittena vipassissāmā”ti nibbattentānaṃ vipassanāpādakāni
atk-vin01a0:693_5: honti. Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito
atk-vin01a0:693_6: vuṭṭhāya “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”ti vuttanayā abhiññāyo patthentā nibbattenti,
atk-vin01a0:693_7: tesaṃ abhiññāpādakāni honti. Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā “nirodhasamāpattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:693_8: samāpajjitvā sattāhaṃ acittakā hutvā diṭṭheva dhamme nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:693_9: viharissāmā”ti nibbattenti, tesaṃ nirodhapādakāni honti. Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-vin01a0:693_10: nibbattetvā “aparihīnajjhānā hutvā brahmaloke uppajjissāmā”ti nibbattenti, tesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:694_0: Bhagavatā panidaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ bodhirukkhamūle nibbattitaṃ, taṃ tassa vipassanāpādakañceva
atk-vin01a0:694_2: veditabbaṃ. Yesañca guṇānaṃ dāyakaṃ ahosi, tesaṃ ekadesaṃ dassento “so evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:695_0: Tattha soti so ahaṃ. Evanti catutthajjhānakkamanidassanametaṃ. Iminā kamena catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:695_1: paṭilabhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Samāhiteti iminā catutthajjhānasamādhinā samāhite. Parisuddhetiādīsu
atk-vin01a0:695_2: pana upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvena parisuddhe. Parisuddhattāyeva pariyodāte, pabhassareti
atk-vin01a0:695_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Sukhādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ ghātena vihatarāgādiaṅgaṇattā anaṅgaṇe. Anaṅgaṇattāyeva
atk-vin01a0:695_4: ca vigatūpakkilese; aṅgaṇena hi cittaṃ upakkilissati. Subhāvitattā mudubhūte, vasībhāvappatteti
atk-vin01a0:695_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Vase vattamānañhi cittaṃ mudūti vuccati. Muduttāyeva ca kammaniye, kammakkhame
atk-vin01a0:695_6: kammayoggeti vuttaṃ hoti. Mudu hi cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti sudhantamiva suvaṇṇaṃ, tadubhayampi
atk-vin01a0:695_7: ca subhāvitattā eva. Yathāha – “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi,
atk-vin01a0:695_8: yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ mudu ca hoti kammaniyañca, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, citta”nti.
atk-vin01a0:696_0: Etesu parisuddhabhāvādīsu ṭhitattā ṭhite. Ṭhitattāyeva āneñjappatte, acale niriñjaneti
atk-vin01a0:696_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā ṭhite, saddhādīhi pariggahitattā
atk-vin01a0:696_2: āneñjappatte. Saddhāpariggahitañhi cittaṃ assaddhiyena na iñjati, vīriyapariggahitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:696_3: kosajjena na iñjati, satipariggahitaṃ pamādena na iñjati, samādhipariggahitaṃ uddhaccena
atk-vin01a0:696_4: na iñjati, paññāpariggahitaṃ avijjāya na iñjati, obhāsagataṃ kilesandhakārena na
atk-vin01a0:696_5: iñjati. Imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ
atk-vin01a0:696_6: cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya.
atk-vin01a0:697_0: Aparo nayo – catutthajjhānasamādhinā samāhite. Nīvaraṇadūrībhāvena parisuddhe. Vitakkādisamatikkamena
atk-vin01a0:697_1: pariyodāte. Jhānappaṭilābhapaccayānaṃ pāpakānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ abhāvena anaṅgaṇe.
atk-vin01a0:697_2: Abhijjhādīnaṃ cittūpakkilesānaṃ vigamena vigatūpakkilese. Ubhayampi cetaṃ anaṅgaṇavatthasuttānusārena
atk-vin01a0:697_3: veditabbaṃ. Vasippattiyā mudubhūte. Iddhipādabhāvūpagamena kammaniye. Bhāvanāpāripūriyā
atk-vin01a0:697_4: paṇītabhāvūpagamena ṭhite āneñjappatte. Yathā āneñjappattaṃ hoti; evaṃ ṭhiteti attho.
atk-vin01a0:697_5: Evampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:698_0: Pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāyāti evaṃ abhiññāpādake jāte etasmiṃ citte pubbenivāsānussatimhi
atk-vin01a0:698_1: yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tadatthāya. Tattha pubbenivāsoti pubbe atītajātīsu nivutthakkhandhā. Nivutthāti
atk-vin01a0:698_2: ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā nivutthadhammā vā nivutthā,
atk-vin01a0:698_3: gocaranivāsena nivutthā, attano viññāṇena viññātā paricchinnā, paraviññāṇaviññātāpi
atk-vin01a0:698_4: vā chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇādīsu. Pubbenivāsānussatīti yāya satiyā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati,
atk-vin01a0:698_5: sā pubbenivāsānussati. Ñāṇanti tāya satiyā sampayuttañāṇaṃ. Evamimassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa
atk-vin01a0:698_6: atthāya pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya etassa ñāṇassa adhigamāya pattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:699_0: Soti so ahaṃ. Anekavihitanti anekavidhaṃ, anekehi vā pakārehi pavattitaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti
atk-vin01a0:699_1: attho. Pubbenivāsanti samanantarātītaṃ bhavaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha nivutthasantānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:699_2: Anussarāmīti “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”ti evaṃ jātipaṭipāṭiyā anugantvā anugantvā
atk-vin01a0:699_3: sarāmi, anudeva vā sarāmi, citte abhininnāmitamatte eva sarāmīti dasseti. Pūritapāramīnañhi
atk-vin01a0:699_4: mahāpurisānaṃ parikammakaraṇaṃ natthi, tena te cittaṃ abhininnāmetvāva saranti. Ādikammikakulaputtā
atk-vin01a0:699_5: pana parikammaṃ katvāva saranti, tasmā tesaṃ vasena parikammaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā. Taṃ
