atk-vin01a0:699_6: pana vuccamānaṃ atibhāriyaṃ vinayanidānaṃ karoti, tasmā taṃ na vadāma. Atthikehi
atk-vin01a0:699_7: pana visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva gahetabbaṃ. Idha pana pāḷimeva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-vin01a0:700_0: Seyyathidanti āraddhappakāradassanatthe nipāto. Teneva yvāyaṃ pubbenivāso āraddho,
atk-vin01a0:700_1: tassa pakārappabhedaṃ dassento ekampi jātintiādimāha. Tattha ekampi jātinti ekampi
atk-vin01a0:700_2: paṭisandhimūlaṃ cutipariyosānaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhasantānaṃ. Esa nayo dvepi
atk-vin01a0:700_3: jātiyotiādīsu. Anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappetiādīsu pana parihāyamāno kappo saṃvaṭṭakappo,
atk-vin01a0:700_4: vaḍḍhamāno vivaṭṭakappoti veditabbo. Tattha ca saṃvaṭṭena saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī gahito hoti
atk-vin01a0:700_5: tammūlakattā. Vivaṭṭena ca vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī. Evañhi sati yāni tāni “cattārimāni, bhikkhave,
atk-vin01a0:700_6: kappassa asaṅkhyeyyāni. Katamāni cattāri? Saṃvaṭṭo saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī, vivaṭṭo vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī”ti
atk-vin01a0:701_0: Tattha tayo saṃvaṭṭā – tejosaṃvaṭṭo, āposaṃvaṭṭo, vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti. Tisso saṃvaṭṭasīmā
atk-vin01a0:701_1: – ābhassarā, subhakiṇhā, vehapphalāti. Yadā kappo tejena saṃvaṭṭati, ābhassarato
atk-vin01a0:701_2: heṭṭhā agginā ḍayhati. Yadā udakena saṃvaṭṭati, subhakiṇhato heṭṭhā udakena vilīyati.
atk-vin01a0:701_3: Yadā vātena saṃvaṭṭati, vehapphalato heṭṭhā vātena viddhaṃsiyati. Vitthārato pana
atk-vin01a0:702_0: Buddhakkhettaṃ nāma tividhaṃ hoti – jātikkhettaṃ, āṇākkhettaṃ, visayakkhettañca.
atk-vin01a0:702_1: Tattha jātikkhettaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṃ hoti, yaṃ tathāgatassa paṭisandhiādīsu
atk-vin01a0:702_2: kampati. Āṇākkhettaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷapariyantaṃ hoti. Yattha ratanaparittaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:702_3: khandhaparittaṃ, dhajaggaparittaṃ, āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ, moraparittanti imesaṃ parittānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:702_4: ānubhāvo pavattati. Visayakkhettaṃ pana anantaṃ aparimāṇaṃ, “yaṃ yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti
atk-vin01a0:702_5: vuttaṃ yattha yaṃ yaṃ ākaṅkhati taṃ taṃ anussarati. Evametesu tīsu buddhakkhettesu
atk-vin01a0:702_6: ekaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ vinassati. Tasmiṃ pana vinassante jātikkhettampi vinaṭṭhameva hoti;
atk-vin01a0:702_7: vinassantañca ekatova vinassati, saṇṭhahantampi ekatova saṇṭhahati. Tassa vināso
atk-vin01a0:702_8: ca saṇṭhahanañca visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. Atthikehi tato gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:703_0: Ye panete saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭā vuttā, etesu bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhanatthāya
atk-vin01a0:703_1: nisinno anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe sari.
atk-vin01a0:703_2: Kathaṃ? “Amutrāsi”ntiādinā nayena. Tattha amutrāsinti amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe ahaṃ amumhi
atk-vin01a0:703_3: bhave vā yoniyā vā gatiyā vā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā sattanikāye vā ahosiṃ.
atk-vin01a0:703_4: Evaṃnāmoti vessantaro vā jotipālo vā. Evaṃgottoti bhaggavo vā gotamo vā. Evaṃvaṇṇoti
atk-vin01a0:703_5: odāto vā sāmo vā. Evamāhāroti sālimaṃsodanāhāro vā pavattaphalabhojano vā. Evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedīti
atk-vin01a0:703_6: anekappakārena kāyikacetasikānaṃ sāmisanirāmisādippabhedānaṃ vā sukhadukkhānaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
atk-vin01a0:703_7: Evamāyupariyantoti evaṃ vassasataparamāyupariyanto vā caturāsītikappasahassaparamāyupariyanto vā.
atk-vin01a0:704_0: So tato cuto amutra udapādinti so ahaṃ tato bhavato yonito gatito viññāṇaṭṭhitito
atk-vin01a0:704_1: sattāvāsato sattanikāyato vā cuto, puna amukasmiṃ nāma bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā
atk-vin01a0:704_2: sattāvāse sattanikāye vā udapādiṃ. Tatrāpāsinti atha tatrāpi bhave yoniyā gatiyā
atk-vin01a0:704_3: viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā puna ahosiṃ. Evaṃnāmotiādi vuttanayameva.
atk-vin01a0:705_0: Atha vā yasmā amutrāsinti idaṃ anupubbena ārohantassa yāvadicchakaṃ saraṇaṃ. So tato
atk-vin01a0:705_1: cutoti paṭinivattantassa paccavekkhaṇaṃ. Tasmā idhūpapannoti imissā idhūpapattiyā
atk-vin01a0:705_2: anantaraṃ amutra udapādinti tusitabhavanaṃ sandhāyāhāti veditabbaṃ. Tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmoti
atk-vin01a0:705_3: tatrāpi tusitabhavane setaketu nāma devaputto ahosiṃ. Evaṃgottoti tāhi devatāhi saddhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:705_4: ekagotto. Evaṃvaṇṇoti suvaṇṇavaṇṇo. Evamāhāroti dibbasudhāhāro. Evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedīti
atk-vin01a0:705_5: evaṃ dibbasukhappaṭisaṃvedī. Dukkhaṃ pana saṅkhāradukkhamattameva. Evamāyupariyantoti
atk-vin01a0:705_6: evaṃ sattapaññāsavassakoṭisaṭṭhivassasatasahassāyupariyanto. So tato cutoti so ahaṃ
atk-vin01a0:705_7: tato tusitabhavanato cuto. Idhūpapannoti idha mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchimhi nibbatto.
atk-vin01a0:706_0: Itīti evaṃ. Sākāraṃ sauddesanti nāmagottavasena sauddesaṃ, vaṇṇādivasena sākāraṃ.
atk-vin01a0:706_1: Nāmagottavasena hi satto “datto, tisso, gotamo”ti uddisīyati; vaṇṇādīhi odāto, sāmoti
atk-vin01a0:706_2: nānattato paññāyati; tasmā nāmagottaṃ uddeso, itare ākārā. Kiṃ pana buddhāyeva pubbenivāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:706_3: sarantīti? Vuccate – na buddhāyeva, paccekabuddha-buddhasāvaka-titthiyāpi, no ca
atk-vin01a0:706_4: kho avisesena. Titthiyā hi cattālīsaṃyeva kappe saranti, na tato paraṃ. Kasmā? Dubbalapaññattā.
atk-vin01a0:706_5: Tesañhi nāmarūpaparicchedavirahato dubbalā paññā hoti. Sāvakesu pana asītimahāsāvakā
atk-vin01a0:706_6: kappasatasahassaṃ saranti; dve aggasāvakā ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ satasahassañca. Paccekabuddhā
atk-vin01a0:706_7: dve asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca. Ettako hi tesaṃ abhinīhāro. Buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo
atk-vin01a0:706_8: natthi, yāva icchanti tāva saranti. Titthiyā ca khandhapaṭipāṭimeva saranti. Paṭipāṭiṃ
atk-vin01a0:706_9: muñcitvā cutipaṭisandhivasena sarituṃ na sakkonti. Tesañhi andhānaṃ viya icchitappadesokkamanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:706_10: natthi. Sāvakā ubhayathāpi saranti; tathā paccekabuddhā. Buddhā pana khandhapaṭipāṭiyāpi
atk-vin01a0:706_11: cutipaṭisandhivasenapi sīhokkantavasenapi anekāsu kappakoṭīsu heṭṭhā vā upari vā
atk-vin01a0:706_12: yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākaṅkhanti, taṃ sabbaṃ sarantiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:707_0: Ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇātiādīsu meti mayā. Vijjāti viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjā. Kiṃ viditaṃ
atk-vin01a0:707_1: karoti? Pubbenivāsaṃ. Avijjāti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādakamoho
atk-vin01a0:707_2: vuccati. Tamoti sveva moho tappaṭicchādakaṭṭhena “tamo”ti vuccati. Ālokoti sāyevavijjā
atk-vin01a0:707_3: obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhena “āloko”ti vuccati. Ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti ayaṃ attho, sesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:707_4: pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. Yojanā panettha – ayaṃ kho me vijjā adhigatā, tassa me adhigatavijjassa
atk-vin01a0:707_5: avijjā vihatā, vinaṭṭhāti attho. Kasmā? Yasmā vijjā uppannā. Esa nayo itarasmimpi padadvaye.
atk-vin01a0:708_0: Yathā tanti ettha yathāti opammatthe. Tanti nipāto. Satiyā avippavāsena appamattassa.
atk-vin01a0:708_1: Vīriyātāpena ātāpino. Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahitattassa, pesitacittassāti
atk-vin01a0:708_2: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā
atk-vin01a0:708_3: vihaññeyya vijjā uppajjeyya, tamo vihaññeyya āloko uppajjeyya; evameva mama avijjā
atk-vin01a0:708_4: vihatā vijjā uppannā, tamo vihato āloko uppanno. Etassa me padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ laddhanti.
atk-vin01a0:709_0: Ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇa paṭhamā abhinibbhidā ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhāti
atk-vin01a0:709_1: ayaṃ kho mama brāhmaṇa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇamukhatuṇḍakena pubbe nivutthakkhandhapaṭicchādakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:709_2: avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamā abhinibbhidā paṭhamā nikkhanti paṭhamā ariyājāti
atk-vin01a0:709_3: ahosi, kukkuṭacchāpakasseva mukhatuṇḍakena vā pādanakhasikhāya vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā
atk-vin01a0:709_4: tamhā aṇḍakosamhā abhinibbhidā nikkhanti kukkuṭanikāye paccājātīti.
atk-vin01a0:712_0: 13. So evaṃ…pe… cutūpapātañāṇāyāti cutiyā ca upapāte ca ñāṇāya; yena ñāṇena sattānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:712_1: cuti ca upapāto ca ñāyati, tadatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Cittaṃ abhininnāmesinti parikammacittaṃ
atk-vin01a0:712_2: nīhariṃ. So dibbena…pe… passāmīti ettha pana pūritapāramīnaṃ mahāsattānaṃ parikammakaraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:712_3: natthi. Te hi citte abhininnāmitamatte eva dibbena cakkhunā satte passanti, ādikammikakulaputtā
atk-vin01a0:712_4: pana parikammaṃ katvā. Tasmā tesaṃ vasena parikammaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā. Taṃ pana vuccamānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:712_5: atibhāriyaṃ vinayanidānaṃ karoti; tasmā taṃ na vadāma. Atthikehi pana visuddhimagge
atk-vin01a0:712_6: vuttanayena gahetabbaṃ. Idha pana pāḷimeva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-vin01a0:713_0: Soti so ahaṃ. Dibbenātiādīsu dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ. Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:713_2: dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu hoti. Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti
atk-vin01a0:713_3: dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ, dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi
atk-vin01a0:713_4: dibbaṃ, ālokapariggahena mahājutikattāpi dibbaṃ, tirokuṭṭādigatarūpadassanena mahāgatikattāpi
atk-vin01a0:713_5: dibbaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabbaṃ. Dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu. Cakkhukiccakaraṇena
atk-vin01a0:713_6: cakkhumivātipi cakkhu. Cutūpapātadassanena diṭṭhivisuddhihetuttā visuddhaṃ. Yo hi
atk-vin01a0:713_7: cutimattameva passati na upapātaṃ, so ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Yo upapātamattameva
atk-vin01a0:713_8: passati na cutiṃ, so navasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Yo pana tadubhayaṃ passati,
atk-vin01a0:713_9: so yasmā duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati, tasmāssa taṃ dassanaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhihetu
atk-vin01a0:713_10: hoti. Tadubhayañca bhagavā addasa. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ – “cutūpapātadassanena diṭṭhivisuddhihetuttā visuddha”nti.
atk-vin01a0:714_0: Ekādasaupakkilesavirahato vā visuddhaṃ. Bhagavato hi ekādasapakkilesavirahitaṃ dibbacakkhu.
atk-vin01a0:714_1: Yathāha – “so kho ahaṃ, anuruddha, ‘vicikicchā cittassa upakkileso’ti iti viditvā
atk-vin01a0:714_2: vicikicchaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahiṃ. Amanasikāro…pe… thinamiddhaṃ… chambhitattaṃ…
atk-vin01a0:714_3: uppilaṃ… duṭṭhullaṃ… accāraddhavīriyaṃ… atilīnavīriyaṃ… abhijappā… nānattasaññā…
atk-vin01a0:714_4: ‘atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ cittassa upakkileso’ti iti viditvā atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:714_5: cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahiṃ. So kho ahaṃ, anuruddha, appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto
atk-vin01a0:714_6: obhāsañhi kho sañjānāmi, na ca rūpāni passāmi. Rūpāni hi kho passāmi, na ca obhāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:715_0: Manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā rūpadassanena atikkantamānusakaṃ; mānusakaṃ vā maṃsacakkhuṃ
atk-vin01a0:715_1: atikkantattā atikkantamānusakanti veditabbaṃ. Tena dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena.
atk-vin01a0:716_0: Satte passāmīti manussamaṃsacakkhunā viya satte passāmi dakkhāmi olokemi. Cavamāne
atk-vin01a0:716_1: upapajjamāneti ettha cutikkhaṇe vā upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunā daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā,
atk-vin01a0:716_2: ye pana āsannacutikā idāni cavissanti te cavamānā. Ye ca gahitapaṭisandhikā sampatinibbattā
atk-vin01a0:716_3: vā, te upapajjamānāti adhippetā. Te evarūpe cavamāne upapajjamāne ca passāmīti dasseti.
atk-vin01a0:716_4: Hīneti mohanissandayuttattā hīnānaṃ jātikulabhogādīnaṃ vasena hīḷite ohīḷite uññāte
atk-vin01a0:716_5: avaññāte. Paṇīteti amohanissandayuttattā tabbiparīte. Suvaṇṇeti adosanissandayuttattā
atk-vin01a0:716_7: abhirūpe virūpetipi attho. Sugateti sugatigate, alobhanissandayuttattā vā aḍḍhe mahaddhane.
atk-vin01a0:716_8: Duggateti duggatigate, lobhanissandayuttattā vā dalidde appannapāne. Yathākammūpageti
atk-vin01a0:716_9: yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ upacitaṃ tena tena upagate. Tattha purimehi “cavamāne”tiādīhi dibbacakkhukiccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:717_0: Tassa ca ñāṇassa ayamuppattikkamo – so heṭṭhā nirayābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nerayikasatte
atk-vin01a0:717_1: passati mahantaṃ dukkhamanubhavamāne, taṃ dassanaṃ dibbacakkhukiccameva. So evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:717_2: manasi karoti – “kinnu kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ dukkhamanubhavantī”ti? Athassa
atk-vin01a0:717_3: “idaṃ nāma katvā”ti taṃ kammārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. Tathā upari devalokābhimukhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:717_4: ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nandanavana-missakavana-phārusakavanādīsu satte passati mahāsampattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:717_5: anubhavamāne. Tampi dassanaṃ dibbacakkhukiccameva. So evaṃ manasi karoti – “kinnu
atk-vin01a0:717_6: kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavantī”ti? Athassa “idaṃ nāma katvā”ti
atk-vin01a0:717_7: taṃkammārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. Idaṃ yathākammūpagañāṇaṃ nāma. Imassa visuṃ parikammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:717_8: nāma natthi. Yathā cimassa, evaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇassapi. Dibbacakkhupādakāneva hi imāni
atk-vin01a0:718_0: Kāyaduccaritenātiādīsu duṭṭhu caritaṃ duṭṭhaṃ vā caritaṃ kilesapūtikattāti duccaritaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:718_1: kāyena duccaritaṃ, kāyato vā uppannaṃ duccaritanti kāyaduccaritaṃ. Evaṃ vacīmanoduccaritānipi
atk-vin01a0:718_2: daṭṭhabbāni. Samannāgatāti samaṅgībhūtā. Ariyānaṃ upavādakāti buddha-paccekabuddha-buddhasāvakānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:718_3: ariyānaṃ antamaso gihisotāpannānampi anatthakāmā hutvā antimavatthunā vā guṇaparidhaṃsanena
atk-vin01a0:718_4: vā upavādakā; akkosakā, garahakāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha “natthi imesaṃ samaṇadhammo,
atk-vin01a0:718_5: assamaṇā ete”ti vadanto antimavatthunā upavadati. “Natthi imesaṃ jhānaṃ vā vimokkho
atk-vin01a0:718_6: vā maggo vā phalaṃ vā”ti vadanto guṇaparidhaṃsanena upavadatīti veditabbo. So ca
atk-vin01a0:718_7: jānaṃ vā upavadeyya ajānaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi ariyūpavādova hoti. Bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ saggāvaraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:718_8: maggāvaraṇañca, satekicchaṃ pana hoti. Tassa ca āvibhāvatthaṃ idaṃ vatthumudāharanti –
atk-vin01a0:719_0: “Aññatarasmiṃ kira gāme eko thero ca daharabhikkhu ca piṇḍāya caranti. Te paṭhamaghareyeva
atk-vin01a0:719_1: uḷuṅkamattaṃ uṇhayāguṃ labhiṃsu. Therassa ca kucchivāto atthi. So cintesi – ‘ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:719_2: yāgu mayhaṃ sappāyā, yāva na sītalā hoti tāva naṃ pivāmī’ti. So manussehi ummāratthāya
atk-vin01a0:719_3: āhaṭe dārukkhandhe nisīditvā taṃ pivi. Itaro taṃ jigucchi – ‘aticchāto vatāyaṃ mahallako
atk-vin01a0:719_4: amhākaṃ lajjitabbakaṃ akāsī’ti. Thero gāme caritvā vihāraṃ gantvā daharabhikkhuṃ
atk-vin01a0:719_5: āha – ‘atthi te, āvuso, imasmiṃ sāsane patiṭṭhā’ti? ‘Āma, bhante, sotāpanno aha’nti.
atk-vin01a0:719_6: ‘Tena hāvuso, uparimaggatthāya vāyāmaṃ mā akāsi, khīṇāsavo tayā upavadito’ti. So
atk-vin01a0:719_7: taṃ khamāpesi. Tenassa taṃ pākatikaṃ ahosi”. Tasmā yo aññopi ariyaṃ upavadati, tena
atk-vin01a0:719_8: gantvā sace attanā vuḍḍhataro hoti, “ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ idañcidañca avacaṃ, taṃ me khamāhī”ti
atk-vin01a0:719_9: khamāpetabbo. Sace navakataro hoti, vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā
atk-vin01a0:719_10: “ahaṃ bhante tumhe idañcidañca avacaṃ, taṃ me khamathā”ti khamāpetabbo. Sace so nakkhamati
atk-vin01a0:719_11: disāpakkanto vā hoti, ye tasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū vasanti tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sace
atk-vin01a0:719_12: attanā vuḍḍhataro hoti ṭhitakeneva, sace navakataro ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā
atk-vin01a0:719_13: “ahaṃ, bhante, asukaṃ nāma āyasmantaṃ idañcidañca avacaṃ, khamatu me so āyasmā”ti
atk-vin01a0:719_14: evaṃ vadantena khamāpetabbo. Sace so parinibbuto hoti, parinibbutamañcaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-vin01a0:719_15: yāva sivathikaṃ gantvāpi khamāpetabbo. Evaṃ kate saggāvaraṇañca maggāvaraṇañca na
atk-vin01a0:720_1: samādinnanānāvidhakammā, ye ca micchādiṭṭhimūlakesu kāyakammādīsu aññepi samādapenti.
atk-vin01a0:720_2: Tattha vacīduccaritaggahaṇeneva ariyūpavāde, manoduccaritaggahaṇena ca micchādiṭṭhiyā
atk-vin01a0:720_3: saṅgahitāyapi imesaṃ dvinnaṃ puna vacanaṃ mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:720_4: Mahāsāvajjo hi ariyūpavādo ānantariyasadiso. Yathāha – “seyyathāpi, sāriputta, bhikkhu
atk-vin01a0:720_5: sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṃ ārādheyya; evaṃsampadamidaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:720_6: sāriputta, vadāmi taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā
atk-vin01a0:721_0: Micchādiṭṭhito ca mahāsāvajjataraṃ nāma aññaṃ natthi. Yathāha – “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-vin01a0:721_1: aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, evaṃ mahāsāvajjataraṃ, yathayidaṃ, micchādiṭṭhi.
atk-vin01a0:722_0: Kāyassa bhedāti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā. Paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇe.
atk-vin01a0:722_1: Athavā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassupacchedā. Paraṃ maraṇāti cuticittato uddhaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:722_2: Apāyanti evamādi sabbaṃ nirayavevacanaṃ. Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā
atk-vin01a0:722_3: ayā apetattā, sukhānaṃ vā āyassa abhāvā apāyo. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggati;
atk-vin01a0:722_4: dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gatīti duggati. Vivasā nipatanti ettha
atk-vin01a0:722_5: dukkaṭakārinoti vinipāto; vinassantā vā ettha nipatanti sambhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgāti
atk-vin01a0:722_6: vinipāto. Natthi ettha assādasaññito ayoti nirayo.
atk-vin01a0:723_0: Atha vā apāyaggahaṇena tiracchānayoniṃ dīpeti. Tiracchānayoni hi apāyo, sugatiyā
atk-vin01a0:723_1: apetattā; na duggati, mahesakkhānaṃ nāgarājādīnaṃ sambhavato. Duggatiggahaṇena pettivisayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:723_2: dīpeti. So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā, dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā;
atk-vin01a0:723_3: na tu vinipāto asurasadisaṃ avinipatitattā. Petamahiddhikānañhi vimānānipi nibbattanti.
atk-vin01a0:723_4: Vinipātaggahaṇena asurakāyaṃ dīpeti. So hi yathāvuttenatthena apāyo ceva duggati
atk-vin01a0:723_5: ca sabbasamussayehi ca vinipatitattā vinipātoti vuccati. Nirayaggahaṇena avīci-ādianekappakāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:723_6: nirayameva dīpeti. Upapannāti upagatā, tattha abhinibbattāti adhippāyo. Vuttavipariyāyena
atk-vin01a0:724_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – ettha sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi saṅgayhati. Saggaggahaṇena
atk-vin01a0:724_1: devagatiyeva. Tattha sundarā gatīti sugati. Rūpādivisayehi suṭṭhu aggoti saggo. So
atk-vin01a0:724_2: sabbopi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti ayaṃ vacanattho. Vijjāti dibbacakkhuñāṇavijjā.
atk-vin01a0:724_3: Avijjāti sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhipaṭicchādikā avijjā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Ayameva
atk-vin01a0:727_0: 14. So evaṃ samāhite citteti idha vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:727_1: Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyāti arahattamaggañāṇatthāya. Arahattamaggo hi āsavavināsanato
atk-vin01a0:727_2: āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati. Tatra cetaṃ ñāṇaṃ tappariyāpannattāti. Cittaṃ abhininnāmesinti
atk-vin01a0:727_3: vipassanācittaṃ abhinīhariṃ. So idaṃ dukkhanti evamādīsu “ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito
atk-vin01a0:727_4: bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ
atk-vin01a0:727_5: jāniṃ paṭivijjhiṃ. Tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti,
atk-vin01a0:727_6: tadubhayampi yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhati taṃ tesaṃ appavattiṃ nibbānaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti,
atk-vin01a0:727_7: tassa ca sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena
atk-vin01a0:727_8: yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ jāniṃ paṭivijjhinti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:728_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento “ime āsavā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:728_1: Tassa me evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa mayhaṃ evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa
atk-vin01a0:728_2: saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ katheti. Kāmāsavāti kāmāsavato. Vimuccitthāti
atk-vin01a0:728_3: iminā phalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. Maggakkhaṇe hi cittaṃ vimuccati, phalakkhaṇe vimuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:728_4: hoti. Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dasseti. Khīṇā jātītiādīhi
atk-vin01a0:728_5: tassa bhūmiṃ. Tena hi ñāṇena bhagavā paccavekkhanto “khīṇā jātī”tiādīni abbhaññāsiṃ.
atk-vin01a0:728_6: Katamā pana bhagavato jāti khīṇā, kathañca naṃ abbhaññāsīti? Vuccate – na tāvassa
atk-vin01a0:728_7: atītā jāti khīṇā, pubbeva khīṇattā; na anāgatā, anāgate vāyāmābhāvato; na paccuppannā,
atk-vin01a0:728_8: vijjamānattā. Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā
atk-vin01a0:728_9: jāti, sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā; taṃ so maggabhāvanāya
atk-vin01a0:728_10: pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā “kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:729_0: Vusitanti vutthaṃ parivutthaṃ, kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho. Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:729_1: puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma, khīṇāsavo
atk-vin01a0:729_2: vutthavāso. Tasmā bhagavā attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti
atk-vin01a0:729_3: abbhaññāsiṃ. Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasena
atk-vin01a0:729_4: soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho. Puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo hi etaṃ kiccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:729_5: karonti, khīṇāsavo katakaraṇīyo. Tasmā bhagavā attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ
atk-vin01a0:729_6: karaṇīya”nti abbhaññāsiṃ. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya
atk-vin01a0:729_7: kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti abbhaññāsiṃ.
atk-vin01a0:730_0: Idāni evaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitaṃ taṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇādhigamaṃ brāhmaṇassa
atk-vin01a0:730_1: dassento ayaṃ kho me brāhmaṇātiādimāha. Tattha vijjāti arahattamaggañāṇavijjā. Avijjāti
atk-vin01a0:730_2: catusaccapaṭicchādikā avijjā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Ayaṃ pana viseso – ayaṃ kho me
atk-vin01a0:730_3: brāhmaṇa tatiyā abhinibbhidā ahosīti ettha ayaṃ kho mama brāhmaṇa āsavānaṃ khayañāṇamukhatuṇḍakena
atk-vin01a0:730_4: catusaccapaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tatiyā abhinibbhidā tatiyā nikkhanti
atk-vin01a0:730_5: tatiyā ariyajāti ahosi, kukkuṭacchāpakasseva mukhatuṇḍakena vā pādanakhasikhāya vā
atk-vin01a0:730_6: aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tamhā aṇḍakosamhā abhinibbhidā nikkhanti kukkuṭanikāye paccājātīti.
atk-vin01a0:731: Ettāvatā kiṃ dassetīti? So hi brāhmaṇa kukkuṭacchāpako aṇḍakosaṃ
atk-vin01a0:732_0: Padāletvā tato nikkhamanto sakimeva jāyati, ahaṃ pana pubbe-nivutthakkhandhapaṭicchādakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:732_1: avijjaṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā paṭhamaṃ tāva pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇavijjāya jāto, tato sattānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:732_3: jāto, puna catusaccapaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tatiyaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇavijjāya
atk-vin01a0:732_4: jāto; evaṃ tīhi vijjāhi tikkhattuṃ jāto. Sā ca me jāti ariyā suparisuddhāti idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:732_5: dassesi. Evaṃ dassento ca pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇaṃ, dibbacakkhunā paccuppannānāgataṃsañāṇaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:732_6: āsavakkhayena sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇanti evaṃ tīhi vijjāhi sabbepi sabbaññuguṇe
atk-vin01a0:732_7: pakāsetvā attano ariyāya jātiyā jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ brāhmaṇassa dassesīti.
atk-vin01a0:735_0: 15. Evaṃ vutte verañjo brāhmaṇoti evaṃ bhagavatā lokānukampakena brāhmaṇaṃ anukampamānena
atk-vin01a0:735_1: vinigūhitabbepi attano ariyāya jātiyā jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāve vijjattayapakāsikāya dhammadesanāya
atk-vin01a0:735_2: vutte pītivipphāraparipuṇṇagattacitto verañjo brāhmaṇo taṃ bhagavato ariyāya jātiyā
atk-vin01a0:735_4: sabbaññuṃ ‘aññesaṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ na karotī’ti avacaṃ – ‘dhīratthu vatare aññāṇa”’nti
atk-vin01a0:735_5: attānaṃ garahitvā “ayaṃ dāni loke ariyāya jātiyā purejātaṭṭhena jeṭṭho, sabbaguṇehi
atk-vin01a0:735_6: appaṭisamaṭṭhena seṭṭho”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “jeṭṭho bhavaṃ
atk-vin01a0:735_7: gotamo seṭṭho bhavaṃ gotamo”ti. Evañca pana vatvā puna taṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:735_8: abbhanumodamāno “abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotamā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:736_1: bhante, ratti; nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho”tiādīsu hi khaye
atk-vin01a0:736_2: dissati. “Ayaṃ me puggalo khamati, imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
atk-vin01a0:737: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:739: Ādīsu abhirūpe. “Abhikkantaṃ, bhante”tiādīsu abbhanumodane. Idhāpi abbhanumodaneyeva. Yasmā ca abbhanumodane, tasmā “sādhu sādhu, bho gotamā”ti vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:741: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho”ti.
atk-vin01a0:742: Iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena cāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:743_0: Atha vā abhikkantanti atiiṭṭhaṃ atimanāpaṃ atisundaranti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha ekena
atk-vin01a0:743_1: abhikkantasaddena desanaṃ thometi, ekena attano pasādaṃ. Ayañhi ettha adhippāyo –
atk-vin01a0:743_2: “abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanā, abhikkantaṃ yadidaṃ
atk-vin01a0:743_3: bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādo”ti. Bhagavatoyeva vā vacanaṃ dve
atk-vin01a0:743_4: dve atthe sandhāya thometi – bhoto gotamassa vacanaṃ abhikkantaṃ dosanāsanato abhikkantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:743_5: guṇādhigamanato, tathā saddhājananato paññājananato, sātthato sabyañjanato, uttānapadato
atk-vin01a0:743_6: gambhīratthato, kaṇṇasukhato hadayaṅgamato, anattukkaṃsanato aparavambhanato, karuṇāsītalato
atk-vin01a0:744_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi. Tattha nikkujjitanti adhomukhaṭhapitaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:744_1: heṭṭhāmukhajātaṃ vā. Ukkujjeyyāti uparimukhaṃ kareyya. Paṭicchannanti tiṇapaṇṇādipaṭicchāditaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:744_2: Vivareyyāti ugghāṭeyya. Mūḷhassāti disāmūḷhassa. Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:744_3: esa maggoti vadeyya. Andhakāreti kāḷapakkhacātuddasī aḍḍharatta-ghanavanasaṇḍa-meghapaṭalehi
atk-vin01a0:744_4: caturaṅge tamasi. Ayaṃ tāva anuttānapadattho. Ayaṃ pana adhippāyayojanā – yathā koci
atk-vin01a0:744_5: nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyya, evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ asaddhamme patiṭṭhitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā
atk-vin01a0:744_6: vuṭṭhāpentena; yathā paṭicchannaṃ vivareyya, evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānā
atk-vin01a0:744_7: pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena; yathā mūḷhassa maggaṃ
atk-vin01a0:744_8: ācikkheyya, evaṃ kummaggamicchāmaggappaṭipannassa me saggamokkhamaggaṃ ācikkhantena;
atk-vin01a0:744_9: yathā andhakāre telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, evaṃ mohandhakāre nimuggassa me buddhādiratanattayarūpāni
atk-vin01a0:744_11: bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-vin01a0:747_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto
atk-vin01a0:747_1: “esāha”ntiādimāha. Tattha esāhanti eso ahaṃ. Bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti
atk-vin01a0:747_2: bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇanti gacchāmi; bhavaṃ me gotamo saraṇaṃ, parāyaṇaṃ, aghassa
atk-vin01a0:747_3: tātā, hitassa ca vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ gacchāmi bhajāmi sevāmi
atk-vin01a0:747_4: payirupāsāmi, evaṃ vā jānāmi bujjhāmīti. Yesañhi dhātūnaṃ gatiattho, buddhipi tesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:747_5: attho; tasmā “gacchāmī”ti imassa jānāmi bujjhāmīti ayampi attho vutto. Dhammañca
atk-vin01a0:747_6: bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ettha pana adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne
atk-vin01a0:747_7: ca catūsu apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo; so atthato ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca.
atk-vin01a0:747_8: Vuttaṃ hetaṃ – “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:747_9: aggamakkhāyatī”ti vitthāro. Na kevalañca ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca, api ca kho ariyaphalehi
atk-vin01a0:750_0: Ettha hi rāgavirāgoti maggo kathito. Anejamasokanti phalaṃ. Dhammamasaṅkhatanti nibbānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:750_1: Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā sabbadhammakkhandhāti.
atk-vin01a0:750_2: Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātena saṃhatoti saṅgho, so atthato aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūho. Vuttañhetaṃ tasmiṃyeva vimāne –
atk-vin01a0:752: Aṭṭha ca puggaladhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. ;
atk-vin01a0:753: Bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho bhikkhusaṅgho. Ettāvatā ca brāhmaṇo tīṇi saraṇagamanāni paṭivedesi.
atk-vin01a0:756: Idāni tesveva tīsu saraṇagamanesu kosallatthaṃ saraṇaṃ, saraṇagamanaṃ, yo saraṇaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin01a0:757_0: Saraṇagamanappabhedo, saraṇagamanaphalaṃ, saṃkileso, bhedoti ayaṃ vidhi vedi tabbo.
atk-vin01a0:757_1: So pana idha vuccamāno atibhāriyaṃ vinayanidānaṃ karotīti na vutto. Atthikehi pana
atk-vin01a0:760_0: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretūti maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo “upāsako aya”nti evaṃ dhāretūti
atk-vin01a0:760_1: attho. Upāsakavidhikosallatthaṃ panettha ko upāsako, kasmā upāsakoti vuccati, kimassa
atk-vin01a0:760_2: sīlaṃ, ko ājīvo, kā vipatti, kā sampattīti idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ. Taṃ atibhāriyakaraṇato
atk-vin01a0:760_3: idha na vibhattaṃ, atthikehi pana papañcasūdaniyaṃ majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-vin01a0:760_4: veditabbaṃ. Ajjataggeti ettha ayaṃ aggasaddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu dissati. “Ajjatagge,
atk-vin01a0:760_5: samma dovārika, āvarāmi dvāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu hi ādimhi dissati.
atk-vin01a0:760_6: “Teneva aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ parāmaseyya, ucchaggaṃ veḷagga”ntiādīsu koṭiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:760_7: “Ambilaggaṃ vā madhuraggaṃ vā tittakaggaṃ vā anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vihāraggena vā
atk-vin01a0:760_8: pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā
atk-vin01a0:760_9: vā…pe… tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe. Idha panāyaṃ ādimhi daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a0:760_10: Tasmā ajjataggeti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvāti evamettha attho veditabbo. Ajjatanti ajjabhāvanti
atk-vin01a0:760_11: vuttaṃ hoti. Ajjadagge icceva vā pāṭho, dakāro padasandhikaro, ajja aggaṃ katvāti
atk-vin01a0:760_12: vuttaṃ hoti. Pāṇupetanti pāṇehi upetaṃ, yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva upetaṃ anaññasatthukaṃ
atk-vin01a0:760_13: tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇagataṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu jānātu, ahañhi sacepi me
atk-vin01a0:760_14: tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindeyyuṃ, neva buddhaṃ “na buddho”ti vā, dhammaṃ “na dhammo”ti
atk-vin01a0:760_15: vā, saṅghaṃ “na saṅgho”ti vā vadeyyanti. Ettha ca brāhmaṇo pāṇupetaṃ saraṇagatanti
atk-vin01a0:760_16: puna saraṇagamanaṃ vadanto attasanniyyātanaṃ pakāsetīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:761_0: Evaṃ attānaṃ niyyātetvā bhagavantaṃ saparisaṃ upaṭṭhātukāmo āha – “adhivāsetu ca
atk-vin01a0:761_1: me bhavaṃ gotamo verañjāyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-vin01a0:761_2: – upāsakañca maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu, adhivāsetu ca me verañjāyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ, tayo
atk-vin01a0:761_3: māse verañjaṃ upanissāya mama anuggahatthaṃ vāsaṃ sampaṭicchatūti. Adhivāsesi bhagavā
atk-vin01a0:761_4: tuṇhībhāvenāti athassa vacanaṃ sutvā bhagavā kāyaṅgaṃ vā vācaṅgaṃ vā acopetvā abbhantareyeva
atk-vin01a0:761_5: khantiṃ cāretvā tuṇhībhāvena adhivāsesi; brāhmaṇassa anuggahatthaṃ manasāva sampaṭicchīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:762_0: Atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvāti atha verañjo brāhmaṇo sace
atk-vin01a0:762_1: me samaṇo gotamo nādhivāseyya, kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhipeyya. Yasmā pana appaṭikkhipitvā
atk-vin01a0:762_2: abbhantare khantiṃ dhāresi, tasmā me manasāva adhivāsesīti evaṃ ākārasallakkhaṇakusalatāya
atk-vin01a0:762_3: bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā, attano nisinnāsanato vuṭṭhāya catūsu disāsu bhagavantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:762_4: sakkaccaṃ vanditvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā āgatakālato pabhuti jātimahallakabrāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:762_5: abhivādanādīni na karotīti vigarahitvāpi idāni viññātabuddhaguṇo kāyena vācāya manasā
atk-vin01a0:762_6: ca anekakkhattuṃ vandantopi atittoyeva hutvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ
atk-vin01a0:762_7: paggayha sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā yāva dassanavisayo tāva paṭimukhoyeva apakkamitvā
atk-vin01a0:765_0: 16. Tena kho pana samayena verañjā dubbhikkhā hotīti yasmiṃ samaye verañjena brāhmaṇena
atk-vin01a0:765_1: bhagavā verañjaṃ upanissāya vassāvāsaṃ yācito, tena samayena verañjā dubbhikkhā hoti.
atk-vin01a0:765_2: Dubbhikkhāti dullabhabhikkhā; sā pana dullabhabhikkhatā yattha manussā assaddhā honti
atk-vin01a0:765_3: appasannā, tattha susassakālepi atisamagghepi pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇe hoti. Verañjāyaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:765_4: yasmā na tathā ahosi, apica kho dusassatāya chātakadosena ahosi tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento
atk-vin01a0:765_5: dvīhitikātiādimāha. Tattha dvīhitikāti dvidhā pavattaīhitikā. Īhitaṃ nāma iriyā dvidhā
atk-vin01a0:765_6: pavattā – cittairiyā, cittaīhā. “Ettha lacchāma nu kho kiñci bhikkhamānā na lacchāmā”ti,
atk-vin01a0:765_7: “jīvituṃ vā sakkhissāma nu kho no”ti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-vin01a0:766_0: Atha vā dvīhitikāti dujjīvikā, īhitaṃ īhā iriyanaṃ pavattanaṃ jīvitantiādīni padāni
atk-vin01a0:766_1: ekatthāni. Tasmā dukkhena īhitaṃ ettha pavattatīti dvīhitikāti ayamettha padattho.
atk-vin01a0:766_2: Setaṭṭhikāti setakāni aṭṭhīni etthāti setaṭṭhikā. Divasampi yācitvā kiñci aladdhā
atk-vin01a0:766_3: matānaṃ kapaṇamanussānaṃ ahicchattakavaṇṇehi aṭṭhīhi tatra tatra parikiṇṇāti vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:766_4: hoti. Setaṭṭikātipi pāṭho. Tassattho – setā aṭṭi etthāti setaṭṭikā. Aṭṭīti āturatā
atk-vin01a0:766_5: byādhi rogo. Tattha ca sassānaṃ gabbhaggahaṇakāle setakarogena upahatameva pacchinnakhīraṃ
atk-vin01a0:766_6: aggahitataṇḍulaṃ paṇḍarapaṇḍaraṃ sālisīsaṃ vā yavagodhūmasīsaṃ vā nikkhamati, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:767_0: Vappakāle suṭṭhu abhisaṅkharitvāpi vuttasassaṃ tattha salākā eva sampajjatīti salākāvuttā;
atk-vin01a0:767_1: salākāya vā tattha jīvitaṃ pavattentīti salākāvuttā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Tattha kira
atk-vin01a0:767_2: dhaññavikkayakānaṃ santikaṃ kayakesu gatesu dubbalamanusse abhibhavitvā balavamanussāva
atk-vin01a0:767_3: dhaññaṃ kiṇitvā gacchanti. Dubbalamanussā alabhamānā mahāsaddaṃ karonti. Dhaññavikkayakā
atk-vin01a0:767_4: “sabbesaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmā”ti dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhāne dhaññamāpakaṃ nisīdāpetvā ekapasse
atk-vin01a0:767_5: vaṇṇajjhakkhaṃ nisīdāpesuṃ. Dhaññatthikā vaṇṇajjhakkhassa santikaṃ gacchanti. So
atk-vin01a0:767_6: āgatapaṭipāṭiyā mūlaṃ gahetvā “itthannāmassa ettakaṃ dātabba”nti salākaṃ likhitvā
atk-vin01a0:767_7: deti, te taṃ gahetvā dhaññamāpakassa santikaṃ gantvā dinnapaṭipāṭiyā dhaññaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-vin01a0:767_8: Evaṃ salākāya tattha jīvitaṃ pavattentīti salākāvuttā.
atk-vin01a0:768_0: Na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetunti paggahena yo uñcho, tena yāpetuṃ na sukarā.
atk-vin01a0:768_1: Pattaṃ gahetvā yaṃ ariyā uñchaṃ karonti, bhikkhācariyaṃ caranti, tena uñchena yāpetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:768_2: na sukarāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tadā kira tattha sattaṭṭhagāme piṇḍāya caritvā ekadivasampi
atk-vin01a0:769_0: Tena kho pana samayena uttarāpathakā assavāṇijā…pe… assosi kho bhagavā udukkhalasaddanti
atk-vin01a0:769_1: – tenāti yasmiṃ samaye bhagavā verañjaṃ upanissāya vassāvāsaṃ upagato tena samayena.
atk-vin01a0:769_2: Uttarāpathavāsikā uttarāpathato vā āgatattā evaṃ laddhavohārā assavāṇijā uttarāpathe
atk-vin01a0:769_3: assānaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhāne pañca assasatāni gahetvā diguṇaṃ tiguṇaṃ lābhaṃ patthayamānā
atk-vin01a0:769_4: desantaraṃ gacchantā tehi attano vikkāyikabhaṇḍabhūtehi pañcamattehi assasatehi verañjaṃ
atk-vin01a0:769_5: vassāvāsaṃ upagatā honti. Kasmā? Na hi sakkā tasmiṃ dese vassike cattāro māse addhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:769_6: paṭipajjituṃ. Upagacchantā ca bahinagare udakena anajjhottharaṇīye ṭhāne attano ca
atk-vin01a0:769_7: vāsāgārāni assānañca mandiraṃ kārāpetvā vatiyā parikkhipiṃsu. Tāni tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānāni
atk-vin01a0:769_9: paññattaṃ hotī”ti. Patthapatthapulakanti ekamekassa bhikkhuno patthapatthapamāṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:769_10: pulakaṃ. Pattho nāma nāḷimattaṃ hoti, ekassa purisassa alaṃ yāpanāya. Vuttampi hetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:769_11: – “patthodano nālamayaṃ duvinna”nti. Pulakaṃ nāma nitthusaṃ katvā ussedetvā gahitayavataṇḍulā
atk-vin01a0:769_12: vuccanti. Yadi hi sathusā honti, pāṇakā vijjhanti, addhānakkhamā na honti. Tasmā
atk-vin01a0:769_13: te vāṇijā addhānakkhamaṃ katvā yavataṇḍulamādāya addhānaṃ paṭipajjanti “yattha assānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:769_14: khādanīyaṃ tiṇaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavissati, tatthetaṃ assabhattaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:770_0: Kasmā pana tehi taṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paññattanti? Vuccate – “na hi te dakkhiṇāpathamanussā
atk-vin01a0:770_1: viya assaddhā appasannā, te pana saddhā pasannā buddhamāmakā, dhammamāmakā, saṅghamāmakā;
atk-vin01a0:770_2: te pubbaṇhasamayaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena nagaraṃ pavisantā dve tayo divase addasaṃsu
atk-vin01a0:770_3: sattaṭṭha bhikkhū sunivatthe supārute iriyāpathasampanne sakalampi nagaraṃ piṇḍāya
atk-vin01a0:770_4: caritvā kiñci alabhamāne. Disvāna nesaṃ etadahosi – “ayyā imaṃ nagaraṃ upanissāya
atk-vin01a0:770_5: vassaṃ upagatā; chātakañca vattati, na ca kiñci labhanti, ativiya kilamanti. Mayañcamha
atk-vin01a0:770_6: āgantukā, na sakkoma nesaṃ devasikaṃ yāguñca bhattañca paṭiyādetuṃ. Amhākaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:770_7: assā sāyañca pāto ca dvikkhattuṃ bhattaṃ labhanti. Yaṃnūna mayaṃ ekamekassa assassa
atk-vin01a0:770_8: pātarāsabhattato ekamekassa bhikkhuno patthapatthapulakaṃ dadeyyāma. Evaṃ ayyā ca
atk-vin01a0:770_9: na kilamissanti, assā ca yāpessantī”ti. Te bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā etamatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:770_10: ārocetvā “bhante, tumhe patthapatthapulakaṃ paṭiggahetvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā katvā paribhuñjathā”ti
atk-vin01a0:770_11: yācitvā devasikaṃ patthapatthapulakaṃ paññapesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “tehi assamaṇḍalikāsu
atk-vin01a0:771_0: Paññattanti niccabhattasaṅkhepena ṭhapitaṃ. Idāni bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvātiādīsu
atk-vin01a0:771_1: pubbaṇhasamayanti divasassa pubbabhāgasamayaṃ, pubbaṇhasamayeti attho. Pubbaṇhe vā
atk-vin01a0:771_2: samayaṃ pubbaṇhasamayaṃ, pubbaṇhe ekaṃ khaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ accantasaṃyoge
atk-vin01a0:771_4: veditabbaṃ. Na hi te tato pubbe anivatthā ahesuṃ. Pattacīvaramādāyāti pattaṃ hatthehi
atk-vin01a0:771_5: cīvaraṃ kāyena ādiyitvā sampaṭicchādetvā, dhāretvāti attho. Yena vā tena vā hi pakārena
atk-vin01a0:771_6: gaṇhantā ādāyaicceva vuccanti, yathā “samādāyeva pakkamatī”ti. Piṇḍaṃ alabhamānāti
atk-vin01a0:771_7: sakalampi verañjaṃ caritvā tiṭṭhatu piṇḍo, antamaso “aticchathā”ti vācampi alabhamānā.
atk-vin01a0:772_0: Patthapatthapulakaṃ ārāmaṃ āharitvāti gatagataṭṭhāne laddhaṃ ekamekaṃ patthapatthapulakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:772_1: gahetvā ārāmaṃ netvā. Udukkhale koṭṭetvā koṭṭetvā paribhuñjantīti therānaṃ koci kappiyakārako
atk-vin01a0:772_2: natthi, yo nesaṃ taṃ gahetvā yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā paceyya. Sāmampi pacanaṃ samaṇasāruppaṃ
atk-vin01a0:772_3: na hoti na ca vaṭṭati. Te evaṃ no sallahukavuttitā ca bhavissati, sāmapākaparimocanañcāti
atk-vin01a0:772_4: aṭṭha aṭṭha janā vā dasa dasa janā vā ekato hutvā udukkhale koṭṭetvā koṭṭetvā sakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:772_5: sakaṃ paṭivīsaṃ udakena temetvā paribhuñjanti. Evaṃ paribhuñjitvā appossukkā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:772_6: karonti. Bhagavato pana te assavāṇijā patthapulakañca denti, tadupiyañca sappimadhusakkaraṃ.
atk-vin01a0:772_7: Taṃ āyasmā ānando āharitvā silāyaṃ pisati. Puññavatā paṇḍitapurisena kataṃ manāpameva
atk-vin01a0:772_8: hoti. Atha naṃ pisitvā sappiādīhi sammā yojetvā bhagavato upanāmesi. Athettha devatā
atk-vin01a0:772_9: dibbojaṃ pakkhipanti. Taṃ bhagavā paribhuñjati. Paribhuñjitvā phalasamāpattiyā kālaṃ
atk-vin01a0:772_10: atināmeti. Na tato paṭṭhāya piṇḍāya carati.
atk-vin01a0:773_0: Kiṃ panānandatthero tadā bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hotīti? Hoti, no ca kho upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:773_1: laddhā. Bhagavato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassantare nibaddhupaṭṭhāko nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a0:773_2: Kadāci nāgasamālatthero bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhāsi, kadāci nāgitatthero, kadāci meghiyatthero,
atk-vin01a0:773_3: kadāci upavāṇatthero, kadāci sāgatatthero, kadāci sunakkhatto licchaviputto. Te attano
atk-vin01a0:773_4: ruciyā upaṭṭhahitvā yadā icchanti tadā pakkamanti. Ānandatthero tesu tesu upaṭṭhahantesu
atk-vin01a0:773_5: appossukko hoti, pakkantesu sayameva vattapaṭipattiṃ karoti. Bhagavāpi kiñcāpi me
atk-vin01a0:773_6: ñātiseṭṭho upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ na tāva labhati, atha kho evarūpesu ṭhānesu ayameva patirūpoti
atk-vin01a0:773_7: adhivāsesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “āyasmā panānando patthapulakaṃ silāyaṃ pisitvā bhagavato
atk-vin01a0:774_0: Nanu ca manussā dubbhikkhakāle ativiya ussāhajātā puññāni karonti, attanā abhuñjitvāpi
atk-vin01a0:774_1: bhikkhūnaṃ dātabbaṃ maññanti. Te tadā kasmā kaṭacchubhikkhampi na adaṃsu? Ayañca
atk-vin01a0:774_2: verañjo brāhmaṇo mahatā ussāhena bhagavantaṃ vassāvāsaṃ yāci, so kasmā bhagavato
atk-vin01a0:774_3: atthibhāvampi na jānātīti? Vuccate – mārāvaṭṭanāya. Verañjañhi brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavato
atk-vin01a0:774_4: santikā pakkantamattameva sakalañca nagaraṃ samantā ca yojanamattaṃ yattha sakkā
atk-vin01a0:774_5: purebhattaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā paccāgantuṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ māro āvaṭṭetvā mohetvā sabbesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:774_6: asallakkhaṇabhāvaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Tasmā na koci antamaso sāmīcikammampi kattabbaṃ maññittha.
atk-vin01a0:775_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavāpi mārāvaṭṭanaṃ ajānitvāva tattha vassaṃ upagatoti? No ajānitvā.
atk-vin01a0:775_1: Atha kasmā campā-sāvatthi-rājagahādīnaṃ aññatarasmiṃ na upagatoti? Tiṭṭhantu campā-sāvatthi-rājagahādīni,
atk-vin01a0:775_2: sacepi bhagavā tasmiṃ saṃvacchare uttarakuruṃ vā tidasapuraṃ vā gantvā vassaṃ upagaccheyya,
atk-vin01a0:775_3: tampi māro āvaṭṭeyya. So kira taṃ saṃvaccharaṃ ativiya āghātena pariyuṭṭhitacitto
atk-vin01a0:775_4: ahosi. Idha pana bhagavā imaṃ atirekakāraṇaṃ addasa – “assavāṇijā bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgahaṃ
atk-vin01a0:776_0: Kiṃ pana māro vāṇijake āvaṭṭetuṃ na sakkotīti? No na sakkoti, te pana āvaṭṭitapariyosāne
atk-vin01a0:776_1: āgamiṃsu. Paṭinivattitvā kasmā na āvaṭṭetīti? Avisahatāya. Na hi so tathāgatassa
atk-vin01a0:776_2: abhihaṭabhikkhāya nibaddhadānassa appitavattassa antarāyaṃ kātuṃ visahati. Catunnañhi
atk-vin01a0:776_3: na sakkā antarāyo kātuṃ. Katamesaṃ catunnaṃ? Tathāgatassa abhihaṭabhikkhāsaṅkhepena
atk-vin01a0:776_4: vā nibaddhadānassa appitavattasaṅkhepena vā pariccattānaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ na
atk-vin01a0:776_5: sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ. Buddhānaṃ jīvitassa na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ.
atk-vin01a0:776_6: Asītiyā anubyañjanānaṃ byāmappabhāya vā na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ. Candimasūriyadevabrahmānampi
atk-vin01a0:776_7: hi pabhā tathāgatassa anubyañjanabyāmappabhāppadesaṃ patvā vihatānubhāvā honti. Buddhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:776_8: sabbaññutaññāṇassa na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātunti imesaṃ catunnaṃ na sakkā kenaci
atk-vin01a0:776_9: antarāyo kātuṃ. Tasmā mārena akatantarāyaṃ bhikkhaṃ bhagavā sasāvakasaṅgho tadā paribhuñjatīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:777_0: Evaṃ paribhuñjanto ca ekadivasaṃ assosi kho bhagavā udukkhalasaddanti bhagavā patthapatthapulakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:777_1: koṭṭentānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ musalasaṅghaṭṭajanitaṃ udukkhalasaddaṃ suṇi. Tato paraṃ jānantāpi
atk-vin01a0:777_2: tathāgatāti evamādi yaṃ parato “kinnu kho so, ānanda, udukkhalasaddo”ti pucchi, tassa
atk-vin01a0:777_3: parihāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā – tathāgatā nāma jānantāpi
atk-vin01a0:777_4: sace tādisaṃ pucchākāraṇaṃ hoti, pucchanti. Sace pana tādisaṃ pucchākāraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-vin01a0:777_5: jānantāpi na pucchanti. Yasmā pana buddhānaṃ ajānanaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā ajānantāpīti
atk-vin01a0:777_6: na vuttaṃ. Kālaṃ viditvā pucchantīti sace tassā pucchāya so kālo hoti, evaṃ taṃ kālaṃ
atk-vin01a0:777_7: viditvā pucchanti; sace na hoti, evampi kālaṃ viditvāva na pucchanti. Evaṃ pucchantāpi
atk-vin01a0:777_8: ca atthasaṃhitaṃ tathāgatā pucchanti, yaṃ atthanissitaṃ kāraṇanissitaṃ, tadeva pucchanti,
atk-vin01a0:777_9: no anatthasaṃhitaṃ. Kasmā? Yasmā anatthasaṃhite setughāto tathāgatānaṃ. Setu vuccati
atk-vin01a0:777_10: maggo, maggeneva tādisassa vacanassa ghāto, samucchedoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:778_0: Idāni atthasaṃhitanti ettha yaṃ atthasannissitaṃ vacanaṃ tathāgatā pucchanti, taṃ
atk-vin01a0:778_1: dassento “dvīhākārehī”ti ādimāha. Tattha ākārehīti kāraṇehi. Dhammaṃ vā desessāmāti
atk-vin01a0:778_2: aṭṭhuppattiyuttaṃ suttaṃ vā pubbacaritakāraṇayuttaṃ jātakaṃ vā kathayissāma. Sāvakānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:778_3: vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmāti sāvakānaṃ vā tāya pucchāya vītikkamaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:778_4: garukaṃ vā lahukaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāma āṇaṃ ṭhapessāmāti.
atk-vin01a0:779_0: Atha kho bhagavā…pe… etamatthaṃ ārocesīti ettha natthi kiñci vattabbaṃ. Pubbe vuttameva
atk-vin01a0:779_2: ārocento etamatthaṃ ārocesīti vuccati. “Sādhu sādhu, ānandā”ti idaṃ pana bhagavā
atk-vin01a0:779_3: āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sampahaṃsento āha. Sādhukāraṃ pana datvā dvīsu ākāresu ekaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:779_4: dhammaṃ desento āha – “tumhehi, ānanda, sappurisehi vijitaṃ, pacchimā janatā sālimaṃsodanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:779_5: atimaññissatī”ti. Tatrāyamadhippāyo – tumhehi, ānanda, sappurisehi evaṃ dubbhikkhe
atk-vin01a0:779_6: dullabhapiṇḍe imāya sallahukavuttitāya iminā ca sallekhena vijitaṃ. Kiṃ vijitanti?
atk-vin01a0:779_7: Dubbhikkhaṃ vijitaṃ, lobho vijito, icchācāro vijito. Kathaṃ? “Ayaṃ verañjā dubbhikkhā,
atk-vin01a0:779_8: samantato pana anantarā gāmanigamā phalabhāranamitasassā subhikkhā sulabhapiṇḍā.
atk-vin01a0:779_9: Evaṃ santepi bhagavā idheva amhe niggaṇhitvā vasatī”ti ekabhikkhussapi cintā vā vighāto
atk-vin01a0:779_10: vā natthi. Evaṃ tāva dubbhikkhaṃ vijitaṃ abhibhūtaṃ attano vase vattitaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:780_0: Kathaṃ lobho vijito? “Ayaṃ verañjā dubbhikkhā, samantato pana anantarā gāmanigamā
atk-vin01a0:780_1: phalabhāranamitasassā subhikkhā sulabhapiṇḍā. Handa mayaṃ tattha gantvā paribhuñjissāmā”ti
atk-vin01a0:780_2: lobhavasena ekabhikkhunāpi ratticchedo vā “pacchimikāya tattha vassaṃ upagacchāmā”ti
atk-vin01a0:780_3: vassacchedo vā na kato. Evaṃ lobho vijito.
atk-vin01a0:781_0: Kathaṃ icchācāro vijito? Ayaṃ verañjā dubbhikkhā, ime ca manussā amhe dve tayo māse
atk-vin01a0:781_1: vasantepi na kismiñci maññanti. Yaṃnūna mayaṃ guṇavāṇijjaṃ katvā “asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa
atk-vin01a0:781_2: jhānassa lābhī…pe… asuko chaḷabhiññoti evaṃ manussānaṃ aññamaññaṃ pakāsetvā kucchiṃ
atk-vin01a0:781_3: paṭijaggitvā pacchā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhaheyyāmā”ti ekabhikkhunāpi evarūpā icchā na uppāditā.
atk-vin01a0:781_4: Evaṃ icchācāro vijito abhibhūto attano vase vattitoti.
atk-vin01a0:782_0: Anāgate pana pacchimā janatā vihāre nisinnā appakasireneva labhitvāpi “kiṃ idaṃ uttaṇḍulaṃ
atk-vin01a0:782_1: atikilinnaṃ aloṇaṃ atiloṇaṃ anambilaṃ accambilaṃ, ko iminā attho”ti ādinā nayena
atk-vin01a0:782_2: sālimaṃsodanaṃ atimaññissati, oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ karissati. Atha vā janapado nāma
atk-vin01a0:782_3: na sabbakālaṃ dubbhikkho hoti. Ekadā dubbhikkho hoti, ekadā subhikkho hoti. Svāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:782_4: yadā subhikkho bhavissati, tadā tumhākaṃ sappurisānaṃ imāya paṭipattiyā pasannā manussā
atk-vin01a0:782_5: bhikkhūnaṃ yāgukhajjakādippabhedena anekappakāraṃ sālivikatiṃ maṃsodanañca dātabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:782_6: maññissanti. Taṃ tumhe nissāya uppannaṃ sakkāraṃ tumhākaṃ sabrahmacārīsaṅkhātā pacchimā
atk-vin01a0:782_7: janatā tumhākaṃ antare nisīditvā anubhavamānāva atimaññissati, tappaccayaṃ mānañca
atk-vin01a0:782_8: omānañca karissati. Kathaṃ? Kasmā ettakaṃ pakkaṃ, kiṃ tumhākaṃ bhājanāni natthi,
atk-vin01a0:785_0: 17. Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānotiādīsu āyasmāti piyavacanametaṃ, garugāravasappatissādhivacanametaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:785_1: Mahāmoggallānoti mahā ca so guṇamahantatāya moggallāno ca gottenāti mahāmoggallāno.
atk-vin01a0:785_2: Etadavocāti etaṃ avoca. Idāni vattabbaṃ “etarahi bhante”tiādivacanaṃ dasseti. Kasmā
atk-vin01a0:785_3: avoca? Thero kira pabbajitvā sattame divase sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto,
atk-vin01a0:785_4: satthārāpi mahiddhikatāya etadagge ṭhapito. So taṃ attano mahiddhikataṃ nissāya cintesi
atk-vin01a0:785_5: – “ayaṃ verañjā dubbhikkhā, bhikkhū ca kilamanti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ pathaviṃ parivattetvā
atk-vin01a0:785_6: bhikkhū pappaṭakojaṃ bhojeyya”nti. Athassa etadahosi – “sace panāhaṃ bhagavato santike
atk-vin01a0:785_7: viharanto bhagavantaṃ ayācitvā evaṃ kareyyaṃ, na metaṃ assa patirūpaṃ; yugaggāho
atk-vin01a0:785_8: viya bhagavatā saddhiṃ kato bhaveyyā”ti. Tasmā yācitukāmo āgantvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca.
atk-vin01a0:786_0: Heṭṭhimatalaṃ sampannanti pathaviyā kira heṭṭhimatale pathavimaṇḍo pathavojo pathavi-pappaṭako
atk-vin01a0:786_1: atthi, taṃ sandhāya vadati. Tattha sampannanti madhuraṃ, sādurasanti attho. Yatheva
atk-vin01a0:786_2: hi “tatrassa rukkho sampannaphalo ca upapannaphalo cā”ti ettha madhuraphaloti attho;
atk-vin01a0:786_3: evamidhāpi sampannanti madhuraṃ sādurasanti veditabbaṃ. Seyyathāpi khuddamadhuṃ anīḷakanti
atk-vin01a0:786_4: idaṃ panassa madhuratāya opammanidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Khuddamadhunti khuddakamakkhikāhi
atk-vin01a0:786_5: katamadhu. Anīḷakanti nimmakkhikaṃ nimmakkhikaṇḍakaṃ parisuddhaṃ. Etaṃ kira madhu
atk-vin01a0:786_6: sabbamadhūhi aggañca seṭṭhañca surasañca ojavantañca. Tenāha – “seyyathāpi khuddamadhuṃ
atk-vin01a0:787_0: Sādhāhaṃ, bhanteti sādhu ahaṃ, bhante. Ettha sādhūti āyācanavacanametaṃ. Pathaviparivattanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:787_1: āyācanto hi thero bhagavantaṃ evamāha. Parivatteyyanti ukkujjeyyaṃ, heṭṭhimatalaṃ
atk-vin01a0:787_2: uparimaṃ kareyyaṃ. Kasmā? Evañhi kate sukhena bhikkhū pappaṭakojaṃ pathavimaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin01a0:787_3: paribhuñjissantīti. Atha bhagavā ananuññātukāmopi theraṃ sīhanādaṃ nadāpetuṃ pucchi
atk-vin01a0:787_4: – “ye pana te, moggallāna, pathavinissitā pāṇā te kathaṃ karissasī”ti. Ye pathavinissitā
atk-vin01a0:787_5: gāmanigamādīsu pāṇā, te pathaviyā parivattiyamānāya ākāse saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonte kathaṃ
atk-vin01a0:787_6: karissasi, kattha ṭhapessasīti? Atha thero bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapitabhāvānurūpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:787_7: attano iddhānubhāvaṃ pakāsento “ekāhaṃ, bhante”tiādimāha. Tassattho – ekaṃ ahaṃ bhante
atk-vin01a0:787_8: hatthaṃ yathā ayaṃ mahāpathavī evaṃ abhinimminissāmi, pathavisadisaṃ karissāmi. Evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:787_9: katvā ye pathavinissitā pāṇā te ekasmiṃ hatthatale ṭhite pāṇe tato dutiyahatthatale
atk-vin01a0:788_0: Athassa bhagavā āyācanaṃ paṭikkhipanto “alaṃ moggallānā”tiādimāha. Tattha alanti
atk-vin01a0:788_1: paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. Vipallāsampi sattā paṭilabheyyunti viparītaggāhampi sattā sampāpuṇeyyuṃ.
atk-vin01a0:788_2: Kathaṃ? Ayaṃ nu kho pathavī, udāhu na ayanti. Atha vā amhākaṃ nu kho ayaṃ gāmo, udāhu
atk-vin01a0:788_3: aññesa”nti. Evaṃ nigamajanapadakhettārāmādīsu. Na vā esa vipallāso, acinteyyo hi
atk-vin01a0:788_4: iddhimato iddhivisayo. Evaṃ pana vipallāsaṃ paṭilabheyyuṃ – idaṃ dubbhikkhaṃ nāma
atk-vin01a0:788_5: na idāniyeva hoti, anāgatepi bhavissati. Tadā bhikkhū tādisaṃ iddhimantaṃ sabrahmacāriṃ
atk-vin01a0:788_7: samānā iddhibalābhāvā parakulāni piṇḍāya upasaṅkamissanti. Tatra manussānaṃ evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:788_8: bhavissati – “buddhakāle bhikkhū sikkhāsu paripūrakārino ahesuṃ. Te guṇe nibbattetvā
atk-vin01a0:788_9: dubbhikkhakāle pathaviṃ parivattetvā pappaṭakojaṃ paribhuñjiṃsu. Idāni pana sikkhāya
atk-vin01a0:788_10: paripūrakārino natthi. Yadi siyuṃ, tatheva kareyyuṃ. Na amhākaṃ yaṃ kiñci pakkaṃ
atk-vin01a0:788_11: vā āmaṃ vā khādituṃ dadeyyu”nti. Evaṃ tesuyeva ariyapuggalesu “natthi ariyapuggalā”ti
atk-vin01a0:788_12: imaṃ vipallāsaṃ paṭilabheyyuṃ. Vipallāsavasena ca ariye garahantā upavadantā apāyupagā
atk-vin01a0:788_13: bhaveyyuṃ. Tasmā mā te rucci pathaviṃ parivattetunti.
atk-vin01a0:789_0: Atha thero imaṃ yācanaṃ alabhamāno aññaṃ yācanto “sādhu, bhante”tiādimāha. Tampissa
atk-vin01a0:789_1: bhagavā paṭikkhipanto “alaṃ moggallānā”tiādimāha. Tattha kiñcāpi na vuttaṃ “vipallāsampi
atk-vin01a0:789_2: sattā paṭilabheyyu”nti, atha kho pubbe vuttanayeneva gahetabbaṃ; atthopi cassa vuttasadisameva
atk-vin01a0:789_3: veditabbo. Yadi pana bhagavā anujāneyya, thero kiṃ kareyyāti? Mahāsamuddaṃ ekena
atk-vin01a0:789_4: padavītihārena atikkamitabbaṃ mātikāmattaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā naḷerupucimandato uttarakuruabhimukhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:789_5: maggaṃ nīharitvā uttarakuruṃ gamanāgamanasampanne ṭhāne katvā dasseyya, yathā bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:789_6: gocaragāmaṃ viya yathāsukhaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā nikkhameyyunti.
atk-vin01a0:792_0: 18. Idāni āyasmā upāli vinayapaññattiyā mūlato pabhuti nidānaṃ dassetuṃ sāriputtattherassa
atk-vin01a0:792_1: sikkhāpadapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vitakkuppādaṃ dassento “atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:792_2: Tattha rahogatassāti rahasi gatassa. Paṭisallīnassāti sallīnassa ekībhāvaṃ gatassa.
atk-vin01a0:792_3: Katamesānanti atītesu vipassīādīsu buddhesu katamesaṃ. Ciraṃ assa ṭhiti, cirā vā
atk-vin01a0:793_0: Kiṃ pana thero imaṃ attano parivitakkaṃ sayaṃ vinicchinituṃ na sakkotīti? Vuccate
atk-vin01a0:793_1: – sakkoti ca na sakkoti ca. Ayañhi imesaṃ nāma buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:793_2: ahosi, imesaṃ ciraṭṭhitikanti ettakaṃ sakkoti vinicchinituṃ. Iminā pana kāraṇena
atk-vin01a0:793_3: na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosi, iminā ciraṭṭhitikanti etaṃ na sakkoti. Mahāpadumatthero panāha
atk-vin01a0:793_4: – “etampi soḷasavidhāya paññāya matthakaṃ pattassa aggasāvakassa na bhāriyaṃ, sammāsambuddhena
atk-vin01a0:793_5: pana saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasantassa sayaṃ vinicchayakaraṇaṃ tulaṃ chaḍḍetvā hatthena
atk-vin01a0:793_6: tulanasadisaṃ hotīti bhagavantaṃyeva upasaṅkamitvā pucchī”ti. Athassa bhagavā taṃ
atk-vin01a0:793_7: vissajjento “bhagavato ca sāriputta vipassissā”tiādimāha. Taṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:794_0: 19. Puna thero kāraṇaṃ pucchanto ko nu kho, bhante, hetūtiādimāha. Tattha ko nu kho
atk-vin01a0:794_1: bhanteti kāraṇapucchā, tassa katamo nu kho bhanteti attho. Hetu paccayoti ubhayametaṃ
atk-vin01a0:794_2: kāraṇādhivacanaṃ; kāraṇañhi yasmā tena tassa phalaṃ hinoti pavattati, tasmā hetūti
atk-vin01a0:794_3: vuccati. Yasmā taṃ paṭicca eti pavattati, tasmā paccayoti vuccati. Evaṃ atthato ekampi
atk-vin01a0:794_4: vohāravasena ca vacanasiliṭṭhatāya ca tatra tatra etaṃ ubhayampi vuccati. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:795_0: Idāni taṃ hetuñca paccayañca dassetuṃ “bhagavā ca sāriputta vipassī”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:795_1: kilāsuno ahesunti na ālasiyakilāsuno, na hi buddhānaṃ ālasiyaṃ vā osannavīriyatā
atk-vin01a0:795_2: vā atthi. Buddhā hi ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā sakalacakkavāḷassa vā dhammaṃ desentā samakeneva
atk-vin01a0:795_3: ussāhena dhammaṃ desenti, na parisāya appabhāvaṃ disvā osannavīriyā honti, nāpi mahantabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:795_4: disvā ussannavīriyā. Yathā hi sīho migarājā sattannaṃ divasānaṃ accayena gocarāya
atk-vin01a0:795_5: pakkanto khuddake vā mahante vā pāṇe ekasadiseneva vegena dhāvati. Taṃ kissa hetu?
atk-vin01a0:795_6: “Mā me javo parihāyī”ti. Evaṃ buddhā appakāya vā mahatiyā vā parisāya samakeneva
atk-vin01a0:795_7: ussāhena dhammaṃ desenti. Taṃ kissa hetu? “Mā no dhammagarutā parihāyī”ti. Dhammagaruno
atk-vin01a0:796_0: Yathā pana amhākaṃ bhagavā mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamāno viya vitthārena dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-vin01a0:796_1: evaṃ te na desesuṃ. Kasmā? Sattānaṃ apparajakkhatāya. Tesaṃ kira kāle dīghāyukā sattā
atk-vin01a0:796_2: apparajakkhā ahesuṃ. Te catusaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ ekagāthampi sutvā dhammaṃ abhisamenti,
atk-vin01a0:796_3: tasmā na vitthārena dhammaṃ desesuṃ. Teneva kāraṇena appakañca nesaṃ ahosi suttaṃ…pe…
atk-vin01a0:796_4: vedallanti. Tattha suttādīnaṃ nānattaṃ paṭhamasaṅgītivaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.
atk-vin01a0:797_0: Apaññattaṃ sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadanti sāvakānaṃ niddosatāya dosānurūpato paññapetabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:797_1: sattāpattikkhandhavasena āṇāsikkhāpadaṃ apaññattaṃ. Anuddiṭṭhaṃ pātimokkhanti anvaddhamāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:797_2: āṇāpātimokkhaṃ anuddiṭṭhaṃ ahosi. Ovādapātimokkhameva te uddisiṃsu; tampi ca no anvaddhamāsaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:797_3: Tathā hi vipassī bhagavā channaṃ channaṃ vassānaṃ sakiṃ sakiṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisi;
atk-vin01a0:797_4: tañca kho sāmaṃyeva. Sāvakā panassa attano attano vasanaṭṭhānesu na uddisiṃsu. Sakalajambudīpe
atk-vin01a0:797_5: ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne bandhumatiyā rājadhāniyā kheme migadāye vipassissa bhagavato vasanaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a0:797_6: sabbopi bhikkhusaṅgho uposathaṃ akāsi. Tañca kho saṅghuposathameva; na gaṇuposathaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:797_7: na puggaluposathaṃ, na pārisuddhiuposathaṃ, na adhiṭṭhānuposathaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:798_0: Tadā kira jambudīpe caturāsītivihārasahassāni honti. Ekamekasmiṃ vihāre abbokiṇṇāni
atk-vin01a0:798_1: dasapi vīsatipi bhikkhusahassāni vasanti, bhiyyopi vasanti. Uposathārocikā devatā
atk-vin01a0:798_2: tattha tattha gantvā ārocenti – “mārisā, ekaṃ vassaṃ atikkantaṃ, dve tīṇi cattāri
atk-vin01a0:798_3: pañca vassāni atikkantāni, idaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ vassaṃ, āgāminiyā puṇṇamāsiyā buddhadassanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:798_4: uposathakaraṇatthañca gantabbaṃ! Sampatto vo sannipātakālo”ti. Tato sānubhāvā bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:798_5: attano attano ānubhāvena gacchanti, itare devatānubhāvena. Kathaṃ? Te kira bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:798_6: pācīnasamuddante vā pacchimauttaradakkhiṇasamuddante vā ṭhitā gamiyavattaṃ pūretvā
atk-vin01a0:798_7: pattacīvaramādāya “gacchāmā”ti cittaṃ uppādenti; saha cittuppādā uposathaggaṃ gatāva
atk-vin01a0:798_8: honti. Te vipassiṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ abhivādetvā nisīdanti. Bhagavāpi sannisinnāya
atk-vin01a0:807: Adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti. ;
atk-vin01a0:808_0: Eteneva upāyena itaresampi buddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddeso veditabbo. Sabbabuddhānañhi
atk-vin01a0:808_1: imā tissova ovādapātimokkhagāthāyo honti. Tā dīghāyukabuddhānaṃ yāva sāsanapariyantā
atk-vin01a0:808_3: pana pabhuti āṇāpātimokkhameva uddisīyati. Tañca kho bhikkhū eva uddisanti, na buddhā.
atk-vin01a0:808_4: Tasmā amhākampi bhagavā paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassamattameva idaṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:808_5: uddisi. Athekadivasaṃ pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde nisinno bhikkhū āmantesi – “na dānāhaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:808_6: bhikkhave, ito paraṃ uposathaṃ karissāmi pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi, tumheva dāni bhikkhave
atk-vin01a0:808_7: ito paraṃ uposathaṃ kareyyātha, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyātha. Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-vin01a0:808_8: anavakāso yaṃ tathāgato aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ kareyya, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:808_9: Tato paṭṭhāya bhikkhū āṇāpātimokkhaṃ uddisanti. Idaṃ āṇāpātimokkhaṃ tesaṃ anuddiṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:809_0: Tesaṃ buddhānanti tesaṃ vipassīādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ. Antaradhānenāti khandhantaradhānena;
atk-vin01a0:809_1: parinibbānenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Buddhānubuddhānanti ye tesaṃ buddhānaṃ anubuddhā sammukhasāvakā
atk-vin01a0:809_2: tesañca khandhantaradhānena. Ye te pacchimā sāvakāti ye tesaṃ sammukhasāvakānaṃ santike
atk-vin01a0:809_3: pabbajitā pacchimā sāvakā. Nānānāmāti “buddharakkhito, dhammarakkhito”tiādi nāmavasena
atk-vin01a0:809_4: vividhanāmā. Nānāgottāti “gotamo, moggallāno”tiādi gottavasena vividhagottā. Nānājaccāti
atk-vin01a0:809_6: neva uccanīcauḷāruḷārabhogādikulavasena vā vividhakulā nikkhamma pabbajitā.
atk-vin01a0:810_0: Te taṃ brahmacariyanti te pacchimā sāvakā yasmā ekanāmā ekagottā ekajātikā ekakulā
atk-vin01a0:810_1: pabbajitā “amhākaṃ sāsanaṃ tanti paveṇī”ti attano bhāraṃ katvā brahmacariyaṃ rakkhanti,
atk-vin01a0:810_2: ciraṃ pariyattidhammaṃ pariharanti. Ime ca tādisā na honti. Tasmā aññamaññaṃ viheṭhentā
atk-vin01a0:810_3: vilomaṃ gaṇhantā “asuko thero jānissati, asuko thero jānissatī”ti sithilaṃ karontā
atk-vin01a0:810_4: taṃ brahmacariyaṃ khippaññeva antaradhāpesuṃ, saṅgahaṃ āropetvā na rakkhiṃsu. Seyyathāpīti
atk-vin01a0:810_5: tassatthassa opammanidassanaṃ. Vikiratīti vikkhipati. Vidhamatīti ṭhānantaraṃ neti.
atk-vin01a0:810_6: Viddhaṃsetīti ṭhitaṭṭhānato apaneti. Yathā taṃ suttena asaṅgahitattāti yathā suttena
atk-vin01a0:810_7: asaṅgahitattā aganthitattā abaddhattā evaṃ vikirati yathā suttena asaṅgahitāni vikiriyanti,
atk-vin01a0:810_8: evaṃ vikiratīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evameva khoti opammasampaṭipādanaṃ. Antaradhāpesunti
atk-vin01a0:810_9: vaggasaṅgaha-paṇṇāsasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgaṇhantā yaṃ yaṃ attano ruccati, taṃ tadeva gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:811_0: Akilāsuno ca te bhagavanto ahesuṃ sāvake cetasā ceto paricca ovaditunti apica sāriputta
atk-vin01a0:811_1: te buddhā attano cetasā sāvakānaṃ ceto paricca paricchinditvā ovadituṃ akilāsuno
atk-vin01a0:811_2: ahesuṃ, paracittaṃ ñatvā anusāsaniṃ na bhāriyato na papañcato addasaṃsu. Bhūtapubbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:811_3: sāriputtātiādi tesaṃ akilāsubhāvappakāsanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhiṃsanaketi bhayānake bhayajananake.
atk-vin01a0:811_4: Evaṃ vitakkethāti nekkhammavitakkādayo tayo vitakke vitakketha. Mā evaṃ vitakkayitthāti
atk-vin01a0:811_5: kāmavitakkādayo tayo akusalavitakke mā vitakkayittha. Evaṃ manasi karothāti “aniccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:811_6: dukkhamanattā asubha”nti manasi karotha. Mā evaṃ manasā katthāti “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā
atk-vin01a0:811_7: subha”nti mā manasi akarittha. Idaṃ pajahathāti akusalaṃ pajahatha. Idaṃ upasampajja
atk-vin01a0:811_8: viharathāti kusalaṃ upasampajja paṭilabhitvā nipphādetvā viharatha.
atk-vin01a0:812_0: Anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsūti aggahetvā vimucciṃsu. Tesañhi cittāni yehi
atk-vin01a0:812_1: āsavehi vimucciṃsu, na te tāni gahetvā vimucciṃsu. Anuppādanirodhena pana nirujjhamānā
atk-vin01a0:812_2: aggahetvā vimucciṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsū”ti. Sabbepi
atk-vin01a0:812_3: te arahattaṃ patvā sūriyarasmisamphuṭṭhamiva padumavanaṃ vikasitacittā ahesuṃ. Tatra
atk-vin01a0:812_4: sudaṃ sāriputta bhiṃsanakassa vanasaṇḍassa bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ hotīti tatrāti purimavacanāpekkhaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:812_5: sudanti padapūraṇamatte nipāto; sāriputtāti ālapanaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha atthayojanā –
atk-vin01a0:812_6: tatrāti yaṃ vuttaṃ “aññatarasmiṃ bhiṃsanake vanasaṇḍe”ti, tatra yo so bhiṃsanakoti
atk-vin01a0:812_7: vanasaṇḍo vutto, tassa bhiṃsanakassa vanasaṇḍassa bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ hoti, bhiṃsanakiriyāya
atk-vin01a0:812_8: hotīti attho. Kiṃ hoti? Idaṃ hoti – yo koci avītarāgo…pe… lomāni haṃsantīti.
atk-vin01a0:813_0: Atha vā tatrāti sāmiatthe bhummaṃ. Suiti nipāto; “kiṃ su nāma te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā”tiādīsu
atk-vin01a0:813_1: viya. Idanti adhippetamatthaṃ paccakkhaṃ viya katvā dassanavacanaṃ. Suidanti sudaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:813_3: “kiṃ sūdha vitta”ntiādīsu viya. Ayaṃ panettha atthayojanā – tassa sāriputta bhiṃsanakassa
atk-vin01a0:813_4: vanasaṇḍassa bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ idaṃsu hoti. Bhiṃsanakatasminti bhiṃsanakabhāveti attho.
atk-vin01a0:813_5: Ekassa takārassa lopo daṭṭhabbo. Bhiṃsanakattasmintiyeva vā pāṭho. “Bhiṃsanakatāya”
atk-vin01a0:813_6: iti vā vattabbe liṅgavipallāso kato. Nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ, tasmā evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:813_7: sambandho veditabbo – bhiṃsanakabhāve idaṃsu hoti, bhiṃsanakabhāvanimittaṃ bhiṃsanakabhāvahetu
atk-vin01a0:813_8: bhiṃsanakabhāvapaccayā idaṃsu hoti. Yo koci avītarāgo taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati, yebhuyyena
atk-vin01a0:813_9: lomāni haṃsantīti bahutarāni lomāni haṃsanti uddhaṃ mukhāni sūcisadisāni kaṇṭakasadisāni
atk-vin01a0:813_10: ca hutvā tiṭṭhanti, appāni na haṃsanti. Bahutarānaṃ vā sattānaṃ haṃsanti. Appakānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:814_0: Idāni ayaṃ kho, sāriputta, hetūtiādi nigamanaṃ. Yañcettha antarantarā na vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:814_1: taṃ uttānatthameva. Tasmā pāḷikkameneva veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:814_2: ahosīti, taṃ purisayugavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Vassagaṇanāya hi vipassissa bhagavato
atk-vin01a0:814_3: asītivassasahassāni āyu, sammukhasāvakānampissa tattakameva. Evamassa yvāyaṃ sabbapacchimako
atk-vin01a0:814_4: sāvako, tena saha ghaṭetvā satasahassaṃ saṭṭhimattāni ca vassasahassāni brahmacariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:814_5: aṭṭhāsi. Purisayugavasena pana yugaparamparāya āgantvā dveyeva purisayugāni aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a0:814_6: Tasmā na ciraṭṭhitikanti vuttaṃ. Sikhissa pana bhagavato sattativassasahassāni āyu.
atk-vin01a0:814_7: Sammukhasāvakānampissa tattakameva. Vessabhussa bhagavato saṭṭhivassasahassāni āyu.
atk-vin01a0:814_8: Sammukhasāvakānampissa tattakameva. Evaṃ tesampi ye sabbapacchimakā sāvakā tehi saha
atk-vin01a0:814_9: ghaṭetvā satasahassato uddhaṃ cattālīsamattāni vīsatimattāni ca vassasahassāni brahmacariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:814_10: aṭṭhāsi. Purisayugavasena pana yugaparamparāya āgantvā dve dveyeva purisayugāni aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin01a0:815_0: 20. Evaṃ āyasmā sāriputto tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ brahmacariyassa na ciraṭṭhitikāraṇaṃ sutvā
atk-vin01a0:815_1: itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitikāraṇaṃ sotukāmo puna bhagavantaṃ “ko pana
atk-vin01a0:815_2: bhante hetū”ti ādinā nayena pucchi. Bhagavāpissa byākāsi. Taṃ sabbaṃ vuttapaṭipakkhavasena
atk-vin01a0:815_3: veditabbaṃ. Ciraṭṭhitikabhāvepi cettha tesaṃ buddhānaṃ āyuparimāṇatopi purisayugatopi
atk-vin01a0:815_4: ubhayathā ciraṭṭhitikatā veditabbā. Kakusandhassa hi bhagavato cattālīsavassasahassāni
atk-vin01a0:815_5: āyu, koṇāgamanassa bhagavato tiṃsavassasahassāni, kassapassa bhagavato vīsativassasahassāni;
atk-vin01a0:815_6: sammukhasāvakānampi nesaṃ tattakameva. Bahūni ca nesaṃ sāvakayugāni paramparāya brahmacariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:815_7: pavattesuṃ. Evaṃ tesaṃ āyuparimāṇatopi sāvakayugatopi ubhayathā brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosi.
atk-vin01a0:816_0: Amhākaṃ pana bhagavato kassapassa bhagavato upaḍḍhāyukappamāṇe dasavassasahassāyukakāle
atk-vin01a0:816_1: uppajjitabbaṃ siyā. Taṃ asambhuṇantena pañcavassasahassāyukakāle, ekavassasahassāyukakāle,
atk-vin01a0:816_2: pañcavassasatāyukakālepi vā uppajjitabbaṃ siyā. Yasmā panassa buddhattakārake dhamme
atk-vin01a0:816_3: esantassa pariyesantassa ñāṇaṃ paripācentassa gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentassa vassasatāyukakāle
atk-vin01a0:816_4: ñāṇaṃ paripākamagamāsi. Tasmā atiparittāyukakāle uppanno. Tenassa sāvakaparamparāvasena
atk-vin01a0:816_5: ciraṭṭhitikampi brahmacariyaṃ āyuparimāṇavasena vassagaṇanāya naciraṭṭhitikamevāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:817_0: 21. Atha kho āyasmā sāriputtoti ko anusandhi? Evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ brahmacariyassa
atk-vin01a0:817_1: ciraṭṭhitikāraṇaṃ sutvā sikkhāpadapaññattiyeva ciraṭṭhitikabhāvahetūti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā
atk-vin01a0:817_2: bhagavatopi brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitikabhāvaṃ icchanto āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:817_3: sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ yāci. Tassā yācanavidhidassanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ – atha kho āyasmā
atk-vin01a0:817_4: sāriputto uṭṭhāyāsanā …pe… ciraṭṭhitikanti. Tattha addhaniyanti addhānakkhamaṃ; dīghakālikanti
atk-vin01a0:818_0: Athassa bhagavā “na tāvāyaṃ sikkhāpadapaññattikālo”ti pakāsento “āgamehi tvaṃ sāriputtā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:818_1: Tattha āgamehi tvanti tiṭṭha tāva tvaṃ; adhivāsehi tāva tvanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ādaratthavasenevettha
atk-vin01a0:818_2: dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ. Etena bhagavā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sāvakānaṃ visayabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipitvā
atk-vin01a0:818_4: tatthāti sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanāpekkhaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ yojanā – yaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:818_5: “sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyyā”ti, tattha tassā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā tathāgatoyeva kālaṃ
atk-vin01a0:818_6: jānissatīti. Evaṃ vatvā akālaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “na tāva sāriputtā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:819_0: Tattha āsavā tiṭṭhanti etesūti āsavaṭṭhānīyā. Yesu diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikā dukkhāsavā
atk-vin01a0:819_2: ca āsavā tiṭṭhantiyeva, yasmā nesaṃ te kāraṇaṃ hontīti attho. Te āsavaṭṭhānīyā vītikkamadhammā
atk-vin01a0:819_3: yāva na saṅghe pātubhavanti, na tāva satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti ayamettha
atk-vin01a0:819_4: yojanā. Yadi hi paññapeyya, parūpavādā parūpārambhā garahadosā na parimucceyya.
atk-vin01a0:820_0: Kathaṃ? Paññapentena hi “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”tiādi sabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:820_1: paññapetabbaṃ bhaveyya. Adisvāva vītikkamadosaṃ imaṃ paññattiṃ ñatvā pare evaṃ upavādañca
atk-vin01a0:820_2: upārambhañca garahañca pavatteyyuṃ – “kathañhi nāma samaṇo gotamo bhikkhusaṅgho me
atk-vin01a0:820_3: anvāyiko vacanakaroti ettāvatā sikkhāpadehi paliveṭhessati, pārājikaṃ paññapessati?
atk-vin01a0:820_4: Nanu ime kulaputtā mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahantañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ hatthagatāni
atk-vin01a0:820_5: ca rajjānipi pahāya pabbajitā, ghāsacchādanaparamatāya santuṭṭhā, sikkhāya tibbagāravā,
atk-vin01a0:820_6: kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhā viharanti. Tesu nāma ko lokāmisabhūtaṃ methunaṃ vā paṭisevissati,
atk-vin01a0:820_7: parabhaṇḍaṃ vā harissati, parassa vā iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ atimadhuraṃ jīvitaṃ upacchindissati,
atk-vin01a0:820_8: abhūtaguṇakathāya vā jīvitaṃ kappessati! Nanu pārājike apaññattepi pabbajjāsaṅkhepenevetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:820_9: pākaṭaṃ kata”nti. Tathāgatassa ca thāmañca balañca sattā na jāneyyuṃ. Paññattampi
atk-vin01a0:820_10: sikkhāpadaṃ kuppeyya, na yathāṭhāne tiṭṭheyya. Seyyathāpi nāma akusalo vejjo kañci
atk-vin01a0:820_11: anuppannagaṇḍaṃ purisaṃ pakkosāpetvā “ehi bho purisa, imasmiṃ te sarīrappadese mahāgaṇḍo
atk-vin01a0:820_12: uppajjitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpessati, paṭikacceva naṃ tikicchāpehī”ti vatvā “sādhācariya,
atk-vin01a0:820_13: tvaṃyeva naṃ tikicchassū”ti vutto tassa arogaṃ sarīrappadesaṃ phāletvā lohitaṃ nīharitvā
atk-vin01a0:820_14: ālepanabandhanadhovanādīhi taṃ padesaṃ sañchaviṃ katvā taṃ purisaṃ vadeyya – “mahārogo
atk-vin01a0:820_15: te mayā tikicchito, dehi me deyyadhamma”nti. So taṃ “kimayaṃ bālavejjo vadati? Kataro
atk-vin01a0:820_16: kira me iminā rogo tikicchito? Nanu me ayaṃ dukkhañca janeti, lohitakkhayañca maṃ
atk-vin01a0:820_17: pāpetī”ti evaṃ upavadeyya ceva upārambheyya ca garaheyya ca, na cassa guṇaṃ jāneyya.
atk-vin01a0:820_18: Evameva yadi anuppanne vītikkamadose satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyya, parūpavādādīhi
atk-vin01a0:820_19: ca na parimucceyya, na cassa thāmaṃ vā balaṃ vā sattā jāneyyuṃ, paññattampi sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-vin01a0:820_20: kuppeyya, na yathāṭhāne tiṭṭheyya. Tasmā vuttaṃ – “na tāva sāriputta satthā sāvakānaṃ…pe… pātubhavantī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:821_0: Evaṃ akālaṃ dassetvā puna kālaṃ dassetuṃ “yato ca kho sāriputtā”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:821_1: yatoti yadā; yasmiṃ kāleti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ vuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:821_2: hettha saṅkhepattho – yasmiṃ samaye “āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatā vītikkamadosā
atk-vin01a0:821_3: saṅghe pātubhavanti, tadā satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti, uddisati pātimokkhaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:821_4: Kasmā? Tesaṃyeva “āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatānaṃ vītikkamadosānaṃ paṭighātāya.
atk-vin01a0:821_5: Evaṃ paññapento yathā nāma kusalo vejjo uppannaṃ gaṇḍaṃ phālanalepanabandhanadhovanādīhi
atk-vin01a0:821_6: tikicchanto rogaṃ vūpasametvā sañchaviṃ katvā na tveva upavādādiraho hoti, sake ca
atk-vin01a0:821_7: ācariyake viditānubhāvo hutvā sakkāraṃ pāpuṇāti; evaṃ na ca upavādādiraho hoti, sake
atk-vin01a0:821_8: ca sabbaññuvisaye viditānubhāvo hutvā sakkāraṃ pāpuṇāti. Tañcassa sikkhāpadaṃ akuppaṃ
atk-vin01a0:822_0: Evaṃ āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppattiṃ sikkhāpadapaññattiyā akālaṃ uppattiñca
atk-vin01a0:822_1: kālanti vatvā idāni tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppattikālañca uppattikālañca dassetuṃ “na
atk-vin01a0:822_2: tāva sāriputta idhekacce”tiādimāha. Tattha uttānatthāni padāni pāḷivaseneva veditabbāni.
atk-vin01a0:822_3: Ayaṃ pana anuttānapadavaṇṇanā – rattiyo jānantīti rattaññū, attano pabbajitadivasato
atk-vin01a0:822_4: paṭṭhāya bahukā rattiyo jānanti, cirapabbajitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Rattaññūhi mahattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:822_5: rattaññumahattaṃ; cirapabbajitehi mahantabhāvanti attho. Tatra rattaññumahattaṃ patte
atk-vin01a0:822_6: saṅghe upasenaṃ vaṅgantaputtaṃ ārabbha sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti veditabbaṃ. So hāyasmā
atk-vin01a0:822_7: ūnadasavasse bhikkhū upasampādente disvā ekavasso saddhivihārikaṃ upasampādesi. Atha
atk-vin01a0:822_8: bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi – “na, bhikkhave, ūnadasavassena upasampādetabbo. Yo
atk-vin01a0:822_9: upasampādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti. Evaṃ paññatte sikkhāpade puna bhikkhū “dasavassāmha
atk-vin01a0:822_10: dasavassāmhā”ti bālā abyattā upasampādenti. Atha bhagavā aparampi sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesi
atk-vin01a0:822_11: – “na, bhikkhave, bālena abyattena upasampādetabbo. Yo upasampādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
atk-vin01a0:822_12: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena dasavassena vā atirekadasavassena
atk-vin01a0:822_13: vā upasampādetu”nti rattaññumahattaṃ pattakāle dve sikkhāpadāni paññattāni.
atk-vin01a0:823_0: Vepullamahattanti vipulabhāvena mahattaṃ. Saṅgho hi yāva na theranavamajjhimānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:823_1: vasena vepullamahattaṃ patto hoti, tāva senāsanāni pahonti. Sāsane ekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā
atk-vin01a0:823_2: dhammā na uppajjanti. Vepullamahattaṃ pana patte te uppajjanti. Atha satthā sāvakānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:823_3: sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti. Tattha vepullamahattaṃ patte saṅghe paññattasikkhāpadāni “yo
atk-vin01a0:823_4: pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttari dirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ”
atk-vin01a0:823_5: ; “yā pana bhikkhunī anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ” ; “yā pana bhikkhunī ekaṃ
atk-vin01a0:823_6: vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiya”nti iminā nayena veditabbāni.
atk-vin01a0:824_0: Lābhaggamahattanti lābhassa aggamahattaṃ; yo lābhassa aggo uttamo mahantabhāvo, taṃ
atk-vin01a0:824_1: patto hotīti attho. Lābhena vā aggamahattampi, lābhena seṭṭhattañca mahantattañca
atk-vin01a0:824_2: pattoti attho. Saṅgho hi yāva na lābhaggamahattaṃ patto hoti, tāva na lābhaṃ paṭicca
atk-vin01a0:824_3: āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā uppajjanti. Patte pana uppajjanti, atha satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-vin01a0:824_4: paññapeti – “yo pana bhikkhu acelakassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā
atk-vin01a0:824_5: khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyya, pācittiya”nti. Idañhi lābhaggamahattaṃ patte
atk-vin01a0:825_0: Bāhusaccamahattanti bāhusaccassa mahantabhāvaṃ. Saṅgho hi yāva na bāhusaccamahattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:825_1: patto hoti, tāva na āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā uppajjanti. Bāhusaccamahattaṃ patte pana
atk-vin01a0:825_2: yasmā ekampi nikāyaṃ, dvepi…pe… pañcapi nikāye uggahetvā ayoniso ummujjamānā puggalā
atk-vin01a0:825_3: rasena rasaṃ saṃsanditvā uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpenti. Atha satthā “yo
atk-vin01a0:825_4: pana bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya – tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi…pe… samaṇuddesopi
atk-vin01a0:825_5: ce evaṃ vadeyyā”tiādinā nayena sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti.
atk-vin01a0:826_0: Evaṃ bhagavā āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppattikālañca uppattikālañca dassetvā
atk-vin01a0:826_1: tasmiṃ samaye sabbasopi tesaṃ abhāvaṃ dassento “nirabbudo hi sāriputtā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:826_2: Tattha nirabbudoti abbudavirahito; abbudā vuccanti corā, niccoroti attho. Corāti
atk-vin01a0:826_3: ca imasmiṃ atthe dussīlāva adhippetā. Te hi assamaṇāva hutvā samaṇapaṭiññatāya paresaṃ
atk-vin01a0:826_4: paccaye corenti. Tasmā nirabbudoti niccoro, niddussīloti vuttaṃ hoti. Nirādīnavoti
atk-vin01a0:826_5: nirupaddavo nirupasaggo; dussīlādīnavarahitoyevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Apagatakāḷakoti kāḷakā
atk-vin01a0:826_6: vuccanti dussīlāyeva; te hi suvaṇṇavaṇṇāpi samānā kāḷakadhammayogā kāḷakātveva veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:826_7: Tesaṃ abhāvā apagatakāḷako. Apahatakāḷakotipi pāṭho. Suddhoti apagatakāḷakattāyeva
atk-vin01a0:826_8: suddho pariyodāto pabhassaro. Sāre patiṭṭhitoti sāro vuccanti sīla-samādhi-paññāvimutti-vimuttiñāṇadassanaguṇā,
atk-vin01a0:827_0: Evaṃ sāre patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ vatvā puna so cassa sāre patiṭṭhitabhāvo evaṃ veditabboti
atk-vin01a0:827_1: dassento imesañhi sāriputtāti ādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā – yānimāni verañjāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:827_2: vassāvāsaṃ upagatāni pañca bhikkhusatāni, imesaṃ yo guṇavasena pacchimako sabbaparittaguṇo
atk-vin01a0:827_3: bhikkhu, so sotāpanno. Sotāpannoti sotaṃ āpanno; sototi ca maggassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:828_0: “Soto sototi hidaṃ, sāriputta, vuccati; katamo nu kho, sāriputta, sototi? Ayameva
atk-vin01a0:828_1: hi, bhante, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:828_2: “Sotāpanno sotāpannoti hidaṃ, sāriputta, vuccati; katamo nu kho, sāriputta, sotāpanno”ti?
atk-vin01a0:828_3: “Yo hi, bhante, iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato, ayaṃ vuccati – sotāpanno.
atk-vin01a0:828_4: Soyamāyasmā evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto”ti. Idha pana maggena phalassa nāmaṃ dinnaṃ. Tasmā
atk-vin01a0:829_0: Avinipātadhammoti vinipātetīti vinipāto; nāssa vinipāto dhammoti avinipātadhammo,
atk-vin01a0:829_1: na attānaṃ apāyesu vinipātanasabhāvoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kasmā? Ye dhammā apāyagamanīyā,
atk-vin01a0:829_2: tesaṃ parikkhayā. Vinipatanaṃ vā vinipāto, nāssa vinipāto dhammoti avinipātadhammo,
atk-vin01a0:829_3: apāyesu vinipātanasabhāvo assa natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sammattaniyāmena maggena niyatattā
atk-vin01a0:829_4: niyato. Sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ parā gati assāti sambodhiparāyaṇo. Upari maggattayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:832_0: 22. Evaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ saññāpetvā verañjāyaṃ taṃ vassāvāsaṃ vītināmetvā vutthavasso
atk-vin01a0:832_1: mahāpavāraṇāya pavāretvā atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi. Āmantesīti
atk-vin01a0:832_2: ālapi abhāsi sambodhesi. Kinti? Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetanti evamādi. Āciṇṇanti caritaṃ
atk-vin01a0:832_3: vattaṃ anudhammatā. Taṃ kho panetaṃ āciṇṇaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti – buddhāciṇṇaṃ, sāvakāciṇṇanti.
atk-vin01a0:832_4: Katamaṃ buddhāciṇṇaṃ? Idaṃ tāva ekaṃ – yehi nimantitā vassaṃ vasanti, na te anapaloketvā
atk-vin01a0:832_5: anāpucchitvā janapadacārikaṃ pakkamanti. Sāvakā pana apaloketvā vā anapaloketvā vā
atk-vin01a0:833_0: Aparampi buddhāciṇṇaṃ – vutthavassā pavāretvā janasaṅgahatthāya janapadacārikaṃ pakkamantiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:833_1: Janapadacārikaṃ carantā ca mahāmaṇḍalaṃ majjhimamaṇḍalaṃ antimamaṇḍalanti imesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:833_2: tiṇṇaṃ maṇḍalānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ maṇḍale caranti. Tattha mahāmaṇḍalaṃ navayojanasatikaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:833_3: majjhimamaṇḍalaṃ chayojanasatikaṃ, antimamaṇḍalaṃ tiyojanasatikaṃ. Yadā mahāmaṇḍale
atk-vin01a0:833_4: cārikaṃ caritukāmā honti, tadā mahāpavāraṇāya pavāretvā pāṭipadadivase mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivārā
atk-vin01a0:833_5: nikkhamitvā gāmanigamādīsu mahājanaṃ āmisapaṭiggahena anuggaṇhantā dhammadānena cassa
atk-vin01a0:833_6: vivaṭṭupanissitaṃ kusalaṃ vaḍḍhentā navahi māsehi janapadacārikaṃ pariyosāpenti.
atk-vin01a0:833_7: Sace pana antovasse bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanā taruṇā honti, mahāpavāraṇāya appavāretvā
atk-vin01a0:833_8: pavāraṇāsaṅgahaṃ datvā kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ pavāretvā māgasirassa paṭhamadivase mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivārā
atk-vin01a0:833_9: nikkhamitvā vuttanayeneva majjhimamaṇḍale aṭṭhahi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpenti. Sace
atk-vin01a0:833_10: pana nesaṃ vutthavassānaṃ aparipākindriyā veneyyasattā honti, tesaṃ indriyaparipākaṃ
atk-vin01a0:833_11: āgamentā māgasiramāsampi tattheva vasitvā phussamāsassa paṭhamadivase mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivārā
atk-vin01a0:833_12: nikkhamitvā vuttanayeneva antimamaṇḍale sattahi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpenti. Tesu
atk-vin01a0:833_13: ca maṇḍalesu yattha katthaci vicarantāpi te te satte kilesehi viyojentā sotāpattiphalādīhi
atk-vin01a0:833_14: payojentā veneyyavaseneva nānāvaṇṇāni pupphāni ocinantā viya caranti.
atk-vin01a0:834_0: Aparampi buddhānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ – devasikaṃ paccūsasamaye santaṃ sukhaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:834_1: katvā phalasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ, phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhahitvā devasikaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā
atk-vin01a0:835: Aparampi buddhānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ – āgantukehi saddhiṃ paṭhamataraṃ paṭisanthārakaraṇaṃ, aṭṭhuppattivasena dhammadesanā, otiṇṇe dose sikkhāpadapaññāpananti idaṃ buddhāciṇṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:836_0: Katamaṃ sāvakāciṇṇaṃ? Buddhassa bhagavato kāle dvikkhattuṃ sannipāto pure vassūpanāyikāya
atk-vin01a0:836_1: ca kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇatthaṃ, vutthavassānañca adhigataguṇārocanatthaṃ upari kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇatthañca.
atk-vin01a0:836_2: Idaṃ sāvakāciṇṇaṃ. Idha pana buddhāciṇṇaṃ dassento āha – “āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ, ānanda, tathāgatāna”nti.
atk-vin01a0:837_0: Āyāmāti āgaccha yāma. Apalokessāmāti cārikaṃ caraṇatthāya āpucchissāma. Evanti sampaṭicchanatthe
atk-vin01a0:837_1: nipāto. Bhanteti gāravādhivacanametaṃ; satthuno paṭivacanadānantipi vaṭṭati. Bhagavato
atk-vin01a0:837_2: paccassosīti bhagavato vacanaṃ paṭiassosi, abhimukho hutvā suṇi sampaṭicchi. Evanti
atk-vin01a0:838_0: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvāti idha pubbaṇhasamayanti vā sāyanhasamayanti vā na vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:838_1: Evaṃ santepi bhagavā katabhattakicco majjhanhikaṃ vītināmetvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ
atk-vin01a0:838_2: pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā nagaradvārato paṭṭhāya nagaravīthiyo suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāhi raṃsīhi
atk-vin01a0:838_3: samujjotayamāno yena verañjassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami. Gharadvāre ṭhitamattameva
atk-vin01a0:838_4: cassa bhagavantaṃ disvā parijano ārocesi. Brāhmaṇo satiṃ paṭilabhitvā saṃvegajāto
atk-vin01a0:838_5: sahasā vuṭṭhāya mahārahaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā bhagavantaṃ paccuggamma “ito, bhagavā,
atk-vin01a0:838_6: upasaṅkamatū”ti āha. Bhagavā upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Atha kho verañjo
atk-vin01a0:838_7: brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upanisīditukāmo attanā ṭhitapadesato yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-vin01a0:839_0: Yaṃ pana brāhmaṇo āha – “apica yo deyyadhammo, so na dinno”ti. Tatrāyamadhippāyo
atk-vin01a0:839_1: – mayā nimantitānaṃ vassaṃvutthānaṃ tumhākaṃ temāsaṃ divase divase pāto yāgukhajjakaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:839_2: majjhanhike khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ, sāyanhe anekavidha pānavikati gandhapupphādīhi pūjāsakkāroti
atk-vin01a0:839_3: evamādiko yo deyyadhammo dātabbo assa, so na dinnoti. Tañca kho no asantanti ettha
atk-vin01a0:839_4: pana liṅgavipallāso veditabbo. So ca kho deyyadhammo amhākaṃ no asantoti ayañhettha
atk-vin01a0:839_5: attho. Atha vā yaṃ dānavatthuṃ mayaṃ tumhākaṃ dadeyyāma, tañca kho no asantanti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:840_0: Nopi adātukamyatāti adātukāmatāpi no natthi, yathā pahūtavittūpakaraṇānaṃ maccharīnaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:840_1: Taṃ kutettha labbhā bahukiccā gharāvāsāti tatrāyaṃ yojanā – yasmā bahukiccā gharāvāsā,
atk-vin01a0:840_2: tasmā ettha santepi deyyadhamme dātukamyatāya ca taṃ kuto labbhā kuto taṃ sakkā laddhuṃ,
atk-vin01a0:840_3: yaṃ mayaṃ tumhākaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dadeyyāmāti gharāvāsaṃ garahanto āha. So kira mārena
atk-vin01a0:840_4: āvaṭṭitabhāvaṃ na jānāti, “gharāvāsapalibodhena me satisammoso jāto”ti maññi, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:840_5: evamāha. Apica – taṃ kutettha labbhāti imasmiṃ temāsabbhantare yamahaṃ tumhākaṃ dadeyyaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:840_6: taṃ kuto labbhā? Bahukiccā hi gharāvāsāti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:841_0: Atha brāhmaṇo “yaṃnūnāhaṃ yaṃ me tīhi māsehi dātabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ ekadivaseneva
atk-vin01a0:841_1: dadeyya”nti cintetvā adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamotiādimāha. Tattha svātanāyāti yaṃ
