atk-vin01a0:841_2: me tumhesu sakkāraṃ karoto sve bhavissati puññañceva pītipāmojjañca, tadatthāya.
atk-vin01a0:841_3: Atha tathāgato “sace ahaṃ nādhivāseyyaṃ, ‘ayaṃ temāsaṃ kiñci aladdhā kupito maññe,
atk-vin01a0:841_4: tena me yāciyamāno ekabhattampi na paṭiggaṇhāti, natthi imasmiṃ adhivāsanakhanti,
atk-vin01a0:841_5: asabbaññū aya’nti evaṃ brāhmaṇo ca verañjāvāsino ca garahitvā bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasaveyyuṃ,
atk-vin01a0:841_6: taṃ tesaṃ mā ahosī”ti tesaṃ anukampāya adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena.
atk-vin01a0:842_0: Adhivāsetvā ca atha kho bhagavā verañjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ “alaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhacintāyā”ti
atk-vin01a0:842_1: saññāpetvā taṅkhaṇānurūpāya dhammiyā kathāya diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ sandassetvā
atk-vin01a0:842_2: kusale dhamme samādapetvā gaṇhāpetvā tattha ca naṃ samuttejetvā saussāhaṃ katvā tāya
atk-vin01a0:842_3: saussāhatāya aññehi ca vijjamānaguṇehi sampahaṃsetvā dhammaratanavassaṃ vassetvā
atk-vin01a0:842_4: uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. Pakkante ca pana bhagavati verañjo brāhmaṇo puttadāraṃ āmantesi
atk-vin01a0:842_5: – “mayaṃ, bhaṇe, bhagavantaṃ temāsaṃ nimantetvā ekadivasaṃ ekabhattampi nādamha.
atk-vin01a0:842_6: Handa, dāni tathā dānaṃ paṭiyādetha yathā temāsikopi deyyadhammo sve ekadivaseneva
atk-vin01a0:842_7: dātuṃ sakkā hotī”ti. Tato paṇītaṃ dānaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā yaṃ divasaṃ bhagavā nimantito,
atk-vin01a0:842_8: tassā rattiyā accayena āsanaṭṭhānaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā mahārahāni āsanāni paññapetvā gandhadhūmavāsakusumavicitraṃ
atk-vin01a0:842_9: mahāpūjaṃ sajjetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo
atk-vin01a0:843_0: 23. Bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tattha agamāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho bhagavā…pe…
atk-vin01a0:843_1: nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti. Atha kho verañjo brāhmaṇo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghanti
atk-vin01a0:843_2: buddhappamukhanti buddhapariṇāyakaṃ; buddhaṃ saṅghattheraṃ katvā nisinnanti vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:843_3: hoti. Paṇītenāti uttamena. Sahatthāti sahatthena. Santappetvāti suṭṭhu tappetvā,
atk-vin01a0:843_4: paripuṇṇaṃ suhitaṃ yāvadatthaṃ katvā. Sampavāretvāti suṭṭhu pavāretvā ‘ala’nti hatthasaññāya
atk-vin01a0:843_5: mukhasaññāya vacībhedena ca paṭikkhipāpetvā. Bhuttāvinti bhuttavantaṃ. Onītapattapāṇinti
atk-vin01a0:843_6: pattato onītapāṇiṃ; apanītahatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ticīvarena acchādesīti ticīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:843_7: bhagavato adāsi. Idaṃ pana vohāravacanamattaṃ hoti “ticīvarena acchādesī”ti, tasmiñca
atk-vin01a0:843_8: ticīvare ekameko sāṭako sahassaṃ agghati. Iti brāhmaṇo bhagavato tisahassagghanakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:843_9: ticīvaramadāsi uttamaṃ kāsikavatthasadisaṃ. Ekamekañca bhikkhuṃ ekamekena dussayugenāti
atk-vin01a0:843_10: ekamekena dussayugaḷena. Tatra ekasāṭako pañcasatāni agghati. Evaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:843_11: pañcasatasahassagghanakāni dussāni adāsi. Brāhmaṇo ettakampi datvā atuṭṭho puna sattaṭṭhasahassagghanake
atk-vin01a0:843_12: anekarattakambale ca paṭṭuṇṇapattapaṭe ca phāletvā phāletvā āyogaaṃsabaddhakakāyabandhanaparissāvanādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:843_13: atthāya adāsi. Satapākasahassapākānañca bhesajjatelānaṃ tumbāni pūretvā ekamekassa
atk-vin01a0:843_14: bhikkhuno abbhañjanatthāya sahassagghanakaṃ telamadāsi. Kiṃ bahunā, catūsu paccayesu
atk-vin01a0:843_15: na koci parikkhāro samaṇaparibhogo adinno nāma ahosi. Pāḷiyaṃ pana cīvaramattameva vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:844_0: Evaṃ mahāyāgaṃ yajitvā saputtadāraṃ vanditvā nisinnaṃ atha kho bhagavā verañjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:844_2: vassetvā puripuṇṇasaṅkappaṃ kurumāno dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā…pe… uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-vin01a0:844_3: pakkāmi. Brāhmaṇopi saputtadāro bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā “punapi,
atk-vin01a0:844_4: bhante, amhākaṃ anuggahaṃ kareyyāthā”ti evamādīni vadanto anubandhitvā assūni pavattayamāno nivatti.
atk-vin01a0:845_0: Atha kho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvāti yathājjhāsayaṃ yathārucitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:845_1: vāsaṃ vasitvā verañjāya nikkhamitvā mahāmaṇḍale cārikāya caraṇakāle gantabbaṃ buddhavīthi
atk-vin01a0:845_2: pahāya dubbhikkhadosena kilantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ujunāva maggena gahetvā gantukāmo
atk-vin01a0:845_3: soreyyādīni anupagamma payāgapatiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tattha gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ uttaritvā yena
atk-vin01a0:845_4: bārāṇasī tadavasari. Tena avasari tadavasari. Tatrāpi yathājjhāsayaṃ viharitvā vesāliṃ
atk-vin01a0:845_5: agamāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “anupagamma soreyyaṃ…pe… vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāya”nti.
atk-vin01a0:854: Sampassataṃ na dissati, kiñci apāsādikaṃ yato ettha;
atk-vin01a0:862_0: 24. Ito paraṃ tena kho pana samayena vesāliyā avidūretiādi yebhuyyena uttānatthaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:862_1: Tasmā anupadavaṇṇanaṃ pahāya yattha yattha vattabbaṃ atthi, taṃ tadeva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-vin01a0:862_2: Kalandagāmoti kalandakā vuccanti kāḷakā, tesaṃ vasena laddhanāmo gāmo. Kalandaputtoti
atk-vin01a0:862_3: gāmavasena laddhanāmassa rājasammatassa cattālīsakoṭivibhavassa kalandaseṭṭhino putto.
atk-vin01a0:862_4: Yasmā pana tasmiṃ gāme aññepi kalandanāmakā manussā atthi, tasmā kalandaputtoti vatvā
atk-vin01a0:862_5: puna seṭṭhiputtoti vuttaṃ. Sambahulehīti bahukehi. Sahāyakehīti sukhadukkhāni saha
atk-vin01a0:862_6: āyanti upagacchantīti sahāyā, sahāyā eva sahāyakā, tehi sahāyakehi. Saddhinti ekato.
atk-vin01a0:862_7: Kenacideva karaṇīyenāti kenacideva bhaṇḍappayojanauddhārasāraṇādinā kiccena; kattikanakkhattakīḷākiccenātipi
atk-vin01a0:862_8: vadanti. Bhagavā hi kattikajuṇhapakkhe vesāliṃ sampāpuṇi. Kattikanakkhattakīḷā cettha
atk-vin01a0:863_0: Addasa khoti kathaṃ addasa? So kira nagarato bhuttapātarāsaṃ suddhuttarāsaṅgaṃ mālāgandhavilepanahatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:863_1: buddhadassanatthaṃ dhammasavanatthañca nikkhamantaṃ mahājanaṃ disvā “kva gacchathā”ti
atk-vin01a0:863_2: pucchi. “Buddhadassanatthaṃ dhammasavanatthañcā”ti. Tena hi “ahampi gacchāmī”ti gantvā
atk-vin01a0:863_3: catubbidhāya parisāya parivutaṃ brahmassarena dhammaṃ desentaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-vin01a0:863_4: Tena vuttaṃ – “addasa kho…pe… desenta”nti. Disvānassāti disvāna assa. Etadahosīti
atk-vin01a0:863_5: pubbe katapuññatāya codiyamānassa bhabbakulaputtassa etaṃ ahosi. Kiṃ ahosi? Yaṃnūnāhampi
atk-vin01a0:863_6: dhammaṃ suṇeyyanti. Tattha yannūnāti parivitakkadassanametaṃ. Evaṃ kirassa parivitakko
atk-vin01a0:863_7: uppanno “yamayaṃ parisā ekaggacittā dhammaṃ suṇāti, aho vatāhampi taṃ suṇeyya”nti.
atk-vin01a0:864_0: Atha kho sudinno kalandaputto yena sā parisāti idha kasmā “yena bhagavā”ti avatvā
atk-vin01a0:864_1: “yena sā parisā”ti vuttanti ce. Bhagavantañhi parivāretvā uḷāruḷārajanā mahatī parisā
atk-vin01a0:864_2: nisinnā, tatra na sakkā iminā pacchā āgatena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nisīdituṃ.
atk-vin01a0:864_3: Parisāya pana ekasmiṃ padese sakkāti so taṃ parisaṃyeva upasaṅkamanto. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:864_4: – “atha kho sudinno kalandaputto yena sā parisā”ti. Ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho sudinnassa
atk-vin01a0:864_5: kalandaputtassa etadahosīti na nisinnamattasseva ahosi, atha kho bhagavato sittayūpasaṃhitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:864_6: thokaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā; taṃ panassa yasmā ekamantaṃ nisinnasseva ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:864_7: – “ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa etadahosī”ti. Kiṃ ahosīti?
atk-vin01a0:865_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepakathā – ahaṃ kho yena yena ākārena bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
atk-vin01a0:865_1: tena tena me upaparikkhato evaṃ hoti yadetaṃ sittayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ
atk-vin01a0:865_2: akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ caritabbaṃ, ekadivasampi
atk-vin01a0:865_3: ca kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ. Saṅkhalikhitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:865_4: likhitasaṅkhasadisaṃ dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāgaṃ caritabbaṃ. Idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:865_5: ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca
atk-vin01a0:865_6: massuñca ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
atk-vin01a0:865_7: vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti. Ettha
atk-vin01a0:865_8: ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati, tañca pabbajjāya
atk-vin01a0:865_9: natthi; tasmā pabbajjā “anagāriyā”ti ñātabbā. Taṃ anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ. Pabbajeyyanti paribbajeyyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:866_0: 25. Aciravuṭṭhitāya parisāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti sudinno avuṭṭhitāya parisāya
atk-vin01a0:866_1: na bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci. Kasmā? Tatrassa bahū ñātisālohitā mittāmaccā santi,
atk-vin01a0:866_2: te “‘tvaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ ekaputtako, na labbhā tayā pabbajitu’nti bāhāyampi gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:866_3: ākaḍḍheyyuṃ, tato pabbajjāya antarāyo bhavissatī”ti saheva parisāya uṭṭhahitvā thokaṃ
atk-vin01a0:866_4: gantvā puna kenaci sarīrakiccalesena nivattitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma pabbajjaṃ
atk-vin01a0:866_5: yāci. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho sudinno kalandaputto aciravuṭṭhitāya parisāya…pe… pabbājetu maṃ bhagavā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:867: Bhagavā pana yasmā rāhulakumārassa pabbajitato pabhuti mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ na pabbājeti, tasmā naṃ pucchi – “anuññātosi pana tvaṃ sudinna mātāpitūhi…pe… pabbajjāyā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:868_0: 26. Ito paraṃ pāṭhānusāreneva gantvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvāti ettha evamattho veditabbo
atk-vin01a0:868_1: – dhuranikkhepeneva taṃ karaṇīyaṃ niṭṭhāpetvāti; na hi pabbajjāya tibbacchandassa
atk-vin01a0:868_2: bhaṇḍappayojanauddhārasāraṇādīsu vā nakkhattakīḷāyaṃ vā cittaṃ namati. Amma tātāti
atk-vin01a0:868_3: ettha pana ammāti mātaraṃ ālapati; tātāti pitaraṃ. Tvaṃ khosīti tvaṃ kho asi. Ekaputtakoti
atk-vin01a0:868_4: ekova puttako; añño te jeṭṭho vā kaniṭṭho vā natthi. Ettha ca “ekaputto”ti vattabbe
atk-vin01a0:868_5: anukampāvasena “ekaputtako”ti vuttaṃ. Piyoti pītijananako. Manāpoti manavaḍḍhanako.
atk-vin01a0:868_6: Sukhedhitoti sukhena edhito; sukhasaṃvaḍḍhitoti attho. Sukhaparihatoti sukhena parihato;
atk-vin01a0:868_7: jātakālato pabhuti dhātīhi aṅkato aṅkaṃ haritvā dhāriyamāno assakarathakādīhi bālakīḷanakehi
atk-vin01a0:869_0: Na tvaṃ, tāta sudinna, kiñci dukkhassa jānāsīti tvaṃ tāta sudinna kiñci appamattakampi
atk-vin01a0:869_1: kalabhāgaṃ dukkhassa na jānāsi; atha vā kiñci dukkhena nānubhosīti attho. Karaṇatthe
atk-vin01a0:869_2: sāmivacanaṃ, anubhavanatthe ca jānanā; atha vā kiñci dukkhaṃ nassarasīti attho. Upayogatthe
atk-vin01a0:869_3: sāmivacanaṃ, saraṇatthe ca jānanā. Vikappadvayepi purimapadassa uttarapadena samānavibhattilopo
atk-vin01a0:869_4: daṭṭhabbo. Taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena ñātabbaṃ. Maraṇenapi mayaṃ te akāmakā vinā
atk-vin01a0:869_5: bhavissāmāti sacepi tava amhesu jīvamānesu maraṇaṃ bhaveyya, tena te maraṇenapi mayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:869_6: akāmakā anicchakā na attano ruciyā, vinā bhavissāma; tayā viyogaṃ vā pāpuṇissāmāti
atk-vin01a0:869_7: attho. Kiṃ pana mayaṃ tanti evaṃ sante kiṃ pana kiṃ nāma taṃ kāraṇaṃ yena mayaṃ taṃ
atk-vin01a0:869_8: jīvantaṃ anujānissāma; atha vā kiṃ pana mayaṃ tanti kena pana kāraṇena mayaṃ taṃ
atk-vin01a0:870: 27. Tatthevāti yattha naṃ ṭhitaṃ mātāpitaro nānujāniṃsu, tattheva ṭhāne. Anantarahitāyāti kenaci attharaṇena anatthatāya.
atk-vin01a0:871_0: 28. Paricārehīti gandhabbanaṭanāṭakādīni paccupaṭṭhāpetvā tattha sahāyakehi saddhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:871_1: yathāsukhaṃ indriyāni cārehi sañcārehi; ito cito ca upanehīti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā
atk-vin01a0:871_2: paricārehīti gandhabbanaṭanāṭakādīni paccupaṭṭhāpetvā tattha sahāyakehi saddhiṃ laḷa,
atk-vin01a0:871_3: upalaḷa, rama, kīḷassūtipi vuttaṃ hoti. Kāme paribhuñjantoti attano puttadārehi saddhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:871_4: bhoge bhuñjanto. Puññāni karontoti buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca ārabbha dānappadānādīni
atk-vin01a0:871_5: sugatimaggasodhakāni kusalakammāni karonto. Tuṇhī ahosīti kathānuppabandhavicchedanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:871_6: nirālāpasallāpo ahosi. Athassa mātāpitaro tikkhattuṃ vatvā paṭivacanampi alabhamānā
atk-vin01a0:871_7: sahāyake pakkosāpetvā “esa vo sahāyako pabbajitukāmo, nivāretha na”nti āhaṃsu. Tepi
atk-vin01a0:871_8: taṃ upasaṅkamitvā tikkhattuṃ avocuṃ, tesampi tuṇhī ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho
atk-vin01a0:872_0: 29. Athassa sahāyakānaṃ etadahosi – “sace ayaṃ pabbajjaṃ alabhamāno marissati na
atk-vin01a0:872_1: koci guṇo bhavissati. Pabbajitaṃ pana naṃ mātāpitaropi kālena kālaṃ passissanti.
atk-vin01a0:872_2: Mayampi passissāma. Pabbajjāpi ca nāmesā bhāriyā, divase divase mattikāpattaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:872_3: piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ. Ekaseyyaṃ ekabhattaṃ brahmacariyaṃ atidukkaraṃ. Ayañca sukhumālo
atk-vin01a0:872_4: nāgarikajātiyo, so taṃ carituṃ asakkonto puna idheva āgamissati. Handassa mātāpitaro
atk-vin01a0:872_5: anujānāpessāmā”ti. Te tathā akaṃsu. Mātāpitaropi naṃ anujāniṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha
atk-vin01a0:872_6: kho sudinnassa kalandaputtassa sahāyakā yena sudinnassa kalandaputtassa mātāpitaro…pe…
atk-vin01a0:873_0: 30. Haṭṭhoti tuṭṭho. Udaggoti pītivasena abbhunnatakāyacitto. Katipāhanti katipayāni
atk-vin01a0:873_1: divasāni. Balaṃ gāhetvāti sappāyabhojanāni bhuñjanto, ucchādananhāpanādīhi ca kāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:873_2: pariharanto, kāyabalaṃ janetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā assumukhaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya
atk-vin01a0:873_3: yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami…pe… pabbājetu maṃ bhante bhagavāti. Bhagavā samīpe ṭhitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:873_4: aññataraṃ piṇḍacārikaṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi – “tena hi bhikkhu sudinnaṃ pabbājehi ceva
atk-vin01a0:873_5: upasampādehi cā”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā sudinnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:873_6: kalandaputtaṃ jinadattiyaṃ saddhivihārikaṃ laddhā pabbājesi ceva upasampādesi ca.
atk-vin01a0:873_7: Tena vuttaṃ – “alattha kho sudinno kalandaputto bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampada”nti.
atk-vin01a0:874_0: Ettha pana ṭhatvā sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca kathitā. Mayaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:874_1: yathāṭhitapāḷivaseneva khandhake kathayissāma. Na kevalañcetaṃ, aññampi yaṃ khandhake
atk-vin01a0:874_2: vā parivāre vā kathetabbaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyehi vibhaṅgekathitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tattha
atk-vin01a0:874_3: tattheva kathayissāma. Evañhi kathiyamāne pāḷikkameneva vaṇṇanā katā hoti. Tato tena
atk-vin01a0:874_4: tena vinicchayena atthikānaṃ pāḷikkameneva imaṃ vinayasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ oloketvā so so
atk-vin01a0:875_0: Acirūpasampannoti aciraṃ upasampanno hutvā; upasampadato nacirakāleyevāti vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:875_1: hoti. Evarūpeti evaṃvidhe evaṃjātike. Dhutaguṇeti kilesaniddhunanake guṇe. Samādāya
atk-vin01a0:875_2: vattatīti samādiyitvā gaṇhitvā vattati carati viharati. Āraññiko hotīti gāmantasenāsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:875_3: paṭikkhipitvā āraññikadhutaṅgavasena araññavāsiko hoti. Piṇḍapātikoti atirekalābhapaṭikkhepena
atk-vin01a0:875_4: cuddasa bhattāni paṭikkhipitvā piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgavasena piṇḍapātiko hoti. Paṃsukūlikoti
atk-vin01a0:875_5: gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipitvā paṃsukūlikadhutaṅgavasena paṃsukūliko hoti. Sapadānacārikoti
atk-vin01a0:875_6: loluppacāraṃ paṭikkhipitvā sapadānacārikadhutaṅgavasena sapadānacāriko hoti; gharapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-vin01a0:875_7: bhikkhāya pavisati. Vajjigāmanti vajjīnaṃ gāmaṃ vajjīsu vā gāmaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:876_0: Aḍḍhā mahaddhanātiādīsu upabhogaparibhogūpakaraṇamahantatāya aḍḍhā; ye hi tesaṃ upabhogā
atk-vin01a0:876_1: yāni ca upabhogūpakaraṇāni, tāni mahantāni bahulāni sārakānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Nidhetvā
atk-vin01a0:876_3: mahābhogā. Aññehi upabhogehi jātarūparajatasseva pahūtatāya pahūtajātarūparajatā.
atk-vin01a0:876_5: Vohāravasena parivattentassa dhanadhaññassa pahūtatāya pahūtadhanadhaññāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:877_0: Senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvāti senāsanaṃ paṭisāmetvā; yathā na vinassati tathā naṃ suṭṭhu
atk-vin01a0:877_1: ṭhapetvāti attho. Saṭṭhimatte thālipāketi gaṇanaparicchedato saṭṭhithālipāke. Ekameko
atk-vin01a0:877_2: cettha thālipāko dasannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhāti. Taṃ sabbampi channaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:877_3: bhattaṃ hoti. Bhattābhihāraṃ abhihariṃsūti ettha abhiharīyatīti abhihāro. Kiṃ abhiharīyati?
atk-vin01a0:877_4: Bhattaṃ. Bhattameva abhihāro bhattābhihāro, taṃ bhattābhihāraṃ. Abhihariṃsūti abhimukhā
atk-vin01a0:877_5: hariṃsu. Tassa santikaṃ gahetvā āgamaṃsūti attho. Etassa kiṃ pamāṇanti? Saṭṭhi thālipākā.
atk-vin01a0:877_6: Tena vuttaṃ – “saṭṭhimatte thālipāke bhattābhihāraṃ abhihariṃsū”ti. Bhikkhūnaṃ vissajjetvāti
atk-vin01a0:877_7: sayaṃ ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātikattā sapadānacāraṃ caritukāmo bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogatthāya
atk-vin01a0:877_8: pariccajitvā datvā. Ayaṃ hi āyasmā “bhikkhū ca lābhaṃ lacchanti ahañca piṇḍakena
atk-vin01a0:877_9: na kilamissāmī”ti etadatthameva āgato. Tasmā attano āgamanānurūpaṃ karonto bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:878_0: 31. Ñātidāsīti ñātakānaṃ dāsī. Ābhidosikanti pārivāsikaṃ ekarattātikkantaṃ pūtibhūtaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:878_1: Tatrāyaṃ padattho – pūtibhāvadosena abhibhūtoti abhidoso, abhidosova ābhidosiko,
atk-vin01a0:878_2: ekarattātikkantassa vā nāmasaññā esā, yadidaṃ ābhidosikoti, taṃ ābhidosikaṃ. Kummāsanti
atk-vin01a0:878_3: yavakummāsaṃ. Chaḍḍetukāmā hotīti yasmā antamaso dāsakammakarānampi gorūpānampi aparibhogāraho,
atk-vin01a0:878_4: tasmā taṃ kacavaraṃ viya bahi chaḍḍetukāmā hoti. Sacetanti sace etaṃ. Bhaginīti ariyavohārena
atk-vin01a0:878_5: ñātidāsiṃ ālapati. Chaḍḍanīyadhammanti chaḍḍetabbasabhāvaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “bhagini,
atk-vin01a0:878_6: etaṃ sace bahi chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ nissaṭṭhapariggahaṃ, taṃ idha me patte ākirā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:879_0: Kiṃ pana evaṃ vattuṃ labbhati, viññatti vā payuttavācā vā na hotīti? Na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a0:879_1: Nissaṭṭhapariggahattā. Yañhi chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ nissaṭṭhapariggahaṃ, yattha sāmikā
atk-vin01a0:879_2: anālayā honti, taṃ sabbaṃ “detha āharatha idha ākirathā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Tathā
atk-vin01a0:879_3: hi aggaariyavaṃsiko āyasmā raṭṭhapālopi “chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ kummāsaṃ idha me patte
atk-vin01a0:879_4: ākirā”ti avaca. Tasmā yaṃ evarūpaṃ chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ aññaṃ vā apariggahitaṃ vanamūlaphalabhesajjādikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:879_5: taṃ sabbaṃ yathāsukhaṃ āharāpetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ, na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ. Hatthānanti
atk-vin01a0:879_6: bhikkhāggahaṇatthaṃ pattaṃ upanāmayato maṇibandhato pabhuti dvinnampi hatthānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:879_7: Pādānanti nivāsanantato paṭṭhāya dvinnampi pādānaṃ. Sarassāti “sacetaṃ bhaginī”ti
atk-vin01a0:879_8: vācaṃ nicchārayato sarassa ca. Nimittaṃ aggahesīti gihikāle sallakkhitapubbaṃ ākāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:879_9: aggahesi sañjāni sallakkhesi. Sudinno hi bhagavato dvādasame vasse pabbajito vīsatime
atk-vin01a0:879_10: vasse ñātikulaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho sayaṃ pabbajjāya aṭṭhavassiko hutvā; tena naṃ sā
atk-vin01a0:879_11: ñātidāsī disvāva na sañjāni, nimittaṃ pana aggahesīti.
atk-vin01a0:880_0: Sudinnassa mātaraṃ etadavocāti atigarunā pabbajjūpagatena sāmiputtena saddhiṃ “tvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:880_1: nu kho me, bhante, ayyo sudinno”tiādivacanaṃ vattuṃ avisahantī vegena gharaṃ pavisitvā
atk-vin01a0:880_2: sudinnassa mātaraṃ etaṃ avoca. Yaggheti ārocanatthe nipāto. Sace je saccanti ettha
atk-vin01a0:880_3: jeti ālapane nipāto. Evañhi tasmiṃ dese dāsijanaṃ ālapanti, tasmā “tvaṃ, bhoti dāsi,
atk-vin01a0:880_4: sace saccaṃ bhaṇasī”ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a0:881_0: 32. Aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlanti tasmiṃ kira dese dānapatīnaṃ gharesu sālā honti, āsanāni
atk-vin01a0:881_1: cettha paññattāni honti, upaṭṭhāpitaṃ udakakañjiyaṃ; tattha pabbajitā piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-vin01a0:881_2: nisīditvā bhuñjanti. Sace icchanti, dānapatīnampi santakaṃ gaṇhanti. Tasmā tampi
atk-vin01a0:881_3: aññatarassa kulassa īdisāya sālāya aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlanti veditabbaṃ. Na hi pabbajitā
atk-vin01a0:881_4: kapaṇamanussā viya asāruppe ṭhāne nisīditvā bhuñjantīti.
atk-vin01a0:882_0: Atthi nāma tātāti ettha atthīti vijjamānatthe; nāmāti pucchanatthe maññanatthe ca
atk-vin01a0:882_1: nipāto. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti – “atthi nu kho, tāta sudinna, amhākaṃ dhanaṃ, na mayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:882_2: niddhanāti vattabbā, yesaṃ no tvaṃ īdise ṭhāne nisīditvā ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi”;
atk-vin01a0:882_3: tathā “atthi nu kho, tāta sudinna, amhākaṃ jīvitaṃ, na mayaṃ matāti vattabbā, yesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:882_4: no tvaṃ īdise ṭhāne nisīditvā ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi”; tathā “atthi
atk-vin01a0:882_5: maññe, tāta sudinna, tava abbhantare sāsanaṃ nissāya paṭiladdho samaṇaguṇo, yaṃ tvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:882_6: subhojanarasasaṃvaḍḍhitopi imaṃ jigucchaneyyaṃ ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ amatamiva nibbikāro paribhuñjissasī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:883_0: So pana gahapati dukkhābhitunnatāya etamatthaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vattumasakkonto “atthi
atk-vin01a0:883_1: nāma, tāta sudinna, ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasī”ti ettakameva avoca. Akkharacintakā
atk-vin01a0:883_2: panettha imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vadanti – anokappanāmarisanatthavasena etaṃ atthināmasadde
atk-vin01a0:883_3: upapade “paribhuñjissasī”ti anāgatavacanaṃ kataṃ. Tassāyamattho – atthi nāma…pe…
atk-vin01a0:883_4: paribhuñjissasi, idaṃ paccakkhampi ahaṃ na saddahāmi na marisayāmīti. Tatāyaṃ ābhidosikoti
atk-vin01a0:883_5: tato tava gehato ayaṃ ābhidosiko kummāso laddhoti attho. Tatoyantipi pāṭho. Tadāyantipi
atk-vin01a0:883_6: paṭhanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Yena sakapitu nivesananti yena sakassa pitu attano pitu
atk-vin01a0:883_7: nivesananti attho; thero pitari pemeneva subbaco hutvā agamāsi. Adhivāsesīti thero
atk-vin01a0:883_8: ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātikopi samāno “sace ekabhattampi na gahessāmi, ativiya nesaṃ domanassaṃ
atk-vin01a0:884_0: 33. Opuñjāpetvāti upalimpāpetvā. Ekaṃ hiraññassāti ettha hiraññanti kahāpaṇo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:884_1: Purisoti nātidīgho nātirasso majjhimappamāṇo veditabbo. Tirokaraṇīyanti karaṇatthe
atk-vin01a0:884_2: bhummaṃ; sāṇipākārena parikkhipitvāti attho. Atha vā tiro karonti etenāti tirokaraṇīyaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:884_3: taṃ parikkhipitvā; samantato katvāti attho. Tena hīti yasmā ajja sudinno āgamissati
atk-vin01a0:884_4: tena kāraṇena. Hi iti padapūraṇamatte nipāto. Tenāti ayampi vā uyyojanatthe nipātoyeva.
atk-vin01a0:885_0: 34. Pubbaṇhasamayanti ettha kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ kālārocanaṃ na vuttaṃ, atha kho ārociteyeva
atk-vin01a0:885_1: kāle agamāsīti veditabbo. Idaṃ te tātāti dve puñje dassento āha. Mātūti janettiyā.
atk-vin01a0:885_2: Mattikanti mātito āgataṃ; idaṃ te mātāmahiyā mātu imaṃ gehaṃ āgacchantiyā dinnadhananti
atk-vin01a0:885_3: attho. Itthikāya itthidhananti hīḷento āha. Itthikāya nāma itthiparibhogānaṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:885_4: nhānacuṇṇādīnaṃ atthāya laddhaṃ dhanaṃ kittakaṃ bhaveyya. Tassāpi tāva parimāṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:885_5: passa. Atha vā idaṃ te tāta sudinna mātu dhanaṃ, tañca kho mattikaṃ, na mayā dinnaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:885_6: tava mātuyeva santakanti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ panetaṃ na kasiyā na vaṇijjāya sambhūtaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:885_7: apica kho itthikāya itthidhanaṃ. Yaṃ itthikāya ñātikulato sāmikakulaṃ gacchantiyā
atk-vin01a0:885_8: laddhabbaṃ nhānacuṇṇādīnaṃ atthāya itthidhanaṃ, taṃ tāva ettakanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a0:886_0: Aññaṃ pettikaṃ aññaṃ pitāmahanti yaṃ pana te pitu ca pitāmahānañca santakaṃ, taṃ
atk-vin01a0:886_1: aññaṃyeva. Nihitañca payuttañca ativiya bahu; ettha ca pitāmahanti taddhitalopaṃ
atk-vin01a0:886_2: katvā veditabbaṃ. Petāmahanti vā pāṭho. Labbhā tāta sudinna hīnāyāvattitvāti tāta,
atk-vin01a0:886_3: sudinna, uttamaṃ ariyaddhajaṃ pabbajitaliṅgaṃ pahāya hīnāya gihibhāvāya āvattitvā
atk-vin01a0:886_4: labbhā bhogā bhuñjituṃ, nālabbhā bhuñjituṃ, na tvaṃ rājabhīto pabbajito, na iṇāyikehi
atk-vin01a0:886_5: palibuddho hutvāti. Tāta na ussahāmīti ettha pana tātāti vacanaṃ gehasitapemena āha,
atk-vin01a0:886_6: na samaṇatejena. Na ussahāmīti na sakkomi. Na visahāmīti nappahomi, na samatthomhi.
atk-vin01a0:887_0: “Vadeyyāma kho taṃ gahapatī”ti idaṃ pana vacanaṃ samaṇatejenāha. Nātikaḍḍheyyāsīti
atk-vin01a0:887_1: yaṃ te mayi pemaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ, taṃ kodhavasena na atikaḍḍheyyāsi; sace na kujjheyyāsīti
atk-vin01a0:887_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Tato seṭṭhi “putto me saṅgahaṃ maññe kattukāmo”ti udaggacitto āha –
atk-vin01a0:887_3: “vadehi tāta sudinnā”ti. Tenahīti uyyojanatthe vibhattipatirūpako nipāto. Tatonidānanti
atk-vin01a0:887_4: taṃnidānaṃ taṃhetukanti paccattavacanassa to-ādeso veditabbo; samāse cassa lopābhāvo.
atk-vin01a0:887_5: Bhayaṃ vāti “kinti me bhoge neva rājāno hareyyu”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ rājādibhayaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:887_6: cittutrāsoti attho. Chambhitattanti rājūhi vā corehi vā “dhanaṃ dehī”ti kammakāraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:887_7: kāriyamānassa kāyiñjanaṃ kāyakampo hadayamaṃsacalanaṃ. Lomahaṃsoti uppanne bhaye
atk-vin01a0:887_8: lomānaṃ haṃsanaṃ uddhaggabhāvo. Ārakkhoti anto ca bahi ca rattiñca divā ca ārakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:888_0: 35. Tena hi vadhūti seṭṭhi gahapati dhanaṃ dassetvā puttaṃ attanā gihibhāvatthāya
atk-vin01a0:888_1: palobhetuṃ asakkonto “mātugāmasadisaṃ dāni purisānaṃ bandhanaṃ natthī”ti maññitvā
atk-vin01a0:888_2: tassa purāṇadutiyikaṃ āmantesi – “tena hi vadhū”ti. Purāṇadutiyikanti purāṇaṃ dutiyikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:888_3: pubbe gihikāle dutiyikaṃ, gehasitasukhupabhogasahāyikaṃ bhūtapubbabhariyanti attho.
atk-vin01a0:888_4: Tena hīti yena kāraṇena mātugāmasadisaṃ bandhanaṃ natthi. Pādesu gahetvāti pāde gahetvā;
atk-vin01a0:888_5: upayogatthe bhummavacanaṃ, pādesu vā taṃ gahetvā. “Kīdisā nāma tā ayyaputta accharāyo”ti
atk-vin01a0:888_6: kasmā evamāha? Tadā kira sambahule khattiyakumārepi brāhmaṇakumārepi seṭṭhiputtepi
atk-vin01a0:888_7: mahāsampattiyo pahāya pabbajante disvā pabbajjāguṇaṃ ajānantā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti
atk-vin01a0:888_8: – “kasmā ete pabbajantī”ti. Athaññe vadanti – “devaccharānaṃ devanāṭakānaṃ kāraṇā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:888_9: Sā kathā vitthārikā ahosi. Taṃ gahetvā ayaṃ evamāhāti. Thero taṃ paṭikkhipanto na
atk-vin01a0:888_10: kho ahaṃ bhaginīti āha. Samudācaratīti voharati vadeti. Tattheva mucchitā papatāti
atk-vin01a0:888_11: naṃ bhaginivādena samudācarantaṃ disvā “anatthiko dāni mayā ayaṃ yo maṃ pajāpatiṃ
atk-vin01a0:888_12: samānaṃ attanā saddhiṃ ekamātukucchiyā sayitadārikaṃ viya maññatī”ti samuppannabalavasokā
atk-vin01a0:888_13: hutvā tasmiṃyeva padese mucchitā papatā; patitāti attho.
atk-vin01a0:889_0: Mā no viheṭhayitthāti mā amhe dhanaṃ dassetvā mātugāmañca uyyojetvā viheṭhayittha;
atk-vin01a0:889_1: vihesā hesā pabbajitānanti. Tena hi tāta sudinna bījakampi dehīti ettha tena hīti
atk-vin01a0:889_2: abhiratiyaṃ uyyojeti. Sace tvaṃ abhirato brahmacariyaṃ carasi, caritvā ākāse nisīditvā
atk-vin01a0:889_3: parinibbāyitā hohi, amhākaṃ pana kulavaṃsabījakaṃ ekaṃ puttaṃ dehi. Mā no aputtakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:889_4: sāpateyyaṃ licchavayo atiharāpesunti mayañhi licchavīnaṃ gaṇarājūnaṃ rajje vasāma,
atk-vin01a0:889_5: te te pituno accayena imaṃ sāpateyyaṃ evaṃ mahantaṃ amhākaṃ vibhavaṃ aputtakaṃ kuladhanarakkhakena
atk-vin01a0:889_6: puttena virahitaṃ attano rājantepuraṃ atiharāpeyyunti, taṃ te mā atiharāpesuṃ, mā atiharāpentūti.
atk-vin01a0:890_0: Etaṃ kho me, amma, sakkā kātunti kasmā evamāha? So kira cintesi – “etesaṃ sāpateyyassa
atk-vin01a0:890_1: ahameva sāmī, añño natthi. Te maṃ sāpateyyarakkhaṇatthāya niccaṃ anubandhissanti;
atk-vin01a0:890_2: tenāhaṃ na lacchāmi appossukko samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ, puttakaṃ pana labhitvā oramissanti,
atk-vin01a0:890_3: tato ahaṃ yathāsukhaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī”ti imaṃ nayaṃ passanto evamāhāti.
atk-vin01a0:891_0: 36. Pupphanti utukāle uppannalohitassa nāmaṃ. Mātugāmassa hi utukāle gabbhapatiṭṭhānaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a0:891_1: lohitavaṇṇā piḷakā saṇṭhahitvā satta divasāni vaḍḍhitvā bhijjanti, tato lohitaṃ paggharati,
atk-vin01a0:891_2: tassetaṃ nāmaṃ “puppha”nti. Taṃ pana yāva balavaṃ hoti bahu paggharati, tāva dinnāpi
atk-vin01a0:891_3: paṭisandhi na tiṭṭhati, doseneva saddhiṃ paggharati; dose pana paggharite suddhe
atk-vin01a0:891_4: vatthumhi dinnā paṭisandhi khippaṃ patiṭṭhāti. Pupphaṃsā uppajjīti pupphaṃ assā uppajji;
atk-vin01a0:891_5: akāralopena sandhi purāṇadutiyikāya bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti purāṇadutiyikāya yā bāhā, tatra
atk-vin01a0:892_0: Apaññatte sikkhāpadeti paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpade aṭṭhapite. Bhagavato kira paṭhamabodhiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:892_1: vīsati vassāni bhikkhū cittaṃ ārādhayiṃsu, na evarūpaṃ ajjhācāramakaṃsu. Taṃ sandhāyeva
atk-vin01a0:892_2: idaṃ suttamāha – “ārādhayiṃsu vata me, bhikkhave, bhikkhū ekaṃ samayaṃ citta”nti.
atk-vin01a0:892_3: Atha bhagavā ajjhācāraṃ apassanto pārājikaṃ vā saṅghādisesaṃ vā na paññapesi. Tasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:892_4: tasmiṃ pana vatthusmiṃ avasese pañca khuddakāpattikkhandhe eva paññapesi. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:893_0: Anādīnavadassoti yaṃ bhagavā idāni sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento ādīnavaṃ dassessati, taṃ
atk-vin01a0:893_1: apassanto anavajjasaññī hutvā. Sace hi “ayaṃ idaṃ na karaṇīyanti vā mūlacchejjāya
atk-vin01a0:893_2: vā saṃvattatī”ti jāneyya, saddhāpabbajito kulaputto tatonidānaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇantopi
atk-vin01a0:893_3: na kareyya. Ettha pana ādīnavaṃ apassanto niddosasaññī ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ – “anādīnavadasso”ti.
atk-vin01a0:893_4: Purāṇadutiyikāyāti bhummavacanaṃ. Abhiviññāpesīti pavattesi; pavattanāpi hi kāyaviññatticopanato
atk-vin01a0:894_0: Sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhīti sā ca teneva ajjhācārena gabbhaṃ gaṇhi, na aññathā. Kiṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:894_1: aññathāpi gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hotīti? Hoti. Kathaṃ? Kāyasaṃsaggena, coḷaggahaṇena, asucipānena,
atk-vin01a0:894_2: nābhiparāmasanena, rūpadassanena, saddena, gandhena. Itthiyo hi ekaccā utusamaye
atk-vin01a0:894_4: gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti. Evaṃ kāyasaṃsaggena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:895_0: Udāyittherassa pana purāṇadutiyikā bhikkhunī taṃ asuciṃ ekadesaṃ mukhena aggahesi,
atk-vin01a0:895_1: ekadesaṃ coḷakeneva saddhiṃ aṅgajāte pakkhipi. Sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhi. Evaṃ coḷaggahaṇena
atk-vin01a0:896: Migasiṅgatāpasassa mātā migī utusamaye tāpasassa passāvaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā sasambhavaṃ passāvaṃ pivi. Sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā migasiṅgaṃ vijāyi. Evaṃ asucipānena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:897_0: Sāmassa pana bodhisattassa mātāpitūnaṃ cakkhuparihāniṃ ñatvā sakko puttaṃ dātukāmo
atk-vin01a0:897_1: dukūlapaṇḍitaṃ āha – “vaṭṭati tumhākaṃ methunadhammo”ti? “Anatthikā mayaṃ etena,
atk-vin01a0:897_2: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitāmhā”ti. “Tena hi imissā utusamaye aṅguṭṭhena nābhiṃ parāmaseyyāthā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:897_3: So tathā akāsi. Sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā sāmaṃ tāpasadārakaṃ vijāyi. Evaṃ nābhiparāmasanena
atk-vin01a0:897_4: gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti. Eteneva nayena maṇḍabyassa ca caṇḍapajjotassa ca vatthu veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:898_0: Kathaṃ rūpadassanena hoti? Idhekaccā itthī utusamaye purisasaṃsaggaṃ alabhamānā chandarāgavasena
atk-vin01a0:898_1: antogehagatāva purisaṃ upanijjhāyati rājorodhā viya, sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti. Evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:899_0: Balākāsu pana puriso nāma natthi, tā utusamaye meghasaddaṃ sutvā gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-vin01a0:899_1: Kukkuṭiyopi kadāci ekassa kukkuṭassa saddaṃ sutvā bahukāpi gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti. Tathā
atk-vin01a0:899_2: gāvī usabhassa. Evaṃ saddena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:900: Gāvī eva ca kadāci usabhagandhena gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti. Evaṃ gandhena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:901_0: Idha panāyaṃ ajjhācārena gabbhaṃ gaṇhi. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “mātāpitaro ca sannipatitā
atk-vin01a0:901_1: honti, mātā ca utunī hoti, gandhabbo ca paccupaṭṭhito hoti, evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sannipātā
atk-vin01a0:902_0: Bhummā devā saddamanussāvesunti yasmā natthi loke raho nāma pāpakammaṃ pakubbato.
atk-vin01a0:902_1: Sabbapaṭhamaṃ hissa taṃ pāpaṃ attanā jānāti, tato ārakkhadevatā, athaññāpi paracittaviduniyo
atk-vin01a0:902_2: devatā. Tasmāssa paracittavidū sakalavanasaṇḍanissitā bhummā devā taṃ ajjhācāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:902_3: disvā saddaṃ anussāvesuṃ. Yathā aññepi devā suṇanti, tathā nicchāresuṃ. Kinti? Nirabbudo
atk-vin01a0:902_4: vata, bho…pe… ādīnavo uppāditoti. Tassattho verañjakaṇḍe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:903_0: Bhummānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā cātumahārājikāti ettha pana bhummānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ
atk-vin01a0:903_1: ākāsaṭṭhadevatā assosuṃ; ākāsaṭṭhānaṃ cātumahārājikāti ayamanukkamo veditabbo. Brahmakāyikāti
atk-vin01a0:903_2: asaññasatte ca arūpāvacare ca ṭhapetvā sabbepi brahmāno assosuṃ; sutvā ca saddamanussāvesunti
atk-vin01a0:903_3: veditabbo. Itiha tena khaṇenāti evaṃ tena sudinnassa ajjhācārakkhaṇena. Tena muhuttenāti
atk-vin01a0:903_4: ajjhācāramuhutteneva. Yāva brahmalokāti yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā. Abbhuggacchīti
atk-vin01a0:904_0: Puttaṃ vijāyīti suvaṇṇabimbasadisaṃ pacchimabhavikasattaṃ janesi. Bījakoti nāmamakaṃsūti
atk-vin01a0:904_1: na aññaṃ nāmaṃ kātumadaṃsu, “bījakampi dehī”ti mātāmahiyā vuttabhāvassa pākaṭattā
atk-vin01a0:904_2: “bījako tvevassa nāmaṃ hotū”ti “bījako”ti nāmamakaṃsu. Puttassa pana nāmavaseneva
atk-vin01a0:904_3: ca mātāpitūnampissa nāmamakaṃsu. Te aparena samayenāti bījakañca bījakamātarañca
atk-vin01a0:904_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Bījakassa kira sattaṭṭhavassakāle tassa mātā bhikkhunīsu so ca bhikkhūsu
atk-vin01a0:904_5: pabbajitvā kalyāṇamitte upanissāya arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “ubho agārasmā
atk-vin01a0:905_0: 37. Evaṃ mātāputtānaṃ pabbajjā saphalā ahosi. Pitā pana vippaṭisārābhibhūto vihāsi.
atk-vin01a0:905_1: Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho āyasmato sudinnassaahudeva kukkucca”ntiādi. Tattha ahudevāti
atk-vin01a0:905_2: ahu eva, dakāro padasandhikaro. Ahosiyevāti attho. Kukkuccanti ajjhācārahetuko pacchānutāpo.
atk-vin01a0:905_3: Vippaṭisārotipi tasseva nāmaṃ. So hi viññūhi akattabbatāya kucchitakiriyabhāvato
atk-vin01a0:905_4: kukkuccaṃ. Kataṃ ajjhācāraṃ nivattetuṃ asamatthatāya taṃ paṭicca virūpaṃ saraṇabhāvato
atk-vin01a0:905_5: vippaṭisāroti vuccati. Alābhā vata meti mayhaṃ vata alābhā; ye jhānādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:905_6: alābhā nāma, te mayhaṃ, na aññassāti adhippāyo. Na vata me lābhāti yepi me paṭiladdhā
atk-vin01a0:905_7: pabbajjasaraṇagamanasikkhāsamādānaguṇā, tepi neva mayhaṃ lābhā ajjhācāramalīnattā.
atk-vin01a0:905_8: Dulladdhaṃ vata meti idaṃ sāsanaṃ laddhampi me dulladdhaṃ. Na vata me suladdhanti
atk-vin01a0:905_9: yathā aññesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ, evaṃ na vata me suladdhaṃ. Kasmā? Yamahaṃ evaṃ svākkhātedhammavinaye…pe…
atk-vin01a0:905_11: Kiso ahosīti khādituṃ vā bhuñjituṃ vā asakkonto tanuko ahosi appamaṃsalohito. Uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātoti
atk-vin01a0:905_13: sirājāleneva santharitagatto. Antomanoti anusocanavasena abbhantareyeva ṭhitacitto.
atk-vin01a0:905_14: Hadayavatthuṃ nissāya pavattanavasena pana sabbepi antomanāyeva. Līnamanoti uddese
atk-vin01a0:905_15: paripucchāya kammaṭṭhāne adhisīle adhicitte adhipaññāya vattapaṭipattipūraṇe ca nikkhittadhuro
atk-vin01a0:905_16: avipphāriko aññadatthu kosajjavaseneva līno saṅkucito mano assāti līnamano. Dukkhīti
atk-vin01a0:905_17: cetodukkhena dukkhī. Dummanoti dosena duṭṭhamano, virūpamano vā domanassābhibhūtatāya.
atk-vin01a0:905_18: Pajjhāyīti vippaṭisāravasena vahacchinno viya gadrabho taṃ taṃ cintayi.
atk-vin01a0:906_0: 38. Sahāyakā bhikkhūti taṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāpapañcena vītināmentaṃ disvā yassa
atk-vin01a0:906_1: vissāsikā kathāphāsukā bhikkhū te naṃ etadavocuṃ. Pīṇindriyoti pasādapatiṭṭhānokāsassa
atk-vin01a0:906_2: sampuṇṇattā paripuṇṇacakkhuādiindriyo. So dāni tvanti ettha dānīti nipāto, so pana
atk-vin01a0:906_3: tvanti vuttaṃ hoti. Kaccino tvanti kacci nu tvaṃ. Anabhiratoti ukkaṇṭhito; gihibhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:906_4: patthayamānoti attho. Tasmā tameva anabhiratiṃ paṭikkhipanto āha – “na kho ahaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:906_5: āvuso, anabhirato”ti. Adhikusalānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya abhiratova ahanti. Atthi
atk-vin01a0:906_6: me pāpakammaṃ katanti mayā kataṃ ekaṃ pāpakammaṃ atthi upalabbhati saṃvijjati, niccakālaṃ
atk-vin01a0:906_7: abhimukhaṃ viya me tiṭṭhati. Atha naṃ pakāsento “purāṇadutiyikāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:907_0: Alañhi te, āvuso sudinna, kukkuccāyāti āvuso sudinna, tuyhetaṃ pāpakammaṃ alaṃ samatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:907_1: kukkuccāya; paṭibalaṃ kukkuccaṃ uppādetunti vuttaṃ hoti. Yaṃ tvanti ādimhi yena pāpena
atk-vin01a0:907_2: tvaṃ na sakkhissasi brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ, taṃ te pāpaṃ alaṃ kukkuccāyāti evaṃ sambandho
atk-vin01a0:907_3: veditabbo. Atha naṃ anusāsantā “nanu āvuso bhagavatā”tiādimāhaṃsu. Tattha nanūti
atk-vin01a0:907_4: anumatiggahaṇatthe nipāto. Anekapariyāyenāti anekakāraṇena. Virāgāyāti virāgatthāya.
atk-vin01a0:907_5: No sarāgāyāti no rāgena rajjanatthāya. Bhagavatā hi “imaṃ me dhammaṃ sutvā sattā
atk-vin01a0:907_6: sabbabhavabhogesu virajjissanti, no rajjissantī” etadatthāya dhammo desitoti adhippāyo.
atk-vin01a0:907_7: Esa nayo sabbapadesu. Idaṃ panettha pariyāyavacanamattaṃ. Visaṃyogāyāti kilesehi
atk-vin01a0:907_8: visaṃyujjanatthāya. No saṃyogāyāti na saṃyujjanatthāya. Anupādānāyāti aggahaṇatthāya.
atk-vin01a0:908_0: Tattha nāma tvanti tasmiṃ nāma tvaṃ. Sarāgāya cetessasīti saha rāgena vattamānāya
atk-vin01a0:908_1: methunadhammāya cetessasi kappessasi pakappessasi; etadatthaṃ vāyamissasīti attho.
atk-vin01a0:908_2: Esa nayo sabbattha. Puna rāgavirāgādīni nava padāni nibbattitalokuttaranibbānameva
atk-vin01a0:908_3: sandhāya vuttāni. Tasmā rāgavirāgāyāti vā madanimmadanāyāti vā vuttepi “nibbānatthāyā”ti
atk-vin01a0:908_4: evameva attho daṭṭhabbo. Nibbānañhi yasmā taṃ āgamma ārabbha paṭicca rāgo virajjati
atk-vin01a0:908_5: na hoti, tasmā rāgavirāgoti vuccati. Yasmā pana taṃ āgamma mānamada-purisamadādayo
atk-vin01a0:908_6: madā nimmadā amadā honti vinassanti, tasmā madanimmadananti vuccati. Yasmā ca taṃ
atk-vin01a0:908_7: āgamma sabbāpi kāmapipāsā vinayaṃ abbhatthaṃ yāti, tasmā pipāsavinayoti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:908_8: Yasmā pana taṃ āgamma pañca kāmaguṇālayā samugghātaṃ gacchanti, tasmā ālayasamugghātoti
atk-vin01a0:908_9: vuccati. Yasmā ca taṃ āgamma tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ upacchijjati, tasmā vaṭṭupacchedoti
atk-vin01a0:908_10: vuccati. Yasmā pana taṃ āgamma sabbaso taṇhā khayaṃ gacchati virajjati nirujjhati
atk-vin01a0:908_11: ca, tasmā taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodhoti vuccati. Yasmā panetaṃ catasso yoniyo, pañca
atk-vin01a0:908_12: gatiyo, satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, nava ca sattāvāse, aparāparabhāvāya vinanato ābandhanato
atk-vin01a0:908_13: saṃsibbanato vānanti laddhavohārāya taṇhāya nikkhantaṃ nissaṭaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:909_0: Kāmānaṃ pahānaṃ akkhātanti vatthukāmānaṃ, kilesakāmānañca pahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Kāmasaññānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:909_1: pariññāti sabbāsampi kāmasaññānaṃ ñātatīraṇapahānavasena tividhā pariññā akkhātā.
atk-vin01a0:909_2: Kāmapipāsānanti kāmesu pātabyatānaṃ kāme vā pātumicchānaṃ. Kāmavitakkānanti kāmupasañhitānaṃvitakkānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:909_4: pañcasu ṭhānesu kilesakkhayakaro lokuttaramaggova kathito. Sabbapaṭhamesu pana tīsu
atk-vin01a0:910_0: Netaṃ āvusoti na etaṃ āvuso, tava pāpakammaṃ appasannānañca pasādāya evarūpānaṃ pasādatthāya
atk-vin01a0:910_1: na hoti. Atha khvetanti atha kho etaṃ. Atha kho tantipi pāṭho. Aññathattāyāti pasādaññathābhāvāya
atk-vin01a0:910_2: vippaṭisārāya hoti. Ye maggena anāgatasaddhā, tesaṃ vippaṭisāraṃ karoti – “īdisepi
atk-vin01a0:910_3: nāma dhammavinaye mayaṃ pasannā, yatthevaṃ duppaṭipannā bhikkhū”ti. Ye pana maggenāgatasaddhā,
atk-vin01a0:910_4: tesaṃ sineru viya vātehi acalo pasādo īdisehi vatthūhi ito vā dāruṇatarehi. Tena
atk-vin01a0:911_0: 39. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesunti bhagavato etaṃ atthaṃ ācikkhiṃsu paṭivedayiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:911_1: Ārocayamānā ca neva piyakamyatāya na bhedapurekkhāratāya, na tassāyasmato avaṇṇapakāsanatthāya,
atk-vin01a0:911_2: na kalisāsanāropanatthāya, nāpi “idaṃ sutvā bhagavā imassa sāsane patiṭṭhaṃ na dassati,
atk-vin01a0:911_3: nikkaḍḍhāpessati na”nti maññamānā ārocesuṃ. Atha kho “imaṃ sāsane uppannaṃ abbudaṃ
atk-vin01a0:911_4: ñatvā bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessati, velaṃ mariyādaṃ āṇaṃ ṭhapessatī”ti ārocesuṃ.
atk-vin01a0:912_0: Etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇeti ettha sudinnassa ajjhācāravītikkamo sikkhāpadapaññattiyā
atk-vin01a0:912_1: kāraṇattā nidānañceva pakaraṇañcāti vuttoti veditabbo. Kāraṇañhi yasmā nideti attano
atk-vin01a0:912_2: phalaṃ “gaṇhātha na”nti dassentaṃ viya appeti, pakaroti ca naṃ kattuṃ ārabhati, karotiyeva
atk-vin01a0:912_3: vā; tasmā nidānañceva pakaraṇañcāti vuccati. Vigarahi buddho bhagavāti buddho bhagavā
atk-vin01a0:912_4: vigarahi nindi; yathā taṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇārahānaṃ vaṇṇañca avaṇṇañca bhaṇantesu aggapuggalo.
atk-vin01a0:912_5: Na hi bhagavato sīlavītikkamakaraṃ puggalaṃ disvā “ayaṃ jātiyā vā gottena vā kolaputtiyena
atk-vin01a0:912_6: vā ganthena vā dhutaṅgena vā ñāto yasassī īdisaṃ puggalaṃ rakkhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cittaṃ
atk-vin01a0:912_7: uppajjati, nāpi pesalaṃ guṇavantaṃ disvā tassa guṇaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-vin01a0:912_8: Atha kho garahitabbaṃ garahati eva, pasaṃsitabbañca pasaṃsati eva, ayañca garahitabbo;
atk-vin01a0:912_9: tasmā taṃ tādilakkhaṇe ṭhito avikampamānena cittena vigarahi buddho bhagavā “ananucchavika”ntiādīhi vacanehi.
atk-vin01a0:913_0: Tatthāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā – yadidaṃ tayā, moghapurisa, tucchamanussa kammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ
atk-vin01a0:913_1: samaṇakaraṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ maggaphalanibbānasāsanānaṃ vā na anucchavikaṃ, tesaṃ chaviṃ
atk-vin01a0:913_2: chāyaṃ sundarabhāvaṃ na anveti nānugacchati, atha kho ārakāva tehi dhammehi. Ananucchavikattā
atk-vin01a0:913_3: eva ca ananulomikaṃ, tesaṃ na anulometi; atha kho vilomaṃ paccanīkabhāve ṭhitaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:913_4: Ananulomikattā eva ca appatirūpaṃ, patirūpaṃ sadisaṃ paṭibhāgaṃ na hoti, atha kho
atk-vin01a0:913_5: asadisaṃ appaṭibhāgameva. Appatirūpattā eva ca assāmaṇakaṃ, samaṇānaṃ kammaṃ na hoti.
atk-vin01a0:913_6: Assāmaṇakattā akappiyaṃ. Yañhi samaṇakammaṃ na hoti, taṃ tesaṃ na kappati. Akappiyattā
atk-vin01a0:913_7: akaraṇīyaṃ. Na hi samaṇā yaṃ na kappati, taṃ karonti. Tañcetaṃ tayā kataṃ, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:913_8: ananucchavikaṃ te, moghapurisa, kataṃ…pe… akaraṇīyanti. Kathañhi nāmāti kena nāma
atk-vin01a0:913_9: kāraṇena, kiṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ passantoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tato kāraṇābhāvaṃ dassento parato
atk-vin01a0:914_0: Idāni yasmā yaṃ tena pāpakammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ vipaccamānaṃ ativiya dukkhavipākaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a0:914_1: tasmāssa taṃ vipākaṃ dassetuṃ katāparādhaṃ viya puttaṃ anukampakā mātāpitaro dayālukena
atk-vin01a0:914_2: cittena sudinnaṃ paribhāsanto “varaṃ te moghapurisā”tiādimāha. Tattha āsu sīghaṃ
atk-vin01a0:914_3: etassa visaṃ āgacchatīti āsīviso. Ghoraṃ caṇḍamassa visanti ghoraviso, tassa āsīvisassa
atk-vin01a0:914_4: ghoravisassa. “Pakkhitta”nti etassa “vara”nti iminā sambandho. Īdisassa āsīvisassa
atk-vin01a0:914_5: ghoravisassa mukhe aṅgajātaṃ varaṃ pakkhittaṃ; sace pakkhittaṃ bhaveyya, varaṃ siyā;
atk-vin01a0:914_6: sundaraṃ sādhu suṭṭhu siyāti attho. Na tvevāti na tu eva varaṃ na sundarameva na
atk-vin01a0:914_7: sādhumeva na suṭṭhumeva. Esa nayo sabbattha. Kaṇhasappassāti kāḷasappassa. Aṅgārakāsuyāti
atk-vin01a0:914_8: aṅgārapuṇṇakūpe, aṅgārarāsimhi vā. Ādittāyāti padittāya gahitaaggivaṇṇāya. Sampajjalitāyāti
atk-vin01a0:914_9: samantato pajjalitāya acciyo muccantiyā. Sajotibhūtāyāti sappabhāya. Samantato uṭṭhitāhi
atk-vin01a0:915_0: Taṃ kissa hetūti yaṃ mayā vuttaṃ “vara”nti taṃ kissa hetu, katarena kāraṇenāti ce?
atk-vin01a0:915_1: Maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyyāti yo tattha aṅgajātaṃ pakkhipeyya, so maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya
atk-vin01a0:915_2: maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ. Itonidānañca kho…pe… upapajjeyyāti yaṃ idaṃ mātugāmassa
atk-vin01a0:915_3: aṅgajāte aṅgajātapakkhipanaṃ, itonidānaṃ tassa kārako puggalo nirayaṃ upapajjeyya;
atk-vin01a0:915_4: evaṃ kammassa mahāsāvajjataṃ passanto taṃ garahi, na tassa dukkhāgamaṃ icchamāno.
atk-vin01a0:915_5: Tattha nāma tvanti tasmiṃ nāma evarūpe kamme evaṃ mahāsāvajje samānepi tvaṃ. Yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:915_6: tvanti ettha yanti hīḷanatthe nipāto. Tvanti taṃ-saddassa vevacanaṃ; dvīhipi yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:915_7: vā taṃ vā hīḷitamavaññātanti vuttaṃ hoti. Asaddhammanti asataṃ nīcajanānaṃ dhammaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:915_8: tehi sevitabbanti attho. Gāmadhammanti gāmānaṃ dhammaṃ; gāmavāsikamanussānaṃ dhammanti
atk-vin01a0:915_9: vuttaṃ hoti. Vasaladhammanti pāpadhamme vasanti paggharantīti vasalā, tesaṃ vasalānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:915_10: hīnapurisānaṃ dhammaṃ, vasalaṃ vā kilesapaggharaṇakaṃ dhammaṃ. Duṭṭhullanti duṭṭhu
atk-vin01a0:915_11: ca kilesadūsitaṃ thūlañca asukhumaṃ, anipuṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Odakantikanti udakakiccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:915_12: antikaṃ avasānaṃ assāti odakantiko, taṃ odakantikaṃ. Rahassanti rahobhavaṃ, paṭicchanne
atk-vin01a0:915_13: okāse uppajjanakaṃ. Ayañhi dhammo jigucchanīyattā na sakkā āvi aññesaṃ dassanavisaye
atk-vin01a0:915_14: kātuṃ, tena vuttaṃ – “rahassa”nti. Dvayaṃdvayasamāpattinti dvīhi dvīhi samāpajjitabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:915_15: dvayaṃ dvayaṃ samāpattintipi pāṭho. Dayaṃ dayaṃ samāpattintipi paṭhanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ.
atk-vin01a0:915_16: Samāpajjissasīti etaṃ “tattha nāma tva”nti ettha vuttanāmasaddena yojetabbaṃ “samāpajjissasi nāmā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:916_0: Bahūnaṃ kho…pe… ādikattā pubbaṅgamoti sāsanaṃ sandhāya vadati. Imasmiṃ sāsane tvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:916_1: bahūnaṃ puggalānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādikattā, sabbapaṭhamaṃ karaṇato; pubbaṅgamo
atk-vin01a0:916_2: sabbapaṭhamaṃ etaṃ maggaṃ paṭipannattā; dvāraṃdado, upāyadassakoti vuttaṃ hoti. Imañhi
atk-vin01a0:916_3: lesaṃ laddhā tava anusikkhamānā bahū puggalā nānappakārake makkaṭiyā methunapaṭisevanādike
atk-vin01a0:917_0: Anekapariyāyenāti imehi “ananucchavika”ntiādinā nayena vuttehi, bahūhi kāraṇehi.
atk-vin01a0:917_1: Dubbharatāya…pe… kosajjassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvāti dubbharatādīnaṃ vatthubhūtassa asaṃvarassa
atk-vin01a0:917_2: avaṇṇaṃ nindaṃ garahaṃ bhāsitvāti attho. Yasmā hi asaṃvare ṭhitassa puggalassa attā
atk-vin01a0:917_3: dubbharatañceva dupposatañca āpajjati, tasmā asaṃvaro “dubbharatā, dupposatā”ti ca
atk-vin01a0:917_4: vuccati. Yasmā pana asaṃvare ṭhitassa attā catūsu paccayesu mahicchataṃ sineruppamāṇepi
atk-vin01a0:917_5: ca paccaye laddhā asantuṭṭhitaṃ āpajjati, tasmā asaṃvaro “mahicchatā, asantuṭṭhitā”ti
atk-vin01a0:917_6: ca vuccati. Yasmā ca asaṃvare ṭhitassa attā gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ceva kilesasaṅgaṇikāya
atk-vin01a0:917_7: ca saṃvattati, kosajjānugato ca hoti aṭṭhakusītavatthupāripūriyā saṃvattati, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:918_0: Subharatāya…pe… vīriyārambhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvāti subharatādīnaṃ vatthubhūtassa saṃvarassa
atk-vin01a0:918_1: vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvāti attho. Yasmā hi asaṃvaraṃ pahāya saṃvare ṭhitassa attā subharo
atk-vin01a0:918_2: hoti suposo, catūsu ca paccayesu appicchataṃ nittaṇhabhāvaṃ āpajjati, ekamekasmiñca
atk-vin01a0:918_4: tasmā saṃvaro “subharatā ceva suposatā ca appiccho ca santuṭṭho cā”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:919: Yasmā pana asaṃvaraṃ pahāya saṃvare ṭhitassa attā kilesasallekhanatāya ceva niddhunanatāya ca saṃvattati, tasmā saṃvaro “sallekho ca dhuto cā”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:920_0: Yasmā ca asaṃvaraṃ pahāya saṃvare ṭhitassa attā kāyavācānaṃ appāsādikaṃ appasādanīyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:920_1: asantaṃ asāruppaṃ kāyavacīduccaritaṃ cittassa appāsādikaṃ appasādanīyaṃ asantaṃ asāruppaṃ
atk-vin01a0:920_2: akusalavitakkattayañca anupagamma tabbiparītassa kāyavacīsucaritassa ceva kusalavitakkattayassa
atk-vin01a0:920_3: ca pāsādikassa pasādanīyassa santassa sāruppassa pāripūriyā saṃvattati, tasmā saṃvaro
atk-vin01a0:921_0: Yasmā pana asaṃvaraṃ pahāya saṃvare ṭhitassa attā sabbakilesāpacayabhūtāya, vivaṭṭāya,
atk-vin01a0:921_1: aṭṭhavīriyārambhavatthupāripūriyā ca saṃvattati, tasmā saṃvaro “apacayo ceva vīriyārambho cā”ti vuccatīti.
atk-vin01a0:922_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ tadanulomikanti tattha sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yaṃ idāni
atk-vin01a0:922_1: sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessati, tassa anucchavikañceva anulomikañca. Yo vā ayaṃ subharatādīhi
atk-vin01a0:922_2: saṃvaro vutto, tassa anucchavikañceva anulomikañca saṃvarappahānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ asuttantavinibaddhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:922_3: pāḷivinimuttaṃ okkantikadhammadesanaṃ katvāti attho. Bhagavā kira īdisesu ṭhānesu
atk-vin01a0:922_4: pañcavaṇṇakusumamālaṃ karonto viya, ratanadāmaṃ sajjento viya, ca ye paṭikkhipanādhippāyā
atk-vin01a0:922_5: asaṃvarābhiratā te samparāyikena vaṭṭabhayena tajjento anekappakāraṃ ādīnavaṃ dassento,
atk-vin01a0:922_6: ye sikkhākāmā saṃvare ṭhitā te appekacce arahatte patiṭṭhapento appekacce anāgāmi-sakadāgāmi-sotāpattiphalesu
atk-vin01a0:922_8: dhammadesanaṃ karoti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ – “bhikkhūnaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ tadanulomikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:923_0: Tena hīti tena sudinnassa ajjhācārena kāraṇabhūtena. Sikkhāpadanti ettha sikkhitabbāti
atk-vin01a0:923_1: sikkhā, pajjate imināti padaṃ, sikkhāya padaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ; sikkhāya adhigamupāyoti
atk-vin01a0:923_2: attho. Atha vā mūlaṃ nissayo patiṭṭhāti vuttaṃ hoti. Methunaviratiyā methunasaṃvarassetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:923_3: adhivacanaṃ. Methunasaṃvaro hi tadaññesaṃ sikkhāsaṅkhātānaṃ sīlavipassanājhānamaggadhammānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:923_4: vuttatthavasena padattā idha “sikkhāpada”nti adhippeto. Ayañca attho sikkhāpadavibhaṅge
atk-vin01a0:923_5: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Apica tassatthassa dīpakaṃ vacanampi “sikkhāpada”nti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:923_6: Vuttampi cetaṃ – “sikkhāpadanti yo tattha nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo”ti.
atk-vin01a0:923_7: Atha vā yathā “anabhijjhā dhammapada”nti vutte anabhijjhā eko dhammakoṭṭhāsoti attho
atk-vin01a0:923_8: hoti, evamidhāpi “sikkhāpada”nti sikkhākoṭṭhāso sikkhāya eko padesotipi attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:924_0: Dasa atthavase paṭiccāti dasa kāraṇavase sikkhāpadapaññattihetu adhigamanīye hitavisese
atk-vin01a0:924_1: paṭicca āgamma ārabbha, dasannaṃ hitavisesānaṃ nipphattiṃ sampassamānoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:924_2: Idāni te dasa atthavase dassento “saṅghasuṭṭhutāyā”tiādimāha. Tattha saṅghasuṭṭhutā
atk-vin01a0:924_3: nāma saṅghassa suṭṭhubhāvo, “suṭṭhu devā”ti āgataṭṭhāne viya “suṭṭhu, bhante”ti vacanasampaṭicchanabhāvo.
atk-vin01a0:924_4: Yo ca tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchati, tassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hoti,
atk-vin01a0:924_5: tasmā saṅghassa “suṭṭhu, bhante”ti mama vacanasampaṭicchanatthaṃ paññapessāmi, asampaṭicchane
atk-vin01a0:924_6: ādīnavaṃ sampaṭicchane ca ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā, na balakkārena abhibhavitvāti etamatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:925_0: Dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyāti dummaṅkū nāma dussīlapuggalā; ye maṅkutaṃ āpādiyamānāpi
atk-vin01a0:925_1: dukkhena āpajjanti, vītikkamaṃ karontā vā katvā vā na lajjanti, tesaṃ niggahatthāya;
atk-vin01a0:925_2: te hi sikkhāpade asati “kiṃ tumhehi diṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ sutaṃ – kiṃ amhehi kataṃ; katarasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:925_3: vatthusmiṃ katamaṃ āpattiṃ āropetvā amhe niggaṇhathā”ti saṅghaṃ viheṭhessanti, sikkhāpade
atk-vin01a0:925_4: pana sati te saṅgho sikkhāpadaṃ dassetvā dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena niggahessati.
atk-vin01a0:926_0: Pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyāti pesalānaṃ piyasīlānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya.
atk-vin01a0:926_1: Piyasīlā hi bhikkhū kattabbākattabbaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ mariyādaṃ ajānantā sikkhattayapāripūriyā
atk-vin01a0:926_2: ghaṭamānā kilamanti, sandiṭṭhamānā ubbāḷhā honti. Kattabbākattabbaṃ pana sāvajjānavajjaṃ
atk-vin01a0:926_3: velaṃ mariyādaṃ ñatvā sikkhattayapāripūriyā ghaṭamānā na kilamanti, sandiṭṭhamānā
atk-vin01a0:926_4: na ubbāḷhā honti. Tena nesaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanā phāsuvihārāya saṃvattati. Yo vā
atk-vin01a0:926_5: dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggaho, sveva etesaṃ phāsuvihāro. Dussīlapuggale nissāya
atk-vin01a0:926_6: hi uposatho na tiṭṭhati, pavāraṇā na tiṭṭhati, saṅghakammāni nappavattanti, sāmaggī
atk-vin01a0:926_7: na hoti, bhikkhū anekaggā uddesaparipucchākammaṭṭhānādīni anuyuñjituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-vin01a0:926_8: Dussīlesu pana niggahitesu sabbopi ayaṃ upaddavo na hoti. Tato pesalā bhikkhū phāsu
atk-vin01a0:926_9: viharanti. Evaṃ “pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsu vihārāyā”ti ettha dvidhā attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:927_0: Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāyāti diṭṭhadhammikā āsavā nāma asaṃvare ṭhitena
atk-vin01a0:927_2: dukkhavisesā. Iti imesaṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya pidhānāya āgamanamaggathakanāyāti attho.
atk-vin01a0:928_0: Samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyāti samparāyikā āsavā nāma asaṃvare ṭhitena katapāpakammamūlakā
atk-vin01a0:928_1: samparāye narakādīsu pattabbā dukkhavisesā, tesaṃ paṭighātatthāya paṭippassambhanatthāya
atk-vin01a0:929_0: Appasannānaṃ pasādāyāti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi sati sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ ñatvā vā
atk-vin01a0:929_1: yathāpaññattaṃ paṭipajjamāne bhikkhū disvā vā yepi appasannā paṇḍitamanussā, te “yāni
atk-vin01a0:929_2: vata loke mahājanassa rajjana-dussana-muyhanaṭṭhānāni, tehi ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā
atk-vin01a0:929_3: ārakā viratā viharanti, dukkaraṃ vata karonti, bhāriyaṃ vata karontī”ti pasādaṃ āpajjanti,
atk-vin01a0:929_4: vinayapiṭake potthakaṃ disvā micchādiṭṭhika-tivedī brāhmaṇo viya. Tena vuttaṃ – “appasannānaṃ pasādāyā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:930_0: Pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāyāti yepi sāsane pasannā kulaputtā tepi sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:930_1: ñatvā yathāpaññattaṃ paṭipajjamāne bhikkhū vā disvā “aho ayyā dukkarakārino, ye yāvajīvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:930_2: ekabhattaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vinayasaṃvaraṃ anupālentī”ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdanti. Tena
atk-vin01a0:931_0: Saddhammaṭṭhitiyāti tividho saddhammo – pariyattisaddhammo, paṭipattisaddhammo, adhigamasaddhammoti.
atk-vin01a0:931_1: Tattha piṭakattayasaṅgahitaṃ sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ “pariyattisaddhammo” nāma. Terasa
atk-vin01a0:931_2: dhutaguṇā, cuddasa khandhakavattāni, dveasīti mahāvattāni, sīlasamādhivipassanāti
atk-vin01a0:931_3: ayaṃ “paṭipattisaddhammo” nāma. Cattāro ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañcāti
atk-vin01a0:931_4: ayaṃ “adhigamasaddhammo” nāma. So sabbopi yasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:931_5: sikkhāpadañca tassa vibhaṅgañca tadatthajotanatthaṃ aññañca buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanti,
atk-vin01a0:931_6: yathāpaññattañca paṭipajjamānā paṭipattiṃ pūretvā paṭipattiyā adhigantabbaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:931_7: adhigacchanti, tasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā ciraṭṭhitiko hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “saddhammaṭṭhitiyā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:932_0: Vinayānuggahāyāti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi sati saṃvaravinayo ca pahānavinayo ca samathavinayo
atk-vin01a0:932_1: ca paññattivinayo cāti catubbidhopi vinayo anuggahito hoti upatthambhito sūpatthambhito.
atk-vin01a0:933_0: Sabbāneva cetāni padāni “sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmī”ti iminā vacanena saddhiṃ yojetabbāni.
atk-vin01a0:934_0: Api cettha yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu taṃ saṅghaphāsu, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:934_1: niggahāyāti evaṃ saṅkhalikanayaṃ; yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu taṃ saṅghaphāsu, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu
atk-vin01a0:934_2: taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyāti evañca ekekapadamūlikaṃ dasakkhattuṃ yojanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:937: Taṃ sabbaṃ veditabbaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ yasmā parivāreyeva āvi bhavissati, tasmā idha na vaṇṇitanti.
atk-vin01a0:938_0: Evaṃ sikkhāpadapaññattiyā ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā tasmiṃ sikkhāpade bhikkhūhi kattabbakiccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:938_1: dīpento “evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti āha. Kiṃ vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:938_2: hoti? Bhikkhave, imaṃ pana mayā iti sandassitānisaṃsaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ evaṃ pātimokkhuddese
atk-vin01a0:938_3: uddiseyyātha ca pariyāpuṇeyyātha ca dhāreyyātha ca aññesañca vāceyyāthāti. Atirekānayanattho
atk-vin01a0:938_4: hi ettha ca saddo, tenāyamattho ānīto hotīti.
atk-vin01a0:939_0: Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “imaṃ sikkhāpada”nti taṃ dassento “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:939_1: paṭiseveyya, pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti āha. Evaṃ mūlacchejjavasena daḷhaṃ katvā paṭhamapārājike
atk-vin01a0:939_2: paññatte aparampi anupaññattatthāya makkaṭīvatthu udapādi. Tassuppattidīpanatthametaṃ
atk-vin01a0:939_3: vuttaṃ – evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hotīti. Tassattho –
atk-vin01a0:939_4: bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ evaṃ paññattaṃ hoti ca, idañca aññaṃ vatthu udapādīti.
atk-vin01a0:943_0: 40. Idāni yaṃ taṃ aññaṃ vatthu uppannaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “tena kho pana samayenā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:943_1: Tatrāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanā – makkaṭiṃ āmisenāti mahāvane bhikkhūnaṃ khantimettādiguṇānubhāvena
atk-vin01a0:943_2: nirāsaṅkacittā bahū migamorakukkuṭamakkaṭādayo tiracchānā padhānāgāraṭṭhānesu vicaranti.
atk-vin01a0:943_3: Tatra ekaṃ makkaṭiṃ āmisena yāgubhattakhajjakādinā upalāpetvā, saṅgaṇhitvāti vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:943_4: hoti. Tassāti bhummavacanaṃ. Paṭisevatīti pacurapaṭisevano hoti; pacuratthe hi vattamānavacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:943_5: So bhikkhūti so methunadhammapaṭisevanako bhikkhu. Senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantāti te
atk-vin01a0:943_6: bhikkhū āgantukā buddhadassanāya āgatā pātova āgantukabhattāni labhitvā katabhattakiccā
atk-vin01a0:943_7: bhikkhūnaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānāni passissāmāti vicariṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “senāsanacārikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:943_8: āhiṇḍantā”ti. Yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamīti tiracchānagatā nāma ekabhikkhunā saddhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:943_9: vissāsaṃ katvā aññesupi tādisaññeva cittaṃ uppādenti. Tasmā sā makkaṭī yena te bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:943_10: tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ca attano vissāsikabhikkhusseva tesampi taṃ vikāraṃ dassesi.
atk-vin01a0:944_0: Cheppanti naṅguṭṭhaṃ. Oḍḍīti abhimukhaṃ ṭhapesi. Nimittampi akāsīti yena niyāmena
atk-vin01a0:944_1: yāya kiriyāya methunādhippāyaṃ te jānanti taṃ akāsīti attho. So bhikkhūti yassāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:944_2: vihāro. Ekamantaṃ nilīyiṃsūti ekasmiṃ okāse paṭicchannā acchiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:945_0: 41. Saccaṃ, āvusoti sahoḍḍhaggahito coro viya paccakkhaṃ disvā coditattā “kiṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:945_1: mayā kata”ntiādīni vattuṃ asakkonto “saccaṃ, āvuso”ti āha. Nanu, āvuso, tatheva taṃ
atk-vin01a0:945_2: hotīti āvuso yathā manussitthiyā, nanu tiracchānagatitthiyāpi taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ tatheva
atk-vin01a0:945_3: hoti. Manussitthiyāpi hi dassanampi gahaṇampi āmasanampi phusanampi ghaṭṭanampi duṭṭhullameva.
atk-vin01a0:945_4: Tiracchānagatitthiyāpi taṃ sabbaṃ duṭṭhullameva. Ko ettha viseso? Alesaṭṭhāne tvaṃ lesaṃ oḍḍesīti.
atk-vin01a0:946_0: 42. Antamaso tiracchānagatāyapi pārājiko hoti asaṃvāsoti tiracchānagatāyapi methunaṃ
atk-vin01a0:946_1: dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā pārājiko yeva hotīti daḷhataraṃ sikkhāpadamakāsi. Duvidhañhi
atk-vin01a0:946_2: sikkhāpadaṃ – lokavajjaṃ, paṇṇattivajjañca. Tattha yassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva
atk-vin01a0:946_3: hoti, taṃ lokavajjaṃ nāma. Sesaṃ paṇṇattivajjaṃ. Tattha lokavajje anupaññatti uppajjamānā
atk-vin01a0:946_4: rundhantī dvāraṃ pidahantī sotaṃ pacchindamānā gāḷhataraṃ karontī uppajjati, aññatra
atk-vin01a0:946_5: adhimānā, aññatra supinantāti ayaṃ pana vītikkamābhāvā abbohārikattā ca vuttā. Paṇṇattivajje
atk-vin01a0:946_6: akate vītikkame uppajjamānā sithilaṃ karontī mocentī dvāraṃ dadamānā aparāparampi
atk-vin01a0:946_7: anāpattiṃ kurumānā uppajjati, gaṇabhojanaparamparabhojanādīsu anupaññattiyo viya.
atk-vin01a0:946_8: “Antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapī”ti evarūpā pana kate vītikkame uppannattā paññattigatikāva
atk-vin01a0:946_9: hoti. Idaṃ pana paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ yasmā lokavajjaṃ, na paṇṇattivajjaṃ; tasmā ayamanupaññatti
atk-vin01a0:946_10: rundhantī dvāraṃ pidahantī sotaṃ pacchindamānā gāḷhataraṃ karontī uppajji.
atk-vin01a0:947_0: Evaṃ dvepi vatthūni sampiṇḍetvā mūlacchejjavasena daḷhataraṃ katvā paṭhamapārājike
atk-vin01a0:947_1: paññatte aparampi anupaññattatthāya vajjiputtakavatthu udapādi. Tassuppattidassanatthametaṃ
atk-vin01a0:947_2: vuttaṃ – “evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hotī”ti. Tassattho
atk-vin01a0:947_3: – bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ evaṃ paññattaṃ hoti ca idañca aññampi vatthu udapādīti.
atk-vin01a0:951_0: 43-44. Idāni yaṃ taṃ aññampi vatthu uppannaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “tena kho pana samayenā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:951_1: Tatrāpi ayamanuttānapadavaṇṇanā – vesālikāti vesālivāsino. Vajjiputtakāti vajjiraṭṭhe
atk-vin01a0:951_2: vesāliyaṃ kulānaṃ puttā. Sāsane kira yo yo upaddavo ādīnavo abbudamuppajji, sabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:951_3: taṃ vajjiputtake nissāya. Tathā hi devadattopi vajjiputtake pakkhe labhitvā saṅghaṃ
atk-vin01a0:951_4: bhindi. Vajjiputtakā eva ca vassasataparinibbute bhagavati uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:951_5: dīpesuṃ. Imepi tesaṃ yeva ekacce evaṃ paññattepi sikkhāpade yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjiṃsu…pe…
atk-vin01a0:952_0: Ñātibyasanenapīti ettha asanaṃ byasanaṃ vikkhepo viddhaṃsanaṃ vināsoti sabbametaṃ
atk-vin01a0:952_1: ekatthaṃ. Ñātīnaṃ byasanaṃ ñātibyasanaṃ, tena ñātibyasanena, rājadaṇḍabyādhimaraṇavippavāsanimittena
atk-vin01a0:952_2: ñātivināsenāti attho. Esa nayo dutiyapadepi. Tatiyapade pana ārogyavināsako rogo
atk-vin01a0:952_3: eva rogabyasanaṃ. So hi ārogyaṃ byasati vikkhipati vināsetīti byasanaṃ. Rogova byasanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:952_4: rogabyasanaṃ, tena rogabyasanena. Phuṭṭhāti adhipannā abhibhūtā samannāgatāti attho.
atk-vin01a0:953_0: Na mayaṃ, bhante ānanda, buddhagarahinoti bhante ānanda, mayaṃ na buddhaṃ garahāma,
atk-vin01a0:953_1: na buddhassa dosaṃ dema. Na dhammagarahino, na saṅghagarahino. Attagarahino mayanti
atk-vin01a0:953_2: attānameva mayaṃ garahāma, attano dosaṃ dema. Alakkhikāti nissirikā. Appapuññāti
atk-vin01a0:953_3: parittapuññā. Vipassakā kusalānaṃ dhammānanti ye aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesu vibhattā kusalā
atk-vin01a0:953_4: dhammā, tesaṃ vipassakā; tato tato ārammaṇato vuṭṭhāya teva dhamme vipassamānāti
atk-vin01a0:953_5: attho. Pubbarattāpararattanti rattiyā pubbaṃ pubbarattaṃ, rattiyā aparaṃ apararattaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:953_6: paṭhamayāmañca pacchimayāmañcāti vuttaṃ hoti. Bodhipakkhikānanti bodhissa pakkhe
atk-vin01a0:953_7: bhavānaṃ, arahattamaggañāṇassa upakārakānanti attho. Bhāvanānuyoganti vaḍḍhanānuyogaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:953_8: Anuyuttā vihareyyāmāti gihipalibodhaṃ āvāsapalibodhañca pahāya vivittesu senāsanesu
atk-vin01a0:954_0: Evamāvusoti thero etesaṃ āsayaṃ ajānanto idaṃ nesaṃ mahāgajjitaṃ sutvā “sace ime
atk-vin01a0:954_1: īdisā bhavissanti, sādhū”ti maññamāno “evamāvuso”ti sampaṭicchi. Aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāsoti
atk-vin01a0:954_2: ubhayampetaṃ kāraṇapaṭikkhepavacanaṃ. Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha tadāyattavuttibhāvena
atk-vin01a0:954_3: phalaṃ tiṭṭhati. Yasmā cassa taṃ okāso hoti tadāyattavuttibhāvena, tasmā “ṭhānañca
atk-vin01a0:954_4: avakāso cā”ti vuccati, taṃ paṭikkhipanto āha – “aṭṭhānametaṃ, ānanda, anavakāso”ti.
atk-vin01a0:954_5: Etaṃ ṭhānaṃ vā okāso vā natthi. Yaṃ tathāgatoti yena tathāgato vajjīnaṃ vā…pe… samūhaneyya,
atk-vin01a0:954_6: taṃ kāraṇaṃ natthīti attho. Yadi hi bhagavā etesaṃ “labheyyāma upasampada”nti yācantānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:954_7: upasampadaṃ dadeyya, evaṃ sante “pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti paññattaṃ samūhaneyya.
atk-vin01a0:955_0: So āgato na upasampādetabboti “yadi hi evaṃ āgato upasampadaṃ labheyya, sāsane agāravo
atk-vin01a0:955_1: bhaveyya. Sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ pana ṭhito sagāravo ca bhavissati, attatthañca karissatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:955_2: ñatvā anukampamāno bhagavā āha – “so āgato na upasampādetabbo”ti. So āgato upasampādetabboti
atk-vin01a0:955_3: evaṃ āgato bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā avipannasīlatāya sāsane sagāravo bhavissati, so sati
atk-vin01a0:955_4: upanissaye nacirasseva uttamatthaṃ pāpuṇissatīti ñatvā upasampādetabboti āha.
atk-vin01a0:956_0: Evaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā āgatesu anupasampādetabbañca upasampādetabbañca
atk-vin01a0:956_1: dassetvā tīṇipi vatthūni samodhānetvā paripuṇṇaṃ katvā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetukāmo
atk-vin01a0:956_2: “evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti vatvā “yo pana bhikkhu…pe…
atk-vin01a0:959_0: 45. Idānissa atthaṃ vibhajanto “yo panāti, yo yādiso”tiādimāha. Tasmiṃ pana sikkhāpade
atk-vin01a0:959_1: ca sikkhāpadavibhaṅge ca sakale ca vinayavinicchaye kosallaṃ patthayantena catubbidho vinayo jānitabbo –
atk-vin01a0:962_0: Katamaṃ catubbidhaṃ? Suttaṃ, suttānulomaṃ, ācariyavādaṃ, attanomatinti. Yaṃ sandhāya
atk-vin01a0:962_1: vuttaṃ – “āhaccapadena rasena ācariyavaṃsena adhippāyā”ti, ettha hi āhaccapadanti
atk-vin01a0:962_2: suttaṃ adhippetaṃ, rasoti suttānulomaṃ, ācariyavaṃsoti ācariyavādo, adhippāyoti attanomati.
atk-vin01a0:964_0: Suttānulomaṃ nāma cattāro mahāpadesā; ye bhagavatā evaṃ vuttā – “yaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-vin01a0:964_1: mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ ce akappiyaṃ anulometi; kappiyaṃ paṭibāhati,
atk-vin01a0:964_2: taṃ vo na kappati. Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ ce
atk-vin01a0:964_3: kappiyaṃ anulometi; akappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo kappati. Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:964_4: kappatī’ti ananuññātaṃ, taṃ ce akappiyaṃ anulometi, kappiyaṃ paṭibāhati; taṃ vo na
atk-vin01a0:964_5: kappati. Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ kappatī’ti ananuññātaṃ, taṃ ce kappiyaṃ anulometi,
atk-vin01a0:965: Ācariyavādo nāma dhammasaṅgāhakehi pañcahi arahantasatehi ṭhapitā pāḷivinimuttā okkantavinicchayappavattā aṭṭhakathātanti.
atk-vin01a0:966: Attanomati nāma sutta-suttānuloma-ācariyavāde muñcitvā anumānena attano anubuddhiyā nayaggāhena upaṭṭhitākārakathanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:967_0: Apica suttantābhidhammavinayaṭṭhakathāsu āgato sabbopi theravādo “attanomati” nāma.
atk-vin01a0:967_1: Taṃ pana attanomatiṃ gahetvā kathentena na daḷhaggāhaṃ gahetvā voharitabbaṃ. Kāraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:967_2: sallakkhetvā atthena pāḷiṃ, pāḷiyā ca atthaṃ saṃsanditvā kathetabbaṃ. Attanomati
atk-vin01a0:967_3: ācariyavāde otāretabbā. Sace tattha otarati ceva sameti ca, gahetabbā. Sace neva
atk-vin01a0:967_4: otarati na sameti, na gahetabbā. Ayañhi attanomati nāma sabbadubbalā. Attanomatito
atk-vin01a0:968: Ācariyavādopi suttānulome otāretabbo. Tattha otaranto samentoyeva gahetabbo, itaro na gahetabbo. Ācariyavādato hi suttānulomaṃ balavataraṃ.
atk-vin01a0:969_0: Suttānulomampi sutte otāretabbaṃ. Tattha otarantaṃ samentameva gahetabbaṃ, itaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:969_1: na gahetabbaṃ. Suttānulomato hi suttameva balavataraṃ. Suttañhi appaṭivattiyaṃ kārakasaṅghasadisaṃ
atk-vin01a0:969_2: buddhānaṃ ṭhitakālasadisaṃ. Tasmā yadā dve bhikkhū sākacchanti, sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:969_3: katheti, paravādī suttānulomaṃ. Tehi aññamaññaṃ khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvā suttānulomaṃ
atk-vin01a0:969_4: sutte otāretabbaṃ. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbaṃ. No ce, na gahetabbaṃ; suttasmiṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:969_5: ṭhātabbaṃ. Athāyaṃ suttaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro ācariyavādaṃ. Tehipi aññamaññaṃ khepaṃ
atk-vin01a0:969_6: vā garahaṃ vā akatvā ācariyavādo sutte otāretabbo. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbo.
atk-vin01a0:969_7: Anotaranto asamento ca gārayhācariyavādo na gahetabbo; suttasmiṃyeva ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:970_0: Athāyaṃ suttaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro attanomatiṃ. Tehipi aññamaññaṃ khepaṃ vā garahaṃ
atk-vin01a0:970_1: vā akatvā attanomati sutte otāretabbā. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbā. No ce, na
atk-vin01a0:971_0: Atha panāyaṃ suttānulomaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttaṃ. Suttaṃ suttānulome otāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:971_1: Sace otarati sameti, tisso saṅgītiyo ārūḷhaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyati, gahetabbaṃ. No
atk-vin01a0:971_2: ce tathā paññāyati na otarati na sameti, bāhirakasuttaṃ vā hoti siloko vā aññaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:971_3: gārayhasuttaṃ guḷhavessantaraguḷhavinayavedallādīnaṃ aññatarato āgataṃ, na gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:972: Athāyaṃ suttānulomaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro ācariyavādaṃ. Ācariyavādo suttānulome otāretabbo. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbo. No ce, na gahetabbo. Suttānulomeyeva ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:973: Athāyaṃ suttānulomaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro attanomatiṃ. Attanomati suttānulome otāretabbā. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbā. No ce, na gahetabbā. Suttānulomeyeva ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:974_0: Atha panāyaṃ ācariyavādaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttaṃ. Suttaṃ ācariyavāde otāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:974_1: Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbaṃ. Itaraṃ gārayhasuttaṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Ācariyavādeyeva ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:975: Athāyaṃ ācariyavādaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttānulomaṃ. Suttānulomaṃ ācariyavāde otāretabbaṃ. Otarantaṃ samentameva gahetabbaṃ, itaraṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Ācariyavādeyeva ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:976: Athāyaṃ ācariyavādaṃ gahetvā katheti, paro attanomatiṃ. Attanomati ācariyavāde otāretabbā. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbā. No ce, na gahetabbā. Ācariyavādeyeva ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:977_0: Atha panāyaṃ attanomatiṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttaṃ. Suttaṃ attanomatiyaṃ otāretabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:977_1: Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbaṃ. Itaraṃ gārayhasuttaṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Attanomatiyameva ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:978: Athāyaṃ attanomatiṃ gahetvā katheti, paro suttānulomaṃ. Suttānulomaṃ attanomatiyaṃ otāretabbaṃ. Otarantaṃ samentameva gahetabbaṃ, itaraṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Attanomatiyameva ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:979_0: Athāyaṃ attanomatiṃ gahetvā katheti, paro ācariyavādaṃ. Ācariyavādo attanomatiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:979_1: otāretabbo. Sace otarati sameti, gahetabbo; itaro gārayhācariyavādo na gahetabbo.
atk-vin01a0:979_2: Attanomatiyameva ṭhātabbaṃ. Attano gahaṇameva baliyaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sabbaṭṭhānesu ca
atk-vin01a0:979_3: khepo vā garahā vā na kātabbāti.
atk-vin01a0:980: Atha panāyaṃ “kappiya”nti gahetvā katheti, paro “akappiya”nti. Sutte ca suttānulome ca otāretabbaṃ. Sace kappiyaṃ hoti, kappiye ṭhātabbaṃ. Sace akappiyaṃ, akappiye ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:981_0: Athāyaṃ tassa kappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti,
atk-vin01a0:981_1: paro kāraṇaṃ na vindati. Kappiyeva ṭhātabbaṃ. Atha paro tassa akappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:981_2: suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti, anena attano gahaṇanti katvā daḷhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:981_3: ādāya na ṭhātabbaṃ. “Sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā akappiyeva ṭhātabbaṃ. Atha dvinnampi
atk-vin01a0:981_4: kāraṇacchāyā dissati, paṭikkhittabhāvoyeva sādhu, akappiye ṭhātabbaṃ. Vinayañhi patvā
atk-vin01a0:981_5: kappiyākappiyavicāraṇamāgamma rundhitabbaṃ, gāḷhaṃ kattabbaṃ, sotaṃ pacchinditabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:982: Atha panāyaṃ “akappiya”nti gahetvā katheti, paro “kappiya”nti. Sutte ca suttānulome ca otāretabbaṃ. Sace kappiyaṃ hoti, kappiye ṭhātabbaṃ. Sace akappiyaṃ, akappiye ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:983_0: Athāyaṃ bahūhi suttavinicchayakāraṇehi akappiyabhāvaṃ dasseti, paro kāraṇaṃ na vindati,
atk-vin01a0:983_1: akappiye ṭhātabbaṃ. Atha paro bahūhi suttavinicchayakāraṇehi kappiyabhāvaṃ dasseti,
atk-vin01a0:983_2: ayaṃ kāraṇaṃ na vindati, kappiye ṭhātabbaṃ. Atha dvinnampi kāraṇacchāyā dissati,
atk-vin01a0:983_3: attano gahaṇaṃ na vissajjetabbaṃ. Yathā cāyaṃ kappiyākappiye akappiyakappiye ca vinicchayo
atk-vin01a0:983_4: vutto; evaṃ anāpattiāpattivāde āpattānāpattivāde ca, lahukagarukāpattivāde garukalahukāpattivāde
atk-vin01a0:983_5: cāpi vinicchayo veditabbo. Nāmamattaṃyeva hi ettha nānaṃ, yojanānaye nānaṃ natthi,
atk-vin01a0:984_1: atirekakāraṇaṃ labhati, tassa vāde ṭhātabbaṃ. Sabbaso pana kāraṇaṃ vinicchayaṃ alabhantena
atk-vin01a0:984_2: suttaṃ na jahitabbaṃ, suttasmiṃyeva ṭhātabbanti. Evaṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade ca sikkhāpadavibhaṅge
atk-vin01a0:984_3: ca sakale ca vinayavinicchaye kosallaṃ patthayantena ayaṃ catubbidho vinayo jānitabbo.
atk-vin01a0:985_0: Imañca pana catubbidhaṃ vinayaṃ ñatvāpi vinayadharena puggalena tilakkhaṇasamannāgatena
atk-vin01a0:985_1: bhavitabbaṃ. Tīṇi hi vinayadharassa lakkhaṇāni icchitabbāni. Katamāni tīṇi? “Suttañcassa
atk-vin01a0:985_2: svāgataṃ hoti suppavatti suvinicchitaṃ suttato anubyañjanato”ti idamekaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:985_3: “Vinaye kho pana ṭhito hoti asaṃhīro”ti idaṃ dutiyaṃ. “Ācariyaparamparā kho panassa
atk-vin01a0:985_4: suggahitā hoti sumanasikatā sūpadhāritā”ti idaṃ tatiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:986_0: Tattha suttaṃ nāma sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ. Tañcassa svāgataṃ hotīti suṭṭhu āgataṃ.
atk-vin01a0:986_1: Suppavattīti suṭṭhu pavattaṃ paguṇaṃ vācuggataṃ suvinicchitaṃ. Suttato anubyañjanatoti
atk-vin01a0:986_2: pāḷito ca paripucchato ca aṭṭhakathāto ca suvinicchitaṃ hoti, kaṅkhacchedaṃ katvā uggahitaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:987_0: Vinaye kho pana ṭhito hotīti vinaye lajjībhāvena patiṭṭhito hoti. Alajjī hi bahussutopi
atk-vin01a0:987_1: samāno lābhagarutāya tantiṃ visaṃvādetvā uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpetvā
atk-vin01a0:987_2: sāsane mahantaṃ upaddavaṃ karoti. Saṅghabhedampi saṅgharājimpi uppādeti. Lajjī pana
atk-vin01a0:987_3: kukkuccako sikkhākāmo jīvitahetupi tantiṃ avisaṃvādetvā dhammameva vinayameva ca
atk-vin01a0:987_4: dīpeti, satthusāsanaṃ garuṃ katvā ṭhapeti. Tathā hi pubbe mahātherā tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ
atk-vin01a0:987_5: nicchāresuṃ – “anāgate lajjī rakkhissati, lajjī rakkhissati, lajjī rakkhissatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:987_6: Evaṃ yo lajjī, so vinayaṃ avijahanto avokkamanto lajjībhāvena vinaye ṭhito hoti suppatiṭṭhitoti.
atk-vin01a0:987_7: Asaṃhīroti saṃhīro nāma yo pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhato vā uparito vā padapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-vin01a0:987_8: vā pucchiyamāno vitthunati vipphandati santiṭṭhituṃ na sakkoti; yaṃ yaṃ parena vuccati
atk-vin01a0:987_9: taṃ taṃ anujānāti; sakavādaṃ chaḍḍetvā paravādaṃ gaṇhāti. Yo pana pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāya
atk-vin01a0:987_10: vā heṭṭhupariyena vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno na vitthunati na vipphandati,
atk-vin01a0:987_11: ekekalomaṃ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya “evaṃ mayaṃ vadāma; evaṃ no ācariyā vadantī”ti
atk-vin01a0:987_12: vissajjeti; yamhi pāḷi ca pāḷivinicchayo ca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya
atk-vin01a0:987_13: parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ agacchanto tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ vuccati “asaṃhīro”ti.
atk-vin01a0:988_0: Ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hotīti theraparamparā vaṃsaparamparā cassa
atk-vin01a0:988_1: suu gahitā hoti. Sumanasikatāti suṭṭhu manasikatā; āvajjitamatte ujjalitapadīpo viya
atk-vin01a0:988_2: hoti. Sūpadhāritāti suṭṭhu upadhāritā pubbāparānusandhito atthato kāraṇato ca upadhāritā;
atk-vin01a0:988_3: attano matiṃ pahāya ācariyasuddhiyā vattā hoti “mayhaṃ ācariyo asukācariyassa santike
atk-vin01a0:988_4: uggaṇhi, so asukassā”ti evaṃ sabbaṃ ācariyaparamparaṃ theravādaṅgaṃ āharitvā yāva
atk-vin01a0:988_5: upālitthero sammāsambuddhassa santike uggaṇhīti pāpetvā ṭhapeti. Tatopi āharitvā
atk-vin01a0:988_6: upālitthero sammāsambuddhassa santike uggaṇhi, dāsakatthero attano upajjhāyassa upālittherassa,
atk-vin01a0:988_7: soṇakatthero attano upajjhāyassa dāsakattherassa, siggavatthero attano upajjhāyassa
atk-vin01a0:988_8: soṇakattherassa, moggaliputtatissatthero attano upajjhāyassa siggavattherassa caṇḍavajjittherassa
atk-vin01a0:988_9: cāti. Evaṃ sabbaṃ ācariyaparamparaṃ theravādaṅgaṃ āharitvā attano ācariyaṃ pāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:988_10: ṭhapeti. Evaṃ uggahitā hi ācariyaparamparā suggahitā hoti. Evaṃ asakkontena pana
atk-vin01a0:988_11: avassaṃ dve tayo parivaṭṭā uggahetabbā. Sabbapacchimena hi nayena yathā ācariyo ca
atk-vin01a0:988_12: ācariyācariyo ca pāḷiñca paripucchañca vadanti, tathā ñātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:989_0: Imehi ca pana tīhi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatena vinayadharena vatthuvinicchayatthaṃ sannipatite
atk-vin01a0:989_1: saṅghe otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe sahasā avinicchinitvāva
atk-vin01a0:989_2: cha ṭhānāni oloketabbāni. Katamāni cha? Vatthu oloketabbaṃ, mātikā oloketabbā, padabhājanīyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:989_3: oloketabbaṃ, tikaparicchedo oloketabbo, antarāpatti oloketabbā, anāpatti oloketabbāti.
atk-vin01a0:990_0: Vatthuṃ olokentopi hi “tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabbaṃ, na tveva naggena
atk-vin01a0:990_1: āgantabbaṃ; yo āgaccheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ ekaccaṃ āpattiṃ passati. So
atk-vin01a0:990_2: taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
atk-vin01a0:991: Mātikaṃ olokentopi “sampajānamusāvāde pācittiya”ntiādinā nayena pañcannaṃ āpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ āpattiṃ passati, so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
atk-vin01a0:992_0: Padabhājanīyaṃ olokentopi “akkhayite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa.
atk-vin01a0:992_1: Yebhuyyena khayite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassā”tiādinā
atk-vin01a0:992_2: nayena sattannaṃ āpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ āpattiṃ passati, so padabhājanīyato suttaṃ ānetvā
atk-vin01a0:993: Tikaparicchedaṃ olokentopi tikasaṅghādisesaṃ vā tikapācittiyaṃ vā tikadukkaṭaṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpattiṃ tikaparicchede passati, so tato suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
atk-vin01a0:994: Antarāpattiṃ olokentopi “paṭilātaṃ ukkhipati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ yā sikkhāpadantaresu antarāpatti hoti taṃ passati, so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
atk-vin01a0:995_0: Anāpattiṃ olokentopi “anāpatti bhikkhu asādiyantassa, atheyyacittassa, na maraṇādhippāyassa,
atk-vin01a0:995_1: anullapanādhippāyassa, na mocanādhippāyassa, asañcicca, assatiyā, ajānantassā”ti
atk-vin01a0:995_2: evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade niddiṭṭhaṃ anāpattiṃ passati, so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā
atk-vin01a0:996_0: Yo hi bhikkhu catubbidhavinayakovido tilakkhaṇasampanno imāni cha ṭhānāni oloketvā
atk-vin01a0:996_1: adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati, tassa vinicchayo appaṭivattiyo, buddhena sayaṃ nisīditvā
atk-vin01a0:996_2: vinicchitasadiso hoti. Taṃ cevaṃ vinicchayakusalaṃ bhikkhuṃ koci katasikkhāpadavītikkamo
atk-vin01a0:996_3: bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā attano kukkuccaṃ puccheyya; tena sādhukaṃ sallakkhetvā sace
atk-vin01a0:996_4: anāpatti hoti, “anāpattī”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace pana āpatti hoti, “āpattī”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:996_5: Sā desanāgāminī ce, “desanāgāminī”ti vattabbaṃ. Vuṭṭhānagāminī ce, “vuṭṭhānagāminī”ti
atk-vin01a0:996_6: vattabbaṃ. Athassa pārājikacchāyā dissati, “pārājikāpattī”ti na tāva vattabbaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-vin01a0:996_7: Methunadhammavītikkamo hi uttarimanussadhammavītikkamo ca oḷāriko. Adinnādānamanussaviggahavītikkamā
atk-vin01a0:996_8: pana sukhumā cittalahukā. Te sukhumeneva āpajjati, sukhumena rakkhati, tasmā visesena
atk-vin01a0:996_9: taṃvatthukaṃ kukkuccaṃ pucchiyamāno “āpattī”ti avatvā sacassa ācariyo dharati, tato
atk-vin01a0:996_10: tena so bhikkhu “amhākaṃ ācariyaṃ pucchā”ti pesetabbo. Sace so puna āgantvā “tumhākaṃ
atk-vin01a0:996_11: ācariyo suttato nayato oloketvā ‘satekiccho’ti maṃ āhā”ti vadati, tato anena so “sādhu
atk-vin01a0:996_12: suṭṭhu yaṃ ācariyo bhaṇati taṃ karohī”ti vattabbo. Atha panassa ācariyo natthi, saddhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:996_13: uggahitatthero pana atthi, tassa santikaṃ pesetabbo – “amhehi saha uggahitatthero
atk-vin01a0:996_14: gaṇapāmokkho, taṃ gantvā pucchā”ti. Tenāpi “satekiccho”ti vinicchite “sādhu suṭṭhu
atk-vin01a0:996_15: tassa vacanaṃ karohī”ti vattabbo. Atha saddhiṃ uggahitattheropi natthi, antevāsiko
atk-vin01a0:996_16: paṇḍito atthi, tassa santikaṃ pesetabbo – “asukadaharaṃ gantvā pucchā”ti. Tenāpi
atk-vin01a0:996_17: “satekiccho”ti vinicchite “sādhu suṭṭhu tassa vacanaṃ karohī”ti vattabbo. Atha daharassāpi
atk-vin01a0:996_18: pārājikacchāyāva upaṭṭhāti, tenāpi “pārājikosī”ti na vattabbo. Dullabho hi buddhuppādo,
atk-vin01a0:996_19: tato dullabhatarā pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca. Evaṃ pana vattabbo – “vivittaṃ okāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:996_20: sammajjitvā divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā sīlāni sodhetvā dvattiṃsākāraṃ tāva manasi karohī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:996_21: Sace tassa arogaṃ sīlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭayati, saṅkhārā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-vin01a0:996_22: upacārappanāppattaṃ viya cittampi ekaggaṃ hoti, divasaṃ atikkantampi na jānāti. So
atk-vin01a0:996_23: divasātikkame upaṭṭhānaṃ āgato evaṃ vattabbo – “kīdisā te cittappavattī”ti. Ārocitāya
atk-vin01a0:996_24: cittappavattiyā vattabbo – “pabbajjā nāma cittavisuddhatthāya, appamatto samaṇadhammaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:997_0: Yassa pana sīlaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti, tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ghaṭayati, patodābhitunnaṃ viya
atk-vin01a0:997_1: cittaṃ vikampati, vippaṭisāragginā ḍayhati, tattapāsāṇe nisinno viya taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-vin01a0:997_2: vuṭṭhāti. So āgato “kā te cittappavattī”ti pucchitabbo. Ārocitāya cittappavattiyā
atk-vin01a0:997_3: “natthi loke raho nāma pāpakammaṃ pakubbato. Sabbapaṭhamañhi pāpaṃ karonto attanā
atk-vin01a0:997_4: jānāti, athassa ārakkhadevatā paracittavidū samaṇabrāhmaṇā aññā ca devatā jānanti,
atk-vin01a0:997_5: tvaṃyeva dāni tava sotthiṃ pariyesāhī”ti vattabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1001_0: Idāni sikkhāpadavibhaṅgassa atthaṃ vaṇṇayissāma. Yaṃ vuttaṃ yo panāti yo yādisotiādi.
atk-vin01a0:1001_1: Ettha yo panāti vibhajitabbapadaṃ; yo yādisotiādīni tassa vibhajanapadāni. Ettha
atk-vin01a0:1001_2: ca yasmā panāti nipātamattaṃ; yoti atthapadaṃ; tañca aniyamena puggalaṃ dīpeti, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:1001_3: tassa atthaṃ dassento aniyamena puggaladīpakaṃ yo saddameva āha. Tasmā ettha evamattho
atk-vin01a0:1001_4: veditabbo – yo panāti yo yokocīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yasmā pana yo yokoci nāma, so avassaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1001_6: taṃ tathā ñāpetuṃ taṃ pabhedaṃ pakāsento “yādiso”tiādimāha. Tattha yādisoti liṅgavasena
atk-vin01a0:1001_7: yādiso vā tādiso vā hotu; dīgho vā rasso vā kāḷo vā odāto vā maṅguracchavi vā kiso
atk-vin01a0:1001_8: vā thūlo vāti attho. Yathāyuttoti yogavasena yena vā tena vā yutto hotu; navakammayutto
atk-vin01a0:1001_9: vā uddesayutto vā vāsadhurayutto vāti attho. Yathājaccoti jātivasena yaṃjacco vā
atk-vin01a0:1001_10: taṃjacco vā hotu; khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vāti attho. Yathānāmoti
atk-vin01a0:1001_11: nāmavasena yathānāmo vā tathānāmo vā hotu; buddharakkhito vā dhammarakkhito vā saṅgharakkhito
atk-vin01a0:1001_12: vāti attho. Yathāgottoti gottavasena yathāgotto vā tathāgotto vā yena vā tena vā
atk-vin01a0:1001_13: gottena hotu; kaccāyano vā vāsiṭṭho vā kosiyo vāti attho. Yathāsīloti sīlesu yathāsīlo
atk-vin01a0:1001_14: vā tathāsīlo vā hotu; navakammasīlo vā uddesasīlo vā vāsadhurasīlo vāti attho. Yathāvihārīti
atk-vin01a0:1001_15: vihāresupi yathāvihārī vā tathāvihārī vā hotu; navakammavihārī vā uddesavihārī vā
atk-vin01a0:1001_16: vāsadhuravihārī vāti attho. Yathāgocaroti gocaresupi yathāgocaro vā tathāgocaro vā
atk-vin01a0:1001_17: hotu; navakammagocaro vā uddesagocaro vā vāsadhuragocaro vāti attho. Thero vāti ādīsu
atk-vin01a0:1001_18: vayovuḍḍhādīsu yo vā so vā hotu; paripuṇṇadasavassatāya thero vā ūnapañcavassatāya
atk-vin01a0:1001_19: navo vā atirekapañcavassatāya majjhimo vāti attho. Atha kho sabbova imasmiṃ atthe
atk-vin01a0:1002_0: Bhikkhuniddese bhikkhatīti bhikkhako; labhanto vā alabhanto vā ariyāya yācanāya yācatīti
atk-vin01a0:1002_1: attho. Buddhādīhi ajjhupagataṃ bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatattā bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagato
