atk-vin01a0:1002_2: nāma. Yo hi koci appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito,
atk-vin01a0:1002_3: so kasigorakkhādīhi jīvikakappanaṃ hitvā liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti
atk-vin01a0:1002_4: bhikkhu. Parapaṭibaddhajīvikattā vā vihāramajjhe kājabhattaṃ bhuñjamānopi bhikkhācariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1002_5: ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu; piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāya pabbajjāya ussāhajātattā vā bhikkhācariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1002_6: ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu. Agghaphassavaṇṇabhedena bhinnaṃ paṭaṃ dhāretīti bhinnapaṭadharo.
atk-vin01a0:1002_7: Tattha satthakacchedanena agghabhedo veditabbo. Sahassagghanakopi hi paṭo satthakena
atk-vin01a0:1002_8: khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chinno bhinnaggho hoti. Purimagghato upaḍḍhampi na agghati. Suttasaṃsibbanena
atk-vin01a0:1002_9: phassabhedo veditabbo. Sukhasamphassopi hi paṭo suttehi saṃsibbito bhinnaphasso hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1002_10: Kharasamphassataṃ pāpuṇāti. Sūcimalādīhi vaṇṇabhedo veditabbo. Suparisuddhopi hi
atk-vin01a0:1002_11: paṭo sūcikammato paṭṭhāya sūcimalena, hatthasedamalajallikāhi, avasāne rajanakappakaraṇehi
atk-vin01a0:1002_12: ca bhinnavaṇṇo hoti; pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahati. Evaṃ tīhākārehi bhinnapaṭadhāraṇato bhinnapaṭadharoti
atk-vin01a0:1002_13: bhikkhu. Gihivatthavisabhāgānaṃ vā kāsāvānaṃ dhāraṇamatteneva bhinnapaṭadharoti bhikkhu.
atk-vin01a0:1003_0: Samaññāyāti paññattiyā vohārenāti attho. Samaññāya eva hi ekacco “bhikkhū”ti paññāyati.
atk-vin01a0:1003_1: Tathā hi nimantanādimhi bhikkhūsu gaṇiyamānesu sāmaṇerepi gahetvā “sataṃ bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:1003_2: sahassaṃ bhikkhū”ti vadanti. Paṭiññāyāti attano paṭijānanena paṭiññāyapi hi ekacco
atk-vin01a0:1003_3: “bhikkhū”ti paññāyati. Tassa “ko etthāti? Ahaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhū”ti evamādīsu sambhavo
atk-vin01a0:1003_4: daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṃ pana ānandattherena vuttā dhammikā paṭiññā. Rattibhāge pana dussīlāpi
atk-vin01a0:1003_5: paṭipathaṃ āgacchantā “ko etthā”ti vutte adhammikāya paṭiññāya abhūtāya “mayaṃ bhikkhū”ti vadanti.
atk-vin01a0:1004_0: Ehi bhikkhūti ehi bhikkhu nāma bhagavato “ehi bhikkhū”ti vacanamattena bhikkhubhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1004_1: ehibhikkhūpasampadaṃ patto. Bhagavā hi ehibhikkhubhāvāya upanissayasampannaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1004_2: disvā rattapaṃsukūlantarato suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ dakkhiṇahatthaṃ nīharitvā brahmaghosaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1004_3: nicchārento “ehi, bhikkhu, cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti vadati.
atk-vin01a0:1004_4: Tassa saheva bhagavato vacanena gihiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyati, pabbajjā ca upasampadā
atk-vin01a0:1004_5: ca ruhati. Bhaṇḍu kāsāyavasano hoti. Ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ aṃse ṭhapetvā
atk-vin01a0:1005: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1007_0: Evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahi parikkhārehi sarīre paṭimukkehiyeva saṭṭhivassikatthero viya
atk-vin01a0:1007_2: tiṭṭhati. Bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kāle ehibhikkhūpasampadāya eva upasampādeti.
atk-vin01a0:1007_3: Evaṃ upasampannāni ca sahassupari ekacattālīsuttarāni tīṇi bhikkhusatāni ahesuṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1007_4: seyyathidaṃ – pañca pañcavaggiyattherā, yaso kulaputto, tassa parivārā catupaṇṇāsa
atk-vin01a0:1007_5: sahāyakā, tiṃsa bhaddavaggiyā, sahassapurāṇajaṭilā, saddhiṃ dvīhi aggasāvakehi aḍḍhateyyasatā
atk-vin01a0:1009: Eko ca thero sappañño, sabbe te ehibhikkhukā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1010_0: Na kevalañca ete eva, aññepi bahū santi. Seyyathidaṃ – tisataparivāro selo brāhmaṇo,
atk-vin01a0:1010_1: sahassaparivāro mahākappino, dasasahassā kapilavatthuvāsino kulaputtā, soḷasasahassā
atk-vin01a0:1010_2: pārāyanikabrāhmaṇāti evamādayo. Te pana vinayapiṭake pāḷiyaṃ na niddiṭṭhattā na vuttā.
atk-vin01a0:1012: Etepi sabbe saṅkhātā, sabbe te ehibhikkhukā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1013_0: Tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannoti “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”tiādinā nayena tikkhattuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1013_1: vācaṃ bhinditvā vuttehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampanno. Ayañhi upasampadā nāma aṭṭhavidhā
atk-vin01a0:1013_4: Tattha ehibhikkhūpasampadā, saraṇagamanūpasampadā ca vuttā eva.
atk-vin01a0:1014_0: Ovādapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā nāma “tasmātiha te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ – ‘tibbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1014_1: me hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati theresu navesu majjhimesu cā’ti. Evañhi
atk-vin01a0:1014_2: te, kassapa, sikkhitabbaṃ. Tasmātiha te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ – ‘yaṃ kiñci
atk-vin01a0:1014_3: dhammaṃ sossāmi kusalūpasaṃhitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā
atk-vin01a0:1014_4: samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ sossāmī’ti. Evaṃ hi te, kassapa, sikkhitabbaṃ. Tasmātiha
atk-vin01a0:1014_5: te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ – ‘sātasahagatā ca me kāyagatāsati na vijahissatī’ti.
atk-vin01a0:1014_6: Evañhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabba”nti iminā ovādapaṭiggahaṇena mahākassapattherassa anuññātaupasampadā.
atk-vin01a0:1015_0: Pañhabyākaraṇūpasampadā nāma sopākassa anuññātaupasampadā. Bhagavā kira pubbārāme
atk-vin01a0:1015_2: ime dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā, udāhu ekatthā, byañjanameva nāna”nti dasa asubhanissite
atk-vin01a0:1015_3: pañhe pucchi. So te byākāsi. Bhagavā tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā “kativassosi tvaṃ, sopākā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1015_4: pucchi. “Sattavassohaṃ, bhagavā”ti. “Sopāka, tvaṃ mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1015_5: saṃsanditvā pañhe byākāsī”ti āraddhacitto upasampadaṃ anujāni. Ayaṃ pañhabyākaraṇūpasampadā.
atk-vin01a0:1016: Garudhammapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā nāma mahāpajāpatiyā aṭṭhagarudhammassa paṭiggahaṇena anuññātaupasampadā.
atk-vin01a0:1018: Aṭṭhavācikūpasampadā nāma bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghato ñatticatutthena bhikkhusaṅghato ñatticatutthenāti imehi dvīhi kammehi upasampadā.
atk-vin01a0:1019_0: Ñatticatutthakammūpasampadā nāma bhikkhūnaṃ etarahi upasampadā. Imāsu aṭṭhasu upasampadāsu
atk-vin01a0:1019_1: “yā sā, bhikkhave, mayā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadā anuññātā, taṃ ajjatagge paṭikkhipāmi.
atk-vin01a0:1019_2: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ñatticatutthena kammena upasampādetu”nti evaṃ anuññātāya imāya
atk-vin01a0:1020_0: Bhadroti apāpako. Kalyāṇaputhujjanādayo hi yāva arahā, tāva bhadrena sīlena samādhinā
atk-vin01a0:1020_1: paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena ca samannāgatattā “bhadro bhikkhū”ti saṅkhyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1020_2: gacchanti. Sāroti tehiyeva sīlasārādīhi samannāgatattā nīlasamannāgamena nīlo paṭo
atk-vin01a0:1020_3: viya “sāro bhikkhū”ti veditabbo. Vigatakilesapheggubhāvato vā khīṇāsavova “sāro”ti
atk-vin01a0:1020_4: veditabbo. Sekhoti puthujjanakalyāṇakena saddhiṃ satta ariyā tisso sikkhā sikkhantīti
atk-vin01a0:1020_5: sekhā. Tesu yo koci “sekho bhikkhū”ti veditabbo. Na sikkhatīti asekho. Sekkhadhamme
atk-vin01a0:1020_6: atikkamma aggaphale ṭhito, tato uttari sikkhitabbābhāvato khīṇāsavo “asekho”ti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:1020_7: Samaggena saṅghenāti sabbantimena pariyāyena pañcavaggakaraṇīye kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:1020_8: kammappattā, tesaṃ āgatattā chandārahānaṃ chandassa āhaṭattā, sammukhībhūtānañca
atk-vin01a0:1020_9: appaṭikkosanato ekasmiṃ kamme samaggabhāvaṃ upagatena. Ñatticatutthenāti tīhi anussāvanāhi
atk-vin01a0:1020_10: ekāya ca ñattiyā kātabbena. Kammenāti dhammikena vinayakammena. Akuppenāti vatthu-ñatti-anussāvana-sīmā-parisasampattisampannattā
atk-vin01a0:1020_11: akopetabbataṃ appaṭikkositabbatañca upagatena. Ṭhānārahenāti kāraṇārahena satthusāsanārahena.
atk-vin01a0:1020_12: Upasampanno nāma uparibhāvaṃ samāpanno, pattoti attho. Bhikkhubhāvo hi uparibhāvo,
atk-vin01a0:1020_13: tañcesa yathāvuttena kammena samāpannattā “upasampanno”ti vuccati. Ettha ca ñatticatutthakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1020_14: ekameva āgataṃ. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā cattāri saṅghakammāni nīharitvā vitthārato
atk-vin01a0:1020_15: kathetabbānīti sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Tāni ca “apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1020_16: ñatticatutthakamma”nti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā vitthārena khandhakato parivārāvasāne
atk-vin01a0:1020_17: kammavibhaṅgato ca pāḷiṃ āharitvā kathitāni. Tāni mayaṃ parivārāvasāne kammavibhaṅgeyeva
atk-vin01a0:1020_18: vaṇṇayissāma. Evañhi sati paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanā ca na bhāriyā bhavissati; yathāṭhitāya
atk-vin01a0:1020_19: ca pāḷiyā vaṇṇanā suviññeyyā bhavissati. Tāni ca ṭhānāni asuññāni bhavissanti; tasmā
atk-vin01a0:1021_0: Tatrāti tesu “bhikkhako”tiādinā nayena vuttesu bhikkhūsu. Yvāyaṃ bhikkhūti yo ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1021_1: bhikkhu. Samaggena saṅghena…pe… upasampannoti aṭṭhasu upasampadāsu ñatticatuttheneva
atk-vin01a0:1021_2: kammena upasampanno. Ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti ayaṃ imasmiṃ “methunaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1021_3: dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā pārājiko hotī”ti atthe “bhikkhū”ti adhippeto. Itare pana “bhikkhako”ti
atk-vin01a0:1021_4: ādayo atthuddhāravasena vuttā. Tesu ca “bhikkhako”ti ādayo niruttivasena vuttā, “samaññāya
atk-vin01a0:1021_5: bhikkhu, paṭiññāya bhikkhū”ti ime dve abhilāpavasena vuttā, “ehi bhikkhū”ti buddhena
atk-vin01a0:1021_6: upajjhāyena paṭiladdhaupasampadāvasena vutto. Saraṇagamanabhikkhu anuppannāya kammavācāya
atk-vin01a0:1024_0: Idāni “bhikkhūna”nti idaṃ padaṃ visesatthābhāvato avibhajitvāva yaṃ sikkhañca sājīvañca
atk-vin01a0:1024_1: samāpannattā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno hoti, taṃ dassento sikkhātiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:1024_2: Tattha sikkhitabbāti sikkhā. Tissoti gaṇanaparicchedo. Adhisīlasikkhāti adhikaṃ uttamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1024_3: sīlanti adhisīlaṃ; adhisīlañca taṃ sikkhitabbato sikkhā cāti adhisīlasikkhā. Esa
atk-vin01a0:1025_0: Katamaṃ panettha sīlaṃ, katamaṃ adhisīlaṃ, katamaṃ cittaṃ, katamaṃ adhicittaṃ, katamā
atk-vin01a0:1025_1: paññā, katamā adhipaññāti? Vuccate – pañcaṅgadasaṅgasīlaṃ tāva sīlameva. Tañhi buddhe
atk-vin01a0:1025_2: uppannepi anuppannepi loke pavattati. Uppanne buddhe tasmiṃ sīle buddhāpi sāvakāpi
atk-vin01a0:1025_3: mahājanaṃ samādapenti. Anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhā ca kammavādino ca dhammikā
atk-vin01a0:1025_4: samaṇabrāhmaṇā cakkavattī ca mahārājāno mahābodhisattā ca samādapenti. Sāmampi paṇḍitā
atk-vin01a0:1025_5: samaṇabrāhmaṇā samādiyanti. Te taṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paripūretvā devesu ca manussesu
atk-vin01a0:1025_6: ca sampattiṃ anubhonti. Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ pana “adhisīla”nti vuccati, tañhi
atk-vin01a0:1025_7: sūriyo viya pajjotānaṃ sineru viya pabbatānaṃ sabbalokiyasīlānaṃ adhikañceva uttamañca,
atk-vin01a0:1025_8: buddhuppādeyeva ca pavattati, na vinā buddhuppādā. Na hi taṃ paññattiṃ uddharitvā
atk-vin01a0:1025_9: añño satto ṭhapetuṃ sakkoti, buddhāyeva pana sabbaso kāyavacīdvāraajjhācārasotaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1025_10: chinditvā tassa tassa vītikkamassa anucchavikaṃ taṃ sīlasaṃvaraṃ paññapenti. Pātimokkhasaṃvaratopi
atk-vin01a0:1025_11: ca maggaphalasampayuttameva sīlaṃ adhisīlaṃ, taṃ pana idha anadhippetaṃ. Na hi taṃ
atk-vin01a0:1026_0: Kāmāvacarāni pana aṭṭha kusalacittāni, lokiyaaṭṭhasamāpatticittāni ca ekajjhaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:1026_1: cittamevāti veditabbāni. Buddhuppādānuppāde cassa pavatti, samādapanaṃ samādānañca
atk-vin01a0:1026_2: sīle vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Vipassanāpādakaṃ aṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ pana “adhicitta”nti
atk-vin01a0:1026_3: vuccati. Tañhi adhisīlaṃ viya sīlānaṃ sabbalokiyacittānaṃ adhikañceva uttamañca,
atk-vin01a0:1026_4: buddhuppādeyeva ca hoti, na vinā buddhuppādā. Tatopi ca maggaphalacittameva adhicittaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1026_5: taṃ pana idha anadhippetaṃ. Na hi taṃ samāpanno bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati.
atk-vin01a0:1027_0: “Atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭha”nti -ādinayappavattaṃ pana kammassakatañāṇaṃ paññā, sā
atk-vin01a0:1027_1: hi buddhe uppannepi anuppannepi loke pavattati. Uppanne buddhe tassā paññāya buddhāpi
atk-vin01a0:1027_2: buddhasāvakāpi mahājanaṃ samādapenti. Anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhā ca kammavādino
atk-vin01a0:1027_3: ca dhammikā samaṇabrāhmaṇā cakkavattī ca mahārājāno mahābodhisattā ca samādapenti.
atk-vin01a0:1027_4: Sāmampi paṇḍitā sattā samādiyanti. Tathā hi aṅkuro dasavassasahassāni mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-vin01a0:1027_5: Velāmo, vessantaro, aññe ca bahū paṇḍitamanussā mahādānāni adaṃsu. Te taṃ kusalaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1027_6: dhammaṃ paripūretvā devesu ca manussesu ca sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu. Tilakkhaṇākāraparicchedakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1027_7: pana vipassanāñāṇaṃ “adhipaññā”ti vuccati. Sā hi adhisīla-adhicittāni viya sīlacittānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1027_8: sabbalokiyapaññānaṃ adhikā ceva uttamā ca, na ca vinā buddhuppādā loke pavattati.
atk-vin01a0:1027_9: Tatopi ca maggaphalapaññāva adhipaññā, sā pana idha anadhippetā. Na hi taṃ samāpanno
atk-vin01a0:1028_0: Tatrāti tāsu tīsu sikkhāsu. Yāyaṃ adhisīlasikkhāti yā ayaṃ pātimokkhasīlasaṅkhātā
atk-vin01a0:1028_1: adhisīlasikkhā. Etaṃ sājīvaṃ nāmāti etaṃ sabbampi bhagavatā vinaye ṭhapitaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1028_2: yasmā ettha nānādesajātigottādibhedabhinnā bhikkhū saha jīvanti ekajīvikā sabhāgajīvikā
atk-vin01a0:1028_3: sabhāgavuttino honti, tasmā “sājīva”nti vuccati. Tasmiṃ sikkhatīti taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1028_4: cittassa adhikaraṇaṃ katvā “yathāsikkhāpadaṃ nu kho sikkhāmi na sikkhāmī”ti cittena
atk-vin01a0:1028_5: olokento sikkhati. Na kevalañcāyametasmiṃ sājīvasaṅkhāte sikkhāpadeyeva sikkhati,
atk-vin01a0:1028_6: sikkhāyapi sikkhati, “etaṃ sājīvaṃ nāmā”ti imassa pana anantarassa padassa vasena
atk-vin01a0:1028_7: “tasmiṃ sikkhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi taṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ, atha kho ayamettha attho daṭṭhabbo
atk-vin01a0:1028_8: – tassā ca sikkhāya sikkhaṃ paripūrento sikkhati, tasmiñca sikkhāpade avītikkamanto
atk-vin01a0:1028_9: sikkhatīti. Tena vuccati sājīvasamāpannoti idampi anantarassa sājīvapadasseva vasena
atk-vin01a0:1028_10: vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana so sikkhampi samāpanno, tasmā sikkhāsamāpannotipi atthato veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1028_11: Evañhi sati “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti etassa padassa padabhājanampi paripuṇṇaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1031_0: Sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti sikkhañca appaṭikkhipitvā dubbalabhāvañca
atk-vin01a0:1031_1: appakāsetvā. Yasmā ca dubbalye āvikatepi sikkhā appaccakkhātāva hoti, sikkhāya pana
atk-vin01a0:1031_2: paccakkhātāya dubbalyaṃ āvikatameva hoti. Tasmā “dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti iminā padena
atk-vin01a0:1031_3: na koci visesattho labbhati. Yathā pana “dirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyyā”ti vutte
atk-vin01a0:1031_4: dirattavacanena na koci visesattho labbhati, kevalaṃ lokavohāravasena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya
atk-vin01a0:1031_5: mukhārūḷhatāya etaṃ vuttaṃ. Evamidampi vohāravasena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya mukhārūḷhatāya
atk-vin01a0:1032_0: Yasmā vā bhagavā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, tasmā “sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāyā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1032_1: iminā atthaṃ sampādetvā “dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti iminā byañjanaṃ sampādeti. Parivārakapadavirahitañhi
atk-vin01a0:1032_2: ekameva atthapadaṃ vuccamānaṃ parivāravirahito rājā viya, vatthālaṅkāravirahito viya
atk-vin01a0:1032_3: ca puriso na sobhati; parivārakena pana atthānulomena sahāyapadena saddhiṃ taṃ sobhatīti.
atk-vin01a0:1033: Yasmā vā sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ekaccaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ attho hoti, tasmā taṃ sandhāya “sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāyā”tipadassa atthaṃ vivaranto “dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti āha.
atk-vin01a0:1034_0: Tattha siyā yasmā na sabbaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ, tasmā “dubbalyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1034_1: anāvikatvā”ti paṭhamaṃ vatvā tassa atthaniyamanatthaṃ “sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāyā”ti vattabbanti,
atk-vin01a0:1034_2: tañca na; kasmā? Atthānukkamābhāvato. “Sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti hi vuttattā yaṃ sikkhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1034_3: samāpanno, taṃ appaccakkhāyāti vuccamāno anukkameneva attho vutto hoti, na aññathā.
atk-vin01a0:1035: Apica anupaṭipāṭiyāpi ettha attho veditabbo. Kathaṃ? “Sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti ettha yaṃ sikkhaṃ samāpanno taṃ appaccakkhāya yañca sājīvaṃ samāpanno tattha dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti.
atk-vin01a0:1036_1: dassento “atthi bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Tattha atthi bhikkhavetiādīni dve mātikāpadāni;
atk-vin01a0:1036_2: tāni vibhajanto “kathañca bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanā – kathanti
atk-vin01a0:1036_3: kena ākārena. Dubbalyāvikammañcāti dubbalyassa āvikammañca. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane.
atk-vin01a0:1036_4: Ukkaṇṭhitoti anabhiratiyā imasmiṃ sāsane kicchajīvikappatto. Atha vā ajja yāmi, sve
atk-vin01a0:1036_5: yāmi, ito yāmi, ettha yāmīti uddhaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ katvā viharamāno, vikkhitto anekaggoti
atk-vin01a0:1037_0: Sāmaññā cavitukāmoti samaṇabhāvato apagantukāmo. Bhikkhubhāvanti bhikkhubhāvena.
atk-vin01a0:1037_1: Karaṇatthe upayogavacanaṃ. “Kaṇṭhe āsattena aṭṭīyeyyā”tiādīsu pana yathālakkhaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1037_2: karaṇavacaneneva vuttaṃ. Aṭṭīyamānoti aṭṭaṃ pīḷitaṃ dukkhitaṃ viya attānaṃ ācaramāno;
atk-vin01a0:1037_3: tena vā bhikkhubhāvena aṭṭo kariyamāno pīḷiyamānoti attho. Harāyamānoti lajjamāno.
atk-vin01a0:1037_4: Jigucchamānoti asuciṃ viya taṃ jigucchanto. Gihibhāvaṃ patthayamānotiādīni uttānatthāniyeva.
atk-vin01a0:1037_5: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ buddhaṃ paccakkheyyanti ettha yaṃnūnāti parivitakkadassane nipāto. Idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1037_6: vuttaṃ hoti – “sacāhaṃ buddhaṃ paccakkheyyaṃ, sādhu vata me siyā”ti. Vadati viññāpetīti
atk-vin01a0:1037_7: imamatthaṃ etehi vā aññehi vā byañjanehi vacībhedaṃ katvā vadati ceva, yassa ca vadati,
atk-vin01a0:1037_8: taṃ viññāpeti jānāpeti. Evampīti uparimatthasampiṇḍanatto pikāro. Evampi dubbalyāvikammañceva
atk-vin01a0:1038_0: Idāni taṃ aññathāpi dubbalyāvikammaṃ sikkhāya ca appaccakkhānaṃ dassento “atha vā
atk-vin01a0:1038_1: panā”tiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ atthato uttānameva. Padato panettha ādito paṭṭhāya “buddhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1038_2: paccakkheyyaṃ, dhammaṃ, saṅghaṃ, sikkhaṃ, vinayaṃ, pātimokkhaṃ, uddesaṃ, upajjhāyaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1038_3: ācariyaṃ, saddhivihārikaṃ, antevāsikaṃ, samānupajjhāyakaṃ, samānācariyakaṃ, sabrahmacāriṃ
atk-vin01a0:1038_4: paccakkheyya”nti imāni cuddasa padāni paccakkhānākārena vuttāni.
atk-vin01a0:1039_0: Gihī assantiādīni “gihī, upāsako, ārāmiko, sāmaṇero, titthiyo, titthiyasāvako, assamaṇo,
atk-vin01a0:1039_1: asakyaputtiyo assa”nti imāni aṭṭha padāni “assa”nti iminā bhāvavikappākārena vuttāni.
atk-vin01a0:1040: 46. Yathā ca etāni, evaṃ “yadi panāhaṃ, apāhaṃ, handāhaṃ, hoti me”ti imesu ekamekena paṭisaṃyuttāni dvāvīsatīti sabbāneva satañca dasa ca padāni honti.
atk-vin01a0:1041_0: 47. Tato paraṃ saritabbavatthudassananayena pavattāni “mātaraṃ sarāmī”tiādīni sattarasa
atk-vin01a0:1041_1: padāni. Tattha khettanti sālikhettādiṃ. Vatthunti tiṇapaṇṇasākaphalāphalasamuṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1042: 48. Tato paraṃ sakiñcanasapalibodhabhāvadassanavasena pavattāni “mātā me atthi, sā mayā posetabbā”tiādīni nava padāni.
atk-vin01a0:1043: 49. Tato paraṃ sanissayasappatiṭṭhabhāvadassanavasena pavattāni “mātā me atthi, sā maṃ posessatī”tiādīni soḷasa padāni.
atk-vin01a0:1044: 50. Tato paraṃ ekabhattaekaseyyabrahmacariyānaṃ dukkarabhāvadassanavasena pavattāni “dukkara”ntiādīni aṭṭha padāni.
atk-vin01a0:1045_0: Tattha dukkaranti ekabhattādīnaṃ karaṇe dukkarataṃ dasseti. Na sukaranti sukarabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1045_1: paṭikkhipati. Evaṃ duccaraṃ na sucaranti ettha. Na ussahāmīti tattha ussāhābhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1045_2: asakkuṇeyyataṃ dasseti. Na visahāmīti asayhataṃ dasseti. Na ramāmīti ratiyā abhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1045_3: dasseti. Nābhiramāmīti abhiratiyā abhāvaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ imāni ca paññāsa, purimāni
atk-vin01a0:1045_4: ca dasuttarasatanti saṭṭhisataṃ padāni dubbalyāvikammavāre vuttānīti veditabbāni.
atk-vin01a0:1046_0: 51. Sikkhāpaccakkhānavārepi “kathañca bhikkhave”ti ādi sabbaṃ atthato uttānameva.
atk-vin01a0:1046_1: Padato panetthāpi “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmi, dhammaṃ, saṅghaṃ, sikkhaṃ, vinayaṃ, pātimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1046_2: uddesaṃ, upajjhāyaṃ, ācariyaṃ, saddhivihārikaṃ, antevāsikaṃ, samānupajjhāyakaṃ, samānācariyakaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1046_3: sabrahmacāriṃ paccakkhāmī”ti imāni cuddasa padāni sikkhāpaccakkhānavacanasambandhena
atk-vin01a0:1046_4: pavattāni. Sabbapadesu ca “vadati viññāpetī”ti vacanassa ayamattho – vacībhedaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:1046_5: vadati, yassa ca vadati taṃ teneva vacībhedena “ayaṃ sāsanaṃ jahitukāmo sāsanato
atk-vin01a0:1046_6: muccitukāmo bhikkhubhāvaṃ cajitukāmo imaṃ vākyabhedaṃ karotī”ti viññāpeti sāveti jānāpeti.
atk-vin01a0:1047_0: Sace panāyaṃ “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vattukāmo padapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ katvā “paccakkhāmi
atk-vin01a0:1047_1: buddha”nti vā vadeyya. Milakkhabhāsāsu vā aññatarabhāsāya tamatthaṃ vadeyya. “Buddhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1047_2: paccakkhāmī”ti vattukāmo uppaṭipāṭiyā “dhammaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vā “sabrahmacāriṃ paccakkhāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1047_3: vā vadeyya, seyyathāpi uttarimanussadhammavibhaṅge “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1047_4: vattukāmo “dutiyaṃ jhāna”nti vadati, sace yassa vadati so “ayaṃ bhikkhubhāvaṃ cajitukāmo
atk-vin01a0:1047_5: etamatthaṃ vadatī”ti ettakamattampi jānāti, viraddhaṃ nāma natthi; khettameva otiṇṇaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1047_6: paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Sakkattā vā brahmattā vā cutasatto viya cutova hoti sāsanā.
atk-vin01a0:1048_0: Sace pana “buddhaṃ paccakkhi”nti vā, “buddhaṃ paccakkhissāmī”ti vā, “buddhaṃ paccakkheyya”nti
atk-vin01a0:1048_1: vāti atītānāgataparikappavacanehi vadati, dūtaṃ vā pahiṇāti, sāsanaṃ vā peseti, akkharaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1048_2: vā chindati, hatthamuddāya vā tamatthaṃ āroceti, appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā. Uttarimanussadhammārocanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1048_3: pana hatthamuddāyapi sīsaṃ eti. Sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ manussajātikasattassa santike
atk-vin01a0:1048_4: cittasampayuttaṃ vacībhedaṃ karontasseva sīsaṃ eti. Vacībhedaṃ katvā viññāpentopi
atk-vin01a0:1048_5: ca yadi “ayameva jānātū”ti ekaṃ niyametvā āroceti, tañca soyeva jānāti, paccakkhātā
atk-vin01a0:1048_6: hoti sikkhā. Atha so na jānāti, añño samīpe ṭhito jānāti, appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā.
atk-vin01a0:1048_7: Atha dvinnaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne dvinnampi niyametvā “etesaṃ ārocemī”ti vadati, tesu ekasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1048_8: jānantepi dvīsu jānantesupi paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Evaṃ sambahulesupi veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1049_0: Sace pana anabhiratiyā pīḷito sabhāge bhikkhū parisaṅkamāno “yo koci jānātū”ti uccasaddaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1049_1: karonto “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vadati, tañca avidūre ṭhito navakammiko vā añño vā
atk-vin01a0:1049_2: samayaññū puriso sutvā “ukkaṇṭhito ayaṃ samaṇo gihibhāvaṃ pattheti, sāsanato cuto”ti
atk-vin01a0:1049_3: jānāti, paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Taṅkhaṇaññeva pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ dujjānaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1049_4: sace āvajjanasamaye jānāti; yathā pakatiyā loke manussā vacanaṃ sutvā jānanti, paccakkhātā
atk-vin01a0:1049_5: hoti sikkhā. Atha aparabhāge “kiṃ iminā vutta”nti kaṅkhanto cirena jānāti, appaccakkhātā
atk-vin01a0:1049_7: ca ekaparicchedāni. Āvajjanasamaye ñāte eva sīsaṃ enti, “kiṃ ayaṃ bhaṇatī”ti kaṅkhatā
atk-vin01a0:1049_8: cirena ñāte sīsaṃ na enti. Yathā cāyaṃ “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti pade vinicchaye vutto;
atk-vin01a0:1050_0: Yasmā ca yadā sikkhā paccakkhātā hoti, tadā “yaṃnūnāhaṃ buddhaṃ paccakkheyya”ntiādīni
atk-vin01a0:1050_1: avadatāpi dubbalyaṃ āvikatameva hoti; tasmā sabbesaṃ padānaṃ avasāne vuttaṃ – “evampi,
atk-vin01a0:1050_2: bhikkhave, dubbalyāvikammañceva hoti sikkhā ca paccakkhātā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1051_0: Tato paraṃ gihīti maṃ dhārehīti ettha sacepi “gihī bhavissāmī”ti vā “gihī homī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1051_1: vā “gihī jātomhī”ti vā “gihimhī”ti vā vadati, appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā. Sace pana
atk-vin01a0:1051_2: “ajja paṭṭhāya gihīti maṃ dhārehī”ti vā “jānāhī”ti vā “sañjānāhī”ti vā “manasi karohī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1051_3: vā vadati, ariyakena vā vadati milakkhakena vā; evametasmiṃ atthe vutte yassa vadati,
atk-vin01a0:1051_4: sace so jānāti, paccakkhātā hoti sikkhā. Esa nayo sesesupi “upāsako”tiādīsu sattasu
atk-vin01a0:1051_5: padesu. Evaṃ imāni ca aṭṭha, purimāni ca cuddasāti dvāvīsati padāni honti.
atk-vin01a0:1052_0: 52. Ito paraṃ purimāneva cuddasa padāni “alaṃ me, kinnu me, na mamattho, sumuttāha”nti
atk-vin01a0:1052_1: imehi catūhi yojetvā vuttāni chappaññāsa honti. Tattha alanti hotu, pariyattanti
atk-vin01a0:1052_2: attho. Kiṃnu meti kiṃ mayhaṃ kiccaṃ, kiṃ karaṇīyaṃ, kiṃ sādhetabbanti attho. Na mamatthoti
atk-vin01a0:1052_3: natthi mama attho. Sumuttāhanti sumutto ahaṃ. Sesamettha vuttanayameva. Evaṃ imāni
atk-vin01a0:1052_4: ca chappaññāsa purimāni ca dvāvīsatīti aṭṭhasattati padāni sarūpeneva vuttāni.
atk-vin01a0:1053_0: 53. Yasmā pana tesaṃ vevacanehipi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, tasmā “yāni vā panaññānipī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:1053_1: Tattha yāni vā panaññānipīti pāḷiyaṃ “buddha”ntiādīni āgatapadāni ṭhapetvā yāni aññāni
atk-vin01a0:1053_2: atthi. Buddhavevacanāni vāti buddhassa vā pariyāyanāmāni…pe… asakyaputtiyassa vā.
atk-vin01a0:1053_3: Tattha vaṇṇapaṭṭhāne āgataṃ nāmasahassaṃ upāligāthāsu nāmasataṃ aññāni ca guṇato
atk-vin01a0:1053_4: labbhamānāni nāmāni “buddhavevacanānī”ti veditabbāni. Sabbānipi dhammassa nāmāni
atk-vin01a0:1054_0: Ayaṃ panettha yojanā – buddhaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevavacanena paccakkhānaṃ yathārutameva.
atk-vin01a0:1054_2: vigatamohaṃ, pabhinnakhīlaṃ, vijitavijayaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evamādibuddhavevacanena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1055_0: Dhammaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ, yathārutameva. “Svākkhātaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1055_1: paccakkhāmi, sandiṭṭhikaṃ, akālikaṃ, ehipassikaṃ, opaneyyikaṃ, paccattaṃ veditabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1055_2: viññūhi dhammaṃ paccakkhāmi. Asaṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ paccakkhāmi; virāgaṃ, nirodhaṃ, amataṃ
atk-vin01a0:1055_3: dhammaṃ paccakkhāmi, dīghanikāyaṃ paccakkhāmi, brahmajālaṃ majjhimanikāyaṃ, mūlapariyāyaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1055_5: jātakaṃ, abhidhammaṃ, kusalaṃ dhammaṃ, akusalaṃ dhammaṃ, abyākataṃ dhammaṃ, satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1055_6: sammappadhānaṃ, iddhipādaṃ, indriyaṃ, balaṃ, bojjhaṅgaṃ, maggaṃ, phalaṃ, nibbānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1056_0: Saṅghaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Suppaṭipannaṃ saṅghaṃ paccakkhāmi,
atk-vin01a0:1056_1: ujuppaṭipannaṃ, ñāyappaṭipannaṃ, sāmīcippaṭipannaṃ saṅghaṃ, catupurisayugaṃ saṅghaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1056_2: aṭṭhapurisapuggalaṃ saṅghaṃ, āhuneyyaṃ saṅghaṃ, pāhuneyyaṃ, dakkhiṇeyyaṃ, añjalikaraṇīyaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1056_3: anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ saṅghaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ saṅghavevacanena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1057_0: Sikkhaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Bhikkhusikkhaṃ paccakkhāmi, bhikkhunīsikkhaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1057_1: adhisīlasikkhaṃ, adhicittasikkhaṃ, adhipaññāsikkhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ sikkhāvevacanena
atk-vin01a0:1058_0: Vinayaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Bhikkhuvinayaṃ paccakkhāmi, bhikkhunīvinayaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1058_1: paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ, dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthaṃ pārājikaṃ, saṅghādisesaṃ, thullaccayaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1058_2: pācittiyaṃ, pāṭidesanīyaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ, dubbhāsitaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evamādivinayavevacanena
atk-vin01a0:1059: Pātimokkhaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ bhikkhunīpātimokkhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ pātimokkhavevacanena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1060_0: Uddesaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Bhikkhupātimokkhuddesaṃ, bhikkhunīpātimokkhuddesaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1060_1: paṭhamaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ, dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ, sammāsambuddhuddesaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1060_3: pabhinnakhīluddesaṃ, vijitavijayuddesaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evamādiuddesavevacanena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1061_0: Upajjhāyaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Yo maṃ pabbājesi, yo maṃ upasampādesi,
atk-vin01a0:1061_1: yassa mūlenāhaṃ pabbajito, yassa mūlenāhaṃ upasampanno, yassamūlikā mayhaṃ pabbajjā,
atk-vin01a0:1061_2: yassamūlikā mayhaṃ upasampadā tāhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ upajjhāyavevacanena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1062_0: Ācariyaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Yo maṃ pabbājesi, yo maṃ anussāvesi,
atk-vin01a0:1062_1: yāhaṃ nissāya vasāmi, yāhaṃ uddisāpemi, yāhaṃ paripucchāmi, yo maṃ uddisati, yo maṃ
atk-vin01a0:1062_2: paripucchāpeti tāhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ ācariyavevacanena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1063_0: Saddhivihārikaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Yāhaṃ pabbājesiṃ, yāhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1063_1: upasampādesiṃ, mayhaṃ mūlena yo pabbajito, mayhaṃ mūlena yo upasampanno, mayhaṃmūlikā
atk-vin01a0:1063_2: yassa pabbajjā, mayhaṃ mūlikā yassa upasampadā tāhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ saddhivihārikavevacanena
atk-vin01a0:1064_0: Antevāsikaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Yāhaṃ pabbājesiṃ, yāhaṃ anussāvesiṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1064_1: yo maṃ nissāya vasati, yo maṃ uddisāpeti, yo maṃ paripucchati, yassāhaṃ uddisāmi,
atk-vin01a0:1064_2: yāhaṃ paripucchāpemi taṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ antevāsikavevacanena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1065_0: Samānupajjhāyakaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Mayhaṃ upajjhāyo yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1065_1: pabbājesi, yaṃ upasampādesi, yo tassa mūlena pabbajito, yo tassa mūlena upasampanno,
atk-vin01a0:1065_2: yassa tammūlikā pabbajjā, yassa tammūlikā upasampadā taṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ samānupajjhāyakavevacanena
atk-vin01a0:1066_0: Samānācariyakaṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Mayhaṃ ācariyo yaṃ pabbājesi,
atk-vin01a0:1066_1: yaṃ anussāvesi, yo taṃ nissāya vasati, yo taṃ uddisāpeti paripucchati, yassa me ācariyo
atk-vin01a0:1066_2: uddisati, yaṃ paripucchāpeti taṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ samānācariyakavevacanena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1067_0: Sabrahmacāriṃ paccakkhāmīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Yenāhaṃ saddhiṃ adhisīlaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1067_1: sikkhāmi, adhicittaṃ adhipaññaṃ sikkhāmi taṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ sabrahmacārivevacanena
atk-vin01a0:1068_0: Gihīti maṃ dhārehīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Āgārikoti maṃ dhārehi, kassako,
atk-vin01a0:1068_1: vāṇijo, gorakkho, okallako, moḷibaddho, kāmaguṇikoti maṃ dhārehī”ti evaṃ gihivevacanena
atk-vin01a0:1069_0: Upāsakoti maṃ dhārehīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Dvevāciko upāsakoti maṃ dhārehi,
atk-vin01a0:1069_1: tevāciko upāsako, buddhaṃ saraṇagamaniko, dhammaṃ saṅghaṃ saraṇagamaniko, pañcasikkhāpadiko
atk-vin01a0:1069_2: dasasikkhāpadiko upāsakoti maṃ dhārehī”ti evaṃ upāsakavevacanena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1070_0: Ārāmikoti maṃ dhārehīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Kappiyakārakoti maṃ dhārehi,
atk-vin01a0:1070_1: veyyāvaccakaro, appaharitakārako, yāgubhājako, phalabhājako, khajjakabhājakoti maṃ
atk-vin01a0:1071_0: Sāmaṇeroti maṃ dhārehīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Kumārakoti maṃ dhārehi, cellako,
atk-vin01a0:1071_1: ceṭako, moḷigallo, samaṇuddeso’ti maṃ dhārehī”ti evaṃ sāmaṇeravecanena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1072_0: Titthiyoti maṃ dhārehīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Nigaṇṭhoti maṃ dhārehi, ājīvako,
atk-vin01a0:1072_1: tāpaso, paribbājako, paṇḍaraṅgoti maṃ dhārehī”ti evaṃ titthiyavevacanena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1073_0: Titthiyasāvakoti maṃ dhārehīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Nigaṇṭhasāvakoti maṃ
atk-vin01a0:1073_1: dhārehi” ājīvaka tāpasa paribbājaka paṇḍaraṅgasāvakoti maṃ dhārehīti evaṃ titthiyasāvakavevacanena
atk-vin01a0:1074_0: Assamaṇoti maṃ dhārehīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Dussīloti maṃ dhārehi, pāpadhammo,
atk-vin01a0:1074_2: brahmacāripaṭiñño, antopūti, avassuto, kasambujāto, koṇṭho’ti maṃ dhārehī”ti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1075_0: Asakyaputtiyoti maṃ dhārehīti na vevacanena paccakkhānaṃ. “Na sammāsambuddhaputtoti
atk-vin01a0:1075_1: maṃ dhārehi, na anantabuddhiputto, na anomabuddhiputto, na bodhipaññāṇaputto, na
atk-vin01a0:1075_2: dhīraputto, na vigatamohaputto, na pabhinnakhīlaputto, na vijitavijayaputtoti maṃ
atk-vin01a0:1076_0: Tehi ākārehi tehi liṅgehi tehi nimittehīti tehi “buddhavevacanāni vā”tiādinā nayena
atk-vin01a0:1076_1: vuttehi buddhādīnaṃ vevacanehi. Vevacanāni hi sikkhāpaccakkhānassa kāraṇattā ākārāni,
atk-vin01a0:1076_2: buddhādīnaṃ saṇṭhānadīpanattā sikkhāpaccakkhānasaṇṭhānattā eva vā liṅgāni, sikkhāpaccakkhānassa
atk-vin01a0:1076_3: sañjānanahetuto manussānaṃ tilakādīni viya nimittānīti vuccanti. Evaṃ kho bhikkhaveti
atk-vin01a0:1076_4: ito paraṃ aññassa sikkhāpaccakkhānakāraṇassa abhāvato niyamento āha. Ayañhettha attho,
atk-vin01a0:1076_5: evameva dubbalyāvikammañceva hoti sikkhāpaccakkhānañca, na ito paraṃ kāraṇamatthīti.
atk-vin01a0:1077_0: 54. Evaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānalakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā appaccakkhāne asammohatthaṃ tasseva
atk-vin01a0:1077_2: appaccakkhātā”tiādimāha. Tattha yehi ākārehītiādi vuttanayameva. Ummattakoti yakkhummattako
atk-vin01a0:1077_3: vā pittummattako vā yo koci viparītasañño, so sace paccakkhāti, appaccakkhātā hoti
atk-vin01a0:1077_4: sikkhā. Ummattakassāti tādisasseva ummattakassa; tādisassa hi santike sace pakatatto
atk-vin01a0:1077_5: sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti, ummattako na jānāti, appaccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Khittacittoti
atk-vin01a0:1077_6: yakkhummattako vuccati. Purimapade pana ummattakasāmaññena vuttaṃ “yakkhummattako
atk-vin01a0:1077_7: vā pittummattako vā”ti. Ubhinnampi viseso anāpattivāre āvi bhavissati. Evaṃ khittacitto
atk-vin01a0:1077_8: sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti, appaccakkhātāva hoti. Tassa santike paccakkhātāpi tamhi ajānante
atk-vin01a0:1078: Vedanāṭṭoti balavatiyā dukkhavedanāya phuṭṭho mucchāpareto; tena vilapantena paccakkhātāpi appaccakkhātāva hoti. Tassa santike paccakkhātāpi tamhi ajānante appaccakkhātā hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1079_0: Devatāya santiketi bhummadevataṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva akaniṭṭhadevatāya santike paccakkhātāpi
atk-vin01a0:1079_1: appaccakkhātāva hoti. Tiracchānagatassāti nāgamāṇavakassa vā supaṇṇamāṇavakassa vā
atk-vin01a0:1079_2: kinnara-hatthi-makkaṭādīnaṃ vā yassa kassaci santike paccakkhātāpi appaccakkhātāva
atk-vin01a0:1079_3: hoti. Tatra ummattakādīnaṃ santike ajānanabhāvena appaccakkhātāti āha. Devatāya santike
atk-vin01a0:1079_4: atikhippaṃ jānanabhāvena. Devatā nāma mahāpaññā tihetukapaṭisandhikā atikhippaṃ jānanti,
atk-vin01a0:1079_5: cittañca nāmetaṃ lahuparivattaṃ. Tasmā cittalahukassa puggalassa cittavaseneva “mā
atk-vin01a0:1079_6: atikhippaṃ vināso ahosī”ti devatāya santike sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ paṭikkhipi.
atk-vin01a0:1080_0: Manussesu pana niyamo natthi. Yassa kassaci sabhāgassa vā visabhāgassa vā gahaṭṭhassa
atk-vin01a0:1080_1: vā pabbajitassa vā viññussa santike paccakkhātā paccakkhātāva hoti. Sace pana so
atk-vin01a0:1080_2: na jānāti, appaccakkhātāva hotīti etamatthaṃ dassento “ariyakenā”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:1080_3: ariyakaṃ nāma ariyavohāro, māgadhabhāsā. Milakkhakaṃ nāma yo koci anariyako andhadamiḷādi.
atk-vin01a0:1080_4: So ca na paṭivijānātīti bhāsantare vā anabhiññatāya, buddhasamaye vā akovidatāya
atk-vin01a0:1080_5: “idaṃ nāma atthaṃ esa bhaṇatī”ti nappaṭivijānāti. Davāyāti sahasā aññaṃ bhaṇitukāmo
atk-vin01a0:1080_6: sahasā “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti bhaṇati. Ravāyāti ravābhaññena, “aññaṃ bhaṇissāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1080_7: aññaṃ bhaṇanto. Purimena ko visesoti ce? Purimaṃ paṇḍitassāpi sahasāvasena aññabhaṇanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1080_8: Idaṃ pana mandattā momūhattā apakataññuttā pakkhalantassa “aññaṃ bhaṇissāmī”ti aññabhaṇanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1081_0: Asāvetukāmo sāvetīti imassa sikkhāpadassa pāḷiṃ vāceti paripucchati uggaṇhāti sajjhāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1081_1: karoti vaṇṇeti, ayaṃ vuccati “asāvetukāmo sāvetī”ti. Sāvetukāmo na sāvetīti dubbalabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1081_2: āvikatvā sikkhaṃ paccakkhanto vacībhedaṃ na karoti, ayaṃ vuccati “sāvetukāmo na sāvetī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1081_3: Aviññussa sāvetīti mahallakassa vā potthakarūpasadisassa, garumedhassa vā samaye
atk-vin01a0:1081_4: akovidassa, gāmadārakānaṃ vā aviññutaṃ pattānaṃ sāveti. Viññussa na sāvetīti paṇḍitassa
atk-vin01a0:1081_5: ñātuṃ samatthassa na sāveti. Sabbaso vā panāti “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādīsu yena
atk-vin01a0:1081_6: yena pariyāyena sikkhā paccakkhātā hoti, tato ekampi vacībhedaṃ katvā na sāveti.
atk-vin01a0:1081_7: Evaṃ khoti appaccakkhānalakkhaṇaṃ niyameti. Ayaṃ hettha attho – “evameva sikkhā appaccakkhātā
atk-vin01a0:1084_1: nāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha methunadhammo nāmāti idaṃ niddisitabbassa methunadhammassa
atk-vin01a0:1084_2: uddesapadaṃ. Asaddhammoti asataṃ nīcajanānaṃ dhammo. Gāmadhammoti gāmavāsīnaṃ sevanadhammo.
atk-vin01a0:1084_3: Vasaladhammoti vasalānaṃ dhammo; kilesavassanato vā sayameva vasalo dhammoti vasaladhammo.
atk-vin01a0:1084_4: Duṭṭhullanti duṭṭhuñca kilesehi duṭṭhattā, thūlañca anipuṇabhāvatoti duṭṭhullaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1084_5: Ito paṭṭhāya ca tīsu padesu “yo so”ti idaṃ parivattetvā “yaṃ ta”nti katvā yojetabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1084_6: – “yaṃ taṃ duṭṭhullaṃ, yaṃ taṃ odakantikaṃ, yaṃ taṃ rahassa”nti. Ettha ca yasmā tassa
atk-vin01a0:1084_7: kammassa parivārabhūtaṃ dassanampi gahaṇampi āmasanampi phusanampi ghaṭṭanampi duṭṭhullaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1084_8: tasmāpi taṃ kammaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ. Yaṃ taṃ duṭṭhullaṃ so methunadhammo. Udakaṃ assa ante
atk-vin01a0:1084_9: suddhatthaṃ ādīyatīti udakantaṃ, udakantameva odakantikaṃ; yaṃ taṃ odakantikaṃ, so
atk-vin01a0:1084_10: methunadhammo. Raho paṭicchanne okāse kattabbatāya rahassaṃ. Yaṃ taṃ rahassaṃ, so
atk-vin01a0:1085_0: Dvayena dvayena samāpajjitabbato dvayaṃdvayasamāpatti. Tattha yojanā – “yā sā dvayaṃdvayasamāpatti
atk-vin01a0:1085_1: so methunadhammo nāmā”ti. Idha pana taṃ sabbaṃ ekajjhaṃ nigamento āha “eso methunadhammo
atk-vin01a0:1085_2: nāmā”ti. Kiṃ kāraṇā vuccati methunadhammoti? Ubhinnaṃ rattānaṃ sārattānaṃ avassutānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1085_3: pariyuṭṭhitānaṃ ubhinnaṃ sadisānaṃ dhammoti, taṃ kāraṇā vuccati methunadhammoti.
atk-vin01a0:1086_0: Paṭisevati nāmāti idaṃ “paṭiseveyyā”ti ettha yenākārena paṭiseveyyāti vuccati, tassākārassa
atk-vin01a0:1086_1: dassanatthaṃ mātikāpadaṃ. Yo nittena nimittantiādīsu yo bhikkhu itthiyā nimittena
atk-vin01a0:1086_2: attano nimittaṃ, itthiyā aṅgajātena attano aṅgajātaṃ sabbantimena pamāṇena ekatilabījamattampi
atk-vin01a0:1086_3: vātena asamphuṭṭhe allokāse paveseti, eso paṭisevati nāma; ettakena sīlabhedaṃ pāpuṇāti, pārājiko hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1087_0: Ettha ca itthinimitte cattāri passāni, vemajjhañcāti pañca ṭhānāni labbhanti. Purisanimitte
atk-vin01a0:1087_1: cattāri passāni, majjhaṃ, uparicāti cha. Tasmā itthinimitte heṭṭhā pavesentopi pārājiko
atk-vin01a0:1087_2: hoti. Uparito pavesentopi, ubhohi passehi pavesentopi cattāri ṭhānāni muñcitvā majjhena
atk-vin01a0:1087_3: pavesentopi pārājiko hoti. Purisanimittaṃ pana heṭṭhābhāgena chupantaṃ pavesentopi
atk-vin01a0:1087_4: pārājiko hoti. Uparibhāgena chupantaṃ pavesentopi, ubhohi passehi chupantaṃ pavesentopi,
atk-vin01a0:1087_5: majjheneva chupantaṃ pavesentopi samañchitaṅguliṃ viya majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā saṅkocetvā
atk-vin01a0:1087_6: uparibhāgena chupantaṃ pavesentopi pārājiko hoti. Tattha tulādaṇḍasadisaṃ pavesentassāpi
atk-vin01a0:1087_7: cattāri passāni, majjhañcāti pañca ṭhānāni; saṅkocetvā pavesentassāpi cattāri passāni,
atk-vin01a0:1087_8: uparibhāgamajjhañcāti pañca ṭhānāni – evaṃ sabbānipi purisanimitte dasa ṭhānāni honti.
atk-vin01a0:1088_0: Nimitte jātaṃ anaṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ cammakhīlaṃ vā piḷakaṃ vā paveseti, āpatti pārājikassa.
atk-vin01a0:1088_1: Naṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ matacammaṃ vā sukkhapiḷakaṃ vā paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Methunassādena
atk-vin01a0:1088_2: lomaṃ vā aṅguli-aṅguṭṭhabījādīni vā pavesentassāpi dukkaṭameva. Ayañca methunakathā
atk-vin01a0:1088_3: nāma yasmā duṭṭhullā kathā asabbhikathā, tasmā etaṃ vā aññaṃ vā vinaye īdisaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1088_4: kathentena paṭikkūlamanasikārañca samaṇasaññañca hirottappañca paccupaṭṭhapetvā sammāsambuddhe
atk-vin01a0:1088_5: gāravaṃ uppādetvā asamakāruṇikassa lokanāthassa karuṇāguṇaṃ āvajjetvā kathetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1088_6: So hi nāma bhagavā sabbaso kāmehi vinivattamānasopi sattānuddayāya lokānukampāya
atk-vin01a0:1088_7: sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca sikkhāpadapaññāpanatthāya īdisaṃ kathaṃ kathesi. “Aho
atk-vin01a0:1088_8: satthu karuṇāguṇo”ti evaṃ lokanāthassa karuṇāguṇaṃ āvajjetvā kathetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1089: Apica yadi bhagavā sabbākārena īdisaṃ kathaṃ na katheyya, ko jāneyya “ettakesu
atk-vin01a0:1090_0: Ṭhānesu pārājikaṃ, ettakesu thullaccayaṃ, ettakesu dukkaṭa”nti. Tasmā suṇantenapi
atk-vin01a0:1090_1: kathentenapi bījakena mukhaṃ apidhāya dantavidaṃsakaṃ hasamānena na nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1092_0: Anupaññattivāre – antamasoti sabbantimena paricchedena. Tiracchānagatāyapīti paṭisandhivasena
atk-vin01a0:1092_1: tiracchānesu gatāyapi. Pageva manussitthiyāti paṭhamataraṃ manussajātikāya itthiyā.
atk-vin01a0:1092_2: Pārājikavatthubhūtā eva cettha tiracchānagatitthī tiracchānagatāti gahetabbā, na
atk-vin01a0:1095_0: Tattha ahiggahaṇena sabbāpi ajagaragonasādibhedā dīghajāti saṅgahitā. Tasmā dīghajātīsu
atk-vin01a0:1095_1: yattha tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ sakkā tilaphalamattampi pavesetuṃ, sā pārājikavatthu.
atk-vin01a0:1095_2: Avasesā dukkaṭavatthūti veditabbā. Macchaggahaṇena sabbāpi macchakacchapamaṇḍūkādibhedā
atk-vin01a0:1095_3: odakajāti saṅgahitā. Tatrāpi dīghajātiyaṃ vuttanayeneva pārājikavatthu ca dukkaṭavatthu
atk-vin01a0:1095_4: ca veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – pataṅgamukhamaṇḍūkā nāma honti tesaṃ mukhasaṇṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1095_5: mahantaṃ, chiddaṃ appakaṃ, tattha pavesanaṃ nappahoti; mukhasaṇṭhānaṃ pana vaṇasaṅkhepaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1095_6: gacchati, tasmā taṃ thullaccayavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Kukkuṭiggahaṇena sabbāpi kākakapotādibhedā
atk-vin01a0:1095_7: pakkhijāti saṅgahitā. Tatrāpi vuttanayeneva pārājikavatthu ca dukkaṭavatthu ca veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1095_9: Tatrāpi vuttanayeneva pārājikavatthu ca dukkaṭavatthu ca veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1096_0: Pārājikoti parājito, parājayaṃ āpanno. Ayañhi pārājikasaddo sikkhāpadāpattipuggalesu
atk-vin01a0:1096_1: vattati. Tattha “aṭṭhānametaṃ, ānanda, anavakāso yaṃ tathāgato vajjīnaṃ vā vajjiputtakānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1096_2: vā kāraṇā sāvakānaṃ pārājikaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ samūhaneyyā”ti evaṃ sikkhāpade
atk-vin01a0:1096_3: vattamāno veditabbo. “Āpattiṃ tvaṃ, bhikkhu, āpanno pārājika”nti evaṃ āpattiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1096_4: “Na mayaṃ pārājikā, yo avahaṭo so pārājiko”ti evaṃ puggale vattamāno veditabbo. “Pārājikena
atk-vin01a0:1096_5: dhammena anuddhaṃseyyā”tiādīsu pana dhamme vattatīti vadanti. Yasmā pana tattha dhammoti
atk-vin01a0:1096_6: katthaci āpatti, katthaci sikkhāpadameva adhippetaṃ, tasmā so visuṃ na vattabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1096_7: Tattha sikkhāpadaṃ yo taṃ atikkamati, taṃ parājeti, tasmā “pārājika”nti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:1096_8: Āpatti pana yo naṃ ajjhāpajjati, taṃ parājeti, tasmā “pārājikā”ti vuccati. Puggalo
atk-vin01a0:1096_9: yasmā parājito parājayamāpanno, tasmā “pārājiko”ti vuccati. Etameva hi atthaṃ sandhāya parivārepi –
atk-vin01a0:1098: Cuto paraddho bhaṭṭho ca, saddhammā hi niraṅkato;
atk-vin01a0:1099: Saṃvāsopi tahiṃ natthi, tenetaṃ iti vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ. ;
atk-vin01a0:1100_0: Ayañhettha attho – “taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamanto āpattiñca āpanno puggalo cuto hotīti
atk-vin01a0:1100_1: sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tena vuccatīti yena kāraṇena assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo paribhaṭṭho
atk-vin01a0:1100_2: chinno parājito sāsanato, tena vuccati. Kinti? “Pārājiko hotī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1101_0: Saha vasanti etthāti saṃvāso, taṃ dassetuṃ “saṃvāso nāmā”ti vatvā “ekakamma”ntiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:1101_1: Tatrāyaṃ saddhiṃ yojanāya vaṇṇanā – catubbidhampi saṅghakammaṃ sīmāparicchinnehi
atk-vin01a0:1101_2: pakatattehi bhikkhūhi ekato kattabbattā ekakammaṃ nāma. Tathā pañcavidhopi pātimokkhuddeso
atk-vin01a0:1101_3: ekato uddisitabbattā ekuddeso nāma. Paññattaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ sabbehipi lajjīpuggalehi
atk-vin01a0:1101_4: samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato samasikkhatā nāma. Ettha yasmā sabbepi lajjino etesu kammādīsu
atk-vin01a0:1101_5: saha vasanti, na ekopi tato bahiddhā sandissati, tasmā tāni sabbānipi gahetvā “eso
atk-vin01a0:1101_6: saṃvāso nāmā”ti āha. So ca vuttappakāro saṃvāso tena puggalena saddhiṃ natthi, tena
atk-vin01a0:1101_7: kāraṇena so pārājiko puggalo asaṃvāsoti vuccatīti.
atk-vin01a0:1102_0: 56. Evaṃ uddiṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ padānukkamena vibhajitvā idāni yaṃ taṃ “paṭiseveyyā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1102_1: ettha yenākārena paṭiseveyyāti vuccati, tassākārassa dassanatthaṃ “paṭisevati nāmā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1102_2: idaṃ mātikāpadaṃ ṭhapetvā “nimittena nimittaṃ aṅgajātena aṅgajāta”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:1102_3: yasmā na kevalaṃ itthiyā eva nimittaṃ pārājikavatthu, na ca manussitthiyā eva, suvaṇṇarajatādimayānañca
atk-vin01a0:1102_4: itthīnampi nimittaṃ vatthumeva na hoti; tasmā yaṃ yaṃ vatthu hoti, taṃ taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1102_5: “tisso itthiyo”tiādinā nayena yesaṃ nimittāni vatthūni honti, te satte vatvā “manussitthiyā
atk-vin01a0:1102_6: tayo magge”tiādinā nayena tāni vatthūni āha.
atk-vin01a0:1103_0: Tattha tisso itthiyo, tayo ubhatobyañjanakā, tayo paṇḍakā, tayo purisāti pārājikavatthūnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1103_1: nimittānaṃ nissayā dvādasa sattā honti. Tesu itthipurisā pākaṭā eva. Paṇḍakaubhatobyañjanakabhedo
atk-vin01a0:1104_0: Manussitthiyā tayo magge methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassāti ettha ca manussitthiyā
atk-vin01a0:1104_1: tīsu maggesūti attho veditabbo. Evaṃ sabbattha. Sabbe eva cete manussitthiyā tayo
atk-vin01a0:1104_2: maggā, amanussitthiyā tayo, tiracchānagatitthiyā tayoti nava; manussaubhatobyañjanakādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1104_3: nava; manussapaṇḍakādīnaṃ dve dve katvā cha; tathā manussapurisādīnanti samatiṃsa
atk-vin01a0:1104_4: maggā honti. Etesu nimittasaṅkhātesu yattha katthaci attano aṅgajātaṃ tilaphalamattampi
atk-vin01a0:1104_5: pavesetvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto pārājikaṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin01a0:1106_0: 57. Āpajjanto pana yasmā sevanacitteneva āpajjati, na vinā tena; tasmā taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1106_1: dassento bhagavā “bhikkhussa sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhite”tiādimāha. Tattha bhikkhussāti
atk-vin01a0:1106_2: methunasevanakassa bhikkhussa. Sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhiteti bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1106_3: sevanacitte paccupaṭṭhiteti attho. Vaccamaggaṃ aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassāti yena maggena
atk-vin01a0:1106_4: vaccaṃ nikkhamati taṃ maggaṃ attano aṅgajātaṃ purisanimittaṃ tilaphalamattampi pavesentassa.
atk-vin01a0:1106_5: Āpatti pārājikassāti āpatti pārājikā assa hotīti attho. Atha vā āpattīti āpajjanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1106_6: hoti. Pārājikassāti pārājikadhammassa. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-vin01a0:1107_0: 58. Evaṃ sevanacitteneva pavesentassa āpattiṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā taṃ pavesanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1107_1: nāma na kevalaṃ attūpakkameneva, parūpakkamenāpi hoti. Tatrāpi ca sādiyantasseva
atk-vin01a0:1107_2: āpatti paṭisevanacittasamaṅgissa, na itarassa. Tasmā ye saddhāpabbajitā kulaputtā
atk-vin01a0:1107_3: sammāpaṭipannakā parūpakkamena pavesanepi sati na sādiyanti, tesaṃ rakkhaṇatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1108_0: Tattha paṭipakkhaṃ atthayanti icchantīti paccatthikā, bhikkhū eva paccatthikā bhikkhupaccatthikā;
atk-vin01a0:1108_1: visabhāgānaṃ veribhikkhūnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Manussitthiṃ bhikkhussa santike ānetvāti
atk-vin01a0:1108_2: issāpakatā taṃ bhikkhuṃ nāsetukāmā āmisena vā upalāpetvā mittasanthavavasena vā “idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1108_3: amhākaṃ kiccaṃ karohī”ti vatvā kañci manussitthiṃ rattibhāge tassa bhikkhussa vasanokāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1108_4: ānetvā. Vaccamaggena aṅgajātaṃ abhinisīdentīti taṃ bhikkhuṃ hatthapādasīsādīsu suggahitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1108_5: nipparipphandaṃ gahetvā itthiyā vaccamaggena tassa bhikkhuno aṅgajātaṃ abhinisīdenti;
atk-vin01a0:1109_0: So cetiādīsu so ce bhikkhu vaccamaggabbhantaraṃ attano aṅgajātassa pavesanaṃ sādiyati
atk-vin01a0:1109_1: adhivāseti tasmiṃ khaṇe sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti. Paviṭṭhaṃ sādiyati adhivāseti,
atk-vin01a0:1109_2: paviṭṭhakāle sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti. Ṭhitaṃ sādiyati adhivāseti, ṭhānappattakāle
atk-vin01a0:1109_3: sukkavissaṭṭhisamaye sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti. Uddharaṇaṃ sādiyati adhivāseti, nīharaṇakāle
atk-vin01a0:1109_4: paṭisevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ catūsu ṭhānesu sādiyanto “mama verisamaṇehi idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1109_5: kata”nti vattuṃ na labhati, pārājikāpattimeva āpajjati. Yathā ca imāni cattāri sādiyanto
atk-vin01a0:1109_6: āpajjati; evaṃ purimaṃ ekaṃ asādiyitvā tīṇi sādiyantopi, dve asādiyitvā dve sādiyantopi,
atk-vin01a0:1109_7: tīṇi asādiyitvā ekaṃ sādiyantopi āpajjatiyeva. Sabbaso pana asādiyanto āsīvisamukhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1109_8: viya aṅgārakāsuṃ viya ca paviṭṭhaṃ aṅgajātaṃ maññamāno nāpajjati. Tena vuttaṃ – “pavesanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1109_9: na sādiyati…pe… uddharaṇaṃ na sādiyati, anāpattī”ti. Imañhi evarūpaṃ āraddhavipassakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1109_10: kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhaṃ ekādasahi aggīhi sampajjalitāni ca sabbāyatanāni ukkhittāsike
atk-vin01a0:1109_11: viya ca vadhake pañca kāmaguṇe passantaṃ puggalaṃ rakkhanto bhagavā paccatthikānañcassa
atk-vin01a0:1109_12: manorathavighātaṃ karonto imaṃ “pavesanaṃ na sādiyatī”tiādikaṃ catukkaṃ nīharitvā ṭhapesīti.
atk-vin01a0:1112_0: 59-60. Evaṃ paṭhamacatukkaṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā bhikkhupaccatthikā itthiṃ ānetvā
atk-vin01a0:1112_1: na kevalaṃ vaccamaggeneva abhinisīdenti, atha kho passāvamaggenapi mukhenapi. Itthiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1112_2: ānetvāpi ca keci jāgarantiṃ ānenti, keci suttaṃ, keci mattaṃ, keci ummattaṃ, keci
atk-vin01a0:1112_3: pamattaṃ aññavihitaṃ vikkhittacittanti attho. Keci mataṃ akkhāyitaṃ, soṇasiṅgālādīhi
atk-vin01a0:1112_4: akkhāyitanimittanti attho. Keci mataṃ yebhuyyena akkhāyitaṃ, yebhuyyena akkhāyitā
atk-vin01a0:1112_5: nāma yassā nimitte vaccamagge passāvamagge mukhe vā bahutaro okāso akkhāyito hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1112_6: Keci mataṃ yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ, yebhuyyena khāyitā nāma yassā vaccamaggādike nimitte
atk-vin01a0:1112_7: bahuṃ khāyitaṃ hoti, appaṃ akkhāyitaṃ. Na kevalañca manussitthimeva ānenti, atha
atk-vin01a0:1112_8: kho amanussitthimpi tiracchānagatitthimpi. Na kevalañca vuttappakāraṃ itthimeva,
atk-vin01a0:1112_9: ubhatobyañjanakampi paṇḍakampi purisampi ānenti. Tasmā tesaṃ vasena aññānipi catukkāni
atk-vin01a0:1113_0: Tattha pāḷiyā asammohatthaṃ vuttacatukkāni evaṃ saṅkhyāto veditabbāni – manussitthiyā
atk-vin01a0:1113_1: tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vasena tīṇi suddhikacatukkāni, tīṇi jāgarantīcatukkāni, tīṇi suttacatukkāni,
atk-vin01a0:1113_2: tīṇi mattacatukkāni, tīṇi ummattacatukkāni, tīṇi pamattacatukkāni, tīṇi mataakkhāyitacatukkāni,
atk-vin01a0:1113_3: tīṇi yebhuyyena akkhāyitacatukkāni, tīṇi yebhuyyena khāyitacatukkānīti sattavīsati
atk-vin01a0:1113_4: catukkāni. Tathā amanussitthiyā; tathā tiracchānagatitthiyāti itthivāre ekāsīti catukkāni.
atk-vin01a0:1113_5: Yathā ca itthivāre evaṃ ubhatobyañjanakavāre. Paṇḍakapurisavāresu pana dvinnaṃ maggānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1113_6: vasena catupaṇṇāsa catupaṇṇāsa honti. Evaṃ sabbānipi dvesatāni, sattati ca catukkāni
atk-vin01a0:1114_0: Sabbavāresu panettha “mataṃ yebhuyyena akkhāyitaṃ khāyita”nti etasmiṃ ṭhāne ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1114_1: vinicchayo – tambapaṇṇidīpe kira dve vinayadharā samānācariyakā therā ahesuṃ – upatissatthero
atk-vin01a0:1114_2: ca, phussadevatthero ca. Te mahābhaye uppanne vinayapiṭakaṃ pariharantā rakkhiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:1114_3: Tesu upatissatthero byattataro. Tassāpi dve antevāsikā ahesuṃ – mahāpadumatthero
atk-vin01a0:1114_4: ca mahāsumatthero ca. Tesu mahāsumatthero nakkhattuṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ assosi, mahāpadumatthero
atk-vin01a0:1114_5: tena saddhiṃ navakkhattuṃ, visuñca ekakova navakkhattunti aṭṭhārasakkhattuṃ assosi;
atk-vin01a0:1114_6: ayameva tesu byattataro. Tesu mahāsumatthero navakkhattuṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ sutvā ācariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1114_7: muñcitvā aparagaṅgaṃ agamāsi. Tato mahāpadumatthero āha – “sūro vata, re, esa vinayadharo
atk-vin01a0:1114_8: yo dharamānakaṃyeva ācariyaṃ muñcitvā aññattha vasitabbaṃ maññati. Nanu ācariye dharamāne
atk-vin01a0:1114_9: vinayapiṭakañca aṭṭhakathā ca anekakkhattuṃ gahetvāpi na vissajjetabbaṃ, niccakālaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1115_0: Evaṃ vinayagarukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kāle ekadivasaṃ upatissatthero mahāpadumattherappamukhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1115_1: pañcannaṃ antevāsikasatānaṃ paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpade imaṃ padesaṃ vaṇṇento nisinno
atk-vin01a0:1115_2: hoti. Taṃ antevāsikā pucchiṃsu – “bhante, yebhuyyena akkhāyite pārājikaṃ, yebhuyyena
atk-vin01a0:1115_3: khāyite thullaccayaṃ, upaḍḍhakkhāyite kena bhavitabba”nti? Thero āha – “āvuso, buddhā
atk-vin01a0:1115_4: nāma pārājikaṃ paññapentā na sāvasesaṃ katvā paññapenti, anavasesaṃyeva katvā sabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1115_5: pariyādiyitvā sotaṃ chinditvā pārājikavatthusmiṃ pārājikameva paññapenti. Idañhi
atk-vin01a0:1115_6: sikkhāpadaṃ lokavajjaṃ, na paṇṇattivajjaṃ. Tasmā yadi upaḍḍhakkhāyite pārājikaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-vin01a0:1115_7: paññapeyya sammāsambuddho. Pārājikacchāyā panettha na dissati, thullaccayameva dissatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1116_0: Apica matasarīre pārājikaṃ paññapento bhagavā yebhuyyena akkhāyite ṭhapesi “tato
atk-vin01a0:1116_1: paraṃ pārājikaṃ natthī”ti dassetuṃ. Thullaccayaṃ paññapento yebhuyyena khāyite ṭhapesi
atk-vin01a0:1116_2: “tato paraṃ thullaccayaṃ natthī”ti dassetuntipi veditabbaṃ. Khāyitākhāyitañca nāmetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1116_3: matasarīrasmiṃyeva veditabbaṃ, na jīvamāne. Jīvamāne hi nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇepi chavimaṃse
atk-vin01a0:1116_4: vā nhārumhi vā sati pārājikameva hoti. Yadipi nimittaṃ sabbaso khāyitaṃ chavicammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1116_5: natthi, nimittasaṇṭhānaṃ paññāyati, pavesanaṃ jāyati, pārājikameva. Nimittasaṇṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1116_6: pana anavasesetvā sabbasmiṃ nimitte chinditvā samantato tacchetvā uppāṭite vaṇasaṅkhepavasena
atk-vin01a0:1116_7: thullaccayaṃ. Nimittato patitāya maṃsapesiyā upakkamantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Matasarīre
atk-vin01a0:1116_8: pana yadipi sabbaṃ sarīraṃ khāyitaṃ hoti, yadipi akkhāyitaṃ, tayo pana maggā akkhāyitā,
atk-vin01a0:1116_9: tesu upakkamantassa pārājikaṃ. Yebhuyyena akkhāyite pārājikameva. Upaḍḍhakkhāyite
atk-vin01a0:1117_1: vā methunarāgena tilaphalamattampi aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa thullaccayameva. Avasesasarīre
atk-vin01a0:1117_2: upakacchakādīsu dukkaṭaṃ. Mate allasarīre pārājikakkhette pārājikaṃ, thullaccayakkhette
atk-vin01a0:1117_3: thullaccayaṃ, dukkaṭakkhette dukkaṭaṃ. Yadā pana sarīraṃ uddhumātakaṃ hoti kuthitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1117_5: upagantumpi asakkuṇeyyaṃ, tadā pārājikavatthuñca thullaccayavatthuñca vijahati; tādise
atk-vin01a0:1117_6: sarīre yattha katthaci upakkamato dukkaṭameva. Tiracchānagatānaṃ hatthi-assa-goṇa-gadrabha-oṭṭhamahiṃsādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1117_7: nāsāya thullaccayaṃ. Vatthikose thullaccayameva. Sabbesampi tiracchānagatānaṃ akkhikaṇṇavaṇesu
atk-vin01a0:1117_8: dukkaṭaṃ, avasesasarīrepi dukkaṭameva. Matānaṃ allasarīre pārājikakkhette pārājikaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1118_0: Kuthitakuṇape pana pubbe vuttanayeneva sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ. Kāyasaṃsaggarāgena vā
atk-vin01a0:1118_1: methunarāgena vā jīvamānakapurisassa vatthikosaṃ appavesento nimittena nimittaṃ chupati,
atk-vin01a0:1118_2: dukkaṭaṃ. Methunarāgena itthiyā appavesento nimittena nimittaṃ chupati, thullaccayaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1118_3: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “itthinimittaṃ methunarāgena mukhena chupati thullaccaya”nti
atk-vin01a0:1118_4: vuttaṃ. Cammakkhandhake “chabbaggiyā bhikkhū aciravatiyā nadiyā gāvīnaṃ tarantīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1118_5: visāṇesupi gaṇhanti, kaṇṇesupi gaṇhanti, gīvāyapi gaṇhanti, cheppāyapi gaṇhanti,
atk-vin01a0:1118_6: piṭṭhimpi abhiruhanti, rattacittāpi aṅgajātaṃ chupantī”ti imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā avisesena
atk-vin01a0:1118_7: vuttaṃ – “na ca, bhikkhave, rattacittena aṅgajātaṃ chupitabbaṃ, yo chupeyya, āpatti
atk-vin01a0:1118_8: thullaccayassā”ti. Taṃ sabbampi saṃsanditvā yathā na virujjhati tathā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1118_9: Kathañca na virujjhati? Yaṃ tāva mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “methunarāgena mukhena
atk-vin01a0:1118_10: chupatī”ti. Tatra kira nimittamukhaṃ mukhanti adhippetaṃ. “Methunarāgenā”ti ca vuttattāpi
atk-vin01a0:1118_11: ayameva tattha adhippāyoti veditabbo. Na hi itthinimitte pakatimukhena methunupakkamo
atk-vin01a0:1118_12: hoti. Khandhakepi ye piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhantā methunarāgena aṅgajātena aṅgajātaṃ chupiṃsu,
atk-vin01a0:1118_13: te sandhāya thullaccayaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Itarathā hi dukkaṭaṃ siyā. Keci panāhu
atk-vin01a0:1118_14: “khandhakepi mukheneva chupanaṃ sandhāya oḷārikattā kammassa thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1118_15: Aṭṭhakathāyampi taṃ sandhāyabhāsitaṃ gahetvāva methunarāgena mukhena chupati thullaccayanti
atk-vin01a0:1118_16: vutta”nti. Tasmā suṭṭhu sallakkhetvā ubhosu vinicchayesu yo yuttataro so gahetabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1118_17: Vinayaññū pana purimaṃ pasaṃsanti. Kāyasaṃsaggarāgena pana pakatimukhena vā nimittamukhena
atk-vin01a0:1118_18: vā itthinimittaṃ chupantassa saṅghādiseso. Tiracchānagatitthiyā passāvamaggaṃ nimittamukhena
atk-vin01a0:1121_0: 61-62. Evaṃ bhagavā paṭipannakassa bhikkhuno rakkhaṇatthaṃ sattatidvisatacatukkāni
atk-vin01a0:1121_1: nīharitvā “idāni ye anāgate pāpabhikkhū ‘santhataṃ imaṃ na kiñci upādinnakaṃ upādinnakena
atk-vin01a0:1121_2: phusati, ko ettha doso’ti sañcicca lesaṃ oḍḍessanti, tesaṃ sāsane patiṭṭhā eva na
atk-vin01a0:1121_3: bhavissatī”ti disvā tesu sattatidvisatacatukkesu ekamekaṃ catukkaṃ catūhi santhatādibhedehi
atk-vin01a0:1121_4: bhinditvā dassento bhikkhupaccatthikā manussitthiṃ bhikkhussa santike ānetvā vaccamaggena
atk-vin01a0:1121_5: passāvamaggena mukhena aṅgajātaṃ abhinisīdenti santhatāya asanthatassātiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:1122_0: Tattha santhatāya asanthatassātiādīsu santhatāya itthiyā vaccamaggena passāvamaggena
atk-vin01a0:1122_1: mukhena asanthatassa bhikkhussa aṅgajātaṃ abhinisīdentīti iminā nayena yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1122_2: Tattha santhatā nāma yassā tīsu maggesu yo koci maggo paliveṭhetvā vā anto vā pavesetvā
atk-vin01a0:1122_3: yena kenaci vatthena vā paṇṇena vā vākapaṭṭena vā cammena vā tipusīsādīnaṃ paṭṭena
atk-vin01a0:1122_4: vā paṭicchanno. Santhato nāma yassa aṅgajātaṃ tesaṃyeva vatthādīnaṃ yena kenaci paṭicchannaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1122_5: Tattha upādinnakena vā anupādinnakaṃ ghaṭṭiyatu, anupādinnakena vā upādinnakaṃ, anupādinnakena
atk-vin01a0:1122_6: vā anupādinnakaṃ, upādinnakena vā upādinnakaṃ, sace yattake paviṭṭhe pārājikaṃ hotīti
atk-vin01a0:1122_7: vuttaṃ, tattakaṃ pavisati, sabbattha sādiyantassa pārājikakkhette pārājikaṃ; thullaccayakkhette
atk-vin01a0:1122_8: thullaccayaṃ, dukkaṭakkhette dukkaṭameva hoti. Sace itthinimittaṃ khāṇuṃ katvā santhataṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1122_9: khāṇuṃ ghaṭṭentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Sace purisanimittaṃ khāṇuṃ katvā santhataṃ, khāṇuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1122_10: pavesentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Sace ubhayaṃ khāṇuṃ katvā santhataṃ, khāṇunā khāṇuṃ ghaṭṭentassa
atk-vin01a0:1122_11: dukkaṭaṃ. Sace itthinimitte veḷunaḷapabbādīnaṃ kiñci pakkhittaṃ, tassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1122_12: cepi phusanto tilaphalamattaṃ paveseti, pārājikaṃ. Uparibhāgaṃ cepi ubhosu passesu
atk-vin01a0:1122_13: ekapassaṃ cepi phusanto paveseti, pārājikaṃ. Cattāripi passāni aphusanto pavesetvā
atk-vin01a0:1122_14: tassa talaṃ cepi phusati, pārājikaṃ. Yadi pana passesu vā tale vā aphusanto ākāsagatameva
atk-vin01a0:1122_15: katvā pavesetvā nīharati, dukkaṭaṃ. Bahiddhā khāṇuke phusati dukkaṭameva. Yathā ca
atk-vin01a0:1122_16: itthinimitte vuttaṃ, evaṃ sabbattha lakkhaṇaṃ veditabbanti.
atk-vin01a0:1125_0: 63-64. Evaṃ santhatacatukkabhedaṃ vatvā idāni yasmā na kevalaṃ manussitthiādike bhikkhussa
atk-vin01a0:1125_1: eva santike ānenti. Atha kho bhikkhumpi tāsaṃ santike ānenti, tasmā tappabhedaṃ dassento
atk-vin01a0:1125_2: “bhikkhupaccatthikā bhikkhuṃ manussitthiyā santike”ti ādinā nayena sabbāni tāni catukkāni
atk-vin01a0:1125_3: punapi nīharitvā dassesi. Tesu vinicchayo vuttanayeneva veditabboti.
atk-vin01a0:1128_0: 65. Yasmā pana na bhikkhupaccatthikā eva evaṃ karonti, rājapaccatthikādayopi karonti.
atk-vin01a0:1128_1: Tasmā tampi pabhedaṃ dassento “rājapaccatthikā”tiādimāha. Tattha rājāno eva paccatthikā
atk-vin01a0:1128_2: rājapaccatthikā. Te ca sayaṃ ānentāpi aññehi āṇāpentāpi ānentiyevāti veditabbā. Corā
atk-vin01a0:1128_3: eva paccatthikā corapaccatthikā. Dhuttāti methunupasaṃhitakhiḍḍāpasutā nāgarikakerāṭiyapurisā,
atk-vin01a0:1128_4: itthidhuttasurādhuttādayo vā; dhuttā eva paccatthikā dhuttapaccatthikā. Gandhanti
atk-vin01a0:1128_5: hadayaṃ vuccati, taṃ uppāṭentīti uppalagandhā, uppalagandhā eva paccatthikā uppalagandhapaccatthikā.
atk-vin01a0:1128_6: Ete kira na kasivaṇijjādīhi jīvanti, panthaghātagāmaghātādīni katvā puttadāraṃ posenti.
atk-vin01a0:1128_7: Te kammasiddhiṃ patthayamānā devatānaṃ āyācetvā tāsaṃ balikammatthaṃ manussānaṃ hadayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1128_8: uppāṭenti. Sabbakāle ca manussā dullabhā. Bhikkhū pana araññe viharantā sulabhā honti.
atk-vin01a0:1128_9: Te sīlavantaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā “sīlavato vadho nāma bhāriyo hotī”ti maññamānā tassa
atk-vin01a0:1128_10: sīlavināsanatthaṃ manussitthiādike vā ānenti; taṃ vā tattha nenti. Ayamettha viseso.
atk-vin01a0:1128_11: Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Bhikkhupaccatthikavāre vuttanayeneva ca imesu catūsupi
atk-vin01a0:1128_12: vāresu catukkāni veditabbāni. Pāḷiyaṃ pana saṃkhittena vuttāni.
atk-vin01a0:1131_0: 66. Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “manussitthiyā tayo magge methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassā”tiādi,
atk-vin01a0:1131_1: ettha asammohatthaṃ “maggena magga”ntiādimāha. Tattha maggena magganti itthiyā tīsu
atk-vin01a0:1131_2: maggesu aññatarena maggena attano aṅgajātaṃ paveseti atha vā sambhinnesu dvīsu maggesu
atk-vin01a0:1131_3: passāvamaggena vaccamaggaṃ vaccamaggena vā passāvamaggaṃ paveseti. Maggena amagganti
atk-vin01a0:1131_4: passāvādimaggena pavesetvā tassa sāmantā vaṇena nīharati. Amaggena magganti maggasāmantena
atk-vin01a0:1131_5: vaṇena pavesetvā maggena nīharati. Amaggena amagganti dvīsu sambhinnavaṇesu ekena
atk-vin01a0:1131_6: vaṇena pavesetvā dutiyena nīharati. Imassa suttassa anulomavasena sabbattha vaṇasaṅkhepe
atk-vin01a0:1132_0: Idāni yaṃ parato vakkhati “anāpatti ajānantassa asādiyantassā”ti, tattha asammohatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1132_1: “bhikkhu suttabhikkhumhī”tiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – yo paṭibuddho sādiyati so
atk-vin01a0:1132_2: “suttamhi mayi eso vippaṭipajji, nāhaṃ jānāmī”ti na muccati. Ubho nāsetabbāti cettha
atk-vin01a0:1132_3: dvepi liṅganāsanena nāsetabbā. Tatra dūsakassa paṭiññākaraṇaṃ natthi, dūsito pucchitvā
atk-vin01a0:1132_4: paṭiññāya nāsetabbo. Sace na sādiyati, na nāsetabbo. Esa nayo sāmaṇeravārepi.
atk-vin01a0:1133_0: Evaṃ tattha tattha taṃ taṃ āpattiñca anāpattiñca dassetvā idāni anāpattimeva dassento
atk-vin01a0:1133_1: “anāpatti ajānantassā”tiādimāha. Tattha ajānanto nāma yo mahāniddaṃ okkanto parena
atk-vin01a0:1133_2: kataṃ upakkamampi na jānāti vesāliyaṃ mahāvane divāvihāragato bhikkhu viya. Evarūpassa
atk-vin01a0:1133_3: anāpatti. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “‘nāhaṃ bhagavā jānāmī’ti; ‘anāpatti, bhikkhu, ajānantassā”’ti.
atk-vin01a0:1133_4: Asādiyanto nāma yo jānitvāpi na sādiyati, tattheva sahasā vuṭṭhitabhikkhu viya. Vuttampi
atk-vin01a0:1134_0: Ummattako nāma pittummattako. Duvidhañhi pittaṃ – baddhapittaṃ, abaddhapittañcāti.
atk-vin01a0:1134_1: Tattha abaddhapittaṃ lohitaṃ viya sabbaṅgagataṃ, tamhi kupite sattānaṃ kaṇḍukacchusarīrakampādīni
atk-vin01a0:1134_2: honti. Tāni bhesajjakiriyāya vūpasamanti. Baddhapittaṃ pana pittakosake ṭhitaṃ. Tamhi
atk-vin01a0:1134_3: kupite sattā ummattakā honti vipallatthasaññā hirottappaṃ chaḍḍetvā asāruppācāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1134_4: caranti. Lahukagarukāni sikkhāpadāni maddantāpi na jānanti. Bhesajjakiriyāyapi atekicchā
atk-vin01a0:1135_0: Khittacitto nāma vissaṭṭhacitto yakkhummattako vuccati. Yakkhā kira bheravāni vā
atk-vin01a0:1135_1: ārammaṇāni dassetvā mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā hadayarūpaṃ vā maddantā satte vikkhittacitte
atk-vin01a0:1135_2: vipallatthasaññe karonti. Evarūpassa khittacittassa anāpatti. Tesaṃ pana ubhinnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1135_3: ayaṃ viseso – pittummattako niccameva ummattako hoti, pakatisaññaṃ na labhati. Yakkhummattako
atk-vin01a0:1135_4: antarantarā pakatisaññaṃ paṭilabhatīti. Idha pana pittummattako vā hotu yakkhummattako
atk-vin01a0:1135_5: vā, yo sabbaso muṭṭhassati kiñci na jānāti, aggimpi suvaṇṇampi gūthampi candanampi
atk-vin01a0:1135_6: ekasadisaṃ maddantova vicarati, evarūpassa anāpatti. Antarantarā saññaṃ paṭilabhitvā
atk-vin01a0:1136: Vedanāṭṭo nāma yo adhimattāya dukkhavedanāya āturo kiñci na jānāti, evarūpassa anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:1137: Ādikammiko nāma yo tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kamme ādibhūto. Idha pana sudinnatthero ādikammiko, tassa anāpatti. Avasesānaṃ makkaṭīsamaṇavajjiputtakādīnaṃ āpattiyevāti.
atk-vin01a0:1140: Imasmiṃ pana sikkhāpade kosallatthaṃ idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃveditabbaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:1143_0: Tattha “samuṭṭhāna”nti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena cha sikkhāpadasamuṭṭhānāni. Tāni parivāre
atk-vin01a0:1143_1: āvi bhavissanti. Samāsato pana sikkhāpadaṃ nāma – atthi chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, atthi catusamuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1143_2: atthi tisamuṭṭhānaṃ, atthi kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ, atthi eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ, atthi
atk-vin01a0:1144_0: Tatrāpi kiñci kiriyato samuṭṭhāti, kiñci akiriyato samuṭṭhāti, kiñci kiriyākiriyato
atk-vin01a0:1144_1: samuṭṭhāti, kiñci siyā kiriyato, siyā akiriyato samuṭṭhāti, kiñci siyā kiriyato siyā
atk-vin01a0:1145: Tatrāpi atthi saññāvimokkhaṃ, atthi nosaññāvimokkhaṃ. Tattha yaṃ cittaṅgaṃ labhatiyeva, taṃ saññāvimokkhaṃ; itaraṃ nosaññāvimokkhaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1146_0: Puna atthi sacittakaṃ, atthi acittakaṃ. Yaṃ saheva cittena āpajjati, taṃ sacittakaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1146_1: yaṃ vināpi cittena āpajjati, taṃ acittakaṃ. Taṃ sabbampi lokavajjaṃ paṇṇattivajjanti
atk-vin01a0:1147_0: Kammakusalavedanāvasenāpi cettha atthi sikkhāpadaṃ kāyakammaṃ, atthi vacīkammaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1147_1: Tattha yaṃ kāyadvārikaṃ, taṃ kāyakammaṃ; yaṃ vacīdvārikaṃ, taṃ vacīkammanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1147_2: Atthi pana sikkhāpadaṃ kusalaṃ, atthi akusalaṃ, atthi abyākataṃ. Dvattiṃseva hi āpattisamauṭṭhāpakacittāni
atk-vin01a0:1147_3: – aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalāni, dvādasa akusalāni, dasa kāmāvacarakiriyacittāni, kusalato
atk-vin01a0:1147_4: ca kiriyato ca dve abhiññācittānīti. Tesu yaṃ kusalacittena āpajjati, taṃ kusalaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1147_5: itarehi itaraṃ. Atthi ca sikkhāpadaṃ tivedanaṃ, atthi dvivedanaṃ, atthi ekavedanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1147_6: Tattha yaṃ āpajjanto tīsu vedanāsu aññataravedanāsamaṅgī hutvā āpajjati, taṃ tivedanaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1147_7: yaṃ āpajjanto sukhasamaṅgī vā upekkhāsamaṅgī vā āpajjati, taṃ dvivedanaṃ; yaṃ āpajjanto
atk-vin01a0:1147_8: dukkhavedanāsamaṅgīyeva āpajjati, taṃ ekavedananti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:1150_0: Imaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ viditvā tesu samuṭṭhānādīsu idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samuṭṭhānato ekasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1150_1: Aṅgavasena dukasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kāyacittato samuṭṭhāti. Kiriyasamuṭṭhānañca karontoyeva
atk-vin01a0:1150_2: hi etaṃ āpajjati. Methunapaṭisaṃyuttāya kāmasaññāya abhāvena muccanato saññāvimokkhaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1150_3: “Anāpatti ajānantassa asādiyantassā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Methunacitteneva naṃ āpajjati,
atk-vin01a0:1150_4: na vinā cittenāti sacittakaṃ. Rāgavaseneva āpajjitabbato lokavajjaṃ. Kāyadvāreneva
atk-vin01a0:1150_5: samuṭṭhānato kāyakammaṃ. Cittaṃ panettha aṅgamattaṃ hoti, na tassa vasena kammabhāvo
atk-vin01a0:1150_6: labbhati. Lobhacittena āpajjitabbato akusalacittaṃ. Sukhasamaṅgī vā upekkhāsamaṅgī
atk-vin01a0:1150_7: vā taṃ āpajjatīti dvivedananti veditabbaṃ. Sabbañcetaṃ āpattiyaṃ yujjati. Sikkhāpadasīsena
atk-vin01a0:1150_8: pana sabbaaṭṭhakathāsudesanā ārūḷhā, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1153_0: Makkaṭī vajjiputtā ca…pe… vuḍḍhapabbajito migoti idaṃ kiṃ? Imā vinītavatthūnaṃ bhagavatā
atk-vin01a0:1153_1: sayaṃ vinicchitānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ uddānagāthā nāma. Tāni vatthūni “sukhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1153_2: vinayadharā uggaṇhissantī”ti dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi ṭhapitāni. Vatthugāthā pana
atk-vin01a0:1153_3: dharamāneyeva bhagavati upālittherena ṭhapitā “iminā lakkhaṇena āyatiṃ vinayadharā
atk-vin01a0:1153_4: vinayaṃ vinicchinissantī”ti. Tasmā ettha vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sādhukaṃ sallakkhetvā paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1153_5: vinicchinitabbaṃ. Dutiyādīnañca vinītavatthūsu vuttalakkhaṇena dutiyādīni. Vinītavatthūni
atk-vin01a0:1153_6: hi sippikānaṃ paṭicchannakarūpāni viya vinayadharānaṃ paṭicchannakavatthūni hontīti.
atk-vin01a0:1154_0: 67. Tattha purimāni dve vatthūni anupaññattiyaṃyeva vuttatthāni. Tatiye vatthumhi
atk-vin01a0:1154_1: gihiliṅgenāti gihivesena odātavattho hutvā. Catutthe natthi kiñci vattabbaṃ. Tato
atk-vin01a0:1154_2: paresu sattasu vatthūsu kusacīranti kuse ganthetvā katacīraṃ. Vākacīraṃ nāma tāpasānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1154_3: vakkalaṃ. Phalakacīraṃ nāma phalakasaṇṭhānāni phalakāni sibbitvā katacīraṃ. Kesakambaloti
atk-vin01a0:1154_4: kesehi tante vāyitvā katakambalo. Vālakambaloti camaravālehi vāyitvā katakambalo.
atk-vin01a0:1154_5: Ulūkapakkhikanti ulūkasakuṇassa pakkhehi katanivāsanaṃ. Ajinakkhipanti salomaṃ sakhuraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1154_6: ajinamigacammaṃ. Dvādasame vatthumhi sārattoti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena sāratto; taṃ rāgaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1155_0: 68. Terasame vatthumhi uppalavaṇṇāti sā therī sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhidhītā satasahassakappe
atk-vin01a0:1155_1: abhinīhārasampannā. Tassā pakatiyāpi atidassanīyā nīluppalavaṇṇā kāyacchavi, abbhantare
atk-vin01a0:1155_2: pana kilesasantāpassa abhāvena ativiya virocati. Sā tāyeva vaṇṇapokkharatāya “uppalavaṇṇā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1155_3: nāmaṃ labhi. Paṭibaddhacittoti gihikālato paṭṭhāya rattacitto; so kira tassā ñātidārako
atk-vin01a0:1155_4: hoti. Atha khoti anantaratthe nipāto; mañcake nisinnānantaramevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Divā
atk-vin01a0:1155_5: bāhirato āgantvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nisinnānañhi paṭhamaṃ andhakāraṃ hoti. So yāvassā
atk-vin01a0:1155_6: taṃ andhakāraṃ na nassati, tāvadeva evamakāsīti attho. Dūsesīti padhaṃsesi. Therī
atk-vin01a0:1155_7: pana anavajjā attano samaṇasaññaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā asādiyantī nisīdi asaddhammādhippāyena
atk-vin01a0:1155_9: pūretvā gato. Tassā theriyā dassanapathaṃ vijahantasseva ayaṃ mahāpathavī sinerupabbataṃ
atk-vin01a0:1155_10: dhāretuṃ samatthāpi taṃ pāpapurisaṃ byāmamattakaḷevaraṃ dhāretuṃ asakkontī viya bhijjitvā
atk-vin01a0:1155_11: vivaramadāsi. So taṅkhaṇaññeva avīcijālānaṃ indhanabhāvaṃ agamāsi. Bhagavā taṃ sutvā
atk-vin01a0:1155_12: “anāpatti, bhikkhave, asādiyantiyā”ti vatvā theriṃ sandhāya dhammapade imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-vin01a0:1157: Yo na limpati kāmesu, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti. ;
atk-vin01a0:1158_0: 69. Cuddasame vatthumhi itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtanti rattibhāge niddaṃ okkantassa purisasaṇṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1158_1: massudāṭhikādi sabbaṃ antarahitaṃ itthisaṇṭhānaṃ uppannaṃ. Tameva upajjhaṃ tameva
atk-vin01a0:1158_2: upasampadanti pubbe gahitaupajjhāyameva pubbe kataupasampadameva anujānāmi. Puna
atk-vin01a0:1158_3: upajjhā na gahetabbā; upasampadā na kātabbāti attho. Tāniyeva vassānīti bhikkhuupasampadato
atk-vin01a0:1158_4: pabhuti yāva vassagaṇanā, taṃyeva vassagaṇanaṃ anujānāmi. Na ito paṭṭhāya vassagaṇanā
atk-vin01a0:1158_5: kātabbāti attho. Bhikkhunīhi saṅgamitunti bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṅgamituṃ saṅgantuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1158_6: samaṅgī bhavituṃ anujānāmīti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – appatirūpaṃ dānissā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1158_7: majjhe vasituṃ, bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ vasatūti. Yā āpattiyo
atk-vin01a0:1158_8: bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇāti yā desanāgāminiyo vā vuṭṭhānagāminiyo vā āpattiyo
atk-vin01a0:1158_9: bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ sādhāraṇā. Tā āpattiyo bhikkhunīnaṃ santike vuṭṭhātunti
atk-vin01a0:1158_10: tā sabbāpi bhikkhunīhi kātabbaṃ vinayakammaṃ katvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike vuṭṭhātuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1158_11: anujānāmīti attho. Tāhi āpattīhi anāpattīti yā pana bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇā
atk-vin01a0:1158_12: sukkavissaṭṭhi-ādikā āpattiyo, tāhi anāpatti. Liṅgaparivattanena tā āpattiyo vuṭṭhitāva
atk-vin01a0:1158_13: honti. Puna pakatiliṅge uppannepi tāhi āpattīhi tassa anāpattiyevāti ayaṃ tāvettha pāḷivinicchayo.
atk-vin01a0:1159_0: Ayaṃ pana pāḷimutto okkantikavinicchayo – imesu tāva dvīsu liṅgesu purisaliṅgaṃ uttamaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1159_1: itthiliṅgaṃ hīnaṃ; tasmā purisaliṅgaṃ balavaakusalena antaradhāyati. Itthiliṅgaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1159_2: dubbalakusalena patiṭṭhāti. Itthiliṅgaṃ pana antaradhāyantaṃ dubbalaakusalena antaradhāyati.
atk-vin01a0:1159_3: Purisaliṅgaṃ balavakusalena patiṭṭhāti. Evaṃ ubhayampi akusalena antaradhāyati, kusalena paṭilabbhati.
atk-vin01a0:1160_0: Tattha sace dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekato sajjhāyaṃ vā dhammasākacchaṃ vā katvā ekāgāre
atk-vin01a0:1160_1: nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkantānaṃ ekassa itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhavati, ubhinnampi sahaseyyāpatti
atk-vin01a0:1160_2: hoti. So ce paṭibujjhitvā attano taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā dukkhī dummano rattibhāgeyeva
atk-vin01a0:1160_3: itarassa āroceyya, tena samassāsetabbo – “hotu, mā cintayittha. Vaṭṭasseveso doso.
atk-vin01a0:1160_4: Sammāsambuddhena dvāraṃ dinnaṃ, bhikkhu vā hotu bhikkhunī vā, anāvaṭo dhammo avārito
atk-vin01a0:1160_5: saggamaggo”ti. Samassāsetvā ca evaṃ vattabbaṃ – “tumhehi bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1160_6: vaṭṭati. Atthi vo kāci sandiṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo”ti. Sacassā honti tādisā bhikkhuniyo
atk-vin01a0:1160_7: atthīti, no ce honti natthīti vatvā so bhikkhu vattabbo – “mama saṅgahaṃ karotha;
atk-vin01a0:1160_8: idāni maṃ paṭhamaṃ bhikkhunupassayaṃ nethā”ti. Tena bhikkhunā taṃ gahetvā tassā vā
atk-vin01a0:1160_9: sandiṭṭhānaṃ attano vā sandiṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ santikaṃ gantabbaṃ. Gacchantena
atk-vin01a0:1160_10: ca na ekakena gantabbaṃ. Catūhi pañcahi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ jotikañca kattaradaṇḍañca
atk-vin01a0:1160_11: gahetvā saṃvidahanaṃ parimocetvā “mayaṃ asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gacchāmā”ti gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1160_12: Sace bahigāme dūre vihāro hoti, antarāmagge gāmantara-nadīpāra-rattivippavāsa-gaṇaohīyanāpattīhi
atk-vin01a0:1160_13: anāpatti. Bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā tā bhikkhuniyo vattabbā – “asukaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1160_14: jānāthā”ti? “Āma, ayyā”ti. “Tassa itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ, saṅgahaṃ dānissa karothā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1160_15: Tā ce “sādhu, ayyā, idāni mayampi sajjhāyissāma, dhammaṃ sossāma, gacchatha tumhe”ti
atk-vin01a0:1160_16: vatvā saṅgahaṃ karonti, ārādhikā ca honti saṅgāhikā lajjiniyo, tā kopetvā aññattha
atk-vin01a0:1160_18: muccati. Sace pana lajjiniyo honti, na saṅgāhikāyo; aññattha gantuṃ labbhati. Sacepi
atk-vin01a0:1160_19: alajjiniyo honti, saṅgahaṃ pana karonti; tāpi pariccajitvā aññattha gantuṃ labbhati.
atk-vin01a0:1160_20: Sace lajjiniyo ca saṅgāhikā ca, ñātikā na honti, āsannagāme pana aññā ñātikāyo honti
atk-vin01a0:1160_21: paṭijagganikā, tāsampi santikaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Gantvā sace bhikkhubhāvepi
atk-vin01a0:1160_22: nissayapaṭipanno, patirūpāya bhikkhuniyā santike nissayo gahetabbo. Mātikā vā vinayo
atk-vin01a0:1160_23: vā uggahito suggahito, puna uggaṇhanakāraṇaṃ natthi. Sace bhikkhubhāve parisāvacaro,
atk-vin01a0:1160_24: tassa santikeyeva upasampannā sūpasampannā. Aññassa santike nissayo gahetabbo. Pubbe
atk-vin01a0:1160_25: taṃ nissāya vasantehipi aññassa santikeyeva nissayo gahetabbo. Paripuṇṇavassasāmaṇerenāpi
atk-vin01a0:1161_0: Yaṃ panassa bhikkhubhāve adhiṭṭhitaṃ ticīvarañca patto ca, taṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati,
atk-vin01a0:1161_1: puna adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Saṅkaccikā ca udakasāṭikā ca gahetabbā. Yaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:1161_2: atirekapatto vā vinayakammaṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti, taṃ sabbampi vinayakammaṃ vijahati,
atk-vin01a0:1161_3: puna kātabbaṃ. Paṭiggahitatelamadhuphāṇitādīnipi paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahanti. Sace paṭiggahaṇato
atk-vin01a0:1161_4: sattame divase liṅgaṃ parivattati, puna paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana bhikkhukāle
atk-vin01a0:1161_5: aññassa bhikkhuno santakaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ, taṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati. Yaṃ ubhinnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1161_6: sādhāraṇaṃ avibhajitvā ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ pakatatto rakkhati. Yaṃ pana vibhattaṃ etasseva
atk-vin01a0:1161_7: santakaṃ, taṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati. Vuttampi cetaṃ parivāre –
atk-vin01a0:1167_0: Idañhi liṅgaparivattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paṭiggahaṇaṃ nāma liṅgaparivattanena, kālaṃkiriyāya,
atk-vin01a0:1167_2: acchinditvā gahaṇena ca vijahati. Tasmā sacepi harītakakhaṇḍampi paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitamatthi,
atk-vin01a0:1167_3: sabbamassa paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati. Bhikkhuvihāre pana yaṃkiñcissā santakaṃ paṭiggahetvā
atk-vin01a0:1167_4: vā appaṭiggahetvā vā ṭhapitaṃ, sabbassa sāva issarā, āharāpetvā gahetabbaṃ. Yaṃ panettha
atk-vin01a0:1167_5: thāvaraṃ tassā santakaṃ senāsanaṃ vā uparopakā vā, te yassicchati tassa dātabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1167_6: Terasasu sammutīsu yā bhikkhukāle laddhā sammuti, sabbā sā paṭippassambhati. Purimikāya
atk-vin01a0:1167_7: senāsanaggāho paṭippassambhati. Sace pacchimikāya senāsane gahite liṅgaṃ parivattati,
atk-vin01a0:1167_8: bhikkhunisaṅgho cassā uppannaṃ lābhaṃ dātukāmo hoti, apaloketvā dātabbo. Sace bhikkhunīhi
atk-vin01a0:1167_9: sādhāraṇāya paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivasantassa liṅgaṃ parivattati, pakkhamānattameva
atk-vin01a0:1167_10: dātabbaṃ. Sace mānattaṃ carantassa parivattati, puna pakkhamānattameva dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1167_11: Sace ciṇṇamānattassa parivattati, bhikkhunīhi abbhānakammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sace akusalavipāke
atk-vin01a0:1167_12: parikkhīṇe pakkhamānattakāle punadeva liṅgaṃ parivattati, chārattaṃ mānattameva dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1167_13: Sace ciṇṇe pakkhamānatte parivattati, bhikkhūhi abbhānakammaṃ kātabbanti.
atk-vin01a0:1168_0: Anantare bhikkhuniyā liṅgaparivattanavatthumhi idha vuttanayeneva sabbo vinicchayo
atk-vin01a0:1168_1: veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – sacepi bhikkhunikāle āpannā sañcarittāpatti paṭicchannā
atk-vin01a0:1168_2: hoti, parivāsadānaṃ natthi, chārattaṃ mānattameva dātabbaṃ. Sace pakkhamānattaṃ carantiyā
atk-vin01a0:1168_3: liṅgaṃ parivattati, na tenattho, chārattaṃ mānattameva dātabbaṃ. Sace ciṇṇamānattāya
atk-vin01a0:1168_4: parivattati, puna mānattaṃ adatvā bhikkhūhi abbhetabbo. Atha bhikkhūhi mānatte adinne
atk-vin01a0:1168_5: puna liṅgaṃ parivattati, bhikkhunīhi pakkhamānattameva dātabbaṃ. Atha chārattaṃ mānattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1168_6: carantassa puna parivattati, pakkhamānattameva dātabbaṃ. Ciṇṇamānattassa pana liṅgaparivatte
atk-vin01a0:1168_7: jāte bhikkhunīhi abbhānakammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Puna parivatte ca liṅge bhikkhunibhāve ṭhitāyapi
atk-vin01a0:1168_8: yā āpattiyo pubbe paṭippassaddhā, tā suppaṭippassaddhā evāti.
atk-vin01a0:1169: 70. Ito parāni “mātuyā methunaṃ dhamma”ntiādīni cattāri vatthūni uttānatthāniyeva.
atk-vin01a0:1170: 71. Mudupiṭṭhikavatthumhi so kira bhikkhu naṭapubbako. Tassa sippakosallatthaṃ parikammakatā piṭṭhi mudukā ahosi. Tasmā evaṃ kātuṃ asakkhi.
atk-vin01a0:1171: Lambīvatthumhi tassa bhikkhussa aṅgajātaṃ dīghaṃ hoti lambati, tasmā lambīti vutto.
atk-vin01a0:1172: Ito parāni dve vaṇavatthūni uttānāneva. Lepacittavatthumhi lepacittaṃ nāma cittakammarūpaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1173_0: Dārudhītalikavatthumhi dārudhītalikā nāma kaṭṭharūpaṃ. Yathā ca imesu dvīsu evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1173_1: aññesupi dantarūpa-potthakarūpa-loharūpādīsu anupādinnakesu itthirūpesu nimitte methunarāgena
atk-vin01a0:1173_2: upakkamantassa asuci muccatu vā mā vā, dukkaṭameva. Kāyasaṃsaggarāgena upakkamantassāpi
atk-vin01a0:1173_3: tatheva dukkaṭaṃ. Mocanarāgena pana upakkamantassa mutte saṅghādiseso, amutte thullaccayanti.
atk-vin01a0:1174_0: 72. Sundaravatthumhi ayaṃ sundaro nāma rājagahe kuladārako saddhāya pabbajito; attabhāvassa
atk-vin01a0:1174_1: abhirūpatāya “sundaro”ti nāmaṃ labhi. Taṃ rathikāya gacchantaṃ disvā samuppannachandarāgā
atk-vin01a0:1174_2: sā itthī imaṃ vippakāraṃ akāsi. Thero pana anāgāmī. Tasmā so na sādiyi. Aññesaṃ pana avisayo eso.
atk-vin01a0:1175: Ito paresu catūsu vatthūsu te bhikkhū jaḷā dummedhā mātugāmassa vacanaṃ gahetvā tathā katvā pacchā kukkuccāyiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:1176_0: 73. Akkhāyitādīni tīṇi vatthūni uttānatthāneva. Dvīsu chinnasīsavatthūsu ayaṃ vinicchayo
atk-vin01a0:1176_1: – vaṭṭakate mukhe vivaṭe aṅgajātaṃ pavesento sace heṭṭhā vā upari vā ubhayapassehi
atk-vin01a0:1176_2: vā chupantaṃ paveseti, pārājikaṃ. Catūhipi passehi achupantaṃ pavesetvā abbhantare
atk-vin01a0:1176_3: tālukaṃ chupati, pārājikameva. Cattāri passāni tālukañca achupanto ākāsagatameva
atk-vin01a0:1176_4: katvā paveseti ca nīharati ca, dukkaṭaṃ. Yadi pana dantā suphusitā, antomukhe okāso
atk-vin01a0:1176_5: natthi, dantā ca bahi oṭṭhamaṃsena paṭicchannā, tattha vātena asamphuṭṭhaṃ allokāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1176_6: tilaphalamattampi pavesentassa pārājikameva. Uppāṭite pana oṭṭhamaṃse dantesuyeva
atk-vin01a0:1176_7: upakkamantassa thullaccayaṃ. Yopi danto bahi nikkhamitvā tiṭṭhati, na sakkā oṭṭhehi
atk-vin01a0:1176_8: pidahituṃ. Tattha upakkamantepi bahi nikkhantajivhāya upakkamantepi thullaccayameva.
atk-vin01a0:1176_9: Jīvamānakasarīrepi bahi nikkhantajivhāya thullaccayameva. Yadi pana bahijivhāya paliveṭhetvā
atk-vin01a0:1176_10: antomukhaṃ paveseti, pārājikameva. Uparigīvāya chinnasīsassapi adhobhāgena aṅgajātaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1177_0: Aṭṭhikavatthumhi susānaṃ gacchantassāpi dukkaṭaṃ. Aṭṭhikāni saṅkaḍḍhantassāpi, nimitte
atk-vin01a0:1177_1: methunarāgena upakkamantassāpi, kāyasaṃsaggarāgena upakkamantassāpi, muccatu vā mā
atk-vin01a0:1177_2: vā, dukkaṭameva. Mocanarāgena pana upakkamantassa muccante saṅghādiseso, amuccante thullaccayameva.
atk-vin01a0:1178: Nāgīvatthumhi nāgamāṇavikā vā hotu kinnarīādīnaṃ vā aññatarā, sabbattha pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1180_0: Petīvatthumhi nijjhāmataṇhikādipetiyo allīyitumpi na sakkā. Vimānapetiyo pana atthi;
atk-vin01a0:1180_1: yāsaṃ kāḷapakkhe akusalaṃ vipaccati, juṇhapakkhe devatā viya sampattiṃ anubhonti.
atk-vin01a0:1180_2: Evarūpāya petiyā vā yakkhiyā vā sace dassana-gahaṇa-āmasana-phusana-ghaṭṭanāni paññāyanti,
atk-vin01a0:1180_3: pārājikaṃ. Athāpi dassanaṃ natthi, itarāni paññāyanti, pārājikameva. Atha dassanagahaṇāni
atk-vin01a0:1180_4: na paññāyanti, āmasanaphusanaghaṭṭanehi paññāyamānehi taṃ puggalaṃ visaññaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:1180_5: attano manorathaṃ pūretvā gacchati, ayaṃ avisayo nāma. Tasmā ettha avisayattā anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:1181: Upahatindriyavatthumhi upahatindriyoti upahatakāyappasādo khāṇukaṇṭakamiva sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā na vedayati. Avedayantassāpi sevanacittavasena āpatti.
atk-vin01a0:1182_0: Chupitamattavatthusmiṃ yo “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevissāmī”ti mātugāmaṃ gaṇhitvā methune
atk-vin01a0:1182_1: virajjitvā vippaṭisārī hoti, dukkaṭamevassa hoti. Methunadhammassa hi pubbapayogā
