atk-vin01a0:1182_2: hatthaggāhādayo yāva sīsaṃ na pāpuṇāti, tāva dukkaṭe tiṭṭhanti. Sīse patte pārājikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1182_3: hoti. Paṭhamapārājikassa hi dukkaṭameva sāmantaṃ. Itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ thullaccayaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1182_4: pana bhikkhu methunadhamme virajjitvā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyīti veditabbo. Tenāha bhagavā
atk-vin01a0:1183_0: 74. Bhaddiyavatthusmiṃ bhaddiyaṃ nāma taṃ nagaraṃ. Jātiyāvanaṃ nāma jātipupphagumbānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1183_1: ussannatāya evaṃ laddhanāmaṃ; taṃ tassa nagarassa upacāre vanaṃ hoti. So tattha nipanno
atk-vin01a0:1183_2: tena vātupatthambhena mahāniddaṃ okkami. Ekarasaṃ bhavaṅgameva vattati. Kilinnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1184: 75. Ito parāni sādiyanapaṭisaṃyuttāni cattāri vatthūni, ajānanavatthu cāti pañca uttānatthāneva.
atk-vin01a0:1185_0: 76. Dvīsu asādiyanavatthūsu sahasā vuṭṭhāsīti āsīvisena daṭṭho viya agginā daḍḍho
atk-vin01a0:1185_1: viya ca turitaṃ vuṭṭhāsi. Akkamitvā pavattesīti appamatto bhikkhu āraddhavipassako
atk-vin01a0:1185_2: upaṭṭhitassati khippaṃ vuṭṭhahantova akkamitvā bhūmiyaṃ vaṭṭento parivaṭṭento viheṭhento
atk-vin01a0:1185_3: pātesi. Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi evarūpesu ṭhānesu cittaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ. Ayañca tesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1186_0: 77. Dvāraṃ vivaritvā nipannavatthumhi divā paṭisallīyantenāti divā nipajjantena.
atk-vin01a0:1186_1: Dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā paṭisallīyitunti dvāraṃ pidahitvā nipajjituṃ. Ettha ca kiñcāpi
atk-vin01a0:1186_2: pāḷiyaṃ “ayaṃ nāma āpattī”ti na vuttā. Vivaritvā nipannadosena pana uppanne vatthusmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1186_3: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, divā paṭisallīyantena dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā paṭisallīyitu”nti
atk-vin01a0:1186_4: vuttattā asaṃvaritvā paṭisallīyantassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhagavato hi adhippāyaṃ ñatvā
atk-vin01a0:1186_5: upālittherādīhi aṭṭhakathā ṭhapitā. “Atthāpatti divā āpajjati no ratti”nti imināpi cetaṃ siddhaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1187_0: Kīdisaṃ pana dvāraṃ saṃvaritabbaṃ, kīdisaṃ na saṃvaritabbaṃ? Rukkhapadaraveḷupadarakilañjapaṇṇādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1187_1: yena kenaci kavāṭaṃ katvā heṭṭhā udukkhale upari uttarapāsake ca pavesetvā kataṃ
atk-vin01a0:1187_2: parivattakadvārameva saṃvaritabbaṃ. Aññaṃ gorūpānaṃ vajesu viya rukkhasūcikaṇṭakadvāraṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1187_3: gāmathakanakaṃ cakkalakayuttadvāraṃ, phalakesu vā kiṭikāsu vā dve tīṇi cakkalakāni
atk-vin01a0:1187_4: yojetvā kataṃ saṃsaraṇakiṭikadvāraṃ, āpaṇesu viya kataṃ ugghāṭanakiṭikadvāraṃ, dvīsu
atk-vin01a0:1187_5: tīsu ṭhānesu veṇusalākā gopphetvā paṇṇakuṭīsu kataṃ salākahatthakadvāraṃ, dussasāṇidvāranti
atk-vin01a0:1187_6: evarūpaṃ dvāraṃ na saṃvaritabbaṃ. Pattahatthassa kavāṭappaṇāmane pana ekaṃ dussasāṇidvārameva
atk-vin01a0:1187_7: anāpattikaraṃ, avasesāni paṇāmentassa āpatti. Divā paṭisallīyantassa pana parivattakadvārameva
atk-vin01a0:1187_8: āpattikaraṃ, sesāni saṃvaritvā vā asaṃvaritvā vā nipannassa āpatti natthi. Saṃvaritvā
atk-vin01a0:1188_0: Parivattakadvāraṃ pana kittakena saṃvutaṃ hoti? Sūcighaṭikādīsu dinnāsu saṃvutameva
atk-vin01a0:1188_1: hoti. Apica kho sūcimattepi dinne vaṭṭati. Ghaṭikamattepi dinne vaṭṭati. Dvārabāhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1188_2: phusitvā pihitamattepi vaṭṭati. Īsakaṃ aphusitepi vaṭṭati. Sabbantimena vidhinā yāvatā
atk-vin01a0:1188_3: sīsaṃ nappavisati tāvatā aphusitepi vaṭṭatīti. Sace bahūnaṃ vaḷañjanaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a0:1188_4: bhikkhuṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā “dvāraṃ, āvuso, jaggāhī”ti vatvāpi nipajjituṃ vaṭṭati. Atha
atk-vin01a0:1188_5: bhikkhū cīvarakammaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci karontā nisinnā honti, “ete dvāraṃ jaggissantī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1188_6: ābhogaṃ katvāpi nipajjituṃ vaṭṭati. Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “upāsakampi āpucchitvā
atk-vin01a0:1188_7: vā, ‘esa jaggissatī’ti ābhogaṃ katvā vā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭati. Kevalaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:1188_8: mātugāmaṃ vā āpucchituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Atha dvārassa udukkhalaṃ vā uttarapāsako
atk-vin01a0:1188_9: vā bhinno vā hoti aṭṭhapito vā, saṃvarituṃ na sakkoti, navakammatthaṃ vā pana iṭṭhakapuñjo
atk-vin01a0:1188_10: vā mattikādīnaṃ vā rāsi antodvāre kato hoti, aṭṭaṃ vā bandhanti, yathā saṃvarituṃ
atk-vin01a0:1188_11: na sakkoti; evarūpe antarāye sati asaṃvaritvāpi nipajjituṃ vaṭṭati. Yadi pana kavāṭaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1188_12: natthi, laddhakappameva. Upari sayantena nisseṇiṃ āropetvā nipajjitabbaṃ. Sace nisseṇimatthake
atk-vin01a0:1188_13: thakanakaṃ hoti, thaketvāpi nipajjitabbaṃ. Gabbhe nipajjantena gabbhadvāraṃ vā pamukhadvāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1188_14: vā yaṃkiñci saṃvaritvā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace ekakuṭṭake gehe dvīsu passesu dvārāni
atk-vin01a0:1189_0: Tibhūmakepi pāsāde dvāraṃ jaggitabbameva. Sace bhikkhācārā paṭikkamma lohapāsādasadisaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1189_1: pāsādaṃ bahū bhikkhū divāvihāratthaṃ pavisanti, saṅghattherena dvārapālassa “dvāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1189_2: jaggāhī”ti vatvā vā “dvārajagganaṃ etassa bhāro”ti ābhogaṃ katvā vā pavisitvā nipajjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1189_3: Yāva saṅghanavakena evameva kattabbaṃ. Pure pavisantānaṃ “dvārajagganaṃ nāma pacchimānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1189_4: bhāro”ti evaṃ ābhogaṃ kātumpi vaṭṭati. Anāpucchā vā ābhogaṃ vā akatvā antogabbhe
atk-vin01a0:1189_5: vā asaṃvutadvāre bahi vā nipajjantānaṃ āpatti. Gabbhe vā bahi vā nipajjanakālepi
atk-vin01a0:1189_6: “dvārajagganaṃ nāma mahādvāre dvārapālassa bhāro”ti ābhogaṃ katvā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:1190_0: Ayañhettha saṅkhepo – idaṃ divāpaṭisallīyanaṃ yena kenaci parikkhitte sadvārabandhe
atk-vin01a0:1190_1: ṭhāne kathitaṃ. Tasmā abbhokāse vā rukkhamūle vā maṇḍape vā yattha katthaci sadvārabandhe
atk-vin01a0:1190_2: nipajjantena dvāraṃ saṃvaritvāva nipajjitabbaṃ. Sace mahāpariveṇaṃ hoti, mahābodhiyaṅgaṇalohapāsādaṅgaṇasadisaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1190_3: bahūnaṃ osaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha dvāraṃ saṃvutampi saṃvutaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati, dvāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1190_4: alabhantā pākāraṃ āruhitvāpi vicaranti, tattha saṃvaraṇakiccaṃ natthi. Rattiṃ dvāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1190_5: vivaritvā nipanno aruṇe uggate uṭṭhahati, anāpatti. Sace pabujjhitvā puna supati,
atk-vin01a0:1190_6: āpatti. Yo pana “aruṇe uggate vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti paricchinditvāva dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā
atk-vin01a0:1190_7: rattiṃ nipajjati, yathāparicchedameva ca na vuṭṭhāti, tassa āpattiyeva. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1190_8: pana “evaṃ nipajjanto anādariyadukkaṭāpi na muccatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1191_0: Yo pana bahudeva rattiṃ jaggitvā addhānaṃ vā gantvā divā kilantarūpo mañce nisinno
atk-vin01a0:1191_1: pāde bhūmito amocetvāva niddāvasena nipajjati, tassa anāpatti. Sace okkantaniddo
atk-vin01a0:1191_2: ajānantopi pāde mañcakaṃ āropeti, āpattiyeva. Nisīditvā apassāya supantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:1191_3: Yopi ca “niddaṃ vinodessāmī”ti caṅkamanto patitvā sahasāva vuṭṭhāti, tassāpi anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:1191_4: Yo pana patitvā tattheva sayati, na vuṭṭhāti, tassa āpatti.
atk-vin01a0:1192_0: Ko muccati, ko na muccatīti? Mahāpaccariyaṃ tāva “ekabhaṅgena nipannakoyeva muccati.
atk-vin01a0:1192_1: Pāde pana bhūmito mocetvā nipanno yakkhagahitakopi visaññībhūtopi na muccatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1192_2: Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “bandhitvā nipajjāpitova muccatī”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1192_3: pana “yo caṅkamanto muccitvā patito tattheva supati, tassāpi avisayattā āpatti na
atk-vin01a0:1192_4: dissati. Ācariyā pana evaṃ na kathayanti. Tasmā āpattiyevāti mahāpadumattherena vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1192_5: Dve pana janā āpattito muccantiyeva, yo ca yakkhagahitako, yo ca bandhitvā nipajjāpito”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1193_0: 78. Bhārukacchakavatthumhi anāpatti supinantenāti yasmā supinante avisayattā evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1193_1: hoti, tasmā upālitthero bhagavatā avinicchitapubbampi imaṃ vatthuṃ nayaggāhena vinicchini.
atk-vin01a0:1193_2: Bhagavāpi ca sutvā “sukathitaṃ, bhikkhave, upālinā; apade padaṃ karonto viya, ākāse
atk-vin01a0:1193_3: padaṃ dassento viya upāli imaṃ pañhaṃ kathesī”ti vatvā theraṃ etadagge ṭhapesi –
atk-vin01a0:1193_4: “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1194: 80. Bhikkhunīsampayojanādīsu te licchavikumārakā khiḍḍāpasutā attano anācārena evaṃ akaṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya ca licchavīnaṃ vināso eva udapādi.
atk-vin01a0:1195_0: 82. Vuḍḍhapabbajitavatthumhi dassanaṃ agamāsīti anukampāya “taṃ dakkhissāmī”ti gehaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1195_1: agamāsi. Athassa sā attano ca dārakānañca nānappakārehi anāthabhāvaṃ saṃvaṇṇesi.
atk-vin01a0:1195_2: Anapekkhañca naṃ ñatvā kupitā “ehi vibbhamāhī”ti balakkārena aggahesi. So attānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1195_3: mocetuṃ paṭikkamanto jarādubbalatāya uttāno paripati. Tato sā attano manaṃ akāsi.
atk-vin01a0:1195_4: So pana bhikkhu anāgāmī samucchinnakāmarāgo tasmā na sādiyīti.
atk-vin01a0:1205: Sampassataṃ na dissati, kiñci apāsādikaṃ yato ettha;
atk-vin01a0:1213: Yasmā tasmā suviññeyyaṃ, yaṃ pubbe ca pakāsitaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1214: Taṃ sabbaṃ vajjayitvāna, hoti saṃvaṇṇanā ayaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1216_0: 84. Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbateti tattha rājagaheti
atk-vin01a0:1216_1: evaṃnāmake nagare, tañhi mandhātu-mahāgovindādīhi pariggahitattā “rājagaha”nti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:1216_2: Aññepettha pakāre vaṇṇayanti. Kiṃ tehi! Nāmametaṃ tassa nagarassa. Taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle
atk-vin01a0:1216_3: ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hoti. Sesakāle suññaṃ hoti yakkhapariggahitaṃ, tesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1216_4: vasantavanaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ gocaragāmaṃ dassetvā nivāsanaṭṭhānamāha – gijjhakūṭe
atk-vin01a0:1216_5: pabbateti. So ca gijjhā tassa kūṭesu vasiṃsu, gijjhasadisāni vā tassa kūṭāni; tasmā
atk-vin01a0:1217_0: Sambahulāti vinayapariyāyena tayo janā sambahulāti vuccanti, tato paraṃ saṅgho. Suttantapariyāyena
atk-vin01a0:1217_1: tayo tayo eva, tato paṭṭhāya sambahulā. Idha pana te suttantapariyāyena sambahulāti
atk-vin01a0:1217_2: veditabbā. Sandiṭṭhāti nātivissāsikā na daḷhamittā; tattha tattha saṅgamma diṭṭhattā
atk-vin01a0:1217_3: hi te sandiṭṭhāti vuccanti. Sambhattāti ativissāsikā daḷhamittā; te hi suṭṭhu bhattā
atk-vin01a0:1217_4: bhajamānā ekasambhogaparibhogāti katvā “sambhattā”ti vuccanti. Isigilipasseti isigili
atk-vin01a0:1217_5: nāma pabbato, tassa passe. Pubbe kira pañcasatamattā paccekabuddhā kāsikosalādīsu
atk-vin01a0:1217_6: janapadesu piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ tasmiṃ pabbate sannipatitvā samāpattiyā
atk-vin01a0:1217_7: vītināmenti. Manussā te pavisanteva passanti na nikkhamante. Tato āhaṃsu – “ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1217_8: pabbato ime isayo gilatī”ti. Tadupādāya tassa “isigili”tveva samaññā udapādi, tassa passe pabbatapāde.
atk-vin01a0:1218_0: Tiṇakuṭiyo karitvāti tiṇacchadanā sadvārabandhā kuṭiyo katvā. Vassaṃ upagacchantena
atk-vin01a0:1218_1: hi nālakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannenāpi pañcannaṃ chadanānaṃ aññatarena channeyeva sadvārabandhe
atk-vin01a0:1218_2: senāsane upagantabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1218_3: Yo upagaccheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti. Tasmā vassakāle sace senāsanaṃ labhati, iccetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1218_4: kusalaṃ; no ce labhati, hatthakammaṃ pariyesitvāpi kātabbaṃ. Hatthakammaṃ alabhantena
atk-vin01a0:1218_5: sāmampi kātabbaṃ. Na tveva asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabbaṃ. Ayamanudhammatā. Tasmā
atk-vin01a0:1218_6: te bhikkhū tiṇakuṭiyo karitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīni paricchinditvā katikavattāni
atk-vin01a0:1218_7: ca khandhakavattāni ca adhiṭṭhāya tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhamānā vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:1219_0: Āyasmāpi dhaniyoti na kevalaṃ te therāva imassa sikkhāpadassa ādikammiko āyasmā dhaniyopi.
atk-vin01a0:1219_1: Kumbhakāraputtoti kumbhakārassa putto; tassa hi nāmaṃ dhaniyo, pitā kumbhakāro, tena
atk-vin01a0:1219_2: vuttaṃ – “dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto”ti. Vassaṃ upagacchīti tehi therehi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāneyeva
atk-vin01a0:1219_3: tiṇakuṭikaṃ karitvā vassaṃ upagacchi. Vassaṃvutthāti purimikāya upagatā mahāpavāraṇāya
atk-vin01a0:1219_4: pavāritā pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya “vutthavassā”ti vuccanti. Evaṃ vassaṃvutthā hutvā.
atk-vin01a0:1220_0: Tiṇakuṭiyo bhinditvāti na daṇḍamuggarādīhi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ katvā, vattasīsena pana
atk-vin01a0:1220_1: tiṇañca dāruvalli-ādīni ca oropetvāti attho. Yena hi vihārapaccante kuṭi katā hoti,
atk-vin01a0:1220_2: tena sace āvāsikā bhikkhū honti, te āpucchitabbā. “Sace imaṃ kuṭiṃ paṭijaggitvā koci
atk-vin01a0:1220_3: vasituṃ ussahati, tassa dethā”ti vatvā pakkamitabbaṃ. Yena araññe vā katā hoti, paṭijagganakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1220_4: vā na labhati, tena “aññesampi paribhogaṃ bhavissatī”ti paṭisāmetvā gantabbaṃ. Te
atk-vin01a0:1220_5: pana bhikkhū araññe kuṭiyo katvā paṭijagganakaṃ alabhantā tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca paṭisāmetvā
atk-vin01a0:1220_6: saṅgopetvāti attho. Yathā ca ṭhapitaṃ taṃ upacikāhi na khajjati, anovassakañca hoti,
atk-vin01a0:1220_7: tathā ṭhapetvā “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā vasitukāmānaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ upakārāya bhavissatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1221_0: Janapadacārikaṃ pakkamiṃsūti attano attano cittānukūlaṃ janapadaṃ agamaṃsu. Āyasmā
atk-vin01a0:1221_1: pana dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto tattheva vassaṃ vasītiādi uttānatthameva. Yāvatatiyakanti
atk-vin01a0:1221_2: yāvatatiyavāraṃ. Anavayoti anuavayo, sandhivasena ukāralopo. Anu anu avayo, yaṃ yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1221_3: kumbhakārehi kattabbaṃ nāma atthi, sabbattha anūno paripuṇṇasippoti attho. Saketi
atk-vin01a0:1221_4: attano santake. Ācariyaketi ācariyakamme. Kumbhakārakammeti kumbhakārānaṃ kamme;
atk-vin01a0:1221_5: kumbhakārehi kattabbakammeti attho. Etena sakaṃ ācariyakaṃ sarūpato dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1221_6: Pariyodātasippoti parisuddhasippo. Anavayattepi sati aññehi asadisasippoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1222_2: katvāti attho. Tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca gomayañca saṅkaḍḍhitvā taṃ kuṭikaṃ pacīti taṃ sabbamattikāmayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1222_3: katvā pāṇikāya ghaṃsitvā sukkhāpetvā telatambamattikāya parimajjitvā anto ca bahi
atk-vin01a0:1222_4: ca tiṇādīhi pūretvā yathā pakkā supakkā hoti, evaṃ paci. Evaṃ pakkā ca pana sā ahosi
atk-vin01a0:1222_5: kuṭikā. Abhirūpāti surūpā. Pāsādikāti pasādajanikā. Lohitikāti lohitavaṇṇā. Kiṅkaṇikasaddoti
atk-vin01a0:1222_6: kiṅkaṇikajālassa saddo. Yathā kira nānāratanehi katassa kiṅkaṇikajālassa saddo hoti,
atk-vin01a0:1222_7: evaṃ tassā kuṭikāya vātapānantarikādīhi paviṭṭhena vātena samāhatāya saddo ahosi.
atk-vin01a0:1222_8: Etenassā anto ca bahi ca supakkabhāvo dassito hoti. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “kiṅkaṇikā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1222_9: kaṃsabhājanaṃ, tasmā yathā abhihatassa kaṃsabhājanassa saddo, evamassā vātappahatāya
atk-vin01a0:1223_0: 85. Kiṃ etaṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha jānantova bhagavā kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-vin01a0:1223_1: Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesunti sabbamattikāmayāya kuṭikāya karaṇabhāvaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya
atk-vin01a0:1223_2: bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave…pe… kuṭikaṃ karissatīti idaṃ atītatthe
atk-vin01a0:1223_3: anāgatavacanaṃ; akāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tassa lakkhaṇaṃ saddasatthato pariyesitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1223_4: Na hi nāma, bhikkhave, tassa moghapurisassa pāṇesu anuddayā anukampā avihesā bhavissatīti
atk-vin01a0:1223_5: ettha anuddayāti anurakkhaṇā; etena mettāpubbabhāgaṃ dasseti. Anukampāti paradukkhena
atk-vin01a0:1223_6: cittakampanā. Avihesāti avihiṃsanā; etehi karuṇāpubbabhāgaṃ dasseti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1223_8: bahū khuddānukhuddake pāṇe byābādhentassa vināsentassa tesu pāṇesu mettākaruṇānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1223_9: pubbabhāgamattāpi anuddayā anukampā avihesā na hi nāma bhavissati appamattakāpi nāma
atk-vin01a0:1223_10: na bhavissatī”ti. Mā pacchimā janatā pāṇesu pātabyataṃ āpajjīti pacchimo janasamūho
atk-vin01a0:1223_11: pāṇesu pātabyabhāvaṃ mā āpajji. “Buddhakālepi bhikkhūhi evaṃ kataṃ, īdisesu ṭhānesu
atk-vin01a0:1223_12: pāṇātipātaṃ karontānaṃ natthi doso”ti maññitvā imassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjamānā pacchimā
atk-vin01a0:1223_13: janatā mā pāṇesu pātabye ghaṃsitabbe evaṃ maññīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1224_0: Evaṃ dhaniyaṃ garahitvā na ca, bhikkhave, sabbamattikāmayā kuṭikā kātabbāti āyatiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1224_1: tādisāya kuṭikāya karaṇaṃ paṭikkhipi; paṭikkhipitvā ca “yo kareyya āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1224_2: sabbamattikāmayakuṭikākaraṇe āpattiṃ ṭhapesi. Tasmā yopi pathavīkhaṇanādinā pāṇesu
atk-vin01a0:1224_3: pātabyataṃ anāpajjanto tādisaṃ kuṭikaṃ karoti, sopi dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Pathavīkhaṇanādīhi
atk-vin01a0:1224_4: pana pāṇesu pātabyataṃ āpajjanto yaṃ yaṃ vatthuṃ vītikkamati, tattha tattha vuttameva
atk-vin01a0:1224_5: āpattiṃ āpajjati. Dhaniyattherassa ādikammikattā anāpatti. Sesānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-vin01a0:1224_6: karontānampi kataṃ labhitvā tattha vasantānampi dukkaṭameva. Dabbasambhāramissakā
atk-vin01a0:1224_7: pana yathā vā tathā vā missā hotu, vaṭṭati. Suddhamattikāmayāva na vaṭṭati. Sāpi
atk-vin01a0:1224_8: iṭṭhakāhi giñjakāvasathasaṅkhepena katā vaṭṭati. Evaṃ bhanteti kho…pe… taṃ kuṭiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1224_9: bhindiṃsūti bhagavato vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā kaṭṭhehi ca pāsāṇehi ca taṃ kuṭikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1225_0: Atha kho āyasmā dhaniyotiādimhi ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – dhaniyo ekapasse divāvihāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1225_1: nisinno tena saddena āgantvā te bhikkhū “kissa me tumhe, āvuso, kuṭiṃ bhindathā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1226_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā iminā atimahantena ussāhena attano vasanatthaṃ kataṃ kuṭikaṃ bhedāpesi,
atk-vin01a0:1226_1: nanu etassettha vayakammampi atthīti? Kiñcāpi atthi, atha kho naṃ bhagavā akappiyāti
atk-vin01a0:1226_2: bhindāpesi, titthiyadhajoti bhindāpesi. Ayamettha vinicchayo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:1226_3: aññānipi kāraṇāni vuttāni – sattānuddayāya, pattacīvaraguttatthāya, senāsanabāhullapaasedhanāyātiādīni.
atk-vin01a0:1226_4: Tasmā idānipi yo bhikkhu bahussuto vinayaññū aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ akappiyaṃ parikkhāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1226_5: gahetvā vicarantaṃ disvā taṃ chindāpeyya vā bhindāpeyya vā anupavajjo, so neva codetabbo
atk-vin01a0:1226_6: na sāretabbo; na taṃ labbhā vattuṃ “mama parikkhāro tayā nāsito, taṃ me dehī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1228_1: anto vā bahi vā pañcavaṇṇena suttena sibbantā vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ karonti, taṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1228_2: Ekavaṇṇena pana nīlena vā pītakena vā yena kenaci suttena anto vā bahi vā sibbituṃ
atk-vin01a0:1228_3: chattadaṇḍaggāhakaṃ salākapañjaraṃ vā vinandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Tañca kho thirakaraṇatthaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1228_4: na vaṇṇamaṭṭhatthāya. Chattapaṇṇakesu makaradantakaṃ vā aḍḍhacandakaṃ vā chindituṃ
atk-vin01a0:1228_5: na vaṭṭati. Chattadaṇḍe gehathambhesu viya ghaṭako vā vāḷarūpakaṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1228_6: Sacepi sabbattha āraggena lekhā dinnā hoti, sāpi na vaṭṭati. Ghaṭakampi vāḷarūpampi
atk-vin01a0:1228_7: bhinditvā dhāretabbaṃ. Lekhāpi ghaṃsitvā vā apanetabbā, suttakena vā daṇḍo veṭhetabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1228_8: Daṇḍabunde pana ahicchattakasaṇṭhānaṃ vaṭṭati. Vātappahārena acalanatthaṃ chattamaṇḍalikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1228_9: rajjukehi gāhetvā daṇḍe bandhanti, tasmiṃ bandhanaṭṭhāne valayamiva ukkiritvā lekhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1229_0: Cīvaramaṇḍanatthāya nānāsuttakehi satapadīsadisaṃ sibbantā āgantukapaṭṭaṃ ṭhapenti,
atk-vin01a0:1229_1: aññampi yaṃkiñci sūcikammavikāraṃ karonti, paṭṭamukhe vā pariyante vā veṇiṃ vā saṅkhalikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1229_2: vā, evamādi sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati, pakatisūcikammameva vaṭṭati. Gaṇṭhikapaṭṭakañca pāsakapaṭṭañca
atk-vin01a0:1229_3: aṭṭhakoṇampi soḷasakoṇampi karonti, tattha agghiyagayamuggarādīni dassenti, kakkaṭakkhīni
atk-vin01a0:1229_4: ukkiranti, sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati, catukoṇameva vaṭṭati. Koṇasuttapiḷakā ca cīvare ratte
atk-vin01a0:1229_5: duviññeyyarūpā vaṭṭanti. Kañjikapiṭṭhakhaliādīsu cīvaraṃ pakkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1229_6: Cīvarakammakāle pana hatthamalasūcimalādīnaṃ dhovanatthaṃ kiliṭṭhakāle ca dhovanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1229_7: vaṭṭati. Gandhaṃ vā lākhaṃ vā telaṃ vā rajane pakkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1230_0: Cīvaraṃ rajitvā saṅkhena vā maṇinā vā yena kenaci na ghaṭṭetabbaṃ. Bhūmiyaṃ jāṇukāni
atk-vin01a0:1230_1: nihantvā hatthehi gahetvā doṇiyampi na ghaṃsitabbaṃ. Doṇiyaṃ vā phalake vā ṭhapetvā
atk-vin01a0:1230_2: ante gāhāpetvā hatthehi paharituṃ pana vaṭṭati; tampi muṭṭhinā na kātabbaṃ. Porāṇakattherā
atk-vin01a0:1230_3: pana doṇiyampi na ṭhapesuṃ. Eko gahetvā tiṭṭhati; aparo hatthe katvā hatthena paharati.
atk-vin01a0:1230_4: Cīvarassa kaṇṇasuttakaṃ na vaṭṭati, rajitakāle chinditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana “anujānāmi,
atk-vin01a0:1230_5: bhikkhave, kaṇṇasuttaka”nti evaṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ anuvāte pāsakaṃ katvā bandhitabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1230_6: rajanakāle lagganatthāya. Gaṇṭhikepi sobhākaraṇatthaṃ lekhā vā piḷakā vā na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a0:1231_0: Patte vā thālake vā āraggena lekhaṃ karonti, anto vā bahi vā na vaṭṭati. Pattaṃ bhamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1231_1: āropetvā majjitvā pacanti – “maṇivaṇṇaṃ karissāmā”ti, na vaṭṭati; telavaṇṇo pana
atk-vin01a0:1231_2: vaṭṭati. Pattamaṇḍale bhittikammaṃ na vaṭṭati, makaradantakaṃ pana vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1232: Dhamakaraṇachattakassa upari vā heṭṭhā vā dhamakaraṇakucchiyaṃ vā lekhā na vaṭṭati, chattamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ panassa lekhā vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1233_0: Kāyabandhanassa sobhanatthaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ diguṇaṃ suttaṃ koṭṭenti, kakkaṭacchīni uṭṭhapenti,
atk-vin01a0:1233_1: na vaṭṭati. Ubhosu pana antesu dasāmukhassa thirabhāvāya diguṇaṃ koṭṭetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1233_2: Dasāmukhe pana ghaṭakaṃ vā makaramukhaṃ vā deḍḍubhasīsaṃ vā yaṃkiñci vikārarūpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1233_3: kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Tattha tattha acchīni dassetvā mālākammalatākammādīni vā katvā
atk-vin01a0:1233_4: koṭṭitakāyabandhanampi na vaṭṭati. Ujukameva pana macchakaṇṭakaṃ vā khajjuripattakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1233_5: vā maṭṭhapaṭṭikaṃ vā katvā koṭṭituṃ vaṭṭati. Kāyabandhanassa dasā ekā vaṭṭati, dve
atk-vin01a0:1233_6: tīṇi cattāripi vaṭṭanti; tato paraṃ na vaṭṭanti. Rajjukakāyabandhanaṃ ekameva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1233_7: Pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ pana ekampi na vaṭṭati. Dasā pana pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānāpi vaṭṭati. Bahurajjuke
atk-vin01a0:1233_8: ekato katvā ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ bahurajjukanti na vattabbaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1234: Kāyabandhanavidhe aṭṭhamaṅgalādikaṃ yaṃkiñci vikārarūpaṃ na vaṭṭati, paricchedalekhāmattaṃ vaṭṭati. Vidhakassa ubhosu antesu thirakaraṇatthāya ghaṭakaṃ karonti, ayampi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1235_1: vā vikārarūpaṃ na vaṭṭati. Ghaṃsitvā vā chinditvā vā yathā vā na paññāyati, tathā
atk-vin01a0:1235_2: suttena veṭhetvā vaḷañjetabbā. Ujukameva pana caturaṃsā vā aṭṭhaṃsā vā soḷasaṃsā
atk-vin01a0:1235_3: vā añjanī vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhato pissā dve vā tisso vā vaṭṭalekhāyo vaṭṭanti. Gīvāyampissā
atk-vin01a0:1236_0: Añjanisalākāyapi vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ na vaṭṭati. Añjanitthavikāyampi yaṃkiñci nānāvaṇṇena
atk-vin01a0:1236_1: suttena vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ na vaṭṭati. Eseva nayo kuñcikākosakepi. Kuñcikāya vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1236_2: na vaṭṭati, tathā sipāṭikāyaṃ. Ekavaṇṇasuttena panettha yena kenaci sibbituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1237_0: Ārakaṇṭakepi vaṭṭamaṇikaṃ vā aññaṃ vā vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭati. Gīvāyaṃ pana paricchedalekhā
atk-vin01a0:1237_1: vaṭṭati. Pipphalikepi maṇikaṃ vā piḷakaṃ vā yaṃkiñci uṭṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Daṇḍake
atk-vin01a0:1237_2: pana paricchedalekhā vaṭṭati. Nakhacchedanaṃ valitakaṃyeva karonti, tasmā taṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1237_3: Uttarāraṇiyaṃ vā adharāraṇiyaṃ vā araṇidhanuke vā uparipellanadaṇḍake vā mālākammādikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1237_4: yaṃkiñci vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭati, pellanadaṇḍakassa pana vemajjhe maṇḍalaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a0:1237_5: tattha paricchedalekhāmattaṃ vaṭṭati. Sūcisaṇḍāsaṃ karonti, yena sūciṃ ḍaṃsāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:1237_6: ghaṃsanti, tattha makaramukhādikaṃ yaṃkiñci vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭati, sūciḍaṃsanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1238_0: Dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsiyampi yaṃkiñci vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭati, ujukameva kappiyalohena
atk-vin01a0:1238_1: ubhosu vā passesu caturaṃsaṃ vā aṭṭhaṃsaṃ vā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Kattaradaṇḍepi yaṃkiñci
atk-vin01a0:1238_2: vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭati, heṭṭhā ekā vā dve vā vaṭṭalekhā upari ahicchattakamakuḷamattañca vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1239: Telabhājanesu visāṇe vā nāḷiyaṃ vā alābuke vā āmaṇḍasārake vā ṭhapetvā itthirūpaṃ purisarūpañca avasesaṃ sabbampi vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1240_0: Mañcapīṭhe bhisibimbohane bhūmattharaṇe pādapuñchane caṅkamanabhisiyā sammuñjaniyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1240_1: kacavarachaḍḍanake rajanadoṇikāya pānīyauḷuṅke pānīyaghaṭe pādakathalikāya phalakapīṭhake
atk-vin01a0:1240_2: valayādhārake daṇḍādhārakepattapidhāne tālavaṇṭe vījaneti – etesu sabbaṃ mālākammādivaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1240_3: vaṭṭati. Senāsane pana dvārakavāṭavātapānakavāṭādīsu sabbaratanamayampi vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1241_0: Senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthi, aññatra viruddhasenāsanā. Viruddhasenāsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1241_1: nāma aññesaṃ sīmāya rājavallabhehi katasenāsanaṃ vuccati, tasmā ye tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1241_2: karonti, te vattabbā – “mā amhākaṃ sīmāya senāsanaṃ karothā”ti. Anādiyitvā karontiyeva,
atk-vin01a0:1241_3: punapi vattabbā – “mā evaṃ akattha, mā amhākaṃ uposathapavāraṇānaṃ antarāyamakattha,
atk-vin01a0:1241_4: mā sāmaggiṃ bhindittha, tumhākaṃ senāsanaṃ katampi kataṭṭhāne na ṭhassatī”ti. Sace
atk-vin01a0:1241_5: balakkārena karontiyeva, yadā tesaṃ lajjiparisā ussannā hoti, sakkā ca hoti laddhuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1241_6: dhammiko vinicchayo, tadā tesaṃ pesetabbaṃ – “tumhākaṃ āvāsaṃ harathā”ti. Sace yāva
atk-vin01a0:1241_7: tatiyaṃ pesite haranti, sādhu; no ce haranti, ṭhapetvā bodhiñca cetiyañca avasesasenāsanāni
atk-vin01a0:1241_8: bhinditabbāni, no ca kho aparibhogaṃ karontehi, paṭipāṭiyā pana chadana-gopānasī-iṭṭhakādīni
atk-vin01a0:1241_9: apanetvā tesaṃ pesetabbaṃ – “tumhākaṃ dabbasambhāre harathā”ti. Sace haranti, sādhu;
atk-vin01a0:1241_10: no ce haranti, atha tesu dabbasambhāresu himavassavātātapādīhi pūtibhūtesu vā corehi
atk-vin01a0:1241_11: vā haṭesu agginā vā daḍḍhesu sīmasāmikā bhikkhū anupavajjā, na labbhā codetuṃ “tumhehi
atk-vin01a0:1241_12: amhākaṃ dabbasambhārā nāsitā”ti vā “tumhākaṃ gīvā”ti vā. Yaṃ pana sīmasāmikehi bhikkhūhi
atk-vin01a0:1243_0: 86. Evaṃ bhinnāya pana kuṭikāya dhaniyassa parivitakkañca puna kuṭikaraṇatthāya ussāhañca
atk-vin01a0:1243_1: dassetuṃ “atha kho āyasmato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha dārugahe gaṇakoti rañño dārubhaṇḍāgāre
atk-vin01a0:1243_2: dārugopako. Devagahadārūnīti devena gahitadārūni. Rājapaṭiggahitabhūtāni dārūnīti
atk-vin01a0:1243_3: attho. Nagarapaṭisaṅkhārikānīti nagarassa paṭisaṅkhārūpakaraṇāni. Āpadatthāya nikkhittānīti
atk-vin01a0:1243_4: aggidāhena vā purāṇabhāvena vā paṭirājūparundhanādinā vā gopuraṭṭālakarājantepurahatthisālādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1243_5: vipatti āpadāti vuccati. Tadatthaṃ nikkhittānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chedāpetvāti
atk-vin01a0:1243_6: attano kuṭiyā pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā kiñci agge kiñci majjhe kiñci mūle khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ karonto chedāpesi.
atk-vin01a0:1244_0: 87. Vassakāroti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ. Magadhamahāmattoti magadharaṭṭhe mahāmatto,
atk-vin01a0:1244_1: mahatiyā issariyamattāya samannāgato, magadharañño vā mahāmatto; mahāamaccoti vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1244_2: hoti. Anusaññāyamānoti tattha tattha gantvā paccavekkhamāno. Bhaṇeti issarānaṃ nīcaṭṭhānikapurisālapanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1244_3: Bandhaṃ āṇāpesīti brāhmaṇo pakatiyāpi tasmiṃ issāpakatova. So rañño “āṇāpehī”ti vacanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1244_4: sutvā yasmā “pakkosāpehī”ti rañño na vuttaṃ, tasmā “naṃ hatthesu ca pādesu ca bandhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1244_5: katvā āṇāpessāmī”ti bandhaṃ āṇāpesi. Addasa kho āyasmā dhaniyoti kathaṃ addasa? So
atk-vin01a0:1244_6: kira attanā lesena dārūnaṃ haṭabhāvaṃ ñatvā “nissaṃsayaṃ esa dārūnaṃ kāraṇā rājakulato
atk-vin01a0:1244_7: vadhaṃ vā bandhaṃ vā pāpuṇissati, tadā naṃ ahameva mocessāmī”ti niccakālaṃ tassa
atk-vin01a0:1244_8: pavattiṃ suṇantoyeva vicarati. Tasmā takhaṇaññeva gantvā addasa. Tena vuttaṃ – “addasa
atk-vin01a0:1244_9: kho āyasmā dhaniyo”ti. Dārūnaṃ kiccāti dārūnaṃ kāraṇā. Purāhaṃ haññāmīti ahaṃ purā
atk-vin01a0:1244_10: haññāmi; yāva ahaṃ na haññāmi, tāva tvaṃ eyyāsīti attho.
atk-vin01a0:1245_0: 88. Iṅgha, bhante, sarāpehīti ettha iṅghāti codanatthe nipāto. Paṭhamābhisittoti
atk-vin01a0:1245_1: abhisitto hutvā paṭhamaṃ. Evarūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti “dinnaññeva samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1245_2: tiṇakaṭṭhodakaṃ paribhuñjantū”ti imaṃ evarūpiṃ vācaṃ abhisitto hutvā paṭhamameva
atk-vin01a0:1245_3: yaṃ tvaṃ abhāsi, taṃ sayameva bhāsitvā idāni sarasi, na sarasīti vuttaṃ hoti. Rājāno
atk-vin01a0:1245_4: kira abhisittamattāyeva dhammabheriṃ carāpenti – “dinnaññeva samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhodakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1245_5: paribhuñjantū”ti taṃ sandhāya esa vadati. Tesaṃ mayā sandhāya bhāsitanti tesaṃ appamattakepi
atk-vin01a0:1245_7: mayā etaṃ bhāsitaṃ; na tumhādisānanti adhippāyo. Tañca kho araññe apariggahitanti
atk-vin01a0:1245_8: tañca tiṇakaṭṭhodakaṃ yaṃ araññe apariggahitaṃ hoti; etaṃ sandhāya mayā bhāsitanti dīpeti.
atk-vin01a0:1246_0: Lomena tvaṃ muttosīti ettha lomamiva lomaṃ, kiṃ pana taṃ? Pabbajjāliṅgaṃ. Kiṃ vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1246_1: hoti? Yathā nāma dhuttā “maṃsaṃ khādissāmā”ti mahagghalomaṃ eḷakaṃ gaṇheyyuṃ. Tamenaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1246_2: añño viññupuriso disvā “imassa eḷakassa maṃsaṃ kahāpaṇamattaṃ agghati. Lomāni pana
atk-vin01a0:1246_3: lomavāre lomavāre aneke kahāpaṇe agghantī”ti dve alomake eḷake datvā gaṇheyya. Evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1246_4: so eḷako viññupurisamāgamma lomena mucceyya. Evameva tvaṃ imassa kammassa katattā
atk-vin01a0:1246_5: vadhabandhanāraho. Yasmā pana arahaddhajo sabbhi avajjharūpo, tvañca sāsane pabbajitattā
atk-vin01a0:1246_6: yaṃ pabbajjāliṅgabhūtaṃ arahaddhajaṃ dhāresi. Tasmā tvaṃ iminā pabbajjāliṅgalomena
atk-vin01a0:1247_0: Manussā ujjhāyantīti rañño parisati bhāsamānassa sammukhā ca parammukhā ca sutvā
atk-vin01a0:1247_1: tattha tattha manussā ujjhāyanti, avajjhāyanti, avajānantā taṃ jhāyanti olokenti
atk-vin01a0:1247_2: lāmakato vā cintentīti attho. Khiyyantīti tassa avaṇṇaṃ kathenti pakāsenti. Vipācentīti
atk-vin01a0:1247_3: vitthārikaṃ karonti, sabbattha pattharanti; ayañca attho saddasatthānusārena veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1247_4: Ayaṃ panettha yojanā – “alajjino ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā”tiādīni cintentā ujjhāyanti.
atk-vin01a0:1247_5: “Natthi imesaṃ sāmañña”ntiādīni bhaṇantā khiyyanti. “Apagatā ime sāmaññā”tiādīni
atk-vin01a0:1247_6: tattha tattha vitthārentā vipācentīti. Etena nayena imesaṃ padānaṃ ito parampi tattha
atk-vin01a0:1247_7: tattha āgatapadānurūpena yojanā veditabbā. Brahmacārinoti seṭṭhacārino. Sāmaññanti
atk-vin01a0:1248_0: Rañño dārūnītiādimhi “adinnaṃ ādiyissatī”ti ayaṃ ujjhāyanattho. Yaṃ panetaṃ adinnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1248_1: ādiyi, taṃ dassetuṃ “rañño dārūnī”ti vuttaṃ. Iti vacanabhede asammuyhantehi attho
atk-vin01a0:1248_2: veditabbo. Purāṇavohāriko mahāmattoti bhikkhubhāvato purāṇe gihikāle vinicchayavohāre
atk-vin01a0:1249_0: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocāti bhagavā sāmaṃyeva lokavohārampi jānāti,
atk-vin01a0:1249_1: atītabuddhānaṃ paññattimpi jānāti – “pubbepi buddhā ettakena pārājikaṃ paññapenti,
atk-vin01a0:1249_2: ettakena thullaccayaṃ, ettakena dukkaṭa”nti. Evaṃ santepi sace aññehi lokavohāraviññūhi
atk-vin01a0:1249_3: saddhiṃ asaṃsanditvā pādamattena pārājikaṃ paññapeyya, tenassa siyuṃ vattāro “sīlasaṃvaro
atk-vin01a0:1249_4: nāma ekabhikkhussapi appameyyo asaṅkhyeyyo mahāpathavī-samudda-ākāsāni viya ativitthiṇṇo,
atk-vin01a0:1249_5: kathañhi nāma bhagavā pādamattakena nāsesī”ti! Tato tathāgatassa ñāṇabalaṃ ajānantā
atk-vin01a0:1249_6: sikkhāpadaṃ kopeyyuṃ, paññattampi sikkhāpadaṃ yathāṭhāne na tiṭṭheyya. Lokavohāraviññūhi
atk-vin01a0:1249_7: pana saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā paññatte so upavādo na hoti. Aññadatthu evaṃ vattāro honti
atk-vin01a0:1249_8: – “imehi nāma agārikāpi pādamattena coraṃ hanantipi bandhantipi pabbājentipi. Kasmā
atk-vin01a0:1249_9: bhagavā pabbajitaṃ na nāsessati; yena parasantakaṃ tiṇasalākamattampi na gahetabba”nti!
atk-vin01a0:1249_10: Tathāgatassa ca ñāṇabalaṃ jānissanti. Paññattampi ca sikkhāpadaṃ akuppaṃ bhavissati,
atk-vin01a0:1249_11: yathāṭhāne ṭhassati. Tasmā lokavohāraviññūhi saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā paññapetukāmo sabbāvantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1249_12: parisaṃ anuvilokento atha kho bhagavā avidūre nisinnaṃ disvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca
atk-vin01a0:1249_13: “kittakena kho bhikkhu rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro coraṃ gahetvā hanati vā bandhati vā pabbājeti vā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1250_0: Tattha māgadhoti magadhānaṃ issaro. Seniyoti senāya sampanno. Bimbisāroti tassa nāmaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1250_1: Pabbājeti vāti raṭṭhato nikkhāmeti. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Pañcamāsako pādoti
atk-vin01a0:1250_2: tadā rājagahe vīsatimāsako kahāpaṇo hoti, tasmā pañcamāsako pādo. Etena lakkhaṇena
atk-vin01a0:1250_3: sabbajanapadesu kahāpaṇassa catuttho bhāgo “pādo”ti veditabbo. So ca kho porāṇassa
atk-vin01a0:1250_4: nīlakahāpaṇassa vasena, na itaresaṃ rudradāmakādīnaṃ. Tena hi pādena atītabuddhāpi
atk-vin01a0:1250_5: pārājikaṃ paññapesuṃ, anāgatāpi paññapessanti. Sabbabuddhānañhi pārājikavatthumhi
atk-vin01a0:1250_6: vā pārājike vā nānattaṃ natthi. Imāneva cattāri pārājikavatthūni. Imāneva cattāri
atk-vin01a0:1250_7: pārājikāni. Ito ūnaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā natthi. Tasmā bhagavāpi dhaniyaṃ vigarahitvā
atk-vin01a0:1250_8: pādeneva dutiyapārājikaṃ paññapento “yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhāta”ntiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:1251_0: Evaṃ mūlacchejjavasena daḷhaṃ katvā dutiyapārājike paññatte aparampi anupaññattatthāya
atk-vin01a0:1251_2: bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hotī”ti. Tassattho ca anupaññattisambandho ca paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1251_3: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Yathā ca idha, evaṃ ito paresu sabbasikkhāpadesu. Yaṃ yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1251_4: pubbe vuttaṃ, taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ vajjetvā uparūpari apubbameva vaṇṇayissāma. Yadi hi
atk-vin01a0:1251_5: yaṃ yaṃ vuttanayaṃ, taṃ taṃ punapi vaṇṇayissāma, kadā vaṇṇanāya antaṃ gamissāma!
atk-vin01a0:1251_6: Tasmā yaṃ yaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ, taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ sādhukaṃ upasallakkhetvā tattha tattha
atk-vin01a0:1251_7: attho ca yojanā ca veditabbā. Apubbaṃ pana yaṃkiñci anuttānatthaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ mayameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-vin01a0:1253_0: 90. Rajakattharaṇaṃ gantvāti rajakatitthaṃ gantvā; tañhi yasmā tattha rajakā vatthāni
atk-vin01a0:1253_1: attharanti, tasmā rajakattharaṇanti vuccati. Rajakabhaṇḍikanti rajakānaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1253_2: rajakā sāyanhasamaye nagaraṃ pavisantā bahūni vatthāni ekekaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ bandhanti.
atk-vin01a0:1253_3: Tato ekaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ tesaṃ pamādena apassantānaṃ avaharitvā thenetvāti attho.
atk-vin01a0:1255_0: 92. Gāmo nāmāti evamādi “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti ettha vuttassa gāmassa ca araññassa
atk-vin01a0:1255_1: ca pabhedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha yasmiṃ gāme ekā eva kuṭi, ekaṃ gehaṃ seyyathāpi
atk-vin01a0:1255_2: malayajanapade; ayaṃ ekakuṭiko gāmo nāma. Etena nayena aparepi veditabbā. Amanusso
atk-vin01a0:1255_3: nāma yo sabbaso vā manussānaṃ abhāvena yakkhapariggahabhūto; yato vā manussā kenaci
atk-vin01a0:1255_4: kāraṇena punapi āgantukāmā eva apakkantā. Parikkhitto nāma iṭṭhakapākāraṃ ādiṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:1255_5: antamaso kaṇṭakasākhāhipi parikkhitto. Gonisādiniviṭṭho nāma vīthisannivesādivasena
atk-vin01a0:1255_6: anivisitvā yathā gāvo tattha tattha dve tayo nisīdanti, evaṃ tattha tattha dve tīṇi
atk-vin01a0:1255_7: gharāni katvā niviṭṭho. Satthoti jaṅghasatthasakaṭasatthādīsu yo koci. Imasmiñca
atk-vin01a0:1255_8: sikkhāpade nigamopi nagarampi gāmaggahaṇeneva gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1256_0: Gāmūpacārotiādi araññaparicchedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Indakhīle ṭhitassāti yassa gāmassa
atk-vin01a0:1256_1: anurādhapurasseva dve indakhīlā, tassa abbhantarime indakhīle ṭhitassa; tassa hi
atk-vin01a0:1256_2: bāhiro indakhīlo ābhidhammikanayena araññasaṅkhepaṃ gacchati. Yassa pana eko, tassa
atk-vin01a0:1256_3: gāmadvārabāhānaṃ vemajjhe ṭhitassa. Yatrāpi hi indakhīlo natthi, tatra gāmadvārabāhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1256_4: vemajjhameva “indakhīlo”ti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ – “gāmadvārabāhānaṃ vemajjhe ṭhitassā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1256_5: Majjhimassāti thāmamajjhimassa, no pamāṇamajjhimassa, neva appathāmassa, na mahāthāmassa;
atk-vin01a0:1256_6: majjhimathāmassāti vuttaṃ hoti. Leḍḍupātoti yathā mātugāmo kāke uḍḍāpento ujukameva
atk-vin01a0:1256_7: hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā leḍḍuṃ khipati, yathā ca udakukkhepe udakaṃ khipanti, evaṃ akhipitvā
atk-vin01a0:1256_8: yathā taruṇamanussā attano balaṃ dassentā bāhaṃ pasāretvā leḍḍuṃ khipanti, evaṃ khittassa
atk-vin01a0:1256_9: leḍḍussa patanaṭṭhānaṃ. Patito pana luṭhitvā yattha gacchati, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1257_0: Aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupātoti ettha
atk-vin01a0:1257_1: pana nibbakosassa udakapātaṭṭhāne ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa suppapāto vā musalapāto
atk-vin01a0:1257_2: vā gharūpacāro nāma. Tasmiṃ gharūpacāre ṭhitassa leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāroti kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1257_3: vuttaṃ. Mahāpaccariyampi tādisameva. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “gharaṃ nāma, gharūpacāro
atk-vin01a0:1257_4: nāma, gāmo nāma, gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā nibbakosassa udakapātaṭṭhānabbhantaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1257_5: gharaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana dvāre ṭhito mātugāmo bhājanadhovanaudakaṃ chaḍḍeti, tassa patanaṭṭhānañca
atk-vin01a0:1257_6: mātugāmeneva antogehe ṭhitena pakatiyā bahi khittassa suppassa vā sammuñjaniyā vā
atk-vin01a0:1257_7: patanaṭṭhānañca, gharassa purato dvīsu koṇesu sambandhitvā majjhe rukkhasūcidvāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1257_8: ṭhapetvā gorūpānaṃ pavesananivāraṇatthaṃ kataparikkhepo ca ayaṃ sabbopi gharūpacāro
atk-vin01a0:1257_9: nāma. Tasmiṃ gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupātabbhantaraṃ gāmo
atk-vin01a0:1257_10: nāma. Tato aññassa leḍḍupātassa abbhantaraṃ gāmūpacāro nāmāti vuttaṃ. Idamettha pamāṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1257_11: Yathā cettha, evaṃ sabbattha yo yo aṭṭhakathāvādo vā theravādo vā pacchā vuccati
atk-vin01a0:1258_0: Yañcetaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pāḷiyā viruddhamiva dissati. Pāḷiyañhi – “gharūpacāre
atk-vin01a0:1258_1: ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:1258_2: taṃ leḍḍupātaṃ gāmasaṅkhepaṃ katvā tato paraṃ gāmūpacāro vuttoti? Vuccate – saccameva
atk-vin01a0:1258_3: pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ, adhippāyo panettha veditabbo. So ca aṭṭhakathācariyānameva vidito.
atk-vin01a0:1258_4: Tasmā yathā “gharūpacāre ṭhitassā”ti ettha gharūpacāralakkhaṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ avuttampi
atk-vin01a0:1258_5: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavasena gahitaṃ. Evaṃ sesampi gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1259_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – idha gāmo nāma duvidho hoti – parikkhitto ca aparikkhitto ca. Tatra
atk-vin01a0:1259_1: parikkhittassa parikkhepoyeva paricchedo. Tasmā tassa visuṃ paricchedaṃ avatvā “gāmūpacāro
atk-vin01a0:1259_2: nāma parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti
atk-vin01a0:1259_3: pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Aparikkhittassa pana gāmassa gāmaparicchedo vattabbo. Tasmā tassa
atk-vin01a0:1259_5: purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti vuttaṃ. Gāmaparicchede ca dassite gāmūpacāralakkhaṇaṃ pubbe
atk-vin01a0:1259_6: vuttanayeneva sakkā ñātunti puna “tattha ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti
atk-vin01a0:1259_7: na vuttaṃ. Yo pana gharūpacāre ṭhitassa leḍḍupātaṃyeva “gāmūpacāro”ti vadati, tassa
atk-vin01a0:1259_8: gharūpacāro gāmoti āpajjati. Tato gharaṃ, gharūpacāro, gāmo, gāmūpacāroti esa vibhāgo
atk-vin01a0:1259_9: saṅkarīyati. Asaṅkarato cettha vinicchayo veditabbo vikāle gāmappavesanādīsu. Tasmā
atk-vin01a0:1259_10: pāḷiñca aṭṭhakathañca saṃsanditvā vuttanayenevettha gāmo ca gāmūpacāro ca veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1259_11: Yopi ca gāmo pubbe mahā hutvā pacchā kulesu naṭṭhesu appako hoti, so gharūpacārato
atk-vin01a0:1259_12: leḍḍupāteneva paricchinditabbo. Purimaparicchedo panassa parikkhittassāpi aparikkhittassāpi appamāṇamevāti.
atk-vin01a0:1260_0: Araññaṃ nāma ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcāti imaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇaṃ gāmañca gāmūpacārañca
atk-vin01a0:1260_1: ṭhapetvā imasmiṃ adinnādānasikkhāpade avasesaṃ “araññaṃ” nāmāti veditabbaṃ. Abhidhamme
atk-vin01a0:1260_2: pana “araññanti nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ. Āraññakasikkhāpade
atk-vin01a0:1260_3: “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ indakhīlato
atk-vin01a0:1260_4: paṭṭhāya āropitena ācariyadhanunā pañcadhanusatappamāṇanti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ bhagavatā
atk-vin01a0:1260_5: “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti etassa atthaṃ vibhajantena “gharaṃ, gharūpacāro, gāmo, gāmūpacāro
atk-vin01a0:1260_6: arañña”nti pāpabhikkhūnaṃ lesokāsanisedhanatthaṃ pañca koṭṭhāsā dassitā. Tasmā ghare
atk-vin01a0:1260_7: vā gharūpacāre vā gāme vā gāmūpacāre vā araññe vā pādagghanakato paṭṭhāya sassāmikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1261_1: Tattha adinnanti dantaponasikkhāpade attano santakampi appaṭiggahitakaṃ kappiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1261_2: ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ vuccati. Idha pana yaṃkiñci parapariggahitaṃ sassāmikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, tadetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1261_3: tehi sāmikehi kāyena vā vācāya vā na dinnanti adinnaṃ. Attano hatthato vā yathāṭhitaṭṭhānato
atk-vin01a0:1261_4: vā na nissaṭṭhanti anissaṭṭhaṃ. Yathāṭhāne ṭhitampi anapekkhatāya na pariccattanti
atk-vin01a0:1261_5: apariccattaṃ. Ārakkhasaṃvidhānena rakkhitattā rakkhitaṃ. Mañjūsādīsu pakkhipitvā
atk-vin01a0:1261_6: gopitattā gopitaṃ. “Mama ida”nti taṇhāmamattena mamāyitattā mamāyitaṃ. Tāhi apariccāgarakkhaṇagopanāhi
atk-vin01a0:1261_7: tehi bhaṇḍasāmikehi parehi pariggahitanti parapariggahitaṃ. Etaṃ adinnaṃ nāma.
atk-vin01a0:1262_0: Theyyasaṅkhātanti ettha thenoti coro, thenassa bhāvo theyyaṃ; avaharaṇacittassetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1262_1: adhivacanaṃ. “Saṅkhā, saṅkhāta”nti atthato ekaṃ; koṭṭhāsassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, “saññānidānā
atk-vin01a0:1262_2: hi papañcasaṅkhā”tiādīsu viya. Theyyañca taṃ saṅkhātañcāti theyyasaṅkhātaṃ, theyyacittasaṅkhāto
atk-vin01a0:1262_3: eko cittakoṭṭhāsoti attho. Karaṇatthe cetaṃ paccattavacanaṃ, tasmā theyyasaṅkhātenāti
atk-vin01a0:1262_4: atthato daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yo ca theyyasaṅkhātena ādiyati, so yasmā theyyacitto hoti, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:1262_5: byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā atthameva dassetuṃ theyyacitto avaharaṇacittoti evamassa padabhājanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1263_0: Ādiyeyya, hareyya, avahareyya, iriyāpathaṃ vikopeyya, ṭhānā cāveyya, saṅketaṃ vītināmeyyāti
atk-vin01a0:1263_1: ettha pana paṭhamapadaṃ abhiyogavasena vuttaṃ, dutiyapadaṃ aññesaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ harantassa
atk-vin01a0:1263_2: gacchato vasena, tatiyapadaṃ upanikkhittabhaṇḍavasena, catutthaṃ saviññāṇakavasena,
atk-vin01a0:1263_3: pañcamaṃ thale nikkhittādivasena, chaṭṭhaṃ parikappavasena vā suṅkaghātavasena vā
atk-vin01a0:1263_4: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Yojanā panettha ekabhaṇḍavasenapi nānābhaṇḍavasenapi hoti. Ekabhaṇḍavasena
atk-vin01a0:1264_0: Tattha nānābhaṇḍavasena tāva evaṃ veditabbaṃ – ādiyeyyāti ārāmaṃ abhiyuñjati, āpatti
atk-vin01a0:1264_1: dukkaṭassa. Sāmikassa vimatiṃ uppādeti, āpatti thullaccayassa. Sāmiko “na mayhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1265: Hareyyāti aññassa bhaṇḍaṃ haranto sīse bhāraṃ theyyacitto āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Phandāpeti, āpatti thullaccayassa. Khandhaṃ oropeti, āpatti pārājikassa.
atk-vin01a0:1266_0: Avahareyyāti upanikkhittaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ “dehi me bhaṇḍa”nti vuccamāno “nāhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1266_1: bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Sāmikassa vimatiṃ uppādeti, āpatti thullaccayassa. Sāmiko
atk-vin01a0:1266_2: “na mayhaṃ dassatī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati, āpatti pārājikassa.
atk-vin01a0:1267: Iriyāpathaṃ vikopeyyāti “sahabhaṇḍahārakaṃ nessāmī”ti paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ saṅkāmeti, āpatti thullaccayassa. Dutiyaṃ pādaṃ saṅkāmeti, āpatti pārājikassa.
atk-vin01a0:1268: Ṭhānā cāveyyāti thalaṭṭhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ theyyacitto āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Phandāpeti, āpatti thullaccayassa. Ṭhānā cāveti, āpatti pārājikassa.
atk-vin01a0:1269_0: Saṅketaṃ vītināmeyyāti parikappitaṭṭhānaṃ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti thullaccayassa.
atk-vin01a0:1269_1: Dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pārājikassa. Atha vā paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ suṅkaghātaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1269_2: atikkāmeti, āpatti thullaccayassa. Dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pārājikassāti
atk-vin01a0:1270_0: Ekabhaṇḍavasena pana sassāmikaṃ dāsaṃ vā tiracchānaṃ vā yathāvuttena abhiyogādinā
atk-vin01a0:1270_1: nayena ādiyati vā harati vā avaharati vā iriyāpathaṃ vā vikopeti, ṭhānā vā cāveti,
atk-vin01a0:1270_2: paricchedaṃ vā atikkāmeti – ayamettha ekabhaṇḍavasena yojanā.
atk-vin01a0:1272_0: Apica imāni cha padāni vaṇṇentena pañca pañcake samodhānetvā pañcavīsati avahārā
atk-vin01a0:1272_1: dassetabbā. Evaṃ vaṇṇayatā hi idaṃ adinnādānapārājikaṃ suvaṇṇitaṃ hoti. Imasmiñca
atk-vin01a0:1272_2: ṭhāne sabbaaṭṭhakathā ākulā luḷitā duviññeyyavinicchayā. Tathā hi sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu
atk-vin01a0:1272_3: yāni tāni pāḷiyaṃ “pañcahākārehi adinnaṃ ādiyantassa āpatti pārājikassa, parapariggahitañca
atk-vin01a0:1272_4: hotī”tiādinā nayena avahāraṅgāni vuttāni, tānipi gahetvā katthaci ekaṃ pañcakaṃ dassitaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1272_5: katthaci “chahākārehī”ti āgatehi saddhiṃ dve pañcakāni dassitāni. Etāni ca pañcakāni
atk-vin01a0:1272_6: na honti. Yattha hi ekekena padena avahāro sijjhati, taṃ pañcakaṃ nāma vuccati. Ettha
atk-vin01a0:1272_7: pana sabbehipi padehi ekoyeva avahāro. Yāni ca tattha labbhamānāniyeva pañcakāni
atk-vin01a0:1272_8: dassitāni, tesampi na sabbesaṃ attho pakāsito. Evamimasmiṃ ṭhāne sabbaaṭṭhakathā
atk-vin01a0:1272_9: ākulā luḷitā duviññeyyavinicchayā. Tasmā pañca pañcakesamodhānetvā dassiyamānā ime
atk-vin01a0:1273_0: Pañca pañcakāni nāma – nānābhaṇḍapañcakaṃ, ekabhaṇḍapañcakaṃ, sāhatthikapañcakaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1273_2: “ādiyeyya, hareyya, avahareyya, iriyāpathaṃ vikopeyya, ṭhānā cāveyyā”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1273_3: vasena labbhanti. Tāni pubbe yojetvā dassitanayeneva veditabbāni. Yaṃ panetaṃ “saṅketaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1273_4: vītināmeyyā”ti chaṭṭhaṃ padaṃ, taṃ parikappāvahārassa ca nissaggiyāvahārassa ca sādhāraṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1273_5: Tasmā taṃ tatiyapañcamesu pañcakesu labbhamānapadavasena yojetabbaṃ. Vuttaṃ nānābhaṇḍapañcakañca
atk-vin01a0:1274_0: Katamaṃ sāhatthikapañcakaṃ? Pañca avahārā – sāhatthiko, āṇattiko, nissaggiyo, atthasādhako,
atk-vin01a0:1274_1: dhuranikkhepoti. Tattha sāhatthiko nāma parassa bhaṇḍaṃ sahatthā avaharati. Āṇattiko
atk-vin01a0:1274_2: nāma “asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpeti. Nissaggiyo nāma antosuṅkaghāte ṭhito
atk-vin01a0:1274_3: bahisuṅkaghātaṃ pāteti, āpatti pārājikassāti, iminā ca saddhiṃ “saṅketaṃ vītināmeyyā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1274_4: idaṃ padayojanaṃ labhati. Atthasādhako nāma “asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkosi, tadā
atk-vin01a0:1274_5: avaharā”ti āṇāpeti. Tattha sace paro anantarāyiko hutvā taṃ avaharati, āṇāpako āṇattikkhaṇeyeva
atk-vin01a0:1274_6: pārājiko hoti, avahārako pana avahaṭakāle. Ayaṃ atthasādhako. Dhuranikkhepo pana
atk-vin01a0:1275_0: Katamaṃ pubbapayogapañcakaṃ? Aparepi pañca avahārā – pubbapayogo, sahapayogo, saṃvidāvahāro,
atk-vin01a0:1275_1: saṅketakammaṃ, nimittakammanti. Tattha āṇattivasena pubbapayogo veditabbo. Ṭhānā
atk-vin01a0:1275_2: cāvanavasena sahapayogo. Itare pana tayo pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva veditabbāti. Idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1276_0: Katamaṃ theyyāvahārapañcakaṃ? Aparepi pañca avahārā – theyyāvahāro, pasayhāvahāro,
atk-vin01a0:1276_1: parikappāvahāro, paṭicchannāvahāro, kusāvahāroti. Te pañcapi “aññataro bhikkhu saṅghassa
atk-vin01a0:1276_2: cīvare bhājiyamāne theyyacitto kusaṃ saṅkāmetvā cīvaraṃ aggahesī”ti etasmiṃ kusasaṅkāmanavatthusmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1276_3: vaṇṇayissāma. Idaṃ theyyāvahārapañcakaṃ. Evamimāni pañca pañcakāni samodhānetvā ime
atk-vin01a0:1277: Imesu ca pana pañcasu pañcakesu kusalena vinayadharena otiṇṇaṃ vatthuṃ sahasā avinicchinitvāva pañca ṭhānāni oloketabbāni. Yāni sandhāya porāṇā āhu –
atk-vin01a0:1280_0: Tattha vatthunti bhaṇḍaṃ; avahārakena hi “mayā idaṃ nāma avahaṭa”nti vuttepi āpattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1280_1: anāropetvāva taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sassāmikaṃ vā assāmikaṃ vāti upaparikkhitabbaṃ. Sassāmikepi
atk-vin01a0:1280_2: sāmikānaṃ sālayabhāvo vā nirālayabhāvo vā upaparikkhitabbo. Sace tesaṃ sālayakāle
atk-vin01a0:1280_3: avahaṭaṃ, bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā āpatti kātabbā. Sace nirālayakāle, na pārājikena kāretabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1280_4: Bhaṇḍasāmikesu pana bhaṇḍaṃ āharāpentesu bhaṇḍaṃ dātabbaṃ. Ayamettha sāmīci.
atk-vin01a0:1281_0: Imassa panatthassa dīpanatthamidaṃ vatthu – bhātiyarājakāle kira mahācetiyapūjāya
atk-vin01a0:1281_1: dakkhiṇadisato eko bhikkhu sattahatthaṃ paṇḍukāsāvaṃ aṃse karitvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ pāvisi;
atk-vin01a0:1281_2: taṅkhaṇameva ca rājāpi cetiyavandanatthaṃ āgato. Tattha ussāraṇāya vattamānāya mahājanasammaddo
atk-vin01a0:1281_3: ahosi. Atha so bhikkhu janasammaddapīḷito aṃsato patantaṃ kāsāvaṃ adisvāva nikkhanto;
atk-vin01a0:1281_4: nikkhamitvā ca kāsāvaṃ apassanto “ko īdise janasammadde kāsāvaṃ lacchati, na dāni
atk-vin01a0:1281_5: taṃ mayha”nti dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā gato. Athañño bhikkhu pacchā āgacchanto taṃ kāsāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1281_6: disvā theyyacittena gahetvā puna vippaṭisārī hutvā “assamaṇo dānimhi, vibbhamissāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1282_0: Tena ca samayena cūḷasumanatthero nāma sabbapariyattidharo vinayācariyapāmokkho mahāvihāre
atk-vin01a0:1282_1: paṭivasati. So bhikkhu theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā okāsaṃ kāretvā attano kukkuccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1282_2: pucchi. Thero tena bhaṭṭhe janakāye pacchā āgantvā gahitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “atthi dāni
atk-vin01a0:1282_3: ettha okāso”ti cintetvā āha – “sace kāsāvasāmikaṃ bhikkhuṃ āneyyāsi, sakkā bhaveyya
atk-vin01a0:1282_4: tava patiṭṭhā kātu”nti. “Kathāhaṃ, bhante, taṃ dakkhissāmī”ti? “Tahiṃ tahiṃ gantvā
atk-vin01a0:1282_5: olokehī”ti. So pañcapi mahāvihāre oloketvā neva addakkhi. Tato naṃ thero pucchi –
atk-vin01a0:1282_6: “katarāya disāya bahū bhikkhū āgacchantī”ti? “Dakkhiṇadisāya, bhante”ti. “Tena hi
atk-vin01a0:1282_7: kāsāvaṃ dīghato ca tiriyañca minitvā ṭhapehi. Ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇadisāya vihārapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-vin01a0:1282_8: vicinitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ ānehī”ti. So tathā katvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā therassa santikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1282_9: ānesi. Thero pucchi – “tavedaṃ kāsāva”nti? “Āma, bhante”ti. “Kuhiṃ te pātita”nti?
atk-vin01a0:1282_10: So sabbaṃ ācikkhi. Thero pana tena kataṃ dhuranikkhepaṃ sutvā itaraṃ pucchi – “tayā
atk-vin01a0:1282_11: idaṃ kuhiṃ disvā gahita”nti? Sopi sabbaṃ ārocesi. Tato naṃ thero āha – “sace te suddhacittena
atk-vin01a0:1282_12: gahitaṃ abhavissa, anāpattiyeva te assa. Theyyacittena pana gahitattā dukkaṭaṃ āpannosi.
atk-vin01a0:1282_13: Taṃ desetvā anāpattiko hohi. Idañca kāsāvaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā etasseva bhikkhuno
atk-vin01a0:1282_14: dehī”ti. So bhikkhu amateneva abhisitto paramassāsappatto ahosīti. Evaṃ vatthu oloketabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1283_0: Kāloti avahārakālo. Tadeva hi bhaṇḍaṃ kadāci samagghaṃ hoti, kadāci mahagghaṃ. Tasmā
atk-vin01a0:1283_1: taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yasmiṃ kāle avahaṭaṃ, tasmiṃyeva kāle yo tassa aggho hoti, tena agghena
atk-vin01a0:1284_0: Desoti avahāradeso. Tañhi bhaṇḍaṃ yasmiṃ dese avahaṭaṃ, tasmiṃyeva dese yo tassa
atk-vin01a0:1284_1: aggho hoti, tena agghena āpatti kāretabbā. Bhaṇḍuṭṭhānadese hi bhaṇḍaṃ samagghaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1285_0: Imassāpi ca atthassa dīpanatthamidaṃ vatthu – antarasamudde kira eko bhikkhu susaṇṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1285_1: nāḷikeraṃ labhitvā bhamaṃ āropetvā saṅkhathālakasadisaṃ manoramaṃ pānīyathālakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1285_2: katvā tattheva ṭhapetvā cetiyagiriṃ agamāsi. Athañño bhikkhu antarasamuddaṃ gantvā
atk-vin01a0:1285_3: tasmiṃ vihāre paṭivasanto taṃ thālakaṃ disvā theyyacittena gahetvā cetiyagirimeva
atk-vin01a0:1285_4: āgato. Tassa tattha yāguṃ pivantassa taṃ thālakaṃ disvā thālakasāmiko bhikkhu āha
atk-vin01a0:1285_5: – “kuto te idaṃ laddha”nti? “Antarasamuddato me ānīta”nti. So taṃ “netaṃ tava santakaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1285_6: theyyāya te gahita”nti saṅghamajjhaṃ ākaḍḍhi. Tattha ca vinicchayaṃ alabhitvā mahāvihāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1285_7: agamiṃsu. Tattha bheriṃ paharāpetvā mahācetiyasamīpe sannipātaṃ katvā vinicchayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1286_0: Tasmiñca sannipāte ābhidhammikagodattatthero nāma vinayakusalo hoti. So evamāha –
atk-vin01a0:1286_1: “iminā idaṃ thālakaṃ kuhiṃ avahaṭa”nti? “Antarasamudde avahaṭa”nti. “Tatridaṃ kiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1286_2: agghatī”ti? “Na kiñci agghati. Tatra hi nāḷikeraṃ bhinditvā miñjaṃ khāditvā kapālaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1286_3: chaḍḍenti, dāruatthaṃ pana pharatī”ti. “Imassa bhikkhuno ettha hatthakammaṃ kiṃ agghatī”ti?
atk-vin01a0:1286_4: “Māsakaṃ vā ūnamāsakaṃ vā”ti. “Atthi pana katthaci sammāsambuddhena māsakena vā ūnamāsakena
atk-vin01a0:1286_5: vā pārājikaṃ paññatta”nti. Evaṃ vutte “sādhu! Sādhu! Sukathitaṃ suvinicchita”nti
atk-vin01a0:1286_6: ekasādhukāro ahosi. Tena ca samayena bhātiyarājāpi cetiyavandanatthaṃ nagarato nikkhamanto
atk-vin01a0:1286_7: taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā sabbaṃ paṭipāṭiyā sutvā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi
atk-vin01a0:1286_8: – “mayi sante bhikkhūnampi bhikkhūnīnampi gihīnampi adhikaraṇaṃ ābhidhammikagodattattherena
atk-vin01a0:1286_9: vinicchitaṃ suvinicchitaṃ, tassa vinicchaye atiṭṭhamānaṃ rājāṇāya ṭhapemī”ti. Evaṃ deso oloketabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1287_0: Agghoti bhaṇḍaggho. Navabhaṇḍassa hi yo aggho hoti, so pacchā parihāyati; yathā navadhoto
atk-vin01a0:1287_1: patto aṭṭha vā dasa vā agghati, so pacchā bhinno vā chiddo vā āṇigaṇṭhikāhato vā
atk-vin01a0:1287_2: appaggho hoti tasmā na sabbadā bhaṇḍaṃ pakatiaggheneva kātabbanti. Evaṃ aggho oloketabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1288_0: Paribhogoti bhaṇḍaparibhogo. Paribhogenāpi hi vāsiādibhaṇḍassa aggho parihāyati.
atk-vin01a0:1288_1: Tasmā evaṃ upaparikkhitabbaṃ, sace koci kassaci pādagghanakaṃ vāsiṃ harati, tatra
atk-vin01a0:1288_2: vāsisāmiko pucchitabbo – “tayā ayaṃ vāsi kittakena kītā”ti? “Pādena, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1288_3: pana te kiṇitvāva ṭhapitā, udāhu taṃ vaḷañjesī”ti? Sace vadati “ekadivasaṃ me dantakaṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1288_4: vā rajanachalliṃ vā pattapacanakadāruṃ vā chinnaṃ, ghaṃsitvā vā nisitā”ti. Athassā
atk-vin01a0:1288_5: porāṇo aggho bhaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathā ca vāsiyā evaṃ añjaniyā vā añjanisalākāya
atk-vin01a0:1288_6: vā kuñcikāya vā palālena vā thusehi vā iṭṭhakacuṇṇena vā ekavāraṃ ghaṃsitvā dhovanamattenāpi
atk-vin01a0:1288_7: aggho bhassati. Tipumaṇḍalassa makaradantacchedanenāpi parimajjitamattenāpi, udakasāṭikāya
atk-vin01a0:1288_8: sakiṃ nivāsanapārupanenāpi paribhogasīsena aṃse vā sīse vā ṭhapanamattenāpi, taṇḍulādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1288_9: papphoṭanenāpi tato ekaṃ vā dve vā apanayanenāpi, antamaso ekaṃ pāsāṇasakkharaṃ uddharitvā
atk-vin01a0:1288_10: chaḍḍitamattenāpi, sappitelādīnaṃ bhājanantarapaavattanenāpi, antamaso tato makkhikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1288_11: vā kipillikaṃ vā uddharitvā chaḍḍitamattenāpi, guḷapiṇḍakassa madhurabhāvajānanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1288_12: nakhena vijjhitvā aṇumattaṃ gahitamattenāpi aggho bhassati. Tasmā yaṃkiñci pādagghanakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1288_13: vuttanayeneva sāmikehi paribhogena ūnaṃ kataṃ hoti, na taṃ avahaṭo bhikkhu pārājikena
atk-vin01a0:1288_14: kātabbo. Evaṃ paribhogo oloketabbo. Evaṃ imāni tulayitvā pañca ṭhānāni dhāreyyatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1288_15: vicakkhaṇo, āpattiṃ vā anāpattiṃ vā garukaṃ vā lahukaṃ vā āpattiṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhapeyyāti.
atk-vin01a0:1291_0: Idāni yadidaṃ “yathārūpe adinnādāne”tiādīni vibhajantena “yathārūpaṃ nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1291_1: Tattha yathārūpanti yathājātikaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā pādato paṭṭhāya hoti, tasmā “pādaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1291_2: vā pādārahaṃ vā atirekapādaṃ vā”ti āha. Tattha pādena kahāpaṇassa catutthabhāgaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1291_3: akappiyabhaṇḍameva dasseti. Pādārahena pādagghanakaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ. Atirekapādena
atk-vin01a0:1291_4: ubhayampi. Ettāvatā sabbākārena dutiyapārājikappahonakavatthu dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1292_0: Pathabyā rājāti sakalapathaviyā rājā dīpacakkavattī asokasadiso, yo vā panaññopi
atk-vin01a0:1292_1: ekadīpe rājā, sīhaḷarājasadiso. Padesarājāti ekadīpassa padesissaro, bimbisāra-pasenadi-ādayo
atk-vin01a0:1292_2: viya. Maṇḍalikā nāma ye dīpapadesepi ekamekaṃ maṇḍalaṃ bhuñjanti. Antarabhogikā nāma
atk-vin01a0:1292_3: dvinnaṃ rājūnaṃ antarā katipayagāmasāmikā. Akkhadassāti dhammavinicchanakā, te dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1292_4: nisīditvā aparādhānurūpaṃ corānaṃ hatthapādacchejjādiṃ anusāsanti. Ye pana ṭhānantarappattā
atk-vin01a0:1292_5: amaccā vā rājakumārā vā katāparādhā honti, te rañño ārocenti, garukaṃ ṭhānaṃ sayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1292_6: na vinicchinanti. Mahāmattāti ṭhānantarappattā mahāamaccā; tepi tattha tattha gāme
atk-vin01a0:1292_7: vā nigame vā nisīditvā rājakiccaṃ karonti. Ye vā panāti aññepi ye rājakulanissitā
atk-vin01a0:1292_8: vā sakissariyanissitā vā hutvā chejjabhejjaṃ anusāsanti, sabbepi te imasmiṃ atthe “rājāno”ti dasseti.
atk-vin01a0:1293_0: Haneyyunti potheyyuñceva chindeyyuñca. Pabbājeyyunti nīhareyyuṃ. Corosīti evamādīni
atk-vin01a0:1293_1: ca vatvā paribhāseyyuṃ; tenevāha – “paribhāso eso”ti. Purimaṃ upādāyāti methunaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1293_2: dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā pārājikaṃ āpattiṃ āpannaṃ puggalaṃ upādāya. Sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayattā
atk-vin01a0:1294_0: 93. Evaṃ uddiṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ padānukkamena vibhajitvā idāni yaṃ taṃ ādiyeyyātiādīhi
atk-vin01a0:1294_1: chahi padehi saṅkhepato ādānaṃ dassetvā saṅkhepatoeva “pādaṃ vā pādārahaṃ vā atirekapādaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1294_2: vā”ti ādātabbabhaṇḍaṃ dassitaṃ, taṃ yattha yattha ṭhitaṃ, yathā yathā ādānaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin01a0:1294_3: anāgate pāpabhikkhūnaṃ lesokāsanirundhanatthaṃ tathā tathā vitthārato dassetuṃ “bhūmaṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1294_4: thalaṭṭha”ntiādinā nayena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā “bhūmaṭṭhaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikkhittaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1297_0: 94. Tatrāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanāya saddhiṃ vinicchayakathā. Nikhātanti bhūmiyaṃ khaṇitvā
atk-vin01a0:1297_1: ṭhapitaṃ. Paṭicchannanti paṃsuiṭṭhakādīhi paṭicchannaṃ. Bhūmaṭṭhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ…pe… gacchati
atk-vin01a0:1297_2: vā, āpatti dukkaṭassāti taṃ evaṃ nikhaṇitvā vā paṭicchādetvā vā ṭhapitattā bhūmiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1297_3: ṭhitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yo bhikkhu kenacideva upāyena ñatvā “āharissāmī”ti theyyacitto hutvā
atk-vin01a0:1297_4: rattibhāge uṭṭhāya gacchati, so bhaṇḍaṭṭhānaṃ appatvāpi sabbakāyavacīvikāresu dukkaṭaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1297_5: āpajjati. Kathaṃ? So hi tassa āharaṇatthāya uṭṭhahanto yaṃ yaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ phandāpeti,
atk-vin01a0:1297_6: sabbattha dukkaṭameva. Nivāsanapārupanaṃ saṇṭhapeti, hatthavāre hatthavāre dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1297_7: “Mahantaṃ nidhānaṃ na sakkā ekena āharituṃ, dutiyaṃ pariyesissāmī”ti kassaci sahāyassa
atk-vin01a0:1297_8: santikaṃ gantukāmo dvāraṃ vivarati, padavāre ca hatthavāre ca dukkaṭaṃ. Dvārapidahane
atk-vin01a0:1297_9: pana aññasmiṃ vā gamanassa anupakāre anāpatti. Tassa nipannokāsaṃ gantvā “itthannāmā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1297_10: pakkosati, tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “ehi gacchāmā”ti vadati, vācāya vācāya dukkaṭaṃ. So
atk-vin01a0:1297_11: tassa vacanena uṭṭhahati, tassāpi dukkaṭaṃ. Uṭṭhahitvā tassa santikaṃ gantukāmo nivāsanapārupanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1297_12: saṇṭhapeti, dvāraṃ vivaritvā tassa samīpaṃ gacchati, hatthavārapadavāresu sabbattha
atk-vin01a0:1297_13: dukkaṭaṃ. So taṃ pucchati “asuko ca asuko ca kuhiṃ, asukañca asukañca pakkosāhī”ti,
atk-vin01a0:1297_14: vācāya vācāya dukkaṭaṃ. Sabbe samāgate disvā “mayā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne evarūpo nidhi
atk-vin01a0:1297_15: upaladdho, gacchāma taṃ gahetvā puññāni ca karissāma, sukhañca jīvissāmā”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a0:1298_0: Evaṃ laddhasahāyo kudālaṃ pariyesati. Sace panassa attano kudālo atthi, “taṃ āharissāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1298_1: gacchanto ca gaṇhanto ca āharanto ca sabbattha hatthavārapadavāresu dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin01a0:1298_2: Sace natthi, aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ vā gahaṭṭhaṃ vā gantvā yācati, yācanto ca sace “kudālaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1298_3: me dehi, kudālena me attho, kiñci kātabbamatthi, taṃ katvā paccāharissāmī”ti musā
atk-vin01a0:1298_4: abhaṇanto yācati, vācāya vācāya dukkaṭaṃ. Sace “mātikā sodhetabbā atthi, vihāre bhūmikammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1298_5: kātabbaṃ atthī”ti musāpi bhaṇati, yaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ musā, tattha tattha pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1298_6: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana saccepi alikepi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ, taṃ pamādalikhitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1298_7: Na hi adinnādānassa pubbapayoge pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭaṃ nāma atthi. Sace pana kudālassa
atk-vin01a0:1298_8: daṇḍo natthi, “daṇḍaṃ karissāmī”ti vāsiṃ vā pharasuṃ vā niseti, tadatthāya gacchati,
atk-vin01a0:1298_9: gantvā sukkhakaṭṭhaṃ chindati tacchati ākoṭeti, sabbattha hatthavārapadavāresu dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1298_10: Allarukkhaṃ chindati, pācittiyaṃ. Tato paraṃ sabbapayogesu dukkaṭaṃ. Saṅkhepaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1298_11: pana mahāpaccariyañca tattha jātakakaṭṭhalatāchedanatthaṃ vāsipharasuṃ pariyesantānampi
atk-vin01a0:1298_12: dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Sace pana tesaṃ evaṃ hoti “vāsipharasukudāle yācantā āsaṅkitā bhavissāma,
atk-vin01a0:1298_13: lohaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā karomā”ti. Tato araññaṃ gantvā lohabījatthaṃ pathaviṃ khaṇanti,
atk-vin01a0:1298_14: akappiyapathaviṃ khaṇantānaṃ dukkaṭehi saddhiṃ pācittiyānīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1298_15: Yathā ca idha, evaṃ sabbattha pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭā na muccati. Kappiyapathaviṃ
atk-vin01a0:1298_16: khaṇantānaṃ dukkaṭāniyeva. Bījaṃ pana gahetvā tato paraṃ sabbakiriyāsu payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1299_0: Piṭakapariyesanepi hatthavārapadavāresu vuttanayeneva dukkaṭaṃ. Musāvāde pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1299_1: Piṭakaṃ kātukāmatāya vallicchedane pācittiyanti sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1299_2: Gacchati vā āpatti dukkaṭassāti evaṃ pariyiṭṭhasahāyakudālapiṭako nidhiṭṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin01a0:1299_3: padavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana gacchanto “imaṃ nidhiṃ laddhā buddhapūjaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:1299_4: dhammapūjaṃ vā saṅghabhattaṃ vā karissāmī”ti kusalaṃ uppādeti, kusalacittena gamane
atk-vin01a0:1299_5: anāpatti. Kasmā? “Theyyacitto dutiyaṃ vā…pe… gacchati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā.
atk-vin01a0:1299_6: Yathā ca idha, evaṃ sabbattha atheyyacittassa anāpatti. Maggato okkamma nidhānaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1299_7: gamanatthāya maggaṃ karonto bhūtagāmaṃ chindati, pācittiyaṃ. Sukkhakaṭṭhaṃ chindati, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1300_0: Tatthajātakanti ciranihitāya kumbhiyā upari jātakaṃ. Kaṭṭhaṃ vā lataṃ vāti na kevalaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1300_1: kaṭṭhalatameva, yaṃkiñci allaṃ vā sukkhaṃ vā tiṇarukkhalatādiṃ chindantassa sahapayogattā dukkaṭameva hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1301_0: Aṭṭhavidhaṃ hetaṃ dukkaṭaṃ nāma imasmiṃ ṭhāne samodhānetvā therehi dassitaṃ – pubbapayogadukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1301_2: ñattidukkaṭaṃ, paṭissavadukkaṭanti. Tattha “theyyacitto dutiyaṃ vā kudālaṃ vā piṭakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1301_3: vā pariyesati gacchati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ pubbapayogadukkaṭaṃ nāma. Ettha
atk-vin01a0:1301_4: hi dukkaṭaṭṭhāne dukkaṭaṃ, pācittiyaṭṭhāne pācittiyameva hoti. “Tatthajātakaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1301_5: vā lataṃ vā chindati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ sahapayogadukkaṭaṃ nāma. Ettha pana
atk-vin01a0:1301_6: pācittiyavatthu ca dukkaṭavatthu ca dukkaṭaṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati. Kasmā? Avahārassa
atk-vin01a0:1301_7: sahapayogattāti. Yaṃ pana dasavidhaṃ ratanaṃ, sattavidhaṃ dhaññaṃ, sabbañca āvudhabhaṇḍādiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1301_8: āmasantassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ anāmāsadukkaṭaṃ nāma. Yaṃ kadalināḷikerādīnaṃ tatthajātakaphalāni
atk-vin01a0:1301_9: āmasantassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ durupaciṇṇadukkaṭaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana piṇḍāya carantassa
atk-vin01a0:1301_10: patte raje patite pattaṃ appaṭiggahetvā adhovitvā vā tattha bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantassa
atk-vin01a0:1301_11: dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ vinayadukkaṭaṃ nāma. “Sutvā na vadanti, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1301_12: idaṃ ñātadukkaṭaṃ nāma. Yaṃ ekādasasu samanubhāsanāsu “ñattiyā dukkaṭa”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1301_13: idaṃ ñattidukkaṭaṃ nāma. “Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave
atk-vin01a0:1301_14: ca āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ paṭissavadukkaṭaṃ nāma. Idaṃ pana sahapayogadukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1301_15: Tena vuttaṃ – “yaṃkiñci allaṃ vā sukkhaṃ vā tiṇarukkhalatādiṃ chindantassa sahapayogattā
atk-vin01a0:1302_0: Sace panassa tatthajātake tiṇarukkhalatādimhi chinnepi lajjidhammo okkamati, saṃvaro
atk-vin01a0:1302_1: uppajjati, chedanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ desetvā muccati. Atha dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā saussāhova
atk-vin01a0:1302_2: paṃsuṃ khaṇati, chedanadukkaṭaṃ paṭippassambhati, khaṇanadukkaṭe patiṭṭhāti. Akappiyapathaviṃ
atk-vin01a0:1302_3: khaṇantopi hi idha sahapayogattā dukkaṭameva āpajjati. Sace panassa sabbadisāsu khaṇitvā
atk-vin01a0:1302_4: kumbhimūlaṃ pattassāpi lajjidhammo okkamati, khaṇanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ desetvā muccati.
atk-vin01a0:1303_0: Byūhati vāti atha pana saussāhova paṃsuṃ viyūhati, ekapasse rāsiṃ karoti, khaṇanadukkaṭaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1303_1: paṭippassambhati, viyūhanadukkaṭe patiṭṭhāti. Tañca paṃsuṃ tattha tattha puñjaṃ karonto
atk-vin01a0:1303_2: payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Sace pana rāsiṃ katvāpi dhuranikkhepaṃ karoti, lajjidhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1303_3: āpajjati, viyūhanadukkaṭaṃ desetvā muccati. Uddharati vāti atha pana saussāhova paṃsuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1303_4: uddharitvā bahi pāteti, viyūhanadukkaṭaṃ paṭippassambhati, uddharaṇadukkaṭe patiṭṭhāti.
atk-vin01a0:1303_5: Paṃsuṃ pana kudālena vā hatthehi vā pacchiyā vā tahiṃ tahiṃ pātento payoge payoge
atk-vin01a0:1303_6: dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Sace pana sabbaṃ paṃsuṃ nīharitvā kumbhiṃ thalaṭṭhaṃ katvāpi lajjidhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1303_7: āpajjati, uddharaṇadukkaṭaṃ desetvā muccati. Atha pana saussāhova kumbhiṃ āmasati,
atk-vin01a0:1303_8: uddharaṇadukkaṭaṃ paṭippassambhati, āmasanadukkaṭe patiṭṭhāti. Āmasitvāpi ca lajjidhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1303_9: āpajjanto āmasanadukkaṭaṃ desetvā muccati. Atha saussāhova kumbhiṃ phandāpeti, āmasanadukkaṭaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1304_0: Tatrāyaṃ dukkaṭathullaccayānaṃ dvinnampi vacanattho – paṭhamaṃ tāvettha duṭṭhu kataṃ
atk-vin01a0:1304_1: satthārā vuttakiccaṃ virādhetvā katanti dukkaṭaṃ. Atha vā duṭṭhaṃ kataṃ, virūpā sā
atk-vin01a0:1304_2: kiriyā bhikkhukiriyānaṃ majjhe na sobhatīti evampi dukkaṭaṃ. Vuttañcetaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:1305: “Dukkaṭaṃ iti yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ suṇohi yathātathaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1307: “Yaṃ manusso kare pāpaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho;
atk-vin01a0:1309_0: Itaraṃ pana thūlattā, accayattā ca thullaccayaṃ. “Samparāye ca duggati”, “yaṃ hoti
atk-vin01a0:1309_1: kaṭukapphala”ntiādīsu viya cettha saṃyogabhāvo veditabbo. Ekassa santike desetabbesu
atk-vin01a0:1309_2: hi accayesu tena samo thūlo accayo natthi. Tasmā vuttaṃ “thūlattā accayattā ca thullaccaya”nti. Vuttañcetaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:1311: Ekassa mūle yo deseti, yo ca taṃ paṭiggaṇhati;
atk-vin01a0:1312: Accayo tena samo natthi, tenetaṃ iti vuccatī”ti. ;
atk-vin01a0:1313_0: Phandāpentassa ca payoge payoge thullaccayaṃ. Phandāpetvāpi ca lajjidhammaṃ okkanto
atk-vin01a0:1313_1: thullaccayaṃ desetvā muccati. Sahapayogato paṭṭhāyeva cettha purimā purimā āpatti
atk-vin01a0:1313_2: paṭippassambhati. Sahapayogaṃ pana akatvā lajjidhammaṃ okkantena yā pubbapayoge dukkaṭapācittiyā
atk-vin01a0:1313_3: āpannā, sabbā tā desetabbā. Sahapayoge ca tatthajātakacchedane bahukānipi dukkaṭāni
atk-vin01a0:1313_4: paṃsukhaṇanaṃ patvā paṭippassambhanti. Ekaṃ khaṇanadukkaṭameva hoti. Khaṇane bahukānipi
atk-vin01a0:1313_5: viyūhanaṃ, viyūhane bahukānipi uddharaṇaṃ, uddharaṇe bahukānipi āmasanaṃ, āmasane
atk-vin01a0:1313_6: bahukānipi phandāpanaṃ patvā paṭippassambhanti. Paṃsukhaṇanādīsu ca lajjidhamme uppanne
atk-vin01a0:1313_7: bahukāpi āpattiyo hontu, ekameva desetvā muccatīti kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Purimāpattipaṭippassaddhi
atk-vin01a0:1313_8: ca nāmesā “ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhantī”ti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1313_9: anusāvanāsuttesuyeva āgatā. Idha pana dutiyapārājike aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena gahetabbāti.
atk-vin01a0:1314_0: Ṭhānā cāveti, āpatti pārājikassāti yo pana phandāpetvāpi lajjidhammaṃ anokkamitvāva
atk-vin01a0:1314_1: taṃ kumbhiṃ ṭhānato antamaso kesaggamattampi cāveti, pārājikameva āpajjatīti attho.
atk-vin01a0:1314_2: Ṭhānā cāvanañcettha chahi ākārehi veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Kumbhiṃ mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:1314_3: attano abhimukhaṃ ākaḍḍhanto iminā antena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ kesaggamattampi pārimantena
atk-vin01a0:1314_4: atikkāmeti, pārājikaṃ. Tatheva gahetvā parato pellento pārimantena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ kesaggamattampi
atk-vin01a0:1314_5: iminā antena atikkāmeti, pārājikaṃ. Vāmato vā dakkhiṇato vā apanāmento vāmantena
atk-vin01a0:1314_6: phuṭṭhokāsaṃ kesaggamattampi dakkhiṇantena atikkāmeti, pārājikaṃ. Dakkhiṇantena vā
atk-vin01a0:1314_7: phuṭṭhokāsaṃ kesaggamattampi vāmantena atikkāmeti, pārājikaṃ. Uddhaṃ ukkhipanto kesaggamattampi
atk-vin01a0:1314_8: bhūmito moceti, pārājikaṃ. Khaṇitvā heṭṭhato osīdento bundena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ kesaggamattampi
atk-vin01a0:1314_9: mukhavaṭṭiyā atikkāmeti, pārājikanti evaṃ ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitāya kumbhiyā. Yadi pana kumbhimukhavaṭṭiyā
atk-vin01a0:1314_10: pāsaṃ katvā lohakhāṇuṃ vā khadirasārādikhāṇuṃ vā pathaviyaṃ ākoṭetvā tattha saṅkhalikāya
atk-vin01a0:1314_11: bandhitvā ṭhapenti, ekissā disāya ekāya saṅkhalikāya baddhāya dve ṭhānāni labbhanti,
atk-vin01a0:1314_12: dvīsu tīsu catūsu disāsu catūhi saṅkhalikāhi baddhāya pañca ṭhānāni labbhanti.
atk-vin01a0:1315_0: Tattha ekakhāṇuke baddhakumbhiyā paṭhamaṃ khāṇukaṃ vā uddharati, saṅkhalikaṃ vā chindati,
atk-vin01a0:1315_1: thullaccayaṃ. Tato kumbhiṃ yathāvuttanayena kesaggamattampi ṭhānā cāveti, pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1315_2: Atha paṭhamaṃ kumbhiṃ uddharati, thullaccayaṃ. Tato khāṇukaṃ kesaggamattampi ṭhānā
atk-vin01a0:1315_3: cāveti, saṅkhalikaṃ vā chindati, pārājikaṃ. Etena upāyena dvīsu tīsu catūsu khāṇukesu
atk-vin01a0:1315_4: baddhakumbhiyāpi pacchime ṭhānācāvane pārājikaṃ. Sesesu thullaccayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1316_0: Sace khāṇu natthi, saṅkhalikāya agge valayaṃ katvā tatthajātake mūle pavesitaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a0:1316_1: paṭhamaṃ kumbhiṃ uddharitvā pacchā mūlaṃ chetvā valayaṃ nīharati, pārājikaṃ. Atha
atk-vin01a0:1316_2: mūlaṃ acchetvā valayaṃ ito cito ca sāreti, rakkhati. Sace pana mūlato anīharitvāpi
atk-vin01a0:1316_3: hatthena gahetvā ākāsagataṃ karoti, pārājikaṃ. Ayamettha viseso. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-vin01a0:1317_0: Keci pana nimittatthāya kumbhimatthake nigrodharukkhādīni ropenti, mūlāni kumbhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1317_1: vinandhitvā ṭhitāni honti, “mūlāni chinditvā kumbhiṃ gahessāmī”ti chindantassa payoge
atk-vin01a0:1317_2: payoge dukkaṭaṃ. Chinditvā okāsaṃ katvā kumbhiṃ kesaggamattampi ṭhānā cāveti, pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1317_3: Mūlāni chindatova luṭhitvā kumbhī ninnaṭṭhānaṃ gatā, rakkhati tāva. Gataṭṭhānato
atk-vin01a0:1317_4: uddharati, pārājikaṃ. Sace chinnesu mūlesu ekamūlamattena kumbhī tiṭṭhati, so ca
atk-vin01a0:1317_5: taṃ “imasmiṃ mūle chinne patissatī”ti chindati, chinnamatte pārājikaṃ. Sace pana
atk-vin01a0:1317_6: ekamūleneva pāse baddhasūkaro viya ṭhitā hoti, aññaṃ kiñci lagganakaṃ natthi, tasmimpi
atk-vin01a0:1317_7: mūle chinnamatte pārājikaṃ. Sace kumbhimatthake mahāpāsāṇo ṭhapito hoti, taṃ daṇḍena
atk-vin01a0:1317_8: ukkhipitvā apanetukāmo kumbhimatthake jātarukkhaṃ chindati, dukkaṭaṃ. Tassā samīpe
atk-vin01a0:1317_9: jātakaṃ chetvā āharati, atatthajātakattā taṃ chindato pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1318_0: Attano bhājananti sace pana kumbhiṃ uddharituṃ asakkonto kumbhigatabhaṇḍaggahaṇatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1318_1: attano bhājanaṃ pavesetvā antokumbhiyaṃ pañcamāsakaṃ vā atirekapañcamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1318_2: theyyacitto āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Paricchedo cettha pārājikaniyamanatthaṃ vutto.
atk-vin01a0:1318_3: Theyyacittena pana ūnapañcamāsakampi āmasanto dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:1319_0: Phandāpetīti ettha yāva ekābaddhaṃ katvā attano bhājanaṃ paveseti, tāva phandāpetīti
atk-vin01a0:1319_1: vuccati. Api ca ito cito ca apabyūhantopi phandāpetiyeva, so thullaccayaṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin01a0:1319_2: Yadā pana ekābaddhabhāvo chinno, kumbhigataṃ kumbhiyameva, bhājanagatampi bhājaneyeva
atk-vin01a0:1319_3: hoti, tadā attano bhājanagataṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ katvā kumbhito anīhatepi ca bhājane pārājikaṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin01a0:1320: Muṭṭhiṃ vā chindatīti ettha yathā aṅgulantarehi nikkhantakahāpaṇā kumbhigate kahāpaṇe na samphusanti, evaṃ muṭṭhiṃ karonto muṭṭhiṃ chindati nāma; sopi pārājikaṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin01a0:1321_0: Suttārūḷhanti sutte ārūḷhaṃ; suttena āvutassāpi suttamayassāpi etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1321_1: Pāmaṅgādīnihi sovaṇṇamayānipi honti rūpiyamayānipi suttamayānipi, muttāvaliādayopi
atk-vin01a0:1321_2: ettheva saṅgahaṃ gatā. Veṭhananti sīsaveṭhanapaṭo vuccati. Etesu yaṃkiñci theyyacitto
atk-vin01a0:1321_3: āmasati, dukkaṭaṃ. Phandāpeti, thullaccayaṃ. Pāmaṅgādīni koṭiyaṃ gahetvā ākāsaṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1322_0: Ghaṃsanto nīharatīti ettha pana paripuṇṇāya kumbhiyā upari samatittikaṃ kumbhiṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:1322_1: ṭhapitaṃ vā ekaṃ koṭiṃ bunde ekaṃ koṭiṃ mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ vā ghaṃsantassa
atk-vin01a0:1322_2: nīharato thullaccayaṃ. Kumbhimukhā mocentassa pārājikaṃ. Yaṃ pana upaḍḍhakumbhiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1322_3: vā rittakumbhiyaṃ vā ṭhapitaṃ, tassa attano phuṭṭhokāsova ṭhānaṃ, na sakalā kumbhī,
atk-vin01a0:1322_4: tasmā taṃ ghaṃsantassāpi nīharato patiṭṭhitokāsato kesaggamatte mutte pārājikameva.
atk-vin01a0:1322_5: Kumbhiyā pana paripuṇṇāya vā ūnāya vā ujukameva uddharantassa heṭṭhimakoṭiyā patiṭṭhitokāsā
atk-vin01a0:1322_6: muttamatteva pārājikaṃ. Antokumbhiyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ yaṃkiñci pārājikappahonakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1322_7: sakalakumbhiyaṃ cārentassa, pāmaṅgādiñca ghaṃsitvā nīharantassa yāva mukhavaṭṭiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1322_8: nātikkamati, tāva thullaccayameva. Tassa hi sabbāpi kumbhī ṭhānanti saṅkhepamahāpaccariyādīsu
atk-vin01a0:1322_9: vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ṭhapitaṭṭhānameva ṭhānaṃ, na sakalā kumbhī. Tasmā
atk-vin01a0:1322_10: yathāṭhitaṭṭhānato kesaggamattampi mocentassa pārājikamevā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ pamāṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1322_11: Itaraṃ pana ākāsagataṃ akarontassa cīvaravaṃse ṭhapitacīvaraveṭhanakanayena vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1322_12: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Vinayavinicchaye hi āgate garuke ṭhātabbaṃ, esā vinayadhammatā.
atk-vin01a0:1322_13: Apica “attano bhājanagataṃ vā karoti, muṭṭhiṃ vā chindatī”ti vacanato petaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1322_14: Yathā antokumbhiyaṃ ṭhitassa na sabbā kumbhī ṭhānanti.
atk-vin01a0:1323_0: Sappiādīsu yaṃkiñci pivato ekapayogena pītamatte pārājikanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1323_1: Mahāpaccariyādīsu pana ayaṃ vibhāgo dassito – “mukhaṃ anapanetvā ākaḍḍhantassa pivato
atk-vin01a0:1323_2: sace paragalagataṃ pādaṃ na agghati, mukhagatena saddhiṃ agghati, rakkhati tāva.
atk-vin01a0:1323_3: Kaṇṭhena pana paricchinnakāleyeva pārājikaṃ hoti. Sacepi oṭṭhehi paricchindanto oṭṭhe
atk-vin01a0:1323_4: pidahati, pārājikameva. Uppaladaṇḍaveḷunāḷinaḷanāḷiādīhi pivantassāpi sace paragalagatameva
atk-vin01a0:1323_5: pādaṃ agghati, pārājikaṃ. Sace saha mukhagatena agghati, na tāva pārājikaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1323_6: Uppaladaṇḍādigatena saddhiṃ ekābaddhabhāvaṃ kopetvā oṭṭhehi paricchinnamatte pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1323_7: Sace uppaladaṇḍādigatena saddhiṃ agghati, uppaladaṇḍādīnaṃ bunde aṅguliyāpi pihitamatte
atk-vin01a0:1323_8: pārājikaṃ. Pādagghanake paragalaṃ appaviṭṭhe uppaladaṇḍādīsu ca mukhe ca atirekapādārahampi
atk-vin01a0:1323_9: ekābaddhaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, rakkhatiyevā”ti. Taṃ sabbampi yasmā “attano bhājanagataṃ
atk-vin01a0:1323_10: vā karoti, muṭṭhiṃ vā chindatī”ti imaṃ nayaṃ bhajati, tasmā sudassitameva. Esa tāva ekābaddhe nayo.
atk-vin01a0:1324_0: Sace pana hatthena vā pattena vā thālakādinā vā kenaci bhājanena gahetvā pivati,
atk-vin01a0:1324_1: yamhi payoge pādagghanakaṃ pūreti, tamhi gate pārājikaṃ. Atha mahagghaṃ hoti, sippikāyapi
atk-vin01a0:1324_2: ekapayogeneva pādagghanakaṃ gahetuṃ sakkā hoti, ekuddhāreyeva pārājikaṃ. Bhājanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1324_3: pana nimujjāpetvā gaṇhantassa yāva ekābaddhaṃ hoti, tāva rakkhati. Mukhavaṭṭiparicchedena
atk-vin01a0:1324_4: vā uddhārena vā pārājikaṃ. Yadā pana sappiṃ vā telaṃ vā acchaṃ telasadisameva madhuphāṇitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1324_5: vā kumbhiṃ āviñchetvā attano bhājane paveseti, tadā tesaṃ acchatāya ekābaddhatā natthīti
atk-vin01a0:1325_0: Pacitvā ṭhapitaṃ pana madhuphāṇitaṃ sileso viya cikkanaṃ ākaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhanayoggaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1325_1: hoti, uppanne kukkucce ekābaddhameva hutvā paṭinīharituṃ sakkoti, etaṃ mukhavaṭṭiyā
atk-vin01a0:1325_2: nikkhamitvā bhājane paviṭṭhampi bāhirena saddhiṃ ekābaddhattā rakkhati, mukhavaṭṭito
atk-vin01a0:1325_3: chinnamatte pana pārājikaṃ. Yopi theyyacittena parassa kumbhiyā pādagghanakaṃ sappiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1325_4: vā telaṃ vā avassapivanakaṃ yaṃkiñci dukūlasāṭakaṃ vā cammakhaṇḍādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1326_0: Rittakumbhiyā “idāni telaṃ ākirissantī”ti ñatvā yaṃkiñci bhaṇḍaṃ theyyacitto pakkhipati,
atk-vin01a0:1326_1: taṃ ce tattha tele ākiṇṇe pañcamāsakaagghanakaṃ pivati, pītamatte pārājikanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1326_2: vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana tattheva sukkhataḷāke sukkhamātikāya ujukaraṇavinicchayena virujjhati,
atk-vin01a0:1326_3: avahāralakkhaṇañcettha na paññāyati, tasmā na gahetabbaṃ. Mahāpaccariyādīsu pana
atk-vin01a0:1326_4: tassa uddhāre pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1327_0: Parassa rittakumbhiyā saṅgopanatthāya bhaṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā tattha tele ākiṇṇe “sace ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1327_1: jānissati, maṃ palibujjhissatī”ti bhīto pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ pītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ theyyacittena
atk-vin01a0:1327_2: uddharati, pārājikaṃ. Suddhacittena uddharati, pare āharāpente bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1327_3: nāma yaṃ parassa naṭṭhaṃ, tassa mūlaṃ vā tadeva vā bhaṇḍaṃ dātabbanti attho. No ce
atk-vin01a0:1327_4: deti, sāmikassa dhuranikkhepe pārājikaṃ. Sace parassa kumbhiyā añño sappiṃ vā telaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1327_5: vā ākirati, tatra cāyaṃ theyyacittena telapivanakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ pakkhipati, vuttanayeneva
atk-vin01a0:1327_6: pārājikaṃ. Attano rittakumbhiyā parassa sappiṃ vā telaṃ vā ākiraṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā theyyacittena
atk-vin01a0:1327_7: bhaṇḍaṃ nikkhipati, pubbe vuttanayeneva uddhāre pārājikaṃ. Suddhacitto nikkhipitvā
atk-vin01a0:1327_8: pacchā theyyacittena uddharati, pārājikameva. Suddhacittova uddharati, neva avahāro,
atk-vin01a0:1327_9: na gīvā; mahāpaccariyaṃ pana anāpattimattameva vuttaṃ. “‘Kissa mama kumbhiyaṃ telaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1327_10: ākirasī’ti kupito attano bhaṇḍaṃ uddharitvā chaḍḍeti, no bhaṇḍadeyya”nti kurundiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1327_11: vuttaṃ. Theyyacittena mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ gahetvā kumbhiṃ āviñchati telaṃ gaḷetukāmo, pādagghanake
atk-vin01a0:1327_12: gaḷite pārājikaṃ. Theyyacitteneva jajjaraṃ karoti “savitvā gamissatī”ti pādagghanake
atk-vin01a0:1327_13: savitvā gate pārājikaṃ. Theyyacitteneva chiddaṃ karoti omaṭṭhaṃ vā ummaṭṭhaṃ vā vemaṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1327_14: vā, idaṃ pana sammohaṭṭhānaṃ; tasmā suṭṭhu sallekkhetabbaṃ. Ayañhettha vinicchayo
atk-vin01a0:1327_15: – omaṭṭhaṃ nāma adhomukhachiddaṃ; ummaṭṭhaṃ nāma uddhaṃmukhachiddaṃ; vemaṭṭhaṃ nāma
atk-vin01a0:1327_16: uḷuṅkasseva ujugatachiddaṃ. Tatra omaṭṭhassa bahi paṭṭhāya katassa abbhantarantato
atk-vin01a0:1327_17: pādagghanake tele gaḷite bahi anikkhantepi pārājikaṃ. Kasmā? Yasmā tato gaḷitamattameva
atk-vin01a0:1327_18: bahigataṃ nāma hoti, na kumbhigatasaṅkhyaṃ labhati. Anto paṭṭhāya katassa bāhirantato
atk-vin01a0:1327_19: pādagghanake gaḷite pārājikaṃ. Ummaṭṭhassa yathā tathā vā katassa bāhirantato pādagghanake
atk-vin01a0:1327_20: gaḷite pārājikaṃ. Tañhi yāva bāhirantato na gaḷati, tāva kumbhigatameva hoti. “Vemaṭṭhassa
atk-vin01a0:1327_21: ca kapālamajjhato gaḷitavasena kāretabbo”ti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana anto ca
atk-vin01a0:1327_22: bahi ca paṭṭhāya majjhe ṭhapetvā katachidde taḷākassa ca mariyādabhedena sameti.
atk-vin01a0:1327_23: Anto paṭṭhāya kate pana bāhirantena, bahi paṭṭhāya kate abbhantarantena kāretabboti
atk-vin01a0:1327_24: idamettha yuttaṃ. Yo pana “vaṭṭitvā gacchissatī”ti theyyacittena kumbhiyā ādhārakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1327_25: vā upatthambhanaleḍḍuke vā apaneti, vaṭṭitvā gatāya pārājikaṃ. Telākiraṇabhāvaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:1327_26: ñatvā rittakumbhiyā jajjarabhāve vā chiddesu vā katesu pacchā nikkhantatelappamāṇena
atk-vin01a0:1327_27: bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ hoti. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana katthaci pārājikantipi likhitaṃ, taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1328_0: Paripuṇṇāya kumbhiyā upari kathalaṃ vā pāsāṇaṃ vā “patitvā bhindissati, tato telaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1328_1: paggharissatī”ti theyyacittena dubbandhaṃ vā karoti, duṭṭhapitaṃ vā ṭhapeti, avassapatanakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1328_2: tathā karontassa katamatte pārājikaṃ. Rittakumbhiyā upari karoti, taṃ pacchā puṇṇakāle
atk-vin01a0:1328_3: patitvā bhindati, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu bhaṇḍassa natthikāle katapayogattā
atk-vin01a0:1328_4: āditova pārājikaṃ na hoti. Bhaṇḍavināsadvārassa pana katattā bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ hoti. Āharāpentesu
atk-vin01a0:1329_0: Theyyacittena mātikaṃ ujukaṃ karoti “vaṭṭitvā vā gamissati, velaṃ vā uttarāpessatī”ti;
atk-vin01a0:1329_1: vaṭṭitvā vā gacchatu, velaṃ vā uttaratu, ujukaraṇakāle pārājikaṃ. Īdisā hi payogā
atk-vin01a0:1329_2: pubbapayogāvahāre saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Sukkhamātikāya ujukatāya pacchā udake āgate
atk-vin01a0:1329_3: vaṭṭitvā vā gacchatu, velaṃ vā uttaratu, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Kasmā? Ṭhānā cāvanapayogassa
atk-vin01a0:1329_4: abhāvā. Tassa lakkhaṇaṃ nāvaṭṭhe āvi bhavissati.
atk-vin01a0:1330_0: Tattheva bhindati vātiādīsu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva vuttaṃ – “bhindati vāti muggarena
atk-vin01a0:1330_1: pothetvā bhindati. Chaḍḍeti vāti udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā ākiritvā uttarāpeti. Jhāpeti
atk-vin01a0:1330_2: vāti dārūni āharitvā jhāpeti. Aparibhogaṃ vā karotīti akhāditabbaṃ vā apātabbaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:1330_3: karoti; uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā visaṃ vā ucchiṭṭhaṃ vā kuṇapaṃ vā pātesi, āpatti dukkaṭassāti
atk-vin01a0:1330_4: ṭhānācāvanassa natthitāya dukkaṭaṃ, buddhavisayo nāmeso. Kiñcāpi dukkaṭaṃ, āharāpente
atk-vin01a0:1330_5: pana bhaṇḍadeyya”nti. Tattha purimadvayaṃ na sameti. Tañhi kumbhijajjarakaraṇena
atk-vin01a0:1330_6: ca mātikāujukaraṇena ca saddhiṃ ekalakkhaṇaṃ. Pacchimaṃ pana dvayaṃ ṭhānā acāventenāpi
atk-vin01a0:1330_7: sakkā kātuṃ. Tasmā ettha evaṃ vinicchayaṃ vadanti – “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kira ‘ṭhānā cāvanassa
atk-vin01a0:1330_8: natthitāya dukkaṭa’nti idaṃ pacchimadvayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ṭhānā cāvanaṃ akarontoyeva
