atk-vin01a0:1473_0: Padasā nessāmīti tajjento vā paharanto vā “ito gacchāhī”ti vadati, tena vuttadisābhāgaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1473_1: gacchantassa dutiyapadavārena pārājikaṃ. Yepi tena saddhiṃ ekacchandā honti, sabbesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1473_2: ekakkhaṇe pārājikaṃ. Bhikkhu dāsaṃ disvā sukhadukkhaṃ pucchitvā vā apucchitvā vā
atk-vin01a0:1473_3: “gaccha, palāyitvā sukhaṃ jīvā”ti vadati, so ce palāyati, dutiyapadavāre pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1473_4: Taṃ attano samīpaṃ āgataṃ añño “palāyā”ti vadati, sace bhikkhusataṃ paṭipāṭiyā attano
atk-vin01a0:1473_5: samīpamāgataṃ vadati, sabbesaṃ pārājikaṃ. Yo pana vegasā palāyantaṃyeva “palāya,
atk-vin01a0:1473_6: yāva taṃ sāmikā na gaṇhantī”ti bhaṇati, anāpatti pārājikassa. Sace pana saṇikaṃ gacchantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1473_7: bhaṇati, so ca tassa vacanena sīghaṃ gacchati, pārājikaṃ. Palāyitvā aññaṃ gāmaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:1473_8: desaṃ vā gataṃ disvā tatopi palāpentassa pārājikameva.
atk-vin01a0:1474: Adinnādānaṃ nāma pariyāyena muccati. Yo hi evaṃ vadati – “tvaṃ idha kiṃ karosi,
atk-vin01a0:1475_0: Kiṃ te palāyituṃ na vaṭṭatīti vā, kiṃ katthaci gantvā sukhaṃ jīvituṃ na vaṭṭatīti
atk-vin01a0:1475_1: vā, dāsadāsiyo palāyitvā amukaṃ nāma padesaṃ gantvā sukhaṃ jīvantī”ti vā, so ca tassa
atk-vin01a0:1475_2: vacanaṃ sutvā palāyati, avahāro natthi. Yopi “mayaṃ amukaṃ nāma padesaṃ gacchāma,
atk-vin01a0:1475_3: tatrāgatā sukhaṃ jīvanti, amhehi ca saddhiṃ gacchantānaṃ antarāmaggepi pātheyyādīhi
atk-vin01a0:1475_4: kilamatho natthī”ti vatvā sukhaṃ attanā saddhiṃ āgacchantaṃ gahetvā gacchati maggagamanavasena,
atk-vin01a0:1475_5: na theyyacittena; nevatthi avahāro. Antarāmagge ca coresu uṭṭhitesu “are! Corā uṭṭhitā,
atk-vin01a0:1475_6: vegena palāya, ehi yāhī”ti vadantassāpi corantarāya mocanatthāya vuttattā avahāraṃ na vadantīti.
atk-vin01a0:1478: Apadesu ahi nāma sassāmiko ahituṇḍikādīhi gahitasappo; yaṃ kīḷāpentā
atk-vin01a0:1479_0: Aḍḍhampi pādampi kahāpaṇampi labhanti, muñcantāpi hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā gahetvāva
atk-vin01a0:1479_1: muñcanti. Te kassaci bhikkhuno nisinnokāsaṃ gantvā sappakaraṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā niddāyanti
atk-vin01a0:1479_2: vā, katthaci vā gacchanti, tatra ce so bhikkhu theyyacittena taṃ karaṇḍaṃ āmasati,
atk-vin01a0:1479_3: dukkaṭaṃ. Phandāpeti, thullaccayaṃ. Ṭhānā cāveti, pārājikaṃ. Sace pana karaṇḍakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1479_4: ugghāṭetvā sappaṃ gīvāya gaṇhāti, dukkaṭaṃ. Uddharati, thullaccayaṃ. Ujukaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:1479_5: uddharantassa karaṇḍatalato sappassa naṅguṭṭhe kesaggamatte mutte pārājikaṃ. Ghaṃsitvā
atk-vin01a0:1479_6: kaḍḍhantassa naṅguṭṭhe mukhavaṭṭito muttamatte pārājikaṃ. Karaṇḍamukhaṃ īsakaṃ vivaritvā
atk-vin01a0:1479_7: pahāraṃ vā datvā “ehi, re”ti nāmena pakkositvā nikkhāmeti, pārājikaṃ. Tatheva vivaritvā
atk-vin01a0:1479_8: maṇḍūkasaddaṃ vā mūsikasaddaṃ vā lājāvikiraṇaṃ vā katvā nāmena pakkosati, accharaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1479_9: vā paharati, evaṃ nikkhantepi pārājikaṃ. Mukhaṃ avivaritvāpi evaṃ kate chāto sappo
atk-vin01a0:1479_10: sīsena karaṇḍapuṭaṃ āhacca okāsaṃ katvā palāyati, pārājikameva. Sace pana mukhe vivarite
atk-vin01a0:1479_11: sayameva sappo nikkhamitvā palāyati, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Athāpi mukhaṃ vivaritvā vā avivaritvā
atk-vin01a0:1479_12: vā kevalaṃ maṇḍūkamūsikasaddaṃ lājāvikiraṇameva ca karoti, na nāmaṃ gahetvā pakkosati,
atk-vin01a0:1479_13: na accharaṃ vā paharati, sappo ca chātattā “maṇḍūkādīni khādissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā
atk-vin01a0:1479_14: palāyati, bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Maccho kevalaṃ idha apadaggahaṇena āgato. Yaṃ panettha
atk-vin01a0:1482_0: 115. Dvipadesu – ye avaharituṃ sakkā, te dassento “manussā pakkhajātā”ti āha. Devatā
atk-vin01a0:1482_1: pana avaharituṃ na sakkā. Pakkhā jātā etesanti pakkhajātā. Te lomapakkhā cammapakkhā
atk-vin01a0:1482_2: aṭṭhipakkhāti tividhā. Tattha morakukkuṭādayo lomapakkhā, vagguliādayo cammapakkhā,
atk-vin01a0:1482_3: bhamarādayo aṭṭhipakkhāti veditabbā. Te sabbepi manussā ca pakkhajātā ca kevalaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1482_4: idha dvipadaggahaṇena āgatā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ ākāsaṭṭhe ca pāṇe ca vuttanayamevāti.
atk-vin01a0:1485_0: 116. Catuppadesu – pasukāti pāḷiyaṃ āgatāvasesā sabbā catuppadajātīti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1485_1: Hatthiādayo pākaṭāyeva. Tattha theyyacittena hatthiṃ āmasantassa dukkaṭaṃ, phandāpentassa
atk-vin01a0:1485_2: thullaccayaṃ. Yo pana mahābalo balamadena taruṇaṃ bhiṅkacchāpaṃ nābhimūle sīsena
atk-vin01a0:1485_3: uccāretvā gaṇhanto cattāro pāde, soṇḍaṃ ca bhūmito kesaggamattampi moceti, pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1485_4: Hatthī pana koci hatthisālāyaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapito hoti, koci abaddhova tiṭṭhati, koci
atk-vin01a0:1485_5: antovatthumhi tiṭṭhati, koci rājaṅgaṇe tiṭṭhati, tattha hatthisālāyaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā
atk-vin01a0:1485_6: ṭhapitassa gīvābandhanañca cattāro ca pādāti pañca ṭhānāni honti. Gīvāya ca ekasmiñca
atk-vin01a0:1485_7: pāde ayasaṅkhalikāya baddhassa cha ṭhānāni. Gīvāya ca dvīsu ca pādesu baddhassa satta
atk-vin01a0:1485_8: ṭhānāni. Tesaṃ vasena phandāpanaṭhānācāvanāni veditabbāni. Abaddhassa sakalā hatthisālā
atk-vin01a0:1485_9: ṭhānaṃ. Tato atikkamane, pārājikaṃ. Antovatthumhi ṭhitassa sakalaṃ antovatthumeva
atk-vin01a0:1485_10: ṭhānaṃ. Tassa vatthudvārātikkamane pārājikaṃ. Rājaṅgaṇe ṭhitassa sakalanagaraṃ ṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1485_11: Tassa nagaradvārātikkamane pārājikaṃ. Bahinagare ṭhitassa ṭhitaṭṭhānameva ṭhānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1485_12: Taṃ haranto padavārena kāretabbo. Nipannassa ekameva ṭhānaṃ. Taṃ theyyacittena uṭṭhāpentassa
atk-vin01a0:1485_13: uṭṭhitamatte pārājikaṃ. Assepi ayameva vinicchayo. Sace pana so catūsu pādesu baddho
atk-vin01a0:1485_14: hoti, aṭṭha ṭhānāni veditabbāni. Esa nayo oṭṭhepi.
atk-vin01a0:1486_0: Goṇopi koci gehe bandhitvā ṭhapito hoti. Koci abaddhova tiṭṭhati, koci pana vaje
atk-vin01a0:1486_1: bandhitvā ṭhapito hoti, koci abaddhova tiṭṭhati. Tattha gehe bandhitvā ṭhapitassa
atk-vin01a0:1486_2: cattāro pādā, bandhanañcāti pañca ṭhānāni; abaddhassa sakalaṃ gehaṃ. Vajepi baddhassa
atk-vin01a0:1486_3: pañca ṭhānāni. Abaddhassa sakalo vajo. Taṃ vajadvāraṃ atikkāmeti, pārājikaṃ. Vajaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1486_4: bhinditvā haranto khaṇḍadvāraṃ atikkāmeti, pārājikaṃ. Dvāraṃ vā vivaritvā vajaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:1486_5: bhinditvā bahi ṭhito nāmena pakkositvā nikkhāmeti, pārājikaṃ. Sākhābhaṅgaṃ dassetvā
atk-vin01a0:1486_6: pakkosantassāpi eseva nayo. Dvāraṃ avivaritvā vajaṃ abhinditvā sākhābhaṅgaṃ cāletvā
atk-vin01a0:1486_7: pakkosati, goṇo chātatāya vajaṃ laṅghetvā nikkhamati, pārājikameva. Sace pana dvāre
atk-vin01a0:1486_8: vivarite vaje vā bhinne sayameva nikkhamati, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Dvāraṃ vivaritvā vā avivaritvā
atk-vin01a0:1486_9: vā vajampi bhinditvā vā abhinditvā vā kevalaṃ sākhābhaṅgaṃ cāleti, na pakkosati,
atk-vin01a0:1486_10: goṇo chātatāya padasā vā laṅghetvā vā nikkhamati, bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Eko majjhe gāme
atk-vin01a0:1486_11: baddho ṭhito, eko nipanno. Ṭhitagoṇassa pañca ṭhānāni honti, nipannassa dve ṭhānāni;
atk-vin01a0:1487_0: Yo pana nipannaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā tattheva ghāteti, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Suparikkhitte pana
atk-vin01a0:1487_1: dvārayutte gāme ṭhitagoṇassa sakalagāmo ṭhānaṃ. Aparikkhitte ṭhitassa vā carantassa
atk-vin01a0:1487_2: vā pādehi akkantaṭṭhānameva ṭhānaṃ gadrabhapasukāsupi ayameva vinicchayoti.
atk-vin01a0:1490: 117. Bahuppadesu – sace ekāya satapadiyā vatthu pūrati, taṃ padasā nentassa navanavuti thullaccayāni, ekaṃ pārājikaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-vin01a0:1493_0: 118. Ocaratīti ocarako, tattha tattha anto anupavisatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ocaritvāti
atk-vin01a0:1493_1: sallakkhetvā, upadhāretvāti attho. Ācikkhatīti parakulesu vā vihārādīsu vā duṭṭhapitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1493_2: asaṃvihitārakkhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ aññassa corakammaṃ kātuṃ paṭibalassa āroceti. Āpatti ubhinnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1493_3: pārājikassāti avassaṃ hāriye bhaṇḍe ocarakassa āṇattikkhaṇe itarassa ṭhānācāvaneti
atk-vin01a0:1493_4: evaṃ āpatti ubhinnaṃ pārājikassa. Yo pana “puriso gehe natthi, bhaṇḍaṃ asukasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1493_5: nāma padese ṭhapitaṃ asaṃvihitārakkhaṃ, dvāraṃ asaṃvutaṃ, gatamatteneva sakkā harituṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1493_6: natthi nāma koci purisakārūpajīvī, yo taṃ gantvā hareyyā”tiādinā nayena pariyāyakathaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1493_7: karoti, tañca sutvā añño “ahaṃ dāni harissāmī”ti gantvā harati, tassa ṭhānācāvane
atk-vin01a0:1493_8: pārājikaṃ, itarassa pana anāpatti. Pariyāyena hi adinnādānato muccatīti.
atk-vin01a0:1496: Oṇiṃ rakkhatīti oṇirakkho. Yo parena attano vasanaṭṭhāne ābhataṃ bhaṇḍaṃ “idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1497_0: Tāva, bhante, muhuttaṃ oloketha, yāva ahaṃ idaṃ nāma kiccaṃ katvā āgacchāmī”ti vutto
atk-vin01a0:1497_1: rakkhati, tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tenevāha – “oṇirakkho nāma āhaṭaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gopento”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1497_2: Tattha oṇirakkho yebhuyyena bandhitvā laggetvā ṭhapitabhaṇḍaṃ amocetvāva heṭṭhā pasibbakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1497_3: vā puṭakaṃ vā chinditvā kiñcimattaṃ gahetvā sibbanādiṃ puna pākatikaṃ karoti, “evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1497_4: gaṇhissāmī”ti āmasanādīni karontassa anurupā āpattiyo veditabbāti.
atk-vin01a0:1500_0: Saṃvidhāya avahāro saṃvidāvahāro; aññamaññasaññattiyā katāvahāroti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṃvidahitvāti
atk-vin01a0:1500_1: ekacchandatāya ekajjhāsayatāya sammantayitvāti attho. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – sambahulā
atk-vin01a0:1500_2: bhikkhū “asukaṃ nāma gehaṃ gantvā, chadanaṃ vā bhinditvā, sandhiṃ vā chinditvā bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1500_3: harissāmā”ti saṃvidahitvā gacchanti. Tesu eko bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati. Tassuddhāre sabbesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1504_0: Tassāyaṃ attho – cattāro janā ācariyantevāsikā chamāsakaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ āharitukāmā
atk-vin01a0:1504_1: jātā. Tattha ācariyo “tvaṃ ekaṃ māsakaṃ hara, tvaṃ ekaṃ, tvaṃ ekaṃ, ahaṃ tayo harissāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1504_2: āha. Antevāsikesu pana paṭhamo “tumhe, bhante, tayo haratha, tvaṃ ekaṃ hara, tvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1504_3: ekaṃ, ahaṃ ekaṃ harissāmī”ti āha. Itarepi dve evameva āhaṃsu. Tattha antevāsikesu
atk-vin01a0:1504_4: ekamekassa ekeko māsako sāhatthiko hoti, tena nesaṃ dukkaṭāpattiyo; pañca āṇattikā,
atk-vin01a0:1504_5: tehi tiṇṇampi pārājikaṃ. Ācariyassa pana tayo sāhatthikā, tehissa thullaccayaṃ. Tayo
atk-vin01a0:1504_6: āṇattikā, tehipi thullaccayameva. Imasmiñhi adinnādānasikkhāpade sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa,
atk-vin01a0:1504_7: āṇattikaṃ vā sāhatthikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti. Sāhatthikaṃ pana sāhatthikeneva kāretabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1504_8: āṇattikaṃ āṇattikeneva. Tena vuttaṃ – “caturo janā saṃvidhāya…pe… pañhā mesā kusalehi cintitā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1505_0: Apica saṃvidāvahāre asammohatthaṃ “ekabhaṇḍaṃ ekaṭṭhānaṃ, ekabhaṇḍaṃ nānāṭhānaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1505_1: nānābhaṇḍaṃ ekaṭṭhānaṃ, nānābhaṇḍaṃ nānāṭhāna”nti idampi catukkaṃ atthato sallakkhetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1505_2: Tattha ekabhaṇḍaṃ ekaṭṭhānanti ekakulassa āpaṇaphalake pañcamāsakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ duṭṭhapitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1505_3: disvā sambahulā bhikkhū ekaṃ āṇāpenti “gacchetaṃ āharā”ti, tassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1505_4: Ekabhaṇḍaṃ nānāṭhānanti ekakulassa pañcasu āpaṇaphalakesu ekekamāsakaṃ duṭṭhapitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1505_5: disvā sambahulā ekaṃ āṇāpenti “gacchete āharā”ti, pañcamassa māsakassa uddhāre sabbesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1505_6: pārājikaṃ. Nānābhaṇḍaṃ ekaṭṭhānanti bahūnaṃ santakaṃ pañcamāsakaṃ vā atirekapañcamāsakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1505_7: vā agghanakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne duṭṭhapitaṃ disvā sambahulā ekaṃ āṇāpenti “gacchetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1505_8: āharā”ti, tassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājikaṃ. Nānābhaṇḍaṃ nānāṭhānanti pañcannaṃ kulānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1505_9: pañcasu āpaṇaphalakesu ekekamāsakaṃ duṭṭhapitaṃ disvā sambahulā ekaṃ āṇāpenti “gacchete
atk-vin01a0:1505_10: āharā”ti, pañcamassa māsakassa uddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājikanti.
atk-vin01a0:1508_1: Ettha ca “purebhattaṃ avaharā”ti vutte ajja vā purebhattaṃ avaharatu, sve vā, anāgate
atk-vin01a0:1508_2: vā saṃvacchare, natthi visaṅketo; ubhinnampi ocarake vuttanayeneva pārājikaṃ. Sace
atk-vin01a0:1508_3: pana “ajja purebhattaṃ avaharā”ti vutte sve purebhattaṃ avaharati, “ajjā”ti niyāmitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1508_4: taṃ saṅketaṃ atikkamma pacchā avahaṭaṃ hoti. Sace “sve purebhattaṃ avaharā”ti vutte
atk-vin01a0:1508_5: ajja purebhattaṃ avaharati, “sve”ti niyāmitaṃ taṃ saṅketaṃ appatvā pure avahaṭaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1508_6: hoti; evaṃ avaharantassa avahārakasseva pārājikaṃ, mūlaṭṭhassa anāpatti. “Sve purebhatta”nti
atk-vin01a0:1508_7: vutte tadaheva vā sve pacchābhattaṃ vā harantopi taṃ saṅketaṃ pure ca pacchā ca haratīti
atk-vin01a0:1508_9: cettha saṅketavisaṅketatā veditabbā. “Purebhattaṃ harā”ti vutte “purebhattameva harissāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1508_10: vāyamantassa pacchābhattaṃ hoti; ettha kathanti? Mahāsumatthero tāva āha – “purebhattapayogova
atk-vin01a0:1508_11: eso, tasmā mūlaṭṭho na muccatī”ti. Mahāpadumatthero panāha – “kālaparicchedaṃ atikkantattā
atk-vin01a0:1511_0: 120. Nimittakammanti saññuppādanatthaṃ kassaci nimittassa karaṇaṃ, taṃ “akkhiṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:1511_1: nikhaṇissāmī”tiādinā nayena tidhā vuttaṃ. Aññampi panettha hatthalaṅghana-pāṇippahāraaṅguliphoṭana-gīvunnāmana-ukkāsanādianekappakāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1514_0: 121. Idāni etesveva saṅketakammanimittakammesu asammohatthaṃ “bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:1514_1: Tattha so taṃ maññamāno tanti so avahārako yaṃ āṇāpakena nimittasaññaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1514_2: taṃ etanti maññamāno tameva avaharati, ubhinnaṃ pārājikaṃ. So taṃ maññamāno aññanti
atk-vin01a0:1514_3: yaṃ avaharāti vuttaṃ, taṃ etanti maññamāno aññaṃ tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhapitaṃ avaharati,
atk-vin01a0:1514_4: mūlaṭṭhassa anāpatti. Aññaṃ maññamāno tanti āṇāpakena nimittasaññaṃ katvā vuttabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1514_5: appagghaṃ, idaṃ aññaṃ tasseva samīpe ṭhapitaṃ sārabhaṇḍanti evaṃ aññaṃ maññamāno
atk-vin01a0:1514_6: tameva avaharati, ubhinnampi pārājikaṃ. Aññaṃ maññamāno aññanti purimanayeneva idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1514_7: aññaṃ tasseva samīpe ṭhapitaṃ sārabhaṇḍanti maññati, tañce aññameva hoti, tasseva pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1515_1: antevāsikā daṭṭhabbā. Tattha bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetīti ācariyo kiñci bhaṇḍaṃ katthaci
atk-vin01a0:1515_2: sallakkhetvā tassa haraṇatthāya buddharakkhitaṃ āṇāpeti. Itthannāmassa pāvadāti gaccha
atk-vin01a0:1515_3: tvaṃ, buddharakkhita, etamatthaṃ dhammarakkhitassa pāvada. Itthannāmo itthannāmassa
atk-vin01a0:1515_4: pāvadatūti dhammarakkhitopi saṅgharakkhitassa pāvadatu. Itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1515_5: avaharatūti evaṃ tayā āṇattena dhammarakkhitena āṇatto saṅgharakkhito itthannāmaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1515_6: bhaṇḍaṃ avaharatu, so hi amhesu vīrajātiko paṭibalo imasmiṃ kammeti. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti
atk-vin01a0:1515_7: evaṃ āṇāpentassa ācariyassa tāva dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana sā āṇatti yathādhippāyaṃ gacchati,
atk-vin01a0:1515_8: yaṃ parato thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, āṇattikkhaṇe tadeva hoti. Atha taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avassaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1515_9: hāriyaṃ hoti, yaṃ parato “sabbesaṃ āpatti pārājikassā”ti vuttaṃ, tato imassa taṅkhaṇeyeva
atk-vin01a0:1515_10: pārājikaṃ hotīti ayaṃ yutti sabbattha veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1516_0: So itarassa ārocetīti buddharakkhito dhammarakkhitassa, dhammarakkhito ca saṅgharakkhitassa
atk-vin01a0:1516_1: “amhākaṃ ācariyo evaṃ vadati – ‘itthannāmaṃ kira bhaṇḍaṃ avahara, tvaṃ kira amhesu
atk-vin01a0:1516_2: ca vīrapuriso”’ti āroceti, evaṃ tesampi dukkaṭaṃ. Avahārako paṭiggaṇhātīti “sādhu
atk-vin01a0:1516_3: harissāmī”ti saṅgharakkhito sampaṭicchati. Mūlaṭṭhassa āpatti thullaccayassāti saṅgharakkhitena
atk-vin01a0:1516_4: paṭiggahitamatte ācariyassa thullaccayaṃ, mahājano hi tena pāpe niyojitoti. So taṃ
atk-vin01a0:1516_5: bhaṇḍanti so ce saṅgharakkhito taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati, sabbesaṃ catunnampi janānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1516_6: pārājikaṃ. Na kevalañca catunnaṃ, etena upāyena visaṅketaṃ akatvā paramparāya āṇāpentaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1516_7: samaṇasataṃ samaṇasahassaṃ vā hotu, sabbesaṃ pārājikameva.
atk-vin01a0:1517_0: Dutiyavāre – so aññaṃ āṇāpetīti so ācariyena āṇatto buddharakkhito dhammarakkhitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1517_1: adisvā vā avattukāmo vā hutvā saṅgharakkhitameva upasaṅkamitvā “amhākaṃ ācariyo evamāha
atk-vin01a0:1517_2: – ‘itthannāmaṃ kira bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”’ti āṇāpeti. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti āṇattiyā tāva
atk-vin01a0:1517_3: buddharakkhitassa dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassāti saṅgharakkhitena sampaṭicchite
atk-vin01a0:1517_4: mūlaṭṭhasseva dukkaṭanti veditabbaṃ. Sace pana so taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati, āṇāpakassa
atk-vin01a0:1517_5: ca buddharakkhitassa, avahārakassa ca saṅgharakkhitassāti ubhinnampi pārājikaṃ. Mūlaṭṭhassa
atk-vin01a0:1517_6: pana ācariyassa visaṅketattā pārājikena anāpatti. Dhammarakkhitassa ajānanatāya sabbena
atk-vin01a0:1517_7: sabbaṃ anāpatti. Buddharakkhito pana dvinnaṃ sotthibhāvaṃ katvā attanā naṭṭho.
atk-vin01a0:1518_0: Ito paresu catūsu āṇattivāresu paṭhame tāva so gantvā puna paccāgacchatīti bhaṇḍaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1518_1: gantvā anto ca bahi ca ārakkhaṃ disvā avaharituṃ asakkonto āgacchati. Yadā sakkosi,
atk-vin01a0:1518_2: tadāti kiṃ ajjeva avahaṭaṃ hoti? Gaccha yadā sakkosi tadā naṃ avaharāti. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti
atk-vin01a0:1518_3: evaṃ puna āṇattiyāpi dukkaṭameva hoti. Sace pana taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avassaṃ hāriyaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a0:1518_4: atthasādhakacetanā nāma maggānantaraphalasadisā, tasmā ayaṃ āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pārājiko.
atk-vin01a0:1518_5: Sacepi avahārako saṭṭhivassātikkamena taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati, āṇāpako ca antarāyeva
atk-vin01a0:1518_6: kālaṃ vā karoti, hīnāya vā āvattati; assamaṇova hutvā kālaṃ vā karissati, hīnāya
atk-vin01a0:1518_7: vā āvattissati, avahārakassa pana avahārakkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1519: Dutiyavāre – yasmā taṃ saṇikaṃ vā bhaṇanto tassa vā badhiratāya “mā avaharī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1520: Etaṃ vacanaṃ na sāveti, tasmā mūlaṭṭho na mutto. Tatiyavāre – pana sāvitattā mutto. Catutthavāre – tena ca sāvitattā, itarena ca “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā oratattā ubhopi muttāti.
atk-vin01a0:1523_0: 122. Idāni tattha tattha ṭhānā cāvanavasena vuttassa adinnādānassa aṅgaṃ vatthubhedena
atk-vin01a0:1523_1: ca āpattibhedaṃ dassento “pañcahi ākārehī”tiādimāha. Tattha pañcahi ākārehīti pañcahi
atk-vin01a0:1523_2: kāraṇehi; pañcahi aṅgehīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – adinnaṃ ādiyantassa
atk-vin01a0:1523_3: “parapariggahitañca hotī”tiādinā nayena vuttehi pañcahākārehi pārājikaṃ hoti, na
atk-vin01a0:1523_4: tato ūnehīti. Tatrime pañca ākārā – parapariggahitaṃ, parapariggahitasaññitā, parikkhārassa
atk-vin01a0:1523_5: garukabhāvo, theyyacittaṃ, ṭhānācāvananti. Ito parehi pana dvīhi vārehi lahuke parikkhāre
atk-vin01a0:1524_0: 125. “Chahākārehī”tiādinā nayena vuttavārattaye pana na sakasaññitā, na vissāsaggāhitā,
atk-vin01a0:1524_1: na tāvakālikatā, parikkhārassa garukabhāvo, theyyacittaṃ, ṭhānācāvananti evaṃ cha
atk-vin01a0:1524_2: ākārā veditabbā. Vatthubhedena panetthāpi paṭhamavāre pārājikaṃ. Dutiyatatiyesu thullaccayadukkaṭāni
atk-vin01a0:1524_3: vuttāni. Tato paresu pana tīsu vāresu vijjamānepi vatthubhede vatthussa parehi apariggahitattā
atk-vin01a0:1524_4: dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ. Tatra yadetaṃ “na ca parapariggahita”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ anajjhāvutthakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1524_5: vā hotu chaḍḍitaṃ chinnamūlakaṃ assāmikavatthu, attano santakaṃ vā, ubhayampi “na
atk-vin01a0:1524_6: ca parapariggahita”ntveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Yasmā panettha parapariggahitasaññā
atk-vin01a0:1524_7: ca atthi, theyyacittena ca gahitaṃ, tasmā anāpatti na vuttāti.
atk-vin01a0:1527_0: 131. Evaṃ vatthuvasena ca cittavasena ca āpattibhedaṃ dassetvā idāni anāpattibhedaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1527_2: santakaṃ idaṃ bhaṇḍa”nti evaṃ sasaññissa parabhaṇḍampi gaṇhato gahaṇe anāpatti, gahitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1527_3: pana puna dātabbaṃ. Sace sāmikehi “dehī”ti vutto na deti, tesaṃ dhuranikkhepe pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1528_0: Vissāsaggāheti vissāsaggahaṇepi anāpatti. Vissāsaggāhalakkhaṇaṃ pana iminā suttena
atk-vin01a0:1528_1: jānitabbaṃ – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa vissāsaṃ gahetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1528_2: – sandiṭṭho ca hoti, sambhatto ca, ālapito ca, jīvati ca, gahite ca attamano”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1528_3: Tattha sandiṭṭhoti diṭṭhamattakamitto, sambhattoti daḷhamitto, ālapitoti “mama santakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1528_4: yaṃ icchasi, taṃ gaṇheyyāsi, āpucchitvā gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ natthī”ti vutto. Jīvatīti
atk-vin01a0:1528_5: anuṭṭhānaseyyāya sayitopi yāva jīvitindriyupacchedaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Gahite ca attamanoti
atk-vin01a0:1528_6: gahite tuṭṭhacitto hoti, evarūpassa santakaṃ “gahite me attamano bhavissatī”ti jānantena
atk-vin01a0:1528_7: gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Anavasesapariyādānavasena cetāni pañcaṅgāni vuttāni. Vissāsaggāho
atk-vin01a0:1528_8: pana tīhi aṅgehi ruhati – sandiṭṭho, jīvati, gahite attamano; sambhatto, jīvati,
atk-vin01a0:1528_9: gahite attamano; ālapito, jīvati, gahite attamanoti.
atk-vin01a0:1529_0: Yo pana na jīvati, na ca gahite attamano hoti; tassa santakaṃ vissāsaggāhena gahitampi
atk-vin01a0:1529_1: puna dātabbaṃ. Dadamānena ca matakadhanaṃ tāva ye tassa dhane issarā gahaṭṭhā vā
atk-vin01a0:1529_2: pabbajitā vā, tesaṃ dātabbaṃ. Anattamanassa santakaṃ tasseva dātabbaṃ. Yo pana paṭhamaṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:1529_3: “suṭṭhu kataṃ tayā mama santakaṃ gaṇhantenā”ti vacībhedena vā cittuppādamattena vā
atk-vin01a0:1529_4: anumoditvā pacchā kenaci kāraṇena kupito, paccāharāpetuṃ na labhati. Yopi adātukāmo
atk-vin01a0:1529_5: cittena pana adhivāseti, na kiñci vadati, sopi puna paccāharāpetuṃ na labhati. Yo
atk-vin01a0:1529_6: pana “mayā tumhākaṃ santakaṃ gahitaṃ vā paribhuttaṃ vā”ti vutte “gahitaṃ vā hotu
atk-vin01a0:1529_7: paribhuttaṃ vā, mayā pana taṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena ṭhapitaṃ, pākatikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1530_0: Tāvakāliketi “paṭidassāmi paṭikarissāmī”ti evaṃ gaṇhantassa tāvakālikepi gahaṇe anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:1530_1: Gahitaṃ pana sace bhaṇḍasāmiko puggalo vā gaṇo vā “tuyhevetaṃ hotū”ti anujānāti,
atk-vin01a0:1530_2: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce anujānāti, āharāpente dātabbaṃ. Saṅghasantakaṃ pana paṭidātumeva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1531_0: Petapariggaheti ettha pana pettivisaye upapannāpi kālaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve
atk-vin01a0:1531_1: nibbattāpi cātumahārājikādayo devāpi sabbe “petā” tveva saṅkhyaṃ gatā, tesaṃ pariggahe
atk-vin01a0:1531_2: anāpatti. Sacepi hi sakko devarājā āpaṇaṃ pasāretvā nisinno hoti, dibbacakkhuko ca
atk-vin01a0:1531_3: bhikkhu taṃ ñatvā attano cīvaratthāya satasahassagghanakampi sāṭakaṃ tassa “mā gaṇha,
atk-vin01a0:1531_4: mā gaṇhā”ti vadantassāpi gahetvā gacchati, vaṭṭati. Devatā pana uddissa balikammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1532_0: Tiracchānagatapariggaheti tiracchānagatānampi pariggahe anāpatti. Sacepi hi nāgarājā
atk-vin01a0:1532_1: vā supaṇṇamāṇavako vā manussarūpena āpaṇaṃ pasāreti, tato cassa santakaṃ koci bhikkhu
atk-vin01a0:1532_2: purimanayeneva gahetvā gacchati, vaṭṭati. Sīho vā byaggho vā migamahiṃsādayo vadhitvā
atk-vin01a0:1532_3: khādanto jighacchāpīḷito āditova na vāretabbo. Anatthampi hi kareyya. Yadi pana thoke
atk-vin01a0:1532_4: khāyite vāretuṃ sakkoti, vāretvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Senādayopi āmisaṃ gahetvā gacchante
atk-vin01a0:1533_0: Paṃsukūlasaññissāti assāmikaṃ “idaṃ paṃsukūla”nti evaṃsaññissāpi gahaṇe anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:1533_1: Sace pana taṃ sassāmikaṃ hoti, āharāpente dātabbaṃ. Ummattakassāti pubbe vuttappakārassa
atk-vin01a0:1533_2: ummattakassāpi anāpatti. Ādikammikassāti idha dhaniyo ādikammiko, tassa anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:1539_0: Imasmiṃ pana pakiṇṇake idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – sāhatthikaṃ kāyato ca cittato
atk-vin01a0:1539_1: ca samuṭṭhāti, āṇattikaṃ vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, sāhatthikāṇattikaṃ kāyato
atk-vin01a0:1539_2: ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti. Kiriyāsamuṭṭhānañca, karontoyeva hi etaṃ āpajjati
atk-vin01a0:1539_3: na akaronto. “Adinnaṃ ādiyāmī”ti saññāya abhāvena muccanato saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1539_4: lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tuṭṭho vā bhīto vā majjhatto vā
atk-vin01a0:1539_5: taṃ āpajjatīti tivedananti sabbaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1543_0: Dutiyavatthumhi – cittaṃ nāma puthujjanānaṃ rāgādivasena pakatiṃ vijahitvā dhāvati
atk-vin01a0:1543_1: sandhāvati vidhāvati. Sace bhagavā kāyavacīdvārabhedaṃ vināpi cittuppādamattena āpattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1543_2: paññapeyya, ko sakkuṇeyya anāpattikaṃ attānaṃ kātuṃ! Tenāha – “anāpatti bhikkhu cittuppāde”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1543_3: Cittavasikena pana na bhavitabbaṃ, paṭisaṅkhānabalena cittaṃ nivāretabbamevāti.
atk-vin01a0:1544: 133-4. Āmasana-phandāpana-ṭhānācāvanavatthūni uttānatthāneva. Tato parāni ca theyyacitto bhūmito aggahesīti vatthupariyosānāni.
atk-vin01a0:1545_0: 135. Niruttipathavatthusmiṃ 1.329 ādiyīti gaṇhi, “corosi tva”nti parāmasi. Itaro
atk-vin01a0:1545_1: pana “kena avahaṭa”nti vutte “mayā avahaṭa”nti pucchāsabhāgena paṭiññaṃ adāsi. Yadi
atk-vin01a0:1545_2: hi itarena “kena gahitaṃ, kena apanītaṃ, kena ṭhapita”nti vuttaṃ abhavissa, atha
atk-vin01a0:1545_3: ayampi “mayā gahitaṃ, apanītaṃ, ṭhapita”nti vā vadeyya. Mukhaṃ nāma bhuñjanatthāya
atk-vin01a0:1545_4: ca kathanatthāya ca kataṃ, theyyacittaṃ pana vinā avahāro natthi. Tenāha bhagavā
atk-vin01a0:1545_5: – “anāpatti bhikkhu niruttipathe”ti. Vohāravacanamatte anāpattīti attho. Tato paraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1546_0: 137. Abhinnasarīravatthusmiṃ adhivatthoti sāṭakataṇhāya tasmiṃyeva sarīre nibbatto.
atk-vin01a0:1546_1: Anādiyantoti tassa vacanaṃ agaṇhanto, ādaraṃ vā akaronto. Taṃ sarīraṃ uṭṭhahitvāti
atk-vin01a0:1546_2: peto attano ānubhāvena taṃ sarīraṃ uṭṭhāpesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “taṃ sarīraṃ uṭṭhahitvā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1546_3: Dvāraṃ thakesīti bhikkhussa susānasamīpeyeva vihāro, tasmā bhīrukajātiko bhikkhu
atk-vin01a0:1546_4: khippameva tattha pavisitvā dvāraṃ thakesi. Tattheva paripatīti dvāre thakite peto
atk-vin01a0:1546_5: sāṭake nirālayo hutvā taṃ sarīraṃ pahāya yathākammaṃ gato, tasmā taṃ sarīraṃ tattheva
atk-vin01a0:1547_0: Abhinne sarīreti abbhuṇhe allasarīre paṃsukūlaṃ na gahetabbaṃ, gaṇhantassa evarūpā
atk-vin01a0:1547_1: upaddavā honti, dukkaṭañca āpajjati. Bhinne pana gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Kittāvatā pana
atk-vin01a0:1547_2: bhinnaṃ hoti? Kāka-kulala-soṇa-siṅgālādīhi mukhatuṇḍakena vā dāṭhāya vā īsakaṃ phālitamattenāpi.
atk-vin01a0:1547_3: Yassa pana patato ghaṃsanena chavimattaṃ chinnaṃ hoti, cammaṃ acchinnaṃ, etaṃ abhinnameva;
atk-vin01a0:1547_4: camme pana chinne bhinnaṃ. Yassāpi sajīvakāleyeva pabhinnā gaṇḍakuṭṭhapiḷakā vā vaṇo
atk-vin01a0:1547_5: vā hoti, idampi bhinnaṃ. Tatiyadivasato pabhuti uddhumātakādibhāvena kuṇapabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1547_6: upagatampi bhinnameva. Sabbena sabbaṃ pana abhinnepi susānagopakehi vā aññehi vā
atk-vin01a0:1547_7: manussehi gāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. No ce aññaṃ labhati, satthakena vā kenaci vā vaṇaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:1547_8: gahetabbaṃ. Visabhāgasarīre pana satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā samaṇasaññaṃ uppādetvā sīse vā
atk-vin01a0:1547_9: hatthapādapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā vaṇaṃ katvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1549_0: 138. Tadanantare vatthusmiṃ kusaṃ saṅkāmetvā cīvaraṃ aggahesīti pubbe “ādiyeyyā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1550_0: Imesaṃ pana avahārānaṃ evaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ – yo hi koci sassāmikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ rattibhāge
atk-vin01a0:1550_1: vā divasabhāge vā sandhicchedādīni katvā adissamāno avaharati, kūṭamānakūṭakahāpaṇādīhi
atk-vin01a0:1550_2: vā vañcetvā gaṇhāti, tassevaṃ gaṇhato avahāro “theyyāvahāro”ti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1551_0: Yo pana pare pasayha balasā abhibhuyya, atha vā pana santajjetvā bhayaṃ dassetvā
atk-vin01a0:1551_1: tesaṃ santakaṃ gaṇhāti, panthaghāta-gāmaghātādīni karontā dāmarikacorā viya kodhavasena
atk-vin01a0:1551_2: paragharavilopaṃ karontā attano pattabalito ca adhikaṃ balakkārena gaṇhantā rāja-rājamahāmattādayo
atk-vin01a0:1552_0: Parikappetvā gaṇhato pana avahāro “parikappāvahāro”ti vuccati, so bhaṇḍaparikappa-okāsaparikappavasena
atk-vin01a0:1552_1: duvidho. Tatrāyaṃ bhaṇḍaparikappo – idhekacco sāṭakatthiko antogabbhaṃ pavisitvā
atk-vin01a0:1552_2: “sace sāṭako bhavissati, gaṇhissāmi; sace suttaṃ, na gaṇhissāmī”ti parikappetvā andhakāre
atk-vin01a0:1552_3: pasibbakaṃ gaṇhāti, sāṭako ce tatra hoti, uddhāreyeva pārājikaṃ. Suttaṃ ce hoti,
atk-vin01a0:1552_4: rakkhati. Bahi nīharitvā muñcitvā “sutta”nti ñatvā puna āharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapeti,
atk-vin01a0:1552_5: rakkhatiyeva. “Sutta”nti ñatvāpi “yaṃ laddhaṃ, taṃ gahetabba”nti gacchati, padavārena
atk-vin01a0:1552_6: kāretabbo. Bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā gaṇhāti, uddhāre pārājikaṃ. “Coro, coro”ti sāmikehi
atk-vin01a0:1552_7: pariyuṭṭhito chaḍḍetvā palāyati, rakkhati. Sāmikā taṃ disvā gaṇhanti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1552_8: Añño ce koci gaṇhāti, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Atha nivattesu sāmikesu sayameva taṃ disvā “pagevetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1552_9: mayā nīhaṭaṃ, mama dāni santaka”nti gaṇhāti, rakkhati; bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hoti. “Sace
atk-vin01a0:1552_10: suttaṃ bhavissati, gaṇhissāmi; sace sāṭako, na gaṇhissāmi. Sace sappi bhavissati,
atk-vin01a0:1552_11: gaṇhissāmi; sace telaṃ, na gaṇhissāmī”tiādinā nayena parikappetvā gaṇhantassāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:1553_0: Mahāpaccariyādīsu pana “sāṭakatthikopi sāṭakapasibbakameva gahetvā nikkhanto bahi
atk-vin01a0:1553_1: ṭhatvā muñcitvā ‘sāṭako aya’nti disvā gacchanto paduddhāreneva kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1553_2: Ettha pana “sace sāṭako bhavissati, gaṇhissāmī”ti parikappitattā parikappo dissati,
atk-vin01a0:1553_3: disvā haṭattā parikappāvahāro na dissati. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yaṃ parikappitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1553_4: taṃ adiṭṭhaṃ parikappitabhāve ṭhitaṃyeva uddharantassa avahāro vutto, tasmā tattha
atk-vin01a0:1553_5: parikappāvahāro dissati. “Taṃ maññamāno taṃ avaharī”ti pāḷiyā ca sametīti. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:1553_6: yvāyaṃ “sace sāṭako bhavissati, gaṇhissāmī”tiādinā nayena pavatto parikappo, ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1554_0: Okāsaparikappo pana evaṃ veditabbo – idhekacco lolabhikkhu parapariveṇaṃ vā kulagharaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1554_1: vā araññe kammantasālaṃ vā pavisitvā tattha kathāsallāpena nisinno kiñci lobhaneyyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1554_2: parikkhāraṃ oloketi, olokento ca pana disvā dvārapamukhaheṭṭhāpāsādapariveṇadvārakoṭṭhakarukkhamūlādivasena
atk-vin01a0:1554_3: paricchedaṃ katvā “sace maṃ etthantare passissanti, daṭṭhukāmatāya gahetvā vicaranto
atk-vin01a0:1554_4: viya etesaṃyeva dassāmi; no ce passissanti, harissāmī”ti parikappeti. Tassa taṃ ādāya
atk-vin01a0:1554_5: parikappitaparicchedaṃ atikkantamatte pārājikaṃ. Sace upacārasīmaṃ parikappeti, tadabhimukhova
atk-vin01a0:1554_6: gacchanto kammaṭṭhānādīni manasi karonto vā aññavihito vā asatiyā upacārasīmaṃ atikkamati,
atk-vin01a0:1554_7: bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Athāpissa taṃ ṭhānaṃ pattassa coro vā hatthī vā vāḷamigo vā mahāmegho
atk-vin01a0:1554_8: vā vuṭṭhahati, so ca tamhā upaddavā muccitukamyatāya sahasā taṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamati,
atk-vin01a0:1554_9: bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Keci panettha “yasmā mūleva theyyacittena gahitaṃ, tasmā na rakkhati,
atk-vin01a0:1554_10: avahāroyevā”ti vadanti. Ayaṃ tāva mahāaṭṭhakathānayo. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “sacepi
atk-vin01a0:1554_11: so antoparicchede hatthiṃ vā assaṃ vā abhiruhitvā taṃ neva pājeti, na pājāpeti; paricchede
atk-vin01a0:1554_12: atikkantepi pārājikaṃ natthi, bhaṇḍadeyyamevā”ti vuttaṃ. Tatra yvāyaṃ “sace maṃ etthantare
atk-vin01a0:1554_13: passissanti, daṭṭhukāmatāya gahetvā vicaranto viya etesaṃyeva dassāmī”ti pavatto
atk-vin01a0:1555: Evamimesaṃ dvinnampi parikappānaṃ vasena parikappetvā gaṇhato avahāro “parikappāvahāro”ti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1556_0: Paṭicchādetvā pana avaharaṇaṃ paṭicchannāvahāro. So evaṃ veditabbo – yo bhikkhu manussānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1556_1: uyyānādīsu kīḷantānaṃ vā pavisantānaṃ vā omuñcitvā ṭhapitaṃ alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ disvā
atk-vin01a0:1556_2: “sace onamitvā gahessāmi, ‘kiṃ samaṇo gaṇhātī’ti maṃ jānitvā viheṭheyyu”nti paṃsunā
atk-vin01a0:1556_3: vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādeti – “pacchā gaṇhissāmī”ti, tassa ettāvatā uddhāro natthīti
atk-vin01a0:1556_4: na tāva avahāro hoti. Yadā pana te manussā antogāmaṃ pavisitukāmā taṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ vicinantāpi
atk-vin01a0:1556_5: apassitvā “idāni andhakāro, sve jānissāmā”ti sālayā eva gatā honti. Athassa taṃ uddharato
atk-vin01a0:1556_6: uddhāre pārājikaṃ. “Paṭicchannakāleyeva taṃ mama santaka”nti sakasaññāya vā “gatā
atk-vin01a0:1556_7: dāni te, chaḍḍitabhaṇḍaṃ ida”nti paṃsukūlasaññāya vā gaṇhantassa pana bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1556_8: Tesu dutiyadivase āgantvā vicinitvā adisvā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā gatesupi gahitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1556_9: bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Kasmā? Yasmā tassa payogena tehi na diṭṭhaṃ, yo pana tathārūpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1556_10: bhaṇḍaṃ disvā yathāṭhāne ṭhitaṃyeva appaṭicchādetvā theyyacitto pādena akkamitvā
atk-vin01a0:1556_11: kaddame vā vālikāya vā paveseti, tassa pavesitamatteyeva pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1557_0: Kusaṃ saṅkāmetvā pana avaharaṇaṃ “kusāvahāro”ti vuccati. Sopi evaṃ veditabbo – yo
atk-vin01a0:1557_1: bhikkhu kusaṃ pātetvā cīvare bhājiyamāne attano koṭṭhāsassa samīpe ṭhitaṃ appagghataraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1557_2: vā mahagghataraṃ vā samasamaṃ vā agghena parassa koṭṭhāsaṃ haritukāmo attano koṭṭhāse
atk-vin01a0:1557_3: patitaṃ kusadaṇḍakaṃ parassa koṭṭhāse pātetukāmo uddharati, rakkhati tāva. Parassa
atk-vin01a0:1557_4: koṭṭhāse pāteti, rakkhateva. Yadā pana tasmiṃ patite parassa koṭṭhāsato parassa kusadaṇḍakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1557_5: uddharati, uddhaṭamatte pārājiko hoti. Sace paṭhamataraṃ parakoṭṭhāsato kusadaṇḍakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1557_6: uddharati attano koṭṭhāse pātetukāmatāya uddhāre rakkhati, pātane rakkhati. Attano
atk-vin01a0:1557_7: koṭṭhāsato pana attano kusadaṇḍakaṃ uddharati, uddhāreyeva rakkhati. Taṃ uddharitvā
atk-vin01a0:1558_0: Sace pana dvīsupi koṭṭhāsesu patitadaṇḍake adassanaṃ gameti, tato avasesabhikkhūsu
atk-vin01a0:1558_1: gatesu itaro “‘mayhaṃ, bhante, daṇḍako na paññāyatī’ti. ‘Mayhampi, āvuso, na paññāyatī’ti.
atk-vin01a0:1558_2: ‘Katamo pana, bhante, mayhaṃ bhāgo’ti? ‘Ayaṃ tuyhaṃ bhāgo”’ti attano bhāgaṃ dasseti,
atk-vin01a0:1558_3: tasmiṃ vivaditvā vā avivaditvā vā taṃ gaṇhitvā gate itaro tassa bhāgaṃ uddharati,
atk-vin01a0:1558_4: uddhāre pārājikaṃ. Sacepi tena “ahaṃ mama bhāgaṃ tuyhaṃ na demi, tvaṃ pana attano
atk-vin01a0:1558_5: bhāgaṃ ñatvā gaṇhā”ti vutte “nāyaṃ mamā”ti jānantopi tasseva bhāgaṃ gaṇhāti, uddhāre
atk-vin01a0:1558_6: pārājikaṃ. Sace pana itaro “ayaṃ tuyhaṃ bhāgo, ayaṃ mayhaṃ bhāgoti kiṃ iminā vivādenā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1558_7: cintetvā “mayhaṃ vā patto hotu, tumhākaṃ vā, yo varabhāgo taṃ tumhe gaṇhathā”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a0:1558_8: dinnakaṃ nāma gahitaṃ hoti, natthettha avahāro. Sacepi so vivādabhīruko bhikkhu “yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1558_9: tuyhaṃ ruccati, taṃ gaṇhā”ti vutto attano pattaṃ varabhāgaṃ ṭhapetvā lāmakaṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:1558_10: gahetvā gacchati, tato itarassa vicinitāvasesaṃ gaṇhantassāpi avahāro natthevāti.
atk-vin01a0:1559_1: ekaṃ āgataṃ, catunnampi pana paccayānaṃ uppattiñca bhājanīyañca nīharitvā dassetabba”nti
atk-vin01a0:1559_2: evañca vatvā cīvarakkhandhake“paṭiggaṇhātu me, bhante, bhagavā sīveyyakaṃ dussayugaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1559_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa ca gahapaticīvaraṃ anujānātū”ti idaṃ jīvakavatthuṃ ādiṃ katvā uppannacīvarakathā,
atk-vin01a0:1559_4: senāsanakkhandhake “tena kho pana samayena rājagahaṃ dubbhikkhaṃ hoti, manussā na
atk-vin01a0:1559_5: sakkonti saṅghabhattaṃ kātuṃ, icchanti uddesabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1559_6: uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ kātu”nti idaṃ suttamādiṃ katvā piṇḍapātakathā, senāsanakkhandhakeyeva
atk-vin01a0:1559_7: “tena kho pana samayena sattarasavaggiyā bhikkhū aññataraṃ paccantimaṃ mahāvihāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1559_8: paṭisaṅkharonti – ‘idha mayaṃ vassaṃ vasissāmā’ti. Addasaṃsu kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:1559_9: sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū vihāraṃ paṭisaṅkharonte”ti idaṃ chabbaggiyavatthuṃ ādiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1559_10: katvā āgatasenāsanakathā, tadavasāne ca sappiādibhesajjakathā vitthārena kathitā.
atk-vin01a0:1559_11: Mayaṃ pana taṃ sabbaṃ āgatāgataṭṭhāneyeva kathayissāma; evaṃ kathane kāraṇaṃ pubbe vuttameva.
atk-vin01a0:1562_0: 140. Pañcasu vighāsavatthūsu te bhikkhū anupasampannena kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paribhuñjiṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:1562_1: Vighāsaṃ pana gaṇhantena khāditāvasesaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Yadi sakkoti khādante
atk-vin01a0:1562_2: chaḍḍāpetvā gaṇhituṃ, etampi vaṭṭati. Attaguttatthāya pana parānuddayatāya ca na gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1563_1: puggalaṃ āha. Amūlakaṃ aggahesīti sāmikesu dentesu evaṃ aggahesi. Anāpatti bhikkhu
atk-vin01a0:1563_2: pārājikassāti sāmikehi dinnaṃ aggahesi; tenassa anāpatti vuttā. Āpatti sampajānamusāvāde
atk-vin01a0:1563_3: pācittiyassāti yo panānena sampajānamusāvādo vutto, tasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ āha; parato
atk-vin01a0:1563_4: tekaṭulayāguvatthumhi viya. Gahaṇe pana ayaṃ vinicchayo – saṅghassa santakaṃ sammatena
atk-vin01a0:1563_5: vā āṇattehi vā ārāmikādīhi diyyamānaṃ, gihīnañca santakaṃ sāmikena vā āṇattena vā
atk-vin01a0:1563_6: diyyamānaṃ “aparassa bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā gaṇhato bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Aññena diyyamānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1563_7: gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Asammatena vā anāṇattena vā diyyamāne “aparampi
atk-vin01a0:1563_8: bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhanto pattacatukke viya tassuddhāreyeva
atk-vin01a0:1563_9: bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Itarehi diyyamānaṃ evaṃ gaṇhato bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Sāmikena pana
atk-vin01a0:1563_10: “imassa dehī”ti dāpitaṃ vā sayaṃ dinnaṃ vā sudinnanti ayamettha sabbaaṭṭhakathāvinicchayato sāro.
atk-vin01a0:1564_1: nāma vikkāyikamaṃsapacanagharaṃ. Pūvagharaṃ nāma vikkāyikakhajjakapacanagharaṃ. Sesamettha,
atk-vin01a0:1565_0: 144. Pīṭhavatthusmiṃ – so bhikkhu parikappetvā “etaṃ ṭhānaṃ sampattaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1565_1: saṅkāmesi. Tenassa saṅkāmane avahāro natthi. Saṅkāmetvā pana parikappitokāsato gahaṇe
atk-vin01a0:1565_2: pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ haranto ca yadi pīṭhake theyyacittaṃ natthi, thavikaṃ agghāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:1565_3: kāretabbo. Atha pīṭhakepi atthi, ubho agghāpetvā kāretabboti. Bhisiādīni tīṇi vatthūni pākaṭāneva.
atk-vin01a0:1566_0: 146. Vissāsaggāhādīsu tīsu vatthūsu gahaṇe anāpatti, āharāpentesu bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Piṇḍāya
atk-vin01a0:1566_1: paviṭṭhassa paṭiviso antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitasseva gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Yadi pana dāyakā
atk-vin01a0:1566_2: “bahiupacāraṭṭhānampi bhante, bhāgaṃ gaṇhatha, āgantvā paribhuñjissantī”ti vadanti,
atk-vin01a0:1566_3: evaṃ antogāmaṭṭhānampi gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:1567_0: 148-9. Sattasu ambacorakādivatthūsu paṃsukūlasaññāya gahaṇe anāpatti, āharāpentesu
atk-vin01a0:1567_1: bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ, theyyacittena paribhoge pārājikaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – sāmikāpi sālayā,
atk-vin01a0:1567_2: corāpi sālayā, paṃsukūlasaññāya khādantassa bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ, theyyacittena gaṇhato uddhāreyeva
atk-vin01a0:1567_3: avahāro, bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā kāretabbo. Sāmikā sālayā, corā nirālayā, eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:1567_4: Sāmikā nirālayā, corā sālayā; “puna gaṇhissāmā”ti kismiñcideva gahanaṭṭhāne khipitvā
atk-vin01a0:1567_5: gatā, eseva nayo. Ubhopi nirālayā, paṃsukūlasaññāya khādato anāpatti, theyyacittena dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1568_0: Saṅghassa ambādīsu pana saṅghārāme jātaṃ vā hotu, ānetvā dinnaṃ vā pañcamāsakaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:1568_1: atirekapañcamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ avaharantassa pārājikaṃ. Paccante corupaddavena
atk-vin01a0:1568_2: gāmesu vuṭṭhahantesu bhikkhūpi vihāre chaḍḍetvā “puna āvasante janapade āgamissāmā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1568_3: saussāhāva gacchanti. Bhikkhū tādisaṃ vihāraṃ patvā ambapakkādīni “chaḍḍitakānī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1568_4: paṃsukūlasaññāya paribhuñjanti, anāpatti; theyyacittena paribhuñjato avahāro hoti,
atk-vin01a0:1569_0: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana saṅkhepaṭṭhakathāyañca avisesena vuttaṃ – “chaḍḍitavihāre pana
atk-vin01a0:1569_1: phalāphalaṃ theyyacittena paribhuñjato pārājikaṃ. Kasmā? Āgatānāgatānaṃ santakattā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1569_2: Gaṇasantake pana puggalike ca saussāhamattameva pamāṇaṃ. Sace pana tato ambapakkādiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1569_3: kulasaṅgahaṇatthāya deti, kuladūsakadukkaṭaṃ. Theyyacittena dento agghena kāretabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1569_4: Saṅghikepi eseva nayo. Senāsanatthāya niyamitaṃ kulasaṅgahaṇatthāya dadato dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1569_5: issaravatāya thullaccayaṃ, theyyacittena pārājikaṃ. No ce vatthu pahoti, agghena
atk-vin01a0:1569_6: kāretabbo. Bahi upacārasīmāya nisīditvā issaravatāya paribhuñjato gīvā. Ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā
atk-vin01a0:1569_7: kālaṃ ghosetvā “mayhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti khāditaṃ sukhāditaṃ. Ghaṇṭiṃ apaharitvā kālameva
atk-vin01a0:1569_8: ghosetvā, ghaṇṭimeva paharitvā kālaṃ aghosetvā, ghaṇṭimpi apaharitvā kālampi aghosetvā
atk-vin01a0:1569_9: aññesaṃ natthibhāvaṃ ñatvā “mayhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti khāditampi sukhāditameva. Pupphārāmavatthudvayaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-vin01a0:1570_0: 150. Vuttavādakavatthuttaye vutto vajjemīti tayā vutto hutvā “tava vacanena vadāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1570_1: attho. Anāpatti bhikkhu pārājikassāti sāmikehi dinnattā anāpatti. Na ca, bhikkhave,
atk-vin01a0:1570_2: “vutto vajjemī”ti vattabboti “ahaṃ tayā vutto hutvā tava vacanena vadāmī”ti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1570_3: añño bhikkhu aññena bhikkhunā na vattabboti attho. Paricchedaṃ pana katvā “itthannāmaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1570_4: tava vacanena gaṇhissāmī”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Vutto vajjehīti mayā vutto hutvā mama
atk-vin01a0:1570_5: vacanena vadehīti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Imesupi ca dvīsu vatthūsu paricchedaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1570_6: katvā vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Ettāvatā hi upārambhā mutto hotīti.
atk-vin01a0:1571: 151-2. Maṇivatthuttayassa majjhime vatthusmiṃ – nāhaṃ akallakoti nāhaṃ gilānoti attho. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-vin01a0:1572_0: 153. Sūkaravatthudvaye – kiñcāpi paṭhamassa bhikkhuno chātajjhattaṃ disvā kāruññena
atk-vin01a0:1572_1: mocitattā anāpatti. Sāmikesu pana asampaṭicchantesu bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ, tāva mahanto vā
atk-vin01a0:1572_2: matasūkaro āharitvā dātabbo, tadagghanakaṃ vā bhaṇḍaṃ. Sace pāsasāmike kuhiñcipi
atk-vin01a0:1572_3: na passati, pāsasāmantā tadagghanakaṃ sāṭakaṃ vā kāsāvaṃ vā thālakaṃ vā yathā te
atk-vin01a0:1572_4: āgatā passanti, īdise ṭhāne ṭhapetvāva gantabbaṃ, theyyacittena pana mocentassa pārājikameva.
atk-vin01a0:1572_5: Ettha ca koci sūkaro pāsaṃ pādena kaḍḍhitvā chinnamatte pāse ṭhānācāvanadhammena
atk-vin01a0:1572_6: ṭhānena ṭhito hoti caṇḍasote baddhanāvā viya. Koci attano dhammatāya ṭhito, koci
atk-vin01a0:1572_7: nipanno, koci kūṭapāsena baddho hoti. Kūṭapāso nāma yassa ante dhanukaṃ vā aṅkusako
atk-vin01a0:1572_8: vā añño vā koci daṇḍako baddho hoti, yo tattha tattha rukkhādīsu laggitvā sūkarassa
atk-vin01a0:1572_9: gamanaṃ nivāreti. Tatra pāsaṃ kaḍḍhitvā ṭhitassa ekameva ṭhānaṃ pāsabandhanaṃ, so
atk-vin01a0:1572_10: hi pāse muttamatte vā chinnamatte vā palāyati. Attano dhammatāya ṭhitassa bandhanañca
atk-vin01a0:1572_11: cattāro ca pādāti pañca ṭhānāni. Nipannassa bandhanañca sayanañcāti dve ṭhānāni.
atk-vin01a0:1572_12: Kūṭapāsabaddhassa yattha yattha gacchati, taṃ tadeva ṭhānaṃ. Tasmā taṃ tato tato
atk-vin01a0:1572_13: mocentā dasapi vīsatipi satampi bhikkhū pārājikaṃ āpajjanti. Tattha tattha āgataṃ
atk-vin01a0:1573_0: Purimānaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ catuppadakathāyaṃ vuttanayena phandāpanaṭhānācāvanāni veditabbāni.
atk-vin01a0:1573_1: Sunakhadaṭṭhaṃ sūkaraṃ vissajjāpentassāpi kāruññādhippāyena bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ, theyyacittena
atk-vin01a0:1573_2: pārājikaṃ. Pāsaṭṭhānaṃ pana sunakhasamīpaṃ vā asampattaṃ paṭipathaṃ gantvā paṭhamameva
atk-vin01a0:1573_3: palāpentassa avahāro natthi. Yopi baddhasūkarassa ghāsañca pānīyañca datvā balaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1573_4: gāhāpetvā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karoti – “utrasto palāyissatī”ti; so ce palāyati, pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1573_5: Pāsaṃ dubbalaṃ katvā ukkuṭṭhisaddena palāpentassāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:1574_0: Yo pana ghāsañca pānīyañca datvā gacchati, “balaṃ gahetvā palāyissatī”ti; so ce palāyati,
atk-vin01a0:1574_1: bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Pāsaṃ dubbalaṃ katvā gacchantassāpi eseva nayo. Pāsasantike satthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1574_2: vā aggiṃ vā ṭhapeti “chinne vā daḍḍhe vā palāyissatī”ti. Sūkaro pāsaṃ cālento chinne
atk-vin01a0:1574_3: vā daḍḍhe vā palāyati, bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Pāsaṃ yaṭṭhiyā saha pāteti, pacchā sūkaro
atk-vin01a0:1574_4: taṃ maddanto gacchati, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Sūkaro adūhalapāsāṇehi akkanto hoti, taṃ palāpetukāmassa
atk-vin01a0:1574_5: adūhalaṃ kāruññena ukkhipato bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ, theyyacittena pārājikaṃ. Sace ukkhittamatte
atk-vin01a0:1574_6: agantvā pacchā gacchati, bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Ukkhipitvā ṭhapitaṃ adūhalaṃ pāteti, pacchā
atk-vin01a0:1574_7: sūkaro taṃ maddanto gacchati, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Opāte patitasūkarampi kāruññena uddharato
atk-vin01a0:1574_8: bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ, theyyacittena pārājikaṃ. Opātaṃ pūretvā nāseti, pacchā sūkaro taṃ maddanto
atk-vin01a0:1574_9: gacchati, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Sūle viddhaṃ kāruññena uddharati, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ, theyyacittena
atk-vin01a0:1575_0: Vihārabhūmiyaṃ pana pāse vā adūhalaṃ vā oḍḍentā vāretabbā – “migarūpānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṭṭhānametaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1575_1: mā idha evaṃ karothā”ti. Sace “harāpetha, bhante”ti vadanti, harāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Atha
atk-vin01a0:1575_2: sayaṃ haranti, sundarameva. Atha neva haranti, na harituṃ denti, rakkhaṃ yācitvā
atk-vin01a0:1575_3: harāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Manussā sassarakkhaṇakāle khettesu pāse ca adūhalapāsāṇādīni ca
atk-vin01a0:1575_4: karonti – “maṃsaṃ khādantā sassāni rakkhissāmā”ti. Vītivatte sassakāle tesu anālayesu
atk-vin01a0:1575_5: pakkantesu tattha baddhaṃ vā patitaṃ vā mocetuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-vin01a0:1577_0: Macchavatthudvayepi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – kumīnamukhaṃ vivaritvā vā pacchāpuṭakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1577_1: muñcitvā vā passena chiddaṃ katvā vā kumīnato macche pothetvā palāpentassa pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1577_2: Bhattasitthāni dassetvā evaṃ palāpentassāpi pārājikaṃ. Saha kumīnena uddharatopi
atk-vin01a0:1577_3: pārājikaṃ. Kevalaṃ kumīnamukhaṃ vivarati, pacchāpuṭakaṃ muñcati, chiddaṃ vā karoti,
atk-vin01a0:1577_4: macchā pana attano dhammatāya palāyanti, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Evaṃ katvā bhattasitthāni
atk-vin01a0:1577_5: dasseti, macchā gocaratthāya nikkhamitvā palāyanti, bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Mukhaṃ avivaritvā
atk-vin01a0:1577_6: pacchāpuṭakaṃ amuñcitvā passena chiddaṃ akatvā kevalaṃ bhattasitthāni dasseti, macchā
atk-vin01a0:1577_7: pana chātajjhattā sīsena paharitvā okāsaṃ katvā gocaratthāya nikkhamitvā palāyanti,
atk-vin01a0:1577_8: bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Tucchakumīnassa mukhaṃ vā vivarati, pacchāpuṭakaṃ vā muñcati, chiddaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1577_9: vā karoti, āgatāgatā macchā dvāraṃ pattā puṭakachiddehi palāyanti, bhaṇḍadeyyameva.
atk-vin01a0:1577_10: Tucchakumīnaṃ gahetvā gumbe khipati, bhaṇḍadeyyamevāti. Yāne bhaṇḍaṃ pīṭhe thavikāya sadisaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1578_0: Maṃsapesivatthumhi – sace ākāse gaṇhāti, gahitaṭṭhānameva ṭhānaṃ. Taṃ chahākārehi
atk-vin01a0:1579_0: 155. Kumbhivatthusmiṃ – yo sappitelādīni apādagghanakāni gahetvā “na puna evaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1579_1: saṃvare ṭhatvā dutiyadivasādīsupi puna citte uppanne evameva dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:1579_2: paribhuñjanto sabbampi taṃ paribhuñjati, nevatthi pārājikaṃ. Dukkaṭaṃ vā thullaccayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1579_3: vā āpajjati, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hoti. Ayampi bhikkhu evamevamakāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:1579_4: “anāpatti bhikkhu pārājikassā”ti. Dhuranikkhepaṃ pana akatvā “divase divase paribhuñjissāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1579_5: thokaṃ thokampi paribhuñjato yasmiṃ divase pādagghanakaṃ pūrati, tasmiṃ pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1580_0: Saṃvidāvahāravatthūni saṃvidāvahāre, muṭṭhivatthūni odaniyagharādivatthūsu dve vighāsavatthūni
atk-vin01a0:1580_1: ambacorakādivatthūsu vuttavinicchayanayena veditabbāni. Dve tiṇavatthūni uttānatthāneva.
atk-vin01a0:1581_0: 156. Ambabhājāpanādivatthūsu te bhikkhū ekaṃ gāmakāvāsaṃ paricchinnabhikkhukaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-vin01a0:1581_1: Tattha bhikkhū phalāphalaṃ paribhuñjamānāpi tesu āgatesu “therānaṃ phalāni dethā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1581_2: kappiyakārake na avocuṃ. Atha te bhikkhū “kiṃ saṅghikaṃ amhākaṃ na pāpuṇātī”ti ghaṇṭiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1581_3: paharitvā bhājāpetvā tesampi vassaggena bhāgaṃ datvā attanāpi paribhuñjiṃsu. Tena
atk-vin01a0:1581_4: nesaṃ bhagavā “anāpatti, bhikkhave, paribhogatthāyā”ti āha. Tasmā idānipi yattha
atk-vin01a0:1581_5: āvāsikā āgantukānaṃ na denti, phalavāre ca sampatte aññesaṃ atthibhāvaṃ disvā corikāya
atk-vin01a0:1581_6: attanāva khādanti, tattha āgantukehi ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā bhājetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:1582_0: Yattha pana āvāsikā rukkhe rakkhitvā phalavāre sampatte bhājetvā khādanti, catūsu
atk-vin01a0:1582_1: paccayesu sammā upanenti, anissarā tattha āgantukā. Yepi rukkhā cīvaratthāya niyametvā
atk-vin01a0:1582_2: dinnā, tesupi āgantukā anissarā. Eseva nayo sesapaccayatthāya niyametvā dinnesupi.
atk-vin01a0:1583_0: Ye pana tathā aniyamitā, āvāsikā ca te rakkhitvā gopetvā corikāya paribhuñjanti,
atk-vin01a0:1583_1: na tesu āvāsikānaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbaṃ. Ye phalaparibhogatthāya dinnā, āvāsikāpi ne
atk-vin01a0:1583_2: rakkhitvā gopetvā sammā upanenti, tesuyeva tesaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1583_3: pana vuttaṃ – “catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ niyametvā dinnaṃ theyyacittena paribhuñjanto bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1583_4: agghāpetvā kāretabbo. Paribhogavaseneva taṃ bhājetvā paribhuñjantassa bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1583_5: Yaṃ panettha senāsanatthāya niyamitaṃ, taṃ paribhogavaseneva bhājetvā paribhuñjantassa
atk-vin01a0:1584_0: Odissa cīvaratthāya dinnaṃ cīvareyeva upanetabbaṃ. Sace dubbhikkhaṃ hoti, bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:1584_1: piṇḍapātena kilamanti, cīvaraṃ pana sulabhaṃ, saṅghasuṭṭhutāya apalokanakammaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:1584_2: piṇḍapātepi upanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Senāsanena gilānapaccayena vā kilamantesu saṅghasuṭṭhutāya
atk-vin01a0:1584_3: apalokanakammaṃ katvā tadatthāyapi upanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Odissa piṇḍapātatthāya gilānapaccayatthāya
atk-vin01a0:1584_4: ca dinnepi eseva nayo. Odissa senāsanatthāya dinnaṃ pana garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, taṃ rakkhitvā
atk-vin01a0:1584_5: gopetvā tadatthameva upanetabbaṃ. Sace pana dubbhikkhaṃ hoti, bhikkhū piṇḍapātena
atk-vin01a0:1584_6: na yāpenti. Ettha rājarogacorabhayādīhi aññattha gacchantānaṃ vihārā palujjanti,
atk-vin01a0:1584_7: tālanāḷikerādike vināsenti, senāsanapaccayaṃ pana nissāya yāpetuṃ sakkā hoti. Evarūpe
atk-vin01a0:1584_8: kāle senāsanaṃ vissajjetvāpi senāsanajagganatthāya paribhogo bhagavatā anuññāto.
atk-vin01a0:1584_9: Tasmā ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni ṭhapetvā itarāni lāmakakoṭiyā piṇḍapātatthāya
atk-vin01a0:1584_10: vissajjetuṃ vaṭṭati. Mūlavatthucchedaṃ pana katvā na upanetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1585_0: Yo pana ārāmo catuppaccayatthāya niyametvā dinno, tattha apalokanakammaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1585_1: Yena pana paccayena ūnaṃ, tadatthaṃ upanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ārāmo jaggitabbo, vetanaṃ datvāpi
atk-vin01a0:1585_2: jaggāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ye pana vetanaṃ labhitvā ārāmeyeva gehaṃ katvā vasantā rakkhanti,
atk-vin01a0:1585_3: te ce āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nāḷikeraṃ vā tālapakkaṃ vā denti, yaṃ tesaṃ saṅghena anuññātaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1585_4: hoti – “divase divase ettakaṃ nāma khādathā”ti tadeva te dātuṃ labhanti; tato uttari
atk-vin01a0:1586_0: Yo pana ārāmaṃ keṇiyā gahetvā saṅghassa catuppaccayatthāya kappiyabhaṇḍameva deti,
atk-vin01a0:1586_1: ayaṃ bahukampi dātuṃ labhati. Cetiyassa padīpatthāya vā khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇatthāya
atk-vin01a0:1586_2: vā dinno ārāmopi paṭijaggitabbo; vetanaṃ datvāpi jaggāpetabbo. Vetanañca panettha
atk-vin01a0:1586_3: cetiyasantakampi saṅghasantakampi dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Etampi ārāmaṃ vetanena tattheva
atk-vin01a0:1586_4: vasitvā rakkhantānañca keṇiyā gahetvā kappiyabhaṇḍadāyakānañca tattha jātakaphaladānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1587_0: Ambapālakādivatthūsu – anāpatti, bhikkhave, gopakassa dāneti ettha kataraṃ pana gopakadānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1587_1: vaṭṭati, kataraṃ na vaṭṭatīti? Mahāsumatthero tāva āha – “yaṃ gopakassa paricchinditvā
atk-vin01a0:1587_2: dinnaṃ hoti – ‘ettakaṃ divase divase gaṇhā’ti tadeva vaṭṭati; tato uttari na vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1587_3: Mahāpadumatthero panāha – “kiṃ gopakānaṃ paṇṇaṃ āropetvā nimittasaññaṃ vā katvā dinnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1587_4: atthi, etesaṃ hatthe vissaṭṭhakassa ete issarā, tasmā yaṃ te denti taṃ bahukampi
atk-vin01a0:1587_5: vaṭṭatī”ti. Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ – “manussānaṃ ārāmaṃ vā aññaṃ vā phalāphalaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1587_6: dārakā rakkhanti, tehi dinnaṃ vaṭṭati. Āharāpetvā pana na gahetabbaṃ. Saṅghike pana
atk-vin01a0:1587_7: cetiyasantake ca keṇiyā gahetvā rakkhantasseva dānaṃ vaṭṭati. Vetanena rakkhantassa
atk-vin01a0:1587_8: attano bhāgamattaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “yaṃ gihīnaṃ ārāmarakkhakā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1587_9: denti, etaṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhusaṅghassa pana ārāmagopakā yaṃ attano bhatiyā khaṇḍetvā
atk-vin01a0:1587_10: denti, etaṃ vaṭṭati. Yopi upaḍḍhārāmaṃ vā kecideva rukkhe vā bhatiṃ labhitvā rakkhati,
atk-vin01a0:1587_11: tassāpi attano pattarukkhatoyeva dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Keṇiyā gahetvā rakkhantassa pana
atk-vin01a0:1587_12: sabbampi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Etaṃ pana sabbaṃ byañjanato nānaṃ, atthato ekameva; tasmā
atk-vin01a0:1588_0: Dāruvatthumhi – tāvakāliko ahaṃ bhagavāti tāvakālikacitto ahaṃ bhagavāti vattukāmena
atk-vin01a0:1588_1: vuttaṃ, tāvakālikacittoti “puna āharitvā dassāmī”ti evaṃcitto ahanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1589_0: Ayaṃ panettha pāḷimuttakavinicchayo – sace saṅgho saṅghikaṃ kammaṃ kāreti uposathāgāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1589_1: vā bhojanasālaṃ vā, tato āpucchitvā tāvakālikaṃ haritabbaṃ. Yo pana saṅghiko dabbasambhāro
atk-vin01a0:1589_2: agutto deve vassante temeti, ātapena sukkhati, taṃ sabbampi āharitvā attano āvāse
atk-vin01a0:1589_3: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Saṅgho āharāpento aññena vā dabbasambhārena mūlena vā saññāpetabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1589_4: Na sakkā ce hoti saññāpetuṃ, “saṅghikena, bhante, kataṃ saṅghikaparibhogena vaḷañjathā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1589_5: vattabbaṃ. Senāsanassa pana ayameva bhikkhu issaro. Sacepi pāsāṇatthambho vā rukkhatthambho
atk-vin01a0:1589_6: vā kavāṭaṃ vā vātapānaṃ vā nappahoti, saṅghikaṃ tāvakālikaṃ āharitvā pākatikaṃ kātuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1590_0: Udakavatthusmiṃ – yadā udakaṃ dullabhaṃ hoti, yojanatopi aḍḍhayojanatopi āharīyati,
atk-vin01a0:1590_1: evarūpe pariggahitaudake avahāro. Yatopi āharimato vā pokkharaṇīādīsu ṭhitato vā
atk-vin01a0:1590_2: kevalaṃ yāgubhattaṃ sampādenti, pānīyaparibhogañca karonti, na aññaṃ mahāparibhogaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1590_3: tampi theyyacittena gaṇhato avahāro. Yato pana ekaṃ vā dve vā ghaṭe gahetvā āsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1590_4: dhovituṃ, bodhirukkhe siñcituṃ udakapūjaṃ kātuṃ, rajanaṃ pacituṃ labbhati, tattha
atk-vin01a0:1590_5: saṅghassa katikavaseneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Atirekaṃ gaṇhanto, mattikādīni vā theyyacittena
atk-vin01a0:1591_0: Sace āvāsikā katikavattaṃ daḷhaṃ karonti, aññesaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ dhovituṃ vā rajituṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:1591_1: na denti, attanā pana aññesaṃ apassantānaṃ gahetvā sabbaṃ karonti, tesaṃ katikāya
atk-vin01a0:1591_2: na ṭhātabbaṃ. Yattakaṃ te dhovanti, tattakaṃ dhovitabbaṃ. Sace saṅghassa dve tisso
atk-vin01a0:1591_3: pokkharaṇiyo vā udakasoṇḍiyo vā honti, katikā ca katā “ettha nhāyitabbaṃ, ito pānīyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1591_4: gahetabbaṃ, idha sabbaparibhogo kātabbo”ti. Katikavatteneva sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ. Yattha
atk-vin01a0:1592_0: Mattikāvatthusmiṃ – yattha mattikā dullabhā hoti, nānappakārā vā vaṇṇamattikā āharitvā
atk-vin01a0:1592_1: ṭhapitā, tattha thokāpi pañcamāsakaṃ agghati, tasmā pārājikaṃ. Saṅghike pana kamme
atk-vin01a0:1592_2: cetiyakamme ca niṭṭhite saṅghaṃ āpucchitvā vā tāvakālikaṃ vā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sudhāyapi
atk-vin01a0:1593_0: Tiṇavatthūsu – jhāpitatiṇe ṭhānācāvanassa abhāvā dukkaṭaṃ, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1593_1: Saṅgho tiṇavatthuṃ jaggitvā saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ chādeti, puna kadāci jaggituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-vin01a0:1593_2: athañño eko bhikkhu vattasīsena jaggati, saṅghassevetaṃ. No ce jaggati, saṅgheneko
atk-vin01a0:1593_3: bhikkhu vattabbo “jaggitvā dehī”ti. So ce bhāgaṃ icchati, bhāgaṃ datvāpi jaggāpetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1593_4: Sace bhāgaṃ vaḍḍheti, dātabbameva. Vaḍḍhetiyeva, “gaccha jaggitvā sabbaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:1593_5: attano santakaṃ senāsanaṃ chādehī”ti vattabbo. Kasmā? Naṭṭhe attho natthi. Dadantehi
atk-vin01a0:1593_6: pana savatthukaṃ na dātabbaṃ, garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti; tiṇamattaṃ pana dātabbaṃ. Tasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1593_7: ce jaggitvā attano senāsanaṃ chādente puna saṅgho jaggituṃ pahoti, “tvaṃ mā jaggi,
atk-vin01a0:1594_0: Mañcādīni satta vatthūni pākaṭāneva. Pāḷiyaṃ pana anāgatampi pāsāṇatthambhaṃ vā rukkhatthambhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1594_1: vā aññaṃ vā kiñci pādagghanakaṃ harantassa pārājikameva. Padhānagharādīsu chaḍḍitapatitānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1594_2: pariveṇādīnaṃ kuṭṭampi pākārampi bhinditvā iṭṭhakādīni avaharantassāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:1594_3: Kasmā? Saṅghikaṃ nāma kadāci ajjhāvasanti, kadāci na ajjhāvasanti. Paccante corabhayena
atk-vin01a0:1594_4: janapade vuṭṭhahante chaḍḍitavihārādīsu kiñci parikkhāraṃ harantassāpi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:1594_5: Ye pana tato tāvakālikaṃ haranti, puna āvasitesu ca vihāresu bhikkhū āharāpenti,
atk-vin01a0:1594_6: dātabbaṃ. Sacepi tato āharitvā senāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti, taṃ vā tadagghanakaṃ vā dātabbameva.
atk-vin01a0:1594_7: “Puna āvasissāmā”ti ālayaṃ acchinditvā vuṭṭhitesu janapadesu gaṇasantakaṃ vā puggalikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1594_8: vā gahitaṃ hoti; te ce anujānanti, paṭikammena kiccaṃ natthi. Saṅghikaṃ pana garubhaṇḍaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1596_0: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tāvakālikaṃ haritunti ettha yo bhikkhu saṅghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:1596_1: pīṭhaṃ vā tāvakālikaṃ haritvā attano phāsukaṭṭhāne ekampi dvepi māse saṅghikaparibhogena
atk-vin01a0:1596_2: paribhuñjati, āgatāgatānaṃ vuḍḍhatarānaṃ deti, nappaṭibāhati, tassa tasmiṃ naṭṭhepi
atk-vin01a0:1596_3: jiṇṇepi corāvahaṭepi gīvā na hoti. Vasitvā pana gacchantena yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1596_4: Yo pana puggalikaparibhogena paribhuñjati, āgatāgatānaṃ vuḍḍhatarānaṃ na deti, tasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1596_5: naṭṭhe tassa gīvā hoti. Aññaṃ pana āvāsaṃ haritvā paribhuñjantena sace tattha vuḍḍhataro
atk-vin01a0:1596_6: āgantvā vuṭṭhāpeti, “mayā idaṃ asukāvāsato nāma āhaṭaṃ, gacchāmi, naṃ pākatikaṃ karomī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1596_7: vattabbaṃ. Sace so bhikkhu “ahaṃ pākatikaṃ karissāmī”ti vadati, tassa bhāraṃ katvāpi
atk-vin01a0:1597_0: Campāvatthumhi – tekaṭulayāgūti tilataṇḍulamuggehi vā tilataṇḍulamāsehi vā tilataṇḍulakulatthehi
atk-vin01a0:1597_1: vā tilataṇḍulehi saddhiṃ yaṃkiñci ekaṃ aparaṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā tīhi katā, etaṃ kira
atk-vin01a0:1597_2: imehi tīhi catubhāgaudakasambhinne khīre sappimadhusakkarādīhi yojetvā karonti.
atk-vin01a0:1598: Rājagahavatthumhi – madhugoḷakoti atirasakapūvo vuccati; “madhusīsaka”ntipi vadanti. Sesamettha vatthudvayepi odanabhājanīyavatthusmiṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1599_0: 158. Ajjukavatthusmiṃ – etadavocāti gilāno hutvā avoca. Āyasmā upāli āyasmato ajjukassa
atk-vin01a0:1599_1: pakkhoti na agatigamanavasena pakkho, api ca kho anāpattisaññitāya lajjīanuggahena
atk-vin01a0:1599_2: vinayānuggahena ca thero pakkhoti veditabbo. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin01a0:1600_0: 159. Bārāṇasīvatthusmiṃ – corehi upaddutanti corehi viluttaṃ. Iddhiyā ānetvā pāsāde
atk-vin01a0:1600_1: ṭhapesīti thero kira taṃ kulaṃ sokasallasamappitaṃ āvaṭṭantaṃ vivaṭṭantaṃ disvā tassa
atk-vin01a0:1600_2: kulassa anukampāya pasādānurakkhaṇatthāya dhammānuggahena attano iddhiyā “tesaṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:1600_3: pāsādaṃ dārakānaṃ samīpe hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Dārakā “amhākaṃ pāsādo”ti sañjānitvā
atk-vin01a0:1600_4: abhiruhiṃsu. Tato thero iddhiṃ paṭisaṃhari, pāsādopi sakaṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsi. Vohāravasena
atk-vin01a0:1600_5: pana vuttaṃ “te dārake iddhiyā ānetvā pāsāde ṭhapesī”ti. Iddhivisayeti īdisāya adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā
atk-vin01a0:1607: Sikkhāpadaṃ samaṃ tena, aññaṃ kiñci na vijjati;
atk-vin01a0:1616: Vīmaṃsitvātha viññūhi, saṃsanditvā ca taṃ vade.
atk-vin01a0:1620: Aggiṃ viya ca sampassaṃ, nāmaseyya vicakkhaṇoti.
atk-vin01a0:1627: Tatiyaṃ tīhi suddhena, yaṃ buddhena vibhāvitaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1629: Yasmā tasmā suviññeyyaṃ, yaṃ pubbe ca pakāsitaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1630: Taṃ vajjayitvā assāpi, hoti saṃvaṇṇanā ayaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1632_0: 162. Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyanti ettha
atk-vin01a0:1632_1: vesāliyanti evaṃnāmake itthiliṅgavasena pavattavohāre nagare. Tañhi nagaraṃ tikkhattuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1632_2: pākāraparikkhepavaḍḍhanena visālībhūtattā “vesālī”ti vuccati. Idampi ca nagaraṃ sabbaññutappatteyeva
atk-vin01a0:1632_3: sammāsambuddhe sabbākārena vepullaṃ pattanti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ gocaragāmaṃ dassetvā
atk-vin01a0:1632_4: nivāsaṭṭhāna māha – “mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāya”nti. Tattha mahāvanaṃ nāma sayaṃjātaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1632_5: aropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ. Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ himavantena
atk-vin01a0:1632_6: saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ. Idaṃ tādisaṃ na hoti,
atk-vin01a0:1632_7: saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vananti mahāvanaṃ. Kūṭāgārasālā pana mahāvanaṃ nissāya kate
atk-vin01a0:1632_8: ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ anto katvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchadanena katā sabbākārasampannā buddhassa
atk-vin01a0:1633_0: Anekapariyāyena asubhakathaṃ kathetīti anekehi kāraṇehi asubhākārasandassanappavattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1633_1: kāyavicchandaniyakathaṃ katheti. Seyyathidaṃ – “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā…pe.
atk-vin01a0:1633_2: … mutta”nti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Bhikkhave, imasmiṃ byāmamatte kaḷevare sabbākārenapi
atk-vin01a0:1633_3: vicinanto na koci kiñci muttaṃ vā maṇiṃ vā veḷuriyaṃ vā agaruṃ vā candanaṃ vā kuṅkumaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1633_4: vā kappūraṃ vā vāsacuṇṇādīni vā aṇumattampi sucibhāvaṃ passati. Atha kho paramaduggandhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1633_5: jegucchaṃ assirīkadassanaṃ kesalomādinānappakāraṃ asuciṃyeva passati. Tasmā na ettha
atk-vin01a0:1633_6: chando vā rāgo vā karaṇīyo. Yepi hi uttamaṅge sirasmiṃ jātā kesā nāma, tepi asubhā
atk-vin01a0:1633_7: ceva asucino ca paṭikkūlā ca. So ca nesaṃ asubhāsucipaṭikkūlabhāvo vaṇṇatopi saṇṭhānatopi
atk-vin01a0:1633_8: gandhatopi āsayatopi okāsatopīti pañcahi kāraṇehi veditabbo. Evaṃ lomādīnanti. Ayamettha
atk-vin01a0:1633_9: saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge vuttanayena veditabbo. Iti bhagavā ekamekasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1634_0: Asubhāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti uddhumātakādivasena asubhamātikaṃ nikkhipitvā padabhājanīyena
atk-vin01a0:1634_1: taṃ vibhajanto vaṇṇento saṃvaṇṇento asubhāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati. Asubhabhāvanāya vaṇṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1634_2: bhāsatīti yā ayaṃ kesādīsu vā uddhumātakādīsu vā ajjhattabahiddhāvatthūsu asubhākāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1634_3: gahetvā pavattassa cittassa bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā phātikammaṃ, tassā asubhabhāvanāya ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1634_4: dassento vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, guṇaṃ parikitteti. Seyyathidaṃ – “asubhabhāvanābhiyutto,
atk-vin01a0:1634_5: bhikkhave, bhikkhu kesādīsu vā vatthūsu uddhumātakādīsu vā pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ
atk-vin01a0:1634_6: tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilabhati. So taṃ paṭhamajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1634_7: cittamañjūsaṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1635_0: Tatrimāni paṭhamassa jhānassa dasa lakkhaṇāni – pāripanthikato cittavisuddhi, majjhimassa
atk-vin01a0:1635_1: samādhinimittassa paṭipatti, tattha cittapakkhandanaṃ, visuddhassa cittassa ajjhupekkhanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1635_2: samathappaṭipannassa ajjhupekkhanaṃ, ekattupaṭṭhānassa ajjhupekkhanaṃ, tattha jātānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1635_3: dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā, indriyānaṃ ekarasaṭṭhena tadupagavīriyavāhanaṭṭhena
atk-vin01a0:1636_0: Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi – “paṭhamassa jhānassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ? Paṭhamassa
atk-vin01a0:1636_1: jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi, upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe, sampahaṃsanā pariyosānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1636_2: Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi, ādissa kati lakkhaṇāni? Ādissa tīṇi lakkhaṇāni
atk-vin01a0:1636_3: – yo tassa paripantho tato cittaṃ visujjhati, visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1636_4: paṭipajjati, paṭipannattā tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati. Yañca paripanthato cittaṃ visujjhati,
atk-vin01a0:1636_5: yañca visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati, yañca paṭipannattā
atk-vin01a0:1636_6: tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati. Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi, ādissa imāni
atk-vin01a0:1636_7: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni. Tena vuccati – ‘paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ ādikalyāṇañceva hoti tilakkhaṇasampannañca’.
atk-vin01a0:1637_0: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe, majjhassa kati lakkhaṇāni? Majjhassa
atk-vin01a0:1637_1: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni – visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati, samathappaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
atk-vin01a0:1637_2: ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati. Yañca visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati, yañca samathappaṭipannaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1637_3: ajjhupekkhati, yañca ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati. Paṭhamassa jhānassa upekkhānubrūhanā
atk-vin01a0:1637_4: majjhe, majjhassa imāni tīṇi lakkhaṇāni. Tena vuccati – ‘paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ majjhekalyāṇañceva
atk-vin01a0:1638_0: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa sampahaṃsanā pariyosānaṃ, pariyosānassa kati lakkhaṇāni? Pariyosānassa
atk-vin01a0:1638_1: cattāri lakkhaṇāni – tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā, indriyānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1638_3: sampahaṃsanā. Paṭhamassa jhānassa sampahaṃsanā pariyosānaṃ, pariyosānassa imāni cattāri
atk-vin01a0:1638_4: lakkhaṇāni. Tena vuccati – ‘paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇañceva hoti catulakkhaṇasampannañca.
atk-vin01a0:1638_6: hoti vicārasampannañca pītisampannañca sukhasampannañca cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannañca
atk-vin01a0:1639_0: Ādissa ādissa asubhasamāpattiyā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti “evampi itthampī”ti punappunaṃ vavatthānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1639_1: katvā ādisanto asubhasamāpattiyā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, ānisaṃsaṃ katheti, guṇaṃ parikitteti.
atk-vin01a0:1639_2: Seyyathidaṃ – “asubhasaññāparicitena, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato
atk-vin01a0:1639_3: methunadhammasamāpattiyā cittaṃ paṭilīyati paṭikuṭati paṭivaṭṭati, na sampasārīyati,
atk-vin01a0:1639_4: upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhāti. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kukkuṭapattaṃ vā nhārudaddulaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1639_5: vā aggimhi pakkhittaṃ paṭilīyati paṭikuṭati paṭivaṭṭati, na sampasārīyati; evameva
atk-vin01a0:1639_6: kho, bhikkhave, asubhasaññāparicitena bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato methunadhammasamāpattiyā
atk-vin01a0:1639_7: cittaṃ paṭilīyati paṭikuṭati paṭivaṭṭati, na sampasārīyatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1640_0: Icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave, addhamāsaṃ paṭisallīyitunti ahaṃ bhikkhave ekaṃ addhamāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1640_1: paṭisallīyituṃ nilīyituṃ ekova hutvā viharituṃ icchāmīti attho. Namhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo
atk-vin01a0:1640_2: aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakenāti yo attanā payuttavācaṃ akatvā mamatthāya saddhesu
atk-vin01a0:1640_3: kulesu paṭiyattaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ nīharitvā mayhaṃ upanāmeti, taṃ piṇḍapātanīhārakaṃ ekaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1640_4: bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā namhi aññena kenaci bhikkhunā vā gahaṭṭhena vā upasaṅkamitabboti.
atk-vin01a0:1641_0: Kasmā pana evamāhāti? Atīte kira pañcasatā migaluddakā mahatīhi daṇḍavāgurāhi araññaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1641_1: parikkhipitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā ekatoyeva yāvajīvaṃ migapakkhighātakammena jīvikaṃ kappetvā
atk-vin01a0:1641_2: niraye upapannā; te tattha paccitvā pubbe katena kenacideva kusalakammena manussesu
atk-vin01a0:1641_3: upapannā kalyāṇūpanissayavasena sabbepi bhagavato santike pabbajjañca upasampadañca
atk-vin01a0:1641_4: labhiṃsu; tesaṃ tato mūlākusalakammato avipakkavipākā aparāparacetanā tasmiṃ addhamāsabbhantare
atk-vin01a0:1641_5: attūpakkamena ca parūpakkamena ca jīvatupacchedāya okāsamakāsi, taṃ bhagavā addasa.
atk-vin01a0:1641_6: Kammavipāko nāma na sakkā kenaci paṭibāhituṃ. Tesu ca bhikkhūsu puthujjanāpi atthi
atk-vin01a0:1641_7: sotāpannasakadāgāmīanāgāmīkhīṇāsavāpi. Tattha khīṇāsavā appaṭisandhikā, itare ariyasāvakā
atk-vin01a0:1641_8: niyatagatikā sugatiparāyaṇā, puthujjanānaṃ pana gati aniyatā. Atha bhagavā cintesi
atk-vin01a0:1641_9: – “ime attabhāve chandarāgena maraṇabhayabhītā na sakkhissanti gatiṃ visodhetuṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1641_10: handa nesaṃ chandarāgappahānāya asubhakathaṃ kathemi. Taṃ sutvā attabhāve vigatacchandarāgatāya
atk-vin01a0:1641_11: gativisodhanaṃ katvā sagge paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhissanti. Evaṃ nesaṃ mama santike pabbajjā
atk-vin01a0:1642_0: Tato tesaṃ anuggahāya asubhakathaṃ kathesi kammaṭṭhānasīsena, no maraṇavaṇṇasaṃvaṇṇanādhippāyena.
atk-vin01a0:1642_1: Kathetvā ca panassa etadahosi – “sace maṃ imaṃ addhamāsaṃ bhikkhū passissanti, ‘ajja
atk-vin01a0:1642_2: eko bhikkhu mato, ajja dve…pe… ajja dasā’ti āgantvā āgantvā ārocessanti. Ayañca kammavipāko
atk-vin01a0:1642_3: na sakkā mayā vā aññena vā paṭibāhituṃ. Svāhaṃ taṃ sutvāpi kiṃ karissāmi? Kiṃ me
atk-vin01a0:1642_4: anatthakena anayabyasanena sutena? Handāhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adassanaṃ upagacchāmī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1642_5: Tasmā evamāha – “icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave, addhamāsaṃ patisallīyituṃ; namhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo
atk-vin01a0:1643_0: Apare panāhu – “parūpavādavivajjanatthaṃ evaṃ vatvā paṭisallīno”ti. Pare kira bhagavantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1643_2: sāvake aññamaññaṃ ghātente nivāretuṃ na sakkoti. Kimaññaṃ sakkhissatī”ti? Tattha
atk-vin01a0:1643_3: paṇḍitā vakkhanti – “bhagavā paṭisallānamanuyutto nayimaṃ pavattiṃ jānāti, kocissa
atk-vin01a0:1643_4: ārocayitāpi natthi, sace jāneyya addhā nivāreyyā”ti. Idaṃ pana icchāmattaṃ, paṭhamamevettha
atk-vin01a0:1643_5: kāraṇaṃ. Nāssudhāti ettha “assudhā”ti padapūraṇamatte avadhāraṇatthe vā nipāto; neva
atk-vin01a0:1644_0: Anekehi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīhi kāraṇehi vokāro assāti anekākāravokāro; anekākāravokiṇṇo
atk-vin01a0:1644_1: anekakāraṇasammissoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ko so? Asubhabhāvanānuyogo, taṃ anekākāravokāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1644_2: asubhabhāvanānuyogaṃ anuyuttā viharantīti yuttapayuttā viharanti. Aṭṭīyantīti sakena
atk-vin01a0:1644_3: kāyena aṭṭā dukkhitā honti. Harāyantīti lajjanti. Jigucchantīti sañjātajigucchā honti.
atk-vin01a0:1644_4: Daharoti taruṇo. Yuvāti yobbanena samannāgato. Maṇḍanakajātikoti maṇḍanakapakatiko.
atk-vin01a0:1644_5: Sīsaṃnhātoti sīsena saddhiṃ nhāto. Daharo yuvāti cettha daharavacanena paṭhamayobbanabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1644_6: dasseti. Paṭhamayobbane hi sattā visesena maṇḍanakajātikā honti. Sīsaṃnhātoti iminā
atk-vin01a0:1644_7: maṇḍanānuyogakālaṃ. Yuvāpi hi kiñci kammaṃ katvā saṃkiliṭṭhasarīro na maṇḍanānuyutto
atk-vin01a0:1644_8: hoti; sīsaṃnhāto pana so maṇḍanamevānuyuñjati. Ahikuṇapādīni daṭṭhumpi na icchati.
atk-vin01a0:1644_9: So tasmiṃ khaṇe ahikuṇapena vā kukkurakuṇapena vā manussakuṇapena vā kaṇṭhe āsattena
atk-vin01a0:1644_10: kenacideva paccatthikena ānetvā kaṇṭhe baddhena paṭimukkena yathā aṭṭīyeyya harāyeyya
atk-vin01a0:1644_11: jiguccheyya; evameva te bhikkhū sakena kāyena aṭṭīyantā harāyantā jigucchantā so
atk-vin01a0:1644_12: viya puriso taṃ kuṇapaṃ vigatacchandarāgatāya attano kāyaṃ pariccajitukāmā hutvā
atk-vin01a0:1644_13: satthaṃ ādāya attanāpi attānaṃ jīvitā voropenti. “Tvaṃ maṃ jīvitā voropehi; ahaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1645_0: Migalaṇḍikampi samaṇakuttakanti migalaṇḍikoti tassa nāmaṃ; samaṇakuttakoti samaṇavesadhārako.
atk-vin01a0:1645_1: So kira sikhāmattaṃ ṭhapetvā sīsaṃ muṇḍetvā ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ aṃse katvā
atk-vin01a0:1645_2: vihāraṃyeva upanissāya vighāsādabhāvena jīvati. Tampi migalaṇḍikaṃ samaṇakuttakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1645_3: upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti. Sādhūti āyācanatthe nipāto. Noti upayogabahuvacanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1645_4: sādhu āvuso amhe jīvitā voropehīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha ca ariyā neva pāṇātipātaṃ kariṃsu
atk-vin01a0:1645_5: na samādapesuṃ, na samanuññā ahesuṃ. Puthujjanā pana sabbamakaṃsu. Lohitakanti lohitamakkhitaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1645_6: Yena vaggumudānadīti vaggumatā lokassa puññasammatā nadī. Sopi kira “taṃ pāpaṃ tattha
atk-vin01a0:1645_7: pavāhessāmī”ti saññāya gato, nadiyā ānubhāvena appamattakampi pāpaṃ pahīnaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a0:1646_0: 163. Ahudeva kukkuccanti tesu kira bhikkhūsu kenacipi kāyavikāro vā vacīvikāro vā
atk-vin01a0:1646_1: na kato, sabbe satā sampajānā dakkhiṇena passena nipajjiṃsu. Taṃ anussarato tassa
atk-vin01a0:1646_2: kukkuccaṃ ahosiyeva. Ahu vippaṭisāroti tasseva kukkuccassa sabhāvaniyamanatthametaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1646_3: vuttaṃ. Vippaṭisārakukkuccaṃ ahosi, na vinayakukkuccanti. Alābhā vata metiādi kukkuccassa
atk-vin01a0:1646_4: pavattiākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha alābhā vata meti āyatiṃ dāni mama hitasukhalābhā
atk-vin01a0:1646_5: nāma natthīti anutthunāti. “Na vata me lābhā”tiiminā pana tamevatthaṃ daḷhaṃ karoti.
atk-vin01a0:1646_6: Ayañhettha adhippāyo – sacepi koci “lābhā te”ti vadeyya, taṃ micchā, na vata me lābhāti.
atk-vin01a0:1646_7: Dulladdhaṃ vata meti kusalānubhāvena laddhampi idaṃ manussattaṃ dulladdhaṃ vata me.
atk-vin01a0:1646_8: Na vata me suladdhantiiminā pana tamevatthaṃ daḷhaṃ karoti. Ayañhettha adhippāyo
atk-vin01a0:1646_9: – sacepi koci “suladdhaṃ te”ti vadeyya, taṃ micchā; na vata me suladdhanti. Apuññaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1646_10: pasutanti apuññaṃ upacitaṃ janitaṃ vā. Kasmāti ce? Yohaṃ bhikkhū…pe… voropesinti.
atk-vin01a0:1646_11: Tassattho – yo ahaṃ sīlavante tāya eva sīlavantatāya kalyāṇadhamme uttamadhamme seṭṭhadhamme
atk-vin01a0:1647_0: Aññatarā mārakāyikāti nāmavasena apākaṭā ekā bhummadevatā micchādiṭṭhikā mārapakkhikā
atk-vin01a0:1647_1: mārassanuvattikā “evamayaṃ māradheyyaṃ māravisayaṃ nātikkamissatī”ti cintetvā sabbābharaṇavibhūsitā
atk-vin01a0:1647_2: hutvā attano ānubhāvaṃ dassayamānā abhijjamāne udake pathavītale caṅkamamānā viya
atk-vin01a0:1647_3: āgantvā migalaṇḍikaṃ samaṇakuttakaṃ etadavoca. Sādhu sādhūti sampahaṃsanatthe nipāto;
atk-vin01a0:1647_4: tasmā eva dvivacanaṃ kataṃ. Atiṇṇe tāresīti saṃsārato atiṇṇe iminā jīvitāvoropanena
atk-vin01a0:1647_5: tāresi parimocesīti. Ayaṃ kira etissā devatāya bālāya dummedhāya laddhi “ye na matā,
atk-vin01a0:1647_6: te saṃsārato na muttā. Ye matā, te muttā”ti. Tasmā saṃsāramocakamilakkhā viya evaṃladdhikā
atk-vin01a0:1647_7: hutvā tampi tattha niyojentī evamāha. Atha kho migalaṇḍiko samaṇakuttako tāva bhusaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1647_8: uppannavippaṭisāropi taṃ devatāya ānubhāvaṃ disvā “ayaṃ devatā evamāha – addhā iminā
atk-vin01a0:1647_9: atthena evameva bhavitabba”nti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā “lābhā kira me”tiādīni parikittayanto.
atk-vin01a0:1647_10: Vihārena vihāraṃ pariveṇena pariveṇaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadetīti taṃ taṃ vihārañca
atk-vin01a0:1647_11: pariveṇañca upasaṅkamitvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā anto pavisitvā bhikkhū evaṃ vadati – “ko
atk-vin01a0:1648_0: Hotiyeva bhayanti maraṇaṃ paṭicca cittutrāso hoti. Hoti chambhitattanti hadayamaṃsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1648_1: ādiṃ katvā tasmā sarīracalanaṃ hoti; atibhayena thaddhasarīrattantipi eke, thambhitattañhi
atk-vin01a0:1648_2: chambhitattanti vuccati. Lomahaṃsoti uddhaṃṭhitalomatā, khīṇāsavā pana sattasuññatāya
atk-vin01a0:1648_3: sudiṭṭhattā maraṇakasattameva na passanti, tasmā tesaṃ sabbampetaṃ nāhosīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1648_4: Ekampi bhikkhuṃ dvepi…pe… saṭṭhimpi bhikkhū ekāhena jīvitā voropesīti evaṃ gaṇanavasena
atk-vin01a0:1648_5: sabbānipi tāni pañca bhikkhusatāni jīvitā voropesi.
atk-vin01a0:1649_0: 164. Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti tesaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ jīvitakkhayapattabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1649_1: ñatvā tato ekībhāvato vuṭṭhito jānantopi ajānanto viya kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ āyasmantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1649_2: ānandaṃ āmantesi. Kiṃ nu kho ānanda tanubhūto viya bhikkhusaṅghoti ānanda ito pubbe
atk-vin01a0:1649_3: bahū bhikkhū ekato upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti, uddesaṃ paripucchaṃ gaṇhanti sajjhāyanti,
atk-vin01a0:1649_4: ekapajjoto viya ārāmo dissati, idāni pana addhamāsamattassa accayena tanubhūto viya
atk-vin01a0:1649_5: tanuko mando appako viraḷaviraḷo viya jāto bhikkhusaṅgho. Kinnu kho kāraṇaṃ, kiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1650_0: Athāyasmā ānando kammavipākena tesaṃ jīvitakkhayappattiṃ asallakkhento asubhakammaṭṭhānānuyogapaccayā
atk-vin01a0:1650_1: pana sallakkhento “tathā hi pana bhante bhagavā”tiādiṃ vatvā bhikkhūnaṃ arahattappattiyā
atk-vin01a0:1650_2: aññaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācanto “sādhu bhante bhagavā”tiādimāha. Tassattho – sādhu bhante
atk-vin01a0:1650_3: bhagavā aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ ācikkhatu, yena bhikkhusaṅgho arahatte patiṭṭhaheyya; mahāsamuddaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1650_5: bahūni nibbānorohaṇakammaṭṭhānāni santi. Tesu bhagavā bhikkhū samassāsetvā aññataraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1651_0: Atha bhagavā tathā kātukāmo theraṃ uyyojento “tenahānandā”tiādimāha. Tattha vesāliṃ
atk-vin01a0:1651_1: upanissāyāti vesāliṃ upanissāya samantā gāvutepi addhayojanepi yāvatikā bhikkhū viharanti,
atk-vin01a0:1651_2: te sabbe sannipātehīti attho. Te sabbe upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sannipātetvāti attanā gantuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1651_3: yuttaṭṭhānaṃ sayaṃ gantvā aññattha daharabhikkhū pahiṇitvā muhutteneva anavasese
atk-vin01a0:1651_4: bhikkhū upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ samūhaṃ katvā. Yassa dāni bhante bhagavā kālaṃ maññatīti
atk-vin01a0:1651_5: ettha ayamadhippāyo – bhagavā bhikkhusaṅgho sannipatito esa kālo bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1651_6: kātuṃ, anusāsaniṃ dātuṃ, idāni yassa tumhe kālaṃ jānātha, taṃ kattabbanti.
atk-vin01a0:1653_0: 165. Atha kho bhagavā…pe… bhikkhū āmantesi – ayampi kho bhikkhaveti āmantetvā ca
atk-vin01a0:1653_1: pana bhikkhūnaṃ arahattappattiyā pubbe ācikkhitaasubhakammaṭṭhānato aññaṃ pariyāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1654_0: Idāni yasmā bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ santapaṇītakammaṭṭhānadassanatthameva ayaṃ pāḷi
atk-vin01a0:1654_1: vuttā, tasmā aparihāpetvā atthayojanākkamaṃ ettha vaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi. Tatra “ayampi
atk-vin01a0:1654_2: kho bhikkhave”ti imassa tāva padassa ayaṃ yojanā – bhikkhave na kevalaṃ asubhabhāvanāyeva
atk-vin01a0:1654_3: kilesappahānāya saṃvattati, apica ayampi kho ānāpānassatisamādhi…pe… vūpasametīti.
atk-vin01a0:1655: Ayaṃ panettha atthavaṇṇanā – ānāpānassatīti assāsapassāsapariggāhikā sati. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:1656: “Ānanti assāso, no passāso. Apānanti passāso, no assāso. Assāsavasena upaṭṭhānaṃ sati, passāsavasena upaṭṭhānaṃ sati. Yo assasati tassupaṭṭhāti, yo passasati tassupaṭṭhātī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1657_0: Samādhīti tāya ānāpānapariggāhikāya satiyā saddhiṃ uppannā cittekaggatā; samādhisīsena
atk-vin01a0:1657_1: cāyaṃ desanā, na satisīsena. Tasmā ānāpānassatiyā yutto samādhi ānāpānassatisamādhi,
atk-vin01a0:1657_2: ānāpānassatiyaṃ vā samādhi ānāpānassatisamādhīti evamettha attho veditabbo. Bhāvitoti
atk-vin01a0:1657_3: uppādito vaḍḍhito ca. Bahulīkatoti punappunaṃ kato. Santo ceva paṇīto cāti santo
atk-vin01a0:1657_4: ceva paṇīto ceva, ubhayattha evasaddena niyamo veditabbo. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Ayañhi
atk-vin01a0:1657_5: yathā asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kevalaṃ paṭivedhavasena santañca paṇītañca oḷārikārammaṇattā
atk-vin01a0:1657_6: pana paṭikūlārammaṇattā ca ārammaṇavasena neva santaṃ na paṇītaṃ, na evaṃ kenaci
atk-vin01a0:1657_7: pariyāyena asanto vā appaṇīto vā, apica kho ārammaṇasantatāyapi santo vūpasanto nibbuto
atk-vin01a0:1658_0: Asecanako ca sukho ca vihāroti ettha pana nāssa secananti asecanako anāsittako abbokiṇṇo
atk-vin01a0:1658_1: pāṭekko āveṇiko, natthettha parikammena vā upacārena vā santatā ādimanasikārato pabhuti
atk-vin01a0:1658_2: attano sabhāveneva santo ca paṇīto cāti attho. Keci pana asecanakoti anāsittako ojavanto
atk-vin01a0:1658_3: sabhāveneva madhuroti vadanti. Evamayaṃ asecanako ca appitappitakkhaṇe kāyikacetasikasukhappaṭilābhāya
atk-vin01a0:1659_0: Uppannuppanneti avikkhambhite avikkhambhite. Pāpaketi lāmake. Akusale dhammeti akosallasambhūte
atk-vin01a0:1659_1: dhamme. Ṭhānaso antaradhāpetīti khaṇeneva antaradhāpeti vikkhambheti. Vūpasametīti
atk-vin01a0:1659_2: suṭṭhu upasameti, nibbedhabhāgiyattā vā anupubbena ariyamaggavuḍḍhippato samucchindati
atk-vin01a0:1660_0: Seyyathāpīti opammanidassanametaṃ. Gimhānaṃ pacchime māseti āsāḷhamāse. Ūhataṃ rajojallanti
atk-vin01a0:1660_1: addhamāse vātātapasukkhāya gomahiṃsādipādappahārasambhinnāya pathaviyā uddhaṃ hataṃ
atk-vin01a0:1660_2: ūhataṃ ākāse samuṭṭhitaṃ rajañca reṇuñca. Mahā akālameghoti sabbaṃ nabhaṃ ajjhottharitvā
atk-vin01a0:1660_3: uṭṭhito āsāḷhajuṇhapakkhe sakalaṃ addhamāsaṃ vassanakamegho. So hi asampatte vassakāle
atk-vin01a0:1660_4: uppannattā akālameghoti idhādhippeto. Ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametīti khaṇeneva
atk-vin01a0:1660_5: adassanaṃ neti, pathaviyaṃ sannisīdāpeti. Evameva khoti opammasampaṭipādanametaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1661_0: Idāni kathaṃ bhāvito ca bhikkhave ānāpānassatisamādhīti ettha kathanti ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1661_1: nānappakārato vitthāretukamyatāpucchā. Bhāvito ca bhikkhave ānāpānassatisamādhīti
atk-vin01a0:1661_2: nānappakārato vitthāretukamyatāya puṭṭhadhammanidassanaṃ. Esa nayo dutiyapadepi.
atk-vin01a0:1661_3: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – bhikkhave kenapakārena kenākārena kena vidhinā bhāvito
atk-vin01a0:1661_4: ānāpānassatisamādhi kenapakārena bahulīkato santo ceva…pe… vūpasametīti.
atk-vin01a0:1662_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārento “idha bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Tattha idha bhikkhave bhikkhūti
atk-vin01a0:1662_1: bhikkhave imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu. Ayañhettha idhasaddo sabbappakāraānāpānassatisamādhinibbattakassa
atk-vin01a0:1662_3: Vuttañhetaṃ – “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo…pe… suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1663_1: Imassa hi bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu anuvisaṭaṃ cittaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhiārammaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1663_2: abhiruhituṃ na icchati. Kūṭagoṇayuttaratho viya uppathameva dhāvati. Tasmā seyyathāpi
atk-vin01a0:1663_3: nāma gopo kūṭadhenuyā sabbaṃ khīraṃ pivitvā vaḍḍhitaṃ kūṭavacchaṃ dametukāmo dhenuto
atk-vin01a0:1663_4: apanetvā ekamante mahantaṃ thambhaṃ nikhaṇitvā tattha yottena bandheyya. Athassa
atk-vin01a0:1663_5: so vaccho ito cito ca vipphanditvā palāyituṃ asakkonto tameva thambhaṃ upanisīdeyya
atk-vin01a0:1663_6: vā upanipajjeyya vā; evameva imināpi bhikkhunā dīgharattaṃ rūpārammaṇādirasapānavaḍḍhitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1663_7: duṭṭhacittaṃ dametukāmena rūpādiārammaṇato apanetvā araññaṃ vā…pe… suññāgāraṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:1663_8: pavesetvā tattha assāsapassāsathambhe satiyottena bandhitabbaṃ. Evamassa taṃ cittaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1663_9: ito cito ca vipphanditvāpi pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇaṃ alabhamānaṃ satiyottaṃ chinditvā
atk-vin01a0:1663_10: palāyituṃ asakkontaṃ tamevārammaṇaṃ upacārappanāvasena upanisīdati ceva upanipajjati ca. Tenāhu porāṇā –
