atk-vin01a0:1664: “Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ dammaṃ naro idha;
atk-vin01a0:1666: Evamassetaṃ senāsanaṃ bhāvanānurūpaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “idamassa ānāpānassatisamaādhibhāvanānurūpasenāsanapariggahaparidīpana”nti.
atk-vin01a0:1667_0: Atha vā yasmā idaṃ kammaṭṭhānappabhede muddhabhūtaṃ sabbaññubuddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1667_2: gāmantaṃ apariccajitvā na sukaraṃ sampādetuṃ, saddakaṇṭakattā jhānassa. Agāmake pana
atk-vin01a0:1667_3: araññe sukaraṃ yogāvacarena idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1667_4: nibbattetvā tadeva ca pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ sampāpuṇituṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1668_0: Vatthuvijjācariyo viya hi bhagavā, so yathā vatthuvijjācariyo nagarabhūmiṃ passitvā
atk-vin01a0:1668_1: suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā “ettha nagaraṃ māpethā”ti upadisati, sotthinā ca nagare niṭṭhite
atk-vin01a0:1668_2: rājakulato mahāsakkāraṃ labhati; evameva yogāvacarassa anurūpasenāsanaṃ upaparikkhitvā
atk-vin01a0:1668_3: ettha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitabbanti upadisati. Tato tattha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuttena
atk-vin01a0:1668_4: yoginā kamena arahatte patte “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1668_5: labhati. Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu “dīpisadiso”ti vuccati. Yathā hi mahādīpirājā araññe tiṇagahanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1668_6: vā vanagahanaṃ vā pabbatagahanaṃ vā nissāya nilīyitvā vanamahiṃsagokaṇṇasūkarādayo
atk-vin01a0:1668_7: mige gaṇhāti; evamevāyaṃ araññādīsu kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto bhikkhu yathākkamena
atk-vin01a0:1668_8: sotāpattisakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattamagge ceva ariyaphalañca gaṇhātīti veditabbo. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-vin01a0:1672: Tenassa parakkamajavayoggabhūmiṃ araññasenāsanaṃ dassento bhagavā “araññagato vā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:1673_0: Tattha araññagato vāti araññanti “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti
atk-vin01a0:1673_1: ca “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti ca evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇesu
atk-vin01a0:1673_2: araññesu anurūpaṃ yaṃkiñci pavivekasukhaṃ araññaṃ gato. Rukkhamūlagato vāti rukkhasamīpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1673_3: gato. Suññāgāragato vāti suññaṃ vivittokāsaṃ gato. Ettha ca ṭhapetvā araññañca rukkhamūlañca
atk-vin01a0:1673_4: avasesasattavidhasenāsanagatopi suññāgāragatoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Evamassa ututtayānukūlaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1673_6: santamiriyāpathaṃ upadisanto “nisīdatī”ti āha. Athassa nisajjāya daḷhabhāvaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1674_0: Tattha pallaṅkanti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ. Ābhujitvāti ābandhitvā. Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti
atk-vin01a0:1674_1: uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā, aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-vin01a0:1674_2: Evañhi nisinnassa cammamaṃsanhārūni na paṇamanti. Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanappaccayā
atk-vin01a0:1674_3: khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā na uppajjanti. Tāsu anuppajjamānāsu cittaṃ ekaggaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1674_4: hoti. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paripatati. Vuḍḍhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati.
atk-vin01a0:1675_0: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā. Atha vā “parī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1675_2: satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti. Evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Tatrāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1675_3: saṅkhepo – “pariggahitaniyyānaṃ satiṃ katvā”ti. So satova assasatīti so bhikkhu evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1675_4: nisīditvā evañca satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā taṃ satiṃ avijahanto satoeva assasati, sato passasati,
atk-vin01a0:1676: Idāni yehākārehi satokārī hoti, te dassento “dīghaṃ vā assasanto”tiādimāha. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ – “so satova assasati, sato passasatī”ti etasseva vibhaṅge –
atk-vin01a0:1677_0: “Bāttiṃsāya ākārehi satokārī hoti. Dīghaṃ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1677_1: pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti. Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena satokārī hoti. Dīghaṃ passāsavasena…pe…
atk-vin01a0:1677_2: paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasena paṭinissaggānupassī passāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ
atk-vin01a0:1677_3: avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti. Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena satokārī hotī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1678: Tattha dīghaṃ vā assasantoti dīghaṃ vā assāsaṃ pavattento. “Assāso”ti bahi nikkhamanavāto. “Passāso”ti anto pavisanavāto. Suttantaṭṭhakathāsu pana uppaṭipāṭiyā āgataṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1679_0: Tattha sabbesampi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ mātukucchito nikkhamanakāle paṭhamaṃ abbhantaravāto
atk-vin01a0:1679_1: bahi nikkhamati. Pacchā bāhiravāto sukhumaṃ rajaṃ gahetvā abbhantaraṃ pavisanto tāluṃ
atk-vin01a0:1679_2: āhacca nibbāyati. Evaṃ tāva assāsapassāsā veditabbā. Yā pana tesaṃ dīgharassatā,
atk-vin01a0:1679_3: sā addhānavasena veditabbā. Yathā hi okāsaddhānaṃ pharitvā ṭhitaṃ udakaṃ vā vālikā
atk-vin01a0:1679_4: vā “dīghamudakaṃ dīghā vālikā, rassamudakaṃ rassā vālikā”ti vuccati. Evaṃ cuṇṇavicuṇṇāpi
atk-vin01a0:1679_5: assāsapassāsā hatthisarīre ahisarīre ca tesaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ dīghaṃ addhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1679_6: saṇikaṃ pūretvā saṇikameva nikkhamanti, tasmā “dīghā”ti vuccanti. Sunakhasasādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1679_7: attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ rassaṃ addhānaṃ sīghaṃ pūretvā sīghameva nikkhamanti, tasmā “rassā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1679_8: vuccanti. Manussesu pana keci hatthiahiādayo viya kāladdhānavasena dīghaṃ assasanti
atk-vin01a0:1679_9: ca passasanti ca. Keci sunakhasasādayo viya rassaṃ. Tasmā tesaṃ kālavasena dīghamaddhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1679_10: nikkhamantā ca pavisantā ca te dīghā. Ittaramaddhānaṃ nikkhamantā ca pavisantā ca
atk-vin01a0:1679_11: “rassā”ti veditabbā. Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu navahākārehi dīghaṃ assasanto ca passasanto
atk-vin01a0:1679_12: ca “dīghaṃ assasāmi passasāmī”ti pajānāti. Evaṃ pajānato cassa ekenākārena kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā
atk-vin01a0:1680_0: “Kathaṃ dīghaṃ assasanto ‘dīghaṃ assasāmī’ti pajānāti, dīghaṃ passasanto ‘dīghaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1680_1: passasāmī’ti pajānāti? Dīghaṃ assāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte assasati, dīghaṃ passāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte
atk-vin01a0:1680_2: passasati, dīghaṃ assāsapassāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte assasatipi passasatipi. Dīghaṃ assāsapassāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1680_3: addhānasaṅkhāte assasatopi passasatopi chando uppajjati; chandavasena tato sukhumataraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1680_4: dīghaṃ assāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte assasati, chandavasena tato sukhumataraṃ dīghaṃ passāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1680_5: addhānasaṅkhāte passasati, chandavasena tato sukhumataraṃ dīghaṃ assāsapassāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte
atk-vin01a0:1680_6: assasatipi passasatipi. Chandavasena tato sukhumataraṃ dīghaṃ assāsapassāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte
atk-vin01a0:1680_7: assasatopi passasatopi pāmojjaṃ uppajjati; pāmojjavasena tato sukhumataraṃ dīghaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1680_8: assāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte assasati, pāmojjavasena tato sukhumataraṃ dīghaṃ passāsaṃ…pe…
atk-vin01a0:1680_9: dīghaṃ assāsapassāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte assasatipi passasatipi. Pāmojjavasena tato
atk-vin01a0:1680_10: sukhumataraṃ dīghaṃ assāsapassāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte assasatopi passasatopi dīghaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1680_11: assāsapassāsā cittaṃ vivattati, upekkhā saṇṭhāti. Imehi navahi ākārehi dīghaṃ assāsapassāsā
atk-vin01a0:1680_12: kāyo; upaṭṭhānaṃ sati; anupassanā ñāṇaṃ; kāyo upaṭṭhānaṃ, no sati; sati upaṭṭhānañceva
atk-vin01a0:1680_13: sati ca. Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena taṃ kāyaṃ anupassati. Tena vuccati – “kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1681_0: Eseva nayo rassapadepi. Ayaṃ pana viseso – “yathā ettha ‘dīghaṃ assāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte’ti
atk-vin01a0:1681_1: vuttaṃ; evamidha ‘rassaṃ assāsaṃ ittarasaṅkhāte assasatī”ti āgataṃ. Tasmā tassa vasena
atk-vin01a0:1681_2: yāva “tena vuccati kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā”ti tāva yojetabbaṃ. Evamayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1681_3: addhānavasena ittaravasena ca imehākārehi assāsapassāse pajānanto dīghaṃ vā assasanto
atk-vin01a0:1681_4: “dīghaṃ assasāmī”ti pajānāti…pe… rassaṃ vā passasanto “rassaṃ passasāmī”ti pajānātīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1687_0: Sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmi…pe… passasissāmīti sikkhatīti sakalassa assāsakāyassa
atk-vin01a0:1687_1: ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ viditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto “assasissāmī”ti sikkhati. Sakalassa
atk-vin01a0:1687_2: passāsakāyassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ viditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto “passasissāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1687_3: sikkhati. Evaṃ viditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto ñāṇasampayuttacittena assasati ceva
atk-vin01a0:1687_4: passasati ca; tasmā “assasissāmi passasissāmī”ti sikkhatīti vuccati. Ekassa hi bhikkhuno
atk-vin01a0:1687_5: cuṇṇavicuṇṇavisaṭe assāsakāye passāsakāye vā ādi pākaṭo hoti, na majjhapariyosānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1687_6: So ādimeva pariggahetuṃ sakkoti, majjhapariyosāne kilamati. Ekassa majjhaṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1687_7: hoti, na ādipariyosānaṃ. So majjhameva pariggahetuṃ sakkoti, ādipariyosāne kilamati.
atk-vin01a0:1687_8: Ekassa pariyosānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, na ādimajjhaṃ. So pariyosānaṃyeva pariggahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-vin01a0:1687_9: ādimajjhe kilamati. Ekassa sabbampi pākaṭaṃ hoti, so sabbampi pariggahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-vin01a0:1687_10: na katthaci kilamati. Tādisena bhavitabbanti dassento āha – “sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedī
atk-vin01a0:1688_0: Tattha sikkhatīti evaṃ ghaṭati vāyamati. Yo vā tathābhūtassa saṃvaro; ayamettha adhisīlasikkhā.
atk-vin01a0:1688_1: Yo tathābhūtassa samādhi; ayaṃ adhicittasikkhā. Yā tathābhūtassa paññā; ayaṃ adhipaññāsikkhāti.
atk-vin01a0:1688_2: Imā tisso sikkhāyo tasmiṃ ārammaṇe tāya satiyā tena manasikārena sikkhati āsevati
atk-vin01a0:1688_3: bhāveti bahulīkarotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha yasmā purimanaye kevalaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1688_4: assasitabbaṃ passasitabbameva ca, na aññaṃ kiñci kātabbaṃ; ito paṭṭhāya pana ñāṇuppādanādīsu
atk-vin01a0:1688_5: yogo karaṇīyo. Tasmā tattha “assasāmīti pajānāti passasāmīti pajānāti”cceva vattamānakālavasena
atk-vin01a0:1688_6: pāḷiṃ vatvā ito paṭṭhāya kattabbassa ñāṇuppādanādino ākārassa dassanatthaṃ “sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedī
atk-vin01a0:1688_7: assasissāmī”tiādinā nayena anāgatavacanavasena pāḷi āropitāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1689_0: Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assasissāmi…pe… passasissāmīti sikkhatīti oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1689_1: passambhento paṭippassambhento nirodhento vūpasamento assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
atk-vin01a0:1690_0: Tatrevaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā ca passaddhi ca veditabbā. Imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe apariggahitakāle
atk-vin01a0:1690_1: kāyo ca cittañca sadarathā honti. Oḷārikānaṃ kāyacittānaṃ oḷārikatte avūpasante assāsapassāsāpi
atk-vin01a0:1690_2: oḷārikā honti, balavatarā hutvā pavattanti, nāsikā nappahoti, mukhena assasantopi
atk-vin01a0:1690_3: passasantopi tiṭṭhati. Yadā panassa kāyopi cittampi pariggahitā honti, tadā te santā
atk-vin01a0:1690_4: honti vūpasantā. Tesu vūpasantesu assāsapassāsā sukhumā hutvā pavattanti, “atthi
atk-vin01a0:1690_5: nu kho natthī”ti vicetabbākārappattā honti. Seyyathāpi purisassa dhāvitvā pabbatā
atk-vin01a0:1690_6: vā orohitvā mahābhāraṃ vā sīsato oropetvā ṭhitassa oḷārikā assāsapassāsā honti, nāsikā
atk-vin01a0:1690_7: nappahoti, mukhena assasantopi passasantopi tiṭṭhati. Yadā panesa taṃ parissamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1690_8: vinodetvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca allasāṭakaṃ hadaye katvā sītāya chāyāya nipanno hoti,
atk-vin01a0:1690_9: athassa te assāsapassāsā sukhumā honti, “atthi nu kho natthī”ti vicetabbākārappattā.
atk-vin01a0:1690_10: Evameva imassa bhikkhuno pubbe apariggahitakāle kāyo ca…pe… vicetabbākārappattā honti.
atk-vin01a0:1690_11: Taṃ kissa hetu? Tathā hissa pubbe apariggahitakāle “oḷārikoḷārike kāyasaṅkhāre passambhemī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1690_12: ābhogasamannāhāramanasikārapaccavekkhaṇā natthi, pariggahitakāle pana atthi. Tenassa
atk-vin01a0:1690_13: apariggahitakālato pariggahitakāle kāyasaṅkhāro sukhumo hoti. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-vin01a0:1693_0: Pariggahepi oḷāriko, paṭhamajjhānūpacāre sukhumo; tasmimpi oḷāriko paṭhamajjhāne
atk-vin01a0:1693_1: sukhumo. Paṭhamajjhāne ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre ca oḷāriko, dutiyajjhāne sukhumo. Dutiyajjhāne
atk-vin01a0:1693_2: ca tatiyajjhānūpacāre ca oḷāriko, tatiyajjhāne sukhumo. Tatiyajjhāne ca catutthajjhānūpacāre
atk-vin01a0:1693_3: ca oḷāriko, catutthajjhāne atisukhumo appavattimeva pāpuṇāti. Idaṃ tāva dīghabhāṇakasaṃyuttabhāṇakānaṃ mataṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1694_0: Majjhimabhāṇakā pana “paṭhamajjhāne oḷāriko, dutiyajjhānūpacāre sukhumo”ti evaṃ heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato
atk-vin01a0:1694_1: uparūparijjhānūpacārepi sukhumataraṃ icchanti. Sabbesaṃyeva pana matena apariggahitakāle
atk-vin01a0:1695_0: Vipassanāyaṃ pana apariggahe pavatto kāyasaṅkhāro oḷāriko, mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumo.
atk-vin01a0:1695_1: Sopi oḷāriko, upādārūpapariggahe sukhumo. Sopi oḷāriko, sakalarūpapariggahe sukhumo.
atk-vin01a0:1695_2: Sopi oḷāriko, arūpapariggahe sukhumo. Sopi oḷāriko, rūpārūpapariggahe sukhumo. Sopi
atk-vin01a0:1695_3: oḷāriko, paccayapariggahe sukhumo. Sopi oḷāriko, sappaccayanāmarūpapariggahe sukhumo.
atk-vin01a0:1695_4: Sopi oḷāriko, lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya sukhumo. Sopi dubbalavipassanāya oḷāriko,
atk-vin01a0:1695_5: balavavipassanāya sukhumo. Tattha pubbe vuttanayeneva purimassa purimassa pacchimena
atk-vin01a0:1695_6: pacchimena passaddhi veditabbā. Evamettha oḷārikasukhumatā ca passaddhi ca veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1696_0: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ panassa saddhiṃ codanāsodhanāhi evamattho vutto – “kathaṃ passambhayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1696_1: kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assasissāmi…pe… passasissāmī”ti sikkhati? Katame kāyasaṅkhārā? Dīghaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1696_2: assāsā kāyikā ete dhammā kāyappaṭibaddhā kāyasaṅkhārā, te kāyasaṅkhāre passambhento
atk-vin01a0:1696_3: nirodhento vūpasamento sikkhati. Dīghaṃ passāsā kāyikā ete dhammā…pe… rassaṃ assāsā…pe…
atk-vin01a0:1696_4: rassaṃ passāsā… sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedī assāsā… sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedī passāsā kāyikā
atk-vin01a0:1696_5: ete dhammā kāyappaṭibaddhā kāyasaṅkhārā, te kāyasaṅkhāre passambhento nirodhento
atk-vin01a0:1697_0: Yathārūpehi kāyasaṅkhārehi yā kāyassa ānamanā vinamanā sannamanā paṇamanā iñjanā
atk-vin01a0:1697_1: phandanā calanā kampanā passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assasissāmīti sikkhati, passambhayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1698_0: Yathārūpehi kāyasaṅkhārehi yā kāyassa na ānamanā na vinamanā na sannamanā na paṇamanā
atk-vin01a0:1698_1: aniñjanā aphandanā acalanā akampanā, santaṃ sukhumaṃ passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assasissāmīti
atk-vin01a0:1699_0: Iti kira passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assasissāmīti sikkhati, passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1699_1: passasissāmīti sikkhati. Evaṃ sante vātūpaladdhiyā ca pabhāvanā na hoti, assāsapassāsānañca
atk-vin01a0:1699_2: pabhāvanā na hoti, ānāpānassatiyā ca pabhāvanā na hoti, ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca
atk-vin01a0:1699_3: pabhāvanā na na hoti, na ca naṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ paṇḍitā samāpajjantipi vuṭṭhahantipi.
atk-vin01a0:1700_0: Iti kira passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assasissāmi…pe… passasissāmīti sikkhati. Evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1700_1: sante vātūpaladdhiyā ca pabhāvanā hoti, assāsapassāsānañca pabhāvanā hoti, ānāpānassatiyā
atk-vin01a0:1700_2: ca pabhāvanā hoti, ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca pabhāvanā hoti, tañca naṃ samāpattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1701_0: Yathā kathaṃ viya? Seyyathāpi kaṃse ākoṭite paṭhamaṃ oḷārikā saddā pavattanti, oḷārikānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1701_1: saddānaṃ nimittaṃ suggahitattā sumanasikatattā sūpadhāritattā niruddhepi oḷārike
atk-vin01a0:1701_2: sadde atha pacchā sukhumakā saddā pavattanti, sukhumakānaṃ saddānaṃ nimittaṃ suggahitattā
atk-vin01a0:1701_3: sumanasikatattā sūpadhāritattā niruddhepi sukhumake sadde atha pacchā sukhumasaddanimittārammaṇatāpi
atk-vin01a0:1701_4: cittaṃ pavattati; evameva paṭhamaṃ oḷārikā assāsapassāsā pavattanti, oḷārikānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1701_5: nimittaṃ suggahitattā sumanasikatattā sūpadhāritattā niruddhepi oḷārike assāsapassāse
atk-vin01a0:1701_6: atha pacchā sukhumakā assāsapassāsā pavattanti, sukhumakānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ nimittaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1701_7: suggahitattā sumanasikatattā sūpadhāritattā niruddhepi sukhumake assāsapassāse atha
atk-vin01a0:1701_8: pacchā sukhumaassāsapassāsanimittārammaṇatāpi cittaṃ na vikkhepaṃ gacchati.
atk-vin01a0:1702_0: Evaṃ sante vātūpaladdhiyā ca pabhāvanā hoti, assāsapassāsānañca pabhāvanā hoti, ānāpānassatiyā
atk-vin01a0:1702_1: ca pabhāvanā hoti, ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca pabhāvanā hoti, tañca naṃ samāpattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1703_0: Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti assāsapassāsā kāyo, upaṭṭhānaṃ sati, anupassanā ñāṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1703_1: Kāyo upaṭṭhānaṃ no sati, sati upaṭṭhānañceva sati ca, tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena taṃ
atk-vin01a0:1703_2: kāyaṃ anupassati. Tena vuccati – “kāye kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti.
atk-vin01a0:1704: Ayaṃ tāvettha kāyānupassanāvasena vuttassa paṭhamacatukkassa anupubbapadavaṇṇanā.
atk-vin01a0:1705_0: Yasmā panettha idameva catukkaṃ ādikammikassa kammaṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ, itarāni pana
atk-vin01a0:1705_1: tīṇi catukkāni ettha pattajjhānassa vedanācittadhammānupassanāvasena vuttāni, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:1705_2: idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā ānāpānassaticatutthajjhānapadaṭṭhānāya vipassanāya saha
atk-vin01a0:1705_3: paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇitukāmena buddhaputtena yaṃ kātabbaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ idheva
atk-vin01a0:1705_4: tāva ādikammikassa kulaputtassa vasena ādito pabhuti evaṃ veditabbaṃ. Catubbidhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1705_5: tāva sīlaṃ visodhetabbaṃ. Tattha tividhā visodhanā – anāpajjanaṃ, āpannavuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1705_6: kilesehi ca appatipīḷanaṃ. Evaṃ visuddhasīlassa hi bhāvanā sampajjati. Yampidaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1705_8: dveasīti khandhakavattāni cuddasavidhaṃ mahāvattanti imesaṃ vasena ābhisamācārikasīlaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1705_9: vuccati, tampi sādhukaṃ paripūretabbaṃ. Yo hi “ahaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhāmi, kiṃ ābhisamācārikena
atk-vin01a0:1705_10: kamma”nti vadeyya, tassa sīlaṃ paripūressatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Ābhisamācārikavatte
atk-vin01a0:1705_11: pana paripūre sīlaṃ paripūrati, sīle paripūre samādhi gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1705_12: bhagavatā – “so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ābhisamācārikaṃ dhammaṃ aparipūretvā ‘sīlāni
atk-vin01a0:1705_13: paripūressatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti vitthāretabbaṃ. Tasmā tena yampidaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇavattādi
atk-vin01a0:1705_14: ābhisamācārikasīlaṃ vuccati, tampi sādhukaṃ paripūretabbaṃ. Tato –
atk-vin01a0:1706: “Āvāso ca kulaṃ lābho, gaṇo kammañca pañcamaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:1707: Addhānaṃ ñāti ābādho, gantho iddhīti te dasā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1708: Evaṃ vuttesu dasasu palibodhesu yo palibodho atthi, so upacchinditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1709_0: Evaṃ upacchinnapalibodhena kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetabbaṃ. Tampi duvidhaṃ hoti – sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānañca
atk-vin01a0:1709_1: pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānañca. Tattha sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhikkhusaṅghādīsu mettā
atk-vin01a0:1709_2: maraṇassati ca asubhasaññātipi eke. Kammaṭṭhānikena hi bhikkhunā paṭhamaṃ tāva paricchinditvā
atk-vin01a0:1709_3: sīmaṭṭhakabhikkhusaṅghe mettā bhāvetabbā; tato sīmaṭṭhakadevatāsu, tato gocaragāme
atk-vin01a0:1709_4: issarajane, tato tattha manusse upādāya sabbasattesu. So hi bhikkhusaṅghe mettāya
atk-vin01a0:1709_5: sahavāsīnaṃ muducittataṃ janeti, athassa sukhasaṃvāsatā hoti. Sīmaṭṭhakadevatāsu
atk-vin01a0:1709_6: mettāya mudukatacittāhi devatāhi dhammikāya rakkhāya susaṃvihitārakkho hoti. Gocaragāme
atk-vin01a0:1709_7: issarajane mettāya mudukatacittasantānehi issarehi dhammikāya rakkhāya surakkhitaparikkhāro
atk-vin01a0:1709_8: hoti. Tattha manussesu mettāya pasāditacittehi tehi aparibhūto hutvā vicarati. Sabbasattesu
atk-vin01a0:1710_0: Maraṇassatiyā pana “avassaṃ maritabba”nti cintento anesanaṃ pahāya uparūparivaḍḍhamānasaṃvego
atk-vin01a0:1710_1: anolīnavuttiko hoti. Asubhasaññāya dibbesupi ārammaṇesu taṇhā nuppajjati. Tenassetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1710_2: tayaṃ evaṃ bahūpakārattā “sabbattha atthayitabbaṃ icchitabba”nti katvā adhippetassa
atk-vin01a0:1711_0: Aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesu pana yaṃ yassa caritānukūlaṃ, taṃ tassa niccaṃ pariharitabbattā
atk-vin01a0:1711_1: yathāvutteneva nayena “pārihāriyakammaṭṭhāna”ntipi vuccati. Idha pana idameva ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1711_2: “pārihāriyakammaṭṭhāna”nti vuccati. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana sīlavisodhanakathaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1712_0: Evaṃ visuddhasīlena pana upacchinnapalibodhena ca idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhantena
atk-vin01a0:1712_1: imināva kammaṭṭhānena catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1712_2: pattassa buddhaputtassa santike uggahetabbaṃ. Taṃ alabhantena anāgāmissa, tampi alabhantena
atk-vin01a0:1712_3: sakadāgāmissa, tampi alabhantena sotāpannassa, tampi alabhantena ānāpānacatutthajjhānalābhissa,
atk-vin01a0:1712_4: tampi alabhantena pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca asammūḷhassa vinicchayācariyassa santike
atk-vin01a0:1712_5: uggahetabbaṃ. Arahantādayo hi attanā adhigatamaggameva ācikkhanti. Ayaṃ pana gahanapadese
atk-vin01a0:1712_6: mahāhatthipathaṃ nīharanto viya sabbattha asammūḷho sappāyāsappāyaṃ paricchinditvā katheti.
atk-vin01a0:1713_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – tena bhikkhunā sallahukavuttinā vinayācārasampannena vuttappakāramācariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1713_1: upasaṅkamitvā vattapaṭipattiyā ārādhitacittassa tassa santike pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1713_2: uggahetabbaṃ. Tatrime pañca sandhayo – uggaho, paripucchā, upaṭṭhānaṃ, appanā, lakkhaṇanti.
atk-vin01a0:1713_3: Tattha “uggaho” nāma kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanaṃ, “paripucchā” nāma kammaṭṭhānassa
atk-vin01a0:1713_4: paripucchanā, “upaṭṭhānaṃ” nāma kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhānaṃ, “appanā” nāma kammaṭṭhānappanā,
atk-vin01a0:1713_5: “lakkhaṇaṃ” nāma kammaṭṭhānassa lakkhaṇaṃ. “Evaṃlakkhaṇamidaṃ kammaṭṭhāna”nti kammaṭṭhānasabhāvūpadhāraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1714_0: Evaṃ pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhanto attanāpi na kilamati, ācariyampi na viheṭheti;
atk-vin01a0:1714_1: tasmā thokaṃ uddisāpetvā bahukālaṃ sajjhāyitvā evaṃ pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā
atk-vin01a0:1714_2: sace tattha sappāyaṃ hoti, tattheva vasitabbaṃ. No ce tattha sappāyaṃ hoti, ācariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1714_3: āpucchitvā sace mandapañño yojanaparamaṃ gantvā, sace tikkhapañño dūrampi gantvā
atk-vin01a0:1714_5: tattha vasantena upacchinnakhuddakapalibodhena katabhattakiccena bhattasammadaṃ paṭivinodetvā
atk-vin01a0:1714_6: ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena cittaṃ sampahaṃsetvā ācariyuggahato ekapadampi asammussantena
atk-vin01a0:1714_7: idaṃ ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikātabbaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana imaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1715: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “idaṃ ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikātabba”nti tatrāyaṃ manasikāravidhi –
atk-vin01a0:1718_2: paṭipassanā”ti paccavekkhaṇā. Tattha iminā ādikammikakulaputtena paṭhamaṃ gaṇanāya
atk-vin01a0:1718_3: idaṃ kamaṭṭhānaṃ manasikātabbaṃ. Gaṇentena ca pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā na ṭhapetabbaṃ, dasannaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1718_4: upari na netabbaṃ, antare khaṇḍaṃ na dassetabbaṃ. Pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā ṭhapentassa hi
atk-vin01a0:1718_5: sambādhe okāse cittuppādo vipphandati, sambādhe vaje sanniruddhagogaṇo viya. Dasannaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1718_6: upari nentassa gaṇanānissitova cittuppādo hoti. Antarā khaṇḍaṃ dassentassa “sikhāppattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1718_7: nu kho me kammaṭṭhānaṃ, no”ti cittaṃ vikampati. Tasmā ete dose vajjetvā gaṇetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1719_0: Gaṇentena ca paṭhamaṃ dandhagaṇanāya dhaññamāpakagaṇanāya gaṇetabbaṃ. Dhaññamāpako
atk-vin01a0:1719_1: hi nāḷiṃ pūretvā “eka”nti vatvā okirati. Puna pūrento kiñci kacavaraṃ disvā taṃ chaḍḍento
atk-vin01a0:1719_2: “ekaṃ eka”nti vadati. Esa nayo “dve dve”tiādīsu. Evameva imināpi assāsapassāsesu
atk-vin01a0:1719_3: yo upaṭṭhāti taṃ gahetvā “ekaṃ eka”nti ādiṃkatvā yāva “dasa dasā”ti pavattamānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1719_4: pavattamānaṃ upalakkhetvāva gaṇetabbaṃ. Tassevaṃ gaṇayato nikkhamantā ca pavisantā
atk-vin01a0:1720_0: Athānena taṃ dandhagaṇanaṃ dhaññamāpakagaṇanaṃ pahāya sīghagaṇanāya gopālakagaṇanāya
atk-vin01a0:1720_1: gaṇetabbaṃ. Cheko hi gopālako sakkharāyo ucchaṅgena gahetvā rajjudaṇḍahattho pātova
atk-vin01a0:1720_2: vajaṃ gantvā gāvo piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā palighatthambhamatthake nisinno dvāraṃ pattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1720_3: pattaṃyeva gāvaṃ “eko dve”ti sakkharaṃ khipitvā khipitvā gaṇeti. Tiyāmarattiṃ sambādhe
atk-vin01a0:1720_4: okāse dukkhaṃ vutthagogaṇo nikkhamanto aññamaññaṃ upanighaṃsanto vegena vegena puñjo
atk-vin01a0:1720_5: puñjo hutvā nikkhamati. So vegena vegena “tīṇi cattāri pañca dasā”ti gaṇetiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:1720_6: Evamimassāpi purimanayena gaṇayato assāsapassāsā pākaṭā hutvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ punappunaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1720_7: sañcaranti. Tato tena “punappunaṃ sañcarantī”ti ñatvā anto ca bahi ca aggahetvā dvārappattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1720_8: dvārappattaṃyeva gahetvā “eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañca, eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañca
atk-vin01a0:1720_9: cha, eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañca cha satta…pe… aṭṭha… nava… dasā”ti sīghaṃ sīghaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1720_10: gaṇetabbameva. Gaṇanāpaṭibaddhe hi kammaṭṭhāne gaṇanābaleneva cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti
atk-vin01a0:1721_0: Tassevaṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirantarappavattaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-vin01a0:1721_1: Atha “nirantaraṃ pavattatī”ti ñatvā anto ca bahi ca vātaṃ apariggahetvā purimanayeneva
atk-vin01a0:1721_2: vegena vegena gaṇetabbaṃ. Antopavisanavātena hi saddhiṃ cittaṃ pavesayato abbhantaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1721_3: vātabbhāhataṃ medapūritaṃ viya hoti, bahinikkhamanavātena saddhiṃ cittaṃ nīharato
atk-vin01a0:1721_4: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ vikkhipati. Phuṭṭhokāse pana satiṃ ṭhapetvā bhāventasseva
atk-vin01a0:1721_5: bhāvanā sampajjati. Tena vuttaṃ – “anto ca bahi ca vātaṃ apariggahetvā purimanayeneva
atk-vin01a0:1722_0: Kīva ciraṃ panetaṃ gaṇetabbanti? Yāva vinā gaṇanāya assāsapassāsārammaṇe sati santiṭṭhati.
atk-vin01a0:1722_1: Bahi visaṭavitakkavicchedaṃ katvā assāsapassāsārammaṇe sati saṇṭhapanatthaṃyeva hi gaṇanāti.
atk-vin01a0:1723_0: Evaṃ gaṇanāya manasikatvā anubandhanāya manasikātabbaṃ. Anubandhanā nāma gaṇanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1723_1: paṭisaṃharitvā satiyā nirantaraṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanaṃ; tañca kho na ādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasena.
atk-vin01a0:1723_2: Bahinikkhamanavātassa hi nābhi ādi, hadayaṃ majjhaṃ, nāsikaggaṃ pariyosānaṃ. Abbhantarapavisanavātassa
atk-vin01a0:1723_3: nāsikaggaṃ ādi, hadayaṃ majjhaṃ, nābhi pariyosānaṃ. Tañcassa anugacchato vikkhepagataṃ
atk-vin01a0:1723_4: cittaṃ sāraddhāya ceva hoti iñjanāya ca. Yathāha –
atk-vin01a0:1724_0: “Assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi
atk-vin01a0:1724_1: cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca. Passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā
atk-vin01a0:1724_2: anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1725_0: Tasmā anubandhanāya manasikarontena na ādimajjhapariyosānavasena manasikātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1725_1: Apica kho phusanāvasena ca ṭhapanāvasena ca manasikātabbaṃ. Gaṇanānubandhanāvasena
atk-vin01a0:1725_2: viya hi phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi. Phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva pana
atk-vin01a0:1725_3: gaṇento gaṇanāya ca phusanāya ca manasi karoti. Tattheva gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te
atk-vin01a0:1725_4: satiyā anubandhanto appanāvasena ca cittaṃ ṭhapento “anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca
atk-vin01a0:1725_5: ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotī”ti vuccati. Svāyamattho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttapaṅguḷadovārikopamāhi
atk-vin01a0:1726_0: Tatrāyaṃ paṅguḷopamā – “seyyathāpi paṅguḷo dolāya kīḷataṃ mātāputtānaṃ dolaṃ khipitvā
atk-vin01a0:1726_1: tattheva dolatthambhamūle nisinno kamena āgacchantassa ca gacchantassa ca dolāphalakassa
atk-vin01a0:1726_2: ubho koṭiyo majjhañca passati, na ca ubhokoṭimajjhānaṃ dassanatthaṃ byāvaṭo hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1726_3: Evamevāyaṃ bhikkhu sativasena upanibandhanatthambhamūle ṭhatvā assāsapassāsadolaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1726_4: khipitvā tattheva nimitte satiyā nisinno kamena āgacchantānañca gacchantānañca phuṭṭhaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a0:1726_5: assāsapassāsānaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchanto tattha ca cittaṃ ṭhapento
atk-vin01a0:1726_6: passati, na ca tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ byāvaṭo hoti. Ayaṃ paṅguḷopamā.
atk-vin01a0:1727_0: Ayaṃ pana dovārikopamā – “seyyathāpi dovāriko nagarassa anto ca bahi ca purise ‘ko
atk-vin01a0:1727_1: tvaṃ, kuto vā āgato, kuhiṃ vā gacchasi, kiṃ vā te hatthe’ti na vīmaṃsati, na hi tassa
atk-vin01a0:1727_2: te bhārā. Dvārappattaṃ dvārappattaṃyeva pana vīmaṃsati; evameva imassa bhikkhuno
atk-vin01a0:1727_3: anto paviṭṭhavātā ca bahi nikkhantavātā ca na bhārā honti, dvārappattā dvārappattāyeva
atk-vin01a0:1728: Kakacopamā pana āditopabhuti evaṃ veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:1732: Jānato ca tayo dhamme, bhāvanā upalabbhatī”ti. ;
atk-vin01a0:1733_0: Kathaṃ ime tayo dhammā ekacittassa ārammaṇaṃ na honti, na cime tayo dhammā aviditā
atk-vin01a0:1733_1: honti, na ca cittaṃ vikkhepaṃ gacchati, padhānañca paññāyati, payogañca sādheti,
atk-vin01a0:1733_2: visesamadhigacchati? Seyyathāpi rukkho same bhūmibhāge nikkhitto, tamenaṃ puriso
atk-vin01a0:1733_3: kakacena chindeyya, rukkhe phuṭṭhakakacadantānaṃ vasena purisassa sati upaṭṭhitā
atk-vin01a0:1733_4: hoti, na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karoti, na āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā
atk-vin01a0:1733_5: aviditā honti, padhānañca paññāyati, payogañca sādheti.
atk-vin01a0:1734_0: Yathā rukkho same bhūmibhāge nikkhitto; evaṃ upanibandhananimittaṃ. Yathā kakacadantā;
atk-vin01a0:1734_1: evaṃ assāsapassāsā. Yathā rukkhe phuṭṭhakakacadantānaṃ vasena purisassa sati upaṭṭhitā
atk-vin01a0:1734_2: hoti, na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karoti, na āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā
atk-vin01a0:1734_3: aviditā honti, padhānañca paññāyati, payogañca sādheti, evameva bhikkhu nāsikagge
atk-vin01a0:1734_4: vā mukhanimitte vā satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā nisinno hoti, na āgate vā gate vā assāsapassāse
atk-vin01a0:1734_5: manasi karoti, na āgatā vā gatā vā assāsapassāsā aviditā honti, padhānañca paññāyati,
atk-vin01a0:1735_0: Padhānanti katamaṃ padhānaṃ? Āraddhavīriyassa kāyopi cittampi kammaniyaṃ hoti – idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1735_1: padhānaṃ. Katamo payogo? Āraddhavīriyassa upakkilesā pahīyanti, vitakkā vūpasammanti
atk-vin01a0:1735_2: – ayaṃ payogo. Katamo viseso? Āraddhavīriyassa saṃyojanā pahīyanti, anusayā byantī
atk-vin01a0:1735_3: honti – ayaṃ viseso. Evaṃ ime tayo dhammā ekacittassa ārammaṇā na honti, na cime
atk-vin01a0:1735_4: tayo dhammā aviditā honti, na ca cittaṃ vikkhepaṃ gacchati, padhānañca paññāyati,
atk-vin01a0:1738: So imaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti. ;
atk-vin01a0:1739_0: Ayaṃ kakacopamā. Idha panassa āgatāgatavasena amanasikāramattameva payojananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1739_1: Idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaroto kassaci nacireneva nimittañca uppajjati, avasesajjhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā
atk-vin01a0:1739_2: appanāsaṅkhātā ṭhapanā ca sampajjati. Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālatopabhuti
atk-vin01a0:1739_3: anukkamato oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodhavasena kāyadarathe vūpasante kāyopi cittampi
atk-vin01a0:1739_4: lahukaṃ hoti, sarīraṃ ākāse laṅghanākārappattaṃ viya hoti. Yathā sāraddhakāyassa
atk-vin01a0:1739_5: mañce vā pīṭhe vā nisīdato mañcapīṭhaṃ onamati, vikūjati, paccattharaṇaṃ valiṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-vin01a0:1739_6: Asāraddhakāyassa pana nisīdato neva mañcapīṭhaṃ onamati, na vikūjati, na paccattharaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1739_7: valiṃ gaṇhāti, tūlapicupūritaṃ viya mañcapīṭhaṃ hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā asāraddho kāyo
atk-vin01a0:1739_8: lahuko hoti; evameva gaṇanāvasena manasikārakālatopabhuti anukkamato oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodhavasena
atk-vin01a0:1739_9: kāyadarathe vūpasante kāyopi cittampi lahukaṃ hoti, sarīraṃ ākāse laṅghanākārappattaṃ viya hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1740_0: Tassa oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhe sukhumaassāsapassāsanimittārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ pavattati,
atk-vin01a0:1740_1: tasmimpi niruddhe aparāparaṃ tato sukhumatarasukhumatamanimittārammaṇaṃ pavattatiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:1740_2: Kathaṃ? Yathā puriso mahatiyā lohasalākāya kaṃsatāḷaṃ ākoṭeyya, ekappahārena mahāsaddo
atk-vin01a0:1740_3: uppajjeyya, tassa oḷārikasaddārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ pavatteyya, niruddhe oḷārike sadde
atk-vin01a0:1740_4: atha pacchā sukhumasaddanimittārammaṇaṃ, tasmimpi niruddhe aparāparaṃ tato sukhumatarasukhumatamasaddanimittārammaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1740_5: cittaṃ pavattateva; evanti veditabbaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “seyyathāpi kaṃse ākoṭite”ti vitthāro.
atk-vin01a0:1741_0: Yathā hi aññāni kammaṭṭhānāni uparūpari vibhūtāni honti, na tathā idaṃ. Idaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:1741_1: uparūpari bhāventassa bhāventassa sukhumattaṃ gacchati, upaṭṭhānampi na upagacchati.
atk-vin01a0:1741_2: Evaṃ anupaṭṭhahante pana tasmiṃ na tena bhikkhunā uṭṭhāyāsanā cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā
atk-vin01a0:1741_3: gantabbaṃ. Kiṃ kātabbaṃ? “Ācariyaṃ pucchissāmī”ti vā “naṭṭhaṃ dāni me kammaṭṭhāna”nti
atk-vin01a0:1741_4: vā na vuṭṭhātabbaṃ, iriyāpathaṃ vikopetvā gacchato hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ navanavameva hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1742_0: Tatrāyaṃ āharaṇūpāyo. Tena hi bhikkhunā kammaṭṭhānassa anupaṭṭhahanabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-vin01a0:1742_1: iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ – “ime assāsapassāsā nāma kattha atthi, kattha natthi, kassa
atk-vin01a0:1742_2: vā atthi, kassa vā natthī”ti. Athevaṃ paṭisañcikkhatā “ime antomātukucchiyaṃ natthi,
atk-vin01a0:1742_3: udake nimuggānaṃ natthi, tathā asaññībhūtānaṃ matānaṃ catutthajjhānasamāpannānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1742_4: rūpārūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ nirodhasamāpannāna”nti ñatvā evaṃ attanāva attā paṭicodetabbo
atk-vin01a0:1742_5: – “nanu tvaṃ, paṇḍita, neva mātukucchigato, na udake nimuggo, na asaññībhūto, na
atk-vin01a0:1742_6: mato, na catutthajjhānasamaāpanno, na rūpārūpabhavasamaṅgī, na nirodhasamāpanno,
atk-vin01a0:1742_7: atthiyeva te assāsapassāsā, mandapaññatāya pana pariggahetuṃ na sakkosī”ti. Athānena
atk-vin01a0:1742_8: pakatiphuṭṭhavaseneva cittaṃ ṭhapetvā manasikāro pavattetabbo. Ime hi dīghanāsikassa
atk-vin01a0:1742_9: nāsā puṭaṃ ghaṭṭentā pavattanti, rassanāsikassa uttaroṭṭhaṃ. Tasmānena imaṃ nāma
atk-vin01a0:1742_10: ṭhānaṃ ghaṭṭentīti nimittaṃ paṭṭhapetabbaṃ. Imameva hi atthavasaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1742_12: vadāmī”ti. Kiñcāpi hi yaṃkiñci kammaṭṭhānaṃ satassa sampajānasseva sampajjati, ito
atk-vin01a0:1742_13: aññaṃ pana manasikarontassa pākaṭaṃ hoti. Idaṃ pana ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ garukaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1742_15: na ceva ittaraṃ, na ca ittarasattasamāsevitaṃ. Yathā yathā manasi karīyati, tathā
atk-vin01a0:1742_16: tathā santañceva hoti sukhumañca. Tasmā ettha balavatī sati ca paññā ca icchitabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1743_0: Yathā hi maṭṭhasāṭakassa tunnakaraṇakāle sūcipi sukhumā icchitabbā, sūcipāsavedhanampi
atk-vin01a0:1743_1: tato sukhumataraṃ; evameva maṭṭhasāṭakasadisassa imassa kammaṭṭhānassa bhāvanākāle
atk-vin01a0:1743_2: sūcipaṭibhāgā satipi sūcipāsavedhanapaṭibhāgā taṃsampayuttā paññāpi balavatī icchitabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1743_3: Tāhi ca pana satipaññāhi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na te assāsapassāsā aññatra pakatiphuṭṭhokāsā pariyesitabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1744_0: Yathā pana kassako kasiṃ kasitvā balibadde muñcitvā gocarābhimukhe katvā chāyāya
atk-vin01a0:1744_1: nisinno vissameyya, athassa te balibaddā vegena aṭaviṃ paviseyyuṃ. Yo hoti cheko
atk-vin01a0:1744_2: kassako so puna te gahetvā yojetukāmo na tesaṃ anupadaṃ gantvā aṭaviṃ āhiṇḍati. Atha
atk-vin01a0:1744_3: kho rasmiñca patodañca gahetvā ujukameva tesaṃ nipātatitthaṃ gantvā nisīdati vā nipajjati
atk-vin01a0:1744_4: vā. Atha te goṇe divasabhāgaṃ caritvā nipātatitthaṃ otaritvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca
atk-vin01a0:1744_5: paccuttaritvā ṭhite disvā rasmiyā bandhitvā patodena vijjhanto ānetvā yojetvā puna
atk-vin01a0:1744_6: kammaṃ karoti; evameva tena bhikkhunā na te assāsapassāsā aññatra pakatiphuṭṭhokāsā
atk-vin01a0:1744_7: pariyesitabbā. Satirasmiṃ pana paññāpatodañca gahetvā pakatiphuṭṭhokāse cittaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-vin01a0:1744_8: manasikāro pavattetabbo. Evañhissa manasikaroto nacirasseva te upaṭṭhahanti, nipātatitthe
atk-vin01a0:1744_9: viya goṇā. Tato tena satirasmiyā bandhitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne yojetvā paññāpatodena
atk-vin01a0:1744_10: vijjhantena puna kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitabbaṃ; tassevamanuyuñjato nacirasseva nimittaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1744_11: upaṭṭhāti. Taṃ panetaṃ na sabbesaṃ ekasadisaṃ hoti; apica kho kassaci sukhasamphassaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1744_12: uppādayamāno tūlapicu viya, kappāsapicu viya, vātadhārā viya ca upaṭṭhātīti ekacce āhu.
atk-vin01a0:1745_0: Ayaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāvinicchayo – idañhi kassaci tārakarūpaṃ viya, maṇiguḷikā viya,
atk-vin01a0:1745_1: muttāguḷikā viya ca kassaci kharasamphassaṃ hutvā kappāsaṭṭhi viya, sāradārusūci
atk-vin01a0:1745_2: viya ca kassaci dīghapāmaṅgasuttaṃ viya, kusumadāmaṃ viya, dhūmasikhā viya ca kassaci
atk-vin01a0:1745_3: vitthata makkaṭakasuttaṃ viya, valāhakapaṭalaṃ viya, padumapupphaṃ viya, rathacakkaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1745_4: viya, candamaṇḍalaṃ viya, sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ viya ca upaṭṭhāti. Tañca panetaṃ yathā sambahulesu
atk-vin01a0:1745_5: bhikkhūsu suttantaṃ sajjhāyitvā nisinnesu ekena bhikkhunā “tumhākaṃ kīdisaṃ hutvā
atk-vin01a0:1745_6: idaṃ suttaṃ upaṭṭhātī”ti vutte eko “mayhaṃ mahatī pabbateyyā nadī viya hutvā upaṭṭhātī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1745_7: āha. Aparo “mayhaṃ ekā vanarāji viya”. Añño “mayhaṃ sītacchāyo sākhāsampanno phalabhārabharitarukkho
atk-vin01a0:1745_8: viyā”ti. Tesañhi taṃ ekameva suttaṃ saññānānatāya nānato upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ ekameva
atk-vin01a0:1745_9: kammaṭṭhānaṃ saññānānatāya nānato upaṭṭhāti. Saññajañhi etaṃ saññānidānaṃ saññāppabhavaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1746_0: Ettha ca aññameva assāsārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ, aññaṃ passāsārammaṇaṃ, aññaṃ nimittārammaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1746_1: yassa hi ime tayo dhammā natthi, tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ neva appanaṃ na upacāraṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-vin01a0:1746_2: Yassa panime tayo dhammā atthi, tasseva kammaṭṭhānaṃ appanañca upacārañca pāpuṇāti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:1750: Jānato ca tayo dhamme, bhāvanā upalabbhatī”ti. ;
atk-vin01a0:1751_0: Evaṃ upaṭṭhite pana nimitte tena bhikkhunā ācariyasantikaṃ gantvā ārocetabbaṃ – “mayhaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1751_1: bhante, evarūpaṃ nāma upaṭṭhātī”ti. Ācariyena pana “etaṃ nimitta”nti vā “na nimitta”nti
atk-vin01a0:1751_2: vā na vattabbaṃ. “Evaṃ hoti, āvuso”ti vatvā pana “punappunaṃ manasi karohī”ti vattabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1751_3: “Nimitta”nti hi vutte vosānaṃ āpajjeyya; “na nimitta”nti vutte nirāso visīdeyya.
atk-vin01a0:1751_4: Tasmā tadubhayampi avatvā manasikāreyeva niyojetabboti. Evaṃ tāva dīghabhāṇakā. Majjhimabhāṇakā
atk-vin01a0:1751_5: panāhu – “nimittamidaṃ, āvuso, kammaṭṭhānaṃ punappunaṃ manasi karohi sappurisāti
atk-vin01a0:1751_6: vattabbo”ti. Athānena nimitteyeva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ. Evamassāyaṃ ito pabhuti ṭhapanāvasena
atk-vin01a0:1754_0: Tassevaṃ nimittupaṭṭhānato pabhuti nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti kilesā sannisinnāva
atk-vin01a0:1754_1: sati upaṭṭhitāyeva, cittaṃ samāhitameva. Idañhi dvīhākārehi cittaṃ samāhitaṃ nāma
atk-vin01a0:1754_2: hohi – upacārabhūmiyaṃ vā nīvaraṇappahānena, paṭilābhabhūmiyaṃ vā aṅgapātubhāvena.
atk-vin01a0:1754_4: nānākaraṇaṃ? Upacārasamādhi kusalavīthiyaṃ javitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati, appanāsamādhi
atk-vin01a0:1754_5: divasabhāge appetvā nisinnassa divasabhāgampi kusalavīthiyaṃ javati, na bhavaṅgaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1754_6: otarati. Imesu dvīsu samādhīsu nimittapātubhāvena upacārasamādhinā samāhitaṃ cittaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1754_7: hoti. Athānena taṃ nimittaṃ neva vaṇṇato manasikātabbaṃ, na lakkhaṇato paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1754_8: Apica kho khattiyamahesiyā cakkavattigabbho viya kassakena sāliyavagabbho viya ca
atk-vin01a0:1754_9: appamattena rakkhitabbaṃ; rakkhitaṃ hissa phaladaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1757_0: Tatrāyaṃ rakkhaṇūpāyo – tena bhikkhunā āvāso, gocaro, bhassaṃ, puggalo, bhojanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1757_1: utu, iriyāpathoti imāni satta asappāyāni vajjetvā tāneva satta sappāyāni sevantena
atk-vin01a0:1758_0: Evaṃ sappāyasevanena nimittaṃ thiraṃ katvā vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ gamayitvā vatthuvisadakiriyā,
atk-vin01a0:1758_1: indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā, nimittakusalatā, yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sapaggahetabba
atk-vin01a0:1758_2: tasmiṃ samaye cittapaggaṇhanā, yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaniggaṇhanā,
atk-vin01a0:1758_3: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃsetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye sampahaṃsetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye
atk-vin01a0:1758_4: cittasampahaṃsanā, yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaajjhupekkhanā,
atk-vin01a0:1758_5: asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanā, samāhitapuggalasevanā, tadadhimuttatāti imāni dasa appanākosallāni
atk-vin01a0:1759_0: Tassevaṃ anuyuttassa viharato idāni appanā uppajjissatīti bhavaṅgaṃ vicchinditvā
atk-vin01a0:1759_1: nimittārammaṇaṃ manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati. Tasmiñca niruddhe tadevārammaṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:1759_2: cattāri pañca vā javanāni, yesaṃ paṭhamaṃ parikammaṃ, dutiyaṃ upacāraṃ, tatiyaṃ anulomaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1759_3: catutthaṃ gotrabhu, pañcamaṃ appanācittaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ vā parikammañceva upacārañca,
atk-vin01a0:1759_4: dutiyaṃ anulomaṃ, tatiyaṃ gotrabhu, catutthaṃ appanācittanti vuccati. Catutthameva
atk-vin01a0:1759_5: hi pañcamaṃ vā appeti, na chaṭṭhaṃ sattamaṃ vā āsannabhavaṅgapātattā.
atk-vin01a0:1760_0: Ābhidhammikagodattatthero panāha – “āsevanapaccayena kusalā dhammā balavanto honti;
atk-vin01a0:1760_1: tasmā chaṭṭhaṃ sattamaṃ vā appetī”ti. Taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ. Tattha pubbabhāgacittāni
atk-vin01a0:1760_2: kāmāvacarāni honti, appanācittaṃ pana rūpāvacaraṃ. Evamanena pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1760_4: hoti. So tasmiṃyevārammaṇe vitakkādayo vūpasametvā dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pāpuṇāti.
atk-vin01a0:1760_5: Ettāvatā ca ṭhapanāvasena bhāvanāya pariyosānappatto hoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepakathā.
atk-vin01a0:1761_0: Evaṃ pattacatutthajjhāno panettha bhikkhu sallakkhaṇāvivaṭṭanāvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1761_2: pañcahākārehi vasippattaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā arūpapubbaṅgamaṃ vā rūpaṃ, rūpapubbaṅgamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1761_3: vā arūpanti rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti. Kathaṃ? So hi jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-vin01a0:1761_4: jhānaṅgāni pariggahetvā tesaṃ nissayaṃ hadayavatthuṃ taṃ nissayāni ca bhūtāni tesañca
atk-vin01a0:1761_5: nissayaṃ sakalampi karajakāyaṃ passati. Tato “jhānaṅgāni arūpaṃ, vatthādīni rūpa”nti
atk-vin01a0:1762_0: Atha vā samāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā kesādīsu koṭṭhāsesu pathavīdhātuādivasena cattāri
atk-vin01a0:1762_1: bhūtāni taṃnissitarūpāni ca pariggahetvā yathāpariggahitarūpārammaṇaṃ yathāpariggahitarūpavatthudvārārammaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1762_2: vā sasampayuttadhammaṃ viññāṇañca passati. Tato “bhūtādīni rūpaṃ sasampayuttadhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1763_0: Atha vā samāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā assāsapassāsānaṃ samudayo karajakāyo ca cittañcāti
atk-vin01a0:1763_1: passati. Yathā hi kammāragaggariyā dhamamānāya bhastañca purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1763_2: paṭicca vāto sañcarati; evameva kāyañca cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsāti. Tato assāsapassāse
atk-vin01a0:1763_3: ca kāyañca rūpaṃ, cittañca taṃsampayuttadhamme ca arūpanti vavatthapeti.
atk-vin01a0:1764_0: Evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesati, pariyesanto ca taṃ disvā
atk-vin01a0:1764_1: tīsupi addhāsu nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ ārabbha kaṅkhaṃ vitarati. Vitiṇṇakaṅkho kalāpasammasanavasena
atk-vin01a0:1764_2: tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā udayabbayānupassanāya pubbabhāge uppanne obhāsādayo dasa vipassanupakkilese
atk-vin01a0:1764_3: pahāya upakkilesavimuttaṃ paṭipadāñāṇaṃ “maggo”ti vavatthapetvā udayaṃ pahāya bhaṅgānupassanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1764_4: patvā nirantaraṃ bhaṅgānupassanena bhayato upaṭṭhitesu sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindanto
atk-vin01a0:1764_5: virajjanto vimuccanto yathākkamaṃ cattāro ariyamagge pāpuṇitvā arahattaphale patiṭṭhāya
atk-vin01a0:1764_6: ekūnavīsatibhedassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa pariyantappatto sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyo
atk-vin01a0:1764_7: hoti. Ettāvatā cassa gaṇanaṃ ādiṃ katvā vipassanāpariyosānā ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā ca samattā hotīti.
atk-vin01a0:1766_0: Itaresu pana tīsu catukkesu yasmā visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthi; tasmā
atk-vin01a0:1766_1: anupadavaṇṇanānayeneva nesaṃ attho veditabbo. Pītippaṭisaṃvedīti pītiṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1766_2: karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati. Tattha dvīhākārehi pīti
atk-vin01a0:1766_3: paṭisaṃviditā hoti – ārammaṇato ca asammohato ca.
atk-vin01a0:1767: Kathaṃ ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjati, tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
atk-vin01a0:1768_0: Kathaṃ asammohato? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttakapītiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1768_1: khayato vayato sammasati, tassa vipassanākkhaṇe lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena asammohato pīti
atk-vin01a0:1769_0: “Dīghaṃ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1769_1: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Dīghaṃ passāsavasena…pe… rassaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1769_2: assāsavasena… rassaṃ passāsavasena… sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedī assāsavasena… sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedī
atk-vin01a0:1769_3: passāsavasena… passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assāsavasena… passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1769_4: passāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti, tāya satiyā
atk-vin01a0:1769_5: tena ñāṇena sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Āvajjato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti jānato…
atk-vin01a0:1769_6: passato… paccavekkhato… cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahato… saddhāya adhimuccato… vīriyaṃ paggaṇhato…
atk-vin01a0:1769_7: satiṃ upaṭṭhāpayato… cittaṃ samādahato… paññāya pajānato… abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānato…
atk-vin01a0:1769_8: pariññeyyaṃ parijānato… pahātabbaṃ pajahato… bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvayato… sacchikātabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1769_9: sacchikaroto sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Evaṃ sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1770_0: Eteneva nayena avasesapadānipi atthato veditabbāni. Idaṃ panettha visesamattaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1770_1: jhānānaṃ vasena sukhapaṭisaṃveditā catunnampi vasena cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃveditā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1770_2: “Cittasaṅkhāro”ti vedanādayo dve khandhā. Sukhappaṭisaṃvedipade cettha vipassanābhūmidassanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1770_3: “sukhanti dve sukhāni – kāyikañca sukhaṃ cetasikañcā”ti paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Passambhayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1770_4: cittasaṅkhāranti oḷārikaṃ oḷārikaṃ cittasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento, nirodhentoti attho.
atk-vin01a0:1770_5: So vitthārato kāyasaṅkhāre vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Apicettha pītipade pītisīsena
atk-vin01a0:1770_6: vedanā vuttā. Sukhapade sarūpeneva vedanā. Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesu “saññā ca vedanā
atk-vin01a0:1770_7: ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittapaṭibaddhā cittasaṅkhārā”ti vacanato saññāsampayuttā
atk-vin01a0:1770_8: vedanāti. Evaṃ vedanānupassanānayena idaṃ catukkaṃ bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1771_0: Tatiyacatukkepi catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cittapaṭisaṃveditā veditabbā. Abhippamodayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1771_1: cittanti cittaṃ modento pamodento hāsento pahāsento assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
atk-vin01a0:1771_2: Tattha dvīhākārehi abhippamodo hoti – samādhivasena ca vipassanāvasena ca.
atk-vin01a0:1772_0: Kathaṃ samādhivasena? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjati, so samāpattikkhaṇe sampayuttāya
atk-vin01a0:1772_1: pītiyā cittaṃ āmodeti pamodeti. Kathaṃ vipassanāvasena? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā
atk-vin01a0:1772_2: vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttakapītiṃ khayato vayato sammasati; evaṃ vipassanākkhaṇe jhānasampayuttakapītiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1772_3: ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittaṃ āmodeti pamodeti. Evaṃ paṭipanno “abhippamodayaṃ cittaṃ assasissāmi
atk-vin01a0:1773_0: Samādahaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānādivasena ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento
atk-vin01a0:1773_1: tāni vā pana jhānāni samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttakacittaṃ khayato vayato
atk-vin01a0:1773_2: sammasato vipassanākkhaṇe lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena uppajjati khaṇikacittekaggatā; evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1773_3: uppannāya khaṇikacittekaggatāya vasenapi ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento
atk-vin01a0:1774_0: Vimocayaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇehi cittaṃ mocento vimocento, dutiyena
atk-vin01a0:1774_1: vitakkavicārehi, tatiyena pītiyā, catutthena sukhadukkhehi cittaṃ mocento vimocento.
atk-vin01a0:1774_2: Tāni vā pana jhānāni samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttakacittaṃ khayato vayato
atk-vin01a0:1774_3: sammasati. So vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento vimocento,
atk-vin01a0:1774_5: nandito, virāgānupassanāya rāgato, nirodhānupassanāya samudayato, paṭinissaggānupassanāya
atk-vin01a0:1774_6: ādānato cittaṃ mocento vimocento assasati ceva passasati ca. Tena vuttaṃ – “vimocayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1774_7: cittaṃ assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti. Evaṃ cittānupassanāvasena idaṃ catukkaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1775_0: Catutthacatukke pana aniccānupassīti ettha tāva aniccaṃ veditabbaṃ, aniccatā veditabbā,
atk-vin01a0:1775_1: aniccānupassanā veditabbā, aniccānupassī veditabbo. Tattha “anicca”nti pañcakkhandhā.
atk-vin01a0:1775_3: abhāvo vā nibbattānaṃ tenevākārena aṭhatvā khaṇabhaṅgena bhedoti attho. “Aniccānupassanā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1775_4: tassā aniccatāya vasena rūpādīsu “anicca”nti anupassanā; “aniccānupassī”ti tāya anupassanāya
atk-vin01a0:1775_5: samannāgato; tasmā evaṃ bhūto assasanto ca passasanto ca idha “aniccānupassī assasissāmi,
atk-vin01a0:1776_0: Virāgānupassīti ettha pana dve virāgā – khayavirāgo ca accantavirāgo ca. Tattha “khayavirāgo”ti
atk-vin01a0:1776_2: pavattā vipassanā ca maggo ca. Tāya duvidhāyapi anupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto
atk-vin01a0:1776_3: ca passasanto ca “virāgānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:1777_0: Paṭinissaggānupassīti etthāpi dve paṭinissaggā – pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ca pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo
atk-vin01a0:1777_1: ca. Paṭinissaggoyeva anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā; vipassanāmaggānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1777_2: Vipassanā hi tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati, saṅkhatadosadassanena
atk-vin01a0:1777_3: ca tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandatīti pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo
atk-vin01a0:1777_4: cāti vuccati. Maggo samucchedavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati,
atk-vin01a0:1777_5: ārammaṇakaraṇena ca nibbāne pakkhandatīti pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissago
atk-vin01a0:1777_6: cāti vuccati. Ubhayampi pana purimapurimañāṇānaṃ anuanu passanato anupassanāti vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:1777_7: Tāya duvidhāya paṭinissaggānupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto ca passasanto
atk-vin01a0:1777_8: ca paṭinisaggānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatīti veditabbo. Evaṃ bhāvitoti
atk-vin01a0:1777_9: evaṃ soḷasahi ākārehi bhāvito. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-vin01a0:1779_0: 167. Atha kho bhagavātiādimhi pana ayaṃ saṅkhepattho. Evaṃ bhagavā ānāpānassatisamādhikathāya
atk-vin01a0:1779_1: bhikkhū samassāsetvā atha yaṃ taṃ tatiyapārājikapaññattiyā nidānañceva pakaraṇañca
atk-vin01a0:1779_2: uppannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aññamaññaṃ jīvitā voropanaṃ, etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe
atk-vin01a0:1779_3: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā paṭipucchitvā vigarahitvā ca yasmā tattha attanā attānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1779_4: jīvitā voropanaṃ migalaṇḍikena ca voropāpanaṃ pārājikavatthu na hoti; tasmā taṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-vin01a0:1779_5: pārājikassa vatthubhūtaṃ aññamaññaṃ jīvitā voropanameva gahetvā pārājikaṃ paññapento
atk-vin01a0:1779_6: “yo pana bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggaha”ntiādimāha. Ariyapuggalamissakattā panettha
atk-vin01a0:1780_0: Evaṃ mūlacchejjavasena daḷhaṃ katvā tatiyapārājike paññatte aparampi anupaññattatthāya
atk-vin01a0:1781_0: 168. Tattha paṭibaddhacittāti chandarāgena paṭibaddhacittā; sārattā apekkhavantoti
atk-vin01a0:1781_1: attho. Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇemāti jīvite ādīnavaṃ dassetvā maraṇassa guṇaṃ vaṇṇema;
atk-vin01a0:1781_2: ānisaṃsaṃ dassemāti. Katakalyāṇotiādīsu ayaṃ padattho – kalyāṇaṃ sucikammaṃ kataṃ
atk-vin01a0:1781_3: tayāti tvaṃ kho asi katakalyāṇo. Tathā kusalaṃ anavajjakammaṃ kataṃ tayāti katakusalo.
atk-vin01a0:1781_4: Maraṇakāle sampatte yā sattānaṃ uppajjati bhayasaṅkhātā bhīrutā, tato tāyanaṃ rakkhaṇakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1781_5: kataṃ tayāti katabhīruttāṇo pāpaṃ. Lāmakakammaṃ akataṃ tayāti akatapāpo. Luddaṃ dāruṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1781_6: dussīlyakammaṃ akataṃ tayāti akataluddo. Kibbisaṃ sāhasikakammaṃ lobhādikilesussadaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1781_7: akataṃ tayāti akatakibbiso. Kasmā idaṃ vuccati? Yasmā sabbappakārampi kataṃ tayā
atk-vin01a0:1781_8: kalyāṇaṃ, akataṃ tayā pāpaṃ; tena taṃ vadāma – “kiṃ tuyhaṃ iminā rogābhibhūtattā
atk-vin01a0:1781_9: lāmakena pāpakena dukkhabahulattā dujjīvitena”. Mataṃ te jīvitā seyyoti tava maraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1781_10: jīvitā sundarataraṃ. Kasmā? Yasmā ito tvaṃ kālaṅkato katakālo hutvā kālaṃ katvā maritvāti
atk-vin01a0:1781_11: attho. Kāyassa bhedā…pe… upapajjissasi. Evaṃ upapanno ca tattha dibbehi devaloke
atk-vin01a0:1781_12: uppannehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi manāpiyarūpādikehi pañcahi vatthukāmakoṭṭhāsehi samappito
atk-vin01a0:1781_13: samaṅgībhūto paricarissasi sampayutto samodhānagato hutvā ito cito ca carissasi,
atk-vin01a0:1782: 169. Asappāyānīti ahitāni avuḍḍhikarāni yāni khippameva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti.
atk-vin01a0:1784_0: 172. Sañciccāti ayaṃ “sañcicca manussaviggaha”nti mātikāya vuttassa sañciccapadassa
atk-vin01a0:1784_1: uddhāro. Tattha santi upasaggo, tena saddhiṃ ussukkavacanametaṃ sañciccāti; tassa
atk-vin01a0:1784_2: sañcetetvā suṭṭhu cetetvāti attho. Yasmā pana yo sañcicca voropeti, so jānanto sañjānanto
atk-vin01a0:1784_3: hoti, tañcassa voropanaṃ cecca abhivitaritvā vītikkamo hoti. Tasmā byañjane ādaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1784_4: akatvā atthameva dassetuṃ “jānanto sañjānanto cecca abhivitaritvā vītikkamo”ti evamassa
atk-vin01a0:1784_5: padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha jānantoti “pāṇo”ti jānanto. Sañjānantoti “jīvitā voropemī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1784_6: sañjānanto; teneva pāṇajānanākārena saddhiṃ jānantoti attho. Ceccāti vadhakacetanāvasena
atk-vin01a0:1784_7: cetetvā pakappetvā. Abhivitaritvāti upakkamavasena maddanto nirāsaṅkacittaṃ pesetvā.
atk-vin01a0:1784_8: Vītikkamoti evaṃ pavattassa yo vītikkamo ayaṃ sañciccasaddassa sikhāppatto atthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:1785_0: Idāni “manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeyyā”ti ettha vuttaṃ manussattabhāvaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya
atk-vin01a0:1785_1: dassetuṃ “manussaviggaho nāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vasena sabbasukhumaattabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1785_2: “yaṃ mātukucchismi”nti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ cittanti paṭisandhicittaṃ. Uppannanti jātaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1785_3: Paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṃ pātubhūtanti idaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. “Mātukucchismiṃ paṭhamaṃ citta”nti
atk-vin01a0:1785_4: vacanena cettha sakalāpi pañcavokārapaṭisandhi dassitā hoti. Tasmā tañca paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1785_5: cittaṃ taṃsampayuttā ca tayo arūpakkhandhā tena saha nibbattañca kalalarūpanti ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1785_7: samatiṃsa rūpāni, napuṃsakānaṃ kāyavatthudasakavasena vīsati. Tattha itthipurisānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1785_8: kalalarūpaṃ jātiuṇṇāya ekena aṃsunā uddhaṭatelabindumattaṃ hoti acchaṃ vippasannaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1788: Evaṃ parittakaṃ vatthuṃ ādiṃ katvā pakatiyā vīsavassasatāyukassa sattassa yāva maraṇakālā etthantare anupubbena vuḍḍhippatto attabhāvo eso manussaviggaho nāma.
atk-vin01a0:1789_0: Jīvitā voropeyyāti kalalakālepi tāpanamaddanehi vā bhesajjasampadānena vā tato vā
atk-vin01a0:1789_1: uddhampi tadanurūpena upakkamena jīvitā viyojeyyāti attho. Yasmā pana jīvitā voropanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1789_2: nāma atthato jīvitindriyupacchedanameva hoti, tasmā etassa padabhājane “jīvitindriyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1789_3: upacchindati uparodheti santatiṃ vikopetī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha jīvitindriyassa paveṇighaṭanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1789_4: upacchindanto uparodhento ca “jīvitindriyaṃ upacchindati uparodhetī”ti vuccati. Svāyamattho
atk-vin01a0:1790_0: Tattha duvidhaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ – rūpajīvitindriyaṃ, arūpajīvitindriyañca. Tesu arūpajīvitindriye
atk-vin01a0:1790_1: upakkamo natthi, taṃ voropetuṃ na sakkā. Rūpajīvitindriye pana atthi, taṃ voropetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1790_2: sakkā. Taṃ pana voropento arūpajīvitindriyampi voropeti. Teneva hi saddhiṃ taṃ nirujjhati
atk-vin01a0:1790_3: tadāyattavuttito. Taṃ pana voropento kiṃ atītaṃ voropeti, anāgataṃ, paccuppannanti?
atk-vin01a0:1790_4: Neva atītaṃ, na anāgataṃ, tesu hi ekaṃ niruddhaṃ ekaṃ anuppannanti ubhapampi asantaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1790_5: asantattā upakkamo natthi, upakkamassa natthitāya ekampi voropetuṃ na sakkā. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:1791: “Atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvittha, na jīvati; na jīvissati. Anāgate cittakkhaṇe jīvissati, na jīvittha; na jīvati. Paccuppanne cittakkhaṇe jīvati, na jīvittha; na jīvissatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1792: Tasmā yattha jīvati tattha upakkamo yuttoti paccuppannaṃ voropeti.
atk-vin01a0:1793_1: tividhaṃ. Tattha “khaṇapaccuppannaṃ” nāma uppādajarābhaṅgasamaṅgi, taṃ voropetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1793_2: na sakkā. Kasmā? Sayameva nirujjhanato. “Santatipaccuppannaṃ” nāma sattaṭṭhajavanavāramattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1793_3: sabhāgasantativasena pavattitvā nirujjhanakaṃ, yāva vā uṇhato āgantvā ovarakaṃ pavisitvā
atk-vin01a0:1793_4: nisinnassa andhakāraṃ hoti, sītato vā āgantvā ovarake nisinnassa yāva visabhāgautupātubhāvena
atk-vin01a0:1793_5: purimako utu nappaṭippassambhati, etthantare “santatipaccuppanna”nti vuccati. Paṭisandhito
atk-vin01a0:1793_6: pana yāva cuti, etaṃ “addhāpaccuppannaṃ” nāma. Tadubhayampi voropetuṃ sakkā. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a0:1793_7: Tasmiñhi upakkame kate laddhupakkamaṃ jīvitanavakaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ dubbalassa parihīnavegassa
atk-vin01a0:1793_8: santānassa paccayo hoti. Tato santatipaccuppannaṃ vā addhāpaccuppannaṃ vā yathāparicchinnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1793_9: kālaṃ apatvā antarāva nirujjhati. Evaṃ tadubhayampi voropetuṃ sakkā, tasmā tadeva
atk-vin01a0:1794_0: Imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ pāṇo veditabbo, pāṇātipāto veditabbo, pāṇātipāti
atk-vin01a0:1794_1: veditabbo, pāṇātipātassa payogo veditabbo. Tattha “pāṇo”ti vohārato satto, paramatthato
atk-vin01a0:1794_2: jīvitindriyaṃ. Jīvitindriyañhi atipātento “pāṇaṃ atipātetī”ti vuccati taṃ vuttappakārameva.
atk-vin01a0:1794_3: “Pāṇātipāto”ti yāya cetanāya jīvitindriyupacchedakaṃ payogaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sā vadhakacetanā
atk-vin01a0:1794_5: payogo”ti pāṇātipātassa chapayogā – sāhatthiko, āṇattiko, nissaggiyo, thāvaro, vijjāmayo, iddhimayoti.
atk-vin01a0:1795_0: Tattha “sāhatthiko”ti sayaṃ mārentassa kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā paharaṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1795_1: “Āṇattiko”ti aññaṃ āṇāpentassa “evaṃ vijjhitvā vā paharitvā vā mārehī”ti āṇāpanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1795_2: “Nissaggiyo”ti dūre ṭhitaṃ māretukāmassa kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā ususattiyantapāsāṇādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1795_4: bhesajjasaṃvidhānaṃ. Te cattāropi parato pāḷivaṇṇanāyameva vitthārato āvibhavissanti.
atk-vin01a0:1796_0: Vijjāmayaiddhimayā pana pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā. Te evaṃ veditabbā. Saṅkhepato hi māraṇatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1796_1: vijjāparijappanaṃ vijjāmayo payogo. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana “katamo vijjāmayo payogo? Āthabbaṇikā
atk-vin01a0:1796_2: āthabbaṇaṃ payojenti; nagare vā ruddhe saṅgāme vā paccupaṭṭhite paṭisenāya paccatthikesu
atk-vin01a0:1796_3: paccāmittesu ītiṃ uppādenti, upaddavaṃ uppādenti, rogaṃ uppādenti, pajjarakaṃ uppādenti,
atk-vin01a0:1796_4: sūcikaṃ karonti, visūcikaṃ karonti, pakkhandiyaṃ karonti. Evaṃ āthabbaṇikā āthabbaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1796_5: payojenti. Vijjādhārā vijjaṃ parivattetvā nagare vā ruddhe…pe… pakkhandiyaṃ karontī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1796_6: evaṃ vijjāmayaṃ payogaṃ dassetvā āthabbaṇikehi ca vijjādharehi ca māritānaṃ bahūni
atk-vin01a0:1796_7: vatthūni vuttāni, kiṃ tehi! Idañhettha lakkhaṇaṃ māraṇāya vijjāparijappanaṃ vijjāmayo payogoti.
atk-vin01a0:1797_0: Kammavipākajāya iddhiyā payojanaṃ iddhimayo payogo. Kammavipākajiddhi ca nāmesā nāgānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1797_1: nāgiddhi, supaṇṇānaṃ supaṇṇiddhi, yakkhānaṃ yakkhiddhi, devānaṃ deviddhi, rājūnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1797_2: rājiddhīti bahuvidhā. Tattha diṭṭhadaṭṭhaphuṭṭhavisānaṃ nāgānaṃ disvā ḍaṃsitvā phusitvā
atk-vin01a0:1797_3: ca parūpaghātakaraṇe “nāgiddhi” veditabbā. Supaṇṇānaṃ mahāsamuddato dvattibyāmasatappamāṇanāguddharaṇe
atk-vin01a0:1797_4: “supaṇṇiddhi” veditabbā. Yakkhā pana neva āgacchantā na paharantā dissanti, tehi
atk-vin01a0:1797_5: pahaṭasattā pana tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne maranti, tatra tesaṃ “yakkhiddhi” daṭṭhabbā. Vessavaṇassa
atk-vin01a0:1797_6: sotāpannakālato pubbe nayanāvudhena olokitakumbhaṇḍānaṃ maraṇe aññesañca devānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1797_7: yathāsakaṃ iddhānubhāve “deviddhi” veditabbā. Rañño cakkavattissa saparisassa ākāsagamanādīsu,
atk-vin01a0:1797_8: asokassa heṭṭhā upari ca yojane āṇāpavattanādīsu, piturañño ca sīhaḷanarindassa dāṭhākoṭanena
atk-vin01a0:1798_0: Keci pana “puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā iddhimā cetovasippatto
atk-vin01a0:1798_1: aññissā kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ pāpakena manasāanupekkhitā hoti ‘aho vatāyaṃ kucchigato
atk-vin01a0:1798_2: gabbho na sotthinā abhinikkhameyyā’ti. Evampi bhikkhave kulumbassa upaghāto hotī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1798_3: ādikāni suttāni dassetvā bhāvanāmayiddhiyāpi parūpaghātakammaṃ vadanti; saha parūpaghātakaraṇena
atk-vin01a0:1798_4: ca ādittagharūparikhittassa udakaghaṭassa bhedanamiva iddhivināsañca icchanti; taṃ
atk-vin01a0:1798_5: tesaṃ icchāmattameva. Kasmā? Yasmā kusalavedanāvitakkaparittattikehi na sameti. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a0:1798_6: Ayañhi bhāvanāmayiddhi nāma kusalattike kusalā ceva abyākatā ca, pāṇātipāto akusalo.
atk-vin01a0:1798_7: Vedanāttike adukkhamasukhasampayuttā pāṇātipāto dukkhasampayutto. Vitakkattike avitakkāvicārā,
atk-vin01a0:1798_8: pāṇātipāto savitakkasavicāro. Parittattike mahaggatā, pāṇātipāto parittoti.
atk-vin01a0:1799_0: Satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyāti ettha haratīti hārakaṃ. Kiṃ harati? Jīvitaṃ. Atha
atk-vin01a0:1799_1: vā haritabbanti hārakaṃ; upanikkhipitabbanti attho. Satthañca taṃ hārakañcāti satthahārakaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1799_2: Assāti manussaviggahassa. Pariyeseyyāti yathā labhati tathā kareyya; upanikkhipeyyāti
atk-vin01a0:1799_3: attho. Etena thāvarappayogaṃ dasseti. Itarathā hi pariyiṭṭhamatteneva pārājiko bhaveyya;
atk-vin01a0:1799_4: na cetaṃ yuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana sabbaṃ byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā yaṃ ettha thāvarappayogasaṅgahitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1799_5: satthaṃ, tadeva dassetuṃ “asiṃ vā…pe… rajjuṃ vā”ti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1800_0: Tattha satthanti vuttāvasesaṃ yaṃkiñci samukhaṃ veditabbaṃ. Laguḷapāsāṇavisarajjūnañca
atk-vin01a0:1800_1: jīvitavināsanabhāvato satthasaṅgaho veditabbo. Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vāti ettha yasmā “kiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1800_2: tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena, yo tvaṃ na labhasi paṇītāni bhojanāni bhuñjitu”ntiādinā
atk-vin01a0:1800_3: nayena jīvite ādīnavaṃ dassentopi “tvaṃ khosi upāsaka katakalyāṇo…pe… akataṃ tayā
atk-vin01a0:1800_4: pāpaṃ, mataṃ te jīvitā seyyo, ito tvaṃ kālaṅkato paricarissasi accharāparivuto nandanavane
atk-vin01a0:1800_5: sukhappatto viharissasī”tiādinā nayena maraṇe vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇantopi maraṇavaṇṇameva saṃvaṇṇeti.
atk-vin01a0:1800_6: Tasmā dvidhā bhinditvā padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ – “jīvite ādīnavaṃ dasseti, maraṇe vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:1801_0: Maraṇāya vā samādapeyyāti maraṇatthāya upāyaṃ gāhāpeyya. Satthaṃ vā āharāti ādīsu
atk-vin01a0:1801_1: ca yampi na vuttaṃ “sobbhe vā narake vā papāte vā papatā”tiādi, taṃ sabbaṃ parato
atk-vin01a0:1801_2: vuttanayattā atthato vuttamevāti veditabbaṃ. Na hi sakkā sabbaṃ sarūpeneva vattuṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1802_0: Iti cittamanoti iticitto itimano; “mataṃ te jīvitā seyyo”ti ettha vuttamaraṇacitto
atk-vin01a0:1802_1: maraṇamanoti attho. Yasmā panettha mano cittasaddassa atthadīpanatthaṃ vutto, atthato
atk-vin01a0:1802_2: panetaṃ ubhayampi ekameva, tasmā tassa atthato abhedaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ cittaṃ taṃ mano,
atk-vin01a0:1802_3: yaṃ mano taṃ citta”nti vuttaṃ. Itisaddaṃ pana uddharitvāpi na tāva attho vutto. Cittasaṅkappoti
atk-vin01a0:1802_4: imasmiṃ pade adhikāravasena itisaddo āharitabbo. Idañhi “iticittasaṅkappo”ti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1802_5: avuttampi adhikārato vuttameva hotīti veditabbaṃ. Tathā hissa tamevaatthaṃ dassento
atk-vin01a0:1802_6: “maraṇasaññī”tiādimāha. Yasmā cettha “saṅkappo”ti nayidaṃ vitakkassa nāmaṃ. Atha
atk-vin01a0:1802_7: kho saṃvidahanamattassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tañca saṃvidahanaṃ imasmiṃ atthe saññācetanādhippāyehi
atk-vin01a0:1802_8: saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Tasmā citto nānappakārako saṅkappo assāti cittasaṅkappoti evamattho
atk-vin01a0:1802_9: daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hissa padabhājanampi saññācetanādhippāyavasena vuttaṃ. Ettha ca
atk-vin01a0:1803_0: Uccāvacehi ākārehīti mahantāmahantehi upāyehi. Tattha maraṇavaṇṇasaṃvaṇṇane tāva
atk-vin01a0:1803_1: jīvite ādīnavadassanavasena avacākāratā maraṇe vaṇṇabhaṇanavasena uccākāratā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1803_2: Samādapane pana muṭṭhijāṇunipphoṭanādīhi maraṇasamādapanavasena uccākāratā, ekato
atk-vin01a0:1803_3: bhuñjantassa nakhe visaṃ pakkhipitvā maraṇādisamādapanavasena avacākāratā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1804_0: Sobbhe vā narake vā papāte vāti ettha sobbho nāma samantato chinnataṭo gambhīro āvāṭo.
atk-vin01a0:1804_1: Narako nāma tattha tattha phalantiyā bhūmiyā sayameva nibbattā mahādarī, yattha hatthīpi
atk-vin01a0:1804_2: patanti, corāpi nilīnā tiṭṭhanti. Papātoti pabbatantare vā thalantare vā ekato chinno
atk-vin01a0:1804_3: hoti. Purime upādāyāti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā adinnañca ādiyitvā pārājikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1804_4: āpattiṃ āpanne puggale upādāya. Sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca pākaṭamevāti.
atk-vin01a0:1805_0: 174. Evaṃ uddiṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ padānukkamena vibhajitvā idāni yasmā heṭṭhā padabhājanīyamhi
atk-vin01a0:1805_1: saṅkhepeneva manussaviggahapārājikaṃ dassitaṃ, na vitthārena āpattiṃ āropetvā tanti
atk-vin01a0:1805_2: ṭhapitā. Saṅkhepadassite ca atthe na sabbākāreneva bhikkhū nayaṃ gahetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-vin01a0:1805_3: anāgate ca pāpapuggalānampi okāso hoti, tasmā bhikkhūnañca sabbākārena nayaggahaṇatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1805_4: anāgate ca pāpapuggalānaṃ okāsapaṭibāhanatthaṃ puna “sāmaṃ adhiṭṭhāyā”tiādinā nayena
atk-vin01a0:1805_5: mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārato manussaviggahapārājikaṃ dassento “sāmanti sayaṃ hanatī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:1806_0: Tatrāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanāya saddhiṃ vinicchayakathā – kāyenāti hatthena vā pādena
atk-vin01a0:1806_1: vā muṭṭhinā vā jāṇunā vā yena kenaci aṅgapaccaṅgena. Kāyapaṭibaddhenāti kāyato amocitena
atk-vin01a0:1806_2: asiādinā paharaṇena. Nissaggiyenāti kāyato ca kāyapaṭibaddhato ca mocitena ususattiādinā.
atk-vin01a0:1806_3: Ettāvatā sāhatthiko ca nissaggiyo cāti dve payogā vuttā honti.
atk-vin01a0:1807_0: Tattha ekameko uddissānuddissabhedato duvidho. Tattha uddesike yaṃ uddissa paharati,
atk-vin01a0:1807_1: tasseva maraṇena kammunā bajjhati. “Yo koci maratū”ti evaṃ anuddesike pahārappaccayā
atk-vin01a0:1807_2: yassa kassaci maraṇena kammunā bajjhati. Ubhayathāpi ca paharitamatte vā maratu pacchā
atk-vin01a0:1807_3: vā teneva rogena, paharitamatteyeva kammunā bajjhati. Maraṇādhippāyena ca pahāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:1807_4: datvā tena amatassa puna aññacittena pahāre dinne pacchāpi yadi paṭhamappahāreneva
atk-vin01a0:1807_5: marati, tadā eva kammunā baddho. Atha dutiyappahārena marati, natthi pāṇātipāto.
atk-vin01a0:1807_6: Ubhayehi matepi paṭhamappahāreneva kammunā baddho. Ubhayehi amate nevatthi pāṇātipāto.
atk-vin01a0:1807_7: Esa nayo bahūhipi ekassa pahāre dinne. Tatrāpi hi yassa pahārena marati, tasseva
atk-vin01a0:1808_0: Kammāpattibyattibhāvatthañcettha eḷakacatukkampi veditabbaṃ. Yo hi eḷakaṃ ekasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1808_1: ṭhāne nipannaṃ upadhāreti “rattiṃ āgantvā vadhissāmī”ti. Eḷakassa ca nipannokāse
atk-vin01a0:1808_2: tassa mātā vā pitā vā arahā vā paṇḍukāsāvaṃ pārupitvā nipanno hoti. So rattibhāge
atk-vin01a0:1808_3: āgantvā “eḷakaṃ māremī”ti mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā arahantaṃ vā māreti. “Imaṃ vatthuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1808_4: māremī”ti cetanāya atthibhāvato ghātako ca hoti, anantariyakammañca phusati, pārājikañca
atk-vin01a0:1808_5: āpajjati. Añño koci āgantuko nipanno hoti, “eḷakaṃ māremī”ti taṃ māreti, ghātako
atk-vin01a0:1808_6: ca hoti pārājikañca āpajjati, ānantariyaṃ na phusati. Yakkho vā peto vā nipanno hoti,
atk-vin01a0:1808_7: “eḷakaṃ māremī”ti taṃ māreti ghātakova hoti, na cānantariyaṃ phusati, na ca pārājikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1808_8: āpajjati, thullaccayaṃ pana hoti. Añño koci nipanno natthi, eḷakova hoti taṃ māreti,
atk-vin01a0:1808_9: ghātako ca hoti, pācittiyañca āpajjati. “Mātāpituarahantānaṃ aññataraṃ māremī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1808_10: tesaṃyeva aññataraṃ māreti, ghātako ca hoti, ānantariyañca phusati, pārājikañca āpajjati.
atk-vin01a0:1808_11: “Tesaṃ aññataraṃ māressāmī”ti aññaṃ āgantukaṃ māreti, yakkhaṃ vā petaṃ vā māreti,
atk-vin01a0:1808_12: eḷakaṃ vā māreti, pubbe vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Idha pana cetanā dāruṇā hotīti.
atk-vin01a0:1809_0: Aññānipi ettha palālapuñjādivatthūni veditabbāni. Yo hi “lohitakaṃ asiṃ vā sattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1809_1: vā pucchissāmī”ti palālapuñje pavesento tattha nipannaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā arahantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1809_2: vā āgantukapurisaṃ vā yakkhaṃ vā petaṃ vā tiracchānagataṃ vā māreti, vohāravasena
atk-vin01a0:1809_3: “ghātako”ti vuccati, vadhakacetanāya pana abhāvato neva kammaṃ phusati, na āpattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1809_4: āpajjati. Yo pana evaṃ pavesento sarīrasamphassaṃ sallakkhetvā “satto maññe abbhantaragato
atk-vin01a0:1809_5: maratū”ti pavesetvā māreti, tassa tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ anurūpena kammabaddho ca āpatti
atk-vin01a0:1809_6: ca veditabbā. Esa nayo tattha nidahanatthaṃ pavesentassāpi vanappagumbādīsu khipantassāpi.
atk-vin01a0:1810_0: Yopi “coraṃ māremī”ti coravesena gacchantaṃ pitaraṃ māreti, ānantariyañca phusati,
atk-vin01a0:1810_1: pārājiko ca hoti. Yo pana parasenāya aññañca yodhaṃ pitarañca kammaṃ karonte disvā
atk-vin01a0:1810_2: yodhassa usuṃ khipati, “etaṃ vijjhitvā mama pitaraṃ vijjhissatī”ti yathādhippāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1810_3: gate pitughātako hoti. “Yodhe viddhe mama pitā palāyissatī”ti khipati, usu ayathādhippāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1810_4: gantvā pitaraṃ māreti, vohāravasena “pitughātako”ti vuccati; ānantariyaṃ pana natthīti.
atk-vin01a0:1811_0: Adhiṭṭhahitvāti samīpe ṭhatvā. Āṇāpetīti uddissa vā anuddissa vā āṇāpeti. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:1811_1: parasenāya paccupaṭṭhitāya anuddisseva “evaṃ vijjha, evaṃ pahara, evaṃ ghātehī”ti
atk-vin01a0:1811_2: āṇatte yattake āṇatto ghāteti, tattakā ubhinnaṃ pāṇātipātā. Sace tattha āṇāpakassa
atk-vin01a0:1811_3: mātāpitaro honti, ānantariyampi phusati. Sace āṇattasseva mātāpitaro, sova ānantariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1811_4: phusati. Sace arahā hoti, ubhopi ānantariyaṃ phusanti. Uddisitvā pana “etaṃ dīghaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1811_5: rassaṃ rattakañcukaṃ nīlakañcukaṃ hatthikkhandhe nisinnaṃ majjhe nisinnaṃ vijjha
atk-vin01a0:1811_6: pahara ghātehī”ti āṇatte sace so tameva ghāteti, ubhinnampi pāṇātipāto; ānantariyavatthumhi
atk-vin01a0:1811_7: ca ānantariyaṃ. Sace aññaṃ māreti, āṇāpakassa natthi pāṇātipāto. Etena āṇattiko payogo
atk-vin01a0:1815: Vatthu kālo ca okāso, āvudhaṃ iriyāpatho;
atk-vin01a0:1817_0: Tattha “vatthū”ti māretabbo satto. “Kālo”ti pubbaṇhasāyanhādikālo ca yobbanathāvariyādikālo
atk-vin01a0:1817_1: ca. “Okāso”ti gāmo vā vanaṃ vā gehadvāraṃ vā gehamajjhaṃ vā rathikā vā siṅghāṭakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1817_2: vāti evamādi. “Āvudha”nti asi vā usu vā satti vāti evamādi. “Iriyāpatho”ti māretabbassa
atk-vin01a0:1817_3: gamanaṃ vā nisajjā vāti evamādi. “Kiriyāviseso”ti vijjhanaṃ vā chedanaṃ vā bhedanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1818_0: Yadi hi vatthuṃ visaṃvādetvā “yaṃ mārehī”ti āṇatto tato aññaṃ māreti, “purato paharitvā
atk-vin01a0:1818_1: mārehī”ti vā āṇatto pacchato vā passato vā aññasmiṃ vā padese paharitvā māreti. Āṇāpakassa
atk-vin01a0:1818_2: natthi kammabandho; āṇattasseva kammabandho. Atha vatthuṃ avisaṃvādetvā yathāṇattiyā
atk-vin01a0:1818_3: māreti, āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇe āṇattassa ca māraṇakkhaṇeti ubhayesampi kammabandho.
atk-vin01a0:1818_4: Vatthuvisesena panettha kammaviseso ca āpattiviseso ca hotīti. Evaṃ tāva vatthumhi
atk-vin01a0:1819_0: Kāle pana yo “ajja sve”ti aniyametvā “pubbaṇhe mārehī”ti āṇatto yadā kadāci pubbaṇhe
atk-vin01a0:1819_1: māreti, natthi visaṅketo. Yo pana “ajja pubbaṇhe”ti vutto majjhanhe vā sāyanhe vā
atk-vin01a0:1819_2: sve vā pubbaṇhe māreti. Visaṅketo hoti, āṇāpakassa natthi kammabandho. Pubbaṇhe māretuṃ
atk-vin01a0:1819_3: vāyamantassa majjhanhe jātepi eseva nayo. Etena nayena sabbakālappabhedesu saṅketavisaṅketatā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:1820_0: Okāsepi yo “etaṃ gāme ṭhitaṃ mārehī”ti aniyametvā āṇatto taṃ yattha katthaci māreti,
atk-vin01a0:1820_1: natthi visaṅketo. Yo pana “gāmeyevā”ti niyametvā āṇatto vane māreti, tathā “vane”ti
atk-vin01a0:1820_2: āṇatto gāme māreti. “Antogehadvāre”ti āṇatto gehamajjhe māreti, visaṅketo. Etena
atk-vin01a0:1821_0: Āvudhepi yo “asinā vā usunā vā”ti aniyametvā “āvudhena mārehī”ti āṇatto yena kenaci
atk-vin01a0:1821_1: āvudhena māreti, natthi visaṅketo. Yo pana “asinā”ti vutto usunā, “iminā vā asinā”ti
atk-vin01a0:1821_2: vutto aññena asinā māreti. Etasseva vā asissa “imāya dhārāya mārehī”ti vutto itarāya
atk-vin01a0:1821_3: vā dhārāya talena vā tuṇḍena vā tharunā vā māreti, visaṅketo. Etena nayena sabbaāvudhabhedesu
atk-vin01a0:1822_0: Iriyāpathe pana yo “etaṃ gacchantaṃ mārehī”ti vadati, āṇatto ca naṃ sace gacchantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1822_1: māreti, natthi visaṅketo. “Gacchantameva mārehī”ti vutto pana sace nisinnaṃ māreti.
atk-vin01a0:1822_2: “Nisinnameva vā mārehī”ti vutto gacchantaṃ māreti, visaṅketo hoti. Etena nayena sabbairiyāpathabhedesu
atk-vin01a0:1823_0: Kiriyāvisesepi yo “vijjhitvā mārehī”ti vutto vijjhitvāva māreti, natthi visaṅketo.
atk-vin01a0:1823_1: Yo pana “vijjhitvā mārehī”ti vutto chinditvā māreti, visaṅketo. Etena nayena sabbakiriyāvisesabhedesu
atk-vin01a0:1824_0: Yo pana liṅgavasena “dīghaṃ rassaṃ kāḷaṃ odātaṃ kisaṃ thūlaṃ mārehī”ti aniyametvā
atk-vin01a0:1824_1: āṇāpeti, āṇatto ca yaṃkiñci tādisaṃ māreti, natthi visaṅketo ubhinnaṃ pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1824_2: Atha pana so attānaṃ sandhāya āṇāpeti, āṇatto ca “ayameva īdiso”ti āṇāpakameva māreti,
atk-vin01a0:1824_3: āṇāpakassa dukkaṭaṃ, vadhakassa pārājikaṃ. Āṇāpako attānaṃ sandhāya āṇāpeti, itaro
atk-vin01a0:1824_4: aññaṃ tādisaṃ māreti, āṇāpako muccati, vadhakasseva pārājikaṃ. Kasmā? Okāsassa aniyamitattā.
atk-vin01a0:1824_5: Sace pana attānaṃ sandhāya āṇāpentopi okāsaṃ niyameti, “asukasmiṃ nāma rattiṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a0:1824_6: vā divāṭṭhāne vā therāsane vā navāsane vā majjhimāsane vā nisinnaṃ evarūpaṃ nāma
atk-vin01a0:1824_7: mārehī”ti. Tattha ca añño nisinno hoti, sace āṇatto taṃ māreti, neva vadhako muccati
atk-vin01a0:1824_8: na āṇāpako. Kasmā? Okāsassa niyamitattā. Sace pana niyamitokāsato aññatra māreti,
atk-vin01a0:1824_9: āṇāpako muccatīti ayaṃ nayo mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ suṭṭhu daḷhaṃ katvā vutto. Tasmā ettha
atk-vin01a0:1826_0: Idāni ye dūtenāti imassa mātikāpadassa niddesadassanatthaṃ “bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetī”tiādayo
atk-vin01a0:1826_1: cattāro vārā vuttā. Tesu so taṃ maññamānoti so āṇatto yo āṇāpakena “itthannāmo”ti
atk-vin01a0:1826_2: akkhāto, taṃ maññamāno tameva jīvitā voropeti, ubhinnaṃ pārājikaṃ. Taṃ maññamāno
atk-vin01a0:1826_3: aññanti “yaṃ jīvitā voropehī”ti vutto taṃ maññamāno aññaṃ tādisaṃ jīvitā voropeti,
atk-vin01a0:1826_4: mūlaṭṭhassa anāpatti. Aññaṃ maññamāno tanti yo āṇāpakena vutto, tassa balavasahāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1826_5: samīpe ṭhitaṃ disvā “imassa balenāyaṃ gajjati, imaṃ tāva jīvitā voropemī”ti paharanto
atk-vin01a0:1826_6: itarameva parivattitvā tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ “sahāyo”ti maññamāno jīvitā voropeti,
atk-vin01a0:1826_7: ubhinnaṃ pārājikaṃ. Aññaṃ maññamāno aññanti purimanayeneva “imaṃ tāvassa sahāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1826_8: jīvitā voropemī”ti sahāyameva voropeti, tasseva pārājikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1827_0: Dūtaparamparāpadassa niddesavāre itthannāmassa pāvadātiādīsu eko ācariyo tayo buddharakkhitadhammarakkhitasaṅgharakkhitanāmakā
atk-vin01a0:1827_1: antevāsikā daṭṭhabbā. Tattha bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetīti ācariyo kañci puggalaṃ mārāpetukāmo
atk-vin01a0:1827_2: tamatthaṃ ācikkhitvā buddharakkhitaṃ āṇāpeti. Itthannāmassa pāvadāti gaccha tvaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:1827_3: buddharakkhita, etamatthaṃ dhammarakkhitassa pāvada. Itthannāmo itthannāmassa pāvadatūti
atk-vin01a0:1827_4: dhammarakkhitopi saṅgharakkhitassa pāvadatu. Itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ jīvitā voropetūti
atk-vin01a0:1827_5: evaṃ tayā āṇattena dhammarakkhitena āṇatto saṅgharakkhito itthannāmaṃ puggalaṃ jīvitā
atk-vin01a0:1827_6: voropetu; so hi amhesu vīrajātiko paṭibalo imasmiṃ kammeti. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1827_7: āṇāpentassa ācariyassa tāva dukkaṭaṃ. So itarassa ārocetīti buddharakkhito dhammarakkhitassa,
atk-vin01a0:1827_8: dhammarakkhito ca saṅgharakkhitassa “amhākaṃ ācariyo evaṃ vadati – ‘itthannāmaṃ kira
atk-vin01a0:1827_9: jīvitā voropehī’ti. Tvaṃ kira amhesu vīrapuriso”ti āroceti; evaṃ tesampi dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1827_10: Vadhako paṭiggaṇhātīti “sādhu voropessāmī”ti saṅgharakkhito sampaṭicchati. Mūlaṭṭhassa
atk-vin01a0:1827_11: āpatti thullaccayassāti saṅgharakkhitena paṭiggahitamatte ācariyassa thullaccayaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1827_12: Mahājano hi tena pāpe niyojitoti. So tanti so ce saṅgharakkhito taṃ puggalaṃ jīvitā
atk-vin01a0:1827_13: voropeti, sabbesaṃ catunnampi janānaṃ pārājikaṃ. Na kevalañca catunnaṃ, etenūpāyena
atk-vin01a0:1827_14: visaṅketaṃ akatvā paramparāya āṇāpentaṃ samaṇasataṃ samaṇasahassaṃ vā hotu sabbesaṃ pārājikameva.
atk-vin01a0:1828_0: Visakkiyadūtapadaniddese so aññaṃ āṇāpetīti so ācariyena āṇatto buddharakkhito dhammarakkhitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1828_1: adisvā vā avattukāmo vā hutvā saṅgharakkhitameva upasaṅkamitvā “amhākaṃ ācariyo evamāha
atk-vin01a0:1828_2: – ‘itthannāmaṃ kira jīvitā voropehī”ti visaṅketaṃ karonto āṇāpeti. Visaṅketakaraṇeneva
atk-vin01a0:1828_3: hi esa “visakkiyadūto”ti vuccati. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti āṇattiyā tāva buddharakkhitassa
atk-vin01a0:1828_4: dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassāti saṅgharakkhitena sampaṭicchite mūlaṭṭhasseva
atk-vin01a0:1828_5: dukkaṭanti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ sante paṭiggahaṇe āpattiyeva na siyā, sañcaritta paṭiggahaṇamaraṇābhinandanesupi
atk-vin01a0:1828_6: ca āpatti hoti, maraṇapaṭiggahaṇe kathaṃ na siyā tasmā paṭiggaṇhantassevetaṃ dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1828_7: Tenevettha “mūlaṭṭhassā”ti na vuttaṃ. Purimanayepi cetaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa veditabbameva;
atk-vin01a0:1828_8: okāsābhāvena pana na vuttaṃ. Tasmā yo yo paṭiggaṇhāti, tassa tassa tappaccayā āpattiyevāti
atk-vin01a0:1828_9: ayamettha amhākaṃ khanti. Yathā cettha evaṃ adinnādānepīti.
atk-vin01a0:1829_0: Sace pana so taṃ jīvitā voropeti, āṇāpakassa ca buddharakkhitassa voropakassa ca
atk-vin01a0:1829_1: saṅgharakkhitassāti ubhinnampi pārājikaṃ. Mūlaṭṭhassa pana ācariyassa visaṅketattā
atk-vin01a0:1829_2: pārājikena anāpatti. Dhammarakkhitassa ajānanatāya sabbena sabbaṃ anāpatti. Buddharakkhito
atk-vin01a0:1829_3: pana dvinnaṃ sotthibhāvaṃ katvā attanā naṭṭhoti.
atk-vin01a0:1830_0: Gatapaccāgatadūtaniddese – so gantvā puna paccāgacchatīti tassa jīvitā voropetabbassa
atk-vin01a0:1830_1: samīpaṃ gantvā susaṃvihitārakkhattā taṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ asakkonto āgacchati. Yadā
atk-vin01a0:1830_2: sakkosi tadāti kiṃ ajjeva mārito mārito hoti, gaccha yadā sakkosi, tadā naṃ jīvitā
atk-vin01a0:1830_3: voropehīti. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti evaṃ puna āṇattiyāpi dukkaṭameva hoti. Sace pana
atk-vin01a0:1830_4: so avassaṃ jīvitā voropetabbo hoti, atthasādhakacetanā maggānantaraphalasadisā, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:1830_5: ayaṃ āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pārājiko. Sacepi vadhako saṭṭhivassātikkamena taṃ vadhati,
atk-vin01a0:1830_6: āṇāpako ca antarāva kālaṅkaroti, hīnāya vā āvattati, assamaṇova hutvā kālañca karissati,
atk-vin01a0:1830_7: hīnāya vā āvattissati. Sace āṇāpako gihikāle mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā arahantaṃ vā sandhāya
atk-vin01a0:1830_8: evaṃ āṇāpetvā pabbajati, tasmiṃ pabbajite āṇatto taṃ māreti, āṇāpako gihikāleyeva
atk-vin01a0:1830_9: mātughātako pitughātako arahantaghātako vā hoti, tasmā nevassa pabbajjā, na upasampadā
atk-vin01a0:1830_10: ruhati. Sacepi māretabbapuggalo āṇattikkhaṇe puthujjano, yadā pana naṃ āṇatto māreti
atk-vin01a0:1830_11: tadā arahā hoti, āṇattato vā pahāraṃ labhitvā dukkhamūlikaṃ saddhaṃ nissāya vipassanto
atk-vin01a0:1830_12: arahattaṃ patvā tenevābādhena kālaṃkaroti, āṇāpako āṇattikkhaṇeyeva arahantaghātako.
atk-vin01a0:1831: Idāni ye sabbesuyeva imesu dūtavasena vuttamātikāpadesu saṅketavisaṅketadassanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:1832_0: Vuttā tayo vārā, tesu paṭhamavāre tāva – yasmā taṃ saṇikaṃ vā bhaṇanto tassa vā badhiratāya
atk-vin01a0:1832_1: “mā ghātehī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ na sāveti, tasmā mūlaṭṭho na mutto. Dutiyavāre – sāvitattā
atk-vin01a0:1832_2: mutto. Tatiyavāre pana tena ca sāvitattā itarena ca “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā oratattā ubhopi muttāti.
atk-vin01a0:1834_0: 175. Araho rahosaññīniddesādīsu arahoti sammukhe. Rahoti parammukhe. Tattha yo upaṭṭhānakāle
atk-vin01a0:1834_1: veribhikkhumhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āgantvā purato nisinneyeva andhakāradosena tassa
atk-vin01a0:1834_2: āgatabhāvaṃ ajānanto “aho vata itthannāmo hato assa, corāpi nāma taṃ na hananti,
atk-vin01a0:1834_3: sappo vā na ḍaṃsati, na satthaṃ vā visaṃ vā āharatī”ti tassa maraṇaṃ abhinandanto
atk-vin01a0:1834_4: īdisāni vacanāni ullapati, ayaṃ araho rahosaññī ullapati nāma. Sammukheva tasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:1834_5: parammukhasaññīti attho. Yo pana taṃ purato nisinnaṃ disvā puna upaṭṭhānaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:1834_6: gatehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ gatepi tasmiṃ “idheva so nisinno”ti saññī hutvā purimanayeneva
atk-vin01a0:1834_7: ullapati, ayaṃ raho arahosaññī ullapati nāma. Etenevupāyena araho arahosaññī ca raho
atk-vin01a0:1834_8: rahosaññī ca veditabbo. Catunnampi ca etesaṃ vācāya vācāya dukkaṭanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:1835_0: Idāni maraṇavaṇṇasaṃvaṇṇanāya vibhāgadassanatthaṃ vuttesu pañcasu kāyena saṃvaṇṇanādimātikāniddesesu
atk-vin01a0:1835_1: – kāyena vikāraṃ karotīti yathā so jānāti “satthaṃ vā āharitvā visaṃ vā khāditvā
atk-vin01a0:1835_2: rajjuyā vā ubbandhitvā sobbhādīsu vā papatitvā yo marati so kira dhanaṃ vā labhati,
atk-vin01a0:1835_3: yasaṃ vā labhati, saggaṃ vā gacchatīti ayamattho etena vutto”ti tathā hatthamuddādīhi
