atk-vin01a0:2334_2: saṅghādisesena anuddhaṃsane visuṃ pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā anuddhaṃsanādhippāye sati
atk-vin01a0:2334_3: sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyassa okāso na dissati, na ca sakkā anuddhaṃsentassa anāpattiyā
atk-vin01a0:2334_4: bhavitunti purimanayovettha parisuddhataro khāyati. Tathā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ amūlakena
atk-vin01a0:2334_5: antimavatthunā anuddhaṃseti saṅghādiseso, bhikkhuṃ anuddhaṃseti dukkaṭaṃ, tatra saṅghādiseso
atk-vin01a0:2334_6: vuṭṭhānagāmī dukkaṭaṃ, desanāgāmī etehi nāsanā natthi. Yasmā pana sā pakatiyāva dussīlā
atk-vin01a0:2334_7: pāpabhikkhunī idāni ca sayameva “dussīlāmhī”ti vadati tasmā naṃ bhagavā asuddhattāyeva nāsesīti.
atk-vin01a0:2335_0: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakāti evaṃ “mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsetha, ime ca bhikkhū anuyuñjathā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2335_1: vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭhe bhagavati tehi bhikkhūhi “detha dāni imissā setakānī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2335_2: nāsiyamānaṃ taṃ bhikkhuniṃ disvā te bhikkhū taṃ mocetukāmatāya attano aparādhaṃ āvikariṃsu,
atk-vin01a0:2336_0: 385-6. Duṭṭho dosoti dūsito ceva dūsako ca. Uppanne hi dose puggalo tena dosena dūsito
atk-vin01a0:2336_1: hoti pakatibhāvaṃ jahāpito, tasmā “duṭṭho”ti vuccati. Parañca dūseti vināseti, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:2336_2: “doso”ti vuccati. Iti “duṭṭho doso”ti ekassevetaṃ puggalassa ākāranānattena nidassanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2336_3: tena vuttaṃ “duṭṭho dosoti dūsito ceva dūsako cā”ti tattha saddalakkhaṇaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2336_4: Yasmā pana so “duṭṭho doso”ti saṅkhyaṃ gato paṭighasamaṅgīpuggalo kupitādibhāve ṭhitova
atk-vin01a0:2336_5: hoti, tenassa padabhājane “kupito”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kupitoti kuppabhāvaṃ pakatito
atk-vin01a0:2336_6: cavanabhāvaṃ patto. Anattamanoti na sakamano attano vase aṭṭhitacitto; apica pītisukhehi
atk-vin01a0:2336_7: na attamano na attacittoti anattamano. Anabhiraddhoti na sukhito na vā pasāditoti
atk-vin01a0:2336_8: anabhiraddho. Paṭighena āhataṃ cittamassāti āhatacitto. Cittathaddhabhāvacittakacavarasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2336_9: paṭighakhīlaṃ jātamassāti khilajāto. Appatītoti nappatīto pītisukhādīhi vajjito,
atk-vin01a0:2336_10: na abhisaṭoti attho. Padabhājane pana yesaṃ dhammānaṃ vasena appatīto hoti, te dassetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2337_0: Tattha tena ca kopenāti yena duṭṭhoti ca kupitoti ca vutto ubhayampi hetaṃ pakatibhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2337_1: jahāpanato ekākāraṃ hoti. Tena ca dosenāti yena “doso”ti vutto. Imehi dvīhi saṅkhārakkhandhameva dasseti.
atk-vin01a0:2338: Tāya ca anattamanatāyāti yāya “anattamano”ti vutto. Tāya ca anabhiraddhiyāti yāya “anabhiraddho”ti vutto. Imehi dvīhi vedanākkhandhaṃ dasseti.
atk-vin01a0:2339_0: Amūlakena pārājikenāti ettha nāssa mūlanti amūlakaṃ, taṃ panassa amūlakattaṃ yasmā
atk-vin01a0:2339_1: codakavasena adhippetaṃ, na cuditakavasena. Tasmā tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ padabhājane
atk-vin01a0:2339_2: “amūlakaṃ nāma adiṭṭhaṃ asutaṃ aparisaṅkita”nti āha. Tena imaṃ dīpeti “yaṃ pārājikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2339_3: codakena cuditakamhi puggale neva diṭṭhaṃ na sutaṃ na parisaṅkitaṃ idaṃ etesaṃ dassanasavanaparisaṅkāsaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2339_4: mūlānaṃ abhāvato amūlakaṃ nāma, taṃ pana so āpanno vā hotu anāpanno vā etaṃ idha appamāṇanti.
atk-vin01a0:2340: Tattha adiṭṭhaṃ nāma attano pasādacakkhunā vā dibbacakkhunā vā adiṭṭhaṃ. Asutaṃ nāma tatheva kenaci vuccamānaṃ na sutaṃ. Aparisaṅkitaṃ nāma cittena aparisaṅkitaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2341_0: “Diṭṭhaṃ” nāma attanā vā parena vā pasādacakkhunā vā dibbacakkhunā vā diṭṭhaṃ. “Sutaṃ”
atk-vin01a0:2341_1: nāma tatheva sutaṃ. “Parisaṅkita”mpi attanā vā parena vā parisaṅkitaṃ. Tattha attanā
atk-vin01a0:2341_2: diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhameva, parehi diṭṭhaṃ attanā sutaṃ, parehi sutaṃ, parehi parisaṅkitanti
atk-vin01a0:2341_3: idaṃ pana sabbampi attanā sutaṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati.
atk-vin01a0:2342_0: Parisaṅkitaṃ pana tividhaṃ – diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ, sutaparisaṅkitaṃ, mutaparisaṅkitanti.
atk-vin01a0:2342_1: Tattha diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ nāma eko bhikkhu uccārapassāvakammena gāmasamīpe ekaṃ gumbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2342_2: paviṭṭho, aññatarāpi itthī kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ gumbaṃ pavisitvā nivattā, nāpi
atk-vin01a0:2342_3: bhikkhu itthiṃ addasa; na itthī bhikkhuṃ, adisvāva ubhopi yathāruciṃ pakkantā, aññataro
atk-vin01a0:2342_4: bhikkhu ubhinnaṃ tato nikkhamanaṃ sallakkhetvā “addhā imesaṃ kataṃ vā karissanti
atk-vin01a0:2343_0: Sutaparisaṅkitaṃ nāma idhekacco andhakāre vā paṭicchanne vā okāse mātugāmena saddhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2343_1: bhikkhuno tādisaṃ paṭisanthāravacanaṃ suṇāti, samīpe aññaṃ vijjamānampi “atthi natthī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2343_2: na jānāti, so “addhā imesaṃ kataṃ vā karissanti vā”ti parisaṅkati, idaṃ sutaparisaṅkitaṃ nāma.
atk-vin01a0:2344_0: Mutaparisaṅkitaṃ nāma sambahulā dhuttā rattibhāge pupphagandhamaṃsasurādīni gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:2344_1: itthīhi saddhiṃ ekaṃ paccantavihāraṃ gantvā maṇḍape vā bhojanasālādīsu vā yathāsukhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2344_2: kīḷitvā pupphādīni vikiritvā gatā, punadivase bhikkhū taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā “kassidaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2344_3: kamma”nti vicinanti. Tatra ca kenaci bhikkhunā pageva vuṭṭhahitvā vattasīsena maṇḍapaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2344_4: vā bhojanasālaṃ vā paṭijaggantena pupphādīni āmaṭṭhāni honti, kenaci upaṭṭhākakulato
atk-vin01a0:2344_5: ābhatehi pupphādīhi pūjā katā hoti, kenaci bhesajjatthaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ pītaṃ hoti, atha
atk-vin01a0:2344_6: te “kassidaṃ kamma”nti vicinantā bhikkhū tesaṃ hatthagandhañca mukhagandhañca ghāyitvā
atk-vin01a0:2344_7: te bhikkhū parisaṅkanti, idaṃ mutaparisaṅkitaṃ nāma.
atk-vin01a0:2345_0: Tattha diṭṭhaṃ atthi samūlakaṃ, atthi amūlakaṃ; diṭṭhameva atthi saññāsamūlakaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2345_1: atthi saññāamūlakaṃ. Esa nayo sutepi. Parisaṅkite pana diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ atthi samūlakaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2345_2: atthi amūlakaṃ; diṭṭhaparisaṅkitameva atthi saññāsamūlakaṃ, atthi saññāamūlakaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2345_3: Esa nayo sutamutaparisaṅkitesu. Tattha diṭṭhaṃ samūlakaṃ nāma pārājikaṃ āpajjantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2345_4: disvāva “diṭṭho mayā”ti vadati, amūlakaṃ nāma paṭicchannokāsato nikkhamantaṃ disvā
atk-vin01a0:2345_5: vītikkamaṃ adisvā “diṭṭho mayā”ti vadati. Diṭṭhameva saññāsamūlakaṃ nāma disvāva
atk-vin01a0:2345_6: diṭṭhasaññī hutvā codeti, saññāamūlakaṃ nāma pubbe pārājikavītikkamaṃ disvā pacchā
atk-vin01a0:2345_7: adiṭṭhasaññī jāto, so saññāya amūlakaṃ katvā “diṭṭho mayā”ti codeti. Etena nayena
atk-vin01a0:2345_8: sutamutaparisaṅkitānipi vitthārato veditabbāni. Ettha ca sabbappakāreṇāpi samūlakena
atk-vin01a0:2345_9: vā saññāsamūlakena vā codentassa anāpatti, amūlakena vā pana saññāamūlakena vā codentasseva āpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2346_0: Anuddhaṃseyyāti dhaṃseyya padhaṃseyya abhibhaveyya ajjhotthareyya. Taṃ pana anuddhaṃsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2346_1: yasmā attanā codentopi parena codāpentopi karotiyeva, tasmāssa padabhājane “codeti
atk-vin01a0:2347_0: Tattha codetīti “pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannosī”tiādīhi vacanehi sayaṃ codeti, tassa
atk-vin01a0:2347_1: vācāya vācāya saṅghādiseso. Codāpetīti attanā samīpe ṭhatvā aññaṃ bhikkhu āṇāpeti,
atk-vin01a0:2347_2: so tassa vacanena taṃ codeti, codāpakasseva vācāya vācāya saṅghādiseso. Atha sopi
atk-vin01a0:2347_3: “mayā diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ atthī”ti codeti, dvinnampi janānaṃ vācāya vācāya saṅghādiseso.
atk-vin01a0:2348_1: Tattha eko bhikkhu ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ekena vatthunā codeti, imissā codanāya ekaṃ vatthu
atk-vin01a0:2348_2: eko codako. Sambahulā ekaṃ ekavatthunā codenti, pañcasatā mettiyabhūmajakappamukhā
atk-vin01a0:2348_3: chabbaggiyā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtamiva, imissā codanāya ekaṃ vatthu
atk-vin01a0:2348_4: nānācodakā. Eko bhikkhu ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ sambahulehi vatthūhi codeti, imissā codanāya
atk-vin01a0:2348_5: nānāvatthūni eko codako. Sambahulā sambahule sambahulehi vatthūhi codenti, imissā
atk-vin01a0:2349_0: Codetuṃ pana ko labhati, ko na labhatīti? Dubbalacodakavacanaṃ tāva gahetvā koci
atk-vin01a0:2349_1: na labhati. Dubbalacodako nāma sambahulesu kathāsallāpena nisinnesu eko ekaṃ ārabbha
atk-vin01a0:2349_2: anodissakaṃ katvā pārājikavatthuṃ katheti, añño taṃ sutvā itarassa gantvā āroceti.
atk-vin01a0:2349_3: So taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “tvaṃ kira maṃ idañcidañca vadasī”ti vadati. So “nāhaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2349_4: jānāmi, kathāpavattiyaṃ pana mayā anodissakaṃ katvā vuttamatthi, sace ahaṃ tava imaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2349_5: dukkhuppattiṃ jāneyyaṃ, ettakampi na katheyya”nti ayaṃ dubbalacodako. Tassetaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2349_6: gahetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ koci codetuṃ na labhati. Etaṃ pana aggahetvā sīlasampanno bhikkhu
atk-vin01a0:2349_7: bhikkhuṃ vā bhikkhuniṃ vā sīlasampannā ca bhikkhunī bhikkhunīmeva codetuṃ labhatīti
atk-vin01a0:2349_8: mahāpadumatthero āha. Mahāsumatthero pana “pañcapi sahadhammikā labhantī”ti āha.
atk-vin01a0:2349_9: Godattatthero pana “na koci na labhatī”ti vatvā “bhikkhussa sutvā codeti, bhikkhuniyā
atk-vin01a0:2349_10: sutvā codeti…pe… titthiyasāvakānaṃ sutvā codetī”ti idaṃ suttamāhari. Tiṇṇampi therānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2350_0: Ayaṃ pana codanā nāma dūtaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā pesetvā codentassa sīsaṃ na eti,
atk-vin01a0:2350_1: puggalassa pana samīpe ṭhatvāva hatthamuddāya vā vacībhedena vā codentasseva sīsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2350_2: eti. Sikkhāpaccakkhānameva hi hatthamuddāya sīsaṃ na eti, idaṃ pana anuddhaṃsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2350_3: abhūtārocanañca etiyeva. Yo pana dvinnaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne ekaṃ niyametvā codeti, so ce
atk-vin01a0:2350_4: jānāti, sīsaṃ eti. Itaro jānāti, sīsaṃ na eti. Dvepi niyametvā codeti, eko vā jānātu
atk-vin01a0:2350_5: dve vā, sīsaṃ etiyeva. Esava nayo sambahulesu. Taṅkhaṇeyeva ca jānanaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2350_6: samayena āvajjitvā ñāte pana ñātameva hoti. Pacchā ce jānāti, sīsaṃ na eti. Sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2351_0: Evaṃ kāyavācāvasena cāyaṃ duvidhāpi codanā. Puna diṭṭhacodanā, sutacodanā, parisaṅkitacodanāti
atk-vin01a0:2351_1: tividhā hoti. Aparāpi catubbidhā hoti – sīlavipatticodanā, ācāravipatticodanā, diṭṭhivipatticodanā,
atk-vin01a0:2351_2: ājīvavipatticodanāti. Tattha garukānaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ vasena sīlavipatticodanā
atk-vin01a0:2351_4: diṭṭhivipatticodanā, ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vasena ājīvavipatticodanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:2352_0: Aparāpi catubbidhā hoti – vatthusandassanā, āpattisandassanā, saṃvāsapaṭikkhepo,
atk-vin01a0:2352_1: sāmīcipaṭikkhepoti. Tattha vatthusandassanā nāma “tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevittha,
atk-vin01a0:2352_2: adinnaṃ ādiyittha, manussaṃ ghātayittha, abhūtaṃ ārocayitthā”ti evaṃ pavattā. Āpattisandassanā
atk-vin01a0:2352_4: nāma “natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti evaṃ pavattā;
atk-vin01a0:2352_5: ettāvatā pana sīsaṃ na eti, “assamaṇosi asakyaputtiyosī”tiādivacanehi saddhiṃ ghaṭiteyeva
atk-vin01a0:2352_7: akaraṇaṃ. Taṃ paṭipāṭiyā vandanādīni karoto ekassa akatvā sesānaṃ karaṇakāle veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2352_8: Ettāvatā ca codanā nāma hoti, āpatti pana sīsaṃ na eti. “Kasmā mama vandanādīni na
atk-vin01a0:2352_9: karosī”ti pucchite pana “assamaṇosi asakyaputtiyosī”tiādivacanehi saddhiṃ ghaṭiteyeva
atk-vin01a0:2352_10: sīsaṃ eti. Yāgubhattādinā pana yaṃ icchati taṃ āpucchati, na tāvatā codanā hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2353_1: ekaṃ dhammika”nti ādiṃ “katvā yāva dasa adhammikāni pātimokkhaṭṭhapanāni dasa dhammikānī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2353_2: evaṃ adhammikā pañcapaññāsa dhammikā pañcapaññāsāti dasuttarasataṃ codanā vuttā.
atk-vin01a0:2353_3: Tā diṭṭhena codentassa dasuttarasataṃ, sutena codentassa dasuttarasataṃ, parisaṅkitena
atk-vin01a0:2353_4: codentassa dasuttarasatanti tiṃsāni tīṇi satāni honti. Tāni kāyena codentassa, vācāya
atk-vin01a0:2353_5: codentassa, kāyavācāhi codentassāti tiguṇāni katāni navutāni nava satāni honti. Tāni
atk-vin01a0:2353_6: attanā codentassāpi parena codāpentassāpi tattakānevāti vīsatiūnāni dve sahassāni
atk-vin01a0:2353_7: honti, puna diṭṭhādibhede samūlakāmūlakavasena anekasahassā codanā hontīti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:2354_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā aṭṭhakathāya “attādānaṃ ādātukāmena upāli bhikkhunā pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ
atk-vin01a0:2354_1: attādānaṃ ādātabba”nti ca “codakena upāli bhikkhunā paraṃ codetukāmena pañca dhamme
atk-vin01a0:2354_2: ajjhattaṃ paccavekkhitvā paro codetabbo”ti ca evaṃ upālipañcakādīsu vuttāni bahūni
atk-vin01a0:2354_3: suttāni āharitvā attādānalakkhaṇañca codakavattañca cuditakavattañca saṅghena kātabbakiccañca
atk-vin01a0:2354_4: anuvijjakavattañca sabbaṃ vitthārena kathitaṃ, taṃ mayaṃ yathāāgataṭṭhāneyeva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-vin01a0:2355_0: Vuttappabhedāsu pana imāsu codanāsu yāya kāyaci codanāya vasena saṅghamajjhe osaṭe
atk-vin01a0:2355_1: vatthusmiṃ cuditakacodakā vattabbā “tumhe amhākaṃ vinicchayena tuṭṭhā bhavissathā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2355_2: Sace “bhavissāmā”ti vadanti, saṅghena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Atha pana
atk-vin01a0:2355_3: “vinicchinatha tāva, bhante, sace amhākaṃ khamissati, gaṇhissāmā”ti vadanti. “Cetiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2355_4: tāva vandathā”tiādīni vatvā dīghasuttaṃ katvā vissajjitabbaṃ. Te ce cirarattaṃ kilantā
atk-vin01a0:2355_5: pakkantaparisā upacchinnapakkhā hutvā puna yācanti, yāvatatiyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā yadā
atk-vin01a0:2355_6: nimmadā honti tadā nesaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitabbaṃ. Vinicchinantehi ca sace alajjussannā
atk-vin01a0:2355_7: hoti, parisā ubbāhikāya taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitabbaṃ. Sace bālussannā hoti parisā
atk-vin01a0:2355_8: “tumhākaṃ sabhāge vinayadhare pariyesathā”ti vinayadhare pariyesāpetvā yena dhammena
atk-vin01a0:2355_9: yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamati, tathā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2356_0: Tattha ca “dhammo”ti bhūtaṃ vatthu. “Vinayo”ti codanā sāraṇā ca. “Satthusāsana”nti
atk-vin01a0:2356_1: ñattisampadā ca anusāvanasampadā ca. Tasmā codakena vatthusmiṃ ārocite cuditako pucchitabbo
atk-vin01a0:2356_2: “santametaṃ, no”ti. Evaṃ vatthuṃ upaparikkhitvā bhūtena vatthunā codetvā sāretvā
atk-vin01a0:2356_3: ca ñattisampadāya anusāvanasampadāya ca taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ. Tatra ce
atk-vin01a0:2356_4: alajjī lajjiṃ codeti, so ca alajjī bālo hoti abyatto nāssa nayo dātabbo. Evaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:2356_5: vattabbo – “kimhi naṃ codesī”ti? Addhā so vakkhati – “kimidaṃ, bhante, kimhi naṃ
atk-vin01a0:2356_6: nāmā”ti. Tvaṃ kimhi nampi na jānāsi, na yuttaṃ tayā evarūpena bālena paraṃ codetunti
atk-vin01a0:2356_7: uyyojetabbo nāssa anuyogo dātabbo. Sace pana so alajjī paṇḍito hoti byatto diṭṭhena
atk-vin01a0:2356_8: vā sutena vā ajjhottharitvā sampādetuṃ sakkoti etassa anuyogaṃ datvā lajjisseva paṭiññāya kammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2357_0: Sace lajjī alajjiṃ codeti, so ca lajjī bālo hoti abyatto, na sakkoti anuyogaṃ dātuṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2357_1: Tassa nayo dātabbo – “kimhi naṃ codesi sīlavipattiyā vā ācāravipattiādīsu vā ekissā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2357_2: Kasmā pana imasseva evaṃ nayo dātabbo, na itarassa? Nanu na yuttaṃ vinayadharānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2357_3: agatigamananti? Na yuttameva. Idaṃ pana agatigamanaṃ na hoti, dhammānuggaho nāma
atk-vin01a0:2357_4: eso alajjiniggahatthāya hi lajjipaggahatthāya ca sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ. Tatra alajjī
atk-vin01a0:2357_5: nayaṃ labhitvā ajjhottharanto ehīti, lajjī pana nayaṃ labhitvā diṭṭhe diṭṭhasantānena,
atk-vin01a0:2357_6: sute sutasantānena patiṭṭhāya kathessati, tasmā tassa dhammānuggaho vaṭṭati. Sace
atk-vin01a0:2357_7: pana so lajjī paṇḍito hoti byatto, patiṭṭhāya katheti, alajjī ca “etampi natthi,
atk-vin01a0:2357_8: etampi natthī”ti paṭiññaṃ na deti, alajjissa paṭiññāya eva kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2358_0: Tadatthadīpanatthañca idaṃ vatthu veditabbaṃ. Tepiṭakacūḷābhayatthero kira lohapāsādassa
atk-vin01a0:2358_1: heṭṭhā bhikkhūnaṃ vinayaṃ kathetvā sāyanhasamaye vuṭṭhāti, tassa vuṭṭhānasamaye dve
atk-vin01a0:2358_2: attapaccatthikā kathaṃ pavattesuṃ. Eko “etampi natthi, etampi natthī”ti paṭiññaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2358_3: na deti. Atha appāvasese paṭhamayāme therassa tasmiṃ puggale “ayaṃ patiṭṭhāya katheti,
atk-vin01a0:2358_4: ayaṃ pana paṭiññaṃ na deti, bahūni ca vatthūni osaṭāni addhā etaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2358_5: asuddhaladdhi uppannā. Tato bījanīdaṇḍakena pādakathalikāya saññaṃ datvā “ahaṃ āvuso
atk-vin01a0:2358_6: vinicchinituṃ ananucchaviko aññena vinicchināpehī”ti āha. Kasmā bhanteti? Thero tamatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2358_7: ārocesi, cuditakapuggalassa kāye ḍāho uṭṭhito, tato so theraṃ vanditvā “bhante, vinicchinituṃ
atk-vin01a0:2358_8: anurūpena vinayadharena nāma tumhādiseneva bhavituṃ vaṭṭati. Codakena ca īdiseneva
atk-vin01a0:2358_9: bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā setakāni nivāsetvā “ciraṃ kilamitattha mayā”ti khamāpetvā pakkāmi.
atk-vin01a0:2359: Evaṃ lajjinā codiyamāno alajjī bahūsupi vatthūsu uppannesu paṭiññaṃ na deti, so neva “suddho”ti vattabbo na “asuddho”ti. Jīvamatako nāma āmakapūtiko nāma cesa.
atk-vin01a0:2360_0: Sace panassa aññampi tādisaṃ vatthuṃ uppajjati na vinicchinitabbaṃ. Tathā nāsitakova
atk-vin01a0:2360_1: bhavissati. Sace pana alajjīyeva alajjiṃ codeti, so vattabbo “āvuso tava vacanenāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2360_2: kiṃ sakkā vattu”nti itarampi tatheva vatvā ubhopi “ekasambhogaparibhogā hutvā jīvathā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2360_3: vatvā uyyojetabbā, sīlatthāya tesaṃ vinicchayo na kātabbo. Pattacīvarapariveṇādiatthāya
atk-vin01a0:2361_0: Atha lajjī lajjiṃ codeti, vivādo ca nesaṃ kismiñcideva appamattako hoti, saññāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:2361_1: “mā evaṃ karothā”ti accayaṃ desāpetvā uyyojetabbā. Atha panettha cuditakena sahasā
atk-vin01a0:2361_2: viraddhaṃ hoti, ādito paṭṭhāya alajjī nāma natthi. So ca pakkhānurakkhaṇatthāya paṭiññaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2361_3: na deti, “mayaṃ saddahāma, mayaṃ saddahāmā”ti bahū uṭṭhahanti. So tesaṃ paṭiññāya
atk-vin01a0:2361_4: ekavāraṃ dvevāraṃ suddho hotu. Atha pana viraddhakālato paṭṭhāya ṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin01a0:2362_0: Evaṃ yāya kāyaci codanāya vasena saṅghamajjhe osaṭe vatthusmiṃ cuditakacodakesu paṭipattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2362_1: ñatvā tassāyeva codanāya sampattivipattijānanatthaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānādīnaṃ vasena
atk-vin01a0:2362_2: vinicchayo veditabbo. Seyyathidaṃ codanāya ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ? Codanāya
atk-vin01a0:2362_3: “ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo, karotu me āyasmā okāsa”nti evaṃ okāsakammaṃ ādi, otiṇṇena vatthunā
atk-vin01a0:2362_4: codetvā sāretvā vinicchayo majjhe, āpattiyaṃ vā anāpattiyaṃ vā patiṭṭhāpanena samatho pariyosānaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2363_0: Codanāya kati mūlāni, kati vatthūni, kati bhūmiyo? Codanāya dve mūlāni – samūlikā
atk-vin01a0:2363_1: vā amūlikā vā; tīṇi vatthūni – diṭṭhaṃ, sutaṃ, parisaṅkitaṃ; pañca bhūmiyo – kālena
atk-vin01a0:2363_2: vakkhāmi no akālena, bhūtena vakkhāmi no abhūtena, saṇhena vakkhāmi no pharusena,
atk-vin01a0:2363_3: atthasaṃhitena vakkhāmi no anatthasaṃhitena, mettacitto vakkhāmi no dosantaroti.
atk-vin01a0:2363_4: Imāya ca pana codanāya codakena puggalena “parisuddhakāyasamācāro nu khomhī”tiādinā
atk-vin01a0:2363_5: nayena upālipañcake vuttesu pannarasasu dhammesu patiṭṭhātabbaṃ, cuditakena dvīsu
atk-vin01a0:2363_6: dhammesu patiṭṭhātabbaṃ sacce ca akuppe cāti.
atk-vin01a0:2364_0: Appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyanti api eva nāma naṃ puggalaṃ imamhā seṭṭhacariyā
atk-vin01a0:2364_1: cāveyyaṃ, “sādhu vatassa sacāhaṃ imaṃ puggalaṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti iminā
atk-vin01a0:2364_2: adhippāyena anuddhaṃseyyāti vuttaṃhoti. Padabhājane pana “brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti
atk-vin01a0:2365: Khaṇādīni samayavevacanāni. Taṃ khaṇaṃ taṃ layaṃ taṃ muhuttaṃ vītivatteti tasmiṃ khaṇe tasmiṃ laye tasmiṃ muhutte vītivatte. Bhummappattiyā hi idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2366_0: Samanuggāhiyamānaniddese yena vatthunā anuddhaṃsito hotīti catūsu pārājikavatthūsu
atk-vin01a0:2366_1: yena vatthunā codakena cuditako anuddhaṃsito abhibhūto ajjhotthaṭo hoti. Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2366_2: samanuggāhiyamānoti tasmiṃ codakena vuttavatthusmiṃ so codako anuvijjakena “kiṃ te
atk-vin01a0:2366_3: diṭṭhaṃ, kinti te diṭṭha”ntiādinā nayena anuvijjiyamāno vīmaṃsiyamāno upaparikkhiyamāno.
atk-vin01a0:2367_0: Asamanuggāhiyamānaniddese na kenaci vuccamānoti anuvijjakena vā aññena vā kenaci,
atk-vin01a0:2367_1: atha vā diṭṭhādīsu vatthūsu kenaci avuccamāno. Etesañca dvinnaṃ mātikāpadānaṃ parato
atk-vin01a0:2367_2: “bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhātī”tiiminā sambandho veditabbo. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti – “evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2367_3: samanuggāhiyamāno vā asamanuggāhiyamāno vā bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti paṭicca tiṭṭhati
atk-vin01a0:2367_4: paṭijānāti saṅghādiseso”ti. Idañca amūlakabhāvassa pākaṭakāladassanatthameva vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2368_0: Idāni “amūlakañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hotī”ti ettha yasmā amūlakalakkhaṇaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2368_1: tasmā taṃ avatvā apubbameva dassetuṃ “adhikaraṇaṃ nāmā”tiādimāha. Tattha yasmā adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2368_2: adhikaraṇaṭṭhena ekampi vatthuvasena nānā hoti, tenassa taṃ nānattaṃ dassetuṃ “cattāri
atk-vin01a0:2368_3: adhikaraṇāni vivādādhikaraṇa”ntiādimāha. Ko pana so adhikaraṇaṭṭho, yenetaṃ ekaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2368_4: hotīti? Samathehi adhikaraṇīyatā. Tasmā yaṃ adhikicca ārabbha paṭicca sandhāya samathā
atk-vin01a0:2369_0: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana vuttaṃ – “adhikaraṇanti keci gāhaṃ vadanti, keci cetanaṃ, keci
atk-vin01a0:2369_1: akkhantiṃ keci vohāraṃ, keci paṇṇatti”nti. Puna evaṃ vicāritaṃ “yadi gāho adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2369_2: nāma, eko attādānaṃ gahetvā sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ mantayamāno tattha ādīnavaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2369_3: disvā puna cajati, tassa taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samathappattaṃ bhavissati. Yadi cetanā adhikaraṇaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2369_4: “idaṃ attādānaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti uppannā cetanā nirujjhati. Yadi akkhanti adhikaraṇaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2369_5: akkhantiyā attādānaṃ gahetvāpi aparabhāge vinicchayaṃ alabhamāno vā khamāpito vā
atk-vin01a0:2369_6: cajati. Yadi vohāro adhikaraṇaṃ, kathento āhiṇḍitvā aparabhāge tuṇhī hoti niravo,
atk-vin01a0:2369_7: evamassa taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samathappattaṃ bhavissati, tasmā paṇṇatti adhikaraṇanti.
atk-vin01a0:2370_1: evaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇassa tabbhāgiyanti ca vivādādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusalaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2370_2: siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākata”nti ca evamādīhi virujjhati. Na hi te paṇṇattiyā kusalādibhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2370_3: icchanti, na ca “amūlakena pārājikena dhammenā”ti ettha āgato pārājikadhammo paṇṇatti
atk-vin01a0:2370_4: nāma hoti. Kasmā? Accantaakusalattā. Vuttampi hetaṃ – “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākata”nti.
atk-vin01a0:2371_0: Yañcetaṃ “amūlakena pārājikenā”ti ettha amūlakaṃ pārājikaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ, tassevāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2371_1: “amūlakañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hotī”ti paṭiniddeso, na paṇṇattiyā na hi aññaṃ niddisitvā
atk-vin01a0:2371_2: aññaṃ paṭiniddisati. Yasmā pana yāya paṇṇattiyā yena abhilāpena codakena so puggalo
atk-vin01a0:2371_3: pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannoti paññatto, pārājikasaṅkhātassa adhikaraṇassa amūlakattā
atk-vin01a0:2371_4: sāpi paññatti amūlikā hoti, adhikaraṇe pavattattā ca adhikaraṇaṃ. Tasmā iminā pariyāyena
atk-vin01a0:2371_5: paṇṇatti “adhikaraṇa”nti yujjeyya, yasmā vā yaṃ amūlakaṃ nāma adhikaraṇaṃ taṃ sabhāvato
atk-vin01a0:2371_6: natthi, paññattimattameva atthi. Tasmāpi paṇṇatti adhikaraṇanti yujjeyya. Tañca kho
atk-vin01a0:2371_7: idheva na sabbattha. Na hi vivādādīnaṃ paṇṇatti adhikaraṇaṃ. Adhikaraṇaṭṭho pana
atk-vin01a0:2371_8: tesaṃ pubbe vuttasamathehi adhikaraṇīyatā. Iti iminā adhikaraṇaṭṭhena idhekacco vivādo
atk-vin01a0:2371_9: vivādo ceva adhikaraṇañcāti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ. Esa nayo sesesu.
atk-vin01a0:2372_0: Tattha “idha bhikkhū vivadanti dhammoti vā adhammoti vā”ti evaṃ aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni
atk-vin01a0:2372_1: nissāya uppanno vivādo vivādādhikaraṇaṃ. “Idha bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ anuvadanti sīlavipattiyā
atk-vin01a0:2372_2: vā”ti evaṃ catasso vipattiyo nissāya uppanno anuvādo anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ. “Pañcapi
atk-vin01a0:2372_3: āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, sattapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇa”nti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2372_4: āpattiyeva āpattādhikaraṇaṃ. “Yā saṅghassa kiccayatā karaṇīyatā apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2372_5: ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakamma”nti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ saṅghakiccaṃ kiccādhikaraṇanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2373_0: Imasmiṃ panatthe pārājikāpattisaṅkhātaṃ āpattādhikaraṇameva adhippetaṃ. Sesāni atthuddhāravasena
atk-vin01a0:2373_1: vuttāni, ettakā hi adhikaraṇasaddassa atthā. Tesu pārājikameva idha adhippetaṃ. Taṃ
atk-vin01a0:2373_2: diṭṭhādīhi mūlehi amūlakañceva adhikaraṇaṃ hoti. Ayañca bhikkhu dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti,
atk-vin01a0:2373_3: paṭicca tiṭṭhati “tucchakaṃ mayā bhaṇita”ntiādīni vadanto paṭijānāti. Tassa bhikkhuno
atk-vin01a0:2373_4: anuddhaṃsitakkhaṇeyeva saṅghādisesoti ayaṃ tāvassa sapadānukkamaniddesassa sikkhāpadassa attho.
atk-vin01a0:2374_0: 387. Idāni yāni tāni saṅkhepato diṭṭhādīni codanāvatthūni vuttāni, tesaṃ vasena vitthārato
atk-vin01a0:2374_1: āpattiṃ ropetvā dassento “adiṭṭhassa hotī”tiādimāha. Tattha adiṭṭhassa hotīti adiṭṭho
atk-vin01a0:2374_2: assa hoti. Etena codakena adiṭṭho hoti, so puggalo pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjantoti
atk-vin01a0:2375_0: Diṭṭho mayāti diṭṭhosi mayāti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo suto mayātiādīsupi. Sesaṃ adiṭṭhamūlake
atk-vin01a0:2375_1: uttānatthameva. Diṭṭhamūlake pana tañce codeti “suto mayā”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ suttādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2376_0: Sabbasmiṃyeva ca imasmiṃ codakavāre yathā idhāgatesu “pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi,
atk-vin01a0:2376_1: assamaṇosi, asakyaputtiyosī”ti imesu vacanesu ekekassa vasena vācāya vācāya saṅghādiseso
atk-vin01a0:2376_2: hoti, evaṃ aññatra āgatesu “dussīlo, pāpadhammo, asucisaṅkassarasamācāro, paṭicchannakammanto,
atk-vin01a0:2376_3: assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño, abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño, antopūti, avassuto, kasambujāto”ti
atk-vin01a0:2376_4: imesupi vacanesu ekekassa vasena vācāya vācāya saṅghādiseso hotiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2377_0: “Natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti imāni pana suddhāni
atk-vin01a0:2377_1: sīsaṃ na enti, “dussīlosi natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā”ti evaṃ dussīlādipadesu
atk-vin01a0:2377_2: pana “pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosī”tiādipadesu vā yena kenaci saddhiṃ ghaṭitāneva
atk-vin01a0:2378_0: Mahāpadumatthero panāha – “na kevalaṃ idha pāḷiyaṃ anāgatāni ‘dussīlo pāpadhammo’tiādipadāneva
atk-vin01a0:2378_1: sīsaṃ enti, ‘koṇṭhosi mahāsāmaṇerosi, mahāupāsakosi, jeṭṭhabbatikosi, nigaṇṭhosi,
atk-vin01a0:2378_2: ājīvakosi, tāpasosi, paribbājakosi, paṇḍakosi, theyyasaṃvāsakosi, titthiyapakkantakosi,
atk-vin01a0:2378_4: lohituppādakosi, bhikkhunīdūsakosi, ubhatobyañjanakaosī’ti imānipi sīsaṃ entiyevā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2378_5: Mahāpadumattheroyeva ca “diṭṭhe vematikotiādīsu yadaggena vematiko tadaggena no kappeti,
atk-vin01a0:2378_6: yadaggena no kappeti tadaggena nassarati, yadaggena nassarati tadaggena pamuṭṭho hotī”ti vadati.
atk-vin01a0:2379_0: Mahāsumatthero pana ekekaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā catunnampi pāṭekkaṃ nayaṃ dasseti. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a0:2379_1: Diṭṭhe vematikoti ayaṃ tāva dassane vā vematiko hoti puggale vā, tattha “diṭṭho nukho
atk-vin01a0:2379_2: mayā na diṭṭho”ti evaṃ dassane vematiko hoti. “Ayaṃ nukho mayā diṭṭho añño”ti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2379_3: puggale vematiko hoti. Evaṃ dassanaṃ vā no kappeti puggalaṃ vā, dassanaṃ vā nassarati
atk-vin01a0:2379_4: puggalaṃ vā, dassanaṃ vā pamuṭṭho hoti puggalaṃ vā. Ettha ca vematikoti vimatijāto.
atk-vin01a0:2379_5: No kappetīti na saddahati. Nassaratīti asāriyamāno nassarati. Yadā pana taṃ “asukasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2379_6: nāma bhante ṭhāne asukasmiṃ nāma kāle”ti sārenti tadā sarati. Pamuṭṭhoti yo tehi
atk-vin01a0:2379_7: tehi upāyehi sāriyamānopi nassaratiyevāti. Etenevupāyena codāpakavāropi veditabbo,
atk-vin01a0:2380_0: 389. Tato paraṃ āpattibhedaṃ anāpattibhedañca dassetuṃ “asuddhe suddhadiṭṭhī”tiādikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2380_1: catukkaṃ ṭhapetvā ekamekaṃ padaṃ catūhi catūhi bhedehi niddiṭṭhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ pāḷinayeneva
atk-vin01a0:2380_2: sakkā jānituṃ. Kevalaṃ hetthādhippāyabhedo veditabbo. Ayañhi adhippāyo nāma – cāvanādhippāyo,
atk-vin01a0:2380_4: anuvijjanādhippāyo, dhammakathādhippāyoti anekavidho. Tattha purimesu catūsu adhippāyesu
atk-vin01a0:2380_5: okāsaṃ akārāpentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Okāsaṃ kārāpetvāpi ca sammukhā amūlakena pārājikena
atk-vin01a0:2380_6: anuddhaṃsentassa saṅghādiseso. Amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṃsentassa pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2380_7: Ācāravipattiyā anuddhaṃsentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Akkosādhippāyena vadantassa pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2380_8: Asammukhā pana sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi vadantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Asammukhā eva sattavidhampi
atk-vin01a0:2381_0: Kurundiyaṃ pana “vuṭṭhānādhippāyena ‘tvaṃ imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpanno taṃ paṭikarohī’ti
atk-vin01a0:2381_1: vadantassa okāsakiccaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbattheva pana “uposathapavāraṇaṃ ṭhapentassa
atk-vin01a0:2381_2: okāsakammaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Ṭhapanakkhettaṃ pana jānitabbaṃ. “Suṇātu me bhante
atk-vin01a0:2381_3: saṅgho ajjuposatho pannaraso yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyya”ti
atk-vin01a0:2381_4: etasmiñhi re-kāre anatikkanteyeva ṭhapetuṃ labbhati. Tato paraṃ pana yya-kāre patte
atk-vin01a0:2381_5: na labbhati. Esa nayo pavāraṇāya. Anuvijjakassāpi osaṭe vatthusmiṃ “atthetaṃ tavā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2382_0: Dhammakathikassāpi dhammāsane nisīditvā “yo idañcidañca karoti, ayaṃ bhikkhu assamaṇo”tiādinā
atk-vin01a0:2382_1: nayena anodissa dhammaṃ kathentassa okāsakammaṃ natthi. Sace pana odissa niyametvā
atk-vin01a0:2382_2: “asuko ca asuko ca assamaṇo anupāsako”ti katheti, dhammāsanato orohitvā āpattiṃ desetvā
atk-vin01a0:2382_3: gantabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana tattha tattha “anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā”ti vuttaṃ tassa okāsaṃ akārāpetvāti
atk-vin01a0:2382_4: evamattho veditabbo, na hi koci anokāso nāma atthi, yamokāsaṃ kārāpetvā āpattiṃ āpajjati,
atk-vin01a0:2382_5: okāsaṃ pana akārāpetvā āpajjatīti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-vin01a0:2383_0: Samuṭṭhānādīsu tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato, vācācittato, kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin01a0:2383_1: Kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2386_0: 391. Tena samayena buddho bhagavāti dutiyaduṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha handa mayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2386_1: āvuso imaṃ chagalakaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karomāti te kira paṭhamavatthusmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2386_2: attano manorathaṃ sampādetuṃ asakkontā laddhaniggahā vighātappattā “idāni jānissāmā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2386_3: tādisaṃ vatthuṃ pariyesamānā vicaranti. Athekadivasaṃ disvā tuṭṭhā aññamaññaṃ oloketvā
atk-vin01a0:2386_4: evamāhaṃsu – “handa mayaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ chagalakaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karomā”ti,
atk-vin01a0:2386_5: “dabbo mallaputto nāmāya”nti evamassa nāmaṃ karomāti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo mettiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2387_0: Te bhikkhū mettiyabhumajake bhikkhū anuyuñjiṃsūti evaṃ anuyuñjiṃsu –“āvuso, kuhiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2387_1: tumhehi dabbo mallaputto mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ diṭṭho”ti? “Gijjhakūṭapabbatapāde”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2387_2: “Kāya velāya”ti? “Bhikkhācāragamanavelāyā”ti. Āvuso dabba ime evaṃ vadanti – “tvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2387_3: tadā kuhi”nti? “Veḷuvane bhattāni uddisāmī”ti. “Tava tāya velāya veḷuvane atthibhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2387_4: ko jānātī”ti? “Bhikkhusaṅgho, bhante”ti. Te saṅghaṃ pucchiṃsu – “jānātha tumhe tāya
atk-vin01a0:2387_5: velāya imassa veḷuvane atthibhāva”nti. “Āma, āvuso, jānāma, thero sammutiladdhadivasato
atk-vin01a0:2387_6: paṭṭhāya veḷuvaneyevā”ti. Tato mettiyabhumajake āhaṃsu – “āvuso, tumhākaṃ kathā na
atk-vin01a0:2387_7: sameti, kacci no lesaṃ oḍḍetvā vadathā”ti. Evaṃ te tehi bhikkhūhi anuyuñjiyamānā
atk-vin01a0:2388_0: Kiṃ pana tumhe, āvuso, āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassāti
atk-vin01a0:2388_1: ettha aññabhāgassa idaṃ, aññabhāgo vā assa atthīti aññabhāgiyaṃ. Adhikaraṇanti ādhāro
atk-vin01a0:2388_2: veditabbo, vatthu adhiṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo hi so “dabbo mallaputto nāmā”ti chagalako
atk-vin01a0:2388_3: vutto, so yvāyaṃ āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa bhāgo koṭṭhāso pakkho manussajāti
atk-vin01a0:2388_4: ceva bhikkhubhāvo ca tato aññassa bhāgassa koṭṭhāsassa pakkhassa hoti tiracchānajātiyā
atk-vin01a0:2388_5: ceva chagalakabhāvassa ca so vā aññabhāgo assa atthīti tasmā aññabhāgiyasaṅkhyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2388_6: labhati. Yasmā ca tesaṃ “imaṃ mayaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karomā”ti vadantānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2388_7: tassā nāmakaraṇasaññāya ādhāro vatthu adhiṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā adhikaraṇanti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2388_8: Tañhi sandhāya “te bhikkhū aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassā”ti āhaṃsu, na vivādādhikaraṇādīsu
atk-vin01a0:2388_9: aññataraṃ. Kasmā? Asambhavato. Na hi te catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ kassaci aññabhāgiyassa
atk-vin01a0:2388_10: adhikaraṇassa kañcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādiyiṃsu. Na ca catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ leso
atk-vin01a0:2388_11: nāma atthi. Jātilesādayo hi puggalānaṃyeva lesā vuttā, na vivādādhikaraṇādīnaṃ. Idañca
atk-vin01a0:2388_12: “dabbo mallaputto”ti nāmaṃ tassa aññabhāgiyādhikaraṇabhāve ṭhitassa chagalakassa
atk-vin01a0:2388_13: koci deso hoti theraṃ amūlakena pārājikena anuddhaṃsetuṃ lesamatto.
atk-vin01a0:2389_0: Ettha ca dissati apadissati assa ayanti voharīyatīti deso. Jātiādīsu aññatarakoṭṭhāsassetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2389_1: adhivacanaṃ. Aññampi vatthuṃ lissati silissati vohāramatteneva īsakaṃ allīyatīti
atk-vin01a0:2389_2: leso. Jātiādīnaṃyeva aññatarakoṭṭhāsassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tato paraṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2389_3: Sikkhāpadapaññattiyampi ayamevattho. Padabhājane pana yassa aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa
atk-vin01a0:2389_4: kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya, taṃ yasmā aṭṭhuppattivaseneva
atk-vin01a0:2390_0: 393. Yāni pana adhikaraṇanti vacanasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena pavattāni cattāri
atk-vin01a0:2390_1: adhikaraṇāni, tesaṃ aññabhāgiyatā ca tabbhāgiyatā ca yasmā apākaṭā jānitabbā ca vinayadharehi,
atk-vin01a0:2390_2: tasmā vacanasāmaññato laddhaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ nissāya taṃ āvikaronto “aññabhāgiyassa
atk-vin01a0:2390_3: adhikaraṇassāti āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ vā hoti adhikaraṇaññabhāgiyaṃ vā”tiādimāha. Yā
atk-vin01a0:2390_4: ca sā avasāne āpattaññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa vasena codanā vuttā, tampi dassetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2391_0: Tattha ca āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ vāti paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhattā “kathañca āpatti āpattiyā aññabhāgiyā
atk-vin01a0:2391_1: hotī”ti niddese ārabhitabbe yasmā āpattādhikaraṇassa tabbhāgiyavicāraṇāyaṃyeva ayamattho
atk-vin01a0:2391_2: āgamissati, tasmā evaṃ anārabhitvā “kathañca adhikaraṇaṃ adhikaraṇassa aññabhāgiya”nti
atk-vin01a0:2392_0: Tattha aññabhāgiyavāro uttānatthoyeva. Ekamekañhi adhikaraṇaṃ itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2392_1: aññabhāgiyaṃ aññapakkhiyaṃ aññakoṭṭhāsiyaṃ hoti, vatthuvisabhāgattā, tabbhāgiyavāre
atk-vin01a0:2392_2: pana vivādādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇassa tabbhāgiyaṃ tappakkhiyaṃ taṃkoṭṭhāsiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2392_3: vatthusabhāgattā, tathā anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇassa. Kathaṃ? Buddhakālato
atk-vin01a0:2392_4: paṭṭhāya hi aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni nissāya uppannavivādo ca idāni uppajjanakavivādo
atk-vin01a0:2392_5: ca vatthusabhāgatāya ekaṃ vivādādhikaraṇameva hoti, tathā buddhakālato paṭṭhāya catasso
atk-vin01a0:2392_6: vipattiyo nissāya uppannaanuvādo ca idāni uppajjanakaanuvādo ca vatthusabhāgatāya
atk-vin01a0:2392_7: ekaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇameva hoti. Yasmā pana āpattādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇassa sabhāgavisabhāgavatthuto
atk-vin01a0:2392_8: sabhāgasarikkhāsarikkhato ca ekaṃsena tabbhāgiyaṃ na hoti, tasmā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2392_9: āpattādhikaraṇassa siyā tabbhāgiyaṃ siyā aññabhāgiyanti vuttaṃ. Tattha ādito paṭṭhāya
atk-vin01a0:2392_10: aññabhāgiyassa paṭhamaṃ niddiṭṭhattā idhāpi aññabhāgiyameva paṭhamaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2392_11: tattha aññabhāgiyattañca parato tabbhāgiyattañca vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2393_0: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇassa tabbhāgiyanti ettha pana buddhakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin01a0:2393_1: cattāri saṅghakammāni nissāya uppannaṃ adhikaraṇañca idāni cattāri saṅghakammāni
atk-vin01a0:2393_2: nissāya uppajjanakaṃ adhikaraṇañca sabhāgatāya sarikkhatāya ca ekaṃ kiccādhikaraṇameva
atk-vin01a0:2393_3: hoti. Kiṃ pana saṅghakammāni nissāya uppannaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇaṃ, udāhu
atk-vin01a0:2393_4: saṅghakammānamevetaṃ adhivacananti? Saṅghakammānamevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Evaṃ santepi
atk-vin01a0:2393_5: saṅghakammaṃ nāma “idañcidañca evaṃ kattabba”nti yaṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ manasikaroti
atk-vin01a0:2393_6: taṃ nissāya uppajjanato purimaṃ purimaṃ saṅghakammaṃ nissāya uppajjanato ca saṅghakammāni
atk-vin01a0:2394_0: 394. Kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāyāti ettha pana yasmā desoti vā lesamattoti vā pubbe
atk-vin01a0:2394_1: vuttanayeneva byañjanato nānaṃ atthato ekaṃ, tasmā “leso nāma dasa lesā jātileso
atk-vin01a0:2394_2: nāmaleso”tiādimāha. Tattha jātiyeva jātileso. Esa nayo sesesu.
atk-vin01a0:2395_0: 395. Idāni tameva lesaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ yathā taṃ upādāya anuddhaṃsanā hoti tathā
atk-vin01a0:2395_1: savatthukaṃ katvā dassento “jātileso nāma khattiyo diṭṭho hotī”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:2395_2: khattiyo diṭṭho hotīti añño koci khattiyajātiyo iminā codakena diṭṭho hoti. Pārājikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2395_3: dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjantoti methunadhammādīsu aññataraṃ āpajjanto. Aññaṃ khattiyaṃ passitvā
atk-vin01a0:2395_4: codetīti atha so aññaṃ attano veriṃ khattiyajātiyaṃ bhikkhuṃ passitvā taṃ khattiyajātilesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2395_5: gahetvā evaṃ codeti “khattiyo mayā diṭṭho pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto, tvaṃ khattiyo,
atk-vin01a0:2395_6: pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosī” atha vā “tvaṃ so khattiyo, na añño, pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2395_7: ajjhāpannosi, assamaṇosi asakyaputtiyosi natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā
atk-vin01a0:2395_8: vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti, āpatti vācāya vācāya saṅghādisesassa. Ettha ca tesaṃ khattiyānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2395_9: aññamaññaṃ asadisassa tassa tassa dīghādino vā diṭṭhādino vā vasena aññabhāgiyatā
atk-vin01a0:2395_10: khattiyajātipaññattiyā ādhāravasena adhikaraṇatā ca veditabbā, etenupāyena sabbapadesu yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:2396: 400. Pattalesaniddese ca sāṭakapattoti lohapattasadiso susaṇṭhāno succhavi siniddho bhamaravaṇṇo mattikāpatto vuccati. Sumbhakapattoti pakatimattikāpatto.
atk-vin01a0:2397_0: 406. Yasmā pana āpattilesassa ekapadeneva saṅkhepato niddeso vutto, tasmā vitthāratopi
atk-vin01a0:2397_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kasmā
atk-vin01a0:2397_2: panassa tattheva niddesaṃ avatvā idha visuṃ vuttoti? Sesaniddesehi asabhāgattā. Sesaniddesā
atk-vin01a0:2397_3: hi aññaṃ disvā aññassa codanāvasena vuttā. Ayaṃ pana ekameva aññaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2397_4: disvā aññāya āpattiyā codanāvasena vutto. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2397_5: hotīti? Āpattiyā. Teneva vuttaṃ – “evampi āpattaññabhāgiyañca hoti leso ca upādinno”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2397_6: Yañhi so saṅghādisesaṃ āpanno taṃ pārājikassa aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ. Tassa pana
atk-vin01a0:2397_7: aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa leso nāma yo so sabbakhattiyānaṃ sādhāraṇo khattiyabhāvo
atk-vin01a0:2397_8: viya sabbāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇo āpattibhāvo. Etenupāyena sesāpattimūlakanayo codāpakavāro ca veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2398_0: 408. Anāpatti tathāsaññī codeti vā codāpeti vāti “pārājikaṃyeva ayaṃ āpanno”ti yo
atk-vin01a0:2398_1: evaṃ tathāsaññī codeti vā codāpeti vā tassa anāpatti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
atk-vin01a0:2401_0: 409. Tena samayena buddho bhagavāti saṅghabhedasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha atha kho devadattotiādīsu
atk-vin01a0:2401_1: yo ca devadatto, yathā ca pabbajito, yena ca kāraṇena kokālikādayo upasaṅkamitvā
atk-vin01a0:2401_2: “etha mayaṃ āvuso samaṇassa gotamassa saṅghabhedaṃ karissāma cakkabheda”nti āha.
atk-vin01a0:2401_3: Taṃ sabbaṃ saṅghabhedakkhandhake āgatameva. Pañcavatthuyācanā pana kiñcāpi tattheva
atk-vin01a0:2401_4: āgamissati. Atha kho idhāpi āgatattā yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ vatvāva gamissāma.
atk-vin01a0:2402_0: Sādhu bhanteti āyācanā. Bhikkhū yāvajīvaṃ āraññikā assūti āraññikadhutaṅgaṃ samādāya
atk-vin01a0:2402_1: sabbepi bhikkhū yāva jīvanti tāva āraññikā hontu, araññeyeva vasantu. Yo gāmantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2402_2: osareyya vajjaṃ naṃ phuseyyāti yo ekabhikkhupi araññaṃ pahāya nivāsatthāya gāmantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2402_3: osareyya, vajjaṃ taṃ phuseyya naṃ bhikkhuṃ doso phusatu, āpattiyā naṃ bhagavā kāretū”ti
atk-vin01a0:2403: 410. Janaṃ saññāpessāmāti janaṃ amhākaṃ appicchatādibhāvaṃ jānāpessāma, atha vā paritosessāma pasādessāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2404_0: Imāni pana pañca vatthūni yācato devadattassa vacanaṃ sutvāva aññāsi bhagavā “saṅghabhedatthiko
atk-vin01a0:2404_1: hutvā ayaṃ yācatī”ti. Yasmā pana tāni anujāniyamānāni bahūnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ maggantarāyāya
atk-vin01a0:2404_2: saṃvattanti, tasmā bhagavā “alaṃ devadattā”ti paṭikkhipitvā “yo icchati āraññiko hotū”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:2405_0: Ettha pana bhagavato adhippāyaṃ viditvā kulaputtena attano patirūpaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2405_1: Ayañhettha bhagavato adhippāyo – “eko bhikkhu mahajjhāsayo hoti mahussāho, sakkoti
atk-vin01a0:2405_2: gāmantasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā araññe viharanto dukkhassantaṃ kātuṃ. Eko dubbalo
atk-vin01a0:2405_3: hoti appathāmo araññe na sakkoti, gāmanteyeva sakkoti. Eko mahabbalo samappavattadhātuko
atk-vin01a0:2405_4: adhivāsanakhantisampanno iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu samacitto araññepi gāmantepi sakkotiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2405_5: Eko neva gāmante na araññe sakkoti padaparamo hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2406_0: Tatra yvāyaṃ mahajjhāsayo hoti mahussāho, sakkoti gāmantasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā
atk-vin01a0:2406_1: araññe viharanto dukkhassantaṃ kātuṃ, so araññeyeva vasatu, idamassa patirūpaṃ. Saddhivihārikādayopi
atk-vin01a0:2407_0: Yo pana dubbalo hoti appathāmo gāmanteyeva sakkoti dukkhassantaṃ kātuṃ, na araññe
atk-vin01a0:2407_1: so gāmanteyeva vasatu, yvāyaṃ mahabbalo samappavattadhātuko adhivāsanakhantisampanno
atk-vin01a0:2407_2: iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu samacitto araññepi gāmantepi sakkotiyeva, ayampi gāmantasenāsanaṃ pahāya
atk-vin01a0:2407_3: araññe viharatu, idamassa patirūpaṃ saddhivihārikāpi hissa anusikkhamānā araññe vihātabbaṃ maññissanti.
atk-vin01a0:2408_0: Yo panāyaṃ neva gāmante na araññe sakkoti padaparamo hoti. Ayampi araññeyeva vasatu.
atk-vin01a0:2408_1: Ayaṃ hissa dhutaṅgasevanā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanā ca āyatiṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo bhavissati.
atk-vin01a0:2408_2: Saddhivihārikādayo cassa anusikkhamānā araññe vihātabbaṃ maññissantīti.
atk-vin01a0:2409_0: Evaṃ yvāyaṃ dubbalo hoti appathāmo gāmanteyeva viharanto sakkoti dukkhassantaṃ kātuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2409_1: na araññe, imaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya bhagavā “yo icchati gāmante viharatū”ti āha. Iminā
atk-vin01a0:2410_0: Yadi pana bhagavā devadattassa vādaṃ sampaṭiccheyya, yvāyaṃ puggalo pakatiyā dubbalo
atk-vin01a0:2410_1: hoti appathāmo, yopi daharakāle araññavāsaṃ abhisambhuṇitvā jiṇṇakāle vā vātapittādīhi
atk-vin01a0:2410_2: samuppannadhātukkhobhakāle vā nābhisambhuṇāti, gāmanteyeva pana viharanto sakkoti
atk-vin01a0:2410_3: dukkhassantaṃ kātuṃ, tesaṃ ariyamaggupacchedo bhaveyya, arahattaphalādhigamo na bhaveyya,
atk-vin01a0:2410_4: uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ vilomaṃ aniyyānikaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ bhaveyya, satthā ca tesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2410_5: asabbaññū assa “sakavādaṃ chaḍḍetvā devadattavāde patiṭṭhito”ti gārayho ca bhaveyya.
atk-vin01a0:2410_6: Tasmā bhagavā evarūpe puggale saṅgaṇhanto devadattassa vādaṃ paṭikkhipi. Etenevūpāyena
atk-vin01a0:2410_8: vinicchayo veditabbo. Cattāro pana māse rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhittameva.
atk-vin01a0:2411_0: Macchamaṃsavatthusmiṃ tikoṭiparisuddhanti tīhi koṭīhi parisuddhaṃ, diṭṭhādīhi aparisuddhīhi
atk-vin01a0:2411_1: virahitanti attho. Tenevāha – “adiṭṭhaṃ, asutaṃ, aparisaṅkita”nti. Tattha “adiṭṭhaṃ”
atk-vin01a0:2411_2: nāma bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya migamacche vadhitvā gayhamānaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ. “Asutaṃ” nāma bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2411_3: atthāya migamacche vadhitvā gahitanti asutaṃ. “Aparisaṅkitaṃ” pana diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2411_4: sutaparisaṅkitaṃ tadubhayavimuttaparisaṅkitañca ñatvā tabbipakkhato jānitabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin01a0:2411_5: Idha bhikkhū passanti manusse jālavāgurādihatthe gāmato va nikkhamante araññe vā
atk-vin01a0:2411_6: vicarante, dutiyadivase ca nesaṃ taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ samacchamaṃsaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2411_7: abhiharanti. Te tena diṭṭhena parisaṅkanti “bhikkhūnaṃ nukho atthāya kata”nti idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2411_8: diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ, nāma etaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ evaṃ aparisaṅkitaṃ taṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2411_9: Sace pana te manussā “kasmā bhante na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “nayidaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2411_10: bhante bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya kataṃ, amhehi attano atthāya vā rājayuttādīnaṃ atthāya
atk-vin01a0:2412_0: Naheva kho bhikkhū passanti; apica suṇanti, manussā kira jālavāgurādihatthā gāmato
atk-vin01a0:2412_1: vā nikkhamanti, araññe vā vicarantī”ti. Dutiyadivase ca nesaṃ taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2412_2: “bhikkhūnaṃ nukho atthāya kata”nti idaṃ “sutaparisaṅkitaṃ” nāma. Etaṃ gahetuṃ na
atk-vin01a0:2412_3: vaṭṭati, yaṃ evaṃ aparisaṅkitaṃ taṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana te manussā “kasmā, bhante,
atk-vin01a0:2412_4: na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “nayidaṃ, bhante, bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya kataṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2412_5: amhehi attano atthāya vā rājayuttādīnaṃ atthāya vā kata”nti vadanti kappati.
atk-vin01a0:2413_0: Naheva kho pana bhikkhū passanti, na suṇanti; apica kho tesaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2413_1: pattaṃ gahetvā samacchamaṃsaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā abhiharanti, te parisaṅkanti
atk-vin01a0:2413_2: “bhikkhūnaṃ nukho atthāya kata”nti idaṃ “tadubhayavimuttaparisaṅkitaṃ” nāma. Etaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2413_3: gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ evaṃ aparisaṅkitaṃ taṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana te manussā “kasmā,
atk-vin01a0:2413_4: bhante, na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “nayidaṃ, bhante, bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya
atk-vin01a0:2413_5: kataṃ amhehi attano atthāya vā rājayuttādīnaṃ atthāya vā kataṃ pavattamaṃsaṃ vā kappiyameva
atk-vin01a0:2413_6: labhitvā bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya sampādita”nti vadanti kappati. Matānaṃ petakiccatthāya
atk-vin01a0:2413_7: maṅgalādīnaṃ vā atthāya katepi eseva nayo. Yaṃ yañhi bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāya akataṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2413_8: yattha ca nibbematiko hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ kappati.
atk-vin01a0:2414_0: Sace pana ekasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū uddissa kataṃ hoti, te ca attano atthāya katabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2414_1: na jānanti, aññe jānanti. Ye jānanti, tesaṃ na vaṭṭati, itaresaṃ vaṭṭati. Aññe na
atk-vin01a0:2414_2: jānanti, teyeva jānanti, tesaṃyeva na vaṭṭati, aññesaṃ vaṭṭati. Tepi amhākaṃ atthāya
atk-vin01a0:2414_3: katanti jānanti, aññepi etesaṃ atthāya katanti jānanti, sabbesampi na vaṭṭati, sabbe
atk-vin01a0:2414_4: na jānanti, sabbesampi vaṭṭati. Pañcasu hi sahadhammikesu yassa vā tassa vā atthāya
atk-vin01a0:2415_0: Sace pana koci ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ vadhitvā tassa pattaṃ pūretvā deti, so
atk-vin01a0:2415_1: ca attano atthāya katabhāvaṃ jānaṃyeva gahetvā aññassa bhikkhuno deti, so tassa saddhāya
atk-vin01a0:2415_2: paribhuñjati, kassa āpattīti? Dvinnampi anāpatti. Yañhi uddissa kataṃ tassa abhuttatāya
atk-vin01a0:2415_3: anāpatti, itarassa ajānanatāya. Kappiyamaṃsassa hi paṭiggahaṇe āpatti natthi. Uddissa
atk-vin01a0:2415_4: katañca ajānitvā bhuttassa pacchā ñatvā āpattidesanākiccaṃ nāma natthi, akappiyamaṃsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2415_5: pana ajānitvā bhuttena pacchā ñatvāpi āpatti desetabbā, uddissa katañhi ñatvā bhuñjatova
atk-vin01a0:2415_6: āpatti. Akappiyamaṃsaṃ ajānitvā bhuñjantassāpi āpattiyeva. Tasmā āpattibhīrukena
atk-vin01a0:2415_7: rūpaṃ sallakkhentenapi pucchitvāva maṃsaṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Paribhogakāle pucchitvā
atk-vin01a0:2415_8: paribhuñjissāmīti vā gahetvā pucchitvāva paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Duviññeyyattā.
atk-vin01a0:2415_9: Acchamaṃsaṃ hi sūkaramaṃsasadisaṃ hoti, dīpimaṃsādīnipi migamaṃsādisadisāni, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:2416_0: Haṭṭho udaggoti tuṭṭho ceva unnatakāyacitto ca hutvā. So kira “na bhagavā imāni pañca
atk-vin01a0:2416_1: vatthūni anujānāti, idāni sakkhissāmi saṅghabhedaṃ kātu”nti kokālikassa iṅgitākāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2416_2: dassetvā yathā visaṃ vā khāditvā rajjuyā vā ubbandhitvā satthaṃ vā āharitvā maritukāmo
atk-vin01a0:2416_3: puriso visādīsu aññataraṃ labhitvā tappaccayā āsannampi maraṇadukkhaṃ ajānanto haṭṭho
atk-vin01a0:2416_4: udaggo hoti; evameva saṅghabhedapaccayā āsannampi avīcimhi nibbattitvā paṭisaṃvedanīyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2416_5: dukkhaṃ ajānanto “laddho dāni me saṅghabhedassa upāyo”ti haṭṭho udaggo sapariso uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-vin01a0:2416_6: teneva haṭṭhabhāvena bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-vin01a0:2417_0: Te mayaṃ imehi pañcahi vatthūhi samādāya vattāmāti ettha pana “imāni pañca vatthūnī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2417_1: vattabbepi te mayaṃ imehi pañcahi vatthūhi janaṃ saññāpessāmāti abhiṇhaṃ parivitakkavasena
atk-vin01a0:2417_2: vibhattivipallāsaṃ asallakkhetvā abhiṇhaṃ parivitakkānurūpameva “te mayaṃ imehi pañcahi
atk-vin01a0:2418: Dhutā sallekhavuttinoti yā paṭipadā kilese dhunāti, tāya samannāgatattā dhutā. Yā ca kilese sallikhati, sā etesaṃ vuttīti sallekhavuttino.
atk-vin01a0:2419_0: Bāhulikoti cīvarādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ bahulabhāvo bāhullaṃ, taṃ bāhullamassa atthi, tasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2419_1: vā bāhulle niyutto ṭhitoti bāhuliko. Bāhullāya cetetīti bāhulattāya ceteti kappeti
atk-vin01a0:2419_2: pakappeti. Kathañhi nāma mayhañca sāvakānañca cīvarādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ bahulabhāvo
atk-vin01a0:2419_3: bhaveyyāti evaṃ ussukkamāpannoti adhippāyo. Cakkabhedāyāti āṇābhedāya.
atk-vin01a0:2420_0: Dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvāti khandhake vuttanayena “alaṃ, devadatta, mā te rucci saṅghabhedo.
atk-vin01a0:2420_1: Garuko kho, devadatta, saṅghabhedo. Yo kho, devadatta, samaggaṃ saṅghaṃ bhindati,
atk-vin01a0:2420_2: kappaṭṭhikaṃ kibbisaṃ pasavati, kappaṃ nirayamhi paccati, yo ca kho, devadatta, bhinnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2420_3: saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ karoti, brahmaṃ puññaṃ pasavati, kappaṃ saggamhi modatī”ti evamādikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2420_4: anekappakāraṃ devadattassa ca bhikkhūnañca tadanucchavikaṃ tadanulomikaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā.
atk-vin01a0:2421_0: 411. Samaggassāti sahitassa cittena ca sarīrena ca aviyuttassāti attho. Padabhājanepi
atk-vin01a0:2421_1: hi ayameva attho dassito. Samānasaṃvāsakoti hi vadatā cittena aviyogo dassito hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2421_2: Samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitoti vadatā sarīrena. Kathaṃ? Samānasaṃvāsako hi laddhinānāsaṃvāsakena
atk-vin01a0:2421_3: vā kammanānāsaṃvāsakena vā virahito samacittatāya cittena aviyutto hoti. Samānasīmāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2422_0: Bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇanti bhedanassa saṅghabhedassa atthāya saṃvattanikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2422_1: kāraṇaṃ. Imasmiñhi okāse “kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ kāmādhikaraṇa”ntiādīsu viya kāraṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2422_2: adhikaraṇanti adhippetaṃ. Tañca yasmā aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ hoti, tasmā padabhājane “aṭṭhārasa
atk-vin01a0:2422_3: bhedakaravatthūnī”ti vuttaṃ. Tāni pana “idhūpāli, bhikkhu adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpetī”tiādinā
atk-vin01a0:2422_4: nayena khandhake āgatāni, tasmā tatreva nesaṃ atthaṃ vaṇṇayissāma. Yopi cāyaṃ imāni
atk-vin01a0:2422_5: vatthūni nissāya aparehipi kammena, uddesena, vohārena, anusāvanāya, salākaggāhenāti
atk-vin01a0:2422_6: pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅghabhedo hoti, tampi āgataṭṭhāneyeva pakāsayissāma. Saṅkhepato
atk-vin01a0:2422_7: pana bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāyāti ettha saṅghabhedassa atthāya
atk-vin01a0:2422_8: saṃvattanikaṃ saṅghabhedanipphattisamatthaṃ kāraṇaṃ gahetvāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2422_9: Paggayhāti paggahitaṃ abbhussitaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā. Tiṭṭheyyāti yathāsamādinnaṃ yathāpaggahitameva
atk-vin01a0:2422_10: ca katvā accheyya. Yasmā pana evaṃ paggaṇhatā tiṭṭhatā ca taṃ dīpitañceva appaṭinissaṭṭhañca
atk-vin01a0:2422_11: hoti, tasmā padabhājane “dīpeyyā”ti ca “nappaṭinissajjeyyā”ti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2423_0: Bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyoti aññehi lajjīhi bhikkhūhi evaṃ vattabbo bhaveyya. Padabhājane
atk-vin01a0:2423_1: cassa ye passantīti ye sammukhā paggayha tiṭṭhantaṃ passanti. Ye suṇantīti yepi “asukasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2423_2: nāma vihāre bhikkhū bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭhantī”ti suṇanti.
atk-vin01a0:2424: Sametāyasmā saṅghenāti āyasmā saṅghena saddhiṃ sametu samāgacchatu ekaladdhiko hotūti attho. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatīti.
atk-vin01a0:2425_0: Tattha sammodamānoti aññamaññaṃ sampattiyā saṭṭhu modamāno. Avivadamānoti “ayaṃ dhammo,
atk-vin01a0:2425_1: nāyaṃ dhammo”ti evaṃ na vivadamāno. Eko uddeso assāti ekuddeso, ekato pavattapātimokkhuddeso,
atk-vin01a0:2425_2: na visunti attho. Phāsu viharatīti sukhaṃ viharati.
atk-vin01a0:2426_0: Iccetaṃ kusalanti etaṃ paṭinissajjanaṃ kusalaṃ khemaṃ sotthibhāvo tassa bhikkhuno.
atk-vin01a0:2426_1: No ce paṭinissajjati āpatti dukkaṭassāti tikkhattuṃ vuttassa appaṭinissajjato dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2426_2: Sutvā na vadanti āpatti dukkaṭassāti ye sutvā na vadanti, tesampi dukkaṭaṃ. Kīvadūre
atk-vin01a0:2426_3: sutvā avadantānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ? Ekavihāre tāva vattabbaṃ natthi. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2426_4: “samantā addhayojane bhikkhūnaṃ bhāro. Dūtaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā pesetvā vadatopi āpattimokkho
atk-vin01a0:2426_5: natthi. Sayameva gantvā ‘garuko kho, āvuso, saṅghabhedo, mā saṅghabhedāya, parakkamī’ti
atk-vin01a0:2426_6: nivāretabbo”ti. Pahontena pana dūrampi gantabbaṃ agilānānañhi dūrepi bhāroyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2427_0: Idāni “evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno”tiādīsu atthamattameva dassetuṃ “so
atk-vin01a0:2427_1: bhikkhu saṅghamajjhampi ākaḍḍhitvā vattabbo”tiādimāha. Tattha saṅghamajjhampi ākaḍḍhitvāti
atk-vin01a0:2427_2: sace purimanayena vuccamāno na paṭinissajjati hatthesu ca pādesu ca gahetvāpi saṅghamajjhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2427_3: ākaḍḍhitvā punapi “mā āyasmā”tiādinā nayena tikkhattuṃ vattabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2428_0: Yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabboti yāva tatiyaṃ samanubhāsanaṃ tāva samanubhāsitabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2428_1: Tīhi samanubhāsanakammavācāhi kammaṃ kātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Padabhājane panassa
atk-vin01a0:2428_2: atthameva gahetvā samanubhāsanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “so bhikkhu samanubhāsitabbo. Evañca
atk-vin01a0:2429_0: 414. Tattha ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhantīti yañca
atk-vin01a0:2429_1: ñattipariyosāne dukkaṭaṃ āpanno, ye ca dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccaye, tā tissopi
atk-vin01a0:2429_2: āpattiyo “yassa nakkhamati so bhāseyyā”ti evaṃ yya-kārappattamattāya tatiyakammavācāya
atk-vin01a0:2429_3: paṭippassambhanti saṅghādisesoyeva tiṭṭhati. Kiṃ pana āpannāpattiyo paṭippassambhanti
atk-vin01a0:2429_4: anāpannāti? Mahāsumatthero tāva vadati “yo avasāne paṭinissajjissati, so tā āpattiyo
atk-vin01a0:2429_5: na āpajjati, tasmā anāpannā paṭippassambhantī”ti. Mahāpadumatthero pana liṅgaparivattena
atk-vin01a0:2429_6: asādhāraṇāpattiyo viya āpannā paṭippassambhanti, anāpannānaṃ kiṃ paṭippassaddhiyā”ti āha.
atk-vin01a0:2430_0: 415. Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññīti tañce samanubhāsanakammaṃ dhammakammaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a0:2430_1: tasmiṃ dhammakammasaññīti attho. Esa nayo sabbattha. Idha saññā na rakkhati, kammassa
atk-vin01a0:2432_0: Paṭinissajjantassāti ñattito pubbe vā ñattikkhaṇe vā ñattipariyosāne vā paṭhamāya
atk-vin01a0:2432_1: vā anusāvanāya dutiyāya vā tatiyāya vā yāva yya-kāraṃ na sampāpuṇāti, tāva paṭinissajjantassa
atk-vin01a0:2433_0: Ādikammikassāti. Ettha pana “devadatto samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, tasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2433_1: vatthusmi”nti parivāre āgatattā devadatto ādikammiko. So ca kho saṅghabhedāya parakkamanasseva,
atk-vin01a0:2433_2: na appaṭinissajjanassa. Na hi tassa taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ. Kathamidaṃ jānitabbanti ce?
atk-vin01a0:2433_3: Suttato. Yathā hi “ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na
atk-vin01a0:2433_4: paṭinissajji, tasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti parivāre āgatattā ariṭṭhassa kammaṃ katanti paññāyati,
atk-vin01a0:2433_5: na tathā devadattassa. Athāpissa katena bhavitabbanti koci attano rucimattena vadeyya,
atk-vin01a0:2433_6: tathāpi appaṭinissajjane ādikammikassa anāpatti nāma natthi. Na hi paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2433_7: vītikkamantassa aññatra uddissa anuññātato anāpatti nāma dissati. Yampi ariṭṭhasikkhāpadassa
atk-vin01a0:2433_8: anāpattiyaṃ “ādikammikassā”ti potthakesu likhitaṃ, taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ. Pamādalikhitabhāvo
atk-vin01a0:2433_9: cassa “paṭhamaṃ ariṭṭho bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṃ ropetabbo”ti
atk-vin01a0:2434_0: Iti bhedāya parakkamane ādikammikassa devadattassa yasmā taṃ kammaṃ na kataṃ, tasmāssa
atk-vin01a0:2434_1: āpattiyeva na jātā. Sikkhāpadaṃ pana taṃ ārabbha paññattanti katvā “ādikammiko”ti
atk-vin01a0:2434_2: vutto. Iti āpattiyā abhāvatoyevassa anāpatti vuttā. Sā panesā kiñcāpi asamanubhāsantassāti
atk-vin01a0:2434_3: imināva siddhā, yasmā pana asamanubhāsanto nāma yassa kevalaṃ samanubhāsanaṃ na karonti,
atk-vin01a0:2434_4: so vuccati, na ādikammiko. Ayañca devadatto ādikammikoyeva, tasmā “ādikammikassā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2434_5: vuttaṃ. Etenupāyena ṭhapetvā ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ sabbasamanubhāsanāsu vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2435_0: Samuṭṭhānādīsu tivaṅgikaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānaṃ, samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāmametaṃ, kāyavācācittato
atk-vin01a0:2435_1: samuṭṭhāti. Paṭinissajjāmīti kāyavikāraṃ vā vacībhedaṃ vā akarontasseva pana āpajjanato
atk-vin01a0:2435_2: akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2438_0: 417-8. Tena samayena buddho bhagavāti dutiyasaṅghabhedasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha anuvattakāti
atk-vin01a0:2438_2: vadantīti vaggavādakā. Padabhājane pana “tassa vaṇṇāya pakkhāya ṭhitā hontī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2438_3: tassa saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa vaṇṇatthāya ca pakkhavuḍḍhiatthāya ca ṭhitāti
atk-vin01a0:2438_4: attho. Ye hi vaggavādakā, te niyamena īdisā honti, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana
atk-vin01a0:2438_5: tiṇṇaṃ uddhaṃ kammārahā na honti, na hi saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ karoti, tasmā eko
atk-vin01a0:2438_6: vā dve vā tayo vāti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2439: Jānāti noti amhākaṃ chandādīni jānāti. Bhāsatīti “evaṃ karomā”ti amhehi saddhiṃ bhāsati. Amhākampetaṃ khamatīti yaṃ so karoti, etaṃ amhākampi ruccati.
atk-vin01a0:2440_0: Sametāyasmantānaṃ saṅghenāti āyasmantānaṃ cittaṃ saṅghena saddhiṃ sametu samāgacchatu,
atk-vin01a0:2440_1: ekībhāvaṃ yātūti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesamettha paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca pākaṭameva.
atk-vin01a0:2444_0: 424. Tena samayena buddho bhagavāti dubbacasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha anācāraṃ ācaratīti
atk-vin01a0:2444_1: anekappakāraṃ kāyavacīdvāravītikkamaṃ karoti. Kiṃ nu kho nāmāti vambhanavacanametaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2444_2: Ahaṃ kho nāmāti ukkaṃsavacanaṃ. Tumhe vadeyyanti “idaṃ karotha, idaṃ mā karothā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2444_3: ahaṃ tumhe vattuṃ arahāmīti dasseti. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā amhākaṃ buddho bhagavā kaṇṭakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2444_4: āruyha mayā saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbajitotievamādimatthaṃ sandhāyāha. “Amhākaṃ dhammo”ti
atk-vin01a0:2444_5: vatvā pana attano santakabhāve yuttiṃ dassento “amhākaṃ ayyaputtena dhammo abhisamito”ti
atk-vin01a0:2444_6: āha. Yasmā amhākaṃ ayyaputtena catusaccadhammo paṭividdho, tasmā dhammopi amhākanti
atk-vin01a0:2444_7: vuttaṃ hoti. Saṅghaṃ pana attano veripakkhe ṭhitaṃ maññamāno amhākaṃ saṅghoti na
atk-vin01a0:2444_8: vadati. Upamaṃ pana vatvā saṅghaṃ apasādetukāmo “seyyathāpi nāmā”tiādimāha. Tiṇakaṭṭhapaṇṇasaṭanti
atk-vin01a0:2444_9: tattha tattha patitaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhapaṇṇaṃ. Atha vā tiṇañca nissārakaṃ lahukaṃ kaṭṭhañca
atk-vin01a0:2444_10: tiṇakaṭṭhaṃ. Paṇṇasaṭanti purāṇapaṇṇaṃ. Ussāreyyāti rāsiṃ kareyya.
atk-vin01a0:2445_0: Pabbateyyāti pabbatappabhavā, sā hi sīghasotā hoti, tasmā tameva gaṇhāti. Saṅkhasevālapaṇakanti
atk-vin01a0:2445_1: ettha saṅkhoti dīghamūlako paṇṇasevālo vuccati. Sevāloti nīlasevālo, avaseso udakapappaṭakatilabījakādi
atk-vin01a0:2445_2: sabbopi paṇakoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Ekato ussāritāti ekaṭṭhāne kenāpi sampiṇḍitā rāsīkatāti dasseti.
atk-vin01a0:2446_0: 425-6. Dubbacajātikoti dubbacasabhāvo vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti attho. Padabhājanepissa
atk-vin01a0:2446_1: dubbacoti dukkhena kicchena vaditabbo, na sakkā sukhena vattunti attho. Dovacassakaraṇehīti
atk-vin01a0:2446_2: dubbacabhāvakaraṇīyehi, ye dhammā dubbacaṃ puggalaṃ karonti, tehi samannāgatoti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2446_3: Te pana “katame ca, āvuso, dovacassakaraṇā dhammā? Idhāvuso, bhikkhu pāpiccho hotī”tiādinā
atk-vin01a0:2446_4: nayena paṭipāṭiyā anumānasutte āgatā pāpicchatā, attukkaṃsakaparavambhakatā, kodhanatā,
atk-vin01a0:2446_6: codakaṃ paṭippharaṇatā, codakaṃ apasādanatā, codakassa paccāropanatā, aññena aññaṃpaṭicaraṇatā,
atk-vin01a0:2446_7: apadānena na sampāyanatā, makkhipaḷāsitā, issukīmaccharitā, saṭhamāyāvitā, thaddhātimānitā,
atk-vin01a0:2447: Ovādaṃ nakkhamati na sahatīti akkhamo. Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ appaṭipajjanato padakkhiṇena anusāsaniṃ na gaṇhātīti appadakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaniṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2448_0: Uddesapariyāpannesūti uddese pariyāpannesu antogadhesu. “Yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyyā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2448_1: evaṃ saṅgahitattā anto pātimokkhassa vattamānesūti attho. Sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānoti
atk-vin01a0:2448_2: sahadhammikena vuccamāno karaṇatthe upayogavacanaṃ, pañcahi sahadhammikehi sikkhitabbattā
atk-vin01a0:2448_3: tesaṃ vā santakattā sahadhammikanti laddhanāmena buddhapaññattena sikkhāpadena vuccamānoti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2449: Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyāti yena vacanena maṃ vadatha, tato mama vacanato viramatha. Mā maṃ taṃ vacanaṃ vadathāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2450_0: Vadatu sahadhammenāti sahadhammikena sikkhāpadena sahadhammena vā aññenapi pāsādikabhāvasaṃvattanikena
atk-vin01a0:2450_1: vacanena vadatu. Yadidanti vuḍḍhikāraṇanidassanatthe nipāto. Tena “yaṃ idaṃ aññamaññassa
atk-vin01a0:2450_2: hitavacanaṃ āpattito vuṭṭhāpanañca tena aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanena ca
atk-vin01a0:2450_3: saṃvaḍḍhā parisā”ti evaṃ parisāya vuḍḍhikāraṇaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
atk-vin01a0:2454_0: 431. Tena samayena buddho bhagavāti kuladūsakasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha assajipunabbasukā
atk-vin01a0:2454_1: nāmāti assaji ceva punabbasuko ca. Kīṭāgirisminti evaṃnāmake janapade. Āvāsikā hontīti
atk-vin01a0:2454_2: ettha āvāso etesaṃ atthīti āvāsikā. “Āvāso”ti vihāro vuccati. So yesaṃ āyatto navakammakaraṇapurāṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇādibhārahāratāya,
atk-vin01a0:2454_3: te āvāsikā. Ye pana kevalaṃ vihāre vasanti, te nevāsikāti vuccanti. Ime āvāsikā ahesuṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2454_4: Alajjino pāpabhikkhūti nillajjā lāmakabhikkhū, te hi chabbaggiyānaṃ jeṭṭhakachabbaggiyā.
atk-vin01a0:2455_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira cha janā sahāyakā “kasikammādīni dukkarāni, handa mayaṃ sammā pabbajāma!
atk-vin01a0:2455_1: Pabbajantehi ca uppanne kicce nittharaṇakaṭṭhāne pabbajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sammantayitvā
atk-vin01a0:2455_2: dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ santike pabbajiṃsu. Te pañcavassā hutvā mātikaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:2455_3: mantayiṃsu “janapado nāma kadāci subhikkho hoti kadāci dubbhikkho, mayaṃ mā ekaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a0:2455_4: vasimha, tīsu ṭhānesu vasāmā”ti. Tato paṇḍukalohitake āhaṃsu – “āvuso, sāvatthi nāma
atk-vin01a0:2455_6: dvinnaṃ kāsikosalaraṭṭhānaṃ āyamukhabhūtā, tatra tumhe dhuraṭṭhāneyeva pariveṇāni
atk-vin01a0:2455_7: kāretvā ambapanasanāḷikerādīni ropetvā pupphehi ca phalehi ca kulāni saṅgaṇhantā
atk-vin01a0:2456_0: Mettiyabhūmajake āhaṃsu – “āvuso, rājagahaṃ nāma aṭṭhārasahi manussakoṭīhi ajjhāvutthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2457_0: Assajipunabbasuke āhaṃsu – “āvuso, kīṭāgiri nāma dvīhi meghehi anuggahito tīṇi sassāni
atk-vin01a0:2457_1: pasavanti, tatra tumhe dhuraṭṭhāneyeva pariveṇāni kāretvā…pe… parisaṃ vaḍḍhethā”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2457_2: Te tathā akaṃsu. Tesu ekamekassa pakkhassa pañca pañca bhikkhusatāni parivārā, evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2457_3: samadhikaṃ diyaḍḍhabhikkhusahassaṃ hoti. Tatra paṇḍukalohitakā saparivārā sīlavantova
atk-vin01a0:2457_4: bhagavatā saddhiṃ janapadacārikampi caranti, te akatavatthuṃ uppādenti, paññattasikkhāpadaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2457_5: pana na maddanti, itare sabbe alajjino akatavatthuñca uppādenti, paññattasikkhāpadañca
atk-vin01a0:2458_0: Evarūpanti evaṃjātikaṃ. Anācāraṃ ācarantīti anācaritabbaṃ ācaranti, akātabbaṃ karonti.
atk-vin01a0:2458_1: Mālāvacchanti taruṇapuppharukkhaṃ, taruṇakā hi puppharukkhāpi pupphagacchāpi mālāvacchā
atk-vin01a0:2458_2: tveva vuccanti, te ca anekappakāraṃ mālāvacchaṃ sayampi ropenti, aññenapi ropāpenti,
atk-vin01a0:2458_3: tena vuttaṃ – “mālāvacchaṃ ropentipi ropāpentipī”ti. Siñcantīti sayameva udakena
atk-vin01a0:2459_0: Ettha pana akappiyavohāro kappiyavohāro pariyāyo obhāso nimittakammanti imāni pañca
atk-vin01a0:2459_1: jānitabbāni. Tattha akappiyavohāro nāma allaharitānaṃ koṭṭanaṃ koṭṭāpanaṃ, āvāṭassa
atk-vin01a0:2459_2: khaṇanaṃ khaṇāpanaṃ, mālāvacchassa ropanaṃ ropāpanaṃ, āḷiyā bandhanaṃ bandhāpanaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2459_3: udakassa secanaṃ secāpanaṃ, mātikāya sammukhakaraṇaṃ kappiyaudakasiñcanaṃ hatthamukhapādadhovananhānodakasiñcananti.
atk-vin01a0:2459_4: Kappiyavohāro nāma “imaṃ rukkhaṃ jāna, imaṃ āvāṭaṃ jāna, imaṃ mālāvacchaṃ jāna, ettha
atk-vin01a0:2459_5: udakaṃ jānā”ti vacanaṃ sukkhamātikāya ujukaraṇañca. Pariyāyo nāma “paṇḍitena nāma
atk-vin01a0:2459_6: mālāvacchādayo ropāpetabbā nacirasseva upakārāya saṃvattantī”tiādivacanaṃ. Obhāso
atk-vin01a0:2459_7: nāma kudālakhaṇittādīni ca mālāvacche ca gahetvā ṭhānaṃ, evaṃ ṭhitañhi sāmaṇerādayo
atk-vin01a0:2459_8: disvā thero kārāpetukāmoti gantvā karonti. Nimittakammaṃ nāma kudāla-khaṇitti-vāsi-pharasu-udakabhājanāni
atk-vin01a0:2460_0: Imāni pañcapi kulasaṅgahatthāya ropane na vaṭṭanti, phalaparibhogatthāya kappiyākappiyavohāradvayameva
atk-vin01a0:2460_1: na vaṭṭati, itarattayaṃ vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “kappiyavohāropi vaṭṭati. Yañca
atk-vin01a0:2460_2: attano paribhogatthāya vaṭṭati, taṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā atthāyapi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2461_0: Ārāmatthāya pana vanatthāyaca chāyatthāya ca akappiyavohāramattameva na ca vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a0:2461_1: sesaṃ vaṭṭati, na kevalañca sesaṃ yaṃkiñci mātikampi ujuṃ kātuṃ kappiyaudakaṃ siñcituṃ
atk-vin01a0:2461_2: nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ katvā nhāyituṃ hatthapādamukhadhovanudakāni ca tattha chaḍḍetumpi
atk-vin01a0:2461_3: vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana kurundiyañca “kappiyapathaviyaṃ sayaṃ ropetumpi vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2461_4: vuttaṃ. Ārāmādiatthāya pana ropitassa vā ropāpitassa vā phalaṃ paribhuñjitumpi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2462_0: Ocinanaocināpane pakatiyāpi pācittiyaṃ. Kuladūsanatthāya pana pācittiyañceva dukkaṭañca.
atk-vin01a0:2462_1: Ganthanādīsu ca uracchadapariyosānesu kuladūsanatthāya aññatthāya vā karontassa dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin01a0:2462_2: Kasmā? Anācārattā, “pāpasamācāro”ti ettha vuttapāpasamācārattā ca. Ārāmādiatthāya
atk-vin01a0:2462_3: rukkharopane viya vatthupūjanatthāya kasmā na anāpattīti ce? Anāpattiyeva. Yathā
atk-vin01a0:2462_4: hi tattha kappiyavohārena pariyāyādīhi ca anāpatti tathā vatthupūjatthāyapi anāpattiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2463_0: Nanu ca tattha “kappiyapathaviyaṃ sayaṃ ropetumpi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttanti? Vuttaṃ, na
atk-vin01a0:2463_1: pana mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Athāpi maññeyyāsi itarāsu vuttampi pamāṇaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyañca
atk-vin01a0:2463_2: kappiyaudakasecanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ kathanti? Tampi na virujjhati. Tatra hi avisesena
atk-vin01a0:2463_4: vadanto ñāpeti “kulasaṅgahatthāya pupphaphalūpagameva sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ, aññatra
atk-vin01a0:2463_5: pana pariyāyo atthī”ti. Tasmā tattha pariyāyaṃ, idha ca pariyāyābhāvaṃ ñatvā yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2472_0: Sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Tattha siyā yadi vatthupūjanatthāyapi ganthānādīsu
atk-vin01a0:2472_1: āpatti, haraṇādīsu kasmā anāpattīti? Kulitthīādīnaṃ atthāya haraṇato haraṇādhikāre
atk-vin01a0:2472_2: hi visesetvā te kulitthīnantiādi vuttaṃ, tasmā buddhādīnaṃ atthāya harantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2473_0: Tattha ekatovaṇṭikanti pupphānaṃ vaṇṭe ekato katvā katamālaṃ. Ubhatovaṇṭikanti ubhohi
atk-vin01a0:2473_1: passehi pupphavaṇṭe katvā katamālaṃ. Mañjarikantiādīsu pana mañjarī viya katā pupphavikati
atk-vin01a0:2473_2: mañjarikāti vuccati. Vidhūtikāti sūciyā vā salākāya vā sinduvārapupphādīni vijjhitvā
atk-vin01a0:2473_3: katā. Vaṭaṃsakoti vataṃsako. Āveḷāti kaṇṇikā. Uracchadoti hārasadisaṃ ure ṭhapanakapupphadāmaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2474_0: Ayaṃ pana ādito paṭṭhāya vitthārena āpattivinicchayo. Kuladūsanatthāya akappiyapathaviyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2474_1: mālāvacchaṃ ropentassa pācittiyañceva dukkaṭañca, tathā akappiyavohārena ropāpentassa.
atk-vin01a0:2474_2: Kappiyapathaviyaṃ ropanepi ropāpanepi dukkaṭameva. Ubhayatthāpi sakiṃ āṇattiyā bahunnampi
atk-vin01a0:2474_3: ropane ekameva sapācittiyadukkaṭaṃ vā suddhadukkaṭaṃ vā hoti. Paribhogatthāya hi
atk-vin01a0:2474_4: kappiyabhūmiyaṃ vā akappiyabhūmiyaṃ vā kappiyavohārena ropāpane anāpatti. Ārāmādiatthāyapi
atk-vin01a0:2474_5: akappiyapathaviyaṃ ropentassa vā akappiyavacanena ropāpentassa vā pācittiyaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2474_6: pana nayo mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ na suṭṭhu vibhatto, mahāpaccariyaṃ vibhattoti.
atk-vin01a0:2475_0: Siñcanasiñcāpane pana akappiyaudakena sabbattha pācittiyaṃ, kuladūsanaparibhogatthāya
atk-vin01a0:2475_1: dukkaṭampi. Kappiyena tesaṃyeva dvinnamatthāya dukkaṭaṃ. Paribhogatthāya cettha kappiyavohārena
atk-vin01a0:2475_2: siñcāpane anāpatti. Āpattiṭṭhāne pana dhārāvacchedavasena payogabahulatāya āpattibahulatā veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:2476_0: Kuladūsanatthāya ocinane pupphagaṇanāya dukkaṭapācittiyāni aññattha pācittiyāneva.
atk-vin01a0:2476_1: Bahūni pana pupphāni ekapayogena ocinanto payogavasena kāretabbo. Ocināpane kuladūsanatthāya
atk-vin01a0:2476_2: sakiṃ āṇatto bahumpi ocinati, ekameva sapācittiyadukkaṭaṃ, aññatra pācittiyameva.
atk-vin01a0:2477_0: Ganthanādīsu sabbāpi cha pupphavikatiyo veditabbā – ganthimaṃ, gopphimaṃ, vedhimaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2477_1: veṭhimaṃ, pūrimaṃ, vāyimanti. Tattha “ganthimaṃ” nāma sadaṇḍakesu vā uppalapadumādīsu
atk-vin01a0:2477_2: aññesu vā dīghavaṇṭesu pupphesu daṭṭhabbaṃ. Daṇḍakena daṇḍakaṃ vaṇṭena vā vaṇṭaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2477_3: ganthetvā katameva hi ganthimaṃ. Taṃ bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā kātumpi akappiyavacanena
atk-vin01a0:2477_4: kārāpetumpi na vaṭṭati. Evaṃ jāna, evaṃ kate sobheyya, yathā etāni pupphāni na vikiriyanti
atk-vin01a0:2477_5: tathā karohītiādinā pana kappiyavacanena kāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2478_0: “Gopphimaṃ” nāma suttena vā vākādīhi vā vassikapupphādīnaṃ ekatovaṇṭikaubhatovaṇṭikamālāvasena
atk-vin01a0:2478_1: gopphanaṃ, vākaṃ vā rajjuṃ vā diguṇaṃ katvā tattha avaṇṭakāni nīpapupphādīni pavesetvā
atk-vin01a0:2478_2: paṭipāṭiyā bandhanti, etampi gopphimameva. Sabbaṃ purimanayeneva na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2479_0: “Vedhimaṃ” nāma savaṇṭakāni vassikapupphādīni vaṇṭesu, avaṇṭakāni vā vakulapupphādīni
atk-vin01a0:2479_1: antochidde sūcitālahīrādīhi vinivijjhitvā āvunanti, etaṃ vedhimaṃ nāma, tampi purimanayeneva
atk-vin01a0:2479_2: na vaṭṭati. Keci pana kadalikkhandhamhi kaṇṭake vā tālahīrādīni vā pavesetvā tattha
atk-vin01a0:2479_3: pupphāni vijjhitvā ṭhapenti, keci kaṇṭakasākhāsu, keci pupphacchattapupphakūṭāgārakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2479_4: chatte ca bhittiyañca pavesetvā ṭhapitakaṇṭakesu, keci dhammāsanavitāne baddhakaṇṭakesu,
atk-vin01a0:2479_5: keci kaṇikārapupphādīni salākāhi vijjhanti, chattādhichattaṃ viya ca karonti, taṃ
atk-vin01a0:2479_6: atioḷārikameva. Pupphavijjhanatthaṃ pana dhammāsanavitāne kaṇṭakampi bandhituṃ kaṇṭakādīhi
atk-vin01a0:2479_7: vā ekapupphampi vijjhituṃ puppheyeva vā pupphaṃ pavesetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Jālavitānavedika-nāgadantaka
atk-vin01a0:2479_8: pupphapaṭicchakatālapaṇṇaguḷakādīnaṃ pana chiddesu asokapiṇḍiyā vā antaresu pupphāni
atk-vin01a0:2479_9: pavesetuṃ na doso. Etaṃ vedhimaṃ nāma na hoti. Dhammarajjuyampi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:2480_0: “Veṭhimaṃ” nāma pupphadāmapupphahatthakesu daṭṭhabbaṃ. Keci hi matthakadāmaṃ karontā
atk-vin01a0:2480_1: heṭṭhā ghaṭakākāraṃ dassetuṃ pupphehi veṭhenti, keci aṭṭhaṭṭha vā dasa dasa vā uppalapupphādīni
atk-vin01a0:2480_2: suttena vā vākena vā daṇḍakesu bandhitvā uppalahatthake vā padumahatthake vā karonti,
atk-vin01a0:2480_3: taṃ sabbaṃ purimanayeneva na vaṭṭati. Sāmaṇerehi uppāṭetvā thale ṭhapitauppalādīni
atk-vin01a0:2480_4: kāsāvena bhaṇḍikampi bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati. Tesaṃyeva pana vākena vā daṇḍakena vā
atk-vin01a0:2480_5: bandhituṃ aṃsabhaṇḍikaṃ vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Aṃsabhaṇḍikā nāma khandhe ṭhapitakāsāvassa
atk-vin01a0:2480_6: ubho ante āharitvā bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā tasmiṃ pasibbake viya pupphāni pakkhipanti, ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2480_7: vuccati aṃsabhaṇḍikā, etaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Daṇḍakehi paduminipaṇṇaṃ vijjhitvā uppalādīni
atk-vin01a0:2480_8: paṇṇena veṭhetvā gaṇhanti, tatrāpi pupphānaṃ upari paduminipaṇṇameva bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2480_9: Heṭṭhā daṇḍakaṃ pana bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2481_0: “Pūrimaṃ” nāma mālāguṇe ca pupphapaṭe ca daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yo hi mālāguṇena cetiyaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:2481_1: bodhiṃ vā vedikaṃ vā parikkhipanto puna ānetvā pūrimaṭhānaṃ atikkāmeti, ettāvatāpi
atk-vin01a0:2481_2: pūrimaṃ nāma hoti. Ko pana vādo anekakkhattuṃ parikkhipantassa, nāgadanta-kantarehi
atk-vin01a0:2481_3: pavesetvā haranto olambakaṃ katvā puna nāgadantakaṃ parikkhipati, etampi pūrimaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2481_4: nāma. Nāgadantake pana pupphavalayaṃ pavesetuṃ vaṭṭati. Mālāguṇehi pupphapaṭaṃ karonti.
atk-vin01a0:2481_5: Tatrāpi ekameva mālāguṇaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati. Puna paccāharato pūrimameva hoti, taṃ
atk-vin01a0:2481_6: sabbaṃ purimanayeneva na vaṭṭati. Mālāguṇehi pana bahūhipi kataṃ pupphadāmaṃ labhitvā
atk-vin01a0:2481_7: āsanamatthakādīsu bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Atidīghaṃ pana mālāguṇaṃ ekavāraṃ haritvā vā
atk-vin01a0:2481_8: parikkhipitvā vā puna aññassa bhikkhuno dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tenāpi tatheva kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2482_1: karontassa ekamekamhi jālacchidde dukkaṭaṃ. Bhitticchattabodhitthambhādīsupi eseva
atk-vin01a0:2482_2: nayo. Pupphapaṭaṃ pana parehi pūritampi vāyituṃ na labbhati. Gopphimapuppheheva hatthiassādirūpakāni
atk-vin01a0:2482_3: karonti, tānipi vāyimaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti. Purimanayeneva sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati. Aññehi
atk-vin01a0:2482_4: kataparicchede pana pupphāni ṭhapentena hatthiassādirūpakampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2482_5: pana kalambakena aḍḍhacandakena ca saddhiṃ aṭṭhapupphavikatiyo vuttā. Tattha kalambakoti
atk-vin01a0:2482_7: Tadubhayampi pūrimeyeva paviṭṭhaṃ. Kurundiyaṃ pana “dve tayo mālāguṇe ekato katvā
atk-vin01a0:2482_8: pupphadāmakaraṇampi vāyimaṃyevā”ti vuttaṃ. Tampi idha pūrimaṭṭhāneyeva paviṭṭhaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2482_9: na kevalañca pupphaguḷadāmameva piṭṭhamayadāmampi geṇḍukapupphadāmampi kurundiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2482_10: vuttaṃ, kharapattadāmampi sikkhāpadassa sādhāraṇattā bhikkhūnampi bhikkhunīnampi
atk-vin01a0:2482_11: neva kātuṃ na kārāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Pūjānimittaṃ pana kappiyavacanaṃ sabbattha vattuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2483_0: Tuvaṭṭentīti nipajjanti. Lāsentīti pītiyā uppilavamānā viya uṭṭhahitvā lāsiyanāṭakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2483_1: nāṭenti, recakaṃ denti. Naccantiyāpi naccantīti yadā nāṭakitthī naccati, tadā tepi
atk-vin01a0:2483_2: tassā purato vā pacchato vā gacchantā naccanti. Naccantiyāpi gāyantīti yadā sā naccati,
atk-vin01a0:2483_3: tadā naccānurūpaṃ gāyanti. Esa nayo sabbattha. Aṭṭhapadepi kīḷantīti aṭṭhapadaphalake
atk-vin01a0:2483_4: jūtaṃ kīḷanti. Tathā dasapade, ākāsepīti aṭṭhapadadasapadesu viya ākāseyeva kīḷanti.
atk-vin01a0:2483_5: Parihārapathepīti bhūmiyaṃ nānāpathamaṇḍalaṃ katvā tattha pariharitabbapathaṃ pariharantā
atk-vin01a0:2483_6: kīḷanti. Santikāyapi kīḷantīti santikakīḷāya kīḷanti, ekajjhaṃ ṭhapitā sāriyo vā
atk-vin01a0:2483_7: pāsāṇasakkharāyo vā acālentā nakheneva apanenti ca upanenti ca, sace tattha kāci
atk-vin01a0:2483_8: calati, parājayo hoti. Khalikāyāti jūtaphalake pāsakakīḷāya kīḷanti. Ghaṭikāyāti
atk-vin01a0:2483_9: ghaṭikā vuccati daṇḍakakīḷā, tāya kīḷanti. Dīghadaṇḍakena rassadaṇḍakaṃ paharantā vicaranti.
atk-vin01a0:2484_0: Salākahatthenāti lākhāya vā mañjaṭṭhiyā vā piṭṭhaudake vā salākahatthaṃ temetvā “kiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2484_1: hotū”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā bhittiyaṃ vā taṃ paharitvā hatthiassādīrūpāni dassentā kīḷanti.
atk-vin01a0:2484_2: Akkhenāti guḷena. Paṅgacīrenāti paṅgacīraṃ vuccati paṇṇanāḷikā, taṃ dhamantā kīḷanti.
atk-vin01a0:2484_3: Vaṅkakenāti gāmadārakānaṃ kīḷanakena khuddakanaṅgalena. Mokkhacikāyāti mokkhacikā
atk-vin01a0:2484_4: vuccati samparivattakakīḷā, ākāse vā daṇḍaṃ gahetvā, bhūmiyaṃ vā sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā heṭṭhupariyabhāvena
atk-vin01a0:2484_5: parivattantā kīḷantīti attho. Ciṅgulakenāti ciṅgulakaṃ vuccati tālapaṇṇādīhi kataṃ
atk-vin01a0:2484_6: vātappahārena paribbhamanacakkaṃ, tena kīḷanti. Pattāḷhakenāti pattāḷhakaṃ vuccati
atk-vin01a0:2484_7: paṇṇanāḷi, tāya vālikādīni minantā kīḷanti. Rathakenāti khuddakarathena. Dhanukenāti khuddakadhanunā.
atk-vin01a0:2485_0: Akkharikāyāti akkharikā vuccati ākāse vā piṭṭhiyaṃ vā akkharajānanakīḷā, tāya kīḷanti.
atk-vin01a0:2485_1: Manesikāyāti manesikā vuccati manasā cintitajānanakīḷā, tāya kīḷanti. Yathāvajjenāti
atk-vin01a0:2485_2: yathāvajjaṃ vuccati kāṇakuṇikakhañjādīnaṃ yaṃ yaṃ vajjaṃ taṃ taṃ payojetvā dassanakīḷā
atk-vin01a0:2485_3: tāya kīḷanti, velambhakā viya. Hatthismimpi sikkhantīti hatthinimittaṃ yaṃ sippaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2485_4: sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ sikkhanti. Eseva nayo assādīsu. Dhāvantipīti parammukhā gacchantā
atk-vin01a0:2485_5: dhāvanti. Ādhāvantipīti yattakaṃ dhāvanti, tattakameva abhimukhā puna āgacchantā
atk-vin01a0:2485_6: ādhāvanti. Nibbujjhantīti mallayuddhaṃ karonti. Nalāṭikampi dentīti “sādhu, sādhu,
atk-vin01a0:2485_7: bhaginī”ti attano nalāṭe aṅguliṃ ṭhapetvā tassā nalāṭe ṭhapenti. Vividhampi anācāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2485_8: ācarantīti aññampi pāḷiyaṃ anāgataṃ mukhaḍiṇḍimādivividhaṃ anācāraṃ ācaranti.
atk-vin01a0:2486_0: 432. Pāsādikenāti pasādāvahena, sāruppena samaṇānucchavikena. Abhikkantenāti gamanena.
atk-vin01a0:2486_1: Paṭikkantenāti nivattanena. Ālokitenāti purato dassanena. Vilokitenāti ito cito ca
atk-vin01a0:2486_2: dassanena. Samiñjitenāti pabbasaṅkocanena. Pasāritenāti tesaṃyeva pasāraṇena. Sabbattha
atk-vin01a0:2486_4: hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Okkhittacakkhūti heṭṭhā-khittacakkhu. Iriyāpathasampannoti tāya
atk-vin01a0:2487_0: Kvāyanti ko ayaṃ. Abalabalo viyāti abalo kira bondo vuccati, atisayatthe ca idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2487_1: āmeḍitaṃ, tasmā atibondo viyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Mandamandoti abhikkantādīnaṃ anuddhatatāya
atk-vin01a0:2487_2: atimando. Atisaṇhoti evaṃ guṇameva dosato dassenti. Bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko viyāti okkhittacakkhutāya
atk-vin01a0:2487_3: bhakuṭiṃ katvā saṅkuṭitamukho kupito viya vicaratīti maññamānā vadanti. Saṇhāti nipuṇā,
atk-vin01a0:2487_4: “amma tāta bhaginī”ti evaṃ upāsakajanaṃ yuttaṭṭhāne upanetuṃ chekā, na yathā ayaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:2487_5: evaṃ abalabalo viyāti adhippāyo. Sakhilāti sākhalyena yuttā. Sukhasambhāsāti idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2487_6: purimassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yesañhi sukhasambhāsā sammodanīyakathā nelā hoti kaṇṇasukhā,
atk-vin01a0:2487_7: te sakhilāti vuccanti. Tenāhaṃsu – “sakhilā sukhasambhāsā”ti. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo
atk-vin01a0:2487_8: – amhākaṃ ayyā upāsake disvā madhuraṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathenti, tasmā sakhilā
atk-vin01a0:2487_9: sukhasambhāsā, na yathā ayaṃ; evaṃ mandamandā viyāti. Mihitapubbaṅgamāti mihitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2487_10: pubbaṅgamaṃ etesaṃ vacanassāti mihitapubbaṅgamā, paṭhamaṃ sitaṃ katvā pacchā vadantīti
atk-vin01a0:2487_11: attho. Ehisvāgatavādinoti upāsakaṃ disvā “ehi svāgataṃ tavā”ti evaṃvādino, na yathā
atk-vin01a0:2487_12: ayaṃ; evaṃ saṅkuṭitamukhatāya bhākuṭikabhākuṭikā viya evaṃ mihitapubbaṅgamāditāya
atk-vin01a0:2487_13: abhākuṭikabhāvaṃ atthato dassetvā puna sarūpenapi dassento āhaṃsu – “abhākuṭikā uttānamukhā
atk-vin01a0:2487_14: pubbabhāsino”ti. Uppaṭipāṭiyā vā tiṇṇampi ākārānaṃ abhāvadassanametanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2487_15: Kathaṃ? Ettha hi “abhākuṭikā”ti iminā bhākuṭikabhākuṭikākārassa abhāvo dassito. “Uttānamukhā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2487_16: iminā mandamandākārassa, ye hi cakkhūni ummiletvā ālokanena uttānamukhā honti, na
atk-vin01a0:2487_17: te mandamandā. Pubbabhāsinoti iminā abalabalākārassa abhāvo dassito, ye hi ābhāsanakusalatāya
atk-vin01a0:2487_18: “amma tātā”ti paṭhamataraṃ ābhāsanti, na te abalabalāti.
atk-vin01a0:2488_0: Ehi, bhante, gharaṃ gamissāmāti so kira upāsako “na kho, āvuso, piṇḍo labbhatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2488_1: vutte “tumhākaṃ bhikkhūhiyeva etaṃ kataṃ, sakalampi gāmaṃ vicarantā na lacchathā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2488_2: vatvā piṇḍapātaṃ dātukāmo “ehi, bhante, gharaṃ gamissāmā”ti āha. Kiṃ panāyaṃ payuttavācā
atk-vin01a0:2488_3: hoti, na hotīti? Na hoti. Pucchitapañho nāmāyaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmā idāni cepi
atk-vin01a0:2488_4: pubbaṇhe vā sāyanhe vā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ koci puccheyya – “kasmā, bhante,
atk-vin01a0:2488_5: carathā”ti? Yenatthena carati, taṃ ācikkhitvā “laddhaṃ na laddha”nti vutte sace na
atk-vin01a0:2488_6: laddhaṃ, “na laddha”nti vatvā yaṃ so deti, taṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2489_0: Duṭṭhoti na pasādādīnaṃ vināsena duṭṭho, puggalavasena duṭṭho. Dānapathānīti dānāniyeva
atk-vin01a0:2489_1: vuccanti. Atha vā dānapathānīti dānanibaddhāni dānavattānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Upacchinnānīti
atk-vin01a0:2489_2: dāyakehi upacchinnāni, na te tāni etarahi denti. Riñcantīti visuṃ honti nānā honti,
atk-vin01a0:2489_3: pakkamantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṇṭhaheyyāti sammā tiṭṭheyya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ patiṭṭhā bhaveyya.
atk-vin01a0:2490_0: Evamāvusoti kho so bhikkhu saddhassa pasannassa upāsakassa sāsanaṃ sampaṭicchi. Evarūpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2490_1: kira sāsanaṃ kappiyaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā “mama vacanena bhagavato pāde vandathā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2490_2: vā “cetiyaṃ paṭimaṃ bodhiṃ saṅghattheraṃ vandathā”ti vā “cetiye gandhapūjaṃ karotha,
atk-vin01a0:2490_3: pupphapūjaṃ karothā”ti vā “bhikkhū sannipātetha, dānaṃ dassāma, dhammaṃ sossāmāti
