atk-vin01a0:2490_4: vā īdisesu sāsanesu kukkuccaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Kappiyasāsanāni etāni na gihīnaṃ gihikammapaṭisaṃyuttānīti.
atk-vin01a0:2490_5: Kuto ca tvaṃ, bhikkhu, āgacchasīti nisinno so bhikkhu na āgacchati atthato pana āgato
atk-vin01a0:2490_6: hoti; evaṃ santepi vattamānasamīpe vattamānavacanaṃ labbhati, tasmā na doso. Pariyosāne
atk-vin01a0:2490_7: “tato ahaṃ bhagavā āgacchāmī”ti etthāpi vacane eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:2491_0: 433. Paṭhamaṃ assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū codetabbāti “mayaṃ tumhe vattukāmā”ti okāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2491_1: kāretvā vatthunā ca āpattiyā ca codetabbā. Codetvā yaṃ na saranti, taṃ sāretabbā.
atk-vin01a0:2491_2: Sace vatthuñca āpattiñca paṭijānanti, āpattimeva vā paṭijānanti, na vatthuṃ, āpattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2491_3: ropetabbā. Atha vatthumeva paṭijānanti, nāpattiṃ; evampi “imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2491_4: nāma āpattī”ti ropetabbā eva. Yadi neva vatthuṃ, nāpattiṃ paṭijānanti, āpattiṃ na
atk-vin01a0:2491_5: ropetabbā ayamettha vinicchayo. Yathāpaṭiññāya pana āpattiṃ ropetvā; evaṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2492_0: Evaṃ pabbājanīyakammakatena bhikkhunā yasmiṃ vihāre vasantena yasmiṃ gāme kuladūsakakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2492_1: kataṃ hoti, tasmiṃ vihāre vā tasmiṃ gāme vā na vasitabbaṃ. Tasmiṃ vihāre vasantena
atk-vin01a0:2492_2: sāmantagāmepi piṇḍāya na caritabbaṃ. Sāmantavihārepi vasantena tasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya
atk-vin01a0:2492_3: na caritabbaṃ. Upatissatthero pana “bhante nagaraṃ nāma mahantaṃ dvādasayojanikampi
atk-vin01a0:2492_4: hotī”ti antevāsikehi vutto “yassā vīthiyā kuladūsakakammaṃ kataṃ tattheva vārita”nti
atk-vin01a0:2492_5: āha. Tato “vīthipi mahatī nagarappamāṇāva hotī”ti vutto “yassā gharapaṭipāṭiyā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2492_6: āha, “gharapaṭipāṭīpi vīthippamāṇāva hotī”ti vutto ito cito ca satta gharāni vāritānī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2492_7: āha. Taṃ pana sabbaṃ therassa manorathamattameva. Sacepi vihāro tiyojanaparamo hoti
atk-vin01a0:2492_8: dvādasayojanaparamañca nagaraṃ, neva vihāre vasituṃ labbhati, na nagare caritunti.
atk-vin01a0:2493_0: 435. Te saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatāti kathaṃ saṅgho tesaṃ kammaṃ akāsi? Na gantvāva
atk-vin01a0:2493_1: ajjhottharitvā akāsi, atha kho kulehi nimantetvā saṅghabhattesu kayiramānesu tasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2493_2: tasmiṃ ṭhāne therā samaṇapaṭipadaṃ kathetvā “ayaṃ samaṇo, ayaṃ assamaṇo”ti manusse
atk-vin01a0:2493_3: saññāpetvā ekaṃ dve bhikkhū sīmaṃ pave setvā etenevupāyena sabbesaṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2493_4: akaṃsūti. Evaṃ pabbājanīyakammakatassa ca aṭṭhārasa vattāni pūretvā yācantassa kammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2493_5: paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. Paṭippassaddhakammenāpi ca tena yesu kulesu pubbe kuladūsakakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2493_6: kataṃ, tato paccayā na gahetabbā, āsavakkhayappattenāpi na gahetabbā, akappiyāva
atk-vin01a0:2493_7: honti. “Kasmā na gaṇhathā”ti pucchitena “pubbe evaṃ katattā”ti vutte, sace vadanti
atk-vin01a0:2493_8: “na mayaṃ tena kāraṇena dema idāni sīlavantatāya demā”ti gahetabbā. Pakatiyā dānaṭṭhāneyeva
atk-vin01a0:2493_9: kuladūsakakammaṃ kataṃ hoti. Tato pakatidānameva gahetuṃ vaṭṭati, yaṃ vaḍḍhetvā denti, taṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2494_0: Na sammā vattantīti te pana assajipunabbasukā aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā na vattanti.
atk-vin01a0:2494_1: Na lomaṃ pātentīti anulomapaṭipadaṃ appaṭipajjanatāya na pannalomā honti. Na netthāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2494_2: vattantīti attano nittharaṇamaggaṃ na paṭipajjanti. Na bhikkhū khamāpentīti “dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2494_3: bhante, amhehi, na puna evaṃ karissāma, khamatha amhāka”nti evaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khamāpanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2494_4: na karonti. Akkosantīti kārakasaṅghaṃ dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanti. Paribhāsantīti
atk-vin01a0:2494_5: bhayaṃ nesaṃ dassenti. Chandagāmitā…pe… bhayagāmitā pāpentīti ete chandagāmino ca…pe…
atk-vin01a0:2494_6: bhayagāmino cāti evaṃ chandagāmitāyapi…pe… bhayagāmitāyapi pāpenti, yojentīti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2494_7: Pakkamantīti tesaṃ parivāresu pañcasu samaṇasatesu ekacce disā pakkamanti. Vibbhamantīti
atk-vin01a0:2494_8: ekacce gihī honti. Kathañhi nāma assajipunabbasukā bhikkhūti ettha dvinnaṃ pamokkhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2495_0: 436-7. Gāmaṃ vāti ettha nagarampi gāmaggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ. Tenassa padabhājane “gāmopi
atk-vin01a0:2495_1: nigamopi nagarampi gāmo ceva nigamo cā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha apākāraparikkhepo saāpaṇo nigamoti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2496_0: Kulāni dūsetīti kuladūsako. Dūsento ca na asucikaddamādīhi dūseti, atha kho attano
atk-vin01a0:2496_1: duppaṭipattiyā tesaṃ pasādaṃ vināseti. Tenevassa padabhājane “pupphena vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2496_2: Tattha yo haritvā vā harāpetvā vā pakkositvā vā pakkosāpetvā vā sayaṃ vā upagatānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2496_3: yaṃkiñci attano santakaṃ pupphaṃ kulasaṅgahatthāya deti, dukkaṭaṃ. Parasantakaṃ deti,
atk-vin01a0:2496_4: dukkaṭameva. Theyyacittena deti, bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Eseva nayo saṅghikepi. Ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2496_5: pana viseso, senāsanatthāya niyāmitaṃ issaravatāya dadato thullaccayaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2497_0: Pupphaṃ nāma kassa dātuṃ vaṭṭati, kassa na vaṭṭatīti? Mātāpitūnnaṃ tāva haritvāpi
atk-vin01a0:2497_1: harāpetvāpi pakkositvāpi pakkosāpetvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭati, sesañātakānaṃ pakkosāpetvāva.
atk-vin01a0:2497_2: Tañca kho vatthupūjanatthāya, maṇḍanatthāya pana sivaliṅgādipūjanatthāya vā kassacipi
atk-vin01a0:2497_3: dātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Mātāpitūnañca harāpentena ñātisāmaṇereheva harāpetabbaṃ. Itare
atk-vin01a0:2497_4: pana yadi sayameva icchanti, vaṭṭati. Sammatena pupphabhājakena bhājanakāle sampattānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2497_5: sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Kurundiyaṃ sampattagihīnaṃ upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2497_6: Mahāpaccariyaṃ “cūḷakaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Asammatena apaloketvā dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2498_0: Ācariyupajjhāyesu sagāravā sāmaṇerā bahūni pupphāni āharitvā rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapenti,
atk-vin01a0:2498_1: therā pātova sampattānaṃ saddhivihārikādīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ vā “tvaṃ idaṃ gaṇha, tvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2498_2: idaṃ gaṇhā”ti denti, pupphadānaṃ nāma na hoti. “Cetiyaṃ pūjessāmā”ti gahetvā gacchantāpi
atk-vin01a0:2498_3: pūjaṃ karontāpi tattha tattha sampattānaṃ cetiyapūjanatthāya denti, etampi pupphadānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2498_4: nāma na hoti. Upāsake akkapupphādīhi pūjente disvā “vihāre kaṇikārapupphādīni atthi,
atk-vin01a0:2498_5: upāsakā tāni gahetvā pūjethā”ti vattumpi vaṭṭati. Bhikkhū pupphapūjaṃ katvā divātaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2498_6: gāmaṃ paviṭṭhe “kiṃ, bhante, atidivā paviṭṭhatthā”ti pucchanti, “vihāre bahūni pupphāni
atk-vin01a0:2498_7: pūjaṃ akarimhā”ti vadanti. Manussā “bahūni kira vihāre pupphānī”ti punadivase pahūtaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2498_8: khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā pupphapūjañca karonti, dānañca denti,
atk-vin01a0:2498_9: vaṭṭati. Manussā “mayaṃ, bhante, asukadivasaṃ nāma pūjessāmā”ti pupphavāraṃ yācitvā
atk-vin01a0:2498_10: anuññātadivase āgacchanti, sāmaṇerehi ca pageva pupphāni ocinitvā ṭhapitāni honti,
atk-vin01a0:2498_11: te rukkhesu pupphāni apassantā “kuhiṃ, bhante, pupphānī”ti vadanti, sāmaṇerehi ocinitvā
atk-vin01a0:2498_12: ṭhapitāni tumhe pana pūjetvā gacchatha, saṅgho aññaṃ divasaṃ pūjessatīti. Te pūjetvā
atk-vin01a0:2498_13: dānaṃ datvā gacchanti, vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana kurundiyañca “therā sāmaṇerehi
atk-vin01a0:2498_14: dāpetuṃ na labhanti. Sace sayameva tāni pupphāni tesaṃ denti, vaṭṭati. Therehi pana
atk-vin01a0:2498_15: ‘sāmaṇerehi ocinitvā ṭhapitānī’ti ettakameva vattabba”nti vuttaṃ. Sace pana pupphavāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2498_16: yācitvā anocitesu pupphesu yāgubhattādīni ādāya āgantvā sāmaṇere “ocinitvā dethā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2498_17: vadanti. Ñātakasāmaṇerānaṃyeva ocinitvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Aññātake ukkhipitvā rukkhasākhāya
atk-vin01a0:2498_18: ṭhapenti, na orohitvā palāyitabbaṃ, ocinitvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana koci dhammakathiko
atk-vin01a0:2498_19: “bahūni upāsakā vihāre pupphāni yāgubhattādīni ādāya gantvā pupphapūjaṃ karothā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2498_20: vadati, tasseva na kappatīti mahāpaccariyañca kurundiyañca vuttaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2498_21: pana “etaṃ akappiyaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti avisesena vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2499_0: Phalampi attano santakaṃ vuttanayeneva mātāpitūnaṃñca sesañātakānañca dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2499_1: Kulasaṅgahatthāya pana dentassa vuttanayeneva attano santake parasantake saṅghike
atk-vin01a0:2499_2: senāsanatthāya niyāmite ca dukkaṭādīni veditabbāni. Attano santakaṃyeva gilānamanussānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2499_3: vā sampattaissarānaṃ vā khīṇaparibbayānaṃ vā dātuṃ vaṭṭati, phaladānaṃ na hoti. Phalabhājakenāpi
atk-vin01a0:2499_4: sammatena saṅghassa phalabhājanakāle sampattamanussānaṃ upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2499_5: Asammatena apaloketvā dātabbaṃ. Saṅghārāmepi phalaparicchedena vā rukkhaparicchedena
atk-vin01a0:2499_6: vā katikā kātabbā. Tato gilānamanussānaṃ vā aññesaṃ vā phalaṃ yācantānaṃ yathāparicchedena
atk-vin01a0:2499_7: cattāri pañca phalāni dātabbāni. Rukkhā vā dassetabbā “ito gahetuṃ labbhatī”ti. “Igha
atk-vin01a0:2499_8: phalāni sundarāni, ito gaṇhathā”ti evaṃ pana na vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2500_0: Cuṇṇenāti ettha attano santakaṃ sirīsacuṇṇaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kasāvaṃ yaṃkiñci kulasaṅgahatthāya
atk-vin01a0:2500_1: deti, dukkaṭaṃ. Parasantakādīsupi vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso
atk-vin01a0:2500_2: – idha saṅghassa rakkhitagopitāpi rukkhacchalli garubhaṇḍameva. Mattikadantakaṭṭhaveḷūsupi
atk-vin01a0:2500_3: garubhaṇḍūpagaṃ ñatvā cuṇṇe vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo. Paṇṇadānaṃ pana ettha
atk-vin01a0:2500_4: na āgataṃ, tampi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Paratopi garubhaṇḍavinicchaye sabbaṃ vitthārena vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-vin01a0:2501: Vejjikāya vāti ettha vejjakammavidhi tatiyapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2502_0: Jaṅghapesanikenāti ettha jaṅghapesaniyanti gihīnaṃ dūteyyasāsanaharaṇakammaṃ vuccati,
atk-vin01a0:2502_1: taṃ na kātabbaṃ. Gihīnañhi sāsanaṃ gahetvā gacchantassa pade pade dukkaṭaṃ. Taṃ kammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2502_2: nissāya laddhabhojanaṃ bhuñjantassāpi ajjhohāre ajjhohāre dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ sāsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2502_3: aggahetvāpi pacchā “ayaṃ dāni so gāmo handa taṃ sāsanaṃ ārocemī”ti maggā okkamantassāpi
atk-vin01a0:2502_4: pade pade dukkaṭaṃ. Sāsanaṃ ārocetvā laddhabhojanaṃ bhuñjato purimanayeneva dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2502_5: Sāsanaṃ aggahetvā āgatena pana “bhante tasmiṃ gāme itthannāmassa kā pavattī”ti pucchiyamānena
atk-vin01a0:2502_6: kathetuṃ vaṭṭati, pucchitapañhe doso natthi. Pañcannaṃ pana sahadhammikānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2502_7: paṇḍupalāsassa attano veyyāvaccakarassa ca sāsanaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati, gihīnañca pubbe
atk-vin01a0:2502_8: vuttappakāraṃ kappiyasāsanaṃ. Idañhi jaṅghapesaniyakammaṃ nāma na hoti. Imehi pana
atk-vin01a0:2502_9: aṭṭhahi kuladūsakakammehi uppannapaccayā pañcannampi sahadhammikānaṃ na kappanti,
atk-vin01a0:2503_0: Pāpā samācārā assāti pāpasamācāro. Te pana yasmā mālāvaccharopanādayo idha adhippetā,
atk-vin01a0:2503_1: tasmā “mālāvacchaṃ ropentipī”tiādinā nayenassa padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tirokkhāti parammukhā.
atk-vin01a0:2503_2: Kulāni ca tena duṭṭhānīti ettha pana yasmā “kulānī”ti vohāramattametaṃ, atthato hi
atk-vin01a0:2503_3: manussā tena duṭṭhā honti, tasmāssa padabhājane “pubbe saddhā hutvā”tiādimāha. Chandagāminoti
atk-vin01a0:2503_4: chandena gacchantīti chandagāmino. Esa nayo sesesu. Samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāyāti
atk-vin01a0:2503_5: ettha kuladūsakakammena dukkaṭameva. Yaṃ pana so saṅghaṃ paribhavitvā “chandagāmino”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:2503_6: Tassa paṭinissaggāya samanubhāsanakammaṃ kātabbanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2507_0: 442. Uddiṭṭhā kho…pe… evametaṃ dhārayāmīti ettha paṭhamaṃ āpatti etesanti paṭhamāpattikā,
atk-vin01a0:2507_1: paṭhamaṃ vītikkamakkhaṇeyeva āpajjitabbāti attho. Itare pana yathā tatiye catutthe
atk-vin01a0:2507_2: ca divase hotīti jaro “tatiyako catutthako”ti ca vuccati; evaṃ yāvatatiye samanubhāsanakamme
atk-vin01a0:2508_0: Yāvatīhaṃ jānaṃ paṭicchādetīti yattakāni ahāni jānanto paṭicchādeti, “ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2508_1: āpattiṃ āpanno”ti sabrahmacārīnaṃ nāroceti. Tāvatīhanti tattakāni ahāni. Akāmā parivatthabbanti
atk-vin01a0:2508_2: na kāmena, na vasena, atha kho akāmena avasena parivāsaṃ samādāya vatthabbaṃ. Uttari
atk-vin01a0:2508_3: chārattanti parivāsato uttari cha rattiyo. Bhikkhumānattāyāti bhikkhūnaṃ mānanabhāvāya,
atk-vin01a0:2508_4: ārādhanatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vīsatisaṅgho gaṇo assāti vīsatigaṇo. Tatrāti yatra
atk-vin01a0:2508_5: sabbantimena paricchedena vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho atthi tatra. Abbhetabboti abhietabbo
atk-vin01a0:2508_6: sampaṭicchitabbo, abbhānakammavasena osāretabboti vuttaṃ hoti, avhātabboti vā attho.
atk-vin01a0:2508_7: Anabbhitoti na abbhito, asampaṭicchito, akatabbhānakammoti vuttaṃ hoti, anavhātoti
atk-vin01a0:2508_8: vā attho. Sāmīcīti anudhammatā, lokuttaradhammaṃ anugatā ovādānusāsanī, sāmīci dhammatāti
atk-vin01a0:2513_0: 443. Tena samayena buddho bhagavāti paṭhamaaniyatasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha kālayuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2513_1: samullapantoti kālaṃ sallakkhetvā yadā na añño koci samīpena gacchati vā āgacchati
atk-vin01a0:2513_2: vā tadā tadanurūpaṃ “kacci na ukkaṇṭhasi, na kilamasi, na chātāsī”tiādikaṃ gehassitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2513_3: kathaṃ kathento. Kālayuttaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇantoti kālaṃ sallakkhetvā yadā añño koci
atk-vin01a0:2513_4: samīpena gacchati vā āgacchati vā tadā tadanurūpaṃ “uposathaṃ kareyyāsi, salākabhattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2514_0: Bahū dhītaro ca puttā ca assāti bahuputtā. Tassā kira dasa puttā dasa dhītaro ahesuṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2514_1: bahū nattāro assāti bahunattā. Yatheva hi tassā evamassā puttadhītānampi vīsati vīsati
atk-vin01a0:2514_2: dārakā ahesuṃ, iti sā vīsuttaracatusataputtanattaparivārā ahosi. Abhimaṅgalasammatāti
atk-vin01a0:2514_3: uttamamaṅgalasammatā. Yaññesūti dānappadānesu. Chaṇesūti āvāhavivāhamaṅgalādīsu antarussavesu.
atk-vin01a0:2514_4: Ussavesūti āsāḷhīpavāraṇanakkhattādīsu mahussavesu. Paṭhamaṃ bhojentīti “imepi dārakā
atk-vin01a0:2514_5: tayā samānāyukā nirogā hontū”ti āyācantā paṭhamaṃyeva bhojenti, yepi saddhā honti
atk-vin01a0:2514_6: pasannā, tepi bhikkhū bhojetvā tadanantaraṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ taṃyeva bhojenti. Nādiyīti
atk-vin01a0:2514_7: tassā vacanaṃ na ādiyi, na gaṇhi, na vā ādaramakāsīti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2515_0: 444-5. Alaṃkammaniyeti kammakkhamaṃ kammayogganti kammaniyaṃ, alaṃ pariyattaṃ kammaniyabhāvāyāti
atk-vin01a0:2515_1: alaṃkammaniyaṃ, tasmiṃ alaṃkammaniye, yattha ajjhācāraṃ karontā sakkonti, taṃ kammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2515_2: kātuṃ tādiseti attho. Tenevassa padabhājane vuttaṃ – “sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2515_3: paṭisevitu”nti, yattha methunaṃ dhammaṃ sakkā hoti paṭisevitunti vuttaṃ hoti. Nisajjaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2515_4: kappeyyāti nisajjaṃ kareyya, nisīdeyyāti attho. Yasmā pana nisīditvāva nipajjati,
atk-vin01a0:2515_5: tenassa padabhājane ubhayampi vuttaṃ. Tattha upanisinnoti upagantvā nisinno. Evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2515_6: upanipannopi veditabbo. Bhikkhu nisinneti bhikkhumhi nisinneti attho. Ubho vā nisinnāti
atk-vin01a0:2515_7: dvepi apacchā apurimaṃ nisinnā. Ettha ca kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ “sotassa raho”ti āgataṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2515_8: cakkhussa raheneva pana paricchedo veditabbo. Sacepi hi pihitakavāṭassa gabbhassa
atk-vin01a0:2515_9: dvāre nisinno viññū puriso hoti, neva anāpattiṃ karoti. Apihitakavāṭassa pana dvāre
atk-vin01a0:2515_10: nisinno anāpattiṃ karoti. Na kevalañca dvāre antodvādasahatthepi okāse nisinno, sace
atk-vin01a0:2515_11: sacakkhuko vikkhittopi niddāyantopi anāpattiṃ karoti. Samīpe ṭhitopi andho na karoti,
atk-vin01a0:2515_12: cakkhumāpi nipajjitvā niddāyanto na karoti. Itthīnaṃ pana satampi anāpattiṃ na karotiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2516_0: Saddheyyavacasāti saddhātabbavacanā. Sā pana yasmā ariyasāvikāva hoti, tenassa padabhājane
atk-vin01a0:2516_1: “āgataphalā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āgataṃ phalaṃ assāti āgataphalā paṭiladdhasotāpattiphalāti
atk-vin01a0:2516_2: attho. Abhisametāvinīti paṭividdhacatusaccā. Viññātaṃ sikkhattayasāsanaṃ etāyāti
atk-vin01a0:2516_3: viññātasāsanā. Nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamānoti kiñcāpi evarūpā upāsikā disvā vadati,
atk-vin01a0:2516_4: atha kho bhikkhu nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānoyeva tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabbo,
atk-vin01a0:2517_0: Yena vā sā saddheyyavacasā upāsikā vadeyya tena so bhikkhu kāretabboti nisajjādīsu
atk-vin01a0:2517_1: ākāresu yena vā ākārena saddhiṃ methunadhammādīni āropetvā sā upāsikā vadeyya, paṭijānamānova
atk-vin01a0:2517_2: tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo. Evarūpāyapi upāsikāya vacanamattena na kāretabboti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2517_3: Kasmā? Yasmā diṭṭhaṃ nāma tathāpi hoti, aññathāpi hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2518_0: Tadatthajotanatthañca idaṃ vatthuṃ udāharanti – mallārāmavihāre kira eko khīṇāsavatthero
atk-vin01a0:2518_1: ekadivasaṃ upaṭṭhākakulaṃ gantvā antogehe nisīdi, upāsikāpi sayanapallaṅkaṃ nissāya
atk-vin01a0:2518_2: ṭhitā hoti. Atheko piṇḍacāriko dvāre ṭhito disvā “thero upāsikāya saddhiṃ ekāsane
atk-vin01a0:2518_3: nisinno”ti saññaṃ paṭilabhitvā punappunaṃ olokesi. Theropi “ayaṃ mayi asuddhaladdhiko
atk-vin01a0:2518_4: jāto”ti sallakkhetvā katabhattakicco vihāraṃ gantvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā
atk-vin01a0:2518_5: antova nisīdi. Sopi bhikkhu “theraṃ codessāmī”ti āgantvā ukkāsitvā dvāraṃ vivari.
atk-vin01a0:2518_6: Thero tassa cittaṃ ñatvā ākāse uppatitvā kūṭāgārakaṇṇikaṃ nissāya pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-vin01a0:2518_7: Sopi bhikkhu anto pavisitvā mañcañca heṭṭhāmañcañca oloketvā theraṃ apassanto uddhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2518_8: ullokesi, atha ākāse nisinnaṃ theraṃ disvā “bhante, evaṃ mahiddhikā nāma tumhe mātugāmena
atk-vin01a0:2518_9: saddhiṃ ekāsane nisinnabhāvaṃ vadāpetha evā”ti āha. Thero “antaragharasseveso āvuso
atk-vin01a0:2518_10: doso, ahaṃ pana taṃ saddhāpetuṃ asakkonto evamakāsiṃ, rakkheyyāsi ma”nti vatvā otarīti.
atk-vin01a0:2519_0: 446. Ito paraṃ sā ce evaṃ vadeyyātiādi sabbaṃ paṭiññāya kāraṇākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2519_1: tattha mātugāmassa methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantoti mātugāmassa magge methunaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2519_2: paṭisevantoti attho. Nisajjāya kāretabboti nisajjaṃ paṭijānitvā methunadhammapaṭisevanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2519_3: appaṭijānanto methunadhammapārājikāpattiyā akāretvā nisajjāmattena yaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati
atk-vin01a0:2519_4: tāya kāretabbo, pācittiyāpattiyā kāretabboti attho. Etena nayena sabbacatukkesu vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2520_1: paṭijānātītiādīsu gamanaṃ paṭijānātīti “rahonisajjassādatthaṃ gatomhī”ti evaṃ gamanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2520_2: paṭijānāti, nisajjanti nisajjassādeneva nisajjaṃ paṭijānāti. Āpattinti tīsu aññataraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2520_3: āpattiṃ. Āpattiyā kāretabboti tīsu yaṃ paṭijānāti, tāya kāretabbo. Sesamettha catukke
atk-vin01a0:2520_4: uttānādhippāyameva. Dutiyacatukke pana gamanaṃ na paṭijānātīti raho nisajjassādavasena
atk-vin01a0:2520_5: na paṭijānāti, “salākabhattādinā attano kammena gatomhi, sā pana mayhaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2521_0: Ayaṃ pana sabbattha vinicchayo – raho nisajjassādoti methunadhammasannissitakileso
atk-vin01a0:2521_1: vuccati. Yo bhikkhu tenassādena mātugāmassa santikaṃ gantukāmo akkhiṃ añjeti, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2521_2: Nivāsanaṃ nivāseti, kāyabandhanaṃ bandhati, cīvaraṃ pārupati, sabbattha payoge payoge
atk-vin01a0:2521_3: dukkaṭaṃ. Gacchati, padavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ. Gantvā nisīdati, dukkaṭameva. Mātugāme
atk-vin01a0:2521_4: āgantvā nisinnamatte pācittiyaṃ. Sace sā itthī kenaci karaṇīyena uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya punappunaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2521_5: nisīdati, nisajjāya nisajjāya pācittiyaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya gato, sā na diṭṭhā, aññā āgantvā
atk-vin01a0:2521_6: nisīdati, assāde uppanne pācittiyaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “gamanakālato paṭṭhāya asuddhacittattā
atk-vin01a0:2521_7: āpattiyevā”ti vuttaṃ. Sace sambahulā āgacchanti, mātugāmagaṇanāya pācittiyāni. Sace
atk-vin01a0:2521_8: uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya punappunaṃ nisīdanti, nisajjāgaṇanāya pācittiyāni. Aniyametvā diṭṭhadiṭṭhāya
atk-vin01a0:2521_9: saddhiṃ rahassādaṃ kappessāmīti gantvā nisinnassāpi āgatāgatānaṃ vasena punappunaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2521_10: nisajjāvasena ca vuttanayeneva āpattiyo veditabbā. Sace suddhacittena gantvā nisinnassa
atk-vin01a0:2521_11: santikaṃ āgantvā nisinnāya itthiyā rahassādo uppajjati anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2525_0: 452. Tena samayena buddho bhagavāti dutiyaaniyatasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha bhagavatā paṭikkhittantiādimhi
atk-vin01a0:2525_1: “yaṃ eko ekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye nisajjaṃ kappeyya, taṃ nisajjaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2525_2: kappetuṃ paṭikkhitta”nti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo. Itarathā hi “ekassa ekāyā”ti vattabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2525_3: siyā, kasmā? “Paṭikkhitta”nti vuttattā. Sāmiatthe vā etaṃ paccattavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2526_0: 453. Na heva kho pana paṭicchannanti ettha pana yampi bahi parikkhittaṃ anto vivaṭaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2526_1: pariveṇaṅgaṇādi, tampi antogadhanti veditabbaṃ. Evarūpañhi ṭhānaṃ appaṭicchanneyeva
atk-vin01a0:2526_2: gahitanti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpadanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Kevalañhi
atk-vin01a0:2526_3: idha itthīpi purisopi yo koci viññū anandho abadhiro antodvādasahatthe okāse ṭhito
atk-vin01a0:2526_4: vā nisinno vā vikkhittopi niddāyantopi anāpattiṃ karoti. Badhiro pana cakkhumāpi
atk-vin01a0:2526_5: andho vā abadhiropi na karoti. Pārājikāpattiñca parihāpetvā duṭṭhullavācāpatti vuttāti
atk-vin01a0:2526_6: ayaṃ viseso. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Ubhayatthāpi ummattakaādikammikānaṃ anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2527_0: Samuṭṭhānādīsu idaṃsikkhāpadaṃ tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato, vācācittato, kāyavācācittato
atk-vin01a0:2527_1: ca samuṭṭhāti. Kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2534: Tiṃsa nissaggiyā dhammā, ye vuttā samitāvinā;
atk-vin01a0:2536_0: 459. Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati gotamake cetiye. Tena kho pana
atk-vin01a0:2536_1: samayena bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ ticīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ hotīti ettha ticīvaranti antaravāsako
atk-vin01a0:2536_2: uttarāsaṅgo saṅghāṭīti idaṃ cīvarattayaṃ paribhuñjituṃ anuññātaṃ hoti. Yattha panetaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2536_3: anuññātaṃ, yadā ca anuññātaṃ, yena ca kāraṇena anuññātaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ cīvarakkhandhake
atk-vin01a0:2536_4: jīvakavatthusmiṃ āgatameva. Aññeneva ticīvarena gāmaṃ pavisantīti yena vihāre acchanti
atk-vin01a0:2536_5: nhānañca otaranti, tato aññena, evaṃ divase divase nava cīvarāni dhārenti.
atk-vin01a0:2537: 460. Uppannaṃ hotīti anupaññattiyā dvāraṃ dadamānaṃ paṭilābhavasena uppannaṃ hoti, no nipphattivasena.
atk-vin01a0:2538_0: Āyasmato sāriputtassa dātukāmo hotīti āyasmā kira ānando bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā añño
atk-vin01a0:2538_1: evarūpo guṇavisiṭṭho puggalo natthīti guṇabahumānena āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ atimamāyati.
atk-vin01a0:2538_2: So sadāpi manāpaṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā rajitvā kappabinduṃ datvā therasseva deti, purebhatte
atk-vin01a0:2538_3: paṇītaṃ yāgukhajjakaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ vā labhitvāpi therasseva deti, pacchābhatte madhuphāṇitādīni
atk-vin01a0:2538_4: labhitvāpi therasseva deti, upaṭṭhākakulehi dārake nikkhāmetvā pabbājetvāpi therassa
atk-vin01a0:2538_5: santike upajjhaṃ gāhāpetvā sayaṃ anusāvanakammaṃ karoti. Āyasmāpi sāriputto “pitu
atk-vin01a0:2538_6: kattabbakiccaṃ nāma jeṭṭhaputtassa bhāro, taṃ mayā bhagavato kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ ānando
atk-vin01a0:2538_7: karoti, ahaṃ ānandaṃ nissāya appossukko viharituṃ labhāmī”ti āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ativiya
atk-vin01a0:2538_8: mamāyati, sopi manāpaṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā ānandattherasseva detīti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-vin01a0:2538_9: Evaṃ guṇabahumānena mamāyanto tadā uppannampi taṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa dātukāmo hotīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2539_0: Navamaṃ vā bhagavā divasaṃ dasamaṃ vāti ettha pana sace bhaveyya “kathaṃ thero jānātī”ti?
atk-vin01a0:2539_1: Bahūhi kāraṇehi jānāti. Sāriputtatthero kira janapadacārikaṃ pakkamanto ānandattheraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2539_2: āpucchitvāva pakkamati “ahaṃ ettakena nāma kālena āgacchissāmi, etthantare bhagavantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2539_3: mā pamajjī”ti. Sace sammukhā na āpucchati, bhikkhū pesetvāpi āpucchitvāva gacchati.
atk-vin01a0:2539_4: Sace aññattha vassaṃ vasati, ye paṭhamataraṃ bhikkhū āgacchanti, te evaṃ pahiṇati
atk-vin01a0:2539_5: “mama vacanena bhagavato ca pāde sirasā vandatha, ānandassa ca ārogyaṃ vatvā maṃ
atk-vin01a0:2539_6: ‘asukadivase nāma āgamissatī’ti vadathā”ti sadā ca yathāparicchinnadivaseyeva eti.
atk-vin01a0:2539_7: Apicāyasmā ānando anumānenapi jānāti “ettake divase bhagavatā viyogaṃ sahanto adhivāsento
atk-vin01a0:2539_8: āyasmā sāriputto vasi, ito dāni paṭṭhāya asukaṃ nāma divasaṃ na atikkamissati addhā
atk-vin01a0:2539_9: āgamissatī”ti. Yesaṃ yesañhi paññā mahatī tesaṃ tesaṃ bhagavati pemañca gāravo ca
atk-vin01a0:2539_10: mahā hotīti iminā nayenāpi jānāti. Evaṃ bahūhi kāraṇehi jānāti. Tenāha – “navamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2539_11: vā bhagavā divasaṃ dasamaṃ vā”ti. Evaṃ vutte yasmā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2539_12: na lokavajjaṃ; tasmā āyasmatā ānandena vuttasadisameva paricchedaṃ karonto “atha
atk-vin01a0:2539_13: kho bhagavā…pe… dhāretu”nti. Sace pana therena addhamāso vā māso vā uddiṭṭho abhavissa,
atk-vin01a0:2540_0: 462-3. Niṭṭhitacīvarasminti yena kenaci niṭṭhānena niṭṭhite cīvarasmiṃ. Yasmā pana
atk-vin01a0:2540_1: taṃ cīvaraṃ karaṇenapi niṭṭhitaṃ hoti, nassanādīhipi tasmāssa padabhājane atthamattameva
atk-vin01a0:2540_2: dassetuṃ bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ kataṃ vā hotītiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha katanti sūcikammapariyosānena
atk-vin01a0:2540_3: kataṃ, sūcikammapariyosānaṃ nāma yaṃkiñci sūciyā kattabbaṃ pāsapaṭṭagaṇṭhikapaṭṭapariyosānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2540_4: katvā sūciyā paṭisāmanaṃ. Naṭṭhanti corādīhi haṭaṃ, etampi hi karaṇapalibodhassa
atk-vin01a0:2540_5: niṭṭhitattā niṭṭhitanti vuccati. Vinaṭṭhanti upacikādīhi khāyitaṃ. Daḍḍhanti agginā
atk-vin01a0:2540_6: daḍḍhaṃ. Cīvarāsā vā upacchinnāti “asukasmiṃ nāma kule cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti yā cīvarāsā
atk-vin01a0:2540_7: uppannā hoti, sā vā upacchinnā, etesampi hi karaṇapalibodhasseva niṭṭhitattā niṭṭhitabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2541_0: Ubbhatasmiṃ kathineti kathine ca ubbhatasmiṃ. Etena dutiyassa palibodhassa abhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2541_1: dasseti. Taṃ pana kathinaṃ yasmā aṭṭhasu vā mātikāsu ekāya antarubbhārena vā uddharīyati,
atk-vin01a0:2541_2: tenassa niddese “aṭṭhannaṃ mātikāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā
atk-vin01a0:2541_3: kathinassa ubbhārāya – pakkamanantikā, niṭṭhānantikā, sanniṭṭhānantikā, nāsanantikā,
atk-vin01a0:2541_4: savanantikā, āsāvacchedikā, sīmātikkantikā, sahubbhārā”ti evaṃ aṭṭha mātikāyo kathinakkhandhake
atk-vin01a0:2541_5: āgatā. Antarubbhāropi “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho; yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho
atk-vin01a0:2541_6: kathinaṃ uddhareyya, esā ñatti. Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho; saṅgho kathinaṃ uddharati,
atk-vin01a0:2541_7: yassāyasmato khamati, kathinassa ubbhāro, so tuṇhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
atk-vin01a0:2541_8: Ubbhataṃ saṅghena kathinaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2541_9: evaṃ bhikkhunīvibhaṅge āgato. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ āgataṭṭhāneyeva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-vin01a0:2541_10: Idha pana vuccamāne pāḷi āharitabbā hoti, atthopi vattabbo. Vuttopi ca na suviññeyyo
atk-vin01a0:2542_0: Dasāhaparamanti dasa ahāni paramo paricchedo assāti dasāhaparamo, taṃ dasāhaparamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2542_1: kālaṃ dhāretabbanti attho. Padabhājane pana atthamattameva dassetuṃ “dasāhaparamatā
atk-vin01a0:2542_2: dhāretabba”nti vuttaṃ. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti “dasāhaparama”nti ettha yā dasāhaparamatā
atk-vin01a0:2542_3: dasāhaparamabhāvo, ayaṃ ettako kālo yāva nātikkamati tāva dhāretabbanti.
atk-vin01a0:2543: Adhiṭṭhitavikappitesu apariyāpannattā atirekaṃ cīvaranti atirekacīvaraṃ. Tenevassa padabhājane vuttaṃ “anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappita”nti.
atk-vin01a0:2544_0: Channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataranti khomaṃ, kappāsikaṃ, koseyyaṃ, kambalaṃ, sāṇaṃ, bhaṅganti
atk-vin01a0:2544_1: imesaṃ channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ. Etena cīvarassa jātiṃ dassetvā idāni pamāṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2544_2: dassetuṃ “vikappanupagaṃ pacchima”nti āha. Tassa pamāṇaṃ dīghato dve vidatthiyo,
atk-vin01a0:2544_3: tiriyaṃ vidatthi. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āyāmena aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ sugataṅgulena
atk-vin01a0:2545_0: Taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti taṃ yathāvuttajātippamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ dasāhaparamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2545_1: kālaṃ atikkāmayato, etthantare yathā atirekacīvaraṃ na hoti tathā akubbato nissaggiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2545_2: pācittiyaṃ, tañca cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti, pācittiyāpatti cassa hotīti attho. Atha
atk-vin01a0:2545_3: vā nissajjanaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, pubbabhāge kattabbassa vinayakammassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Nissaggiyamassa
atk-vin01a0:2545_4: atthīti nissaggiyamicceva. Kintaṃ? Pācittiyaṃ. Taṃ atikkāmayato sanissaggiyavinayakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2545_5: pācittiyaṃ hotīti ayamettha attho. Padabhājane pana paṭhamaṃ tāva atthavikappaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2545_6: “taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā “ekādase aruṇuggamane nissaggiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2545_7: hoti, nissajjitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Puna yassa ca nissajjitabbaṃ, yathā ca nissajjitabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2545_8: taṃ dassetuṃ “saṅghassa vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ekādase aruṇuggamaneti ettha yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2545_9: divasaṃ cīvaraṃ uppannaṃ tassa yo aruṇo, so uppannadivasanissito, tasmā cīvaruppādadivasaena
atk-vin01a0:2545_10: saddhiṃ ekādase aruṇuggamane nissaggiyaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Sacepi bahūni ekajjhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2545_11: bandhitvā vā veṭhetvā vā ṭhapitāni ekāva āpatti. Abaddhāveṭhitesu vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo.
atk-vin01a0:2546_0: Nissajjitvā āpatti desetabbāti kathaṃ desetabbā? Yathā khandhake vuttaṃ, kathañca
atk-vin01a0:2546_1: tattha vuttaṃ? Evaṃ vuttaṃ – “tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2546_2: uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ
atk-vin01a0:2546_3: paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo – ‘ahaṃ, bhante, itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno, taṃ paṭidesemī”’ti.
atk-vin01a0:2546_4: Idha pana sace ekaṃ cīvaraṃ hoti “ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti vattabbaṃ. Sace
atk-vin01a0:2546_5: dve, “dve”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace bahūni “sambahulānī”ti vattabbaṃ. Nissajjanepi sace
atk-vin01a0:2546_6: ekaṃ yathāpāḷimeva “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvara”nti vattabbaṃ. Sace dve vā bahūni vā,
atk-vin01a0:2546_7: “imāni me, bhante, cīvarāni dasāhātikkantāni nissaggiyāni, imānāhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2546_8: vattabbaṃ. Pāḷiṃ vattuṃ asakkontena aññathāpi vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2547: Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena āpatti paṭiggahetabbāti khandhake vuttanayeneva paṭiggahetabbā. Evañhi tattha vuttaṃ – “byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
atk-vin01a0:2548: ‘Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati vivarati uttāniṃ karoti deseti, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno āpattiṃ paṭiggaṇheyya’nti.
atk-vin01a0:2549: Tena vattabbo ‘passasī’ti? ‘Āma, passāmī’ti. Āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti. Dvīsu pana sambahulāsu vā purimanayeneva vacanabhedo ñātabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2550: Cīvaradānepi “saṅgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ imāni cīvarānī”ti vatthuvasena vacanabhedo veditabbo. Gaṇassa ca puggalassa ca nissajjanepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:2551_0: Āpattidesanāpaṭiggahaṇesu panettha ayaṃ pāḷi – “tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sambahule
atk-vin01a0:2551_1: bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā
atk-vin01a0:2551_2: ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassu vacanīyā – ‘ahaṃ, bhante, itthannāmaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2551_3: āpattiṃ āpanno taṃ paṭidesemī’ti. Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena te bhikkhū ñāpetabbā –
atk-vin01a0:2552: ‘Suṇantu me āyasmantā, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati vivarati uttāniṃ karoti deseti. Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno āpattiṃ paṭiggaṇheyya’nti.
atk-vin01a0:2554_0: Tena bhikkhunā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2554_1: nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo – ‘ahaṃ, āvuso, itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2554_2: āpanno taṃ paṭidesemī’ti. Tena vattabbo ‘passasī’ti, āma passāmīti āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2554_3: Tattha purimanayeneva āpattiyā nāmaggahaṇaṃ vacanabhedo ca veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2555_0: Yathā ca gaṇassa nissajjane evaṃ dvinnaṃ nissajjanepi pāḷi veditabbā. Yadi hi viseso
atk-vin01a0:2555_1: bhaveyya, yatheva “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇannaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kātuṃ, evañca
atk-vin01a0:2555_2: pana, bhikkhave, kātabbo. Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena te bhikkhū ñāpetabbā”tiādinā
atk-vin01a0:2555_3: nayena “tiṇṇannaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kātu”nti vatvā puna “anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
atk-vin01a0:2555_4: dvinnaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kātuṃ, evañca pana, bhikkhave, kātabbo. Therena bhikkhunā
atk-vin01a0:2555_5: ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅga”ntiādinā nayena visuṃyeva dvinnaṃ pārisuddhiuposatho vutto, evamidhāpi
atk-vin01a0:2555_6: visuṃ pāḷiṃ vadeyya, yasmā pana natthi, tasmā avatvā gatoti, gaṇassa vuttā pāḷiyevettha pāḷi.
atk-vin01a0:2556_0: Āpattipaṭiggahaṇe pana ayaṃ viseso, yathā gaṇassa nissajjitvā āpattiyā desiyamānāya
atk-vin01a0:2556_1: āpattipaṭiggāhako bhikkhu ñattiṃ ṭhapeti, evaṃ aṭṭhapetvā dvīsu aññatarena yathā
atk-vin01a0:2556_2: ekapuggalo paṭiggaṇhāti, evaṃ āpatti paṭiggahetabbā. Dvinnañhi ñattiṭṭhapanā nāma
atk-vin01a0:2556_3: natthi, yadi siyā dvinnaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ visuṃ na vadeyya.
atk-vin01a0:2557_0: Nissaṭṭhacīvaradānepi yathā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato dammī”ti eko vadati, evaṃ “imaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2557_1: mayaṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato demā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Ito garukatarāni hi ñattidutiyakammānipi
atk-vin01a0:2557_2: “apaloketvā kātabbānī”ti vuttāni atthi, tesaṃ etaṃ anulomaṃ nissaṭṭhacīvaraṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:2557_3: dātabbameva adātuṃ na labbhati, vinayakammamattañhetaṃ. Na taṃ tena saṅghassa vā
atk-vin01a0:2557_4: gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā dinnameva hotīti.
atk-vin01a0:2558_0: 468. Dasāhātikkante atikkantasaññīti dasāhaṃ atikkante cīvare “atikkantaṃ ida”nti
atk-vin01a0:2558_1: evaṃsaññī, dasāhe vā atikkante “atikkanto dasāho”ti evaṃsaññī. Nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti
atk-vin01a0:2558_2: na idha saññā rakkhati. Yopi evaṃsaññī, tassapi taṃ cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyāpatti
atk-vin01a0:2558_3: ca. Sanissaggiyavinayakammaṃ vā pācittiyanti ubhopi atthavikappā yujjanti. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-vin01a0:2559: Avissajjite vissajjitasaññīti kassaci adinne apariccatte “pariccattaṃ mayā”ti evaṃsaññī.
atk-vin01a0:2560: Anaṭṭhe naṭṭhasaññīti attano cīvarena saddhiṃ bahūni aññesaṃ cīvarāni ekato ṭhapitāni corā haranti. Tatresa attano cīvare anaṭṭhe naṭṭhasaññī hoti. Esa nayo avinaṭṭhādīsupi.
atk-vin01a0:2561: Avilutteti ettha pana gabbhaṃ bhinditvā pasayhāvahāravasena avilutteti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2562_0: Anissajjitvā paribhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassāti sakiṃ nivatthaṃ vā sakiṃ pārutaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:2562_1: kāyato amocetvā divasampi vicarati, ekāva āpatti. Mocetvā mocetvā nivāseti vā pārupati
atk-vin01a0:2562_2: vā payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ. Dunnivatthaṃ vā duppārutaṃ vā saṇṭhapentassa anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2562_3: Aññassa taṃ paribhuñjatopi anāpatti, “anāpatti aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2562_4: ādivacanañcettha sādhakaṃ. Anatikkante atikkantasaññino vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ paribhogaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2563_0: 469. “Anāpatti antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vikappetī”ti ettha pana adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ vikappanupagañca
atk-vin01a0:2563_1: veditabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi – atha kho bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – “yāni tāni bhagavatā
atk-vin01a0:2563_3: vā ‘kaṇḍuppaṭicchādī’ti vā mukhapuñchanacoḷakanti vā parikkhāracoḷanti vā sabbāni
atk-vin01a0:2563_4: tāni adhiṭṭhātabbānīti nu kho udāhu vikappetabbānī”ti, bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ –
atk-vin01a0:2564_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ; vassikasāṭikaṃ vassānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2564_1: cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetuṃ; nisīdanaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ;
atk-vin01a0:2564_2: paccattharaṇaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ; kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ yāvaābādhā adhiṭṭhātuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2564_3: tato paraṃ vikappetuṃ; mukhapuñchanacoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ; parikkhāracoḷaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2565_0: “Tattha ticīvaraṃ” adhiṭṭhahantena rajitvā kappabinduṃ datvā pamāṇayuttameva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2565_1: Tassa pamāṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena sugatacīvarato ūnakaṃ vaṭṭati, lāmakaparicchedena
atk-vin01a0:2565_2: saṅghāṭiyā uttarāsaṅgassa ca dīghato muṭṭhipañcakaṃ tiriyaṃ muṭṭhittikaṃ pamāṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2565_3: vaṭṭati. Antaravāsako dīghato muṭṭhipañcako tiriyaṃ dvihatthopi vaṭṭati. Pārupaṇenapi
atk-vin01a0:2565_4: hi sakkā nābhiṃ paṭicchādetunti. Vuttappamāṇato pana atirekaṃ ūnakañca parikkhāracoḷanti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2566_0: Tattha yasmā “dve cīvarassa adhiṭṭhānā – kāyena vā adhiṭṭheti, vācāya vā adhiṭṭhetī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2566_1: vuttaṃ, tasmā purāṇasaṅghāṭiṃ “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmī”ti paccuddharitvā navaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2566_2: saṅghāṭiṃ hatthena gahetvā “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti cittena ābhogaṃ katvā kāyavikāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2566_3: karontena kāyena adhiṭṭhātabbā. Idaṃ kāyena adhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena
atk-vin01a0:2566_4: aphusantassa na vaṭṭati. Vācāya adhiṭṭhāne pana vacībhedaṃ katvā vācāya adhiṭṭhātabbā.
atk-vin01a0:2566_5: Tatra duvidhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ – sace hatthapāse hoti “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā
atk-vin01a0:2566_6: bhinditabbā. Atha antogabbhe vā uparipāsāde vā sāmantavihāre vā hoti ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2566_7: sallakkhetvā “etaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā. Esa nayo uttarāsaṅge
atk-vin01a0:2566_8: antaravāsake ca. Nāmamattameva hi viseso. Tasmā sabbāni saṅghāṭiṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ antaravāsakanti
atk-vin01a0:2566_9: evaṃ attano nāmeneva adhiṭṭhātabbāni. Sace adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitavatthehi saṅghāṭiādīni
atk-vin01a0:2566_10: karoti, niṭṭhite rajane ca kappe ca imaṃ “paccuddharāmī”ti paccuddharitvā puna adhiṭṭhātabbāni.
atk-vin01a0:2566_11: Adhiṭṭhitena pana saddhiṃ mahantatarameva dutiyapaṭṭaṃ vā khaṇḍaṃ vā saṃsibbantena
atk-vin01a0:2566_12: puna adhiṭṭhātabbameva. Same vā khuddake vā adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-vin01a0:2567_0: Ticīvaraṃ pana parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati na vaṭṭatīti? Mahāpadumatthero
atk-vin01a0:2567_1: kirāha – “ticīvaraṃ ticīvarameva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Sace parikkhāracoḷādhiṭṭhānaṃ labheyya
atk-vin01a0:2567_2: udositasikkhāpade parihāro niratthako bhaveyyā”ti. Evaṃ vutte kira avasesā bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:2567_3: āhaṃsu – “parikkhāracoḷampi bhagavatāva adhiṭṭhātabbanti vuttaṃ, tasmā vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2567_4: Mahāpaccariyampi vuttaṃ “parikkhāracoḷaṃ nāma pāṭekkaṃ nidhānamukhametanti ticīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2567_5: parikkhāracoḷanti adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Udositasikkhāpade pana ticīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2567_6: adhiṭṭhahitvā pariharantassa parihāro vutto”ti. Ubhatovibhaṅgabhāṇako puṇṇavālikavāsī
atk-vin01a0:2567_7: mahātissattheropi kira āha – “mayaṃ pubbe mahātherānaṃ assumha, araññavāsino bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:2567_8: rukkhasusirādīsu cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā padhānaṃ padahanatthāya gacchanti. Sāmantavihāre
atk-vin01a0:2567_9: dhammasavanatthāya gatānañca nesaṃ sūriye uṭṭhite sāmaṇerā vā daharabhikkhū vā pattacīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2567_10: gahetvā gacchanti, tasmā sukhaparibhogatthaṃ ticīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷanti adhiṭṭhātuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2567_11: vaṭṭatī”ti. Mahāpaccariyampi vuttaṃ pubbe āraññikā bhikkhū abaddhasīmāyaṃ dupparihāranti
atk-vin01a0:2568_0: “Vassikasāṭikā” anatirittappamāṇā nāmaṃ gahetvā vuttanayeneva cattāro vassike māse
atk-vin01a0:2568_1: adhiṭṭhātabbā, tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā. Vaṇṇabhedamattarattāpi cesā
atk-vin01a0:2568_2: vaṭṭati. Dve pana na vaṭṭanti. “Nisīdanaṃ” vuttanayena adhiṭṭhātabbameva, tañca kho
atk-vin01a0:2568_3: pamāṇayuttaṃ ekameva, dve na vaṭṭanti. “Paccattharaṇa”mpi adhiṭṭhātabbameva, taṃ
atk-vin01a0:2568_4: pana mahantampi vaṭṭati, ekampi vaṭṭati, bahūnipi vaṭṭanti. Nīlampi pītakampi sadasampi
atk-vin01a0:2568_5: pupphadasampīti sabbappakāraṃ vaṭṭati. Sakiṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhitameva hoti. “Kaṇḍuppaṭicchādi”
atk-vin01a0:2568_6: yāva ābādho atthi, tāva pamāṇikā adhiṭṭhātabbā. Ābādhe vūpasante paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā,
atk-vin01a0:2568_7: ekāva vaṭṭati. “Mukhapuñchanacoḷaṃ” adhiṭṭhātabbameva, yāva ekaṃ dhoviyati, tāva
atk-vin01a0:2568_8: aññaṃ paribhogatthāya icchitabbanti dve vaṭṭanti. Apare pana therā “nidhānamukhametaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2568_9: bahūnipi vaṭṭantī”ti vadanti. Parikkhāracoḷe gaṇanā natthi, yattakaṃ icchati tattakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2568_11: “parikkhāracoḷaka”nti adhiṭṭhātabbameva. Bahūni ekato katvā “imāni cīvarāni parikkhāracoḷāni
atk-vin01a0:2568_13: ṭhapentenapi adhiṭṭhātabbameva. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ. Mañcabhisi
atk-vin01a0:2568_14: pīṭhakabhisi bimbohanaṃ pāvāro kojavoti etesu pana senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇe
atk-vin01a0:2569_0: Adhiṭṭhitacīvaraṃ pana paribhuñjato kathaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti? Aññassa dānena,
atk-vin01a0:2569_1: acchinditvā gahaṇena, vissāsaggāhena, hīnāyāvattanena, sikkhāpaccakkhānena, kālaṃkiriyāya,
atk-vin01a0:2569_2: liṅgaparivattanena, paccuddharaṇena, chiddabhāvenāti imehi navahi kāraṇehi vijahati.
atk-vin01a0:2569_3: Tattha purimehi aṭṭhahi sabbacīvarāni adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahanti, chiddabhāvena pana ticīvarasseva
atk-vin01a0:2569_4: sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ vuttaṃ, tañca nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇena chiddena.
atk-vin01a0:2569_5: Tattha nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇaṃ kaniṭṭhaṅgulinakhavasena veditabbaṃ, chiddañca vinibbiddhachiddameva.
atk-vin01a0:2569_6: Chiddassa hi abbhantare ekatantu cepi acchinno hoti, rakkhati. Tattha saṅghāṭiyā
atk-vin01a0:2569_7: ca uttarāsaṅgassa ca dīghantato vidatthippamāṇassa tiriyantato aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇassa
atk-vin01a0:2569_8: padesassa orato chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhindati, parato na bhindati. Antaravāsakassa
atk-vin01a0:2569_9: pana dīghantato vidatthippamāṇasseva tiriyantato caturaṅgulappamāṇassa padesassa
atk-vin01a0:2569_10: orato chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhindati, parato na bhindati. Tasmā jāte chidde taṃ cīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2569_11: atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, sūcikammaṃ katvā puna adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Mahāsumatthero
atk-vin01a0:2569_12: panāha – “pamāṇacīvarassa yattha katthaci chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhindati, mahantassa
atk-vin01a0:2569_13: pana pamāṇato bahi chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhindati, antojātaṃ bhindatī”ti. Karavīkatissatthero
atk-vin01a0:2569_14: āha – “khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ na pamāṇaṃ, dve cīvarāni pārupantassa vāmahatthe saṅgharitvā
atk-vin01a0:2569_15: ṭhapitaṭṭhāne chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhindati, orabhāge bhindati. Antaravāsakassapi
atk-vin01a0:2569_16: ovaṭṭikaṃ karontena saṅgharitaṭṭhāne chiddaṃ na bhindati, tato oraṃ bhindatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2569_17: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ticīvare mahāsumattheravādaṃ pamāṇaṃ katvā uttarimpi idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2569_18: vuttaṃ “pacchimappamāṇaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ rakkhatī”ti. Parikkhāracoḷe dīghaso aṭṭhaṅgule
atk-vin01a0:2569_19: sugataṅgulena tiriyaṃ caturaṅgule yattha katthaci chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati. Mahante
atk-vin01a0:2569_20: coḷe tato parena chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati. Esa nayo sabbesu adhiṭṭhātabbakesu cīvaresū”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2570_0: Tattha yasmā sabbesampi adhiṭṭhātabbakacīvarānaṃ vikappanupagapacchimappamāṇato aññaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2570_2: vuttaṃ, taṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ, tato uttari paṭisiddhattā na pacchimaṃ tato heṭṭhā appaṭisiddhattā.
atk-vin01a0:2570_3: Ticīvarassāpi sugatacīvarappamāṇato ūnakattaṃ ukkaṭṭhappamāṇameva. Pacchimaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:2570_5: natthiyeva. Vikappanupagapacchimena pana pacchimaparicchedo vutto. Tasmā yaṃ tāva
atk-vin01a0:2570_6: andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pacchimappamāṇaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ rakkhatī”ti vatvā tattha parikkhāracoḷasseva
atk-vin01a0:2570_8: muṭṭhipañcakādipabhedaṃ pacchimappamāṇaṃ sandhāya “esa nayo sabbesu adhiṭṭhātabbakesucīvaresū”ti
atk-vin01a0:2571_0: Karavīkatissattheravādepi dīghantatoyeva chiddaṃ dassitaṃ, tiriyantato na dassitaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2571_1: tasmā so aparicchinno. Mahāsumattheravāde “pamāṇacīvarassa yattha katthaci chiddaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2571_2: adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhindati, mahantassa pana pamāṇato bahi chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhindatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2571_3: vuttaṃ. Idaṃ pana na vuttaṃ – “idaṃ nāma pamāṇacīvaraṃ ito uttari mahantaṃ cīvara”nti.
atk-vin01a0:2571_4: Apicettha ticīvarādīnaṃ muṭṭhipañcakādibhedaṃ pacchimappamāṇanti adhippetaṃ. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:2571_5: yadi pacchimappamāṇato bahi chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhindeyya, ukkaṭṭhapattassāpi
atk-vin01a0:2571_6: majjhimapattassa vā omakappamāṇato bahi chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhindeyya, na ca na
atk-vin01a0:2572_0: Yo panāyaṃ sabbapaṭhamo aṭṭhakathāvādo, ayamevettha pamāṇaṃ. Kasmā? Paricchedasabbhāvato.
atk-vin01a0:2572_1: Ticīvarassa hi pacchimappamāṇañca chiddappamāṇañca chidduppattidesappamāṇañca sabbaaṭṭhakathāsuyeva
atk-vin01a0:2572_2: paricchinditvā vuttaṃ, tasmā sveva vādo pamāṇaṃ. Addhā hi so bhagavato adhippāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2572_3: anugantvā vutto. Itaresu pana neva paricchedo atthi, na pubbāparaṃ sametīti.
atk-vin01a0:2573_0: Yo pana dubbalaṭṭhāne paṭhamaṃ aggaḷaṃ datvā pacchā dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ chinditvā apaneti,
atk-vin01a0:2573_1: adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhijjati. Maṇḍalaparivattanepi eseva nayo. Dupaṭṭassa ekasmiṃ paṭale
atk-vin01a0:2573_2: chidde vā jāte gaḷite vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhijjati, khuddakaṃ cīvaraṃ mahantaṃ karoti,
atk-vin01a0:2573_3: mahantaṃ vā khuddakaṃ karoti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhijjati. Ubho koṭiyo majjhe karonto
atk-vin01a0:2573_4: sace paṭhamaṃ chinditvā pacchā ghaṭeti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhijjati. Atha ghaṭetvā chindati,
atk-vin01a0:2573_5: na bhijjati, rajakehi dhovāpetvā setaṃ kārāpentassāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānamevāti.
atk-vin01a0:2573_6: Ayaṃ tāva “antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vikappetī”ti ettha adhiṭṭhāne vinicchayo.
atk-vin01a0:2574_0: Vikappane pana dve vikappanā – sammukhāvikappanā ca parammukhāvikappanā ca. Kathaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2574_1: sammukhāvikappanā hotīti? Cīvarānaṃ ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā
atk-vin01a0:2574_2: “‘imaṃ cīvara’nti vā ‘imāni cīvarānī’ti vā ‘etaṃ cīvara’nti vā ‘etāni cīvarānī”’ti
atk-vin01a0:2574_3: vā “tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti vattabbaṃ, ayamekā sammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a0:2574_4: paribhuñjituṃ pana vissajjetuṃ vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vā na vaṭṭati. “Mayhaṃ santakaṃ, mayhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2574_5: santakāni paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti evaṃ pana vutte
atk-vin01a0:2574_6: paccuddhāro nāma hoti. Tatopabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin01a0:2575_0: Aparopi nayo – tatheva cīvarānaṃ ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā tasseva
atk-vin01a0:2575_1: bhikkhuno santike “‘imaṃ cīvara’nti vā ‘imāni cīvarānī’ti vā ‘etaṃ cīvara’nti vā
atk-vin01a0:2575_2: ‘etāni cīvarānī”’ti vā vatvā pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa attanā abhirucitassa
atk-vin01a0:2575_3: yassa kassaci nāmaṃ gahetvā “‘tissassa bhikkhuno vikappemī’ti vā ‘tissāya bhikkhuniyā,
atk-vin01a0:2575_4: sikkhamānāya, tissassa sāmaṇerassa, tissāya sāmaṇeriyā vikappemī”’ti vā vattabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2575_5: ayaṃ aparāpi sammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati, paribhogādīsu pana ekampi
atk-vin01a0:2575_6: na vaṭṭati. Tena pana bhikkhunā “tissassa bhikkhuno santakaṃ…pe… tissāya sāmaṇeriyā
atk-vin01a0:2575_7: santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti vutte paccuddhāro
atk-vin01a0:2576_0: Kathaṃ parammukhāvikappanā hotīti? Cīvarānaṃ tatheva ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca
atk-vin01a0:2576_1: ñatvā “‘imaṃ cīvara’nti vā ‘imāni cīvarānī’ti vā ‘etaṃ cīvara’nti vā ‘etāni cīvarānī”’ti
atk-vin01a0:2576_2: vā vatvā “tuyhaṃ vikappanatthāya dammī”ti vattabbaṃ. Tena vattabbo – “ko te mitto
atk-vin01a0:2576_3: vā sandiṭṭho vā”ti? Tato itarena purimanayeneva “tisso bhikkhūti vā…pe… tissā sāmaṇerī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2576_4: vā vattabbaṃ. Puna tena bhikkhunā “ahaṃ tissassa bhikkhuno dammīti vā…pe… tissāya
atk-vin01a0:2576_5: sāmaṇeriyā dammī”ti vā vattabbaṃ, ayaṃ parammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a0:2576_6: paribhogādīsu pana ekampi na vaṭṭati. Tena pana bhikkhunā dutiyasammukhāvikappanāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2576_7: vuttanayeneva “itthannāmassa santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:2576_8: karohī”ti vutte paccuddhāro nāma hoti. Tatopabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin01a0:2577_0: Dvinnaṃ vikappanānaṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ? Sammukhāvikappanāyaṃ sayaṃ vikappetvā parena
atk-vin01a0:2577_1: paccuddharāpeti. Parammukhāvikappanāya pareneva vikappāpetvā pareneva paccuddharāpeti,
atk-vin01a0:2577_2: idamettha nānākaraṇaṃ. Sace pana yassa vikappeti, so paññattikovido na hoti, na jānāti
atk-vin01a0:2577_3: paccuddharituṃ, taṃ cīvaraṃ gahetvā aññassa byattassa santikaṃ gantvā puna vikappetvā
atk-vin01a0:2577_4: paccuddharāpetabbaṃ. Vikappitavikappanā nāmesā vaṭṭati. Ayaṃ “vikappetī”ti imasmiṃ pade vinicchayo.
atk-vin01a0:2578_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”ntiādivacanato ca idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2578_1: “vikappetī”ti avisesena vuttavacanaṃ viruddhaṃ viya dissati, na ca viruddhaṃ tathāgatā
atk-vin01a0:2578_2: bhāsanti. Tasmā evamassa attho veditabbo, ticīvaraṃ ticīvarasaṅkhepeneva pariharato
atk-vin01a0:2578_3: adhiṭṭhātumeva anujānāmi, na vikappetuṃ. Vassikasāṭikaṃ pana cātumāsato paraṃ vikappetumeva
atk-vin01a0:2578_4: na adhiṭṭhātuṃ. Evañca sati yo ticīvare ekena cīvarena vippavasitukāmo hoti, tassa
atk-vin01a0:2578_5: ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ paccuddharitvā vippavāsasukhatthaṃ vikappanāya okāso dinno hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2578_6: Dasāhātikkame ca anāpattīti etenupāyena sabbattha vikappanāya appaṭisiddhabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2579_0: Vissajjetīti aññassa deti. Kathaṃ pana dinnaṃ hoti, kathaṃ gahitaṃ? “Imaṃ tuyhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2579_1: demi dadāmi dajjāmi oṇojemi pariccajāmi nissajjāmi vissajjāmīti vā “itthannāmassa
atk-vin01a0:2579_2: demi…pe… nissajjāmī”ti vā vadati, sammukhāpi parammukhāpi dinnaṃyeva hoti. “Tuyhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2579_3: gaṇhāhī”ti vutte “mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti vadati, sudinnaṃ suggahitañca. “Tava santakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2579_4: karohi, tava santakaṃ hotu, tava santakaṃ karissasī”ti vutte “mama santakaṃ karomi,
atk-vin01a0:2579_5: mama santakaṃ hotu, mama santakaṃ karissāmī”ti vadati, duddinnaṃ duggahitañca. Neva
atk-vin01a0:2579_6: dātā dātuṃ jānāti, na itaro gahetuṃ. Sace pana “tava santakaṃ karohī”ti vutte “sādhu,
atk-vin01a0:2579_7: bhante, mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti gaṇhāti, suggahitaṃ. Sace pana “eko gaṇhāhī”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a0:2579_8: itaro “na gaṇhāmī”ti puna so “dinnaṃ mayā tuyhaṃ, gaṇhāhī”ti vadati, itaropi “na
atk-vin01a0:2579_9: mayhaṃ iminā attho”ti vadati. Tato purimopi “mayā dinna”nti dasāhaṃ atikkāmeti, pacchimopi
atk-vin01a0:2579_10: “mayā paṭikkhitta”nti. Kassa āpattīti? Na kassaci āpatti. Yassa pana ruccati, tena
atk-vin01a0:2580_0: Yo pana adhiṭṭhāne vematiko, tena kiṃ kātabbaṃ? Vematikabhāvaṃ ārocetvā sace anadhiṭṭhitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2580_1: bhavissati, evaṃ me kappiyaṃ hotīti vatvā vuttanayeneva nissajjitabbaṃ. Na hi evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2580_2: jānāpetvā vinayakammaṃ karontassa musāvādo hoti. Keci pana “ekena bhikkhunā vissāsaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2580_3: gahetvā puna dinnaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati. Na hi tassetaṃ vinayakammaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2580_4: nāpi taṃ ettakena aññaṃ vatthuṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2581_0: Nassatītiādi uttānatthameva. Yo na dadeyya āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha “mayhaṃ dinnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2581_1: iminā”ti imāya saññāya na dentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Tassa santakabhāvaṃ pana ñatvā lesena
atk-vin01a0:2582_0: Samuṭṭhānādīsu idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma kāyavācāto ca kāyavācācittato
atk-vin01a0:2582_1: ca samuṭṭhāti, anadhiṭṭhānena ca avikappanena ca āpajjanato akiriyaṃ, saññāya abhāvepi
atk-vin01a0:2582_2: na muccati, ajānantopi āpajjatīti nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2585_0: 471. Tena samayena buddho bhagavāti udositasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha santaruttarenāti antaranti
atk-vin01a0:2585_1: antaravāsako vuccati, uttaranti uttarāsaṅgo, saha antarena uttaraṃ santaruttaraṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2585_2: tena santaruttarena, saha antaravāsakena uttarāsaṅgenāti attho. Kaṇṇakitānīti sedena
atk-vin01a0:2585_3: phuṭṭhokāsesu sañjātakāḷasetamaṇḍalāni. Addasa kho āyasmā ānando senāsanacārikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2585_4: āhiṇḍantoti thero kira bhagavati divā paṭisallānatthāya gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe taṃ
atk-vin01a0:2585_5: okāsaṃ labhitvā dunnikkhittāni dārubhaṇḍamattikābhaṇḍāni paṭisāmento asammaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2585_6: sammajjanto gilānehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonto tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2585_7: sampatto addasa. Tena vuttaṃ – “addasa kho āyasmā ānando senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍanto”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2586_0: 473. Avippavāsasammutiṃ dātunti avippavāse sammuti avippavāsasammuti, avippavāsāya
atk-vin01a0:2586_1: vā sammuti avippavāsasammuti. Ko panettha ānisaṃso? Yena cīvarena vippavasati, taṃ
atk-vin01a0:2586_2: nissaggiyaṃ na hoti, āpattiñca nāpajjati. Kittakaṃ kālaṃ? Mahāsumatthero tāva āha
atk-vin01a0:2586_3: – “yāva rogo na vūpasamati, vūpasante pana roge sīghaṃ cīvaraṭṭhānaṃ āgantabba”nti.
atk-vin01a0:2586_4: Mahāpadumatthero āha – “sīghaṃ āgacchato rogo paṭikuppeyya, tasmā saṇikaṃ āgantabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2586_5: Yato paṭṭhāya hi satthaṃ vā pariyesati, ‘gacchāmī’ti ābhogaṃ vā karoti, tato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin01a0:2586_6: vaṭṭati. ‘Na dāni gamissāmī’ti evaṃ pana dhuranikkhepaṃ karontena paccuddharitabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2586_7: atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhassatī”ti. Sace panassa rogo paṭikuppati, kiṃ kātabbanti? Phussadevatthero
atk-vin01a0:2586_8: tāva āha – “sace soyeva rogo paṭikuppati, sā eva sammuti, puna sammutidānakiccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2586_9: natthi. Athañño kuppati, puna dātabbā sammutī”ti. Upatissatthero āha – “so vā rogo
atk-vin01a0:2586_10: hotu, añño vā puna sammutidānakiccaṃ natthī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2587_0: 475-6. Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunāti idha pana purimasikkhāpade viya atthaṃ aggahetvā
atk-vin01a0:2587_1: niṭṭhite cīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunoti evaṃ sāmivasena karaṇavacanassa attho veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2587_2: Karaṇavasena hi bhikkhunā idaṃ nāma kātabbanti natthi. Sāmivasena pana bhikkhuno
atk-vin01a0:2587_3: cīvarasmiṃ niṭṭhite kathine ca ubbhate evaṃ chinnapalibodho ekarattampi ce bhikkhu
atk-vin01a0:2587_4: ticīvarena vippavaseyyāti evaṃ attho yujjati. Tattha ticīvarenāti adhiṭṭhitesu tīsu
atk-vin01a0:2587_5: cīvaresu yena kenaci. Ekena vippavutthopi hi ticīvarena vippavuttho hoti, paṭisiddhapariyāpannena
atk-vin01a0:2587_6: vippavutthattā. Tenevassa padabhājane “saṅghāṭiyā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vippavaseyyāti vippayutto vaseyya.
atk-vin01a0:2588_0: 477-8. Gāmo ekūpacārotiādi avippavāsalakkhaṇavavatthāpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2588_1: yathākkamena tāneva pannarasa mātikāpadāni vitthārento “gāmo ekūpacāro nāmā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin01a0:2588_2: Tattha ekakulassa gāmoti ekassa rañño vā bhojakassa vā gāmo. Parikkhittoti yena kenaci
atk-vin01a0:2588_3: pākārena vā vatiyā vā parikkhāya vā parikkhitto. Ettāvatā ekakulagāmassa ekūpacāratā
atk-vin01a0:2588_4: dassitā. Antogāme vatthabbanti evarūpe gāme cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā gāmabbhantare yathārucite
atk-vin01a0:2588_5: ṭhāne aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Aparikkhittoti iminā tasseva gāmassa nānūpacāratā
atk-vin01a0:2588_6: dassitā. Evarūpe gāme yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tattha vatthabbaṃ. Hatthapāsā
atk-vin01a0:2588_7: vā na vijahitabbanti atha vā taṃ gharaṃ samantato hatthapāsā na vijahitabbaṃ, aḍḍhateyyaratanappamāṇappadesā
atk-vin01a0:2588_8: uddhaṃ na vijahitabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Aḍḍhateyyaratanabbhantare pana vatthuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2588_9: Taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā sacepi iddhimā bhikkhū ākāse aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeti, nissaggiyameva
atk-vin01a0:2588_10: hoti. Ettha ca yasmiṃ ghareti gharaparicchedo “ekakulassa nivesanaṃ hotī”tiādinā
atk-vin01a0:2589_0: 479. Nānākulassa gāmoti nānārājūnaṃ vā bhojakānaṃ vā gāmo, vesālikusinārādisadiso.
atk-vin01a0:2589_1: Parikkhittoti iminā nānākulagāmassa ekūpacāratā dassitā. Sabhāye vā dvāramūle vāti
atk-vin01a0:2589_2: ettha sabhāyanti liṅgabyattayena sabhā vuttā. Dvāramūleti nagaradvārassa samīpe.
atk-vin01a0:2589_3: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – evarūpe gāme yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tattha vā vatthabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2589_4: Tattha saddasaṅghaṭṭanena vā janasambādhena vā vasituṃ asakkontena sabhāye vā vatthabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2589_5: nagaradvāramūle vā. Tatrapi vasituṃ asakkontena yattha katthaci phāsukaṭṭhāne vasitvā
atk-vin01a0:2589_6: antoaruṇe āgamma tesaṃyeva sabhāyadvāramūlānaṃ hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ. Gharassa
atk-vin01a0:2589_7: pana cīvarassa vā hatthapāse vattabbameva natthi.
atk-vin01a0:2590_0: Sabhāyaṃ gacchantena hatthapāse cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvāti sace ghare aṭṭhapetvā sabhāye
atk-vin01a0:2590_1: ṭhapessāmīti sabhāyaṃ gacchati, tena sabhāyaṃ gacchantena hatthapāseti hatthaṃ pasāretvā
atk-vin01a0:2590_2: “handimaṃ cīvaraṃ ṭhapemī”ti evaṃ nikkhepasukhe hatthapāsagate kismiñci āpaṇe cīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2590_3: nikkhipitvā purimanayeneva sabhāye vā vatthabbaṃ dvāramūle vā, hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2591_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – phussadevatthero tāva āha – “cīvarahatthapāse vasitabbaṃ natthi,
atk-vin01a0:2591_1: yattha katthaci vīthihatthapāsepi sabhāyahatthapāsepi dvārahatthapāsepi vasituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2591_2: Upatissatthero panāha – “nagarassa bahūnipi dvārāni honti bahūnipi sabhāyāni, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:2591_3: sabbattha na vaṭṭati. Yassā pana vīthiyā cīvaraṃ ṭhapitaṃ yaṃ tassā sammukhaṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a0:2591_4: sabhāyañca dvārañca tassa sabhāyassa ca dvārassa ca hatthapāsā na vijahitabbaṃ. Evañhi
atk-vin01a0:2591_5: sati sakkā cīvarassa pavatti jānitu”nti. Sabhāyaṃ pana gacchantena yassa āpaṇikassa
atk-vin01a0:2591_6: hatthe nikkhittaṃ, sace so taṃ cīvaraṃ atiharitvā ghare nikkhipati, vīthihatthapāso
atk-vin01a0:2591_7: na rakkhati, gharassa hatthapāse vatthabbaṃ. Sace mahantaṃ gharaṃ hoti, dve vīthiyo
atk-vin01a0:2591_8: pharitvā ṭhitaṃ purato vā pacchato vā hatthapāseyeva aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ. Sabhāye
atk-vin01a0:2591_9: nikkhipitvā pana sabhāye vā tassa sammukhe nagaradvāramūle vā tesaṃyeva hatthapāse
atk-vin01a0:2592_0: Aparikkhittotiiminā tasseva gāmassa nānūpacāratā dassitā. Etenevupāyena sabbattha
atk-vin01a0:2592_1: ekūpacāratā ca nānūpacāratā ca veditabbā. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “gāmo ekūpacāro nāmā”ti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2592_2: ādimhi “ajjhokāso ekūpacāro nāmā”ti evaṃ ante ca ekameva mātikāpadaṃ uddharitvā padabhājanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2592_3: vitthāritaṃ. Tasmā tasseva padassānusārena sabbattha parikkhepādivasena ekūpacāratā
atk-vin01a0:2593_0: 480-1. Nivesanādīsu ovarakāti gabbhānaṃyevetaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ. Hatthapāsā vāti gabbhassa
atk-vin01a0:2593_1: hatthapāsā. Dvāramūle vāti sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇe gharadvāramūle. Hatthapāsā vāti gabbhassa
atk-vin01a0:2594_0: 482-7. Udositoti yānādīnaṃ bhaṇḍānaṃ sālā. Ito paṭṭhāya ca nivesane vuttanayeneva
atk-vin01a0:2594_1: vinicchayo veditabbo. Aṭṭoti paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ iṭṭhakāhi kato bahalabhittiko
atk-vin01a0:2594_2: catupañcabhūmiko patissayaviseso. Māḷoti ekakūṭasaṅgahito caturassapāsādo. Pāsādoti
atk-vin01a0:2595_0: 489. Sattabbhantarātiettha ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ aṭṭhavīsatihatthaṃ hoti. Sace sattho
atk-vin01a0:2595_1: gacchanto gāmaṃ vā nadiṃ vā pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhati antopaviṭṭhena saddhiṃ ekābaddho
atk-vin01a0:2595_2: hutvā orañca pārañca pharitvā ṭhito hoti, satthaparihārova labbhati. Atha gāme vā
atk-vin01a0:2595_3: nadiyā vā pariyāpanno hoti antopaviṭṭho, gāmaparihāro ceva nadīparihāro ca labbhati.
atk-vin01a0:2595_4: Sace vihārasīmaṃ atikkamitvā tiṭṭhati, antosīmāya ca cīvaraṃ hoti, vihāraṃ gantvā
atk-vin01a0:2595_5: vasitabbaṃ. Sace bahisīmāya cīvaraṃ hoti satthasamīpeyeva vasitabbaṃ. Sace gacchanto
atk-vin01a0:2595_6: sakaṭe vā bhagge goṇe vā naṭṭhe antarā chijjati, yasmiṃ koṭṭhāse cīvaraṃ tattha vasitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2596: 490. Ekakulassa khette hatthapāso nāma cīvarahatthapāsoyeva, nānākulassa khette hatthapāso nāma khettadvārassa hatthapāso. Aparikkhitte cīvarasseva hatthapāso.
atk-vin01a0:2597_0: 491-4. Dhaññakaraṇanti khalaṃ vuccati. Ārāmoti pupphārāmo vā phalārāmo vā. Dvīsupi
atk-vin01a0:2597_1: khette vuttasadisova vinicchayo. Vihāro nivesanasadiso. Rukkhamūle antochāyāyanti
atk-vin01a0:2597_2: chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsassa anto eva. Viraḷasākhassa pana rukkhassa ātapena phuṭṭhokāse
atk-vin01a0:2597_3: ṭhapitaṃ nissaggiyameva hoti, tasmā tādisassa sākhācchāyāya vā khandhacchāyāya vā
atk-vin01a0:2597_4: ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace sākhāya vā viṭape vā ṭhapeti, upari aññasākhācchāyāya phuṭṭhokāseyeva
atk-vin01a0:2597_5: ṭhapetabbaṃ. Khujjarukkhassa chāyā dūraṃ gacchati, chāyāya gataṭṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2598_0: Agāmake araññeti agāmakaṃ nāma araññaṃ viñjhāṭavīādīsu vā samuddamajjhe vā macchabandhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2598_1: agamanapathe dīpakesu labbhati. Samantā sattabbhantarāti majjhe ṭhitassa samattā
atk-vin01a0:2598_2: sabbadisāsu sattabbhantarā, vinibbedhena cuddasa honti. Majjhe nisinno puratthimāya
atk-vin01a0:2598_3: vā pacchimāya vā disāya pariyante ṭhapitacīvaraṃ rakkhati. Sace pana aruṇuggamanasamaye
atk-vin01a0:2598_4: kesaggamattampi puratthimaṃ disaṃ gacchati, pacchimāya disāya cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2598_5: hoti. Esa nayo itarasmiṃ. Uposathakāle pana parisapariyante nisinnabhikkhuto paṭṭhāya
atk-vin01a0:2598_6: sattabbhantarasīmā sodhetabbā. Yattakaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho vaḍḍhati, sīmāpi tattakaṃ vaḍḍhati.
atk-vin01a0:2599_0: 495. Anissajjitvā paribhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha sace padhāniko bhikkhu sabbarattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2599_1: padhānamanuyuñjitvā paccusasamaye “nhāyissāmī”ti tīṇipi cīvarāni tīre ṭhapetvā nadiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2599_2: otarati, nhāyantasseva cassa aruṇaṃ uṭṭhahati, kiṃ kātabbaṃ. So hi yadi uttaritvā
atk-vin01a0:2599_3: cīvaraṃ nivāseti, nissaggiyacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin01a0:2599_4: Atha naggo gacchati, evampi dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatīti? Na āpajjati. So hi yāva aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2599_5: disvā vinayakammaṃ na karoti, tāva tesaṃ cīvarānaṃ aparibhogārahattā naṭṭhacīvaraṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a0:2599_6: ṭhito hoti. Naṭṭhacīvarassa ca akappiyaṃ nāma natthi. Tasmā ekaṃ nivāsetvā dve hatthena
atk-vin01a0:2599_7: gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā vinayakammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sace dūre vihāro hoti, antarāmagge
atk-vin01a0:2599_8: manussā sañcaranti. Ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ aṃsakūṭe ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2599_9: Sace vihāre sabhāgabhikkhū na passati, bhikkhācāraṃ gatā honti, saṅghāṭiṃ bahigāme
atk-vin01a0:2599_10: ṭhapetvā santaruttarena āsanasālaṃ gantvā vinayakammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sace bahigāme corabhayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2599_11: hoti, pārupitvā gantabbaṃ. Sace āsanasālā sambādhā hoti janākiṇṇā, na sakkā ekamante
atk-vin01a0:2599_12: cīvaraṃ apanetvā vinayakammaṃ kātuṃ, ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ādāya bahigāmaṃ gantvā vinayakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2600_0: Sace bhikkhū daharānaṃ hatthe pattacīvaraṃ datvā maggaṃ gacchantā pacchime yāme sayitukāmā
atk-vin01a0:2600_1: honti, attano attano cīvaraṃ hatthapāse katvāva sayitabbaṃ. Sace gacchantānaṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:2600_2: asampattesu daharesu aruṇaṃ uggacchati, cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti, nissayo pana na
atk-vin01a0:2600_3: paṭippassambhati, daharānampi purato gacchantānaṃ theresu asampattesu eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:2600_4: Maggaṃ virajjhitvā araññe aññamaññaṃ apassantesupi eseva nayo. Sace pana daharā “mayaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2600_5: bhante, muhuttaṃ sayitvā asukasmiṃ nāma okāse tumhe sampāpuṇissāmā”ti vatvā yāva
atk-vin01a0:2600_6: aruṇuggamanā sayanti, cīvarañca nissaggiyaṃ hoti, nissayo ca paṭippassambhati, dahare
atk-vin01a0:2600_7: uyyojetvā theresu sayantesupi eseva nayo. Dvedhāpathaṃ disvā therā “ayaṃ maggo” daharā
atk-vin01a0:2600_8: “ayaṃ maggo”ti vatvā aññamaññassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā gatā, saha aruṇuggamanā cīvarāni
atk-vin01a0:2600_9: ca nissaggiyāni honti, nissayo ca paṭippassambhati. Sace daharā maggato okkamma “antoaruṇeyeva
atk-vin01a0:2600_10: nivattissāmā”ti bhesajjatthāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā āgacchanti. Asampattānaṃyeva ca tesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2600_11: aruṇo uggacchati, cīvarāni nissaggiyāni honti, nissayo pana na paṭippassambhati.
atk-vin01a0:2600_12: Sace pana dhenubhayena vā sunakhabhayena vā “muhuttaṃ ṭhatvā gamissāmā”ti ṭhatvā
atk-vin01a0:2600_13: vā nisīditvā vā gacchanti, antarā aruṇe uggate cīvarāni nissaggiyāni honti, nissayo
atk-vin01a0:2600_14: ca paṭippassambhati. Sace “antoaruṇeyeva āgamissāmā”ti antosīmāyaṃ gāmaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2600_15: antarā aruṇo uggacchati, neva cīvarāni nissaggiyāni honti, na nissayo paṭippassambhati.
atk-vin01a0:2600_16: Sace pana “vibhāyatu tāvā”ti nisīdanti, aruṇe uggatepi na cīvarāni nissaggiyāni honti,
atk-vin01a0:2600_17: nissayo pana paṭippassambhati. Yepi “antoaruṇeyeva āgamissāmā”ti sāmantavihāraṃ dhammasavanatthāya
atk-vin01a0:2600_18: saussāhā gacchanti, antarāmaggeyeva ca nesaṃ aruṇo uggacchati, cīvarāni nissaggiyāni
atk-vin01a0:2600_19: honti, nissayo pana na paṭippassambhati. Sace dhammagāravena “yāva pariyosānaṃ sutvāva
atk-vin01a0:2600_20: gamissāmā”ti nisīdanti, saha aruṇassuggamanā cīvarānipi nissaggiyāni honti, nissayopi
atk-vin01a0:2600_21: paṭippassambhati. Therena daharaṃ cīvaradhovanatthāya gāmakaṃ pesentena attano cīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2600_22: paccuddharitvāva dātabbaṃ. Daharassāpi cīvaraṃ paccuddharāpetvā ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace
atk-vin01a0:2600_23: assatiyā gacchati, attano cīvaraṃ paccuddharitvā daharassa cīvaraṃ vissāsena gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:2600_24: ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace thero nassarati, daharo eva sarati, daharena attano cīvaraṃ paccuddharitvā
atk-vin01a0:2600_25: therassa cīvaraṃ vissāsena gahetvā gantvā vattabbo “bhante, tumhākaṃ cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-vin01a0:2600_26: paribhuñjathā”ti attanopi cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Evaṃ ekassa satiyāpi āpattimokkho
atk-vin01a0:2601: Samuṭṭhānādīsu paṭhamakathinasikkhāpade anadhiṭṭhānaṃ avikappanañca akiriyaṃ, idha apaccuddharaṇaṃ ayameva viseso. Sesaṃ sabbattha vuttanayamevāti.
atk-vin01a0:2604_0: 497. Tena samayenāti tatiyakathinasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha ussāpetvā punappunaṃ vimajjatīti
atk-vin01a0:2604_1: “valīsu naṭṭhāsu idaṃ mahantaṃ bhavissatī”ti maññamāno udakena siñcitvā pādehi akkamitvā
atk-vin01a0:2604_2: hatthehi ussāpetvā ukkhipitvā piṭṭhiyaṃ ghaṃsati, taṃ ātape sukkhaṃ paṭhamappamāṇameva
atk-vin01a0:2604_3: hoti. So punapi tathā karoti, tena vuttaṃ – “ussāpetvā punappunaṃ vimajjatī”ti. Taṃ
atk-vin01a0:2604_4: evaṃ kilamantaṃ bhagavā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova disvā nikkhamitvā senāsanacārikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2604_5: āhiṇḍanto viya tattha agamāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “addasa kho bhagavā”tiādi.
atk-vin01a0:2605_0: 499-500. Ekādasamāseti ekaṃ pacchimakattikamāsaṃ ṭhapetvā sese ekādasamāse. Sattamāseti
atk-vin01a0:2605_1: kattikamāsaṃ hemantike ca cattāroti pañcamāse ṭhapetvā sese sattamāse. Kālepi ādissa
atk-vin01a0:2605_2: dinnanti saṅghassa vā “idaṃ akālacīvara”nti uddisitvā dinnaṃ, ekapuggalassa vā “idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2606_0: Saṅghato vāti attano pattabhāgavasena saṅghato vā uppajjeyya. Gaṇato vāti idaṃ suttantikagaṇassa
atk-vin01a0:2606_1: dema, idaṃ ābhidhammikagaṇassāti evaṃ gaṇassa denti. Tato attano pattabhāgavasena
atk-vin01a0:2607: No cassa pāripūrīti no ce pāripūrī bhaveyya, yattakena kayiramānaṃ adhiṭṭhānacīvaraṃ pahoti, tañce cīvaraṃ tattakaṃ na bhaveyya, ūnakaṃ bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2608_0: Paccāsā hoti saṅghato vātiādīsu asukadivasaṃ nāma saṅgho cīvarāni labhissati, gaṇo
atk-vin01a0:2608_1: labhissati, tato me cīvaraṃ uppajjissatīti evaṃ saṅghato vā gaṇato vā paccāsā hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2608_2: Ñātakehi me cīvaratthāya pesitaṃ, mittehi pesitaṃ, te āgatā cīvare dassantīti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2608_3: ñātito vā mittato vā paccāsā hoti. Paṃsukūlaṃ vāti ettha pana paṃsukūlaṃ vā lacchāmīti
atk-vin01a0:2608_4: evaṃ paccāsā hotīti yojetabbaṃ. Attano vā dhanenāti attano kappāsasuttādinā dhanena,
atk-vin01a0:2608_5: asukadivasaṃ nāma lacchāmīti evaṃ vā paccāsā hotīti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2609_0: Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya satiyāpi paccāsāyāti māsaparamato ce uttari nikkhipeyya,
atk-vin01a0:2609_1: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti attho. Evaṃ pana avatvā yasmā antarā uppajjamāne paccāsācīvare
atk-vin01a0:2609_2: mūlacīvarassa uppannadivasato yāva vīsatimo divaso tāva uppannaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ mūlacīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2609_3: attano gatikaṃ karoti, tato uddhaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ attano gatikaṃ karoti.
atk-vin01a0:2609_4: Tasmā taṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “tadahuppanne mūlacīvare”tiādinā nayena padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2610_0: Visabhāge uppanne mūlacīvareti yadi mūlacīvaraṃ saṇhaṃ, paccāsācīvaraṃ thūlaṃ, na
atk-vin01a0:2610_1: sakkā yojetuṃ. Rattiyo ca sesā honti, na tāva māso pūrati, na akāmā niggahena cīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2610_2: kāretabbaṃ. Aññaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ labhitvāyeva kālabbhantare kāretabbaṃ. Paccāsācīvarampi
atk-vin01a0:2610_3: parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Atha mūlacīvaraṃ thūlaṃ hoti, paccāsācīvaraṃ saṇhaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2610_4: mūlacīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā paccāsācīvarameva mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2610_5: Taṃ puna māsaparihāraṃ labhati, etenupāyena yāva icchati tāva aññamaññaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2614_0: 503-5. Tena samayenāti purāṇacīvarasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha yāva sattamā pitāmahayugāti
atk-vin01a0:2614_1: pitupitā pitāmaho, pitāmahassa yugaṃ pitāmahayugaṃ. Yuganti āyuppamāṇaṃ vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:2614_2: Abhilāpa mattameva cetaṃ. Atthato pana pitāmahoyeva pitāmahayugaṃ. Tato uddhaṃ sabbepi
atk-vin01a0:2614_3: pubbapurisā pitāmahaggahaṇeneva gahitā. Evaṃ yāva sattamo puriso tāva yā asambaddhā
atk-vin01a0:2614_4: sā yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā asambaddhāti vuccati. Desanāmukhameva cetaṃ. “Mātito
atk-vin01a0:2614_5: vā pitito vā”tivacanato pana pitāmahayugampi pitāmahiyugampi mātāmahayugampi mātāmahiyugampi
atk-vin01a0:2614_6: tesaṃ bhātubhaginībhāgineyyaputtapaputtādayopi sabbe idha saṅgahitā evāti veditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:2615_0: Tatrāyaṃ vitthāranayo – pitā pitupitā tassa pitā tassāpi pitāti evaṃ yāva sattamā
atk-vin01a0:2615_1: yugā, pitā pitumātā tassā pitā ca mātā ca bhātā ca bhaginī ca puttā ca dhītaro cāti
atk-vin01a0:2615_2: evampi uddhañca adho ca yāva sattamā yugā, pitā pitubhātā pitubhaginī pituputtā pitudhītaro
atk-vin01a0:2615_3: tesampi puttadhītuparamparāti evampi yāva sattamā yugā, mātā mātumātā tassā mātā
atk-vin01a0:2615_4: tassāpi mātāti evampi yāva sattamā yugā, mātā mātupitā tassa mātā ca pitā ca bhātā
atk-vin01a0:2615_5: ca bhaginī ca puttā ca dhītaro cāti, evampi uddhañca adho ca yāva sattamā yugā, mātā
atk-vin01a0:2615_6: mātubhātā mātubhaginī mātuputtā mātudhītaro tesampi puttadhītuparamparāti evampi
atk-vin01a0:2615_7: yāva sattamā yugā, neva mātusambandhena na pitusambandhena sambaddhā, ayaṃ aññātikā nāma.
atk-vin01a0:2616: Ubhato saṅgheti bhikkhunisaṅghe ñatticatutthena bhikkhusaṅghe ñatticatutthenāti aṭṭhavācikavinayakammena upasampannā.
atk-vin01a0:2617_0: Sakiṃ nivatthampi sakiṃ pārutampīti rajitvā kappaṃ katvā ekavārampi nivatthaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:2617_1: pārutaṃ vā. Antamaso paribhogasīsena aṃse vā matthake vā katvā maggaṃ gato hoti,
atk-vin01a0:2617_2: ussīsakaṃ vā katvā nipanno hoti, etampi purāṇacīvarameva. Sace pana paccattharaṇassa
atk-vin01a0:2617_3: heṭṭhā katvā nipajjati, hatthehi vā ukkhipitvā ākāse vitānaṃ katvā sīsena aphusanto
atk-vin01a0:2617_4: gacchati, ayaṃ paribhogo nāma na hotīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2618_0: Dhotaṃ nissaggiyanti ettha evaṃ āṇattā bhikkhunī dhovanatthāya uddhanaṃ sajjeti,
atk-vin01a0:2618_1: dārūni saṃharati, aggiṃ karoti, udakaṃ āharati yāva naṃ dhovitvā ukkhipati, tāva
atk-vin01a0:2618_2: bhikkhuniyā payoge payoge bhikkhussa dukkaṭaṃ. Dhovitvā ukkhittamatte nissaggiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2618_3: hoti. Sace duddhotanti maññamānā puna siñcati vā dhovati vā yāva niṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati
atk-vin01a0:2618_4: tāva payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ. Esa nayo rajanākoṭanesu. Rajanadoṇiyañhi rajanaṃ ākiritvā
atk-vin01a0:2618_5: yāva sakiṃ cīvaraṃ rajati, tato pubbe yaṃkiñci rajanatthāya karoti, pacchā vā paṭirajati,
atk-vin01a0:2618_6: sabbattha payoge payoge bhikkhussa dukkaṭaṃ. Evaṃ ākoṭanepi payogo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2619_0: 506. Aññātikāya aññātikasaññī purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpetīti no cepi “imaṃ dhovā”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a0:2619_1: atha kho dhovanatthāya kāyavikāraṃ katvā hatthena vā hatthe deti, pādamūle vā ṭhapeti,
atk-vin01a0:2619_2: upari vā khipati, sikkhamānāsāmaṇerīsāmaṇeraupāsakatitthiyādīnaṃ vā hatthe peseti,
atk-vin01a0:2619_3: nadītitthe dhovantiyā upacāre vā khipati, antodvādasahatthe okāse ṭhatvā, dhovāpitaṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:2619_4: hoti. Sace pana upacāraṃ muñcitvā orato ṭhapeti sā ce dhovitvā āneti, anāpatti. Sikkhamānāya
atk-vin01a0:2619_5: vā sāmaṇeriyā vā upāsikāya vā hatthe dhovanatthāya deti, sā ce upasampajjitvā dhovati,
atk-vin01a0:2619_6: āpattiyeva. Upāsakassa hatthe deti, so ce liṅge parivatte bhikkhunīsu pabbajitvā
atk-vin01a0:2619_7: upasampajjitvā dhovati, āpattiyeva. Sāmaṇerassa vā bhikkhussa vā hatthe dinnepi liṅgaparivattane eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:2620_0: Dhovāpeti rajāpetītiādīsu ekena vatthunā nissaggiyaṃ, dutiyena dukkaṭaṃ. Tīṇipi kārāpentassa
atk-vin01a0:2620_1: ekena nissaggiyaṃ, sesehi dve dukkaṭāni. Yasmā panetāni dhovanādīni paṭipāṭiyā vā
atk-vin01a0:2620_2: uppaṭipāṭiyā vā kārentassa mokkho natthi, tasmā ettha tīṇi catukkāni vuttāni. Sacepi
atk-vin01a0:2620_3: hi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ rajitvā dhovitvā ānehī”ti vutte sā bhikkhunī paṭhamaṃ dhovitvā pacchā
atk-vin01a0:2620_4: rajati, nissaggiyena dukkaṭameva. Evaṃ sabbesu viparītavacanesu nayo netabbo. Sace
atk-vin01a0:2620_5: pana “dhovitvā ānehī”ti vuttā dhovati ceva rajati ca, dhovāpanapaccayā eva āpatti,
atk-vin01a0:2620_6: rajane anāpatti. Evaṃ sabbattha vuttādhikakaraṇe “avuttā dhovatī”ti iminā lakkhaṇena
atk-vin01a0:2620_7: anāpatti veditabbā. “Imasmiṃ cīvare yaṃ kātabbaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ tuyhaṃ bhāro”ti vadanto
atk-vin01a0:2621: Aññātikāya vematiko aññātikāya ñātikasaññīti imānipi padāni vuttānaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena vitthārato veditabbāni.
atk-vin01a0:2622_0: Ekato upasampannāyāti bhikkhunīnaṃ santike upasampannāya dhovāpentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2622_1: Bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannāya pana yathāvatthukameva, bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannā
atk-vin01a0:2623_0: 507. Avuttā dhovatīti uddesāya vā ovādāya vā āgatā kilinnaṃ cīvaraṃ disvā ṭhapitaṭṭhānato
atk-vin01a0:2623_1: gahetvā vā “detha, ayya, dhovissāmī”ti āharāpetvā vā dhovati ceva rajati ca ākoṭeti
atk-vin01a0:2623_2: ca, ayaṃ avuttā dhovati nāma. Yāpi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ dhovā”ti daharaṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:2623_3: āṇāpentassa bhikkhuno sutvā “āharathayya ahaṃ dhovissāmī”ti dhovati, tāvakālikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2623_4: vā gahetvā dhovitvā rajitvā deti, ayampi avuttā dhovati nāma.
atk-vin01a0:2624: Aññaṃ parikkhāranti upāhanatthavikapattatthavikaaṃsabaddhakakāyabandhanamañcapīṭhabhisitaṭṭikādiṃ yaṃkiñci dhovāpeti, anāpatti. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2625: Samuṭṭhānādīsu pana idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2628_0: 508. Tena samayenāti cīvarapaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha piṇḍapātapaṭikkantāti piṇḍapātato
atk-vin01a0:2628_1: paṭikkantā. Yena andhavanaṃ tenupasaṅkamīti apaññatte sikkhāpade yena andhavanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2628_2: tenupasaṅkami. Katakammāti katacorikakammā, sandhicchedanādīhi parabhaṇḍaṃ haritāti
atk-vin01a0:2628_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Coragāmaṇikoti corajeṭṭhako. So kira pubbe theriṃ jānāti, tasmā corānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2628_4: purato gacchanto disvā “ito mā gacchatha, sabbe ito ethā”ti te gahetvā aññena maggena
atk-vin01a0:2628_5: agamāsi. Samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvāti therī kira paricchinnavelāyaṃyeva samādhimhā vuṭṭhahi.
atk-vin01a0:2628_6: Sopi tasmiṃyeva khaṇe evaṃ avaca, tasmā sā assosi, sutvā ca “natthi dāni añño ettha
atk-vin01a0:2628_7: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā aññatra mayā”ti taṃ maṃsaṃ aggahesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho
atk-vin01a0:2629_0: Ohiyyakoti avahīyako avaseso, vihāravāraṃ patvā ekova vihāre ṭhitoti attho. Sace
atk-vin01a0:2629_1: me tvaṃ antaravāsakaṃ dadeyyāsīti kasmā āha? Saṇhaṃ ghanamaṭṭhaṃ antaravāsakaṃ disvā
atk-vin01a0:2629_2: lobhena, apica appako tassā antaravāsake lobho, theriyā pana sikhāppattā koṭṭhāsasampatti
atk-vin01a0:2629_3: tenassā sarīrapāripūriṃ passissāmīti visamalobhaṃ uppādetvā evamāha. Antimanti pañcannaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2629_4: cīvarānaṃ sabbapariyantaṃ hutvā antimaṃ, antimanti pacchimaṃ. Aññaṃ lesenāpi vikappetvā
atk-vin01a0:2629_5: vā paccuddharitvā vā ṭhapitaṃ cīvaraṃ natthīti evaṃ yathāanuññātānaṃ pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2629_6: dhāraṇavaseneva āha, na lobhena, na hi khīṇāsavānaṃ lobho atthi. Nippīḷiyamānāti
atk-vin01a0:2630: Antaravāsakaṃ datvā upassayaṃ agamāsīti saṅkaccikaṃ nivāsetvā yathā tassa manoratho na pūrati, evaṃ hatthataleyeva dassetvā agamāsi.
atk-vin01a0:2631: 510. Kasmā pārivattakacīvaraṃ appaṭigaṇhante ujjhāyiṃsu? “Sace ettakopi amhesu ayyānaṃ vissāso natthi, kathaṃ mayaṃ yāpessāmā”ti vihatthatāya samabhitunnattā.
atk-vin01a0:2632: Anujānāmi bhikkhave imesaṃ pañcannanti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ samasaddhānaṃ samasīlānaṃ samadiṭṭhīnaṃ pārivattakaṃ gahetuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2633_0: 512. Payoge dukkaṭanti gahaṇatthāya hatthappasāraṇādīsu dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭilābhenāti paṭiggahaṇena.
atk-vin01a0:2633_1: Tattha ca hatthena vā hatthe detu, pādamūle vā ṭhapetu, upari vā khipatu, so ce sādiyati,
atk-vin01a0:2633_2: gahitameva hoti. Sace pana sikkhamānāsāmaṇerasāmaṇerīupāsakaupāsikādīnaṃ hatthe pesitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2633_3: paṭiggaṇhāti, anāpatti. Dhammakathaṃ kathentassa catassopi parisā cīvarāni ca nānāvirāgavatthāni
atk-vin01a0:2633_4: ca ānetvā pādamūle ṭhapenti, upacāre vā ṭhatvā upacāraṃ vā muñcitvā khipanti, yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2633_5: tattha bhikkhunīnaṃ santakaṃ, taṃ aññatra pārivattakā gaṇhantassa āpattiyeva. Atha
atk-vin01a0:2633_6: pana rattibhāge khittāni honti, “idaṃ bhikkhuniyā, idaṃ aññesa”nti ñātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-vin01a0:2633_7: pārivattakakiccaṃ natthīti mahāpaccariyaṃ kurundiyañca vuttaṃ, taṃ acittakabhāvena
atk-vin01a0:2633_8: na sameti. Sace bhikkhunī vassāvāsikaṃ deti, pārivattakameva kātabbaṃ. Sace pana
atk-vin01a0:2633_9: saṅkārakūṭādīsu ṭhapeti, “paṃsukūlaṃ gaṇhissantī”ti paṃsukūlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2634_0: 513. Aññātikāya aññātikasaññīti tikapācittiyaṃ. Ekato upasampannāyāti bhikkhunīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2634_1: santike upasampannāya hatthato gaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ, bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannāya pana pācittiyameva.
atk-vin01a0:2635_1: vā mahagghaṃ cetāpetvā sacepi cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, anāpatti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:2635_2: “antamaso harītakīkhaṇḍenāpī”ti vuttaṃ. Vipulena vā parittanti idaṃ vuttavipallāsena
atk-vin01a0:2635_3: veditabbaṃ. Aññaṃ parikkhāranti pattatthavikādiṃ yaṃ kiñci vikappanupagapacchimacīvarappamāṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2635_4: pana paṭaparissāvanampi na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ neva adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ na vikappanupagaṃ taṃ
atk-vin01a0:2635_5: sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Sacepi mañcappamāṇā bhisicchavi hoti, vaṭṭatiyeva; ko pana vādo pattatthavikādīsu.
atk-vin01a0:2636: Samuṭṭhānādīsu idaṃ chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyākiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃvacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2639_0: 515. Tena samayenāti aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha upanando sakyaputtoti asītisahassamattānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2639_1: sakyakulā pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ patikiṭṭho lolajātiko. Paṭṭoti cheko samattho paṭibalo
atk-vin01a0:2639_2: sarasampanno kaṇṭhamādhuriyena samannāgato. Kismiṃ viyāti kiṃsu viya kileso viya,
atk-vin01a0:2639_3: hirottappavasena kampanaṃ viya saṅkampanaṃ viya hotīti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2640_0: Addhānamagganti addhānasaṅkhātaṃ dīghamaggaṃ, na nagaravīthimagganti attho. Te bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:2640_1: acchindiṃsūti musiṃsu, pattacīvarāni nesaṃ hariṃsūti attho. Anuyuñjāhīti bhikkhubhāvajānanatthāya
atk-vin01a0:2640_3: Etamatthaṃ ārocesunti bhikkhubhāvaṃ jānāpetvā yo “sāketā sāvatthiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā”tiādinā
atk-vin01a0:2641_0: 517. Aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vātiādīsu yaṃ parato “tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2641_1: vuttaṃ, taṃ ādiṃ katvā evaṃ anupubbakathā veditabbā. Sace core passitvā daharā pattacīvarāni
atk-vin01a0:2641_2: gahetvā palātā, corā therānaṃ nivāsanapārupanamattaṃyeva haritvā gacchanti, therehi
atk-vin01a0:2641_3: neva tāva cīvaraṃ viññāpetabbaṃ, na sākhāpalāsaṃ bhañjitabbaṃ. Atha daharā sabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2641_4: bhaṇḍakaṃ chaḍḍetvā palātā, corā therānaṃ nivāsanapārupanaṃ tañca bhaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:2641_5: gacchanti, daharehi āgantvā attano nivāsanapārupanāni na tāva therānaṃ dātabbāni,
atk-vin01a0:2641_6: na hi anacchinnacīvarā attano atthāya sākhāpalāsaṃ bhañjituṃ labhanti, acchinnacīvarānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2641_7: pana atthāya labhanti, acchinnacīvarāva attanopi paresampi atthāya labhanti. Tasmā
atk-vin01a0:2641_8: therehi vā sākhāpalāsaṃ bhañjitvā vākādīhi ganthetvā daharānaṃ dātabbaṃ, daharehi
atk-vin01a0:2641_9: vā therānaṃ atthāya bhañjitvā ganthetvā tesaṃ hatthe datvā vā adatvā vā attanā nivāsetvā
atk-vin01a0:2641_10: attano nivāsanapārupanāni therānaṃ dātabbāni, neva bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2642_0: Sace antarāmagge rajakattharaṇaṃ vā hoti, aññe vā tādise manusse passanti, cīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2642_1: viññāpetabbaṃ. Yāni ca nesaṃ te vā viññattamanussā aññe vā sākhāpalāsanivāsane bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:2642_2: disvā ussāhajātā vatthāni denti, tāni sadasāni vā hontu adasāni vā nīlādinānāvaṇṇāni
atk-vin01a0:2642_3: vā kappiyānipi akappiyānipi sabbāni acchinnacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitattā tesaṃ nivāsetuñca
