atk-vin01a0:2648_0: Ayañhi pañho acchinnacīvarakaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vutto. Atha pana titthiyehi sahagacchanti,
atk-vin01a0:2648_1: te ca nesaṃ kusacīravākacīraphalakacīrāni denti, tānipi laddhiṃ aggahetvā nivāsetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2649_0: Idāni “yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ upagacchati, sace tattha hoti saṅghassa vihāracīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2649_1: vā”tiādīsu vihāracīvaraṃ nāma manussā āvāsaṃ kāretvā “cattāropi paccayā amhākaṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:2649_2: santakā paribhogaṃ gacchantū”ti ticīvaraṃ sajjetvā attanā kārāpite āvāse ṭhapenti,
atk-vin01a0:2649_3: etaṃ vihāracīvaraṃ nāma. Uttarattharaṇanti mañcakassa upari attharaṇakaṃ vuccati.
atk-vin01a0:2649_4: Bhumattharaṇanti parikammakatāya bhūmiyā rakkhaṇatthaṃ cimilikāhi kataattharaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2649_5: tassa upari taṭṭikaṃ pattharitvā caṅkamanti. Bhisicchavīti mañcabhisiyā vā pīṭhabhisiyā
atk-vin01a0:2649_6: vā chavi, sace pūritā hoti vidhunitvāpi gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Evametesu vihāracīvarādīsu
atk-vin01a0:2649_7: yaṃ tattha āvāse hoti, taṃ anāpucchāpi gahetvā nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ vā acchinnacīvarakānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2649_8: bhikkhūnaṃ labbhatīti veditabbaṃ. Tañca kho labhitvā odahissāmi puna ṭhapessāmīti
atk-vin01a0:2649_9: adhippāyena na mūlacchejjāya. Labhitvā ca pana ñātito vā upaṭṭhākato vā aññato vā
atk-vin01a0:2649_10: kutoci pākatikameva kātabbaṃ. Videsagatena ekasmiṃ saṅghike āvāse saṅghikaparibhogena
atk-vin01a0:2649_11: paribhuñjanatthāya ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sacassa paribhogeneva taṃ jīrati vā nassati vā gīvā
atk-vin01a0:2649_12: na hoti. Sace pana etesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ gihivatthādīnaṃ bhisicchavipariyantānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2649_13: kiñci na labbhati, tena tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabbanti.
atk-vin01a0:2650_0: 519. Yehi kehici vā acchinnanti ettha yampi acchinnacīvarā ācariyupajjhāyā aññe “āharatha,
atk-vin01a0:2650_1: āvuso, cīvara”nti yācitvā vā vissāsena vā gaṇhanti, tampi saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti vattuṃ yujjati.
atk-vin01a0:2651_0: Paribhogajiṇṇaṃ vāti ettha ca acchinnacīvarānaṃ ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ attanā tiṇapaṇṇehi
atk-vin01a0:2651_1: paṭicchādetvā dinnacīvarampi saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti vattuṃ yujjati. Evañhi te acchinnacīvaraṭṭhāne
atk-vin01a0:2651_2: naṭṭhacīvaraṭṭhāne ca ṭhitā bhavissanti, tena nesaṃ viññattiyaṃ akappiyacīvaraparibhoge
atk-vin01a0:2652_0: 521. Ñātakānaṃ pavāritānanti ettha “etesaṃ santakaṃ dethā”ti viññāpentassa yācantassa
atk-vin01a0:2652_1: anāpattīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Na hi ñātakapavāritānaṃ āpatti vā anāpatti vā hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2652_2: Attano dhanenāti etthāpi attano kappiyabhaṇḍena kappiyavohāreneva cīvaraṃ viññāpentassa
atk-vin01a0:2652_3: cetāpentassa parivattāpentassa anāpattīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Pavāritānanti ettha
atk-vin01a0:2652_4: ca saṅghavasena pavāritesu pamāṇameva vaṭṭati. Puggalikapavāraṇāya yaṃ yaṃ pavāreti,
atk-vin01a0:2652_5: taṃ taṃyeva viññāpetabbaṃ. Yo catūhi paccayehi pavāretvā sayameva sallakkhetvā kālānukālaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2652_6: cīvarāni divase divase yāgubhattādīnīti evaṃ yena yenattho taṃ taṃ deti, tassa viññāpanakiccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2652_7: natthi. Yo pana pavāretvā bālatāya vā satisammosena vā na deti, so viññāpetabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2652_8: Yo “mayhaṃ gehaṃ pavāremī”ti vadati, tassa gehaṃ gantvā yathāsukhaṃ nisīditabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2652_9: nipajjitabbaṃ, na kiñci gahetabbaṃ. Yo pana “yaṃ mayhaṃ gehe atthi, taṃ pavāremī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2652_10: vadati. Yaṃ tattha kappiyaṃ, taṃ viññāpetabbaṃ, gehe pana nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ
atk-vin01a0:2653_0: Aññassatthāyāti ettha attano ñātakapavārite na kevalaṃ attano atthāya, atha kho aññassatthāya
atk-vin01a0:2653_1: viññāpentassa anāpattīti ayameko attho. Ayaṃ pana dutiyo aññassāti ye aññassa ñātakapavāritā,
atk-vin01a0:2653_2: te tasseva “aññassā”ti laddhavohārassa buddharakkhitassa vā dhammarakkhitassa vā
atk-vin01a0:2654: Samuṭṭhānādīsu idampi chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2657_0: 522-4. Tena samayenāti tatuttarisikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha abhihaṭṭhunti abhīti upasaggo,
atk-vin01a0:2657_1: haritunti attho, gaṇhitunti vuttaṃ hoti. Pavāreyyāti icchāpeyya, icchaṃ ruciṃ uppādeyya,
atk-vin01a0:2657_2: vadeyya nimanteyyāti attho. Abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārentena pana yathā vattabbaṃ, taṃ ākāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2657_3: dassetuṃ “yāvatakaṃ icchasi tāvatakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti evamassa padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ. Atha
atk-vin01a0:2657_4: vā yathā “nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato”ti ettha disvāti attho, evamidhāpi “abhiaṭṭhuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2657_5: pavāreyyā”ti abhiharitvā pavāreyyāti attho. Tattha kāyābhihāro vācābhihāroti duvidho
atk-vin01a0:2657_6: abhihāro, kāyena vā hi vatthāni abhiharitvā pādamūle ṭhapetvā “yattakaṃ icchasi tattakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2657_7: gaṇhāhī”ti vadanto pavāreyya, vācāya vā “amhākaṃ dussakoṭṭhāgāraṃ paripuṇṇaṃ, yattakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2657_8: icchasi tattakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vadanto pavāreyya, tadubhayampi ekajjhaṃ katvā “abhihaṭṭhuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2658_0: Santaruttaraparamanti saantaraṃ uttaraṃ paramaṃ assa cīvarassāti santaruttaraparamaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2658_1: nivāsanena saddhiṃ pārupanaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo assāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tato cīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2658_2: sāditabbanti tato abhihaṭacīvarato ettakaṃ cīvaraṃ gahetabbaṃ, na ito paranti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2658_3: Yasmā pana acchinnasabbacīvarena ticīvarikeneva bhikkhunā evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ, aññena
atk-vin01a0:2658_4: aññathāpi, tasmā taṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “sace tīṇi naṭṭhāni hontī”tiādinā nayenassa
atk-vin01a0:2659_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – yassa tīṇi naṭṭhāni, tena dve sāditabbāni, ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2659_1: pārupitvā aññaṃ sabhāgaṭṭhānato pariyesissati. Yassa dve naṭṭhāni, tena ekaṃ sāditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2659_2: Sace pakatiyāva santaruttarena carati, dve sāditabbāni. Evaṃ ekaṃ sādiyanteneva samo
atk-vin01a0:2659_3: bhavissati. Yassa tīsu ekaṃ naṭṭhaṃ, na sāditabbaṃ. Yassa pana dvīsu ekaṃ naṭṭhaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2659_4: ekaṃ sāditabbaṃ. Yassa ekaṃyeva hoti, tañca naṭṭhaṃ, dve sāditabbāni. Bhikkhuniyā
atk-vin01a0:2659_5: pana pañcasupi naṭṭhesu dve sāditabbāni. Catūsu naṭṭhesu ekaṃ sāditabbaṃ, tīsu naṭṭhesu
atk-vin01a0:2659_6: kiñci na sāditabbaṃ, ko pana vādo dvīsu vā ekasmiṃ vā. Yena kenaci hi santaruttaraparamatāya
atk-vin01a0:2659_7: ṭhātabbaṃ, tato uttari na labbhatīti idamettha lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2660_0: 526. Sesakaṃ āharissāmīti dve cīvarāni katvā sesaṃ puna āharissāmīti attho. Na acchinnakāraṇāti
atk-vin01a0:2660_1: bāhusaccādiguṇavasena denti. Ñātakānantiādīsu ñātakānaṃ dentānaṃ sādiyantassa pavāritānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2660_2: dentānaṃ sādiyantassa attano dhanena sādiyantassa anāpattīti attho. Aṭṭhakathāsu
atk-vin01a0:2660_3: pana “ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne pakatiyā bahumpi vaṭṭati, acchinnakāraṇā pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2660_4: vuttaṃ. Taṃ pāḷiyā na sameti. Yasmā panidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:2660_5: paññattaṃ, tasmā idha “aññassatthāyā”ti na vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2661: Samuṭṭhānādīsu idampi chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2664_0: 527. Tena samayenāti upakkhaṭasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha atthāvuso maṃ so upaṭṭhākoti āvuso,
atk-vin01a0:2664_1: yaṃ tvaṃ bhaṇasi, atthi evarūpo so mama upaṭṭhākoti ayamettha attho. Api meyya evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2664_2: hotīti api me ayya evaṃ hoti, api mayyā evantipi pāṭho.
atk-vin01a0:2665_0: 528-9. Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissāti ettha uddissāti apadissa ārabbha. Yasmā pana yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2665_1: uddissa upakkhaṭaṃ hoti, taṃ tassatthāya upakkhaṭaṃ nāma hoti. Tasmāssa padabhājane
atk-vin01a0:2666_0: Bhikkhuṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvāti bhikkhuṃ paccayaṃ katvā, yañhi bhikkhuṃ uddissa upakkhaṭaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2666_1: taṃ niyameneva bhikkhuṃ paccayaṃ katvā upakkhaṭaṃ hoti, tena vuttaṃ – “bhikkhuṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2666_2: karitvā”ti. Paccayopi hi “labhati māro ārammaṇa”ntiādīsu ārammaṇanti āgato. Idāni
atk-vin01a0:2666_3: “uddissā”ti ettha yo kattā, tassa ākāradassanatthaṃ “bhikkhuṃ acchādetukāmo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2666_4: Bhikkhuṃ acchādetukāmena hi tena taṃ uddissa upakkhaṭaṃ, na aññena kāraṇena. Iti
atk-vin01a0:2666_5: so acchādetukāmo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “bhikkhuṃ acchādetukāmo”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2667_0: Aññātakassa gahapatissa vāti aññātakena gahapatinā vāti attho. Karaṇatthe hi idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2667_1: sāmivacanaṃ. Padabhājane pana byañjanaṃ avicāretvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ “aññātako
atk-vin01a0:2668_0: Cīvaracetāpannanti cīvaramūlaṃ, taṃ pana yasmā hiraññādīsu aññataraṃ hoti, tasmā
atk-vin01a0:2668_1: padabhājane “hiraññaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Upakkhaṭaṃ hotīti sajjitaṃ hoti, saṃharitvā
atk-vin01a0:2668_2: ṭhapitaṃ, yasmā pana “hiraññaṃ vā”tiādinā vacanenassa upakkhaṭabhāvo dassito hoti,
atk-vin01a0:2668_3: tasmā “upakkhaṭaṃ nāmā”ti padaṃ uddharitvā visuṃ padabhājanaṃ na vuttaṃ. Imināti
atk-vin01a0:2668_4: upakkhaṭaṃ sandhāyāha, tenevassa padabhājane “paccupaṭṭhitenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yañhi upakkhaṭaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2668_5: saṃharitvā ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hotīti. Acchādessāmīti vohāravacanametaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2668_6: “itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dassāmī”ti ayaṃ panettha attho. Tenevassa padabhājanepi “dassāmī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2669_0: Tatra ce so bhikkhūti yatra so gahapati vā gahapatānī vā tatra so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito
atk-vin01a0:2669_1: upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya ceti ayamettha padasambandho. Tattha upasaṅkamitvāti
atk-vin01a0:2669_2: imassa gantvāti imināva atthe siddhe pacuravohāravasena “ghara”nti vuttaṃ. Yatra
atk-vin01a0:2669_3: pana so dāyako tatra gantvāti ayamevettha attho, tasmā punapi vuttaṃ “yattha katthaci
atk-vin01a0:2669_4: upasaṅkamitvā”ti. Vikappaṃ āpajjeyyāti visiṭṭhakappaṃ adhikavidhānaṃ āpajjeyya, padabhājane
atk-vin01a0:2669_5: pana yenākārena vikappaṃ āpanno hoti tameva dassetuṃ “āyataṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sādhūti
atk-vin01a0:2669_6: āyācane nipāto. Vatāti parivitakke. Manti attānaṃ niddisati. Āyasmāti paraṃ ālapati
atk-vin01a0:2669_7: āmanteti. Yasmā panidaṃ sabbaṃ byañjanamattameva, uttānatthameva, tasmāssa padabhājane
atk-vin01a0:2669_8: attho na vutto. Kalyāṇakamyataṃ upādāyāti sundarakāmataṃ visiṭṭhakāmataṃ cittena
atk-vin01a0:2669_9: gahetvā, tassa “āpajjeyya ce”ti iminā sambandho. Yasmā pana yo kalyāṇakamyataṃ upādāya
atk-vin01a0:2669_10: āpajjati, so sādhatthiko mahagghatthiko hoti, tasmāssa padabhājane byañjanaṃ pahāya
atk-vin01a0:2669_11: adhippetatthameva dassetuṃ tadeva vacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana na imassa āpajjanamatteneva
atk-vin01a0:2669_12: āpatti sīsaṃ eti, tasmā “tassa vacanenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2670_0: 531. Anāpatti ñātakānantiādīsu ñātakānaṃ cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa anāpattīti
atk-vin01a0:2670_1: evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Mahagghaṃ cetāpetukāmassa appagghaṃ cetāpetīti gahapatissa vīsatiagghanakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2670_2: cīvaraṃ cetāpetukāmassa “alaṃ mayhaṃ etena, dasagghanakaṃ vā aṭṭhagghanakaṃ vā dehī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2670_3: vadati anāpatti. Appagghanti idañca atirekanivāraṇatthameva vuttaṃ, samakepi pana
atk-vin01a0:2670_4: anāpatti, tañca kho agghavaseneva na pamāṇavasena, agghavaḍḍhanakañhi idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2670_5: Tasmā yo vīsatiagghanakaṃ antaravāsakaṃ cetāpetukāmo, “taṃ ettakameva me agghanakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2670_6: cīvaraṃ dehī”ti vattumpi vaṭṭati. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2674_0: 532. Dutiyaupakkhaṭepi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Tañhi imassa anupaññattisadisaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2674_1: Kevalaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpade ekassa pīḷā katā, dutiye dvinnaṃ, ayamevettha viseso. Sesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2674_2: sabbaṃ paṭhamasadisameva. Yathā ca dvinnaṃ, evaṃ bahūnaṃ pīḷaṃ katvā gaṇhatopi āpatti veditabbāti.
atk-vin01a0:2677_0: 537. Tena samayenāti rājasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha upāsakaṃ saññāpetvāti jānāpetvā, “iminā
atk-vin01a0:2677_1: mūlena cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā therassa dehī”ti evaṃ vatvāti adhippāyo. Paññāsabandhoti paññāsakahāpaṇadaṇḍoti
atk-vin01a0:2677_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Paññāsaṃ baddhotipi pāṭho, paññāsaṃ jito paññāsaṃ dāpetabboti adhippāyo.
atk-vin01a0:2677_3: Ajjaṇho, bhante, āgamehīti bhante, ajja ekadivasaṃ amhākaṃ tiṭṭha, adhivāsehīti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2678: 538-9. Rājabhoggoti rājato bhoggaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ assatthīti rājabhoggo, rājabhogotipi pāṭho, rājato bhogo assa atthīti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2679_0: Pahiṇeyyāti peseyya, uttānatthattā panassa padabhājanaṃ na vuttaṃ. Yathā ca etassa,
atk-vin01a0:2679_1: evaṃ “cīvaraṃ itthannāmaṃ bhikkhu”ntiādīnampi padānaṃ uttānatthattāyeva padabhājanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2679_2: na vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ābhatanti ānītaṃ. Kālena kappiyanti yuttapattakālena, yadā
atk-vin01a0:2679_3: no attho hoti, tadā kappiyaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhāmāti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2680_0: Veyyāvaccakaroti kiccakaro, kappiyakārakoti attho. Saññatto so mayāti āṇatto so mayā,
atk-vin01a0:2680_1: yathā tumhākaṃ cīvarena atthe sati cīvaraṃ dassati, evaṃ vuttoti attho. Attho me
atk-vin01a0:2680_2: āvuso cīvarenāti codanālakkhaṇanidassanametaṃ, idañhi vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ, assa vā
atk-vin01a0:2680_3: attho yāya kāyaci bhāsāya; idaṃ codanālakkhaṇaṃ. “Dehi me cīvara”ntiādīni pana navattabbākāradassanatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2680_4: vuttāni, etāni hi vacanāni etesaṃ vā attho yāya kāyaci bhāsāya na vattabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2681_0: Dutiyampi vattabbo tatiyampi vattabboti “attho me āvuso cīvarenā”ti idameva yāvatatiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2681_1: vattabboti. Evaṃ “dvattikkhattuṃ codetabbo sāretabbo”ti ettha uddiṭṭhacodanāparicchedaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2681_2: dassetvā idāni “dvattikkhattuṃ codayamāno sārayamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya,
atk-vin01a0:2681_3: iccetaṃ kusala”nti imesaṃ padānaṃ saṅkhepato atthaṃ dassento “sace abhinipphādeti,
atk-vin01a0:2681_4: iccetaṃ kusala”nti āha. Evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ codento taṃ cīvaraṃ yadi nipphādeti, sakkoti
atk-vin01a0:2681_5: attano paṭilābhavasena nipphādetuṃ, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ sādhu suṭṭhu sundaraṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2682_0: Catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbanti ṭhānalakkhaṇanidassanametaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2682_1: Chakkhattuparamanti ca bhāvanapuṃsakavacanametaṃ, chakkhattuparamañhi etena cīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2682_2: uddissa tuṇhībhūtena ṭhātabbaṃ, na aññaṃ kiñci kātabbaṃ, idaṃ ṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ. Tattha
atk-vin01a0:2682_3: yo sabbaṭṭhānānaṃ sādhāraṇo tuṇhībhāvo, taṃ tāva dassetuṃ padabhājane “tattha gantvā
atk-vin01a0:2682_4: tuṇhībhūtenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha na āsane nisīditabbanti “idha, bhante, nisīdathā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2682_5: vuttenāpi na nisīditabbaṃ. Na āmisaṃ paṭiggahetabbanti yāgukhajjakādibhedaṃ kiñci
atk-vin01a0:2682_6: āmisaṃ “gaṇhatha, bhante”ti yāciyamānenāpi na gaṇhitabbaṃ. Na dhammo bhāsitabboti
atk-vin01a0:2682_7: maṅgalaṃ vā anumodanaṃ vā bhāsathāti yāciyamānenāpi kiñci na bhāsitabbaṃ, kevalaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2682_8: “kiṃ kāraṇā āgatosī”ti pucchiyamānena “jānāsi, āvuso”ti vattabbo. Pucchiyamānoti
atk-vin01a0:2682_9: idañhi karaṇatthe paccattavacanaṃ. Atha vā pucchaṃ kurumāno pucchiyamānoti evampettha
atk-vin01a0:2682_10: attho daṭṭhabbo. Yo hi pucchaṃ karoti, so ettakaṃ vattabboti ṭhānaṃ bhañjatīti āgatakāraṇaṃ bhañjati.
atk-vin01a0:2683_0: Idāni yā tisso codanā, cha ca ṭhānāni vuttāni. Tattha vuḍḍhiñca hāniñca dassento
atk-vin01a0:2683_1: “catukkhattuṃ codetvā”tiādimāha. Yasmā ca ettha ekacodanāvuḍḍhiyā dvinnaṃ ṭhānānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2683_2: hāni vuttā, tasmā “ekā codanā diguṇaṃ ṭhāna”nti lakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Iti iminā
atk-vin01a0:2683_3: lakkhaṇena tikkhattuṃ codetvā chakkhattuṃ ṭhātabbaṃ, dvikkhattuṃ codetvā aṭṭhakkhattuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2683_4: ṭhātabbaṃ, sakiṃ codetvā dasakkhattuṃ ṭhātabbanti. Yathā ca “chakkhattuṃ codetvā
atk-vin01a0:2683_5: na ṭhātabba”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ “dvādasakkhattuṃ ṭhatvā na codetabba”ntipi vuttameva
atk-vin01a0:2683_6: hoti. Tasmā sace codetiyeva na tiṭṭhati, cha codanā labbhanti. Sace tiṭṭhatiyeva
atk-vin01a0:2683_7: na codeti, dvādasa ṭhānāni labbhanti. Sace codetipi tiṭṭhatipi, ekāya codanāya dve
atk-vin01a0:2683_8: ṭhānāni hāpetabbāni. Tattha yo ekadivasameva punappunaṃ gantvā chakkhattuṃ codeti,
atk-vin01a0:2683_9: sakiṃyeva vā gantvā “attho me, āvuso, cīvarenā”ti chakkhattuṃ vadati. Tathā ekadivasameva
atk-vin01a0:2683_10: punappunaṃ gantvā dvādasakkhattuṃ tiṭṭhati, sakiṃyeva vā gantvā tatra tatra ṭhāne
atk-vin01a0:2683_11: tiṭṭhati, sopi sabbacodanāyo sabbaṭṭhānāni ca bhañjati. Ko pana vādo nānādivasesu
atk-vin01a0:2684_0: Yatassa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhatanti yato rājato vā rājabhoggato vā assa bhikkhuno
atk-vin01a0:2684_1: cīvaracetāpannaṃ ānītaṃ. Yatvassātipi pāṭho. Ayamevattho. “Yatthassā”tipi paṭhanti,
atk-vin01a0:2684_2: yasmiṃ ṭhāne assa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pesitanti ca atthaṃ kathenti, byañjanaṃ pana na
atk-vin01a0:2684_3: sameti. Tatthāti tassa rañño vā rājabhoggassa vā santike; samīpatthe hi idaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2684_4: Na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhotīti taṃ cīvaracetāpannaṃ tassa bhikkhuno
atk-vin01a0:2684_5: kiñci appamattakampi kammaṃ na nipphādeti. Yuñjantāyasmanto sakanti āyasmanto attano
atk-vin01a0:2684_6: santakaṃ dhanaṃ pāpuṇantu. Mā vo sakaṃ vinassāti tumhākaṃ santakaṃ mā vinassatu.
atk-vin01a0:2684_7: Yo pana neva sāmaṃ gacchati, na dūtaṃ pāheti, vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin01a0:2685_0: Kiṃ pana sabbakappiyakārakesu evaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti? Na paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Ayañhi
atk-vin01a0:2685_1: kappiyakārako nāma saṅkhepato duvidho niddiṭṭho ca aniddiṭṭho ca. Tattha niddiṭṭho
atk-vin01a0:2685_2: duvidho – bhikkhunā niddiṭṭho, dūtena niddiṭṭhoti. Aniddiṭṭhopi duvidho – mukhavevaṭika
atk-vin01a0:2685_3: kappiyakārako, parammukhakappiyakārakoti. Tesu bhikkhunā niddiṭṭho sammukhāsammukhavasena
atk-vin01a0:2686_0: Kathaṃ? Idhekacco bhikkhussa cīvaratthāya dūtena akappiyavatthuṃ pahiṇati, dūto taṃ
atk-vin01a0:2686_1: bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā “idaṃ, bhante, itthannāmena tumhākaṃ cīvaratthāya pahitaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2686_2: gaṇhatha na”nti vadati, bhikkhu “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti paṭikkhipati, dūto “atthi pana
atk-vin01a0:2686_3: te, bhante, veyyāvaccakaro”ti pucchati, puññatthikehi ca upāsakehi “bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2686_4: karothā”ti āṇattā vā, bhikkhūnaṃ vā sandiṭṭhā sambhattā keci veyyāvaccakarā honti,
atk-vin01a0:2686_5: tesaṃ aññataro tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhussa santike nisinno hoti, bhikkhu taṃ niddisati
atk-vin01a0:2686_6: “ayaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti. Dūto tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “therassa
atk-vin01a0:2686_7: cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti gacchati, ayaṃ bhikkhunā sammukhāniddiṭṭho.
atk-vin01a0:2687_0: No ce bhikkhussa santike nisinno hoti, apica kho bhikkhu niddisati – “asukasmiṃ nāma
atk-vin01a0:2687_1: gāme itthannāmo bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti, so gantvā tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2687_2: datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dadeyyāsī”ti āgantvā bhikkhussa ārocetvā gacchati,
atk-vin01a0:2688_0: Na heva kho so dūto attanā āgantvā āroceti, apica kho aññaṃ pahiṇati “dinnaṃ mayā,
atk-vin01a0:2688_1: bhante, tassa hatthe cīvaracetāpannaṃ, cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti, ayaṃ dutiyo bhikkhunā asammukhāniddiṭṭho.
atk-vin01a0:2689_0: Na heva kho aññaṃ pahiṇati, apica kho gacchantova bhikkhuṃ vadati “ahaṃ tassa hatthe
atk-vin01a0:2689_1: cīvaracetāpannaṃ dassāmi, tumhe cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti, ayaṃ tatiyo bhikkhunā asammukhāniddiṭṭhoti
atk-vin01a0:2689_2: evaṃ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho tayo asammukhāniddiṭṭhāti ime cattāro bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhaveyyāvaccakarā
atk-vin01a0:2689_3: nāma. Etesu imasmiṃ rājasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2690_0: Aparo bhikkhu purimanayeneva dūtena pucchito natthitāya vā, avicāretukāmatāya vā
atk-vin01a0:2690_1: “natthamhākaṃ kappiyakārako”ti vadati, tasmiñca khaṇe koci manusso āgacchati, dūto
atk-vin01a0:2690_2: tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “imassa hatthato cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā
atk-vin01a0:2691_0: Aparo dūto gāmaṃ pavisitvā attanā abhirucitassa kassaci hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā
atk-vin01a0:2691_1: purimanayeneva āgantvā āroceti, aññaṃ vā pahiṇati, “ahaṃ asukassa nāma hatthe cīvaracetāpannaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2691_2: dassāmi, tumhe cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā vā gacchati, ayaṃ tatiyo dūtena asammukhāniddiṭṭhoti
atk-vin01a0:2691_3: evaṃ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho, tayo asammukhāniddiṭṭhāti ime cattāro dūtena niddiṭṭhaveyyāvaccakarā
atk-vin01a0:2691_4: nāma. Etesu meṇḍakasikkhāpade vuttanayena paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “santi,
atk-vin01a0:2691_5: bhikkhave, manussā saddhā pasannā, te kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe hiraññaṃ upanikkhipanti
atk-vin01a0:2691_6: – ‘iminā ayyassa yaṃ kappiyaṃ taṃ dethā’ti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ tato kappiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2691_7: taṃ sādituṃ, na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2691_8: pariyesitabbanti vadāmī”ti. Ettha ca codanāya pamāṇaṃ natthi, mūlaṃ asādiyantena
atk-vin01a0:2691_9: sahassakkhattumpi codanāya vā ṭhānena vā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ sādituṃ vaṭṭati. No ce deti,
atk-vin01a0:2691_10: aññaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetvāpi āharāpetabbaṃ. Sace icchati mūlasāmikānampi kathetabbaṃ;
atk-vin01a0:2692_0: Aparo bhikkhu purimanayeneva dūtena pucchito “natthamhākaṃ kappiyakārako”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a0:2692_1: tadañño samīpe ṭhito sutvā “āhara bho ahaṃ ayyassa cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā dassāmī”ti vadati.
atk-vin01a0:2692_2: Dūto “handa bho dadeyyāsī”ti tassa hatthe datvā bhikkhussa anārocetvāva gacchati,
atk-vin01a0:2692_3: ayaṃ mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako. Aparo bhikkhuno upaṭṭhākassa vā aññassa vā hatthe
atk-vin01a0:2692_4: akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ dadeyyāsī”ti ettova pakkamati, ayaṃ parammukhakappiyakārakoti
atk-vin01a0:2692_5: ime dve aniddiṭṭhakappiyakārakā nāma. Etesu aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2692_6: Sace sayameva cīvaraṃ ānetvā dadanti, gahetabbaṃ. No ce, kiñci na vattabbā. Desanāmattameva
atk-vin01a0:2692_7: cetaṃ “dūtena cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇeyyā”ti sayaṃ āharitvāpi piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya
atk-vin01a0:2692_8: dadantesupi eseva nayo. Na kevalañca attanoyeva atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a0:2692_9: sacepi koci jātarūparajataṃ ānetvā “idaṃ saṅghassa dammi, ārāmaṃ vā karotha cetiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2692_10: vā bhojanasālādīnaṃ vā aññatara”nti vadati, idampi sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati. Yassa
atk-vin01a0:2692_11: kassaci hi aññassatthāya sampaṭicchantassa dukkaṭaṃ hotīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2693_0: Sace pana “nayidaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitte “vaḍḍhakīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2693_1: vā kammakarānaṃ vā hatthe bhavissati, kevalaṃ tumhe sukatadukkaṭaṃ jānāthā”ti vatvā
atk-vin01a0:2693_2: tesaṃ hatthe datvā pakkamati, vaṭṭati. Athāpi “mama manussānaṃ hatthe bhavissati
atk-vin01a0:2693_3: mayhameva vā hatthe bhavissati, kevalaṃ tumhe yaṃ yassa dātabbaṃ, tadatthāya peseyyāthā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2694_0: Sace pana saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā puggalaṃ vā anāmasitvā “idaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ cetiyassa
atk-vin01a0:2694_1: dema, vihārassa dema, navakammassa demā”ti vadanti, paṭikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati. “Ime
atk-vin01a0:2694_2: idaṃ bhaṇantī”ti kappiyakārakānaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. “Cetiyādīnaṃ atthāya tumhe gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:2694_3: ṭhapethā”ti vuttena pana “amhākaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2695_0: Sace pana koci bahuṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ ānetvā “idaṃ saṅghassa dammi, cattāro paccaye
atk-vin01a0:2695_1: paribhuñjathā”ti vadati, taṃ ce saṅgho sampaṭicchati, paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2695_2: Tatra ce eko bhikkhu “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti paṭikkhipati, upāsako ca “yadi na kappati,
atk-vin01a0:2695_3: mayhameva bhavissatī”ti gacchati. So bhikkhu “tayā saṅghassa lābhantarāyo kato”ti
atk-vin01a0:2695_4: na kenaci kiñci vattabbo. Yo hi taṃ codeti, sveva sāpattiko hoti, tena pana ekena
atk-vin01a0:2695_5: bahū anāpattikā katā. Sace pana bhikkhūhi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitte “kappiyakārakānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2695_6: vā hatthe bhavissati, mama purisānaṃ vā mayhaṃ vā hatthe bhavissati, kevalaṃ tumhe
atk-vin01a0:2696_0: Catupaccayatthāya ca dinnaṃ yena yena paccayena attho hoti, tadatthaṃ upanetabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2696_1: cīvaratthāya dinnaṃ cīvareyeva upanetabbaṃ. Sace cīvarena tādiso attho natthi, piṇḍapātādīhi
atk-vin01a0:2696_2: saṅgho kilamati, saṅghasuṭṭhutāya apaloketvā tadatthāyapi upanetabbaṃ. Esa nayo piṇḍapātagilānapaccayatthāya
atk-vin01a0:2696_3: dinnepi, senāsanatthāya dinnaṃ pana senāsanassa garubhaṇḍattā senāsaneyeva upanetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2696_4: Sace pana bhikkhūsu senāsanaṃ chaḍḍetvā gatesu senāsanaṃ vinassati, īdise kāle senāsanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2696_5: vissajjetvāpi bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogo anuññāto, tasmā senāsanajagganatthaṃ mūlacchejjaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2697_0: Na kevalañca hiraññasuvaṇṇameva, aññampi khettavatthādi akappiyaṃ na sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2697_1: Sace hi koci “mayhaṃ tisassasampādanakaṃ mahātaḷākaṃ atthi, taṃ saṅghassa dammī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2697_2: vadati, taṃ ce saṅgho sampaṭicchati, paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpattiyeva. Yo pana
atk-vin01a0:2697_3: taṃ paṭikkhipati, so purimanayeneva na kenaci kiñci vattabbo. Yo hi taṃ codeti, sveva
atk-vin01a0:2697_4: sāpattiko hoti, tena pana ekena bahū anāpattikā katā.
atk-vin01a0:2698_0: Yo pana “tādisaṃyeva taḷākaṃ dammī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitto
atk-vin01a0:2698_1: vadati “asukañca asukañca saṅghassa taḷākaṃ atthi, taṃ kathaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So vattabbo
atk-vin01a0:2698_2: – “kappiyaṃ katvā dinnaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Kathaṃ dinnaṃ kappiyaṃ hotīti? “Cattāro paccaye
atk-vin01a0:2698_3: paribhuñjathā”ti vatvā dinnanti. So sace “sādhu, bhante, cattāro paccaye saṅgho paribhuñjatū”ti
atk-vin01a0:2698_4: deti, vaṭṭati. Athāpi “taḷākaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitto “kappiyakārako
atk-vin01a0:2698_5: atthī”ti pucchitvā “natthī”ti vutte “idaṃ asuko nāma vicāressati, asukassa vā hatthe,
atk-vin01a0:2698_6: mayhaṃ vā hatthe bhavissati, saṅgho kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ paribhuñjatū”ti vadati, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2698_7: Sacepi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitto “udakaṃ paribhuñjissati, bhaṇḍakaṃ dhovissati,
atk-vin01a0:2698_8: migapakkhino pivissantī”ti vadati, evampi vaṭṭati. Athāpi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhitto
atk-vin01a0:2698_9: vadati “kappiyasīsena gaṇhathā”ti. “Sādhu, upāsaka, saṅgho pānīyaṃ pivissati, bhaṇḍakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2698_10: dhovissati, migapakkhino pivissantī”ti vatvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2699_0: Athāpi “mama taḷākaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā saṅghassa dammī”ti “vutte, sādhu, upāsaka,
atk-vin01a0:2699_1: saṅgho pānīyaṃ pivissatī”tiādīni vatvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Yadi pana bhikkhūhi
atk-vin01a0:2699_2: hatthakammaṃ yācitvā sahatthena ca kappiyapathaviṃ khanitvā udakaparibhogatthāya
atk-vin01a0:2699_3: taḷākaṃ kāritaṃ hoti, taṃ ce nissāya sassaṃ nipphādetvā manussā vihāre kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2699_4: denti, vaṭṭati. Atha manussā eva saṅghassa upakāratthāya saṅghikabhūmiṃ khanitvā
atk-vin01a0:2699_5: taṃ nissāya nipphannasassato kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ denti, evampi vaṭṭati. “Amhākaṃ ekaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2699_6: kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapethā”ti vutte ca ṭhapetumpi labbhati. Atha pana te manussā rājabalinā
atk-vin01a0:2699_7: upaddutā pakkamanti, aññe paṭipajjanti, na ca bhikkhūnaṃ kiñci denti, udakaṃ vāretuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2699_8: labbhati. Tañca kho kasikammakāleyeva, na sassakāle. Sace te vadanti “nanu, bhante,
atk-vin01a0:2699_9: pubbepi manussā imaṃ nissāya sassaṃ akaṃsū”ti. Tato vattabbā – “te saṅghassa imañca
atk-vin01a0:2699_10: imañca upakāraṃ akaṃsu, idañcidañca kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ adaṃsū”ti. Sace vadanti – “mayampi
atk-vin01a0:2700_0: Sace pana koci abyatto akappiyavohārena taḷākaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti vā kāreti vā, taṃ bhikkhūhi
atk-vin01a0:2700_1: na paribhuñjitabbaṃ, taṃ nissāya laddhaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍampi akappiyameva. Sace bhikkhūhi
atk-vin01a0:2700_2: pariccattabhāvaṃ ñatvā sāmiko vā tassa puttadhītaro vā añño vā koci vaṃse uppanno
atk-vin01a0:2700_3: puna kappiyavohārena deti, vaṭṭati. Pacchinne kulavaṃse yo tassa janapadassa sāmiko,
atk-vin01a0:2700_4: so acchinditvā puna deti, cittalapabbate bhikkhunā nīhaṭaudakavāhakaṃ aḷanāgarājamahesī
atk-vin01a0:2701_1: ca kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Taṃ nissāya pana sassaṃ karonte disvā kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na
atk-vin01a0:2701_2: vaṭṭati. Yadi te sayameva kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ denti, gahetabbaṃ. No ce denti, na codetabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2701_3: na sāretabbaṃ. Paccayavasena paṭiggahitataḷāke kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Mattikuddharaṇapāḷibandhanādīni
atk-vin01a0:2701_4: pana kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace kappiyakārakā sayameva karonti, vaṭṭati. Abyattena pana
atk-vin01a0:2701_5: lajjibhikkhunā kārāpitesu kiñcāpi paṭiggahaṇe kappiyaṃ, bhikkhussa payogapaccayā
atk-vin01a0:2701_6: uppannena missakattā visagatapiṇḍapāto viya akappiyamaṃsarasamissakabhojanaṃ viya
atk-vin01a0:2702_0: Sace pana “udakassa okāso atthi, taḷākassa pāḷi thirā, yathā bahuṃ udakaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-vin01a0:2702_1: evaṃ karohi, tīrasamīpe udakaṃ karohī”ti evaṃ udakameva vicāreti, vaṭṭati. Uddhane
atk-vin01a0:2702_2: aggiṃ na pātenti, “udakakammaṃ labbhatu upāsakā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. “Sassaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:2702_3: āharathā”ti vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati. Sace pana taḷāke atibahuṃ udakaṃ disvā passato
atk-vin01a0:2702_4: vā piṭṭhito vā mātikaṃ nīharāpeti, vanaṃ chindāpetvā kedāre kārāpeti, porāṇakedāresu
atk-vin01a0:2702_5: vā pakatibhāgaṃ aggahetvā atirekaṃ gaṇhāti, navasasse vā akālasasse vā aparicchinnabhāge
atk-vin01a0:2702_6: “ettake kahāpaṇe dethā”ti kahāpaṇe uṭṭhāpeti, sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2703_0: Yo pana “kassatha vapathā”ti avatvā “ettakāya bhūmiyā, ettako nāma bhāgo”ti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2703_1: bhūmiṃ vā patiṭṭhapeti, “ettake bhūmibhāge amhehi sassaṃ kataṃ, ettakaṃ nāma bhāgaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2703_2: gaṇhathā”ti vadantesu kassakesu bhūmippamāṇaggahaṇatthaṃ rajjuyā vā daṇḍena vā mināti,
atk-vin01a0:2703_3: khale vā ṭhatvā rakkhati, khalato vā nīharāpeti, koṭṭhāgāre vā paṭisāmeti, tasseva taṃ akappiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2704_0: Sace kassakā kahāpaṇe āharitvā “ime saṅghassa āhaṭā”ti vadanti, aññataro ca bhikkhu
atk-vin01a0:2704_1: “na saṅgho kahāpaṇe khādatī”ti saññāya “ettakehi kahāpaṇehi sāṭake āhara, ettakehi
atk-vin01a0:2704_2: yāguādīni sampādehī”ti vadati. Yaṃ te āharanti, sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ. Kasmā? Kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā.
atk-vin01a0:2705_0: Sace dhaññaṃ āharitvā idaṃ saṅghassa āhaṭanti vadanti, aññataro ca bhikkhu purimanayeneva
atk-vin01a0:2705_1: “ettakehi vīhīhi idañcidañca āharathā”ti vadati. Yaṃ te āharanti, tasseva akappiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2706_0: Sace taṇḍulaṃ vā aparaṇṇaṃ vā āharitvā “idaṃ saṅghassa āhaṭa”nti vadanti, aññataro
atk-vin01a0:2706_1: ca bhikkhu purimanayeneva “ettakehi taṇḍulehi idañcidañca āharathā”ti vadati. Yaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2706_2: te āharanti, sabbesaṃ kappiyaṃ. Kasmā? Kappiyānaṃ taṇḍulādīnaṃ vicāritattā. Kayavikkayepi
atk-vin01a0:2707_0: Pubbe pana cittalapabbate eko bhikkhu catusāladvāre “aho vata sve saṅghassa ettakappamāṇe
atk-vin01a0:2707_1: pūve paceyyu”nti ārāmikānaṃ saññājananatthaṃ bhūmiyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ akāsi, taṃ disvā cheko
atk-vin01a0:2707_2: ārāmiko tatheva katvā dutiyadivase bheriyā ākoṭitāya sannipatite saṅghe pūvaṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:2707_3: saṅghattheraṃ āha – “bhante, amhehi ito pubbe neva pitūnaṃ na pitāmahānaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2707_4: sutapubbaṃ, ekena ayyena catussāladvāre pūvatthāya saññā katā, ito dāni pabhuti ayyā
atk-vin01a0:2707_5: attano attano cittānurūpaṃ vadantu, amhākampi phāsuvihāro bhavissatī”ti. Mahāthero
atk-vin01a0:2707_6: tatova nivatti, ekabhikkhunāpi pūvo na gahito. Evaṃ pubbe tatruppādampi na paribhuñjiṃsu. Tasmā –
atk-vin01a0:2710: Yo cāyaṃ taḷāke vutto, pokkharaṇī-udakavāhakamātikādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:2711_0: Pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaucchuphalāphalādīnaṃ viruhanaṭṭhānaṃ yaṃ kiñci khettaṃ vā vatthuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2711_1: vā dammīti vuttepi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitvā taḷāke vuttanayeneva yadā kappiyavohārena
atk-vin01a0:2711_3: araññaṃ dammī”ti vutte pana vaṭṭati. Sace manussā bhikkhūhi anāṇattāyeva tattha rukkhe
atk-vin01a0:2711_4: chinditvā aparaṇṇādīni sampādetvā bhikkhūnaṃ bhāgaṃ denti, vaṭṭati; adentā na codetabbā.
atk-vin01a0:2711_5: Sace kenacideva antarāyena tesu pakkantesu aññe karonti, na ca bhikkhūnaṃ kiñci denti,
atk-vin01a0:2711_6: te vāretabbā. Sace vadanti – “nanu, bhante, pubbepi manussā idha sassāni akaṃsū”ti,
atk-vin01a0:2711_7: tato te vattabbā – “te saṅghassa idañcidañca kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ adaṃsū”ti. Sace vadanti
atk-vin01a0:2712_0: Kañci sassuṭṭhānakaṃ bhūmippadesaṃ sandhāya “sīmaṃ demā”ti vadanti, vaṭṭati. Sīmā
atk-vin01a0:2712_1: paricchedanatthaṃ pana thambhā vā pāsāṇā vā sayaṃ na ṭhapetabbā. Kasmā? Bhūmi nāma
atk-vin01a0:2712_2: anagghā appakenāpi pārājiko bhaveyya, ārāmikānaṃ pana vattabbaṃ – “iminā ṭhānena
atk-vin01a0:2712_3: amhākaṃ sīmā gatā”ti. Sacepi hi te adhikaṃ gaṇhanti, pariyāyena kathitattā anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2712_4: Yadi pana rājarājamahāmattādayo sayameva thambhe ṭhapāpetvā “cattāro paccaye paribhuñjathā”ti denti, vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2713_0: Sace koci antosīmāya taḷākaṃ khanati, vihāramajjhena vā mātikaṃ neti, cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇādīni
atk-vin01a0:2713_1: dussanti, vāretabbo. Sace saṅgho kiñci labhitvā āmisagarukatāya na vāreti, eko bhikkhu
atk-vin01a0:2713_2: vāreti, sova bhikkhu issaro. Sace eko bhikkhu na vāreti, “netha tumhe”ti tesaṃyeva
atk-vin01a0:2713_3: pakkho hoti, saṅgho vāreti, saṅghova issaro. Saṅghikesu hi kammesu yo dhammakammaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2713_4: karoti, sova issaro. Sace vāriyamānopi karoti, heṭṭhā gahitaṃ paṃsuṃ heṭṭhā pakkhipitvā,
atk-vin01a0:2713_5: upari gahitaṃ paṃsuṃ upari pakkhipitvā pūretabbā.
atk-vin01a0:2714_0: Sace koci yathājātameva ucchuṃ vā aparaṇṇaṃ vā alābukumbhaṇḍādikaṃ vā valliphalaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2714_1: dātukāmo “etaṃ sabbaṃ ucchukhettaṃ aparaṇṇavatthuṃ valliphalāvāṭaṃ dammī”ti vadati,
atk-vin01a0:2714_2: saha vatthunā parāmaṭṭhattā “na vaṭṭatī”ti mahāsumatthero āha. Mahāpadumatthero pana
atk-vin01a0:2714_3: “abhilāpamattametaṃ sāmikānaṃyeva hi so bhūmibhāgo tasmā vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-vin01a0:2715_0: “Dāsaṃ dammī”ti vadati, na vaṭṭati. “Ārāmikaṃ dammi, veyyāvaccakaraṃ dammi, kappiyakārakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2715_1: dammī”ti vutte vaṭṭati. Sace so ārāmiko purebhattampi pacchābhattampi saṅghasseva
atk-vin01a0:2715_2: kammaṃ karoti, sāmaṇerassa viya sabbaṃ bhesajjapaṭijagganampi tassa kātabbaṃ. Sace
atk-vin01a0:2715_3: purebhattameva saṅghassa kammaṃ karoti, pacchābhattaṃ attano kammaṃ karoti, sāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2715_4: nivāpo na dātabbo. Yepi pañcadivasavārena vā pakkhavārena vā saṅghassa kammaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:2715_5: sesakāle attano kammaṃ karonti, tesampi karaṇakāleyeva bhattañca nivāpo ca dātabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2715_6: Sace saṅghassa kammaṃ natthi, attanoyeva kammaṃ katvā jīvanti, te ce hatthakammamūlaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2715_7: ānetvā denti, gahetabbaṃ. No ce denti, na kiñci vattabbā. Yaṃ kiñci rajakadāsampi
atk-vin01a0:2716_0: Sace “gāvo demā”ti vadanti, “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitabbā. Imā gāvo kutoti paṇḍitehi
atk-vin01a0:2716_2: vutte vaṭṭati. Ajikādīsupi eseva nayo. “Hatthiṃ dema, assaṃ mahisaṃ kukkuṭaṃ sūkaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2716_3: demā”ti vadanti, sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace keci manussā “appossukkā, bhante,
atk-vin01a0:2716_4: tumhe hotha, mayaṃ ime gahetvā tumhākaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ dassāmā”ti gaṇhanti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2716_5: “Kukkuṭasūkarā sukhaṃ jīvantū”ti araññe vissajjetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Imaṃ taḷākaṃ, imaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2716_6: khettaṃ, imaṃ vatthuṃ, vihārassa demā”ti vutte paṭikkhipituṃ na labbhatīti. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2717: Samuṭṭhānādīsu idampi chasamuṭṭhānaṃ kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2722_0: 542. Tena samayenāti kosiyasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha santharitvā kataṃ hotīti same bhūmibhāge
atk-vin01a0:2722_1: kosiyaṃsūni uparūpari santharitvā kañjikādīhi siñcitvā kataṃ hoti. Ekenapi kosiyaṃsunā
atk-vin01a0:2722_2: missitvāti tiṭṭhatu attano rucivasena missitaṃ, sacepi tassa karaṇaṭṭhāne vāto ekaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2722_3: kosiyaṃsuṃ ānetvā pāteti, evampi missetvā katameva hotīti. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2723: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2727_0: 547. Tena samayenāti suddhakāḷakasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha suddhakāḷakānanti suddhānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2727_1: kāḷakānaṃ, aññehi amissitakāḷakānanti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva. Samuṭṭhānādīnipi
atk-vin01a0:2730: 552. Tena samayenāti dvebhāgasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha ante ādiyitvāti santhatassa ante anuvātaṃ viya dassetvā odātaṃ alliyāpetvā.
atk-vin01a0:2731_0: Dve bhāgāti dve koṭṭhāsā. Ādātabbāti gahetabbā. Gocariyānanti kapilavaṇṇānaṃ. Dve
atk-vin01a0:2731_1: tulā ādātabbāti catūhi tulāhi kāretukāmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Atthato pana yattakehi
atk-vin01a0:2731_2: eḷakalomehi kātukāmo hoti, tesu dve koṭṭhāsā kāḷakānaṃ eko odātānaṃ, eko gocariyānanti
atk-vin01a0:2731_3: idameva dassitaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2732: Samuṭṭhānādīnipi kosiyasikkhāpadasadisāneva. Kevalaṃ idaṃ ādāya anādāya ca karaṇato kiriyākiriyaṃ veditabbanti.
atk-vin01a0:2735: 557. Tena samayenāti chabbassasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha ūhadantipi ummihantipīti santhatānaṃ upari vaccampi passāvampi karontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2736_0: Dinnā saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno santhatasammutīti evaṃ laddhasammutiko bhikkhu
atk-vin01a0:2736_1: yāva rogo na vūpasammati, tāva yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati, tattha tattha santhataṃ kātuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2736_2: labhati. Sace arogo hutvā puna mūlabyādhināva gilāno hoti, soyeva parihāro, natthaññaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2736_3: sammutikiccanti phussadevatthero āha. Upatissatthero pana “so vā byādhi paṭikuppatu,
atk-vin01a0:2736_4: añño vā, ‘sakiṃ gilāno’ti nāmaṃ laddhaṃ laddhameva, puna sammutikiccaṃ natthī”ti āha.
atk-vin01a0:2737: Orena ce channaṃ vassānanti channaṃ vassānaṃ orimabhāge, antoti attho. Padabhājane pana saṅkhyāmattadassanatthaṃ “ūnakachabbassānī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2738_0: Anāpatti chabbassāni karotīti yadā chabbassāni paripuṇṇāni honti, tadā santhataṃ
atk-vin01a0:2738_1: karoti. Dutiyapadepi “yadā atirekachabbassāni honti, tadā karotī”ti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2738_2: Na hi so chabbassāni karotīti. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2742_0: 565. Tena samayenāti nisīdanasanthatasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha icchāmahaṃ bhikkhaveti bhagavā
atk-vin01a0:2742_1: kira taṃ temāsaṃ na kiñci bodhaneyyasattaṃ addasa, tasmā evamāha. Evaṃ santepi tantivasena
atk-vin01a0:2742_2: dhammadesanā kattabbā siyā. Yasmā panassa etadahosi – “mayi okāsaṃ kāretvā paṭisallīne
atk-vin01a0:2742_3: bhikkhū adhammikaṃ katikavattaṃ karissanti, taṃ upaseno bhindissati. Ahaṃ tassa pasīditvā
atk-vin01a0:2742_4: bhikkhūnaṃ dassanaṃ anujānissāmi, tato maṃ passitukāmā bahū bhikkhū dhutaṅgāni samādiyissanti,
atk-vin01a0:2742_5: ahañca tehi ujjhitasanthatapaccayā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmī”ti, tasmā evamāha. Evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2743_0: Sapariso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti thero kira “na, bhikkhave, ūnadasavassena upasampādetabbo,
atk-vin01a0:2743_1: yo upasampādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti imasmiṃ khandhakasikkhāpade “kathañhi nāma
atk-vin01a0:2743_2: tvaṃ moghapurisa aññehi ovadiyo anusāsiyo aññaṃ ovadituṃ anusāsituṃ maññissasī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2743_3: evamādinā nayena garahaṃ labhitvā “satthā mayhaṃ parisaṃ nissāya garahaṃ adāsi, so
atk-vin01a0:2743_4: dānāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ teneva puṇṇacandasassirīkena sabbākāraparipuṇṇena mukhena brahmaghosaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2743_5: nicchāretvā parisaṃyeva nissāya sādhukāraṃ dāpessāmī”ti suhadayo kulaputto atirekayojanasataṃ
atk-vin01a0:2743_6: paṭikkamitvā parisaṃ cinitvā pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi parivuto puna bhagavantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2743_7: upasaṅkamanto. Tena vuttaṃ – “sapariso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī”ti. Na hi sakkā
atk-vin01a0:2744_0: Bhagavato avidūre nisinnoti vattasampattiyā parisuddhabhāvena nirāsaṅko sīho viya
atk-vin01a0:2744_1: kañcanapabbatassa bhagavato avidūre nisinno. Etadavocāti kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ etaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2744_2: avoca. Manāpāni te bhikkhu paṃsukūlānīti bhikkhu tava imāni paṃsukūlāni manāpāni,
atk-vin01a0:2744_3: attano ruciyā khantiyā gahitānīti attho. Na kho me, bhante, manāpānīti, bhante na
atk-vin01a0:2744_4: mayā attano ruciyā gahitāni, galaggāhena viya matthakatāḷanena viya ca gāhitomhīti dasseti.
atk-vin01a0:2745_0: Paññāyissatīti paññāto abhiññāto bhavissati, tattha sandississatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2745_1: Na mayaṃ apaññattaṃ paññapessāmāti mayaṃ sāvakā nāma apaññattaṃ na paññapessāma,
atk-vin01a0:2745_2: buddhavisayo hi eso yadidaṃ “pācittiyaṃ dukkaṭa”ntiādinā nayena apaññattasikkhāpadapaññapanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2745_3: paññattasamucchindanaṃ vā. Samādāyāti taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā, “sādhu suṭṭhū”ti
atk-vin01a0:2745_4: sampaṭicchitvā yathāpaññattesu sabbasikkhāpadesu sikkhissāmāti dasseti. Tassa āraddhacitto
atk-vin01a0:2746_0: 566. Anuññātāvusoti anuññātaṃ, āvuso. Pihentāti pihayantā. Santhatāni ujjhitvāti
atk-vin01a0:2746_1: santhate catutthacīvarasaññitāya sabbasanthatāni ujjhitvā. Dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:2746_2: āmantesīti bhagavā santhatāni vippakiṇṇāni disvā “saddhādeyyavinipātane kāraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-vin01a0:2746_3: paribhogupāyaṃ nesaṃ dassessāmī”ti dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi.
atk-vin01a0:2747_0: 567. Sakiṃ nivatthampi sakiṃ pārutampīti sakiṃ nisinnañceva nipannañca. Sāmantāti
atk-vin01a0:2747_1: ekapassato vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā chinditvā gahitaṭṭhānaṃ yathā vidatthimattaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a0:2747_2: evaṃ gahetabbaṃ, santharantena pana pāḷiyaṃ vuttanayeneva ekadese vā santharitabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2747_3: vijaṭetvā vā missakaṃ katvā santharitabbaṃ, evaṃ thirataraṃ hotīti. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2749: Imesu pana pañcasu santhatesu purimāni tīṇi vinayakammaṃ katvā paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti, pacchimāni dve vaṭṭantīti veditabbānīti.
atk-vin01a0:2752_0: 571. Tena samayenāti eḷakalomasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha uppaṇḍesunti “kittakena, bhante,
atk-vin01a0:2752_1: kītānī”tiādīni vadantā avahasiṃsu. Ṭhitakova āsumbhīti yathā manussā araññato mahantaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2752_2: dārubhāraṃ ānetvā kilantā ṭhitakāva pātenti, evaṃ pātesīti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2753_0: 572. Sahatthāti sahatthena, attanā haritabbānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Bahitiyojanaṃ pātetīti
atk-vin01a0:2753_1: tiyojanato bahi pāteti. Anantarāyena patanake hatthato muttamatte lomagaṇanāya nissaggiyapācittiyāni.
atk-vin01a0:2753_2: Sace bahitiyojane rukkhe vā thambhe vā paṭihaññitvā puna anto patanti, anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2753_3: Bhūmiyaṃ patitvā ṭhatvā ṭhatvā vaṭṭamānā eḷakalomabhaṇḍikā puna anto pavisati, āpattiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2753_4: Anto ṭhatvā hatthena vā pādena vā yaṭṭhiyā vā vaṭṭeti ṭhatvā vā aṭhatvā vā vaṭṭamānā
atk-vin01a0:2753_5: bhaṇḍikā gacchatu, āpattiyeva. “Añño harissatī”ti ṭhapeti, tena haritepi āpattiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2753_6: Suddhacittena ṭhapitaṃ vāto vā añño vā attano dhammatāya bahi pāteti, āpattiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2753_7: Saussāhattā acittakattā ca sikkhāpadassa. Kurundiyādīsu pana “ettha anāpattī”ti vuttā,
atk-vin01a0:2753_8: sā anāpatti pāḷiyā na sameti. Ubhatobhaṇḍikaṃ ekābaddhaṃ katvā ekaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ antosīmāya
atk-vin01a0:2753_9: ekaṃ bahisīmāya karonto ṭhapeti, rakkhati tāva. Ekābaddhe kājepi eseva nayo. Yadi
atk-vin01a0:2753_10: pana abandhitvā kājakoṭiyaṃ ṭhapitamattameva hoti, na rakkhati. Ekābaddhepi parivattetvā ṭhapite āpattiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2754_0: Aññassa yāne vāti ettha gacchante yāne vā hatthipiṭṭhiādīsu vā sāmikassa ajānantasseva
atk-vin01a0:2754_1: harissatīti ṭhapeti, tasmiṃ tiyojanaṃ atikkante āpatti. Agacchantepi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:2754_2: Sace pana agacchante yāne vā hatthipiṭṭhiyādīsu vā ṭhapetvā abhiruhitvā sāreti, heṭṭhā
atk-vin01a0:2754_3: vā gacchanto codeti, pakkosanto vā anubandhāpeti, “aññaṃ harāpetī”ti vacanato anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2754_4: Kurundiyādīsu pana “āpattī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ “aññaṃ harāpetī”ti iminā na sameti. Adinnādāne
atk-vin01a0:2754_5: pana suṅkaghāte āpatti hoti. Yā hi tattha āpatti, sā idha anāpatti. Yā idha āpatti,
atk-vin01a0:2754_6: sā tattha anāpatti. Taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā aññavihito vā corādīhi vā upadduto gacchati,
atk-vin01a0:2755_0: 575. Tiyojanaṃ vāsādhippāyo gantvā tato paraṃ haratīti yattha gato, tattha uddesaparipucchādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2755_1: vā paccayādīnaṃ vā alābhena tato paraṃ aññattha gacchati, tatopi aññatthāti evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2755_2: yojanasatampi harantassa anāpatti. Acchinnaṃ paṭilabhitvāti corā acchinditvā niratthakabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2755_3: ñatvā paṭidenti, taṃ harantassa anāpatti. Nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvāti vinayakammakataṃ
atk-vin01a0:2756_0: Katabhaṇḍanti kataṃbhaṇḍaṃ kambalakojavasanthatādiṃ yaṃ kiñci antamaso suttakena
atk-vin01a0:2756_1: baddhamattampi. Yo pana tanukapattatthavikantare vā āyogaaṃsabaddhakakāyabandhanādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2756_2: antaresu vā pipphalikādīnaṃ malarakkhaṇatthaṃ sipāṭikāya vā antamaso vātābādhiko
atk-vin01a0:2756_3: kaṇṇacchiddepi lomāni pakkhipitvā gacchati, āpattiyeva. Suttakena pana bandhitvā
atk-vin01a0:2756_4: pakkhittaṃ katabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, veṇiṃ katvā harati, idaṃ nidhānamukhaṃ nāma,
atk-vin01a0:2757: Samuṭṭhānādīsu idaṃ eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma, kāyato ca kāyacittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2760_0: 576. Tena samayenāti eḷakalomadhovāpanasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha riñcantīti ujjhanti vissajjenti,
atk-vin01a0:2760_1: na sakkonti anuyuñjitunti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesamettha purāṇacīvarasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva
atk-vin01a0:2763: 582. Tena samayenāti rūpiyasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha paṭivisoti koṭṭhāso.
atk-vin01a0:2764_0: 583-4. Jātarūparajatanti ettha jātarūpanti suvaṇṇassa nāmaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā tathāgatassa
atk-vin01a0:2764_1: vaṇṇasadisaṃ hoti, tasmā “satthuvaṇṇo vuccatī”ti padabhājane vuttaṃ. Tassattho –
atk-vin01a0:2764_2: “yo satthuvaṇṇo lohaviseso, idaṃ jātarūpaṃ nāmā”ti rajataṃ pana “saṅkho, silā, pavāla,
atk-vin01a0:2764_3: rajataṃ, jātarūpa”ntiādīsu rūpiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Idha pana yaṃ kiñci vohāragamanīyaṃ kahāpaṇādi
atk-vin01a0:2764_4: adhippetaṃ. Tenevassa padabhājane “kahāpaṇo lohamāsako”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kahāpaṇoti
atk-vin01a0:2764_5: sovaṇṇamayo vā rūpiyamayo vā pākatiko vā. Lohamāsakoti tambalohādīhi katamāsako.
atk-vin01a0:2764_6: Dārumāsakoti sāradārunā vā veḷupesikāya vā antamaso tālapaṇṇenāpi rūpaṃ chinditvā
atk-vin01a0:2764_7: katamāsako. Jatumāsakoti lākhāya vā niyyāsena vā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā katamāsako.
atk-vin01a0:2764_8: “Ye vohāraṃ gacchantī”ti iminā pana padena yo yo yattha yattha janapade yadā yadā
atk-vin01a0:2764_9: vohāraṃ gacchati, antamaso aṭṭhimayopi cammamayopi rukkhaphalabījamayopi samuṭṭhāpitarūpopi
atk-vin01a0:2765_0: Iccetaṃ sabbampi rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ jātarūpamāsako, vuttappabhedo sabbopi rajatamāsakoti
atk-vin01a0:2765_1: catubbidhaṃ nissaggiyavatthu hoti. Muttā, maṇi, veḷuriyo, saṅkho, silā, pavāla, lohitaṅko,
atk-vin01a0:2765_3: dukkaṭavatthu. Suttaṃ phālo paṭako kappāso anekappakāraṃ aparaṇṇaṃ sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitādibhesajjañca
atk-vin01a0:2765_4: idaṃ kappiyavatthu. Tattha nissaggiyavatthuṃ attano vā saṅghagaṇapuggalacetiyānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2765_5: vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati. Attano atthāya sampaṭicchato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2765_6: hoti, sesānaṃ atthāya dukkaṭaṃ. Dukkaṭavatthuṃ sabbesampi atthāya sampaṭicchato dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin01a0:2765_7: Kappiyavatthumhi anāpatti. Sabbampi nikkhipanatthāya bhaṇḍāgārikasīsena sampaṭicchato
atk-vin01a0:2766: Uggaṇheyyāti gaṇheyya. Yasmā pana gaṇhanto āpattiṃ āpajjati, tenassa padabhājane “sayaṃ gaṇhāti nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sesapadesupi.
atk-vin01a0:2767_0: Tattha jātarūparajatabhaṇḍesu kahāpaṇamāsakesu ca ekaṃ gaṇhato vā gaṇhāpayato vā
atk-vin01a0:2767_1: ekā āpatti. Sahassaṃ cepi ekato gaṇhāti, gaṇhāpeti, vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo. Mahāpaccariyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2767_2: pana kurundiyañca sithilabaddhāya thavikāya sithilapūrite vā bhājane rūpagaṇanāya
atk-vin01a0:2767_3: āpatti. Ghanabaddhe pana ghanapūrite vā ekāva āpattīti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2768_0: Upanikkhittasādiyane pana “idaṃ ayyassa hotū”ti vutte sacepi cittena sādiyati, gaṇhitukāmo
atk-vin01a0:2768_1: hoti, kāyena vā vācāya vā “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti paṭikkhipati, anāpatti. Kāyavācāhi
atk-vin01a0:2768_2: vā appaṭikkhipitvāpi suddhacitto hutvā “nayidaṃ amhākaṃ kappatī”ti na sādiyati, anāpattiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2768_3: Tīsu dvāresu hi yena kenaci paṭikkhittaṃ paṭikkhittameva hoti. Sace pana kāyavācāhi
atk-vin01a0:2768_4: appaṭikkhipitvā cittena adhivāseti, kāyavācāhi kattabbassa paṭikkhepassa akaraṇato
atk-vin01a0:2768_5: akiriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyadvāre ca vacīdvāre ca āpattiṃ āpajjati, manodvāre pana āpatti nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a0:2769_0: Eko sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā pādamūle ṭhapeti “tuyhidaṃ hotū”ti, bhikkhū “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2769_1: paṭikkhipati, upāsako pariccattaṃ mayā tumhākanti gato, añño tattha āgantvā pucchati
atk-vin01a0:2769_2: – “kiṃ, bhante, ida”nti? Yaṃ tena attanā ca vuttaṃ, taṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. So ce vadati
atk-vin01a0:2769_3: – “gopayissāmi, bhante, guttaṭṭhānaṃ dassethā”ti, sattabhūmikampi pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-vin01a0:2769_4: “idaṃ guttaṭṭhāna”nti ācikkhitabbaṃ, “idha nikkhipāhī”ti na vattabbaṃ. Ettāvatā kappiyañca
atk-vin01a0:2769_5: akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitaṃ hoti. Dvāraṃ pidahitvā rakkhantena vasitabbaṃ. Sace kiñci
atk-vin01a0:2769_6: vikkāyikabhaṇḍaṃ pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā āgacchati, “idaṃ gahessatha bhante”ti vutte
atk-vin01a0:2769_7: “upāsaka atthi amhākaṃ iminā attho, vatthu ca evarūpaṃ nāma saṃvijjati, kappiyakārako
atk-vin01a0:2769_8: natthī”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace so vadati, “ahaṃ kappiyakārako bhavissāmi, dvāraṃ vivaritvā
atk-vin01a0:2769_9: dethā”ti, dvāraṃ vivaritvā “imasmiṃ okāse ṭhapita”nti vattabbaṃ, “idaṃ gaṇhā”ti na
atk-vin01a0:2769_10: vattabbaṃ. Evampi kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitameva hoti, so ce taṃ gahetvā
atk-vin01a0:2769_11: tassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ deti, vaṭṭati. Sace adhikaṃ gaṇhāti, “na mayaṃ tava bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2770_0: Saṅghamajjhe nissajjitabbanti ettha yasmā rūpiyaṃ nāma akappiyaṃ, “tasmā nissajjitabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2770_1: saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā”ti na vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana taṃ paṭiggahitamattameva
atk-vin01a0:2770_2: na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpitaṃ, tasmā upāyena paribhogadassanatthaṃ “saṅghamajjhe
atk-vin01a0:2770_3: nissajjitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ sappi vāti “pabbajitānaṃ sappi vā
atk-vin01a0:2770_4: telaṃ vā vaṭṭati upāsakā”ti evaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2771_0: Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbeheva paribhuñjitabbanti sabbehi bhājetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2771_1: Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakena bhāgo na gahetabbo. Aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā ārāmikānaṃ vā pattabhāgampi
atk-vin01a0:2771_2: labhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati, antamaso makkaṭādīhi tato haritvā araññe ṭhapitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2771_3: vā tesaṃ hatthato gaḷitaṃ vā tiracchānagatapariggahitampi paṃsukūlampi na vaṭṭatiyeva,
atk-vin01a0:2771_4: tato āhaṭena phāṇitena senāsanadhūpanampi na vaṭṭati. Sappinā vā telena vā padīpaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2771_5: katvā dīpāloke nipajjituṃ kasiṇaparikammampi kātuṃ, potthakampi vācetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2771_6: Telamadhuphāṇitehi pana sarīre vaṇaṃ makkhetuṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva. Tena vatthunā mañcapīṭhādīni
atk-vin01a0:2771_7: vā gaṇhanti, uposathāgāraṃ vā bhojanasālaṃ vā karonti, paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2771_8: Chāyāpi gehaparicchedena ṭhitā na vaṭṭati, paricchedātikkantā āgantukattā vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2771_9: Taṃ vatthuṃ vissajjetvā katena maggenapi setunāpi nāvāyapi uḷumpenapi gantuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a0:2771_10: tena vatthunā khanāpitāya pokkharaṇiyā ubbhidodakaṃ pātuṃ vā paribhuñjituṃ vā na
atk-vin01a0:2771_11: vaṭṭati. Anto udake pana asati aññaṃ āgantukaṃ udakaṃ vā vassodakaṃ vā paviṭṭhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2771_12: vaṭṭati. Kītāya yena udakena saddhiṃ kītā taṃ āgantukampi na vaṭṭati, taṃ vatthuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2771_13: upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjati, tepi paccayā tassa na vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin01a0:2771_14: Ārāmo gahito hoti, sopi paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Yadi bhūmipi bījampi akappiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2771_15: neva bhūmiṃ na phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace bhūmiṃyeva kiṇitvā aññāni bījāni
atk-vin01a0:2771_16: ropitāni phalaṃ vaṭṭati, atha bījāni kiṇitvā kappiyabhūmiyaṃ ropitāni, phalaṃ na
atk-vin01a0:2771_17: vaṭṭati, bhūmiyaṃ nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2772_0: Sace so chaḍḍetīti yattha katthaci khipati, athāpi na chaḍḍeti, sayaṃ gahetvā gacchati,
atk-vin01a0:2772_1: na vāretabbo. No ce chaḍḍetīti atha neva gahetvā gacchati, na chaḍḍeti, kiṃ mayhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2772_2: iminā byāpārenāti yena kāmaṃ pakkamati, tato yathāvuttalakkhaṇo rūpiyachaḍḍako sammannitabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2773_0: Yo na chandāgatintiādīsu lobhavasena taṃ vatthuṃ attano vā karonto attānaṃ vā ukkaṃsento
atk-vin01a0:2773_1: chandāgatiṃ nāma gacchati. Dosavasena “nevāyaṃ mātikaṃ jānāti, na vinaya”nti paraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2773_2: apasādento dosāgatiṃ nāma gacchati. Mohavasena muṭṭhapamuṭṭhassatibhāvaṃ āpajjanto
atk-vin01a0:2773_3: mohāgatiṃ nāma gacchati. Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa bhayena chaḍḍetuṃ avisahanto bhayāgatiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2773_4: nāma gacchati. Evaṃ akaronto na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2774_0: 585. Animittaṃ katvāti nimittaṃ akatvā, akkhīni nimmīletvā nadiyā vā papāte vā vanagahane
atk-vin01a0:2774_1: vā gūthaṃ viya anapekkhena patitokāsaṃ asamannāharantena pātetabbanti attho. Evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2774_2: jigucchitabbepi rūpiye bhagavā pariyāyena bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogaṃ ācikkhi. Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa
atk-vin01a0:2774_3: pana kenaci pariyāyena tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo na vaṭṭati. Yathā cāyaṃ etassa
atk-vin01a0:2774_4: na vaṭṭati, evaṃ asantasambhāvanāya vā kuladūsakakammena vā kuhanādīhi vā uppannapaccayā
atk-vin01a0:2774_5: neva tassa na aññassa vaṭṭanti, dhammena samena uppannāpi appaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin01a0:2775_0: Cattāro hi paribhogā – theyyaparibhogo, iṇaparibhogo, dāyajjaparibhogo, sāmiparibhogoti.
atk-vin01a0:2775_1: Tattha saṅghamajjhepi nisīditvā paribhuñjantassa dussīlassa paribhogo “theyyaparibhogo”
atk-vin01a0:2775_2: nāma. Sīlavato appaccavekkhitaparibhogo “iṇaparibhogo” nāma. Tasmā cīvaraṃ paribhoge
atk-vin01a0:2775_3: paribhoge paccavekkhitabbaṃ, piṇḍapāto ālope ālope. Tathā asakkontena purebhattapacchābhattapurimayāmapacchimayāmesu.
atk-vin01a0:2775_4: Sacassa appaccavekkhatova aruṇo uggacchati, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Senāsanampi
atk-vin01a0:2775_5: paribhoge paribhoge paccavekkhitabbaṃ, bhesajjassa paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi satipaccayatā
atk-vin01a0:2775_6: vaṭṭati, evaṃ santepi paṭiggahaṇe satiṃ katvā paribhoge akarontasseva āpatti, paṭiggahaṇe
atk-vin01a0:2775_7: pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2776_0: Catubbidhā hi suddhi – desanāsuddhi, saṃvarasuddhi, pariyeṭṭhisuddhi, paccavekkhaṇasuddhīti.
atk-vin01a0:2776_1: Tattha desanāsuddhi nāma pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ, tañhi desanāya sujjhanato “desanāsuddhī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2776_2: vuccati. Saṃvarasuddhi nāma indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ, tañhi na puna evaṃ karissāmīti cittādhiṭṭhānasaṃvareneva
atk-vin01a0:2776_4: tañhi anesanaṃ pahāya dhammena samena paccaye uppādentassa pariyesanāya suddhattā
atk-vin01a0:2776_6: tañhi “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevatī”tiādinā nayena vuttena paccavekkhaṇena
atk-vin01a0:2776_7: sujjhanato “paccavekkhaṇasuddhī”ti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ – “paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2777_0: Sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ paccayaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo nāma, te hi bhagavato puttā,
atk-vin01a0:2777_1: tasmā pitusantakānaṃ paccayānaṃ dāyādā hutvā te paccaye paribhuñjanti. Kiṃ pana te
atk-vin01a0:2777_2: bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjanti, gihīnaṃ paccaye paribhuñjantīti? Gihīhi dinnāpi
atk-vin01a0:2777_3: bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato santakā honti, tasmā te bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjantīti
atk-vin01a0:2778_0: Khīṇāsavānaṃ paribhogo sāmiparibhogo nāma, te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino
atk-vin01a0:2778_1: hutvā paribhuñjantīti. Imesu paribhogesu sāmiparibhogo ca dāyajjaparibhogo ca sabbesampi
atk-vin01a0:2778_2: vaṭṭati. Iṇaparibhogo na vaṭṭati, theyyaparibhoge kathāyeva natthi.
atk-vin01a0:2779: Aparepi cattāro paribhogā – lajjiparibhogo, alajjiparibhogo, dhammiyaparibhogo, adhammiyaparibhogoti.
atk-vin01a0:2780_0: Tattha alajjino lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo vaṭṭati, āpattiyā na kāretabbo. Lajjino
atk-vin01a0:2780_1: alajjinā saddhiṃ yāva na jānāti, tāva vaṭṭati. Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthi,
atk-vin01a0:2780_2: tasmā yadāssa alajjībhāvaṃ jānāti tadā vattabbo “tumhe kāyadvāre ca vacīdvāre ca
atk-vin01a0:2780_3: vītikkamaṃ karotha, taṃ appatirūpaṃ mā evamakatthā”ti. Sace anādiyitvā karotiyeva,
atk-vin01a0:2780_4: yadi tena saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ karoti, sopi alajjīyeva hoti. Yopi attano bhārabhūtena
atk-vin01a0:2780_5: alajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ karoti, sopi nivāretabbo. Sace na oramati, ayampi alajjīyeva
atk-vin01a0:2780_6: hoti. Evaṃ eko alajjī alajjīsatampi karoti. Alajjino pana alajjināva saddhiṃ paribhoge
atk-vin01a0:2780_7: āpatti nāma natthi. Lajjino lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo dvinnaṃ khattiyakumārānaṃ suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ bhojanasadisoti.
atk-vin01a0:2781_0: Dhammiyādhammiyaparibhogo paccayavasena veditabbo. Tattha sace puggalopi alajjī piṇḍapātopi
atk-vin01a0:2781_1: adhammiyo, ubho jegucchā. Puggalo alajjī piṇḍapāto dhammiyo, puggalaṃ jigucchitvā
atk-vin01a0:2781_2: piṇḍapāto na gahetabbo. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana dussīlo saṅghato uddesabhattādīni labhitvā
atk-vin01a0:2781_3: saṅghasseva deti, etāni yathādānameva gatattā vaṭṭantīti vuttaṃ. Puggalo lajjī piṇḍapāto
atk-vin01a0:2781_4: adhammiyo, piṇḍapāto jeguccho na gahetabbo. Puggalo lajjī, piṇḍapātopi dhammiyo, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2782: Apare dve paggahā; dve ca paribhogā – lajjipaggaho, alajjipaggaho; dhammaparibhogo āmisaparibhogoti.
atk-vin01a0:2783_0: Tattha alajjino lajjiṃ paggahetuṃ vaṭṭati, na so āpattiyā kāretabbo. Sace pana lajjī
atk-vin01a0:2783_1: alajjiṃ paggaṇhāti, anumodanāya ajjhesati, dhammakathāya ajjhesati, kulesu upatthambheti.
atk-vin01a0:2783_2: Itaropi “amhākaṃ ācariyo īdiso ca īdiso cā”ti tassa parisati vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2784_0: Dhammaparibhoga-āmisaparibhogesu pana yattha āmisaparibhogo vaṭṭati, tattha dhammaparibhogopi
atk-vin01a0:2784_1: vaṭṭati. Yo pana koṭiyaṃ ṭhito gantho tassa puggalassa accayena nassissati, taṃ dhammānuggahena
atk-vin01a0:2785_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – mahābhaye kira ekasseva bhikkhuno mahāniddeso paguṇo ahosi. Atha
atk-vin01a0:2785_2: āha – “āvuso mahārakkhita, etassa santike mahāniddesaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti. “Pāpo kirāyaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2785_3: bhante, na gaṇhāmī”ti. “Gaṇhāvuso, ahaṃ te santike nisīdissāmī”ti. “Sādhu, bhante,
atk-vin01a0:2785_4: tumhesu nisinnesu gaṇhissāmī”ti paṭṭhapetvā rattindivaṃ nirantaraṃ pariyāpuṇanto
atk-vin01a0:2785_5: osānadivase heṭṭhāmañce itthiṃ disvā “bhante, sutaṃyeva me pubbe, sacāhaṃ evaṃ jāneyyaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2785_6: na īdisassa santike dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya”nti āha. Tassa pana santike bahū mahātherā
atk-vin01a0:2786: 586. Rūpiye rūpiyasaññīti ettha sabbampi jātarūparajataṃ rūpiyasaṅgahameva gatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2787: Rūpiye vematikoti “suvaṇṇaṃ nu kho, kharapattaṃ nu kho”tiādinā nayena saṃsayajāto.
atk-vin01a0:2788_0: Rūpiye arūpiyasaññīti suvaṇṇādīsu kharapattādisaññī. Apica puññakāmā rājorodhādayo
atk-vin01a0:2788_1: bhattakhajjakagandhapiṇḍādīsu pakkhipitvā hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ denti, coḷabhikkhāya carantānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2788_2: dassante baddhakahāpaṇādīhiyeva saddhiṃ coḷakāni denti, bhikkhū bhattādisaññāya vā
atk-vin01a0:2788_3: coḷakasaññāya vā paṭiggaṇhanti, evampi rūpiye arūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ gaṇhātīti veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2788_4: Paṭiggaṇhantena pana “imasmiṃ gehe idaṃ laddha”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ. Yena hi assatiyā
atk-vin01a0:2788_5: dinnaṃ hoti, so satiṃ paṭilabhitvā puna āgacchati, athassa vattabbaṃ – “tava coḷakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2789_0: Samuṭṭhānādīsu chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, siyā kiriyaṃ gahaṇena āpajjanato, siyā akiriyaṃ paṭikkhepassa
atk-vin01a0:2789_1: akaraṇato rūpiyaaññavādakaupassutisikkhāpadāni hi tīṇi ekaparicchedāni, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2792_0: 587. Tena samayenāti rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha nānappakārakanti katākatādivasena
atk-vin01a0:2793_0: 589. Sīsūpagantiādīsu sīsaṃ upagacchatīti sīsūpagaṃ, potthakesu pana “sīsūpaka”nti
atk-vin01a0:2793_1: likhitaṃ, yassa kassaci sīsālaṅkārassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha. Katena
atk-vin01a0:2794_0: Rūpiye rūpiyasaññītiādimhi purimasikkhāpade vuttavatthūsu nissaggiyavatthunā nissaggiyavatthuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2794_1: cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ, aparāparaparivattane
atk-vin01a0:2794_2: iminā nissaggiyapācittiyameva. Nissaggiyavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuṃ vā kappiyavatthuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2794_3: vā cetāpentassapi eseva nayo. Yo hi ayaṃ arūpiye rūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ cetāpetītiādi
atk-vin01a0:2794_4: dutiyo tiko vutto, tassānulomattā avuttopi ayamaparopi rūpiye rūpiyasaññī arūpiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2794_5: cetāpetītiādi tiko veditabbo. Attano vā hi arūpiyena parassa rūpiyaṃ cetāpeyya attano
atk-vin01a0:2794_6: vā rūpiyena parassa arūpiyaṃ, ubhayathāpi rūpiyasaṃvohāro katoyeva hoti, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2795_0: Dukkaṭavatthunā pana nissaggiyavatthuṃ cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena
atk-vin01a0:2795_1: dukkaṭaṃ, pacchā parivattane iminā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ, garukassa cetāpitattā.
atk-vin01a0:2795_2: Dukkaṭavatthunā dukkaṭavatthumeva, kappiyavatthuṃ vā cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena
atk-vin01a0:2795_3: dukkaṭaṃ, pacchā parivattanepi iminā dukkaṭameva. Kasmā? Akappiyavatthunā cetāpitattā.
atk-vin01a0:2795_4: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sace kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti
atk-vin01a0:2795_5: bhāsitaṃ, taṃ dubbhāsitaṃ. Kasmā? Na hi dānaggahaṇato añño kayavikkayo nāma atthi,
atk-vin01a0:2795_7: tañca kho aññatra sahadhammikehi. Idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ rūpiyena ca rūpiyārūpiyacetāpanaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2795_8: arūpiyena ca rūpiyacetāpanaṃ. Dukkaṭavatthunā pana dukkaṭavatthuno cetāpanaṃ neva
atk-vin01a0:2795_9: idha na tattha pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ, na cettha anāpatti bhavituṃ arahati. Tasmā yatheva
atk-vin01a0:2795_10: dukkaṭavatthuno paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, tatheva tassa vā tena vā cetāpanepi dukkaṭaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2796_0: Kappiyavatthunā pana nissaggiyavatthuṃ cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena
atk-vin01a0:2796_1: anāpatti, pacchā parivattane iminā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “arūpiye
atk-vin01a0:2796_2: arūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ cetāpeti nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti. Teneva kappiyavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2796_3: cetāpentassa mūlapaṭiggahaṇe tatheva anāpatti, pacchā parivattane iminā dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2796_4: Kasmā? Akappiyassa cetāpitattā. Kappiyavatthunā pana kappiyavatthuṃ aññatra sahadhammikehi
atk-vin01a0:2796_5: cetāpentassa mūlaggahaṇe purimasikkhāpadena anāpatti, pacchā parivattane upari kayavikkayasikkhāpadena
atk-vin01a0:2796_6: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Kayavikkayaṃ mocetvā gaṇhantassa uparisikkhāpadenapi anāpatti,
atk-vin01a0:2797_0: Imassa ca rūpiyasaṃvohārassa garukabhāvadīpakaṃ idaṃ pattacatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yo
atk-vin01a0:2797_1: hi rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā tena ayabījaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, taṃ koṭṭāpetvā tena lohena pattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2797_2: kāreti, ayaṃ patto mahāakappiyo nāma, na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātuṃ. Sace
atk-vin01a0:2797_3: hi taṃ vināsetvā thālakaṃ kāreti, tampi akappiyaṃ. Vāsiṃ kāreti, tāya chinnaṃ dantakaṭṭhampi
atk-vin01a0:2797_4: akappiyaṃ. Baḷisaṃ kāroti, tena māritā macchāpi akappiyā. Vāsiphalaṃ tāpetvā udakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2797_5: vā khīraṃ vā uṇhāpeti, tampi akappiyameva.
atk-vin01a0:2798_0: Yo pana rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā tena pattaṃ kiṇāti, ayampi patto akappiyo. “Pañcannampi
atk-vin01a0:2798_1: sahadhammikānaṃ na kappatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sakkā pana kappiyo kātuṃ, so
atk-vin01a0:2798_2: hi mūle mūlasāmikānaṃ patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hoti. Kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2799_0: Yopi rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā kappiyakārakena saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā
atk-vin01a0:2799_1: “ayaṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti vadati. Kappiyakārako ca taṃ rūpiyaṃ datvā kammāraṃ saññāpeti,
atk-vin01a0:2799_2: ayampi patto kappiyavohārena gahitopi dutiyapattasadisoyeva, mūlassa sampaṭicchitattā
atk-vin01a0:2799_3: akappiyo. Kasmā sesānaṃ na kappatīti? Mūlassa anissaṭṭhattā.
atk-vin01a0:2800_0: Yo pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā “therassa pattaṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti pahitakappiyakārakena
atk-vin01a0:2800_1: saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā “ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā imaṃ dehī”ti kahāpaṇe
atk-vin01a0:2800_2: dāpetvā gahito, ayaṃ patto etasseva bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati dubbicāritattā, aññesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2801_0: Mahāsumattherassa kira upajjhāyo anuruddhatthero nāma ahosi. So attano evarūpaṃ pattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2801_1: sappissa pūretvā saṅghassa nissajji. Tipiṭakacūḷanāgattherassapi saddhivihārikānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2801_2: evarūpo patto ahosi. Taṃ theropi sappissa pūrāpetvā saṅghassa nissajjāpesīti. Idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2802_0: Sace pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā “therassa pattaṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti pahitakappiyakārakena
atk-vin01a0:2802_1: saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti vā “imāhaṃ gahessāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2802_2: vā vadati, kappiyakārako ca taṃ rūpiyaṃ datvā kammāraṃ saññāpeti, ayaṃ patto sabbakappiyo
atk-vin01a0:2803_0: 591. Arūpiye rūpiyasaññīti kharapattādīsu suvaṇṇādisaññī. Āpatti dukkaṭassāti sace
atk-vin01a0:2803_1: tena arūpiyaṃ cetāpeti dukkaṭāpatti hoti. Esa nayo vematike. Arūpiyasaññissa pana
atk-vin01a0:2803_2: pañcahi sahadhammikehi saddhi “idaṃ gahetvā idaṃ dethā”ti kayavikkayaṃ karontassāpi
atk-vin01a0:2804: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2807_0: 593. Tena samayenāti kayavikkayasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha kati hipi tyāyanti kati te ayaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2807_1: hikāro panettha padapūraṇo, pikāro garahāyaṃ, ayaṃ dubbalasaṅghāṭi tava kati divasāni
atk-vin01a0:2807_2: bhavissatīti attho. Atha vā katihampi tyāyantipi pāṭho. Tattha katihanti kati ahāni,
atk-vin01a0:2807_3: kati divasānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Katihipi myāyanti idampi eteneva
atk-vin01a0:2807_4: nayena veditabbaṃ. Gihīpi naṃ gihissāti ettha nanti nāmatthe nipāto, gihī nāma gihissāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2808_0: 594. Nānappakārakanti cīvarādīnaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍānaṃ vasena anekavidhaṃ. Tenevassa
atk-vin01a0:2808_1: padabhājane cīvaraṃ ādiṃ katvā dasikasuttapariyosānaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍameva dassitaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2808_2: Akappiyabhaṇḍaparivattanañhi kayavikkayasaṅgahaṃ na gacchati. Kayavikkayanti kayañceva
atk-vin01a0:2808_3: vikkayañca. “Iminā imaṃ dehī”tiādinā hi nayena parassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhanto kayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2809_0: 595. Ajjhācaratīti abhibhavitvā carati, vītikkamavācaṃ bhāsatīti attho. Yato kayitañca
atk-vin01a0:2809_1: hoti vikkayitañcāti yadā kayitañca hoti parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ karontena,
atk-vin01a0:2809_2: vikkītañca attano bhaṇḍaṃ parahatthagataṃ karontena. “Iminā ima”ntiādivacanānurūpato
atk-vin01a0:2809_3: pana pāṭhe paṭhamaṃ attano bhaṇḍaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2810_0: Nissajjitabbanti evaṃ parassa hatthato kayavasena gahitakappiyabhaṇḍaṃ nissajjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2810_1: Ayañhi kayavikkayo ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike avasesehi gihipabbajitehi antamaso
atk-vin01a0:2811_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – vatthena vā vatthaṃ hotu bhattena vā bhattaṃ, yaṃ kiñci kappiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2811_1: “iminā imaṃ dehī”ti vadati, dukkaṭaṃ. Evaṃ vatvā mātuyāpi attano bhaṇḍaṃ deti, dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2811_2: “Iminā imaṃ dehī”ti vutto vā “imaṃ dehi, imaṃ te dassāmī”ti vatvā vā mātuyāpi bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2811_3: attanā gaṇhāti, dukkaṭaṃ. Attano bhaṇḍe parahatthaṃ parabhaṇḍe ca attano hatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2811_4: sampatte nissaggiyaṃ. Mātaraṃ pana pitaraṃ vā “imaṃ dehī”ti vadato viññatti na hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2811_5: “Imaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vadato saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ na hoti. Aññātakaṃ “imaṃ dehī”ti vadato
atk-vin01a0:2811_6: viññatti hoti. “Imaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vadato saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ hoti. “Iminā imaṃ dehī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2811_7: kayavikkayaṃ āpajjato nissaggiyaṃ. Tasmā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ parivattentena mātāpitūhipi
atk-vin01a0:2811_8: saddhiṃ kayavikkayaṃ aññātakehi saddhiṃ tisso āpattiyo mocentena parivattetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2812_0: Tatrāyaṃ parivattanavidhi – bhikkhussa pātheyyataṇḍulā honti, so antarāmagge bhattahatthaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2812_1: purisaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ taṇḍulā atthi, na ca no imehi attho, bhattena pana attho”ti
atk-vin01a0:2812_2: vadati. Puriso taṇḍule gahetvā bhattaṃ deti, vaṭṭati. Tissopi āpattiyo na honti.
atk-vin01a0:2812_3: Antamaso nimittakammamattampi na hoti. Kasmā? Mūlassa atthitāya. Parato ca vuttameva
atk-vin01a0:2812_4: “idaṃ amhākaṃ atthi, amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca atthoti bhaṇatī”ti. Yo pana evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2812_5: akatvā “iminā imaṃ dehī”ti parivatteti; yathāvatthukameva. Vighāsādaṃ disvā “imaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2812_6: odanaṃ bhuñjitvā, rajanaṃ vā dārūni vā āharā”ti vadati, rajanachalligaṇanāya dārugaṇanāya
atk-vin01a0:2812_7: ca nissaggiyāni honti. “Imaṃ odanaṃ bhuñjitvā idaṃ nāma karothā”ti dantakārādīhi
atk-vin01a0:2812_8: sippikehi dhamakaraṇādīsu taṃ taṃ parikkhāraṃ kāreti, rajakehi vā vatthaṃ dhovāpeti;
atk-vin01a0:2812_9: yathāvatthukameva. Nhāpitena kese chindāpeti, kammakārehi navakammaṃ kāreti; yathāvatthukameva.
atk-vin01a0:2812_10: Sace pana “idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā idaṃ karothā”ti na vadati “idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñja
atk-vin01a0:2812_11: bhuttosi bhuñjissasi, idaṃ nāma karohī”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Ettha ca kiñcāpi vatthadhovane
atk-vin01a0:2812_12: vā kesacchedane vā bhūmisodhanādinavakamme vā parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ nissajjitabbaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2812_13: nāma natthi. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā na sakkā etaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2812_14: tasmā yathā nissaggiyavatthumhi paribhutte vā naṭṭhe vā pācittiyaṃ deseti, evamidhāpi desetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2813_0: 596. Kayavikkaye kayavikkayasaññītiādimhi yo kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjati, so tasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2813_1: kayavikkayasaññī vā bhavatu vematiko vā, na kayavikkayasaññī vā nissaggiyapācittiyameva.
atk-vin01a0:2813_2: Cūḷattike dvīsu padesu dukkaṭamevāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2814_0: 597. Agghaṃ pucchatīti “ayaṃ tava patto kiṃ agghatī”ti pucchati. “Idaṃ nāmā”ti vutte
atk-vin01a0:2814_1: pana sace tassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ mahagghaṃ hoti, evañca naṃ paṭivadati “upāsaka, mama
atk-vin01a0:2814_2: idaṃ vatthu mahagghaṃ, tava pattaṃ aññassa dehī”ti. Taṃ sutvā itaro “aññaṃ thālakampi
atk-vin01a0:2814_3: dassāmī”ti vadati gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati, “idaṃ amhākaṃ atthī”ti vuttalakkhaṇe patati.
atk-vin01a0:2814_4: Sace so patto mahaggho, bhikkhuno vatthu appagghaṃ, pattasāmiko cassa appagghabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2814_5: na jānāti, patto na gahetabbo, “mama vatthu appaggha”nti ācikkhitabbaṃ. Mahagghabhāvaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2814_6: ñatvā vañcetvā gaṇhanto hi gahitabhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā kāretabbataṃ āpajjati. Sace pattasāmiko
atk-vin01a0:2814_7: “hotu, bhante, sesaṃ mama puññaṃ bhavissatī”ti deti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2815_0: Kappiyakārakassa ācikkhatīti yassa hatthato bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ antamaso
atk-vin01a0:2815_1: tassa puttabhātikampi kappiyakārakaṃ katvā “iminā imaṃ nāma gahetvā dehī”ti ācikkhati.
atk-vin01a0:2815_2: So ce cheko hoti, punappunaṃ apanetvā vivaditvā gaṇhāti, tuṇhībhūtena ṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2815_3: No ce cheko hoti, na jānāti gahetuṃ, vāṇijako taṃ vañceti, “mā gaṇhā”ti vattabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2816_0: Idaṃ amhākantiādimhi “idaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ telaṃ vā sappi vā amhākaṃ atthi, amhākañca
atk-vin01a0:2816_1: aññena appaṭiggahitakena attho”ti bhaṇati. Sace so taṃ gahetvā aññaṃ deti, paṭhamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2816_2: attano telaṃ na mināpetabbaṃ. Kasmā? Nāḷiyañhi avasiṭṭhatelaṃ hoti, taṃ pacchā minantassa
atk-vin01a0:2817: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2822_0: 598. Tena samayenāti pattasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha pattavāṇijjanti gāmanigamādīsu vicarantā
atk-vin01a0:2822_1: pattavāṇijjaṃ vā karissanti. Āmattikāpaṇaṃ vāti amattāni vuccanti bhājanāni, tāni
atk-vin01a0:2822_2: yesaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ te āmattikā, tesaṃ āmattikānaṃ āpaṇaṃ āmattikāpaṇaṃ, kulālabhaṇḍavāṇijakāpaṇanti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2823_0: 602. Tayo pattassa vaṇṇāti tīṇi pattassa pamāṇāni. Aḍḍhāḷhakodanaṃ gaṇhātīti magadhanāḷiyā
atk-vin01a0:2823_1: dvinnaṃ taṇḍulanāḷīnaṃ odanaṃ gaṇhāti. Magadhanāḷi nāma aḍḍhaterasapalā hotīti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2823_2: vuttaṃ. Sīhaḷadīpe pakatināḷi mahantā, damiḷanāḷi khuddakā, magadhanāḷi pamāṇayuttā,
atk-vin01a0:2823_3: tāya magadhanāḷiyā diyaḍḍhanāḷi ekā sīhaḷanāḷi hotīti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Catubhāgaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2823_4: khādananti odanassa catutthabhāgappamāṇaṃ khādanaṃ, taṃ hatthahāriyassa muggasūpassa
atk-vin01a0:2823_5: vasena veditabbaṃ. Tadupiyaṃ byañjananti tassa odanassa anurūpaṃ macchamaṃsasākaphalakaḷīrādibyañjanaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2824_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – anupahatapurāṇasālitaṇḍulānaṃ sukoṭṭitaparisuddhānaṃ dve magadhanāḷiyo
atk-vin01a0:2824_1: gahetvā tehi taṇḍulehi anuttaṇḍulaṃ akilinnaṃ apiṇḍitaṃ suvisadaṃ kundamakuḷarāsisadisaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2824_2: avassāvitodanaṃ pacitvā niravasesaṃ patte pakkhipitvā tassa odanassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo
atk-vin01a0:2824_3: nātighano nātitanuko hatthahāriyo sabbasambhārasaṅkhato muggasūpo pakkhipitabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2824_4: Tato ālopassa ālopassa anurūpaṃ yāvacarimālopappahonakaṃ macchamaṃsādibyañjanaṃ pakkhipitabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2824_5: sappitelatakkarasakañjikādīni pana gaṇanūpagāni na honti, tāni hi odanagatikāneva,
atk-vin01a0:2824_6: neva hāpetuṃ na vaḍḍhetuṃ sakkonti. Evametaṃ sabbampi pakkhittaṃ sace pattassa mukhavaṭṭiyā
atk-vin01a0:2824_7: heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati, suttena vā hīrena vā chindantassa suttassa vā hīrassa
atk-vin01a0:2824_8: vā heṭṭhimantaṃ phusati, ayaṃ ukkaṭṭho nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ
atk-vin01a0:2824_9: tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ ukkaṭṭhomako nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ na sampāpuṇāti, antogatameva
atk-vin01a0:2825_0: Nāḷikodananti magadhanāḷiyā ekāya taṇḍulanāḷiyā odanaṃ. Patthodananti magadhanāḷiyā
atk-vin01a0:2825_1: upaḍḍhanāḷikodanaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana nāmamatte viseso –
atk-vin01a0:2825_2: sace nāḷikodanādi sabbampi pakkhittaṃ vuttanayeneva heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2825_3: majjhimo nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ majjhimomako
atk-vin01a0:2825_4: nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ na sampāpuṇāti antogatameva hoti, ayaṃ majjhimukkaṭṭho
atk-vin01a0:2825_5: nāma patto. Sace patthodanādi sabbampi pakkhittaṃ heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2825_6: omako nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ omakomako nāma
atk-vin01a0:2825_7: patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ na pāpuṇāti antogatameva hoti, ayaṃ omakukkaṭṭho nāma pattoti
atk-vin01a0:2825_8: evamete nava pattā. Tesu dve apattā ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho ca omakomako ca. “Tato ukkaṭṭho
atk-vin01a0:2825_9: apatto omako apatto”ti idañhi ete sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho hi ettha ukkaṭṭhato
atk-vin01a0:2825_10: ukkaṭṭhattā “tato ukkaṭṭho apatto”ti vutto. Omakomako ca omakato omakattā tato omako
atk-vin01a0:2825_11: apattoti vutto. Tasmā ete bhājanaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbā, na adhiṭṭhānupagā,
atk-vin01a0:2825_12: na vikappanupagā. Itare pana satta adhiṭṭhahitvā vā vikappetvā vā paribhuñjitabbā,
atk-vin01a0:2825_13: evaṃ akatvā taṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti taṃ sattavidhampi pattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2826: 607. Nissaggiyaṃ pattaṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjatīti yāguṃ pivitvā dhote dukkaṭaṃ, khañjakaṃ khāditvā bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā dhote dukkaṭanti evaṃ payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2827_0: 608. Anāpatti antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vikappetīti ettha pana pamāṇayuttassapi adhiṭṭhānavikappanupagattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2827_1: evaṃ veditabbaṃ – ayopatto pañcahi pākehi mattikāpatto dvīhi pākehi pakko adhiṭṭhānupago,
atk-vin01a0:2827_2: ubhopi yaṃ mūlaṃ dātabbaṃ, tasmiṃ dinneyeva. Sace ekopi pāko ūno hoti, kākaṇikamattampi
atk-vin01a0:2827_3: vā mūlaṃ adinnaṃ, na adhiṭṭhānupago. Sacepi pattasāmiko vadati “yadā tumhākaṃ mūlaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2827_4: bhavissati, tadā dassatha, adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjathā”ti neva adhiṭṭhānupago hoti,
atk-vin01a0:2827_5: pākassa hi ūnattā pattasaṅkhaṃ na gacchati, mūlassa sakalassa vā ekadesassa vā adinnattā
atk-vin01a0:2827_6: sakabhāvaṃ na upeti, aññasseva santako hoti, tasmā pāke ca mūle ca niṭṭhiteyeva adhiṭṭhānupago
atk-vin01a0:2827_7: hoti. Yo adhiṭṭhānupago, sveva vikappanupago, so hatthaṃ āgatopi anāgatopi adhiṭṭhātabbo
atk-vin01a0:2827_8: vikappetabbo vā. Yadi hi pattakārako mūlaṃ labhitvā sayaṃ vā dātukāmo hutvā “ahaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2827_9: bhante, tumhākaṃ pattaṃ katvā asukadivase nāma pacitvā ṭhapessāmī”ti vadati, bhikkhu
atk-vin01a0:2827_10: ca tena paricchinnadivasato dasāhaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana
atk-vin01a0:2827_11: pattakārako “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pattaṃ katvā pacitvā sāsanaṃ pesessāmī”ti vatvā tatheva
atk-vin01a0:2827_12: karoti, tena pesitabhikkhu pana tassa bhikkhuno na āroceti, añño disvā vā sutvā vā
atk-vin01a0:2827_13: “tumhākaṃ, bhante, patto niṭṭhito”ti āroceti, etassa ārocanaṃ napamāṇaṃ. Yadā pana
atk-vin01a0:2827_14: tena pesitoyeva āroceti, tassa vacanaṃ sutadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato
atk-vin01a0:2827_15: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Sace pattakārako “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pattaṃ katvā pacitvā kassaci
atk-vin01a0:2827_16: hatthe pahiṇissāmī”ti vatvā tatheva karoti, pattaṃ gahetvā āgatabhikkhu pana attano
atk-vin01a0:2827_17: pariveṇe ṭhapetvā tassa na āroceti, añño koci bhaṇati “api, bhante, adhunā ābhato
atk-vin01a0:2827_18: patto sundaro”ti! “Kuhiṃ, āvuso, patto”ti? “Itthannāmassa hatthe pesito”ti. Etassapi
atk-vin01a0:2827_19: vacanaṃ na pamāṇaṃ. Yadā pana so bhikkhu pattaṃ deti, laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2827_20: atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Tasmā dasāhaṃ anatikkāmetvāva adhiṭṭhātabbo vikappetabbo vā.
atk-vin01a0:2828_0: Tattha dve pattassa adhiṭṭhānā – kāyena vā adhiṭṭhāti, vācāya vā adhiṭṭhāti. Tesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2828_1: vasena adhiṭṭhahantena ca “imaṃ pattaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti vā “etaṃ pattaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2828_2: vā evaṃ sammukhe vā parammukhe vā ṭhitaṃ purāṇapattaṃ paccuddharitvā aññassa vā datvā
atk-vin01a0:2828_3: navaṃ pattaṃ yattha katthaci ṭhitaṃ hatthena parāmasitvā “imaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2828_4: cittena ābhogaṃ katvā kāyavikāraṃ karontena kāyena vā adhiṭṭhātabbo, vacībhedaṃ katvā
atk-vin01a0:2828_5: vācāya vā adhiṭṭhātabbo. Tatra duvidhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ – sace hatthapāse hoti “imaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2828_6: pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā. Atha antogabbhe vā uparipāsāde vā sāmantavihāre
atk-vin01a0:2828_7: vā hoti, ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā “etaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā.
atk-vin01a0:2829_0: Adhiṭṭhahantena pana ekakena adhiṭṭhātumpi vaṭṭati, aññassa santike adhiṭṭhātumpi
atk-vin01a0:2829_1: vaṭṭati. Aññassa santike ayamānisaṃso – sacassa “adhiṭṭhito nu kho me, no”ti vimati
atk-vin01a0:2829_2: uppajjati, itaro sāretvā vimatiṃ chindissatīti. Sace koci dasa patte labhitvā sabbeva
atk-vin01a0:2829_3: attanāva paribhuñjitukāmo hoti, na sabbe adhiṭṭhātabbā. Ekaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāya punadivase
atk-vin01a0:2829_4: taṃ paccuddharitvā añño adhiṭṭhātabbo. Etenupāyena vassasatampi pariharituṃ sakkā.
atk-vin01a0:2830_0: Evaṃ appamattassa bhikkhuno siyā adhiṭṭhānavijahananti? Siyā. Sace hi ayaṃ pattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2830_1: aññassa vā deti, vibbhamati vā sikkhaṃ vā paccakkhāti, kālaṃ vā karoti, liṅgaṃ vāssa
atk-vin01a0:2830_2: parivattati, paccuddharati vā, patte vā chiddaṃ hoti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:2833_0: Coraharaṇavissāsaggāhehipi vijahatiyeva. Kittakena chiddena adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhijjati?
atk-vin01a0:2833_1: Yena kaṅgusitthaṃ nikkhamati ceva pavisati ca. Idañhi sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ lāmakadhaññasitthaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2833_2: tasmiṃ ayacuṇṇena vā āṇiyā vā paṭipākatike kate dasāhabbhantare puna adhiṭṭhātabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2833_3: Ayaṃ tāva “antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vikappetī”ti ettha adhiṭṭhāne vinicchayo.
atk-vin01a0:2834_0: Vikappane pana dve vikappanā – sammukhāvikappanā ca parammukhāvikappanā ca. Kathaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2834_1: sammukhāvikappanā hoti? Pattānaṃ ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā “imaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2834_2: patta”nti vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ patta”nti vā “ete patte”ti vā vatvā “tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2834_3: vattabbaṃ. Ayamekā sammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati, paribhuñjituṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:2834_4: vissajjetuṃ vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vā na vaṭṭati. “Mayhaṃ santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi
atk-vin01a0:2834_5: vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti evaṃ pana vutte paccuddhāro nāma hoti, tatopabhuti
atk-vin01a0:2835_0: Aparo nayo – tatheva pattānaṃ ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā tasseva
atk-vin01a0:2835_1: bhikkhuno santike “imaṃ patta”nti vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ patta”nti vā “ete patte”ti
atk-vin01a0:2835_2: vā vatvā pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa attanā abhirucitassa yassa kassaci nāmaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2835_3: gahetvā “tissassa bhikkhuno vikappemī”ti vā “tissāya bhikkhuniyā sikkhamānāya sāmaṇerassa
atk-vin01a0:2835_4: tissāya sāmaṇeriyā vikappemī”ti vā vattabbaṃ, ayaṃ aparāpi sammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvatā
atk-vin01a0:2835_5: nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati, paribhogādīsu pana ekampi na vaṭṭati. Tena pana bhikkhunā “tissassa
atk-vin01a0:2835_6: bhikkhuno santakaṃ…pe… tissāya sāmaṇeriyā santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2835_7: vā karohī”ti vutte paccuddhāro nāma hoti. Tatopabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭanti.
