atk-vin01a0:2836_0: Kathaṃ parammukhāvikappanā hoti? Pattānaṃ tatheva ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca
atk-vin01a0:2836_1: ñatvā “imaṃ patta”nti vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ patta”nti vā “ete patte”ti vā vatvā
atk-vin01a0:2836_2: “tuyhaṃ vikappanatthāya dammī”ti vattabbaṃ. Tena vattabbo – “ko te mitto vā sandiṭṭho
atk-vin01a0:2836_3: vā”ti? Tato itarena purimanayeneva “tisso bhikkhūti vā…pe… tissā sāmaṇerī”ti vā vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2836_4: Puna tena bhikkhunā “ahaṃ tissassa bhikkhuno dammī”ti vā…pe… “tissāya sāmaṇeriyā
atk-vin01a0:2836_5: dammī”ti vā vattabbaṃ, ayaṃ parammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvattā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati, paribhogādīsu
atk-vin01a0:2836_6: pana ekampi na vaṭṭati. Tena pana bhikkhunā dutiyasammukhāvikappanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-vin01a0:2836_7: “itthannāmassa santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti vutte
atk-vin01a0:2836_8: paccuddhāro nāma hoti. Tatopabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin01a0:2837: Imāsaṃ pana dvinnaṃ vikappanānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ, avaseso ca vacanakkamo sabbo paṭhamakathinasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhīti.
atk-vin01a0:2840_0: 609. Tena samayenāti ūnapañcabandhanasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha na yāpetīti so kira yadi
atk-vin01a0:2840_1: ariyasāvako nābhavissā, aññathattampi agamissā, evaṃ tehi ubbāḷho, sotāpannattā pana
atk-vin01a0:2840_2: kevalaṃ sarīreneva na yāpeti, tena vuttaṃ – “attanāpi na yāpeti, puttadārāpissa kilamantī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2841_0: 612-3. Ūnapañcabandhanenāti ettha ūnāni pañca bandhanāni assāti ūnapañcabandhano,
atk-vin01a0:2841_1: nāssa pañca bandhanāni pūrentīti attho, tena ūnapañcabandhanena. Itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇe
atk-vin01a0:2841_2: karaṇavacanaṃ. Tattha yasmā abandhanassāpi pañca bandhanāni na pūrenti, sabbaso natthitāya,
atk-vin01a0:2841_3: tasmā padabhājane “abandhano vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Ūnapañcabandhanenā”ti ca vuttattā
atk-vin01a0:2841_4: yassa pañcabandhano patto hoti, tassa so apatto, tasmā aññaṃ viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2841_5: Bandhanañca nāmetaṃ yasmā bandhanokāse sati hoti, asati na hoti, tasmā tassa lakkhaṇaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2842_0: Dvaṅgulā rāji na hotīti mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulappamāṇā ekāpi rāji na hoti. Yassa
atk-vin01a0:2842_1: dvaṅgulā rāji hotīti yassa pana tādisā ekā rāji hoti, so tassā rājiyā heṭṭhimapariyante
atk-vin01a0:2842_2: pattavedhakena vijjhitvā pacitvā suttarajjuka-makacirajjukādīhi vā tipusuttakena
atk-vin01a0:2842_3: vā bandhitabbo, taṃ bandhanaṃ āmisassa alagganatthaṃ tipupaṭṭakena vā kenaci baddhasilesena
atk-vin01a0:2842_4: vā paṭicchādetabbaṃ. So ca patto adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbo, sukhumaṃ vā chiddaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2842_5: katvā bandhitabbo. Suddhehi pana madhusitthakalākhāsajjulasādīhi bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2842_6: Phāṇitaṃ jhāpetvā pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Mukhavaṭṭisamīpe pana pattavedhakena
atk-vin01a0:2842_7: vijjhiyamāno kapālassa bahalattā bhijjati, tasmā heṭṭhā vijjhitabbo. Yassa pana dve
atk-vin01a0:2842_8: rājiyo ekāyeva vā caturaṅgulā, tassa dve bandhanāni dātabbāni. Yassa tisso ekāyeva
atk-vin01a0:2842_9: vā chaḷaṅgulā, tassa tīṇi. Yassa catasso ekāyeva vā aṭṭhaṅgulā, tassa cattāri. Yassa
atk-vin01a0:2842_10: pañca ekāyeva vā dasaṅgulā, so baddhopi abaddhopi apattoyeva, añño viññāpetabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2843_0: Ayopatte pana sacepi pañca vā atirekāni vā chiddāni honti, tāni ce ayacuṇṇena vā
atk-vin01a0:2843_1: āṇiyā vā lohamaṇḍalakena vā baddhāni maṭṭhāni honti, sveva patto paribhuñjitabbo,
atk-vin01a0:2843_2: na añño viññāpetabbo. Atha pana ekampi chiddaṃ mahantaṃ hoti, lohamaṇḍalakena baddhampi
atk-vin01a0:2843_3: maṭṭhaṃ na hoti, patte āmisaṃ laggati, akappiyo hoti, ayaṃ apatto. Añño viññāpetabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2844_0: 615. Thero vattabboti patte ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā “ayaṃ, bhante, patto pamāṇayutto sundaro
atk-vin01a0:2844_1: therānurūpo, taṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattabbo. Yo na gaṇheyyāti anukampāya na gaṇhantassa
atk-vin01a0:2844_2: dukkaṭaṃ. Yo pana santuṭṭhiyā “kiṃ me aññena pattenā”ti na gaṇhāti, tassa anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2845_0: Na adeseti mañcapīṭhachattanāgadantakādike adese, na nikkhipitabbo. Yattha purimaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2845_1: sundaraṃ pattaṃ ṭhapeti, tattheva ṭhapetabbo. Pattassa hi nikkhipanadeso “anujānāmi,
atk-vin01a0:2846_0: Na abhogenāti yāgurandhanarajanapacanādinā aparibhogena na paribhuñjitabbo. Antarāmagge
atk-vin01a0:2846_1: pana byādhimhi uppanne aññasmiṃ bhājane asati mattikāya limpetvā yāguṃ vā pacituṃ
atk-vin01a0:2847_0: Na vissajjetabboti aññassa na dātabbo. Sace pana saddhivihāriko vā antevāsiko vā
atk-vin01a0:2847_1: aññaṃ varapattaṃ ṭhapetvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ sāruppo, ayaṃ therassā”ti gaṇhāti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2847_2: Añño vā taṃ gahetvā attano pattaṃ deti, vaṭṭati. “Mayhameva pattaṃ āharā”ti vattabbakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-vin01a0:2848_0: 617. Pavāritānanti ettha saṅghavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne pañcabandhaneneva vaṭṭati. Puggalavasena
atk-vin01a0:2848_1: pavāritaṭṭhāne ūnapañcabandhanenāpi vaṭṭatīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2849: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2852: 618. Tena samayenāti bhesajjasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha attho, bhanteti rājā bhikkhū uyyuttappayutte therassa leṇatthāya pabbhāraṃ sodhente disvā ārāmikaṃ dātukāmo pucchi.
atk-vin01a0:2853_0: 619-21. Pāṭiyekkoti visuṃ eko. Mālākiteti katamāle mālādhare, kusumamālāpaṭimaṇḍiteti
atk-vin01a0:2853_1: attho. Tiṇaṇḍupakanti tiṇacumbaṭakaṃ. Paṭimuñcīti ṭhapesi. Sā ahosi suvaṇṇamālāti
atk-vin01a0:2853_2: dārikāya sīse ṭhapitamattāyeva therassa adhiṭṭhānavasena suvaṇṇapadumamālā ahosi.
atk-vin01a0:2853_3: Tañhi tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ sīse ṭhapitamattameva “suvaṇṇamālā hotū”ti thero adhiṭṭhāsi. Dutiyampi
atk-vin01a0:2854_0: Suvaṇṇanti adhimuccīti “sovaṇṇamayo hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Pañcannaṃ bhesajjānanti sappiādīnaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2854_1: Bāhulikāti paccayabāhulikatāya paṭipannā. Kolambepi ghaṭepītiettha kolambā nāma mahāmukhacāṭiyo
atk-vin01a0:2854_2: vuccanti. Olīnavilīnānīti heṭṭhā ca ubhatopassesu ca gaḷitāni. Okiṇṇavikiṇṇāti sappiādīnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2854_3: gandhena bhūmiṃ khanantehi okiṇṇā, bhittiyo khanantehi upari sañcarantehi ca vikiṇṇā.
atk-vin01a0:2855_0: 622. Paṭisāyanīyānīti paṭisāyitabbāni, paribhuñjitabbānīti attho. Bhesajjānīti bhesajjakiccaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2855_1: karontu vā mā vā, evaṃ laddhavohārāni. “Gosappī”tiādīhi loke pākaṭaṃ dassetvā “yesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2855_2: maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti iminā aññesampi migarohitasasādīnaṃ sappiṃ saṅgahetvā dassesi.
atk-vin01a0:2855_3: Yesañhi khīraṃ atthi, sappipi tesaṃ atthiyeva, taṃ pana sulabhaṃ vā hotu dullabhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2856_0: Sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbānīti sannidhiṃ katvā nidahitvā paribhuñjitabbāni.
atk-vin01a0:2856_1: Kathaṃ? Pāḷiyā āgatasappiādīsu sappi tāva purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ tadahupurebhattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2856_2: sāmisampi nirāmisampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ nirāmisaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2856_3: paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Sattāhātikkame sace ekabhājane ṭhapitaṃ, ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃ. Sace
atk-vin01a0:2856_4: bahūsu vatthugaṇanāya nissaggiyāni, pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva
atk-vin01a0:2856_5: vaṭṭati. Purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittaṃ ajjhoharituṃ
atk-vin01a0:2856_6: na vaṭṭati; abbhañjanādīsu upanetabbaṃ. Sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti, anajjhoharaṇīyataṃ
atk-vin01a0:2856_7: āpannattā. “Paṭisāyanīyānī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Sace anupasampanno purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitanavanītena
atk-vin01a0:2856_8: sappiṃ katvā deti, purebhattaṃ sāmisaṃ vaṭṭati. Sace sayaṃ karoti, sattāhampi nirāmisameva
atk-vin01a0:2856_9: vaṭṭati. Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitanavanītena pana yena kenaci katasappi sattāhampi
atk-vin01a0:2856_10: nirāmisameva vaṭṭati. Uggahitakena kate pubbe vuttasuddhasappinayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2857_0: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīrena vā dadhinā vā katasappi anupasampannena kataṃ sāmisampi
atk-vin01a0:2857_1: tadahupurebhattaṃ vaṭṭati. Sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati. Navanītaṃ tāpentassa
atk-vin01a0:2857_2: hi sāmaṃpāko na hoti, sāmaṃpakkena pana tena saddhiṃ āmisaṃ na vaṭṭati. Pacchābhattato
atk-vin01a0:2857_3: paṭṭhāya ca na vaṭṭatiyeva. Sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti, savatthukassa paṭiggahitattā,
atk-vin01a0:2857_4: “tāni paṭiggahetvā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitehi kataṃ pana abbhañjanādīsu
atk-vin01a0:2857_5: upanetabbaṃ. Purebhattampi ca uggahitakehi kataṃ ubhayesampi sattāhātikkame anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2857_6: Eseva nayo akappiyamaṃsasappimhi. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yattha pāḷiyaṃ āgatasappinā
atk-vin01a0:2857_7: nissaggiyaṃ, tattha iminā dukkaṭaṃ. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvā manussasappi
atk-vin01a0:2857_8: ca navanītañca paṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ duppaṭikkhittaṃ, sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu anuññātattā.
atk-vin01a0:2858_0: Pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ navanītampi purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a0:2858_1: pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya nirāmisameva. Sattāhātikkame nānābhājanesu ṭhapite bhājanagaṇanāya
atk-vin01a0:2858_2: ekabhājanepi amissetvā piṇḍapiṇḍavasena ṭhapite piṇḍagaṇanāya nissaggiyāni. Pacchābhattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2858_3: paṭiggahitaṃ sappinayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ettha pana dadhiguḷikāyopi takkabindūnipi
atk-vin01a0:2858_4: honti, tasmā taṃ dhotaṃ vaṭṭatīti upaḍḍhattherā āhaṃsu. Mahāsīvatthero pana “bhagavatā
atk-vin01a0:2858_5: anuññātakālato paṭṭhāya takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsū”ti āha. Tasmā navanītaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2858_7: Pacitvā sappiṃ katvā paribhuñjitukāmena adhotampi pacituṃ vaṭṭati. Yaṃ tattha dadhigataṃ
atk-vin01a0:2858_8: vā takkagataṃ vā taṃ khayaṃ gamissati, ettāvatā hi savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na
atk-vin01a0:2858_9: hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo. Āmisena saddhiṃ pakkattā pana tasmimpi kukkuccāyanti
atk-vin01a0:2858_10: kukkuccakā. Idāni uggahetvā ṭhapitanavanīte ca purebhattaṃ khīradadhīni paṭiggahetvā
atk-vin01a0:2858_11: katanavanīte ca pacchābhattaṃ tāni paṭiggahetvā katanavanīte ca uggahitehi katanavavīte
atk-vin01a0:2858_12: ca akappiyamaṃsanavanīte ca sabbo āpattānāpattiparibhogāparibhoganayo sappimhi vuttakkameneva gahetabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2859_0: Telabhikkhāya paviṭṭhānaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ tattheva sappimpi navanītampi pakkatelampi
atk-vin01a0:2859_1: apakkatelampi ākiranti, tattha takkadadhibindūnipi bhattasitthānipi taṇḍulakaṇāpi
atk-vin01a0:2859_2: makkhikādayopi honti. Ādiccapākaṃ katvā parissāvetvā gahitaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a0:2859_3: paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitabhesajjehi saddhiṃ pacitvā natthupānampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace
atk-vin01a0:2859_4: vaddalisamaye lajji sāmaṇero yathā tattha patitataṇḍulakaṇādayo na paccanti, evaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2859_5: sāmisapākaṃ mocento aggimhi vilīyāpetvā parissāvetvā puna pacitvā deti, purimanayeneva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2860_0: Telesu tilatelaṃ tāva purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato
atk-vin01a0:2860_1: paṭṭhāya nirāmisameva. Sattāhātikkame panassa bhājanagaṇanāya nissaggiyabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-vin01a0:2860_2: Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati. Uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2860_3: ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭati, sīsamakkhanādīsu upanetabbaṃ, sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2860_4: Purebhattaṃ tile paṭiggahetvā katatelaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato
atk-vin01a0:2860_5: paṭṭhāya anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ hoti, sīsamakkhanādīsu upanetabbaṃ, sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2860_6: Pacchābhattaṃ tile paṭiggahetvā katatelaṃ anajjhoharaṇīyameva, savatthukapaṭiggahitattā,
atk-vin01a0:2860_7: sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti, sīsamakkhanādīsu upanetabbaṃ. Purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2861_0: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitakatile bhajjitvā vā tilapiṭṭhaṃ vā sedetvā uṇhodakena vā temetvā
atk-vin01a0:2861_1: katatelaṃ sace anupasampannena kataṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati. Attanā katatelaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2861_2: pana nibbaṭṭitattā purebhattaṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati. Sāmaṃpakkattā sāmisaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a0:2861_3: savatthukapaṭiggahitattā pana pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya ubhayampi anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2861_4: sīsamakkhanādīsu upanetabbaṃ, sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti. Yadi pana appaṃ uṇhodakaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2861_5: hoti abbhukkiraṇamattaṃ, abbohārikaṃ hoti, sāmapākagaṇanaṃ na gacchati. Sāsapatelādīsupi
atk-vin01a0:2862_0: Sace pana purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitānaṃ sāsapādīnaṃ cuṇṇehi ādiccapākena sakkā telaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2862_1: kātuṃ, taṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya nirāmisameva, sattāhātikkame
atk-vin01a0:2862_2: nissaggiyaṃ. Yasmā pana sāsapamadhukacuṇṇādīni sedetvā eraṇḍakaṭṭhīni ca bhajjitvā
atk-vin01a0:2862_3: eva telaṃ karonti, tasmā tesaṃ telaṃ anupasampannehi kataṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi
atk-vin01a0:2862_4: vaṭṭati. Vatthūnaṃ yāvajīvikattā pana savatthukapaṭiggahaṇe doso natthīti. Attanā
atk-vin01a0:2862_5: kataṃ sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogeneva paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Uggahitakehi kataṃ anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2863_0: Telakaraṇatthāya sāsapamadhukaeraṇḍakaṭṭhīni vā paṭiggahetvā kataṃ telaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2863_1: Dutiyadivase kataṃ chāhaṃ vaṭṭati. Tatiyadivase kataṃ pañcāhaṃ vaṭṭati. Catuttha-pañcama-chaṭṭhasattāmadivase
atk-vin01a0:2863_2: kataṃ tadaheva vaṭṭati. Sace yāva aruṇassa uggamanā tiṭṭhati, nissaggiyaṃ. Aṭṭhame
atk-vin01a0:2863_3: divase kataṃ anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ. Anissaggiyattā pana bāhiraparibhoge vaṭṭati. Sacepi
atk-vin01a0:2863_4: na karoti, telatthāya gahitasāsapādīnaṃ sattāhātikkamane dukkaṭameva. Pāḷiyaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:2863_6: paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmayato dukkaṭaṃ hoti. Ayametesu viseso. Sesaṃ yāvakālikavatthuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2864_0: 623. Vasātelanti “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vasāni bhesajjāni, acchavasaṃ, macchavasaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2864_1: susukāvasaṃ, sūkaravasaṃ, gadrabhavasa”nti evaṃ anuññātavasānaṃ telaṃ. Ettha ca “acchavasa”nti
atk-vin01a0:2864_2: vacanena ṭhapetvā manussavasaṃ sabbesaṃ akappiyamaṃsāna vasā anuññātā. Macchaggahaṇena
atk-vin01a0:2864_3: ca susukāpi gahitā honti, vāḷamacchattā pana visuṃ vuttaṃ. Macchādiggahaṇena cettha
atk-vin01a0:2864_4: sabbesampi kappiyamaṃsānaṃ vasā anuññātā. Maṃsesu hi dasamanaussa-hatthi-assa-sunakha-ahi-sīha-byaggha-dīpi-accha-taracchānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2864_5: maṃsāni akappiyāni. Vasāsu ekā manussavasāva. Khīrādīsu akappiyaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a0:2865_0: Anupasampannehi katanibbaṭṭitavasātelaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi
atk-vin01a0:2865_1: vaṭṭati. Pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana tattha sukhumarajasadisaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2865_2: maṃsaṃ vā nhāru vā aṭṭhi vā lohitaṃ vā hoti, taṃ abbohārikaṃ. Sace pana vasaṃ paṭiggahetvā
atk-vin01a0:2865_3: sayaṃ karoti, purebhattaṃ paṭiggahetvā pacitvā parissāvetvā sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogena
atk-vin01a0:2865_4: paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Nirāmisaparibhogañhi sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ – “kāle paṭiggahitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2865_5: kāle nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ telaparibhogena paribhuñjitu”nti. Tatrāpi abbohārikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2865_6: abbohārikameva. Pacchābhattaṃ pana paṭiggahituṃ vā kātuṃ vā na vaṭṭatiyeva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:2866_0: “Vikāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle nippakkaṃ vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ ce paribhuñjeyya,
atk-vin01a0:2866_1: āpatti tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ. Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle nippakkaṃ vikāle
atk-vin01a0:2866_2: saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ ce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ. Kāle ce, bhikkhave,
atk-vin01a0:2866_3: paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ ce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
atk-vin01a0:2866_4: Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ ce paribhuñjeyya, anāpattī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2867_0: Upatissattheraṃ pana antevāsikā pucchiṃsu – “bhante, sappinavanītavasāni ekato pacitvā
atk-vin01a0:2867_1: nibbaṭṭitāni vaṭṭanti, na vaṭṭantī”ti? “Na vaṭṭanti, āvuso”ti. Thero kirettha pakkatelakasaṭe
atk-vin01a0:2867_2: viya kukkuccāyati. Tato naṃ uttari pucchiṃsu – “bhante, navanīte dadhiguḷikā vā takkabindu
atk-vin01a0:2867_3: vā hoti, etaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? “Etampi, āvuso, na vaṭṭatī”ti. Tato naṃ āhaṃsu – “bhante,
atk-vin01a0:2867_4: ekato pacitvā saṃsaṭṭhāni tejavantāni honti, rogaṃ niggaṇhantī”ti? “Sādhāvuso”ti thero sampaṭicchi.
atk-vin01a0:2868_0: Mahāsumatthero panāha – “kappiyamaṃsavasā sāmisaparibhoge vaṭṭati, itarā nirāmisaparibhoge
atk-vin01a0:2868_1: vaṭṭatī”ti. Mahāpadumatthero pana “idaṃ ki”nti paṭikkhipitvā “nanu vātābādhikā bhikkhū
atk-vin01a0:2868_2: pañcamūlakasāvayāguyaṃ acchasūkaratelādīni pakkhipitvā yāguṃ pivanti, sā tejussadattā
atk-vin01a0:2869_0: Madhu nāma makkhikāmadhūti madhukarīhi nāma madhumakkhikāhi khuddakamakkhikāhi bhamaramakkhikāhi
atk-vin01a0:2869_1: ca kataṃ madhu. Taṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisaparibhogampi vaṭṭati,
atk-vin01a0:2869_2: pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogameva vaṭṭati. Sattāhātikkame sace
atk-vin01a0:2869_3: silesasadisaṃ mahāmadhuṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ, itaraṃ vā nānābhājanesu,
atk-vin01a0:2869_4: vatthugaṇanāya nissaggiyāni. Sace ekameva khaṇḍaṃ, ekabhājane vā itaraṃ ekameva nissaggiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2869_5: Uggahitakaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, arumakkhanādīsu upanetabbaṃ. Madhupaṭalaṃ vā
atk-vin01a0:2869_6: madhusitthakaṃ vā sace madhunā amakkhitaṃ parisuddhaṃ, yāvajīvikaṃ. Madhumakkhitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2869_7: pana madhugatikameva. Cīrikā nāma sapakkhā dīghamakkhikā, tumbalanāmikā ca aṭṭhipakkhā
atk-vin01a0:2869_8: kāḷamahābhamarā honti, tesaṃ āsayesu niyyāsasadisaṃ madhu hoti, taṃ yāvajīvikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2870_0: Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbattanti ucchurasaṃ upādāya apakkā vā avatthukapakkā vā
atk-vin01a0:2870_1: sabbāpi avatthukā ucchuvikati phāṇitanti veditabbā. Taṃ phāṇitaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2870_2: purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2870_3: Sattāhātikkame vatthugaṇanāya nissaggiyaṃ. Bahū piṇḍā cuṇṇetvā ekabhājane pakkhittā
atk-vin01a0:2870_4: honti ghanasannivesā, ekameva nissaggiyaṃ. Uggahitakaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2870_5: gharadhūpanādīsu upanetabbaṃ. Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitena aparissāvitaucchurasena kataphāṇitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2870_6: sace anupasampannena kataṃ, sāmisampi vaṭṭati. Sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati. Pacchābhattato
atk-vin01a0:2870_7: paṭṭhāya pana savatthukapaṭiggahitattā anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ, sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2870_9: anāpatti. Esa nayo ucchuṃ paṭiggahetvā kataphāṇitepi. Purebhattaṃ pana parissāvitapaṭiggahitakena
atk-vin01a0:2870_10: kataṃ sace anupasampannena kataṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin01a0:2870_11: sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva. Sayaṃkataṃ purebhattampi nirāmisameva. Pacchābhattaṃ parissāvitapaṭiggahitena
atk-vin01a0:2870_12: kataṃ pana nirāmisameva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭati. Uggahitakakataṃ vuttanayameva. “Jhāmaucchuphāṇitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2870_13: vā koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitaṃ vā purebhattameva vaṭṭatī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2871_0: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “etaṃ savatthukapakkaṃ vaṭṭati, no vaṭṭatī”ti pucchaṃ katvā “ucchuphāṇitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2871_1: pacchābhattaṃ novaṭṭanakaṃ nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ. Sītudakena kataṃ madhukapupphaphāṇitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2871_2: purebhattaṃ sāmisaṃ vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva. Sattāhātikkame
atk-vin01a0:2871_3: vatthugaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ. Khīraṃ pakkhipitvā kataṃ madhukaphāṇitaṃ yāvakālikaṃ. Khaṇḍasakkharaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2871_4: pana khīrajallikaṃ apanetvā sodhenti, tasmā vaṭṭati. Madhukapupphaṃ pana purebhattaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2871_5: allaṃ vaṭṭati, bhajjitampi vaṭṭati. Bhajjitvā tilādīhi missaṃ vā amissaṃ vā katvā
atk-vin01a0:2871_6: koṭṭitampi vaṭṭati. Yadi pana taṃ gahetvā merayatthāya yojenti, yojitaṃ bījato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin01a0:2871_8: phāṇitaṃ yāvakālikameva. Maricapakkehi phāṇitaṃ karonti, taṃ yāvajīvikaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2872_0: Tāni paṭiggahetvāti sacepi sabbānipi paṭiggahetvā eka ghaṭe avinibbhogāni katvā nikkhipati,
atk-vin01a0:2872_1: sattāhātikkame ekameva nissaggiyaṃ. Vinibhuttesu pañca nissaggiyāni. Sattāhaṃ pana
atk-vin01a0:2872_2: anatikkāmetvā gilānenapi agilānenapi vuttanayeneva yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2872_3: Sattavidhañhi odissaṃ nāma – byādhiodissaṃ, puggalodissaṃ, kālodissaṃ, samayodissaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2873_0: Tattha byādhiodissaṃ nāma – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, amanussikābādhe āmakamaṃsaṃ āmakalohita”nti
atk-vin01a0:2873_1: evaṃ byādhiṃ uddissa anuññātaṃ, taṃ teneva ābādhena ābādhikassa vaṭṭati, na aññassa.
atk-vin01a0:2873_2: Tañca kho kālepi vikālepi kappiyampi akappiyampi vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2874_0: Puggalodissaṃ nāma – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, romanthakassa romanthanaṃ. Na ca, bhikkhave,
atk-vin01a0:2874_1: bahimukhadvāraṃ nīharitvā ajjhoharitabba”nti evaṃ puggalaṃ uddissa anuññātaṃ, taṃ
atk-vin01a0:2875_0: Kālodissaṃ nāma – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, cattāri mahāvikaṭāni dātuṃ – gūthaṃ, muttaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2875_1: chārikaṃ, mattika”nti evaṃ ahinā daṭṭhakālaṃ uddissa anuññātaṃ, taṃ tasmiṃyeva kāle
atk-vin01a0:2876: Samayodissaṃ nāma – “gaṇabhojane aññatra samayā”tiādinā nayena taṃ taṃ samayaṃ uddissa anuññātā anāpattiyo, tā tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva samaye anāpattiyo honti, na aññadā.
atk-vin01a0:2877_0: Desodissaṃ nāma – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, evarūpesu paccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena
atk-vin01a0:2877_1: gaṇena upasampada”nti evaṃ paccantadese uddissa anuññātāni upasampadādīni, tāni tattheva
atk-vin01a0:2878_0: Vasodissaṃ nāma – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vasāni bhesajjānī”ti evaṃ vasānāmena anuññātaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2878_1: taṃ ṭhapetvā manussavasaṃ sabbesaṃ kappiyākappiyavasānaṃ telaṃ taṃtadatthikānaṃ telaparibhogena
atk-vin01a0:2879_0: Bhesajjodissaṃ nāma – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañca bhesajjānī”ti evaṃ bhesajjanāmena
atk-vin01a0:2879_1: anuññātāni āhāratthaṃ pharituṃ samatthāni sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitanti. Tāni
atk-vin01a0:2879_2: paṭiggahetvā tadahupurebhattaṃ yathāsukhaṃ pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sati paccaye vuttanayeneva
atk-vin01a0:2880: 624. Sattāhātikkante atikkantasaññī nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti sacepi sāsapamattaṃ hoti sakiṃ vā aṅguliyā gahetvā jivhāya sāyanamattaṃ nissajjitabbameva, pācittiyañca desetabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2881_0: Na kāyikena paribhogena paribhuñjitabbanti kāyo vā kāye aru vā na makkhetabbaṃ. Tehi
atk-vin01a0:2881_3: vuttaṃ. “Kasāve pana pakkhipitvā dvāravātapānakavāṭāni makkhetabbānī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2882_0: Anāpatti antosattāhaṃ adhiṭṭhetīti sattāhabbhantare sappiñca telañca vasañca muddhanitelaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2882_1: vā abbhañjanaṃ vā madhuṃ arumakkhanaṃ phāṇitaṃ gharadhūpanaṃ adhiṭṭheti, anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2882_2: Sace adhiṭṭhitatelaṃ anadhiṭṭhitatelabhājane ākiritukāmo hoti, bhājane ce sukhumaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2882_3: chiddaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ telaṃ purāṇatelena ajjhottharīyati, puna adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2882_4: Atha mahāmukhaṃ hoti, sahasāva bahutelaṃ pavisitvā purāṇatelaṃ ajjhottharati, puna
atk-vin01a0:2882_5: adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi. Adhiṭṭhitagatikameva hi taṃ hoti, etena nayena adhiṭṭhitatelabhājane
atk-vin01a0:2883_0: 625. Vissajjetīti ettha sace dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti,
atk-vin01a0:2883_1: sattāhātikkame dvinnampi anāpatti, paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭati. Sace yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2883_2: so itaraṃ bhaṇati – “āvuso, imaṃ telaṃ sattāhamattaṃ paribhuñja tva”nti. So ca paribhogaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2883_3: na karoti, kassa āpatti? Na kassacipi āpatti. Kasmā? Yena paṭiggahitaṃ tena vissajjitattā,
atk-vin01a0:2884_0: Vinassatīti aparibhogaṃ hoti. Cattenātiādīsu yena cittena bhesajjaṃ cattañca vantañca
atk-vin01a0:2884_1: muttañca hoti, taṃ cittaṃ cattaṃ vantaṃ muttanti vuccati. Tena cittena puggalo anapekkhoti
atk-vin01a0:2884_2: vuccatti, evaṃ anapekkho sāmaṇerassa datvāti attho. Idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ? “Evaṃ antosattāhe
atk-vin01a0:2884_3: datvā pacchā labhitvā paribhuñjantassa anāpattidassanattha”nti mahāsumatthero āha.
atk-vin01a0:2884_4: Mahāpadumatthero panāha – “nayidaṃ yācitabbaṃ, antosattāhe dinnassa hi puna paribhoge
atk-vin01a0:2884_5: āpattiyeva natthi. Sattāhātikkantassa pana paribhoge anāpattidassanatthamidaṃ vutta”nti.
atk-vin01a0:2884_6: Tasmā evaṃ dinnaṃ bhesajjaṃ sace sāmaṇero abhisaṅkharitvā vā anabhisaṅkharitvā vā
atk-vin01a0:2884_7: tassa bhikkhuno natthukammatthaṃ dadeyya, gahetvā natthukammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sace bālo
atk-vin01a0:2884_8: hoti, dātuṃ na jānāti, aññena bhikkhunā vattabbo – “atthi te, sāmaṇera, tela”nti
atk-vin01a0:2884_9: “āma, bhante, atthī”ti. “Āhara, therassa bhesajjaṃ karissāmā”ti. Evampi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2885: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ, akiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2889: 626. Tena samayenāti vassikasāṭikasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha vassikasāṭikā anuññātāti cīvarakkhandhake visākhāvatthusmiṃ anuññātā. Paṭikaccevāti pureyeva.
atk-vin01a0:2890_0: 627. Māso seso gimhānanti catunnaṃ gimhamāsānaṃ eko pacchimamāso seso. Katvāti sibbanarajanakappapariyosānena
atk-vin01a0:2890_1: niṭṭhapetvā. Karontena ca ekameva katvā samaye adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, dve adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin01a0:2891: Atirekamāse sese gimhāneti gimhānanāmake atirekamāse sese.
atk-vin01a0:2892_0: Atirekaddhamāse sese gimhāne katvā nivāsetīti ettha pana ṭhatvā vassikasāṭikāya pariyesanakkhettaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2892_1: karaṇakkhettaṃ nivāsanakkhettaṃ adhiṭṭhānakkhettanti catubbidhaṃ khettaṃ, kucchisamayo
atk-vin01a0:2892_2: piṭṭhisamayoti duvidho samayo, piṭṭhisamayacatukkaṃ kucchisamayacatukkanti dve catukkāni ca veditabbāni.
atk-vin01a0:2893_0: Tattha jeṭṭhamūlapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchimapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva kāḷapakkhuposathā,
atk-vin01a0:2893_1: ayameko addhamāso pariyesanakkhettañceva karaṇakkhettañca. Etasmiñhi antare vassikasāṭikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2893_2: aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ laddhaṃ kātuñca vaṭṭati, nivāsetuṃ adhiṭṭhātuñca na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2893_3: Kāḷapakkhuposathassa pacchimapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva āsāḷhīpuṇṇamā, ayameko
atk-vin01a0:2893_4: addhamāso pariyesanakaraṇanivāsanānaṃ tiṇṇampi khettaṃ. Etasmiñhi antare pariyesituṃ
atk-vin01a0:2893_5: kātuṃ nivāsetuñca vaṭṭati, adhiṭṭhātuṃyeva na vaṭṭati. Āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāsiyā pacchimapāṭipadadivasato
atk-vin01a0:2893_6: paṭṭhāya yāva kattikapuṇṇamā, ime cattāro māsā pariyesanakaraṇanivāsanādhiṭṭhānānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2893_7: catunnaṃ khettaṃ. Etasmiñhi antare aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ laddhaṃ kātuṃ nivāsetuṃ adhiṭṭhātuñca
atk-vin01a0:2893_8: vaṭṭati. Idaṃ tāva catubbidhaṃ khettaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2894_0: Kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pana pacchimapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva jeṭṭhamūlapuṇṇamā,
atk-vin01a0:2894_1: ime satta māsā piṭṭhisamayo nāma. Etasmiñhi antare “kālo vassikasāṭikāyā”tiādinā
atk-vin01a0:2894_2: nayena satuppādaṃ katvā aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ nipphādentassa
atk-vin01a0:2894_3: iminā sikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. “Detha me vassikasāṭikacīvara”ntiādinā
atk-vin01a0:2894_4: nayena viññattiṃ katvā nipphādentassa aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2894_5: Vuttanayeneva satuppādaṃ katvā ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato nipphādentassa imināva sikkhāpadena
atk-vin01a0:2894_6: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Viññattiṃ katvā nipphādentassa aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena
atk-vin01a0:2895: “Mātaraṃ cīvaraṃ yāce, no ca saṅghe pariṇataṃ;
atk-vin01a0:2896: Kenassa hoti āpatti, anāpatti ca ñātake;
atk-vin01a0:2898: Ayañhi pañho imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttoti. Evaṃ piṭṭhisamayacatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2899_0: Jeṭṭhamūlapuṇṇamāsiyā pana pacchimapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva kattikapuṇṇamā,
atk-vin01a0:2899_1: ime pañca māsā kucchisamayo nāma. Etasmiñhi antare vuttanayena satuppādaṃ katvā aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato
atk-vin01a0:2899_2: vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ nipphādentassa vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ. Ye manussā pubbepi vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2899_3: denti, ime pana sacepi attano aññātakaappavāritā honti, vattabhedo natthi, tesu satuppādakaraṇassa
atk-vin01a0:2899_4: anuññātattā. Viññatiṃ katvā nipphādentassa aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2899_5: pācittiyaṃ. Idaṃ pana pakatiyā vassikasāṭikadāyakesupi hotiyeva. Vuttanayeneva satuppādaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2899_6: katvā ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato nipphādentassa iminā sikkhāpadena anāpatti. Viññattiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2899_7: katvā nipphādentassa aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena anāpatti. “Na vattabbā detha me”ti
atk-vin01a0:2899_8: idañhi pariyesanakāle aññātakaappavāriteyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evaṃ kucchisamayacatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2900_0: Naggo kāyaṃ ovassāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha udakaphusitagaṇanāya akatvā nhānapariyosānavasena
atk-vin01a0:2900_1: payoge payoge dukkaṭena kāretabbo. So ca kho vivaṭaṅgaṇe ākāsato patitaudakeneva
atk-vin01a0:2900_2: nhāyanto. Nhānakoṭṭhakavāpiādīsu ghaṭehi āsittaudakena vā nhāyantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2901_0: Vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhiyatīti ettha sace katapariyesitāya vassikasāṭikāya gimhānaṃ pacchima
atk-vin01a0:2901_1: māsaṃ khepetvā puna vassānassa paṭhamamāsaṃ ukkaḍḍhitvā gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsameva
atk-vin01a0:2901_2: karonti, vassikasāṭikā dhovitvā nikkhipitabbā. Anadhiṭṭhitā avikappitā dve māse parihāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2901_3: labhati, vassūpanāyikadivase adhiṭṭhātabbā. Sace satisammosena vā appahonakabhāvena
atk-vin01a0:2901_4: vā akatā hoti, te ca dve māse vassānassa ca cātumāsanti cha māse parihāraṃ labhati.
atk-vin01a0:2901_5: Sace pana kattikamāse kathinaṃ attharīyati, aparepi cattāro māse labhati, evaṃ dasa
atk-vin01a0:2901_6: māsā honti. Tato parampi satiyā paccāsāya mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapentassa ekamāsanti
atk-vin01a0:2901_7: evaṃ ekādasa māse parihāraṃ labhati. Sace pana ekāhadvīhādivasena yāva dasāhānāgatāya
atk-vin01a0:2901_8: vassūpanāyikāya antovasse vā laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca, kadā adhiṭṭhātabbāti etaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu
atk-vin01a0:2901_9: na vicāritaṃ. Laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya antodasāhe niṭṭhitā pana tasmiṃyeva antodasāhe
atk-vin01a0:2901_10: adhiṭṭhātabbā. Dasāhātikkame niṭṭhitā tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbā. Dasāhe appahonte cīvarakālaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2901_11: nātikkametabbāti ayaṃ no attanomati. Kasmā? “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2901_12: na vikappetuṃ; vassikasāṭikaṃ vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ, tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti
atk-vin01a0:2901_13: hi vuttaṃ. Tasmā vassūpanāyikato pubbe dasāhātikkamepi anāpatti. “Dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2901_14: dhāretabba”nti ca vuttaṃ. Tasmā ekāhadvīhādivasena yāva dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya
atk-vin01a0:2901_15: antovasse vā laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca vuttanayeneva antodasāhe vā tadahu vā adhiṭṭhātabbā,
atk-vin01a0:2902_0: Tattha siyā “vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti vacanato “cātumāsabbhantare yadā vā
atk-vin01a0:2902_1: tadā vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Yadi evaṃ, “kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ yāva ābādhā adhiṭṭhātu”nti
atk-vin01a0:2902_2: vuttaṃ sāpi, ca dasāhaṃ atikkāmetabbā siyā. Evañca sati “dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2902_3: dhāretabba”nti idaṃ virujjhati. Tasmā yathāvuttameva gahetabbaṃ, aññaṃ vā acalaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2902_4: kāraṇaṃ labhitvā chaḍḍetabbaṃ. Apica kurundiyampi nissaggiyāvasāne vuttaṃ – “kadā
atk-vin01a0:2902_5: adhiṭṭhātabbā? Laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya antodasāhe niṭṭhitā pana tasmiṃyeva antodasāhe
atk-vin01a0:2902_6: adhiṭṭhātabbā. Yadi nappahoti yāva kattikapuṇṇamā parihāraṃ labhatī”ti.
atk-vin01a0:2903_0: 630. Acchinnacīvarassāti etaṃ vassikasāṭikameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tesañhi naggānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2903_1: kāyovassāpane anāpatti. Ettha ca mahagghavassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsetvā nhāyantassa corupaddavo
atk-vin01a0:2904: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2907_0: 631. Tena samayenāti cīvaraacchindanasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha yampi tyāhanti yampi te
atk-vin01a0:2907_1: ahaṃ. So kira “mama pattacīvaraupāhanapaccattharaṇāni vahanto mayā saddhiṃ cārikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2907_2: pakkamissatī”ti adāsi. Tenevamāha. Acchindīti balakkārena aggahesi, sakasaññāya gahitattā
atk-vin01a0:2907_3: panassa pārājikaṃ natthi, kilametvā gahitattā āpatti paññattā.
atk-vin01a0:2908_0: 633. Sayaṃ acchindati nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti ekaṃ cīvaraṃ ekābaddhāni ca bahūni
atk-vin01a0:2908_1: acchindato ekā āpatti. Ekato abaddhāni visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitāni ca bahūni acchindato “saṅghāṭiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2908_2: āhara, uttarāsaṅgaṃ āharā”ti evaṃ āharāpayato ca vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo. “Mayā dinnāni
atk-vin01a0:2908_3: sabbāni āharā”ti vadatopi ekavacaneneva sambahulā āpattiyo.
atk-vin01a0:2909_0: Aññaṃ āṇāpeti āpatti dukkaṭassāti “cīvaraṃ gaṇhā”ti āṇāpeti, ekaṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Āṇatto
atk-vin01a0:2909_1: bahūni gaṇhāti, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ “saṅghāṭiṃ gaṇha, uttarāsaṅgaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadato vācāya
atk-vin01a0:2909_2: vācāya dukkaṭaṃ. “Mayā dinnāni sabbāni gaṇhā”ti vadato ekavācāya sambahulā āpattiyo.
atk-vin01a0:2910_0: 634. Aññaṃ parikkhāranti vikappanupagapacchimacīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ kiñci antamaso
atk-vin01a0:2910_1: sūcimpi. Veṭhetvā ṭhapitasūcīsupi vatthugaṇanāya dukkaṭāni. Sithilaveṭhitāsu evaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2910_2: Gāḷhaṃ katvā baddhāsu pana ekameva dukkaṭanti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sūcighare pakkhittāsupi
atk-vin01a0:2910_3: eseva nayo. Thavikāya pakkhipitvā sithilabaddha gāḷhabaddhesu tikaṭukādīsu bhesajjesupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin01a0:2911_0: 635. So vā detīti “bhante, tumhākaṃyeva idaṃ sāruppa”nti evaṃ vā deti, atha vā pana
atk-vin01a0:2911_1: “āvuso, mayaṃ tuyhaṃ ‘vattapaṭipattiṃ karissati, amhākaṃ santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhissati,
atk-vin01a0:2911_2: dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇissatī’ti cīvaraṃ adamha, so dāni tvaṃ na vattaṃ karosi, na upajjhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2911_3: gaṇhāsi, na dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāsī”ti evamādīni vutto “bhante, cīvaratthāya maññe bhaṇatha,
atk-vin01a0:2911_4: idaṃ vo cīvara”nti deti, evampi so vā deti. Disāpakkantaṃ vā pana daharaṃ “nivattetha
atk-vin01a0:2911_5: na”nti bhaṇati, so na nivattati. Cīvaraṃ gahetvā rundhathāti, evaṃ ce nivattati,
atk-vin01a0:2911_6: sādhu. Sace “pattacīvaratthāya maññe tumhe bhaṇatha, gaṇhatha na”nti deti. Evampi
atk-vin01a0:2911_7: so vā deti, vibbhantaṃ vā disvā “mayaṃ tuyhaṃ ‘vattaṃ karissatī’ti pattacīvaraṃ adamha,
atk-vin01a0:2911_8: so dāni tvaṃ vibbhamitvā carasī”ti vadati. Itaro “gaṇhatha tumhākaṃ pattacīvara”nti
atk-vin01a0:2911_9: deti, evampi so vā deti. “Mama santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhantasseva demi, aññattha gaṇhantassa
atk-vin01a0:2911_10: na demi. Vattaṃ karontasseva demi, akarontassa na demi, dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantasseva
atk-vin01a0:2911_11: demi, apariyāpuṇantassa na demi, avibbhamantasseva demi, vibbhamantassa na demī”ti
atk-vin01a0:2911_12: evaṃ pana dātuṃ na vaṭṭati, dadato dukkaṭaṃ. Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭati. Cajitvā dinnaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2911_13: acchinditvā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin01a0:2912: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2915_0: 636. Tena samayenāti suttaviññattisikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha khomanti khomavākehi katasuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2915_1: Kappāsikanti kappāsato nibbattaṃ. Koseyyanti kosiyaṃsūhi kantitvā katasuttaṃ. Kambalanti
atk-vin01a0:2915_2: eḷakalomasuttaṃ. Sāṇanti sāṇavākasuttaṃ. Bhaṅganti pāṭekkaṃ vākasuttamevāti eke.
atk-vin01a0:2915_3: Etehi pañcahi missetvā katasuttaṃ pana “bhaṅga”nti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2916_0: Vāyāpeti payoge payoge dukkaṭanti sace tantavāyassa turivemādīni natthi, tāni “araññato
atk-vin01a0:2916_1: āharissāmī”ti vāsiṃ vā pharasuṃ vā niseti, tato paṭṭhāya yaṃ yaṃ upakaraṇatthāya
atk-vin01a0:2916_2: vā cīvaravāyanatthāya vā karoti, sabbattha tantavāyassa payoge payoge bhikkhussa
atk-vin01a0:2916_3: dukkaṭaṃ. Dīghato vidatthimatte tiriyañca hatthamatte vīte nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2916_4: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “yāva pariyosānaṃ vāyāpentassa phalake phalake nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti
atk-vin01a0:2916_5: vuttaṃ. Tampi idameva pamāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Vikappanupagapacchimañhi
atk-vin01a0:2917_0: Apicettha evaṃ vinicchayo veditabbo – suttaṃ tāva sāmaṃ viññāpitaṃ akappiyaṃ, sesaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2917_1: ñātakādivasena uppannaṃ kappiyaṃ. Tantavāyopi aññātakaappavārito viññattiyā laddho
atk-vin01a0:2917_2: akappiyo, seso kappiyo. Tattha akappiyasuttaṃ akappiyatantavāyena vāyāpentassa pubbe
atk-vin01a0:2917_3: vuttanayena nissaggiyaṃ. Teneva pana kappiyasuttaṃ vāyāpentassa yathā pubbe nissaggiyaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2917_4: evaṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Teneva kappiyaṃ akappiyañca suttaṃ vāyāpentassa yadi pacchimacīvarappamāṇena
atk-vin01a0:2917_5: eko paricchedo suddhakappiyasuttamayo, eko akappiyasuttamayoti evaṃ kedārabaddhaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2917_6: viya cīvaraṃ hoti, akappiyasuttamaye paricchede pācittiyaṃ, itarasmiṃ tatheva dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2917_7: Yadi tato ūnaparicchedā honti, antamaso acchimaṇḍalappamāṇāpi, sabbaparicchedesu
atk-vin01a0:2917_8: paricchedagaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ. Atha ekantarikena vā suttena dīghato vā kappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2917_9: akappiyaṃ katvā vītaṃ hoti, phalake phalake dukkaṭaṃ. Kappiyatantavāyenapi akappiyasuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2917_10: vāyāpentassa yathā pubbe nissaggiyaṃ, evaṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Teneva kappiyañca akappiyañca
atk-vin01a0:2917_11: suttaṃ vāyāpentassa sace pacchimacīvarappamāṇā ūnakā vā akappiyasuttaparicchedā honti,
atk-vin01a0:2917_12: tesu paricchedagaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ. Kappiyasuttaparicchedesu anāpatti. Atha ekantarikena
atk-vin01a0:2917_13: vā suttena dīghato vā kappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ akappiyaṃ katvā vītaṃ hoti, phalake phalake dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2918_0: Yadi pana dve tantavāyā honti, eko kappiyo eko akappiyo, suttañca akappiyaṃ, te ce
atk-vin01a0:2918_1: vārena vinanti, akappiyatantavāyena vīte phalake phalake pācittiyaṃ, ūnatare dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2918_2: Itarena vīte ubhayattha dukkaṭaṃ. Sace dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā ekato vinanti, phalake
atk-vin01a0:2918_3: phalake pācittiyaṃ. Atha suttaṃ kappiyaṃ, cīvarañca kedārabaddhādīhi saparicchedaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2918_4: akappiyatantavāyena vīte paricchede paricchede dukkaṭaṃ, itarena vīte anāpatti. Sace
atk-vin01a0:2918_5: dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā ekato vinanti, phalake phalake dukkaṭaṃ. Atha suttampi kappiyañca
atk-vin01a0:2918_6: akappiyañca, te ce vārena vinanti, akappiyatantavāyena akappiyasuttamayesu pacchimacīvarappamāṇesu
atk-vin01a0:2918_7: paricchedesu vītesu paricchedagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ. Ūnakataresu kappiyasuttamayesu
atk-vin01a0:2918_8: ca dukkaṭaṃ. Kappiyatantavāyena akappiyasuttamayesu pamāṇayuttesu vā ūnakesu vā dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin01a0:2919_0: Atha ekantarikena vā suttena dīghato vā akappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ kappiyaṃ katvā vinanti,
atk-vin01a0:2919_1: ubhopi vā te vemaṃ gahetvā ekato vinanti, aparicchede cīvare phalake phalake dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2919_2: saparicchede paricchedavasena dukkaṭānīti. Ayaṃ pana attho mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ apākaṭo,
atk-vin01a0:2920_0: Sace suttampi kappiyaṃ, tantavāyopi kappiyo ñātakappavārito vā mūlena vā payojito,
atk-vin01a0:2920_1: vāyāpanapaccayā anāpatti. Dasāhātikkamanapaccayā pana āpattiṃ rakkhantena vikappanupagappamāṇamatte
atk-vin01a0:2920_2: vīte tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Dasāhātikkamena niṭṭhāpiyamānañhi nissaggiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2920_3: bhaveyyāti. Ñātakādīhi tantaṃ āropetvā “tumhākaṃ, bhante, idaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2921_0: Sace tantavāyo evaṃ payojito vā sayaṃ dātukāmo vā hutvā “ahaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ cīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2921_1: asukadivase nāma vāyitvā ṭhapessāmī”ti vadati, bhikkhu ca tena paricchinnadivasato
atk-vin01a0:2922_0: Sace pana tantavāyo “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ cīvaraṃ vāyitvā sāsanaṃ pesessāmī”ti vatvā tatheva
atk-vin01a0:2922_1: karoti, tena pesitabhikkhu pana tassa bhikkhuno na āroceti, añño disvā vā sutvā vā
atk-vin01a0:2922_2: “tumhākaṃ, bhante, cīvaraṃ niṭṭhita”nti āroceti, etassa ārocanaṃ na pamāṇaṃ. Yadā
atk-vin01a0:2922_3: pana tena pesitoyeva āroceti, tassa vacanaṃ sutadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato
atk-vin01a0:2923_0: Sace tantavāyo “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ cīvaraṃ vāyitvā kassaci hatthe pahiṇissāmī”ti vatvā
atk-vin01a0:2923_1: tatheva karoti, cīvaraṃ gahetvā gatabhikkhu pana attano pariveṇe ṭhapetvā tassa na
atk-vin01a0:2923_2: āroceti, añño koci bhaṇati “api, bhante, adhunā ābhataṃ cīvaraṃ sundara”nti? “Kuhiṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2923_3: āvuso, cīvara”nti? “Itthannāmassa hatthe pesita”nti. Etassapi vacanaṃ na pamāṇaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2923_4: Yadā pana so bhikkhu cīvaraṃ deti, laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2923_5: pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana vāyāpanamūlaṃ adinnaṃ hoti, yāva kākaṇikamattampi avasiṭṭhaṃ, tāva rakkhati.
atk-vin01a0:2924_0: 640. Anāpatti cīvaraṃ sibbetunti cīvarasibbanatthāya suttaṃ viññāpentassa anāpattīti
atk-vin01a0:2924_1: attho. Āyogetiādīsupi nimittatthe bhummavacanaṃ, āyogādinimittaṃ viññāpentassa anāpattīti
atk-vin01a0:2925: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2928_0: 641. Tena samayenāti mahāpesakārasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha suttaṃ dhārayitvāti suttaṃ tuletvā
atk-vin01a0:2928_1: palaparicchedaṃ katvā. Appitanti ghanaṃ. Suvītanti suṭṭhu vītaṃ, sabbaṭṭhānesu samaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2928_2: katvā vītaṃ. Suppavāyitanti suṭṭhu pavāyitaṃ sabbaṭṭhānesu samaṃ katvā tante pasāritaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2928_3: Suvilekhitanti lekhaniyā suṭṭhu vilikhitaṃ. Suvitacchitanti kocchena suṭṭhu vitacchitaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2928_4: suniddhotanti attho. Paṭibaddhanti vekallaṃ. Tanteti tante dīghato pasāraṇeyeva upanetvāti attho.
atk-vin01a0:2929_0: 642. Tatra ce so bhikkhūti yatra gāme vā nigame vā te tantavāyā tatra. Vikappaṃ āpajjeyyāti
atk-vin01a0:2929_1: visiṭṭhaṃ kappaṃ adhikavidhānaṃ āpajjeyya. Pāḷiyaṃ pana yenākārena vikappaṃ āpanno
atk-vin01a0:2929_2: hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “idaṃ kho, āvuso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2930: Dhammampi bhaṇatīti dhammakathampi katheti, “tassa vacanena āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā”ti suttavaḍḍhanaākārameva dasseti.
atk-vin01a0:2931: Pubbe appavāritoti cīvarasāmikehi pubbe appavārito hutvā. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-vin01a0:2932: Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2936_0: 646-9. Tena samayenāti accekacīvarasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha dasāhānāgatanti dasa ahāni
atk-vin01a0:2936_1: dasāhaṃ, tena dasāhena anāgatā dasāhānāgatā, dasāhena asampattāti attho, taṃ dasāhānāgataṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2936_3: vuttaṃ. Pavāraṇāyāti idaṃ pana yā sā dasāhānāgatāti vuttā, taṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ
atk-vin01a0:2937_1: purimanayeneva bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “‘yato paṭṭhāya paṭhamamahāpavāraṇā
atk-vin01a0:2937_2: dasāhānāgatā’ti vuccati, sacepi tāni divasāni accantameva bhikkhuno accekacīvaraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2937_3: uppajjeyya, ‘accekaṃ ida’nti jānamānena bhikkhunā sabbampi paṭiggahetabba”nti. Tena
atk-vin01a0:2937_4: pavāraṇāmāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭhāya uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito
atk-vin01a0:2937_5: hoti. Kāmañcesa “dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba”nti imināva siddho, atthuppattivasena
atk-vin01a0:2937_6: pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2938_0: Accekacīvaranti accāyikacīvaraṃ vuccati, tassa pana accāyikabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “senāya
atk-vin01a0:2938_1: vā gantukāmo hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha saddhāti iminā saddhāmattakameva dassitaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2938_2: Pasādoti iminā suppasannā balavasaddhā. Etaṃ accekacīvaraṃ nāmāti etaṃ imehi kāraṇehi
atk-vin01a0:2938_3: dātukāmena dūtaṃ vā pesetvā sayaṃ vā āgantvā “vassāvāsikaṃ dassāmī”ti evaṃ ārocitaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2938_4: cīvaraṃ accekacīvaraṃ nāma hotī. Chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi
atk-vin01a0:2939_0: Saññāṇaṃ katvā nikkhipitabbanti kiñci nimittaṃ katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ. Kasmā etaṃ vuttaṃ?
atk-vin01a0:2939_1: Yadi hi taṃ pure pavāraṇāya vibhajanti. Yena gahitaṃ, tena chinnavassena na bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2939_2: Sace pana hoti, taṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghikameva hoti. Tato sallakkhetvā sukhaṃ dātuṃ bhavissatīti.
atk-vin01a0:2940_0: 650. Accekacīvare accekacīvarasaññīti evamādi vibhajitvā gahitameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2940_1: Sace pana avibhattaṃ hoti, saṅghassa vā bhaṇḍāgāre, cīvarasamayātikkamepi anāpatti.
atk-vin01a0:2940_2: Iti atirekacīvarassa dasāhaṃ parihāro. Akatassa vassikasāṭikacīvarassa anatthate
atk-vin01a0:2940_3: kathine pañca māsā, vasse ukkaḍḍhite cha māsā, atthate kathine apare cattāro māsā.
atk-vin01a0:2940_4: Hemantassa pacchime divase mūlacīvarādhiṭṭhānavasena aparopi eko māsoti ekādasa māsā
atk-vin01a0:2940_5: parihāro. Satiyā paccāsāya mūlacīvarassa eko māso, accekacīvarassa anatthate kathine
atk-vin01a0:2940_6: ekādasadivasādhiko māso, atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañca māsā, tato paraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2942: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – akiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2945_0: 652. Tena samayenāti sāsaṅkasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha vutthavassā āraññakesūti te pubbepi
atk-vin01a0:2945_1: araññeyeva vihariṃsu. Dubbalacīvarattā pana paccayavasena gāmantasenāsane vassaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2945_2: vasitvā niṭṭhitacīvarā hutvā “idāni nippalibodhā samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmā”ti āraññakesu
atk-vin01a0:2945_3: senāsanesu viharanti. Kattikacorakāti kattikamāse corā. Paripātentīti upaddavanti,
atk-vin01a0:2945_4: tattha tattha ādhāvitvā uttāsenti palāpenti. Antaraghare nikkhipitunti antogāme nikkhipituṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2945_5: Bhagavā yasmā paccayā nāma dhammena samena dullabhā, sallekhavā hi bhikkhu mātarampi
atk-vin01a0:2945_6: viññāpetuṃ na sakkoti. Tasmā cīvaraguttatthaṃ antaraghare nikkhipituṃ anujānāti.
atk-vin01a0:2945_7: Bhikkhūnaṃ pana anurūpattā araññavāsaṃ na paṭikkhipi.
atk-vin01a0:2946_0: 653. Upavassaṃ kho panāti ettha upavassanti upavassa; upavasitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upasampajjantiādīsu
atk-vin01a0:2946_1: viya hi ettha anunāsiko daṭṭhabbo. Vassaṃ upagantvā vasitvā cāti attho. Imassa ca
atk-vin01a0:2946_2: padassa “tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto”ti iminā sambandho. Kiṃ vuttaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2946_3: hoti? Vassaṃ upagantvā vasitvā ca tato paraṃ pacchimakattikapuṇṇamapariyosānakālaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2946_4: yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni sāsaṅkasammatāni sappaṭibhayāni; tathārūpesu
atk-vin01a0:2946_5: bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto ākaṅkhamāno tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare
atk-vin01a0:2946_6: nikkhipeyyāti. Yasmā pana yo vassaṃ upagantvā yāva paṭhamakattikapuṇṇamaṃ vasati,
atk-vin01a0:2946_7: so vuṭṭhavassānaṃ abbhantaro hoti, tasmā idaṃ atigahanaṃ byañjanavicāraṇaṃ akatvā
atk-vin01a0:2946_8: padabhājane kevalaṃ cīvaranikkhepārahaṃ puggalaṃ dassetuṃ “vuṭṭhavassāna”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2946_9: Tassāpi “bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto”ti iminā sambandho. Ayañhi ettha attho “vuṭṭhavassānaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2946_10: bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto”ti evarūpānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abbhantare yo koci bhikkhūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin01a0:2947_0: Araññalakkhaṇaṃ adinnādānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – sace vihāro parikkhitto
atk-vin01a0:2947_1: hoti, parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīlato aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya
atk-vin01a0:2947_2: yāva vihāraparikkhepā minitabbaṃ. Sace vihāro aparikkhitto hoti, yaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2947_3: senāsanaṃ vā bhattasālā vā dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānaṃ vā bodhivā cetiyaṃ vā dūre cepi
atk-vin01a0:2947_4: senāsanato hoti, taṃ paricchedaṃ katvā minitabbaṃ. Sacepi āsanne gāmo hoti, vihāre
atk-vin01a0:2947_5: ṭhitehi gharamānusakānaṃ saddo sūyati, pabbatanadīādīhi pana antaritattā na sakkā
atk-vin01a0:2947_6: ujuṃ gantuṃ, yo cassa pakatimaggo hoti, sacepi nāvāya sañcaritabbo, tena maggena
atk-vin01a0:2947_7: gāmato pañcadhanusatikaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Yo āsannagāmassa aṅgasampādanatthaṃ tato tato
atk-vin01a0:2948: Sāsaṅkasammatānīti “sāsaṅkānī”ti sammatāni; evaṃ saññātānīti attho. Padabhājane pana yena kāraṇena tāni sāsaṅkasammatāni, taṃ dassetuṃ “ārāme ārāmūpacāre”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2949: Saha paṭibhayena sappaṭibhayāni, sannihitabalavabhayānīti attho. Padabhājane pana yena kāraṇena tāni sappaṭibhayāni; taṃ dassetuṃ “ārāme ārāmūpacāre”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2950: Samantā gocaragāme nikkhipeyyāti āraññakassa senāsanassa samantā sabbadisābhāgesu attanā abhirucite gocaragāme satiyā aṅgasampattiyā nikkhipeyya.
atk-vin01a0:2951_0: Tatrāyaṃ aṅgasampatti – purimikāya upagantvā mahāpavāraṇāya pavārito hoti, idamekaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2951_1: aṅgaṃ. Sace pacchimikāya vā upagato hoti chinnavasso vā, nikkhipituṃ na labhati.
atk-vin01a0:2951_2: Kattikamāsoyeva hoti, idaṃ dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ. Kattikamāsato paraṃ na labhati, pañcadhanusatikaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2951_3: pacchimameva pamāṇayuttaṃ senāsanaṃ hoti, idaṃ tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ. Ūnappamāṇe vā gāvutato
atk-vin01a0:2951_4: atirekappamāṇe vā na labhati, yatra hi piṇḍāya caritvā puna vihāraṃ bhattavelāyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2951_5: sakkā āgantuṃ, tadeva idha adhippetaṃ. Nimantito pana addhayojanampi yojanampi gantvā
atk-vin01a0:2951_6: vasituṃ pacceti, idamappamāṇaṃ. Sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayameva hoti, idaṃ catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2951_7: Anāsaṅkaappaṭibhaye hi aṅgayuttepi senāsane vasanto nikkhipituṃ na labhatīti.
atk-vin01a0:2952: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti yā udositasikkhāpade kosambakasammuti anuññātā tassā sammutiyā aññatra; sace sā laddhā hoti, chārattātirekampi vippavasituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2953_0: Puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvāti sace gocaragāmato puratthimāya disāya senāsanaṃ; ayañca
atk-vin01a0:2953_1: pacchimadisaṃ gato hoti, senāsanaṃ āgantvā sattamaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontena
atk-vin01a0:2953_2: gāmasīmampi okkamitvā sabhāyaṃ vā yattha katthaci vā vasitvā cīvarappavattiṃ ñatvā
atk-vin01a0:2953_3: pakkamituṃ vaṭṭatīti attho. Evaṃ asakkontena tattheva ṭhitena paccuddharitabbaṃ,
atk-vin01a0:2954: Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyavācato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, akiriyā, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
atk-vin01a0:2957_0: 657. Tena samayenāti pariṇatasikkhāpadaṃ. Tattha pūgassāti samūhassa; dhammagaṇassāti
atk-vin01a0:2957_1: attho. Paṭiyattanti paṭiyāditaṃ. Bahū saṅghassa bhattāti saṅghassa bahūni bhattāni
atk-vin01a0:2957_2: anekāni lābhamukhāni; na saṅghassa kenaci parihānīti dīpenti. Oṇojethāti detha. Kiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2957_3: panevaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti kasmā na vaṭṭati? Ayañhi abhihaṭabhikkhā abhiharitvā ekasmiṃ
atk-vin01a0:2957_4: okāse saṅghassatthāya paṭiyattā abhihaṭapaṭiyatte ca uddissa ṭhapitabhāge ca payuttavācā nāma natthi.
atk-vin01a0:2958_0: 658. Saṅghikanti saṅghassa santakaṃ. So hi saṅghassa pariṇatattā hatthaṃ anārūḷhopi
atk-vin01a0:2958_1: ekena pariyāyena saṅghassa santako hoti, padabhājane pana “saṅghikaṃ nāma saṅghassa
atk-vin01a0:2958_2: dinnaṃ hoti pariccatta”nti evaṃ atthuddhāravasena nippariyāyatova saṅghikaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2958_3: Lābhanti paṭilabhitabbavatthuṃ āha. Tenevassa niddese “cīvarampī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pariṇatanti
atk-vin01a0:2958_4: saṅghassa ninnaṃ saṅghassa poṇaṃ saṅghassa pabbhāraṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ. Yena pana kāraṇena
atk-vin01a0:2958_5: so pariṇato hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “dassāma karissāmāti vācā bhinnā hotī”ti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2959_0: 659. Payoge dukkaṭanti pariṇatalābhassa attano pariṇāmanapayoge dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena
atk-vin01a0:2959_1: tasmiṃ hatthaṃ ārūḷhe nissaggiyaṃ. Sace pana saṅghassa dinnaṃ hoti, taṃ gahetuṃ na
atk-vin01a0:2959_2: vaṭṭati, saṅghasseva dātabbaṃ. Yopi ārāmikehi saddhiṃ ekato khādati, bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā
atk-vin01a0:2959_3: kāretabbo. Pariṇataṃ pana sahadhammikānaṃ vā gihīnaṃ vā antamaso mātusantakampi “idaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2959_4: mayhaṃ dehī”ti saṅghassa pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā attano pariṇāmetvā gaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2959_5: pācittiyaṃ. “Imassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti evaṃ aññassa pariṇāmentassa suddhikapācittiyaṃ.
atk-vin01a0:2959_6: Ekaṃ pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā attano, ekaṃ aññassa pariṇāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyañceva
atk-vin01a0:2959_7: suddhikapācittiyañca. Eseva nayo bahūsu. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-vin01a0:2963_0: Ayañhi pariṇāmanaṃ sandhāya vutto. Yopi vassikasāṭikasamaye mātugharepi saṅghassa
atk-vin01a0:2963_1: pariṇataṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ ñatvā attano pariṇāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Parassa
atk-vin01a0:2963_3: āharanti, gilāno cepi bhikkhu saṅghassa pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā kiñci yācati, nissaggiyaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2963_4: pācittiyameva. Sace pana so “tumhākaṃ sappiādīni ābhaṭāni atthī”ti pucchitvā “āma,
atk-vin01a0:2963_5: atthī”ti vutte “mayhampi dethā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Athāpi naṃ kukkuccāyantaṃ upāsakā
atk-vin01a0:2963_6: vadanti – “saṅghopi amhehi dinnameva labhati; gaṇhatha, bhante”ti evampi vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2964: 660. Saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghassāti ekasmiṃ vihāre saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññaṃ vihāraṃ uddisitvā “asukasmiṃ nāma mahāvihāre saṅghassa dethā”ti pariṇāmeti.
atk-vin01a0:2965: Cetiyassa vāti “kiṃ saṅghassa dinnena, cetiyassapūjaṃ karothā”ti evaṃ cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti.
atk-vin01a0:2966_0: Cetiyassa pariṇatanti ettha niyametvā aññacetiyassatthāya ropitamālāvacchato aññacetiyamhi
atk-vin01a0:2966_1: pupphampi āropetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Ekassa cetiyassa pana chattaṃ vā paṭākaṃ vā āropetvā
atk-vin01a0:2966_2: ṭhitaṃ disvā sesaṃ aññassa cetiyassa dāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin01a0:2967_0: Puggalassa pariṇatanti antamaso sunakhassāpi pariṇataṃ “imassa sunakhassa mā dehi,
atk-vin01a0:2967_1: etassa dehī”ti evaṃ aññapuggalassa pariṇāmeti, dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana dāyakā “mayaṃ
atk-vin01a0:2967_2: saṅghassa bhattaṃ dātukāmā, cetiyassa pūjaṃ kātukāmā, ekassa bhikkhuno parikkhāraṃ
atk-vin01a0:2967_3: dātukāmā, tumhākaṃ ruciyā dassāma; bhaṇatha, kattha demā”ti vadanti. Evaṃ vutte tena
atk-vin01a0:2967_4: bhikkhunā “yattha icchatha, tattha dethā”ti vattabbā. Sace pana kevalaṃ “kattha demā”ti
atk-vin01a0:2967_5: pucchanti, pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva vattabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-vin01a0:2968: Tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammavacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
